atk-s0201a:15: Buddhopi buddhabhāvaṃ, bhāvetvā ceva sacchikatvā ca;
atk-s0201a:16: Yaṃ upagato gatamalaṃ, vande tamanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-s0201a:24: Pañcahi yā saṅgītā, anusaṅgītā ca pacchāpi.
atk-s0201a:39: Iti pana sabbaṃ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṃ;
atk-s0201a:40: Vuttaṃ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmi.
atk-s0201a:43: Icceva kato tasmā, tampi gahetvāna saddhimetāya;
atk-s0201a:46_0: 1. Tattha majjhimasaṅgīti nāma paṇṇāsato mūlapaṇṇāsā majjhimapaṇṇāsā uparipaṇṇāsāti
atk-s0201a:46_1: paṇṇāsattayasaṅgahā. Vaggato ekekāya paṇṇāsāya pañca pañca vagge katvā pannarasavaggasamāyogā.
atk-s0201a:46_2: Suttato diyaḍḍhasuttasataṃ dve ca suttantā. Padato tevīsuttarapañcasatādhikāni asītipadasahassāni. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-s0201a:49_0: Akkharato satta akkharasatasahassāni cattālīsañca sahassāni tepaññāsañca akkharāni.
atk-s0201a:49_1: Bhāṇavārato asīti bhāṇavārā tevīsapadādhiko ca upaḍḍhabhāṇavāro. Anusandhito pucchānusandhi-ajjhāsayānusandhi-yathānusandhivasena
atk-s0201a:49_2: saṅkhepato tividho anusandhi. Vitthārato panettha tīṇi anusandhisahassāni nava ca
atk-s0201a:52_0: Tattha paṇṇāsāsu mūlapaṇṇāsā ādi, vaggesu mūlapariyāyavaggo, suttesu mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:52_1: Tassāpi “evaṃ me suta”ntiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādi.
atk-s0201a:52_2: Sā panesā paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ādimhi vitthāritā.
atk-s0201a:57_0: 1. Yaṃ panetaṃ “evaṃ me suta”ntiādikaṃ nidānaṃ. Tattha evanti nipātapadaṃ. Metiādīni
atk-s0201a:57_1: nāmapadāni. Ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharatīti ettha vīti upasaggapadaṃ, haratīti ākhyātapadanti
atk-s0201a:58_1: Tathāhesa – “evaṃ jātena maccena kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti evamādīsu upamāyaṃ āgato.
atk-s0201a:58_2: “Evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te paṭikkamitabba”ntiādīsu upadese. “Evametaṃ bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:58_3: evametaṃ sugatā”tiādīsu sampahaṃsane. “Evamevaṃ panāyaṃ vasalī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā
atk-s0201a:58_4: tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu garahaṇe. “Evaṃ bhanteti kho
atk-s0201a:58_5: te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”ntiādīsu vacanasampaṭiggahe. “Evaṃ byākho ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:58_6: bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”tiādīsu ākāre. “Ehi tvaṃ, māṇavaka, yena samaṇo
atk-s0201a:58_7: ānando tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena samaṇaṃ, ānandaṃ, appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ
atk-s0201a:58_8: lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha – ‘subho māṇavo todeyyaputto, bhavantaṃ ānandaṃ,
atk-s0201a:58_9: appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī’ti, evañca vadehi sādhu
atk-s0201a:58_10: kira bhavaṃ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṃ, tenupasaṅkamatu
atk-s0201a:58_11: anukampaṃ upādāyā”tiādīsu nidassane. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, kālāmā, ime dhammā kusalā
atk-s0201a:58_12: vā akusalā vāti? Akusalā, bhante. Sāvajjā vā anavajjā vāti? Sāvajjā, bhante. Viññugarahitā
atk-s0201a:58_13: vā viññuppasatthā vāti? Viññugarahitā, bhante. Samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya
atk-s0201a:58_14: saṃvattanti no vā, kathaṃ vo ettha hotīti? Samattā, bhante, samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya
atk-s0201a:58_15: saṃvattanti, evaṃ no ettha hotī”tiādīsu avadhāraṇe. Svāyamidha ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇesu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:59_0: Tattha ākāraṭṭhena evaṃsaddena etamatthaṃ dīpeti – nānānayanipuṇaṃ anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:59_2: sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena
atk-s0201a:59_3: ko samattho viññātuṃ, sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi
atk-s0201a:60: Nidassanaṭṭhena “nāhaṃ sayambhū, na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi evaṃ sutanti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0201a:61_0: Avadhāraṇaṭṭhena “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0201a:61_1: ānando, gatimantānaṃ, satimantānaṃ, dhitimantānaṃ, upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti
atk-s0201a:61_2: evaṃ bhagavatā, “āyasmā ānando atthakusalo dhammakusalo byañjanakusalo niruttikusalo
atk-s0201a:61_3: pubbāparakusalo”ti evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ
atk-s0201a:61_4: dassento sattānaṃ sotukamyataṃ janeti “evaṃ me sutaṃ, tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato
atk-s0201a:61_5: vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva na aññathā daṭṭhabba”nti.
atk-s0201a:62_0: Me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissati. Tathā hissa “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”ntiādīsu
atk-s0201a:62_1: mayāti attho. “Sādhu me, bhante bhagavā, saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu mayhanti
atk-s0201a:62_2: attho. “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavathā”tiādīsu mamāti attho. Idha pana “mayā
atk-s0201a:62_3: suta”nti ca “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0201a:63_0: Sutanti ayaṃ suta-saddo saupasaggo ca anupasaggo ca gamana-vissuta-kilinna-upacitānuyoga-sotaviññeyya-sotadvārānusāraviññātādianekatthappabhedo.
atk-s0201a:63_1: Tathā hissa “senāya pasuto”tiādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”tiādīsu
atk-s0201a:63_2: vissutadhammassāti attho, “avassutā avassutassāti”ādīsu kilinnā kilinnassāti attho.
atk-s0201a:63_3: “Tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappaka”ntiādīsu upacitanti attho. “Ye jhānapasutā dhīrā”tiādīsu
atk-s0201a:63_4: jhānānuyuttāti attho. “Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta”ntiādīsu sotaviññeyyanti attho. “Sutadharo
atk-s0201a:63_5: sutasannicayo”tiādīsu sotadvārānusāraviññātadharoti attho. Idha panassa sotadvārānusārena
atk-s0201a:63_6: “upadhārita”nti vā “upadhāraṇa”nti vāti attho. Me-saddassa hi mayāti atthe sati “evaṃ
atk-s0201a:63_7: mayā sutaṃ sotadvārānusārena upadhārita”nti yujjati. Mamāti atthe sati “evaṃ mama
atk-s0201a:64_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu evanti sotaviññāṇādiviññāṇakiccanidassanaṃ. Meti vuttaviññāṇasamaṅgipuggalanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:64_2: tassā sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattibhāvappakāsanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:64_3: Meti attappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti dhammappakāsanaṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepo “nānappakārena
atk-s0201a:64_4: ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ, idaṃ pana kataṃ, ayaṃ dhammo suto”ti.
atk-s0201a:65: Tathā evanti niddisitabbappakāsanaṃ. Meti puggalappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti puggalakiccappakāsanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ suttaṃ niddisissāmi, taṃ mayā evaṃ sutanti.
atk-s0201a:66_0: Tathā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:66_1: tassa nānākāraniddeso. Evanti hi ayaṃ ākārapaññatti, meti kattuniddeso, sutanti visayaniddeso.
atk-s0201a:66_2: Ettāvatā nānākārappavattena cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino kattuvisaye gahaṇasanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:67_0: Atha vā evanti puggalakiccaniddeso. Sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso. Meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso.
atk-s0201a:67_1: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – mayā savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena viññāṇavasena
atk-s0201a:68_0: Tattha evanti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti. Kiñhettha
atk-s0201a:68_1: taṃ paramatthato atthi, yaṃ evanti vā meti vā niddesaṃ labhetha? Sutanti vijjamānapaññatti.
atk-s0201a:68_2: Yañhi tamettha sotena upaladdhaṃ, taṃ paramatthato vijjamānanti.
atk-s0201a:69_0: Tathā evanti ca meti ca taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti. Sutanti diṭṭhādīni
atk-s0201a:69_1: upanidhāya vattabbato upanidhāpaññatti. Ettha ca evanti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0201a:69_2: Na hi sammūḷho nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho hoti. Sutanti vacanena sutassa asammosaṃ
atk-s0201a:69_3: dīpeti. Yassa hi sutaṃ sammuṭṭhaṃ hoti, na so kālantarena mayā sutanti paṭijānāti.
atk-s0201a:69_4: Iccassa asammohena paññāsiddhi, asammosena pana satisiddhi. Tattha paññā pubbaṅgamāya
atk-s0201a:70_0: Aparo nayo – evanti vacanena yoniso manasikāraṃ dīpeti, ayoniso manasikaroto hi nānappakārapaṭivedhābhāvato.
atk-s0201a:70_1: Sutanti vacanena avikkhepaṃ dīpeti, vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato. Tathā hi vikkhittacitto
atk-s0201a:70_2: puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ, puna bhaṇathā”ti bhaṇati. Yoniso
atk-s0201a:70_3: manasikārena cettha attasammāpaṇidhiṃ pubbe ca katapuññataṃ sādheti, sammā apaṇihitattassa
atk-s0201a:70_4: pubbe akatapuññassa vā tadabhāvato. Avikkhepena pana saddhammassavanaṃ sappurisūpanissayañca
atk-s0201a:70_5: sādheti. Na hi vikkhittacitto sotuṃ sakkoti, na ca sappurise anupassayamānassa savanaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0201a:71_0: Aparo nayo – yasmā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:71_1: hoti, tassa nānākāraniddesoti vuttaṃ. So ca evaṃ bhaddako ākāro na sammā appaṇihitattano
atk-s0201a:71_2: pubbe akatapuññassa vā hoti, tasmā evanti iminā bhaddakena ākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattiṃ
atk-s0201a:71_3: attano dīpeti, sutanti savanayogena purimacakkadvayasampattiṃ. Na hi appatirūpadese
atk-s0201a:71_4: vasato sappurisūpanissayavirahitassa vā savanaṃ atthi. Iccassa pacchimacakkadvayasiddhiyā
atk-s0201a:71_5: āsayasuddhi siddhā hoti. Purimacakkadvayasiddhiyā payogasuddhi. Tāya ca āsayasuddhiyā
atk-s0201a:71_6: adhigamabyattisiddhi, payogasuddhiyā āgamabyattisiddhi. Iti payogāsayasuddhassa āgamādhigamasampannassa
atk-s0201a:71_7: vacanaṃ aruṇuggaṃ viya sūriyassa udayato yonisomanasikāro viya ca kusalakammassa
atk-s0201a:71_8: arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento evaṃ me sutantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:72_0: Aparo nayo – evanti iminā nānappakārapaṭivedhadīpakena vacanena attano atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:72_2: Evanti ca idaṃ yonisomanasikāradīpakaṃ vacanaṃ bhāsamāno – “ete mayā dhammā manasānupekkhitā
atk-s0201a:72_3: diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti dīpeti. Sutanti idaṃ savanayogadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ bhāsamāno
atk-s0201a:72_4: – “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti. Tadubhayenapi atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ
atk-s0201a:72_5: dīpento savane ādaraṃ janeti. Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto
atk-s0201a:72_6: mahatā hitā paribāhiro hotīti ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ dhammo sotabboti.
atk-s0201a:73_0: “Evaṃ me suta”nti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ
atk-s0201a:73_1: dhammaṃ attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati, sāvakattaṃ paṭijānanto sappurisabhūmiṃ
atk-s0201a:73_2: okkamati. Tathā asaddhammā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, saddhamme cittaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. “Kevalaṃ
atk-s0201a:73_3: sutamevetaṃ mayā tasseva pana bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti, satthāraṃ
atk-s0201a:74_0: Apica “evaṃ me suta”nti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimavacanaṃ vivaranto
atk-s0201a:74_1: “sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa
atk-s0201a:74_4: vacanaṃ, na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kattabbā”ti
atk-s0201a:74_5: sabbadevamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhamme assaddhiyaṃ vināseti, saddhāsampadaṃ uppādetīti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0201a:77: Ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso. Samayanti paricchinnaniddeso. Ekaṃ samayanti aniyamitaparidīpanaṃ. Tattha samayasaddo –
atk-s0201a:79: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati.
atk-s0201a:80_0: Tathā hissa “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0201a:80_1: samavāyo attho. “Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu
atk-s0201a:80_3: “Samayopi kho te, bhaddāli, appaṭividdho ahosi, bhagavā kho sāvatthiyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0201a:80_4: bhagavāpi maṃ jānissati, ‘bhaddāli, nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya na paripūrakārī’ti,
atk-s0201a:80_5: ayampi kho te, bhaddāli, samayo appaṭividdho ahosī”tiādīsu hetu. “Tena kho pana samayena
atk-s0201a:80_6: uggāhamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya
atk-s0201a:81: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-s0201a:83_0: Ādīsu paṭilābho. “Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā”tiādīsu pahānaṃ. “Dukkhassa
atk-s0201a:83_1: pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”tiādīsu paṭivedho.
atk-s0201a:83_3: paṭhamamajjhimapacchimayāma-muhuttādīsu kālappabhedabhūtesu samayesu ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti.
atk-s0201a:84_0: Tattha kiñcāpi etesu saṃvaccharādīsu samayesu yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ yamhi yamhi saṃvacchare
atk-s0201a:84_1: utumhi māse pakkhe rattibhāge divasabhāge vā vuttaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ therassa suviditaṃ
atk-s0201a:84_2: suvavatthāpitaṃ paññāya. Yasmā pana “evaṃ me sutaṃ asukasaṃvacchare asukautumhi asukamāse
atk-s0201a:84_3: asukapakkhe asukarattibhāge asukadivasabhāge vā”ti evaṃ vutte na sakkā sukhena dhāretuṃ
atk-s0201a:84_4: vā uddisituṃ vā uddisāpetuṃ vā, bahu ca vattabbaṃ hoti, tasmā ekeneva padena tamatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:85_0: Ye vā ime gabbhokkantisamayo jātisamayo saṃvegasamayo abhinikkhamanasamayo dukkarakārikasamayo
atk-s0201a:85_2: evamādayo bhagavato devamanussesu ativiya suppakāsā anekakālappabhedā eva samayā,
atk-s0201a:85_3: tesu samayesu desanāsamayasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti. Yo cāyaṃ ñāṇakaruṇākiccasamayesu
atk-s0201a:86_0: Kasmā panettha yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara”nti ca ito aññesu suttapadesu
atk-s0201a:86_1: “yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca bhummavacanena niddeso
atk-s0201a:86_2: kato, vinaye ca “tena samayena buddho bhagavā”ti karaṇavacanena, tathā akatvā “ekaṃ
atk-s0201a:86_3: samaya”nti upayogavacananiddeso katoti. Tattha tathā idha ca aññathā atthasambhavato.
atk-s0201a:86_4: Tattha hi abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho
atk-s0201a:86_5: ca sambhavati. Adhikaraṇañhi kālattho ca samūhattho ca samayo, tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ
atk-s0201a:86_6: khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati, tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:87_0: Vinaye ca hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati. Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi
atk-s0201a:87_1: dubbiññeyyo, tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto
atk-s0201a:87_2: sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi, tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:88_0: Idha pana aññasmiñca evaṃjātike accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati. Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0201a:88_1: imaṃ aññaṃ vā suttantaṃ desesi, accantameva taṃ samayaṃ karuṇāvihārena vihāsi, tasmā
atk-s0201a:91: Aññatra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhā”ti.
atk-s0201a:92_0: Porāṇā pana vaṇṇayanti – “tasmiṃ samaye”ti vā – “tena samayenā”ti vā – “ekaṃ samaya”nti
atk-s0201a:92_1: vā abhilāpamattabhedo esa, sabbattha bhummameva atthoti. Tasmā “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttepi
atk-s0201a:93: Bhagavāti garu. Garuñhi loke “bhagavā”ti vadanti. Ayañca sabbaguṇavisiṭṭhatāya sabbasattānaṃ garu, tasmā “bhagavā”ti veditabbo. Porāṇehipi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0201a:99: Imissā gāthāya vasenassa padassa vitthārato attho veditabbo. So ca visuddhimagge buddhānussatiniddese vuttoyeva.
atk-s0201a:100_0: Ettāvatā cettha evaṃ me sutanti vacanena yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ dassento bhagavato dhammasarīraṃ
atk-s0201a:100_1: paccakkhaṃ karoti. Tena – “nayidaṃ atikkantasatthukaṃ pāvacanaṃ, ayaṃ vo satthā”ti
atk-s0201a:101_0: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavāti vacanena tasmiṃ samaye bhagavato avijjamānabhāvaṃ dassento
atk-s0201a:101_1: rūpakāyaparinibbānaṃ sādheti. Tena “evaṃvidhassa nāma ariyadhammassa desako dasabaladharo
atk-s0201a:101_2: vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyo, sopi bhagavā parinibbuto, kena aññena jīvite āsā janetabbā”ti
atk-s0201a:101_3: jīvitamadamattaṃ janaṃ saṃvejeti, saddhamme cassa ussāhaṃ janeti.
atk-s0201a:102: Evanti ca bhaṇanto desanāsampattiṃ niddisati. Me sutanti sāvakasampattiṃ. Ekaṃ samayanti kālasampattiṃ. Bhagavāti desakasampattiṃ.
atk-s0201a:103_0: Ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharatīti ettha ukkāti dīpikā, tañca nagaraṃ “maṅgaladivaso sukhaṇo
atk-s0201a:103_1: sunakkhattaṃ mā atikkamī”ti rattimpi ukkāsu ṭhitāsu māpitattā ukkaṭṭhāti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:103_2: Daṇḍadīpikāsu jāletvā dhārīyamānāsu māpitattāti vuttaṃ hoti, tassaṃ ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:103_3: Samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Viharatīti avisesena iriyāpathadibbabrahmaariyavihāresu
atk-s0201a:103_5: riyāpathesu aññatarairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ. Tena ṭhitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi
atk-s0201a:103_6: sayānopi bhagavā viharaticceva veditabbo. So hi bhagavā ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena
atk-s0201a:103_7: iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavatteti, tasmā viharatīti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:104_0: Subhagavaneti ettha subhagattā subhagaṃ, sundarasirikattā sundarakāmattā cāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:104_1: hoti. Tassa hi vanassa sirisampattiyā manussā annapānādīni ādāya divasaṃ tattheva
atk-s0201a:104_2: chaṇasamajjaussave karontā bhogasukhaṃ anubhonti, sundarasundare cettha kāme patthenti
atk-s0201a:104_3: “puttaṃ labhāma, dhītaraṃ labhāmā”ti, tesaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti, evaṃ taṃ sundarasirikattā
atk-s0201a:104_4: sundarakāmattā ca subhagaṃ. Apica bahujanakantatāyapi subhagaṃ. Vanayatīti vanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:104_5: attasampadāya sattānaṃ bhattiṃ kāreti, attani sinehaṃ uppādetīti attho. Vanute iti
atk-s0201a:104_7: ca “etha maṃ paribhuñjathā”ti sabbapāṇino yācati viyāti attho. Subhagañca taṃ vanañcāti
atk-s0201a:104_8: subhagavanaṃ. Tasmiṃ subhagavane. Vanañca nāma ropimaṃ, sayaṃjātanti duvidhaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0201a:104_9: veḷuvanajetavanādīni ropimāni. Andhavanamahāvanaañjanavanādīni sayaṃ jātāni. Idampi
atk-s0201a:105_0: Sālarājamūleti ettha sālarukkhopi sāloti vuccati. Yathāha “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:105_1: gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahantaṃ sālavanaṃ, tañcassa eḷaṇḍehi sañchanna”nti
atk-s0201a:108_0: Yo koci rukkhopi. Yathāha “atha kho taṃ, bhikkhave, māluvabījaṃ aññatarasmiṃ sālamūle
atk-s0201a:108_1: nipateyyā”ti. Idha pana vanappatijeṭṭhakarukkho adhippeto. Rājasaddo panassa tameva
atk-s0201a:108_2: jeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ sādheti. Yathāha “suppatiṭṭhitassa kho brāhmaṇa dhammika nigrodharājassā”ti.
atk-s0201a:108_3: Tattha dvedhā samāso, sālānaṃ rājātipi sālarājā, sālo ca so jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena rājā ca
atk-s0201a:108_4: itipi sālarājā. Mūlanti samīpaṃ. Ayañhi mūlasaddo, “mūlāni uddhareyya, antamaso usiranāḷimattānipī”tiādīsu
atk-s0201a:108_6: kāle chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni patanti, ettāvatā rukkhamūla”ntiādīsu samīpe.
atk-s0201a:108_7: Idha pana samīpe adhippeto, tasmā sālarājassa samīpeti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:109_0: Tattha siyā – yadi tāva bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati, “subhagavane sālarājamūle”ti
atk-s0201a:109_1: na vattabbaṃ, atha tattha viharati, “ukkaṭṭhāya”nti na vattabbaṃ, na hi sakkā ubhayattha
atk-s0201a:109_2: ekaṃ samayaṃ viharitunti. Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:110_0: Nanu avocumha “samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacana”nti. Tasmā yathā gaṅgāyamunādīnaṃ samīpe
atk-s0201a:110_1: goyūthāni carantāni “gaṅgāya caranti, yamunāya carantī”ti vuccanti, evamidhāpi yadidaṃ
atk-s0201a:110_2: ukkaṭṭhāya samīpe subhagavanaṃ sālarājamūlaṃ, tattha viharanto vuccati “ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:111_0: Tattha ukkaṭṭhākittanena āyasmā ānando bhagavato gahaṭṭhānuggahakaraṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a:111_1: subhagavanādikittanena pabbajitānuggahakaraṇaṃ. Tathā purimena paccayaggahaṇato attakilamathānuyogavivajjanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:111_3: ca dhammadesanābhiyogaṃ, pacchimena vivekādhimuttiṃ. Purimena karuṇāya upagamanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:111_4: pacchimena paññāya apagamanaṃ. Purimena sattānaṃ hitasukhanipphādanādhimuttataṃ,
atk-s0201a:111_6: phāsuvihāraṃ, pacchimena uttarimanussadhammānuyoganimittaṃ. Purimena manussānaṃ upakārabahulataṃ,
atk-s0201a:111_7: pacchimena devānaṃ. Purimena loke jātassa loke saṃvaḍḍhabhāvaṃ, pacchimena lokena
atk-s0201a:111_8: anupalittataṃ. Purimena “ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya
atk-s0201a:111_9: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. Katamo ekapuggalo,
atk-s0201a:111_10: tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti vacanato yadatthaṃ bhagavā uppanno, tadatthaparinipphādanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:111_11: pacchimena yattha uppanno, tadanurūpavihāraṃ. Bhagavā hi paṭhamaṃ lumbinivane, dutiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:111_12: bodhimaṇḍeti lokiyalokuttarāya uppattiyā vaneyeva uppanno, tenassa vaneyeva vihāraṃ
atk-s0201a:112_0: Tatrāti desakālaparidīpanaṃ. Tañhi yaṃ samayaṃ viharati, tatra samaye. Yasmiñca sālarājamūle
atk-s0201a:112_1: viharati, tatra sālarājamūleti dīpeti. Bhāsitabbayutte vā desakāle dīpeti. Na hi
atk-s0201a:112_2: bhagavā ayutte dese kāle vā dhammaṃ bhāsati. “Akālo kho tāva bāhiyā”ti ādicettha
atk-s0201a:112_3: sādhakaṃ. Khoti padapūraṇamatte avadhāraṇe ādikālatthe vā nipāto. Bhagavāti lokagarudīpanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:112_5: ajjhupagatoti bhikkhū”tiādinā nayena vacanattho veditabbo. Āmantesīti ālapi abhāsi
atk-s0201a:112_6: sambodhesīti ayamettha attho. Aññatra pana ñāpanepi hoti. Yathāha “āmantayāmi vo,
atk-s0201a:112_7: bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo, bhikkhave”ti. Pakkosanepi. Yathāha “ehi tvaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0201a:113_1: Bhikkhanasīlatāguṇayuttopi hi bhikkhu bhikkhanadhammatāguṇayuttopi. Bhikkhane sādhukāritāguṇayuttopīti
atk-s0201a:113_2: saddavidū maññanti. Tena ca nesaṃ bhikkhanasīlatādiguṇayogasiddhena vacanena hīnādhikajanasevitaṃ
atk-s0201a:113_3: vuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatadīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti. Bhikkhavoti iminā ca karuṇāvipphārasommahadayanayananipātapubbaṅgamena
atk-s0201a:113_4: vacanena te attano mukhābhimukhe karoti. Teneva ca kathetukamyatādīpakena vacanena
atk-s0201a:113_5: nesaṃ sotukamyataṃ janeti. Teneva ca sambodhanaṭṭhena sādhukaṃ savanamanasikārepi
atk-s0201a:114_0: Aparesupi devamanussesu vijjamānesu kasmā bhikkhūyeva āmantesīti ce. Jeṭṭhaseṭṭhāsannasadāsannihitabhāvato.
atk-s0201a:114_1: Sabbaparisasādhāraṇā hi bhagavato dhammadesanā. Parisāya ca jeṭṭhā bhikkhū, paṭhamuppannattā.
atk-s0201a:114_2: Seṭṭhā, anagāriyabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvā satthucariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanapaṭiggāhakattā
atk-s0201a:114_3: ca. Āsannā, tattha nisinnesu satthusantikattā. Sadāsannihitā, satthusantikāvacarattāti.
atk-s0201a:114_4: Apica te dhammadesanāya bhājanaṃ, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattisabbhāvato. Visesato ca
atk-s0201a:114_5: ekacce bhikkhūyeva sandhāya ayaṃ desanātipi te eva āmantesi.
atk-s0201a:115_0: Tattha siyā – kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā dhammaṃ desento paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū āmantesi, na
atk-s0201a:115_1: dhammameva desetīti. Satijananatthaṃ. Bhikkhū hi aññaṃ cintentāpi vikkhittacittāpi
atk-s0201a:115_2: dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāpi kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontāpi nisinnā honti, te anāmantetvā
atk-s0201a:115_3: dhamme desiyamāne – “ayaṃ desanā kinnidānā kiṃpaccayā katamāya aṭṭhuppattiyā desitā”ti
atk-s0201a:115_4: sallakkhetuṃ asakkontā duggahitaṃ vā gaṇheyyuṃ, na vā gaṇheyyuṃ. Tena nesaṃ satijananatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:115_5: bhagavā paṭhamaṃ āmantetvā pacchā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a:116_0: Bhadanteti gāravavacanametaṃ, satthuno paṭivacanadānaṃ vā, apicettha bhikkhavoti
atk-s0201a:116_1: vadamāno bhagavā te bhikkhū ālapati. Bhadanteti vadamānā te bhagavantaṃ paccālapanti.
atk-s0201a:116_2: Tathā bhikkhavoti bhagavā ābhāsati. Bhadanteti te paccābhāsanti. Bhikkhavoti paṭivacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:116_3: dāpeti, bhadanteti paṭivacanaṃ denti. Te bhikkhūti ye bhagavā āmantesi. Bhagavato
atk-s0201a:116_4: paccassosunti bhagavato āmantanaṃ paṭiassosuṃ, abhimukhā hutvā suṇiṃsu sampaṭicchiṃsu
atk-s0201a:116_5: paṭiggahesunti attho. Bhagavā etadavocāti bhagavā etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a:117_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ āyasmatā ānandena kamalakuvalayujjalavimalasādurasasalilāya pokkharaṇiyā
atk-s0201a:117_6: mahādvāraṃ viya ca atthabyañjanasampannassa buddhānaṃ desanāñāṇagambhīrabhāvasaṃsūcakassa
atk-s0201a:119_0: Idāni “sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā nikkhittassa suttassa
atk-s0201a:119_1: vaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto. Sā panesā suttavaṇṇanā yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā
atk-s0201a:119_2: vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti, tasmā suttanikkhepaṃ tāva vicārayissāma. Cattāro hi suttanikkhepā
atk-s0201a:120_0: Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva kathesi.
atk-s0201a:121_0: Yāni pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ
atk-s0201a:121_1: uttari āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ manaṃ abhinīhāraṃ
atk-s0201a:121_2: bujjhanabhāvañca avekkhitvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni. Seyyathidaṃ, cūḷarāhulovādasuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a:122_0: Bhagavantaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā catasso parisā cattāro vaṇṇā nāgā supaṇṇā gandhabbā
atk-s0201a:122_1: asurā yakkhā mahārājāno tāvatiṃsādayo devā mahābrahmāti evamādayo “bojjhaṅgā bojjhaṅgā”ti,
atk-s0201a:122_2: bhante, vuccanti. “Nīvaraṇā nīvaraṇā”ti, bhante, vuccanti. Ime nu kho, bhante, pañcupādānakkhandhā.
atk-s0201a:122_3: “Kiṃ sūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena pañhaṃ pucchanti. Evaṃ puṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:122_4: bhagavatā yāni kathitāni bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni. Yāni vā panaññānipi devatāsaṃyutta-mārasaṃyutta-brahmasaṃyutta-sakkapañha-cūḷavedalla-mahāvedalla-sāmaññaphala-
atk-s0201a:123_0: Yāni panetāni uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni. Seyyathidaṃ, dhammadāyādaṃ cūḷasīhanādaṃ
atk-s0201a:123_1: candūpamaṃ puttamaṃsūpamaṃ dārukkhandhūpamaṃ aggikkhandhūpamaṃ pheṇapiṇḍūpamaṃ pāricchattakūpamanti
atk-s0201a:124_0: Evamimesu catūsu nikkhepesu imassa suttassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo. Aṭṭhuppattiyañhi
atk-s0201a:124_1: idaṃ bhagavatā nikkhittaṃ. Katarāya aṭṭhuppattiyā? Pariyattiṃ nissāya uppanne māne.
atk-s0201a:124_2: Pañcasatā kira brāhmaṇā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū aparabhāge bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0201a:124_3: sutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ sampassamānā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0201a:124_4: nacirasseva sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā pariyattiṃ nissāya mānaṃ uppādesuṃ “yaṃ
atk-s0201a:124_5: yaṃ bhagavā katheti, taṃ taṃ mayaṃ khippameva jānāma, bhagavā hi tīṇi liṅgāni cattāri
atk-s0201a:124_6: padāni satta vibhattiyo muñcitvā na kiñci katheti, evaṃ kathite ca amhākaṃ gaṇṭhipadaṃ
atk-s0201a:124_7: nāma natthī”ti. Te bhagavati agāravā hutvā tato paṭṭhāya bhagavato upaṭṭhānampi dhammassavanampi
atk-s0201a:124_8: abhiṇhaṃ na gacchanti. Bhagavā tesaṃ taṃ cittacāraṃ ñatvā “abhabbā ime imaṃ mānakhilaṃ
atk-s0201a:124_9: anupahacca maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā sacchikātu”nti tesaṃ sutapariyattiṃ nissāya uppannaṃ
atk-s0201a:124_10: mānaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā desanākusalo bhagavā mānabhañjanatthaṃ sabbadhammamūlapariyāyanti desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:125_0: Tattha sabbadhammamūlapariyāyanti sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ mūlapariyāyaṃ. Sabbesanti anavasesānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:125_1: Anavasesavācako hi ayaṃ sabba-saddo. So yena yena sambandhaṃ gacchati, tassa tassa
atk-s0201a:125_2: anavasesataṃ dīpeti. Yathā, “sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ sabbā vedanā aniccā sabbasakkāyapariyāpannesu
atk-s0201a:125_4: dissati. “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyya”ntiādīsu hi dhammasaddo
atk-s0201a:125_5: pariyattiyaṃ vattati. “Diṭṭhadhammo viditadhammo”tiādīsu saccesu. “Evaṃ dhammā te
atk-s0201a:127: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatī”ti. –
atk-s0201a:129_1: sabhāve. “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontī”tiādīsu suññatāyaṃ. “Dhammo suciṇṇo
atk-s0201a:129_2: sukhamāvahātī”tiādīsu puññe. “Dve aniyatā dhammā”tiādīsu āpattiyaṃ. “Sabbe dhammā
atk-s0201a:129_3: sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”tiādīsu ñeyye. Idha
atk-s0201a:129_4: panāyaṃ sabhāve vattati. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti dhammā.
atk-s0201a:129_5: Mūla-saddo vitthārito eva. Idha panāyaṃ asādhāraṇahetumhi daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:130_1: khvesa brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya akiriyavādo
atk-s0201a:130_2: samaṇo gotamo”tiādīsu kāraṇe. “Kassa nu kho, ānanda, ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu
atk-s0201a:130_3: vāre. Idha pana kāraṇepi desanāyampi vattati. Tasmā “sabbadhammamūlapariyāya”nti
atk-s0201a:130_4: ettha sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ asādhāraṇahetusaññitaṃ kāraṇanti vā sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ kāraṇadesananti
atk-s0201a:130_5: vā evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo. Neyyatthattā cassa suttassa, na catubhūmakāpi sabhāvadhammā
atk-s0201a:130_6: sabbadhammāti veditabbā. Sakkāyapariyāpannā pana tebhūmakā dhammāva anavasesato veditabbā,
atk-s0201a:131_1: “Kacci pana vo, anuruddhā, samaggā sammodamānā”tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati. “Gacchatha,
atk-s0201a:131_2: bhikkhave, paṇāmemi vo”tiādīsu upayoge. “Na vo mama santike vatthabba”ntiādīsu karaṇe.
atk-s0201a:131_3: “Vanapatthapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”tiādīsu sampadāne. “Sabbesaṃ vo, sāriputta,
atk-s0201a:131_4: subhāsita”ntiādīsu sāmivacane. “Ye hi vo ariyā parisuddhakāyakammantā”tiādīsu padapūraṇamatte.
atk-s0201a:132_0: Bhikkhaveti patissavena abhimukhībhūtānaṃ punālapanaṃ. Desessāmīti desanāpaṭijānanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:132_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, bhikkhave, sabbadhammānaṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ tumhākaṃ desessāmi, dutiyena
atk-s0201a:132_2: nayena kāraṇadesanaṃ tumhākaṃ desessāmīti. Taṃ suṇāthāti tamatthaṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ taṃ
atk-s0201a:132_3: desanaṃ mayā vuccamānaṃ suṇātha. Sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti ettha pana sādhukaṃ sādhūti
atk-s0201a:132_5: dissati. “Sādhu me bhante bhagavā, saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu hi āyācane
atk-s0201a:132_6: dissati. “Sādhu, bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu
atk-s0201a:135_0: Ādīsu sundare. “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, sādhukaṃ suṇāhī”tiādīsu sādhukasaddoyeva daḷhīkamme,
atk-s0201a:135_1: āṇattiyantipi vuccati. Idhāpi ayaṃ ettheva daḷhīkamme ca āṇattiyañca attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:135_2: Sundaratthepi vattati. Daḷhīkaraṇatthena hi daḷhamimaṃ dhammaṃ suṇātha suggahitaṃ
atk-s0201a:135_3: gaṇhantā. Āṇattiatthena mama āṇattiyā suṇātha. Sundaratthena sundaramimaṃ bhaddakaṃ
atk-s0201a:136_0: Manasi karothāti āvajjetha, samannāharathāti attho, avikkhittacittā hutvā nisāmetha
atk-s0201a:136_1: citte karothāti adhippāyo. Idānettha taṃ suṇāthāti sotindriyavikkhepavāraṇametaṃ.
atk-s0201a:136_2: Sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti manasikāre daḷhīkammaniyojanena manindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:136_4: Purimena ca dhammassavane niyojeti, pacchimena sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇūpaparikkhādīsu.
atk-s0201a:136_5: Purimena ca sabyañjano ayaṃ dhammo, tasmā savanīyoti dīpeti. Pacchimena sāttho, tasmā
atk-s0201a:136_6: manasi kātabboti. Sādhukapadaṃ vā ubhayapadehi yojetvā yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dhammagambhīro
atk-s0201a:136_7: desanāgambhīro ca, tasmā suṇātha sādhukaṃ, yasmā atthagambhīro paṭivedhagambhīro
atk-s0201a:136_8: ca, tasmā sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:137_0: Bhāsissāmīti desessāmi. “Taṃ suṇāthā”ti ettha paṭiññātaṃ desanaṃ na saṃkhittatova
atk-s0201a:137_1: desessāmi, apica kho vitthāratopi naṃ bhāsissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti, saṅkhepavitthāravācakāni
atk-s0201a:140_0: Evaṃ vutte ussāhajātā hutvā evaṃ bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ satthu
atk-s0201a:140_1: vacanaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu, paṭiggahesunti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha nesaṃ bhagavā etadavoca
atk-s0201a:140_2: etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ idha bhikkhavotiādikaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ avoca. Tattha idhāti desāpadese
atk-s0201a:140_3: nipāto. Svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha – “idha tathāgato loke uppajjatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:140_4: Katthaci sāsanaṃ. Yathāha – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti. Katthaci okāsaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:142: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:143: Katthaci padapūraṇamattameva. Yathāha “idhāhaṃ – bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito”ti. Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:144_0: 2. Bhikkhaveti yathāpaṭiññātaṃ desanaṃ desetuṃ puna bhikkhū ālapati. Ubhayenāpi,
atk-s0201a:144_1: bhikkhave, imasmiṃ loketi vuttaṃ hoti. Assutavā puthujjanoti ettha pana āgamādhigamābhāvā
atk-s0201a:144_3: uggahaparipucchāvinicchayarahitattā maññanāpaṭisedhako neva āgamo, paṭipattiyā adhigantabbassa
atk-s0201a:144_4: anadhigatattā neva adhigamo atthi. So āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā iti. Svāyaṃ –
atk-s0201a:147_0: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha
atk-s0201a:147_1: – puthu kilese janentīti puthujjanā, puthu avihatasakkāyadiṭṭhikāti puthujjanā, puthu
atk-s0201a:147_2: satthārānaṃ mukhamullokikāti puthujjanā, puthu sabbagatīhi avuṭṭhitāti puthujjanā,
atk-s0201a:147_3: puthu nānābhisaṅkhāre abhisaṅkharontīti puthujjanā, puthu nānāoghehi vuyhantīti puthujjanā,
atk-s0201a:147_4: puthu nānāsantāpehi santappantīti puthujjanā, puthu nānāpariḷāhehi paridayhantīti
atk-s0201a:147_5: puthujjanā, puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā laggā
atk-s0201a:147_6: lagitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā, puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvuṭā nivutā ovutā pihitā
atk-s0201a:147_7: paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanāti. Puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:147_8: nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjanā. Puthu vā ayaṃ, visuṃyeva
atk-s0201a:147_9: saṅkhaṃ gato, visaṃsaṭṭho sīlasutādiguṇayuttehi ariyehi janotipi puthujjano. Evametehi
atk-s0201a:150_0: Dve puthujjanā vuttā. Tesu andhaputhujjano vutto hotīti veditabbo. Ariyānaṃ adassāvītiādīsu
atk-s0201a:150_1: ariyāti ārakattā kilesehi, anaye nairiyanato, aye iriyanato, sadevakena ca lokena
atk-s0201a:150_2: araṇīyato buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca vuccanti, buddhā eva vā idha
atk-s0201a:150_3: ariyā. Yathāha “sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… tathāgato ariyoti vuccatī”ti. Sappurisāti
atk-s0201a:150_4: ettha pana paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā ca “sappurisā”ti veditabbā. Te hi lokuttaraguṇayogena
atk-s0201a:150_5: sobhanā purisāti sappurisā. Sabbeva vā ete dvedhāpi vuttā. Buddhāpi hi ariyā ca sappurisā
atk-s0201a:155_0: Kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hotīti ettāvatā hi buddhasāvako vutto, kataññutādīhi
atk-s0201a:155_1: paccekabuddhā buddhāti. Idāni yo tesaṃ ariyānaṃ adassanasīlo, na ca dassane sādhukārī,
atk-s0201a:155_2: so ariyānaṃ adassāvīti veditabbo. So ca cakkhunā adassāvī ñāṇena adassāvīti duvidho,
atk-s0201a:155_3: tesu ñāṇena adassāvī idha adhippeto. Maṃsacakkhunā hi dibbacakkhunā vā ariyā diṭṭhāpi
atk-s0201a:155_4: adiṭṭhāva honti. Tesaṃ cakkhūnaṃ vaṇṇamattaggahaṇato, na ariyabhāvagocarato. Soṇasiṅgālādayopi
atk-s0201a:155_5: ca cakkhunā ariye passanti. Na ca te ariyānaṃ dassāvino.
atk-s0201a:156_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – cittalapabbatavāsino kira khīṇāsavattherassa upaṭṭhāko vuḍḍhapabbajito
atk-s0201a:156_1: ekadivasaṃ therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caritvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito
atk-s0201a:156_2: āgacchanto theraṃ pucchi “ariyā nāma, bhante, kīdisā”ti. Thero āha “idhekacco mahallako
atk-s0201a:156_3: ariyānaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā sahacarantopi neva ariye jānāti,
atk-s0201a:156_4: evaṃ dujjānā, āvuso, ariyā”ti. Evaṃ vuttepi so neva aññāsi. Tasmā na cakkhunā dassanaṃ
atk-s0201a:156_5: dassanaṃ, ñāṇena dassanameva dassanaṃ. Yathāha “kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena
atk-s0201a:156_6: diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī”ti. Tasmā cakkhunā passantopi
atk-s0201a:156_7: ñāṇena ariyehi diṭṭhaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ apassanto ariyādhigatañca dhammaṃ anadhigacchanto
atk-s0201a:156_8: ariyakaradhammānaṃ ariyabhāvassa ca adiṭṭhattā “ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:157: Ariyadhammassa akovidoti satipaṭṭhānādibhede ariyadhamme akusalo. Ariyadhamme avinītoti ettha pana –
atk-s0201a:160_0: Ayañhi saṃvaravinayo pahānavinayoti duvidho vinayo. Ettha ca duvidhepi vinaye ekameko
atk-s0201a:160_1: vinayo pañcadhā bhijjati. Saṃvaravinayopi hi sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro
atk-s0201a:160_2: khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidho. Pahānavinayopi tadaṅgapahānaṃ vikkhambhanapahānaṃ
atk-s0201a:161: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti ayaṃ sīlasaṃvaro. “Rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti ayaṃ satisaṃvaro.
atk-s0201a:166_0: Ayaṃ ñāṇasaṃvaro. “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”ti ayaṃ khantisaṃvaro. “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ
atk-s0201a:166_1: nādhivāsetī”ti ayaṃ vīriyasaṃvaro. Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ
atk-s0201a:166_3: Evaṃ tāva saṃvaravinayo pañcadhā bhijjatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:167_0: Tathā yaṃ nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu vipassanāñāṇesu paṭipakkhabhāvato dīpālokeneva tamassa,
atk-s0201a:167_1: tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ, nāmarūpavavatthānena
atk-s0201a:167_3: kaṅkhāvitaraṇena kathaṃkathībhāvassa, kalāpasammasanena “ahaṃ mamā”ti gāhassa, maggāmaggavavatthānena
atk-s0201a:167_4: amagge maggasaññāya, udayadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā, vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā,
atk-s0201a:167_5: bhayadassanena sabhaye abhayasaññāya, ādīnavadassanena assādasaññāya, nibbidānupassanāya
atk-s0201a:167_7: anulomena dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ nibbāne ca paṭilomabhāvassa, gotrabhunā saṅkhāranimittaggāhassa
atk-s0201a:168: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānaṃ, etaṃ vikkhambhanapahānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:169_0: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ
atk-s0201a:169_1: pahānāyā”tiādinā nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena
atk-s0201a:169_2: pahānaṃ, idaṃ samucchedapahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhattaṃ kilesānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:169_3: etaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭattā pahīnasabbasaṅkhataṃ
atk-s0201a:169_4: nibbānaṃ etaṃ nissaraṇapahānaṃ nāma. Sabbampi cetaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:169_5: vinayanaṭṭhena vinayo, tasmā “pahānavinayo”ti vuccati. Taṃtaṃpahānavato vā tassa
atk-s0201a:169_6: tassa vinayassa sambhavatopetaṃ “pahānavinayo”ti vuccati. Evaṃ pahānavinayopi pañcadhā
atk-s0201a:170_0: Evamayaṃ saṅkhepato duvidho, bhedato ca dasavidho vinayo bhinnasaṃvarattā pahātabbassa
atk-s0201a:170_1: ca appahīnattā yasmā etassa assutavato puthujjanassa natthi, tasmā abhāvato tassa
atk-s0201a:170_2: ayaṃ avinītoti vuccatīti. Esa nayo sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido
atk-s0201a:170_3: sappurisadhamme avinītoti etthapi. Ninnānākaraṇañhi etaṃ atthato. Yathāha “yeva te
atk-s0201a:170_4: ariyā, teva te sappurisā. Yeva te sappurisā, teva te ariyā. Yo eva so ariyānaṃ dhammo,
atk-s0201a:170_5: so eva so sappurisānaṃ dhammo. Yo eva so sappurisānaṃ dhammo, so eva so ariyānaṃ
atk-s0201a:170_6: dhammo. Yeva te ariyavinayā, teva te sappurisavinayā. Yeva te sappurisavinayā, teva
atk-s0201a:170_7: te ariyavinayā. Ariyeti vā sappuriseti vā, ariyadhammeti vā sappurisadhammeti vā,
atk-s0201a:170_8: ariyavinayeti vā sappurisavinayeti vā esese eke ekatthe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevā”ti.
atk-s0201a:171_0: “Kasmā pana bhagavā sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”ti vatvā taṃ
atk-s0201a:171_1: adesetvāva “idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti evaṃ puthujjanaṃ
atk-s0201a:171_2: niddisīti? Puggalādhiṭṭhānāya dhammadesanāya tamatthaṃ āvikātuṃ. Bhagavato hi dhammādhiṭṭhānā
atk-s0201a:171_3: dhammadesanā, dhammādhiṭṭhānā puggaladesanā, puggalādhiṭṭhānā puggaladesanā, puggalādhiṭṭhānā
atk-s0201a:172_0: Tattha, “tisso imā, bhikkhave, vedanā. Katamā tisso? Sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā
atk-s0201a:172_1: vedanā. Imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso vedanā”ti evarūpī dhammādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā
atk-s0201a:172_2: veditabbā. “Cha dhātuyo ayaṃ putiso cha phassāyatano aṭṭhārasa manopavicāro caturādhiṭṭhāno”ti
atk-s0201a:172_3: evarūpī dhammādhiṭṭhānā puggaladesanā. “Tayome, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
atk-s0201a:172_4: lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo? Andho ekacakkhu dvicakkhu. Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo andho”ti?
atk-s0201a:172_5: evarūpī puggalādhiṭṭhānā puggaladesanā. “Katamañca, bhikkhave, duggatibhayaṃ? Idha,
atk-s0201a:172_6: bhikkhave, ekacco iti paṭisañcikkhati, kāyaduccaritassa kho pāpako vipāko abhisamparāyaṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a:172_7: suddhamattānaṃ pariharati. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, duggatibhaya”nti evarūpī puggalādhiṭṭhānā dhammadesanā.
atk-s0201a:173_0: Svāyaṃ idha yasmā puthujjano apariññātavatthuko, apariññāmūlikā ca idhādhippetānaṃ
atk-s0201a:173_1: sabbadhammānaṃ mūlabhūtā maññanā hoti, tasmā puthujjanaṃ dassetvā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0201a:173_2: desanāya tamatthaṃ āvikātuṃ, “idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti
atk-s0201a:176_0: Evaṃ puthujjanaṃ niddisitvā idāni tassa pathavīādīsu vatthūsu sabbasakkāyadhammajanitaṃ
atk-s0201a:176_1: maññanaṃ dassento, pathaviṃ pathavitotiādimāha. Tattha lakkhaṇapathavī sasambhārapathavī
atk-s0201a:176_2: ārammaṇapathavī sammutipathavīti catubbidhā pathavī. Tāsu “katamā ca, āvuso, ajjhattikā
atk-s0201a:176_3: pathavīdhātu? Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigata”ntiādīsu vuttā lakkhaṇapathavī.
atk-s0201a:176_4: “Pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā”tiādīsu vuttā sasambhārapathavī. Ye ca kesādayo
atk-s0201a:176_5: vīsati koṭṭhāsā, ayolohādayo ca bāhirā. Sā hi vaṇṇādīhi sambhārehi saddhiṃ pathavīti
atk-s0201a:176_7: nimittapathavītipi vuccati. Pathavīkasiṇajjhānalābhī devaloke nibbatto āgamanavasena
atk-s0201a:176_8: pathavīdevatāti nāmaṃ labhati. Ayaṃ sammutipathavīti veditabbā. Sā sabbāpi idha labbhati.
atk-s0201a:176_9: Tāsu yaṃkañci pathaviṃ ayaṃ puthujjano pathavito sañjānāti, pathavīti sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a:176_10: pathavībhāgena sañjānāti, lokavohāraṃ gahetvā saññāvipallāsena sañjānāti pathavīti.
atk-s0201a:176_11: Evaṃ pathavībhāgaṃ amuñcantoyeva vā etaṃ “sattoti vā sattassā”ti vā ādinā nayena
atk-s0201a:176_12: sañjānāti. Kasmā evaṃ sañjānātīti na vattabbaṃ. Ummattako viya hi puthujjano. So
atk-s0201a:176_13: yaṃkiñci yena kenaci ākārena gaṇhāti. Ariyānaṃ adassāvitādibhedameva vā ettha kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:176_14: Yaṃ vā parato “apariññātaṃ tassā”ti vadantena bhagavatāva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:177_0: Pathaviṃ pathavito saññatvāti so taṃ pathaviṃ evaṃ viparītasaññāya sañjānitvā, “saññānidānā
atk-s0201a:177_1: hi papañcasaṅkhā”ti vacanato aparabhāge thāmapattehi taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcehi idha
atk-s0201a:177_2: maññanānāmena vuttehi maññati kappeti vikappeti, nānappakārato aññathā gaṇhāti. Tena
atk-s0201a:177_3: vuttaṃ “pathaviṃ maññatī”ti. Evaṃ maññato cassa tā maññanā oḷārikanayena dassetuṃ
atk-s0201a:177_4: “yā ayaṃ kesā lomā”tiādinā nayena vīsatibhedā ajjhattikā pathavī vuttā. Yā cāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:177_5: vibhaṅge “tattha katamā bāhirā pathavīdhātu? Yaṃ bāhiraṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigataṃ kakkhaḷattaṃ
atk-s0201a:177_6: kakkhaḷabhāvo bahiddhā anupādinnaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ, ayo lohaṃ tipu sīsaṃ sajjhaṃ muttā
atk-s0201a:177_7: maṇi veḷuriyaṃ saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ lohitaṅko masāragallaṃ tiṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:177_8: kaṭṭhaṃ sakkharā kaṭhalaṃ bhūmi pāsāṇo pabbato”ti evaṃ bāhirā pathavī vuttā. Yā ca
atk-s0201a:177_9: ajjhattārammaṇattike nimittapathavī, taṃ gahetvā ayamatthayojanā vuccati.
atk-s0201a:178_0: Pathaviṃ maññatīti tīhi maññanāhi ahaṃ pathavīti maññati, mama pathavīti maññati,
atk-s0201a:178_1: paro pathavīti maññati, parassa pathavīti maññati, atha vā ajjhattikaṃ pathaviṃ taṇhāmaññanāya
atk-s0201a:178_2: maññati, mānamaññanāya maññati, diṭṭhimaññanāya maññati. Kathaṃ? Ayañhi kesādīsu
atk-s0201a:178_3: chandarāgaṃ janeti kese assādeti abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati. Lome,
atk-s0201a:178_4: nakhe, dante, tacaṃ, aññataraṃ vā pana rajjanīyavatthuṃ. Evaṃ ajjhattikaṃ pathaviṃ
atk-s0201a:178_5: taṇhāmaññanāya maññati. Iti me kesā siyuṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ. Iti lomātiādinā vā pana
atk-s0201a:178_6: nayena tattha nandiṃ samannāneti. “Imināhaṃ sīlena vā…pe… brahmacariyena vā evaṃ
atk-s0201a:178_7: siniddhamudusukhumanīlakeso bhavissāmī”tiādinā vā pana nayena appaṭiladdhānaṃ paṭilābhāya
atk-s0201a:178_8: cittaṃ paṇidahati. Evampi ajjhattikaṃ pathaviṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a:179_0: Tathā attano kesādīnaṃ sampattiṃ vā vipattiṃ vā nissāya mānaṃ janeti, “seyyohamasmīti
atk-s0201a:179_1: vā sadisohamasmīti vā hīnohamasmīti vā”ti. Evaṃ ajjhattikaṃ pathaviṃ mānamaññanāya
atk-s0201a:179_2: maññati. “Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”nti āgatanayena pana kesaṃ “jīvo”ti abhinivisati.
atk-s0201a:179_3: Esa nayo lomādīsu. Evaṃ ajjhattikaṃ pathaviṃ diṭṭhimaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a:180_0: Atha vā “yā ceva kho panāvuso, ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu, yā ca bāhirā pathavīdhātu,
atk-s0201a:180_1: pathavīdhāturevesā, taṃ netaṃ mamā”ti imissā pavattiyā paccanīkanayena kesādibhedaṃ
atk-s0201a:180_2: pathaviṃ etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attāti abhinivisati. Evampi ajjhattikaṃ pathaviṃ
atk-s0201a:180_3: diṭṭhimaññanāya maññati. Evaṃ tāva ajjhattikaṃ pathaviṃ tīhi maññanāhi maññati.
atk-s0201a:181_0: Yathā ca ajjhattikaṃ evaṃ bāhirampi. Kathaṃ? “Ayañhi ayalohādīsu chandarāgaṃ janeti.
atk-s0201a:181_1: Ayalohādīni assādeti abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati. Mama ayo mama lohantiādinā
atk-s0201a:181_2: nayena ayādīni mamāyati rakkhati gopayati, evaṃ bāhiraṃ pathaviṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a:181_3: Iti me ayalohādayo siyuṃ anāgatamaddhānanti vā panettha nandiṃ samannāneti, imināhaṃ
atk-s0201a:181_4: sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā evaṃ sampannaayalohādiupakaraṇo bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:181_5: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahati. Evampi bāhiraṃ pathaviṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a:182_0: Tathā attano ayalohādīnaṃ sampattiṃ vā vipattiṃ vā nissāya mānaṃ janeti “imināhaṃ
atk-s0201a:182_1: seyyosmīti vā, sadisosmīti vā hīnosmīti vā”ti evaṃ bāhiraṃ pathaviṃ mānamaññanāya
atk-s0201a:182_2: maññati. Aye jīvasaññī hutvā pana ayaṃ “jīvo”ti abhinivisati. Esa nayo lohādīsu.
atk-s0201a:183_0: Atha vā “idhekacco pathavīkasiṇaṃ attato samanupassati. Yaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, so ahaṃ.
atk-s0201a:183_1: Yo ahaṃ, taṃ pathavīkasiṇanti pathavīkasiṇañca attañca advayaṃ samanupassatī”ti paṭisambhidāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:183_2: vuttanayeneva nimittapathaviṃ “attā”ti abhinivisati. Evaṃ bāhiraṃ pathaviṃ diṭṭhimaññanāya
atk-s0201a:183_3: maññati. Evampi bāhiraṃ pathaviṃ tīhi maññanāhi maññati. Evaṃ tāva “pathaviṃ maññatī”ti
atk-s0201a:183_4: ettha tissopi maññanā veditabbā. Ito paraṃ saṅkhepeneva kathayissāma.
atk-s0201a:184_0: Pathaviyā maññatīti ettha pathaviyāti bhummavacanametaṃ. Tasmā ahaṃ pathaviyāti maññati,
atk-s0201a:184_1: mayhaṃ kiñcanaṃ palibodho pathaviyāti maññati, paro pathaviyāti maññati, parassa
atk-s0201a:184_2: kiñcanaṃ palibodho pathaviyāti maññatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a:185_0: Atha vā yvāyaṃ “kathaṃ rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassati? Idhekacco vedanaṃ… saññaṃ…
atk-s0201a:185_1: saṅkhāre… viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, tassa evaṃ hoti, ayaṃ kho me attā, so kho
atk-s0201a:185_2: pana me attā imasmiṃ rūpeti evaṃ rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ samanupassatī”ti etassa atthanayo
atk-s0201a:185_3: vutto, eteneva nayena vedanādidhamme attato gahetvā tato ajjhattikabāhirāsu pathavīsu
atk-s0201a:185_4: yaṃkiñci pathaviṃ tassokāsabhāvena parikappetvā so kho pana me ayaṃ attā imissā pathaviyāti
atk-s0201a:185_5: maññanto pathaviyā maññati, ayamassa diṭṭhimaññanā. Tasmiṃyeva panassa attani sinehaṃ
atk-s0201a:185_6: tabbatthukañca mānaṃ uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā. Yadā pana teneva nayena
atk-s0201a:185_7: so kho panassa attā pathaviyāti maññati, tadā diṭṭhimaññanā eva yujjati. Itarāyopi pana icchanti.
atk-s0201a:186_0: Pathavito maññatīti ettha pana pathavitoti nissakkavacanaṃ. Tasmā saupakaraṇassa
atk-s0201a:186_1: attano vā parassa vā yathāvuttappabhedato pathavito uppattiṃ vā niggamanaṃ vā pathavito
atk-s0201a:186_2: vā añño attāti maññamāno pathavito maññatīti veditabbo, ayamassa diṭṭhimaññanā. Tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0201a:186_3: panassa diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi
atk-s0201a:186_4: veditabbā. Apare āhu pathavīkasiṇaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā tato aññaṃ appamāṇaṃ attānaṃ
atk-s0201a:186_5: gahetvā pathavito bahiddhāpi me attāti maññamāno pathavito maññatīti.
atk-s0201a:187_0: Pathaviṃ meti maññatīti ettha pana kevalañhi mahāpathaviṃ taṇhāvasena mamāyatīti
atk-s0201a:187_1: iminā nayena pavattā ekā taṇhāmaññanā eva labbhatīti veditabbā. Sā cāyaṃ mama kesā,
atk-s0201a:187_2: mama lomā, mama ayo, mama lohanti evaṃ yathāvuttappabhedāya sabbāyapi ajjhattikabāhirāya
atk-s0201a:188_0: Pathaviṃ abhinandatīti vuttappakārameva pathaviṃ taṇhādīhi abhinandati, assādeti,
atk-s0201a:188_1: parāmasati cāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Pathaviṃ maññatī”ti eteneva etasmiṃ atthe siddhe kasmā
atk-s0201a:188_2: etaṃ vuttanti ce. Avicāritametaṃ porāṇehi. Ayaṃ pana attano mati, desanāvilāsato
atk-s0201a:188_3: vā ādīnavadassanato vā. Yassā hi dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā nānānayavicitradesanāvilāsasampanno,
atk-s0201a:188_4: ayaṃ sā bhagavatā suppaṭividdhā. Tasmā pubbe maññanāvasena kilesuppattiṃ dassetvā
atk-s0201a:188_5: idāni abhinandanāvasena dassento desanāvilāsato vā idamāha. Yo vā pathaviṃ maññati,
atk-s0201a:188_6: pathaviyā maññati, pathavito maññati, pathaviṃ meti maññati, so yasmā na sakkoti
atk-s0201a:188_7: pathavīnissitaṃ taṇhaṃ vā diṭṭhiṃ vā pahātuṃ, tasmā pathaviṃ abhinandatiyeva. Yo
atk-s0201a:188_8: ca pathaviṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati, dukkhañca ādīnavoti ādīnavadassanatopi
atk-s0201a:188_9: idamāha. Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā “yo, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:188_10: so abhinandati, yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:189_0: Evaṃ pathavīvatthukaṃ maññanaṃ abhinandanañca vatvā idāni yena kāraṇena so maññati,
atk-s0201a:189_1: abhinandati ca, taṃ kāraṇaṃ āvikaronto āha taṃ kissa hetu, apariññātaṃ tassāti vadāmīti.
atk-s0201a:189_2: Tassattho, so puthujjano taṃ pathaviṃ kissa hetu maññati, kena kāraṇena maññati,
atk-s0201a:189_3: abhinandatīti ce. Apariññātaṃ tassāti vadāmīti, yasmā taṃ vatthu tassa apariññātaṃ,
atk-s0201a:189_4: tasmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo hi pathaviṃ parijānāti, so tīhi pariññāhi parijānāti ñātapariññāya
atk-s0201a:190_0: Tattha katamā ñātapariññā. Pathavīdhātuṃ parijānāti, ayaṃ pathavīdhātu ajjhattikā,
atk-s0201a:190_1: ayaṃ bāhirā, idamassā lakkhaṇaṃ, imāni rasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti, ayaṃ ñātapariññā.
atk-s0201a:190_2: Katamā tīraṇapariññā? Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā pathavīdhātuṃ tīreti aniccato dukkhato rogatoti
atk-s0201a:190_3: dvācattālīsāya ākārehi, ayaṃ tīraṇapariññā. Katamā pahānapariññā? Evaṃ tīrayitvā
atk-s0201a:190_4: aggamaggena pathavīdhātuyā chandarāgaṃ pajahati, ayaṃ pahānapariññā.
atk-s0201a:191_1: Ariyamagge ñāṇaṃ pahānapariññāti. Yo pathaviṃ parijānāti, so imāhi tīhi pariññāhi
atk-s0201a:191_2: parijānāti, assa ca puthujjanassa tā pariññāyo natthi, tasmā apariññātattā pathaviṃ
atk-s0201a:191_3: maññati ca abhinandati cāti. Tenāha bhagavā – idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano…pe…
atk-s0201a:191_4: pathaviṃ maññati, pathaviyā maññati, pathavito maññati, pathaviṃ meti maññati, pathaviṃ
atk-s0201a:191_5: abhinandati. Taṃ kissa hetu? Apariññātaṃ tassāti vadāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:194_0: Āpaṃ āpatoti etthāpi lakkhaṇasasambhārārammaṇasammutivasena catubbidho āpo. Tesu
atk-s0201a:194_1: “tattha, katamā ajjhattikā āpodhātu. Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ āpo āpogataṃ, sineho
atk-s0201a:194_2: sinehagataṃ bandhanattaṃ rūpassa ajjhattaṃ upādinna”ntiādīsu vutto lakkhaṇaāpo. “Āpokasiṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:194_3: uggaṇhanto āpasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhātī”tiādīsu vutto sasambhārāpo. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0201a:194_4: vuttasadisameva. Kevalaṃ yojanānaye pana “pittaṃ semha”ntiādinā nayena vuttā dvādasabhedā
atk-s0201a:194_5: ajjhattikā āpodhātu, “tattha, katamā bāhirā āpodhātu? Yaṃ bāhiraṃ āpo āpogataṃ, sineho
atk-s0201a:194_6: sinehagataṃ bandhanattaṃ rūpassa bahiddhā anupādinnaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ, mūlaraso khandharaso
atk-s0201a:194_7: tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso khīraṃ dadhi sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu
atk-s0201a:194_8: phāṇitaṃ bhummāni vā udakāni antalikkhāni vā”ti evaṃ vuttā ca bāhirā āpodhātu veditabbā,
atk-s0201a:195_0: Tejaṃ tejatoti imasmiṃ tejovārepi vuttanayeneva vitthāro veditabbo. Yojanānaye panettha
atk-s0201a:195_1: “yena ca santappati, yena ca jīrīyati, yena ca pariḍayhati, yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ
atk-s0201a:195_2: sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatī”ti evaṃ vuttā catuppabhedā ajjhattikā tejodhātu. “Tattha
atk-s0201a:195_3: katamā bāhirā tejodhātu? Yaṃ bāhiraṃ tejo tejogataṃ usmā usmāgataṃ usumaṃ usumagataṃ
atk-s0201a:195_4: bahiddhā anupādinnaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ, kaṭṭhaggi palālaggi tiṇaggi gomayaggi thusaggi
atk-s0201a:195_5: saṅkāraggi indaggi aggisantāpo sūriyasantāpo kaṭṭhasannicayasantāpo tiṇasannicayasantāpo
atk-s0201a:195_6: dhaññasannicayasantāpo bhaṇḍasannicayasantāpo”ti evaṃ vuttā ca bāhirā tejodhātu veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:196_0: Vāyaṃ vāyatoti imassa vāyavārassāpi yojanānaye pana “uddhaṅgamā vātā adhogamā vātā
atk-s0201a:196_1: kucchisayā vātā koṭṭhāsayā vātā aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātā satthakavātā khurakavātā uppalakavātā
atk-s0201a:196_2: assāso passāso”ti evaṃ vuttā ajjhattikā vāyodhātu. “Tattha katamā bāhirā vāyodhātu?
atk-s0201a:196_3: Yaṃ bāhiraṃ vāyo vāyogataṃ thambhitattaṃ rūpassa bahiddhā anupādinnaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ,
atk-s0201a:196_4: puratthimā vātā pacchimā vātā uttarā vātā dakkhiṇā vātā sarajā vātā arajā vātā sītā
atk-s0201a:196_5: vātā uṇhā vātā parittā vātā adhimattā vātā kāḷavātā verambhavātā pakkhavātā supaṇṇavātā
atk-s0201a:196_6: tālavaṇṭavātā vidhūpanavātā”ti evaṃ vuttā ca bāhirā vāyodhātu veditabbā. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0201a:198: Vuttā bhavanti sabbe, iti vutto lakkhaṇo hāro”ti. –
atk-s0201a:199_0: Evaṃ nettiyaṃ lakkhaṇo nāma hāro vutto, tassa vasena yasmā catūsu bhūtesu gahitesu
atk-s0201a:199_1: upādārūpampi gahitameva bhavati, rūpalakkhaṇaṃ anatītattā. Yañca bhūtopādārūpaṃ so
atk-s0201a:199_2: rūpakkhandho. Tasmā “assutavā puthujjano pathaviṃ āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ maññatī”ti vadantena
atk-s0201a:199_3: atthato rūpaṃ attato samanupassatītipi vuttaṃ hoti. “Pathaviyā āpasmiṃ tejasmiṃ vāyasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:199_4: maññatī”ti vadantena rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ samanupassatīti vuttampi hoti. “Pathavito
atk-s0201a:199_5: āpato tejato vāyato maññatī”ti vadantena rūpato añño attāti siddhattā rūpavantaṃ
atk-s0201a:199_6: vā attānaṃ attani vā rūpaṃ samanupassatītipi vuttaṃ hoti. Evametā catasso rūpavatthukā
atk-s0201a:199_7: sakkāyadiṭṭhimaññanā veditabbā. Tattha ekā ucchedadiṭṭhi, tisso sassatadiṭṭhiyoti
atk-s0201a:199_8: dveva diṭṭhiyo hontīti ayampi atthaviseso veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:202_0: 3. Evaṃ rūpamukhena saṅkhāravatthukaṃ maññanaṃ vatvā idāni ye saṅkhāre upādāya sattā
atk-s0201a:202_1: paññapīyanti, tesu saṅkhāresu sattesupi yasmā puthujjano maññanaṃ karoti, tasmā te
atk-s0201a:202_2: satte niddisanto bhūte bhūtato sañjānātītiādimāha. Tatthāyaṃ bhūtasaddo pañcakkhandhaamanussadhātuvijjamānakhīṇāsavasattarukkhādīsu
atk-s0201a:202_3: dissati. “Bhūtamidanti, bhikkhave, samanupassathā”tiādīsu hi ayaṃ pañcakkhandhesu
atk-s0201a:202_4: dissati. “Yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatānī”ti ettha amanussesu. “Cattāro kho, bhikkhu,
atk-s0201a:202_5: mahābhūtā hetū”ti ettha dhātūsu. “Bhūtasmiṃ pācittiya”ntiādīsu vijjamāne. “Yo ca
atk-s0201a:202_6: kālaghaso bhūto”ti ettha khīṇāsave. “Sabbeva nikkhipissanti bhūtā loke samussaya”nti
atk-s0201a:202_7: ettha sattesu. “Bhūtagāmapātabyatāyā”ti ettha rukkhādīsu. Idha panāyaṃ sattesu vattati,
atk-s0201a:202_8: no ca kho avisesena. Cātumahārājikānaṃ hi heṭṭhā sattā idha bhūtāti adhippetā.
atk-s0201a:203_0: Tattha bhūte bhūtato sañjānātītiādi vuttanayameva. Bhūte maññatītiādīsu pana tissopi
atk-s0201a:203_1: maññanā yojetabbā. Kathaṃ? Ayañhi “so passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi
atk-s0201a:203_2: kāmaguṇehi samappitaṃ samaṅgibhūta”nti vuttanayena bhūte subhā sukhitāti gahetvā
atk-s0201a:203_3: rajjati, disvāpi ne rajjati, sutvāpi, ghāyitvāpi, sāyitvāpi, phusitvāpi, ñatvāpi.
atk-s0201a:203_4: Evaṃ bhūte taṇhāmaññanāya maññati. “Aho vatāhaṃ khattiyamahāsālānaṃ vā sahabyataṃ
atk-s0201a:203_5: upapajjeyya”ntiādinā vā pana nayena appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahati,
atk-s0201a:203_6: evampi bhūte taṇhāmaññanāya maññati. Attano pana bhūtānañca sampattivipattiṃ nissāya
atk-s0201a:203_7: attānaṃ vā seyyaṃ dahati. Bhūtesu ca yaṃkiñci bhūtaṃ hīnaṃ attānaṃ vā hīnaṃ, yaṃkiñci
atk-s0201a:203_8: bhūtaṃ seyyaṃ. Attānaṃ vā bhūtena, bhūtaṃ vā attanā sadisaṃ dahati. Yathāha “idhekacco
atk-s0201a:203_9: jātiyā vā…pe… aññataraññatarena vatthunā pubbakālaṃ parehi sadisaṃ attānaṃ dahati.
atk-s0201a:203_10: Aparakālaṃ attānaṃ seyyaṃ dahati. Pare hīne dahati, yo evarūpo māno …pe… ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0201a:204_0: Bhūte pana “niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā”ti vā “sabbe sattā sabbe pāṇā sabbe
atk-s0201a:204_1: bhūtā sabbe jīvā avasā abalā avīriyā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā chasvevābhijātīsu
atk-s0201a:204_2: sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentī”ti vā maññamāno diṭṭhimaññanāya maññati. Evaṃ bhūte tīhi maññanāhi maññati.
atk-s0201a:205_0: Kathaṃ bhūtesu maññati? Tesu tesu bhūtesu attano upapattiṃ vā sukhuppattiṃ vā ākaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a:205_1: Evaṃ tāva taṇhāmaññanāya bhūtesu maññati. Bhūtesu vā upapattiṃ ākaṅkhamāno dānaṃ
atk-s0201a:205_2: deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti. Evampi bhūtesu taṇhāmaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a:205_3: Bhūte pana samūhaggāhena gahetvā tattha ekacce bhūte seyyato dahati, ekacce sadisato
atk-s0201a:205_4: vā hīnato vāti. Evaṃ bhūtesu mānamaññanāya maññati. Tathā ekacce bhūte niccā dhuvāti
atk-s0201a:205_5: maññati. Ekacce aniccā adhuvāti, ahampi bhūtesu aññatarosmīti vā maññati. Evaṃ bhūtesu
atk-s0201a:206_0: Bhūtato maññatīti ettha pana saupakaraṇassa attano vā parassa vā yato kutoci bhūtato
atk-s0201a:206_1: uppattiṃ maññamāno bhūtato maññatīti veditabbo, ayamassa diṭṭhimaññanā. Tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0201a:206_2: panassa diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi
atk-s0201a:206_3: veditabbā. Bhūte meti maññatīti ettha pana ekā taṇhāmaññanāva labbhati. Sā cāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:206_4: “mama puttā, mama dhītā, mama ajeḷakā, kukkuṭasūkarā, hatthigavassavaḷavā”ti evamādinā
atk-s0201a:206_5: nayena mamāyato pavattatīti veditabbā. Bhūte abhinandatīti etaṃ vuttanayameva. Apariññātaṃ
atk-s0201a:206_6: tassāti ettha pana ye saṅkhāre upādāya bhūtānaṃ paññatti, tesaṃ apariññātattā bhūtā
atk-s0201a:206_7: apariññātā hontīti veditabbā. Yojanā pana vuttanayeneva kātabbā.
atk-s0201a:207_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepato saṅkhāravasena ca sattavasena ca maññanāvatthuṃ dassetvā idāni bhūmivisesādinā
atk-s0201a:207_1: bhedena vitthāratopi taṃ dassento deve devatotiādimāha. Tattha dibbanti pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
atk-s0201a:207_2: attano vā iddhiyāti devā, kīḷanti jotenti cāti attho. Te tividhā sammutidevā upapattidevā
atk-s0201a:207_3: visuddhidevāti. Sammutidevā nāma rājāno deviyo rājakumārā. Upapattidevā nāma cātumahārājike
atk-s0201a:207_4: deve upādāya tatuttaridevā. Visuddhidevā nāma arahanto khīṇāsavā. Idha pana upapattidevā
atk-s0201a:207_5: daṭṭhabbā, no ca kho avisesena. Paranimmitavasavattidevaloke māraṃ saparisaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:207_6: sesā cha kāmāvacarā idha devāti adhippetā. Tattha sabbā atthavaṇṇanā bhūtavāre vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:208_0: Pajāpatinti ettha pana māro pajāpatīti veditabbo. Keci pana “tesaṃ tesaṃ devānaṃ
atk-s0201a:208_1: adhipatīnaṃ mahārājādīnametaṃ adhivacana”nti vadanti. Taṃ devaggahaṇeneva tesaṃ gahitattā
atk-s0201a:208_2: ayuttanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ, māroyeva pana sattasaṅkhātāya pajāya adhipatibhāvena
atk-s0201a:208_3: idha pajāpatīti adhippeto. So kuhiṃ vasati? Paranimmitavasavattidevaloke. Tatra hi
atk-s0201a:208_4: vasavattirājā rajjaṃ kāreti. Māro ekasmiṃ padese attano parisāya issariyaṃ pavattento
atk-s0201a:208_5: rajjapaccante dāmarikarājaputto viya vasatīti vadanti. Māraggahaṇeneva cettha māraparisāyapi
atk-s0201a:208_6: gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yojanānayo cettha pajāpatiṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ dīghāyukaṃ sukhabahulaṃ
atk-s0201a:208_7: disvā vā sutvā vā rajjanto taṇhāmaññanāya maññati. “Aho vatāhaṃ pajāpatino sahabyataṃ
atk-s0201a:208_8: upapajjeyya”ntiādinā vā pana nayena appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahantopi
atk-s0201a:208_9: pajāpatiṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati. Pajāpatibhāvaṃ pana patto samāno ahamasmi pajānamissaro
atk-s0201a:208_10: adhipatīti mānaṃ janento pajāpatiṃ mānamaññanāya maññati. “Pajāpati nicco dhuvo”ti
atk-s0201a:208_11: vā “ucchijjissati vinassissatī”ti vā “avaso abalo avīriyo niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇato
atk-s0201a:208_12: chasvevābhijātīsu sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti vā maññamāno pana pajāpatiṃ diṭṭhimaññanāya
atk-s0201a:209_0: Pajāpatisminti ettha pana ekā diṭṭhimaññanāva yujjati. Tassā evaṃ pavatti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:209_1: Idhekacco “pajāpatismiṃ ye ca dhammā saṃvijjanti, sabbe te niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā”ti
atk-s0201a:209_2: maññati. Atha vā “pajāpatismiṃ natthi pāpaṃ, na tasmiṃ pāpakāni kammāni upalabbhantī”ti maññati.
atk-s0201a:210_0: Pajāpatitoti ettha tissopi maññanā labbhanti. Kathaṃ? Idhekacco saupakaraṇassa attano
atk-s0201a:210_1: vā parassa vā pajāpatito uppattiṃ vā niggamanaṃ vā maññati, ayamassa diṭṭhimaññanā.
atk-s0201a:210_2: Tasmiṃyeva panassa diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ mānañca uppādayato
atk-s0201a:210_3: taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā. Pajāpatiṃ meti ettha pana ekā taṇhāmaññanāva labbhati.
atk-s0201a:210_4: Sā cāyaṃ “pajāpati mama satthā mama sāmī”tiādinā nayena mamāyato pavattatīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:211_0: Brahmaṃ brahmatoti ettha brūhito tehi tehi guṇavisesehīti brahmā. Apica brahmāti
atk-s0201a:211_1: mahābrahmāpi vuccati, tathāgatopi brāhmaṇopi mātāpitaropi seṭṭhampi. “Sahasso brahmā
atk-s0201a:211_2: dvisahasso brahmā”tiādīsu hi mahābrahmā brahmāti vuccati. “Brahmāti kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:218_0: Ettha mātāpitaro. “Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetī”ti ettha seṭṭhaṃ. Idha pana paṭhamābhinibbatto
atk-s0201a:218_1: kappāyuko brahmā adhippeto. Taggahaṇeneva ca brahmapurohitabrahmapārisajjāpi gahitāti
atk-s0201a:218_2: veditabbā. Atthavaṇṇanā panettha pajāpativāre vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:219_0: Ābhassaravāre daṇḍadīpikāya acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī
atk-s0201a:219_1: viya sarati visaratīti ābhassarā. Tesaṃ gahaṇena sabbāpi dutiyajjhānabhūmi gahitā,
atk-s0201a:219_2: ekatalavāsino eva cete sabbepi parittābhā appamāṇābhā ābhassarāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:220_0: Subhakiṇhavāre subhena okiṇṇā vikiṇṇā subhena sarīrappabhāvaṇṇena ekagghanā suvaṇṇamañjūsāya
atk-s0201a:220_2: gahitā. Ekatalavāsino eva cete sabbepi parittasubhā appamāṇasubhā subhakiṇhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:221: Vehapphalavāre, vipulā phalāti vehapphalā. Catutthajjhānabhūmi brahmāno vuccanti. Atthanayayojanā pana imesu tīsupi vāresu bhūtavāre vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:222_0: Abhibhūvāre abhibhavīti abhibhū. Kiṃ abhibhavi? Cattāro khandhe arūpino. Asaññabhavassetaṃ
atk-s0201a:222_1: adhivacanaṃ. Asaññasattā devā vehapphalehi saddhiṃ ekatalāyeva ekasmiṃ okāse yena
atk-s0201a:222_2: iriyāpathena nibbattā, teneva yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhanti cittakammarūpasadisā hutvā. Te
atk-s0201a:222_3: idha sabbepi abhibhūvacanena gahitā. Keci abhibhū nāma sahasso brahmāti evamādinā
atk-s0201a:222_4: nayena tattha tattha adhipatibrahmānaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Brahmaggahaṇeneva pana tassa gahitattā
atk-s0201a:222_5: ayuttametanti veditabbaṃ. Yojanānayo cettha abhibhū vaṇṇavā dīghāyukoti sutvā tattha
atk-s0201a:222_6: chandarāgaṃ uppādento abhibhuṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati. “Aho vatāhaṃ abhibhuno sahabyataṃ
atk-s0201a:222_7: upapajjeyya”ntiādinā pana nayena appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahantopi
atk-s0201a:222_8: abhibhuṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati. Attānaṃ hīnato abhibhuṃ seyyato dahanto pana abhibhuṃ
atk-s0201a:222_9: mānamaññanāya maññati. “Abhibhū nicco dhuvo”tiādinā nayena parāmasanto abhibhuṃ diṭṭhimaññanāya
atk-s0201a:225_0: 4. Evaṃ bhagavā paṭipāṭiyā devaloke dassentopi abhibhūvacanena asaññabhavaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0201a:225_1: idāni yasmā ayaṃ vaṭṭakathā, suddhāvāsā ca vivaṭṭapakkhe ṭhitā, anāgāmikhīṇāsavā
atk-s0201a:225_2: eva hi te devā. Yasmā vā katipayakappasahassāyukā te devā, buddhuppādakāleyeva honti.
atk-s0201a:225_3: Buddhā pana asaṅkheyepi kappe na uppajjanti, tadā suññāpi sā bhūmi hoti. Rañño khandhāvāraṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:225_4: viya hi buddhānaṃ suddhāvāsabhavo. Te teneva ca kāraṇena viññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsavasenapi
atk-s0201a:225_5: na gahitā, sabbakālikā pana imā maññanā. Tasmā tāsaṃ sadāvijjamānabhūmiṃ dassento
atk-s0201a:225_6: suddhāvāse atikkamitvā, ākāsānañcāyatanantiādimāha. Tattha ākāsānañcāyatananti tabbhūmikā
atk-s0201a:225_7: cattāro kusalavipākakiriyā khandhā. Te ca tatrūpapannāyeva daṭṭhabbā bhavaparicchedakathā
atk-s0201a:225_8: ayanti katvā. Esa nayo viññāṇañcāyatanādīsu. Atthayojanā pana catūsupi etesu vāresu
atk-s0201a:225_9: abhibhūvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Mānamaññanā cettha pajāpativāre vuttanayenāpi yujjati.
atk-s0201a:228_0: 5. Evaṃ bhūmivisesādinā bhedena vitthāratopi maññanāvatthuṃ dassetvā idāni sabbamaññanāvatthubhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a:228_1: sakkāyapariyāpannaṃ tebhūmakadhammabhedaṃ diṭṭhādīhi catūhi saṅgaṇhitvā dassento,
atk-s0201a:229_0: Tattha diṭṭhanti maṃsacakkhunāpi diṭṭhaṃ, dibbacakkhunāpi diṭṭhaṃ. Rūpāyatanassetaṃ
atk-s0201a:229_1: adhivacanaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhaṃ maññatīti diṭṭhaṃ tīhi maññanāhi maññati. Kathaṃ? Rūpāyatanaṃ
atk-s0201a:229_2: subhasaññāya sukhasaññāya ca passanto tattha chandarāgaṃ janeti, taṃ assādeti abhinandati.
atk-s0201a:229_3: Vuttampi hetaṃ bhagavatā “itthirūpe, bhikkhave, sattā rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā
atk-s0201a:229_4: ajjhosannā, te dīgharattaṃ socanti itthirūpavasānugā”ti. Evaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṇhāmaññanāya
atk-s0201a:229_5: maññati. “Iti me rūpaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhānanti vā panettha nandiṃ samannāneti, rūpasampadaṃ
atk-s0201a:229_6: vā pana ākaṅkhamāno dānaṃ detī”ti vitthāro. Evampi diṭṭhaṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a:229_7: Attano pana parassa ca rūpasampattiṃ vipattiṃ nissāya mānaṃ janeti. “Imināhaṃ seyyosmī”ti
atk-s0201a:229_8: vā “sadisosmī”ti vā “hīnosmī”ti vāti evaṃ diṭṭhaṃ mānamaññanāya maññati. Rūpāyatanaṃ
atk-s0201a:229_9: pana niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassatanti maññati, attānaṃ attaniyanti maññati, maṅgalaṃ amaṅgalanti
atk-s0201a:229_10: maññati, evaṃ diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhimaññanāya maññati. Evaṃ diṭṭhaṃ tīhi maññanāhi maññati.
atk-s0201a:229_11: Kathaṃ diṭṭhasmiṃ maññati? Rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassananayena maññanto diṭṭhasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:229_12: maññati. Yathā vā dhane dhaññe. Evaṃ rūpasmiṃ rāgādayoti maññantopi diṭṭhasmiṃ maññati.
atk-s0201a:229_13: Ayamassa diṭṭhimaññanā. Tasmiññeva panassa diṭṭhimaññanāya maññite vatthusmiṃ sinehaṃ
atk-s0201a:229_14: mānañca uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā. Evaṃ diṭṭhasmiṃ maññati. Sesaṃ pathavīvāre
atk-s0201a:230: Sutanti maṃsasotenapi sutaṃ, dibbasotenapi sutaṃ, saddāyatanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:231: Mutanti mutvā munitvā ca gahitaṃ, āhacca upagantvāti attho, indriyānaṃ ārammaṇānañca aññamaññasaṃsilese viññātanti vuttaṃ hoti, gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:232_0: Viññātanti manasā viññātaṃ, sesānaṃ sattannaṃ āyatanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ dhammārammaṇassa
atk-s0201a:232_1: vā. Idha pana sakkāyapariyāpannameva labbhati. Vitthāro panettha diṭṭhavāre vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:235: 6. Evaṃ sabbaṃ sakkāyabhedaṃ diṭṭhādīhi catūhi dassetvā idāni tameva samāpannakavārena ca asamāpannakavārena ca dvidhā dassento ekattaṃ nānattantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:236_0: Ekattanti iminā hi samāpannakavāraṃ dasseti. Nānattanti iminā asamāpannakavāraṃ.
atk-s0201a:236_1: Tesaṃ ayaṃ vacanattho ekabhāvo ekattaṃ. Nānābhāvo nānattanti. Yojanā panettha samāpannakavāraṃ
atk-s0201a:236_2: catūhi khandhehi, asamāpannakavārañca pañcahi khandhehi bhinditvā “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā
atk-s0201a:236_3: sāsananayena pathavīvārādīsu vuttena ca aṭṭhakathānayena yathānurūpaṃ vīmaṃsitvā
atk-s0201a:236_4: veditabbā. Keci pana ekattanti ekattanayaṃ vadanti nānattanti nānattanayaṃ. Apare
atk-s0201a:236_5: “ekattasaññī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā, nānattasaññī attā hotī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhābhinivesaṃ.
atk-s0201a:236_6: Taṃ sabbaṃ idha nādhippetattā ayuttameva hoti.
atk-s0201a:237_0: Evaṃ sabbaṃ sakkāyaṃ dvidhā dassetvā idāni tameva ekadhā sampiṇḍetvā dassento sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:237_1: sabbatotiādimāha. Yojanānayo panettha sabbaṃ assādento sabbaṃ taṇhāmaññanāya maññati.
atk-s0201a:237_2: “Mayā ete sattā nimmitā”tiādinā nayena attanā nimmitaṃ maññanto sabbaṃ mānamaññanāya
atk-s0201a:237_3: maññati. “Sabbaṃ pubbekatakammahetu, sabbaṃ issaranimmānahetu, sabbaṃ ahetuapaccayā,
atk-s0201a:237_4: sabbaṃ atthi, sabbaṃ natthī”tiādinā nayena maññanto sabbaṃ diṭṭhimaññanāya maññatīti
atk-s0201a:237_5: veditabbo. Kathaṃ sabbasmiṃ maññati? Idhekacco evaṃdiṭṭhiko hoti “mahā me attā”ti.
atk-s0201a:237_6: So sabbalokasannivāsaṃ tassokāsabhāvena parikappetvā so kho pana me ayaṃ attā sabbasminti
atk-s0201a:237_7: maññati, ayamassa diṭṭhimaññanā. Tasmiṃyeva panassa attani sinehaṃ tabbatthukañca
atk-s0201a:237_8: mānaṃ uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā. Sesaṃ pathavīvāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:238_0: Evaṃ sabbaṃ sakkāyaṃ ekadhā dassetvā idāni aparenapi nayena taṃ ekadhā dassento nibbānaṃ
atk-s0201a:238_1: nibbānatoti āha. Tattha nibbānanti “yato kho, bho, ayaṃ attā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito
atk-s0201a:238_2: samaṅgibhūto paricāreti. Ettāvatā kho, bho, ayaṃ attā paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ
atk-s0201a:238_3: patto hotī”tiādinā nayena pañcadhā āgataṃ paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:238_4: Tattha nibbānaṃ assādento taṇhāmaññanāya maññati. Tena nibbānena “ahamasmi nibbānaṃ
atk-s0201a:238_5: patto”ti mānaṃ janento mānamaññanāya maññati. Anibbānaṃyeva samānaṃ taṃ nibbānato
atk-s0201a:238_6: niccādito ca gaṇhanto diṭṭhimaññanāya maññatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:239_0: Nibbānato pana aññaṃ attānaṃ gahetvā so kho pana me ayaṃ attā imasmiṃ nibbāneti maññanto
atk-s0201a:239_1: nibbānasmiṃ maññati, ayamassa diṭṭhimaññanā. Tasmiṃyeva panassa attani sinehaṃ tabbatthukañca
atk-s0201a:239_2: mānaṃ uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā. Esa nayo nibbānato maññanāyapi. Tatrapi
atk-s0201a:239_3: hi nibbānato aññaṃ attānaṃ gahetvā “idaṃ nibbānaṃ, ayaṃ attā, so kho pana me ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:239_4: attā ito nibbānato añño”ti maññanto nibbānato maññati, ayamassa diṭṭhimaññanā. Tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0201a:239_5: panassa attani sinehaṃ tabbatthukañca mānaṃ uppādayato taṇhāmānamaññanāpi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:239_6: “Aho sukhaṃ mama nibbāna”nti maññanto pana nibbānaṃ meti maññatīti veditabbo. Sesaṃ
atk-s0201a:240: Yādiso esa sakkāyo, tathā naṃ avijānato;
atk-s0201a:243: Taṃ paccanīkato bālo, gaṇhaṃ gaṇhāti maññanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:247: Gūthādī viya gūthasmiṃ, hoti mānena maññanā.
atk-s0201a:248: Attā attaniyo meti, passato naṃ abuddhino;
atk-s0201a:249: Ādāse viya bondhissa, diṭṭhiyā hoti maññanā.
atk-s0201a:254: Sa’so sakkāyamalīno, jātiyā ca jarāya ca;
atk-s0201a:255: Rogādīhi ca dukkhehi, niccaṃ haññati bāḷhaso.
atk-s0201a:256: Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddante, sakkāyaṃ anupassatha;
atk-s0201a:258: Eso sabhāvo hetassa, passaṃ evamimaṃ budho;
atk-s0201a:263_0: 7. Evaṃ bhagavā pathavīādīsu vatthūsu sabbasakkāyadhammamūlabhūtaṃ puthujjanassa
atk-s0201a:263_1: pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni tesveva vatthūsu sekkhassa pavattiṃ dassento yopi so, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:263_2: bhikkhu sekkhotiādimāha. Tattha yoti uddesavacanaṃ. Soti niddesavacanaṃ. Pikāro sampiṇḍanattho
atk-s0201a:263_3: ayampi dhammo aniyatotiādīsu viya. Tena ca ārammaṇasabhāgena puggalaṃ sampiṇḍeti,
atk-s0201a:263_4: no puggalasabhāgena, heṭṭhato hi puggalā diṭṭhivipannā, idha diṭṭhisampannā, na tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:263_5: sabhāgatā atthi. Ārammaṇaṃ pana heṭṭhā puggalānampi tadeva, imesampi tadevāti. Tena
atk-s0201a:263_6: vuttaṃ “ārammaṇasabhāgena puggalaṃ sampiṇḍeti no puggalasabhāgenā”ti. Yopi soti iminā
atk-s0201a:263_7: pana sakalena vacanena idāni vattabbaṃ sekkhaṃ dassetīti veditabbo. Bhikkhave, bhikkhūti idaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a:264_0: Sekkhoti kenaṭṭhena sekkho? Sekkhadhammappaṭilābhato sekkho. Vuttañhetaṃ “kittāvatā
atk-s0201a:264_1: nu kho, bhante, sekkho hotīti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekkhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato
atk-s0201a:264_2: hoti…pe… sekkhena sammāsamādhinā samannāgato hoti. Ettāvatā kho bhikkhu, sekkho hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:264_3: Apica sikkhatītipi sekkho. Vuttañhetaṃ “sikkhatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā sekkhoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:264_4: Kiñca sikkhati? Adhisīlampi sikkhati, adhicittampi sikkhati, adhipaññampi sikkhati,
atk-s0201a:264_5: sikkhatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā sekkhoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:265_0: Yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomapaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro
atk-s0201a:265_1: bhojane mattaññū jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0201a:265_2: bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati – “ajja vā sve vā aññataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ adhigamissāmī”ti,
atk-s0201a:265_3: sopi vuccati sikkhatīti sekkhoti. Imasmiṃ panatthe paṭivedhappattova sekkho adhippeto, no puthujjano.
atk-s0201a:266_0: Appattaṃ mānasaṃ etenāti appattamānaso. Mānasanti rāgopi cittampi arahattampi. “Antalikkhacaro
atk-s0201a:266_1: pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti ettha hi rāgo mānasaṃ. “Cittaṃ mano mānasa”nti ettha
atk-s0201a:266_2: cittaṃ. “Appattamānaso sekkho, kālaṃ kayirā janesutā”ti ettha arahattaṃ. Idhāpi arahattameva
atk-s0201a:267_0: Anuttaranti seṭṭhaṃ, asadisanti attho. Catūhi yogehi khemaṃ ananuyuttanti yogakkhemaṃ,
atk-s0201a:267_1: arahattameva adhippetaṃ. Patthayamānoti dve patthanā taṇhāpatthanā ca, chandapatthanā
atk-s0201a:267_2: ca. “Patthayamānassa hi pajappitāni, pavedhitaṃ vāpi pakappitesū”ti ettha taṇhāpatthanā.
atk-s0201a:270_0: Ettha kattukamyatā kusalacchandapatthanā. Ayameva idhādhippetā. Tena patthayamānoti
atk-s0201a:270_1: taṃ yogakkhemaṃ pattukāmo adhigantukāmo tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:270_2: Viharatīti aññaṃ iriyāpathadukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ
atk-s0201a:270_3: kāyaṃ harati. Atha vā “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti adhimuccanto saddhāya viharatī”tiādināpi
atk-s0201a:270_4: niddesanayenettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānātīti pathaviṃ pathavībhāvena
atk-s0201a:270_5: abhijānāti, na puthujjano viya sabbākāraviparītāya saññāya sañjānāti. Apica kho abhivisiṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:270_6: ñāṇena jānāti, evaṃ pathavīti etaṃ pathavībhāvaṃ adhimuccanto eva naṃ aniccātipi
atk-s0201a:270_7: dukkhātipi anattātipi evaṃ abhijānātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evañca naṃ abhiññatvā pathaviṃ
atk-s0201a:270_8: mā maññīti vuttaṃ hoti. Maññatīti maññi. Ayaṃ pana maññī ca na maññī ca na vattabboti.
atk-s0201a:270_9: Etasmiñhi atthe idaṃ padaṃ nipātetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ko panettha adhippāyoti.
atk-s0201a:270_10: Vuccate, puthujjano tāva sabbamaññanānaṃ appahīnattā maññatīti vutto. Khīṇāsavo pahīnattā
atk-s0201a:270_11: na maññatīti. Sekkhassa pana diṭṭhimaññanā pahīnā, itarā pana tanubhāvaṃ gatā, tena
atk-s0201a:270_12: so maññatītipi na vattabbo puthujjano viya, na maññatītipi na vattabbo khīṇāsavo viyāti.
atk-s0201a:271_0: Pariññeyyaṃ tassāti tassa sekkhassa taṃ maññanāvatthu okkantaniyāmattā sambodhiparāyaṇattā
atk-s0201a:271_1: ca tīhi pariññāhi pariññeyyaṃ, apariññeyyañca apariññātañca na hoti puthujjanassa
atk-s0201a:271_2: viya, nopi pariññātaṃ khīṇāsavassa viya. Sesaṃ sabbattha vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a:274_0: 8. Evaṃ pathavīādīsu vatthūsu sekkhassa pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni khīṇāsavassa pavattiṃ
atk-s0201a:274_1: dassento yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahantiādimāha. Tattha yopīti pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho.
atk-s0201a:274_2: Tena idha ubhayasabhāgatāpi labbhatīti dasseti. Sekkho hi khīṇāsavena ariyapuggalattā
atk-s0201a:274_3: sabhāgo, tena puggalasabhāgatā labbhati, ārammaṇasabhāgatā pana vuttanayā eva. Arahanti
atk-s0201a:274_4: ārakakileso, dūrakileso pahīnakilesoti attho. Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā “kathañca, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:274_5: bhikkhu arahaṃ hoti? Ārakāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobbhavikā
atk-s0201a:274_6: sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṃ
atk-s0201a:274_7: hotī”ti. khīṇāsavoti cattāro āsavā kāmāsavo…pe… avijjāsavo, ime cattāro āsavā arahato
atk-s0201a:274_8: khīṇā pahīnā samucchinnā paṭippassaddhā, abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, tena vuccati khīṇāsavoti.
atk-s0201a:275_0: Vusitavāti garusaṃvāsepi ariyamaggasaṃvāsepi dasasu ariyavāsesupi vasi parivasi vuttho
atk-s0201a:275_1: parivuttho, so vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇoti vusitavā katakaraṇīyoti puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ
atk-s0201a:275_2: upādāya satta sekkhā catūhi maggehi karaṇīyaṃ karonti nāma, khīṇāsavassa sabbakaraṇīyāni
atk-s0201a:275_3: katāni pariyositāni, natthi tassa uttari karaṇīyaṃ dukkhakkhayādhigamāyāti katakaraṇīyo. Vuttampi hetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:277: Katassa paṭicayo natthi, karaṇīyaṃ na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:278_0: Ohitabhāroti tayo bhārā khandhabhāro kilesabhāro abhisaṅkhārabhāroti, tassime tayo
atk-s0201a:278_1: bhārā ohitā oropitā nikkhittā pātitā, tena vuccati ohitabhāroti. Anuppattasadatthoti
atk-s0201a:278_2: anuppatto sadatthaṃ, sakatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Kakārassāyaṃ dakāro kato, sadatthoti
atk-s0201a:278_3: ca arahattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tañhi attupanibandhanaṭṭhena attānaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena attano
atk-s0201a:278_4: paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano attho sakatthoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:279_2: Imāni hi satte bhavesu saṃyojenti upanibandhanti, bhavaṃ vā bhavena saṃyojenti, tasmā
atk-s0201a:279_3: “bhavasaṃyojanānī”ti vuccanti. Imāni bhavasaṃyojanāni arahato parikkhīṇāni pahīnāni
atk-s0201a:279_4: ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni, tena vuccati “parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano”ti. Sammadaññā vimuttoti
atk-s0201a:279_5: ettha sammadaññāti sammā aññāya. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭhaṃ, āyatanānaṃ
atk-s0201a:279_6: āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ dhātuṭṭhaṃ, dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhaṃ, samudayassa pabhavaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:279_7: nirodhassa santaṭṭhaṃ, maggassa dassanaṭṭhaṃ, sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti evamādiṃ vā
atk-s0201a:279_8: bhedaṃ sammā yathābhūtaṃ aññāya jānitvā tīrayitvā tulayitvā vibhāvetvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti.
atk-s0201a:280_0: Vimuttoti dve vimuttiyo cittassa ca vimutti nibbānañca. Arahā sabbakilesehi vimuttacittattā
atk-s0201a:280_1: cittavimuttiyāpi vimutto. Nibbānaṃ adhimuttattā nibbānepi vimutto. Tena vuccati “sammadaññā
atk-s0201a:280_2: vimutto”ti. Pariññātaṃ tassāti tassa arahato taṃ maññanāvatthu tīhi pariññāhi pariññātaṃ.
atk-s0201a:280_3: Tasmā so taṃ vatthuṃ na maññati, taṃ vā maññanaṃ na maññatīti vuttaṃ hoti, sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a:281_0: Nibbānavāre pana khayā rāgassātiādayo tayo vārā vuttā. Te pathavīvārādīsupi vitthāretabbā.
atk-s0201a:281_1: Ayañca pariññātavāro nibbānavārepi vitthāretabbo. Vitthārentena ca pariññātaṃ tassāti
atk-s0201a:281_2: sabbapadehi yojetvā puna khayā rāgassa vītarāgattāti yojetabbaṃ. Esa nayo itaresu.
atk-s0201a:281_3: Desanā pana ekattha vuttaṃ sabbattha vuttameva hotīti saṃkhittā.
atk-s0201a:282_0: Khayā rāgassa vītarāgattāti ettha ca yasmā bāhirako kāmesu vītarāgo, na khayā rāgassa
atk-s0201a:282_1: vītarāgo. Arahā pana khayā yeva, tasmā vuttaṃ “khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā”ti. Esa
atk-s0201a:282_2: nayo dosamohesupi. Yathā ca “pariññātaṃ tassāti vadāmī”ti vuttepi pariññātattā so
atk-s0201a:282_3: taṃ vatthuṃ taṃ vā maññanaṃ na maññatīti attho hoti, evamidhāpi vītarāgattā so taṃ
atk-s0201a:282_4: vatthuṃ taṃ vā maññanaṃ na maññatīti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:283_0: Ettha ca pariññātaṃ tassāti ayaṃ vāro maggabhāvanāpāripūridassanatthaṃ vutto. Itare
atk-s0201a:283_1: pana phalasacchikiriyāpāripūridassanatthanti veditabbā. Dvīhi vā kāraṇehi arahā na
atk-s0201a:283_2: maññati vatthussa ca pariññātattā akusalamūlānañca samucchinnattā. Tenassa pariññātavārena
atk-s0201a:283_3: vatthuno vatthupariññaṃ dīpeti, itarehi akusalamūlasamucchedanti. Tattha pacchimesu
atk-s0201a:283_4: tīsu vāresu ayaṃ viseso veditabbo, tīsu hi vāresu rāge ādīnavaṃ disvā dukkhānupassī
atk-s0201a:283_5: viharanto appaṇihitavimokkhena vimutto khayā rāgassa vītarāgo hoti. Dose ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0201a:283_6: disvā aniccānupassī viharanto animittavimokkhena vimutto khayā dosassa vītadoso hoti.
atk-s0201a:283_7: Mohe ādīnavaṃ disvā anattānupassī viharanto suññatavimokkhena vimutto khayā mohassa vītamoho hotīti.
atk-s0201a:284_0: Evaṃ sante na eko tīhi vimokkhehi vimuccatīti dve vārā na vattabbā siyunti ce, taṃ
atk-s0201a:284_1: na. Kasmā? Aniyamitattā. Aniyamena hi vuttaṃ “yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha”nti.
atk-s0201a:284_2: Na pana vuttaṃ appaṇihitavimokkhena vā vimutto, itarena vāti, tasmā yaṃ arahato yujjati,
atk-s0201a:285_0: Avisesena vā yo koci arahā samānepi rāgādikkhaye vipariṇāmadukkhassa pariññātattā
atk-s0201a:285_1: khayā rāgassa vītarāgoti vuccati, dukkhadukkhassa pariññātattā khayā dosassa vītadosoti.
atk-s0201a:285_2: Saṅkhāradukkhassa pariññātattā khayā mohassa vītamohoti. Iṭṭhārammaṇassa vā pariññātattā
atk-s0201a:285_3: khayā rāgassa vītarāgo. Aniṭṭhārammaṇassa pariññātattā khayā dosassa vītadoso. Majjhattārammaṇassa
atk-s0201a:285_4: pariññātattā khayā mohassa vītamoho. Sukhāya vā vedanāya rāgānusayassa samucchinnattā
atk-s0201a:285_5: khayā rāgassa vītarāgo, itarāsu paṭighamohānusayānaṃ samucchinnattā vītadoso vītamoho
atk-s0201a:285_6: cāti. Tasmā taṃ visesaṃ dassento āha “khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā…pe… vītamohattā”ti.
atk-s0201a:288_0: 12. Evaṃ pathavīādīsu vatthūsu khīṇāsavassa pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni attano pavattiṃ
atk-s0201a:288_1: dassento tathāgatopi, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha tathāgatoti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā
atk-s0201a:288_2: tathāgatoti vuccati – tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:288_3: āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato, tathadassitāya
atk-s0201a:288_4: tathāgato, tathāvāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato, abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgatoti.
atk-s0201a:289_0: Kathaṃ bhagavā tathā āgatoti tathāgato? Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā
