atk-s0201a:289_1: sammāsambuddhā āgatā, yathā vipassī bhagavā āgato, yathā sikhī bhagavā, yathā vessabhū
atk-s0201a:289_2: bhagavā, yathā kakusandho bhagavā, yathā koṇāgamano bhagavā, yathā kassapo bhagavā
atk-s0201a:289_3: āgatoti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yena abhinīhārena ete bhagavanto āgatā, teneva amhākampi bhagavā āgato.
atk-s0201a:290_0: Atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā dānapāramiṃ pūretvā, sīlanekkhammapaññāvīriyakhantisaccaadhiṭṭhānamettāupekkhāpāramiṃ
atk-s0201a:290_1: pūretvā, imā dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti, samatiṃsa
atk-s0201a:290_2: pāramiyo pūretvā, aṅgapariccāgaṃ nayanadhanarajjaputtadārapariccāganti ime pañca
atk-s0201a:290_4: buddhicariyāya koṭiṃ patvā āgato, tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgato.
atk-s0201a:291_0: Yathā ca vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne sammappadhāne
atk-s0201a:291_1: iddhipāde pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅge ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-s0201a:291_2: brūhetvā āgato, tathā amhākaṃ bhagavāpi āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0201a:297_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato. Yathā sampatijāto vipassī bhagavā gato…pe… kassapo
atk-s0201a:297_1: bhagavā gato. Kathañca so gatoti, so hi sampatijātova samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:297_2: uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gato. Yathāha – sampatijāto, ānanda, bodhisatto
atk-s0201a:297_3: samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati
atk-s0201a:297_4: setamhi chatte anudhārīyamāne, sabbā ca disā anuviloketi, āsabhiñca vācaṃ bhāsati
atk-s0201a:297_5: “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimā jāti,
atk-s0201a:298_0: Tañcassa gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena.
atk-s0201a:298_1: Yañhi so sampatijātova samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahi, idamassa caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa
atk-s0201a:298_2: pubbanimittaṃ. Uttarābhimukhabhāvo pana sabbalokuttarabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ. Sattapadavītihāro
atk-s0201a:298_6: pubbanimittaṃ. Tathā ayaṃ bhagavāpi gato. Tañcassa gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ
atk-s0201a:308_0: Atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā, ayampi bhagavā tatheva nekkhammena
atk-s0201a:308_1: kāmacchandaṃ pahāya gato. Abyāpādena byāpādaṃ, ālokasaññāya thinamiddhaṃ, avikkhepena
atk-s0201a:308_2: uddhaccakukkuccaṃ, dhammavavatthānena vicikicchaṃ pahāya, ñāṇena avijjaṃ padāletvā,
atk-s0201a:308_3: pāmojjena aratiṃ vinodetvā, paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇakavāṭaṃ ugghāṭetvā, dutiyajjhānena
atk-s0201a:308_4: vitakkavicāradhūmaṃ vūpasametvā, tatiyajjhānena pītiṃ virājetvā, catutthajjhānena
atk-s0201a:309_0: Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ pahāya, dukkhānupassanāya sukhasaññaṃ, anattānupassanāya
atk-s0201a:309_1: attasaññaṃ, nibbidānupassanāya nandiṃ, virāgānupassanāya rāgaṃ, nirodhānupassanāya
atk-s0201a:309_2: samudayaṃ, paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānaṃ, khayānupassanāya ghanasaññaṃ, vayānupassanāya
atk-s0201a:309_3: āyūhanaṃ, vipariṇāmānupassanāya dhuvasaññaṃ, animittānupassanāya nimittaṃ, appaṇihitānupassanāya
atk-s0201a:309_7: kilese bhañjitvā, sakadāgāmimaggena oḷārike kilese pahāya, anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagate
atk-s0201a:309_8: kilese samugghāṭetvā, arahattamaggena sabbakilese samucchinditvā gato. Evampi tathā gatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0201a:310_0: Kathaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato. Pathavīdhātuyā kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ
atk-s0201a:310_1: avitathaṃ. Āpodhātuyā paggharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Tejodhātuyā uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ. Vāyodhātuyā
atk-s0201a:311: Rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ. Vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ. Saññāya sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ. Saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:312: Vitakkassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇaṃ. Vicārassa anumajjanalakkhaṇaṃ. Pītiyā pharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Sukhassa sātalakkhaṇaṃ. Cittekaggatāya avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ. Phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:313: Saddhindriyassa adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ. Vīriyindriyassa paggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Satindriyassa upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ. Samādhindriyassa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ. Paññindriyassa pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:314: Saddhābalassa assaddhiye akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ. Vīriyabalassa kosajje. Satibalassa muṭṭhasacce. Samādhibalassa uddhacce. Paññābalassa avijjāya akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:316_2: Sammāvāyāmassa paggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Sammāsatiyā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ. Sammāsamādhissa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:317_0: Avijjāya aññāṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Saṅkhārānaṃ cetanālakkhaṇaṃ. Viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:317_1: Nāmassa namanalakkhaṇaṃ. Rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ. Saḷāyatanassa āyatanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:317_2: Phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ. Vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ. Taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇaṃ. Upādānassa
atk-s0201a:317_3: gahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Bhavassa āyūhanalakkhaṇaṃ. Jātiyā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ. Jarāya jīraṇalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:318_0: Dhātūnaṃ suññatālakkhaṇaṃ. Āyatanānaṃ āyatanalakkhaṇaṃ. Satipaṭṭhānānaṃ upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:318_1: Sammappadhānānaṃ padahanalakkhaṇaṃ. Iddhipādānaṃ ijjhanalakkhaṇaṃ. Indriyānaṃ adhipatilakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:318_2: Balānaṃ akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ. Bojjhaṅgānaṃ niyyānalakkhaṇaṃ. Maggassa hetulakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:319: Saccānaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ. Samathassa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ. Vipassanāya anupassanālakkhaṇaṃ. Samathavipassanānaṃ ekarasalakkhaṇaṃ. Yuganandhānaṃ anativattanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:320: Sīlavisuddhiyā saṃvaralakkhaṇaṃ. Cittavisuddhiyā avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ. Diṭṭhivisuddhiyā dassanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:321_0: Khayeñāṇassa samucchedalakkhaṇaṃ. Anuppāde ñāṇassa passaddhilakkhaṇaṃ. Chandassa
atk-s0201a:321_1: mūlalakkhaṇaṃ. Manasikārassa samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ. Phassassa samodhānalakkhaṇaṃ. Vedanāya
atk-s0201a:321_2: samosaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Samādhissa pamukhalakkhaṇaṃ. Satiyā ādhipateyyalakkhaṇaṃ. Paññāya
atk-s0201a:321_3: tatuttarilakkhaṇaṃ. Vimuttiyā sāralakkhaṇaṃ. Amatogadhassa nibbānassa pariyosānalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:321_4: tathaṃ avitathaṃ. Evaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anuppattoti
atk-s0201a:322_0: Kathaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato? Tathadhammā nāma cattāri
atk-s0201a:322_1: ariyasaccāni. Yathāha “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Katamāni
atk-s0201a:322_2: cattāri, idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti vitthāro.
atk-s0201a:322_3: Tāni ca bhagavā abhisambuddho, tasmā tathānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:322_4: Abhisambuddhattho hi ettha gatasaddo. Apica jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho
atk-s0201a:322_5: tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe… saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho
atk-s0201a:322_6: avitatho anaññatho. Tathā avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho. Saṅkhārānaṃ viññāṇassa
atk-s0201a:322_7: paccayaṭṭho…pe… jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho. Taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:322_8: bhagavā abhisambuddho, tasmāpi tathānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:323_0: Kathaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato? Bhagavā yaṃ sadevake loke…pe… sadevamanussāya aparimāṇāsu
atk-s0201a:323_1: lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma
atk-s0201a:323_2: atthi. Taṃ sabbākārato jānāti, passati. Evaṃ jānatā passatā ca tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena
atk-s0201a:323_3: vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:323_4: yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ
atk-s0201a:323_5: pītaka”nti ādinā nayena anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ
atk-s0201a:323_6: tathameva hoti, vitathaṃ natthi. Esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi āpāthamāgacchantesu saddādīsu.
atk-s0201a:323_7: Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā “yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0201a:323_8: sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi, …tamahaṃ
atk-s0201a:323_9: abhiññāsiṃ, taṃ tathāgatassa viditaṃ, taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī”ti. Evaṃ tathadassitāya
atk-s0201a:323_10: tathāgato. Tattha tathadassīatthe tathāgatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:324_0: Kathaṃ tathāvāditāya tathāgato? Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno
atk-s0201a:324_1: tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, yañca rattiṃ
atk-s0201a:324_2: yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi, etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe
atk-s0201a:324_3: kāle paṭhamabodhiyāpi majjhimabodhiyāpi pacchimabodhiyāpi yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ
atk-s0201a:324_4: suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ atthato ca byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ anūnamanadhikaṃ
atk-s0201a:324_5: sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ dosamohamadanimmadanaṃ, natthi tattha vālaggamattampi
atk-s0201a:324_6: pakkhalitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya, ekanāḷiyā mitaṃ viya, ekatulāya
atk-s0201a:324_7: tulitaṃ viya ca tathameva hoti avitathaṃ. Tenāha – “yañca, cunda, rattiṃ tathāgato
atk-s0201a:324_8: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0201a:324_9: parinibbāyati, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati, sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti
atk-s0201a:324_10: no aññathā. Tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti. Gadaattho hi ettha gatasaddo. Evaṃ tathāvāditāya
atk-s0201a:324_11: tathāgato. Apica āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa
atk-s0201a:324_12: takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evametasmiṃ atthe padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:325_0: Kathaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato? Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi, kāyassapi vācā.
atk-s0201a:325_1: Tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. Evaṃbhūtassa cassa yathā
atk-s0201a:325_2: vācā, kāyopi tathāgato pavattoti attho. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatā pavattāti
atk-s0201a:325_3: tathāgato. Tenāha “yathāvādī, bhikkhave, tathāgato tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī.
atk-s0201a:325_4: Iti yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī, tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:326_0: Kathaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato? Upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā aviciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:326_1: tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati, sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi
atk-s0201a:326_2: vimuttiyāpi vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi, atulo appameyyo
atk-s0201a:326_3: anuttaro rājarājo devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā. Tenāha “sadevake,
atk-s0201a:326_4: bhikkhave, loke…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso
atk-s0201a:327_0: Tatrevaṃ padasiddhi veditabbā, agado viya agado. Ko panesa? Desanāvilāsamayo ceva
atk-s0201a:327_1: puññussayo ca. Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino
atk-s0201a:327_2: sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati, iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāsamayo
atk-s0201a:327_3: ceva puññassayo ca agado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:328_0: Apica tathāya gatotipi tathāgato, tathaṃ gatotipi tathāgato. Gatoti avagato, atīto,
atk-s0201a:328_1: patto, paṭipannoti attho. Tattha sakalaṃ lokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti
atk-s0201a:328_2: tathāgato. Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhaṃ
atk-s0201a:328_3: sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ
atk-s0201a:328_4: gato paṭipannoti tathāgato. Tena yaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā “loko, bhikkhave, tathāgatena
atk-s0201a:328_5: abhisambuddho, lokasmā tathāgato visaṃyutto. Lokasamudayo, bhikkhave, tathāgatena
atk-s0201a:328_6: abhisambuddho, lokasamudayo tathāgatassa pahīno. Lokanirodho, bhikkhave, tathāgatena
atk-s0201a:328_7: abhisambuddho, lokanirodho tathāgatassa sacchikato. Lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:328_8: tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā tathāgatassa bhāvitā. Yaṃ,
atk-s0201a:328_9: bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddhaṃ, tasmā tathāgatoti
atk-s0201a:328_10: vuccatī”ti. Tassa evampi attho veditabbo. Idampi ca tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvadīpane
atk-s0201a:328_11: mukhamattameva. Sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0201a:329: Arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti padadvaye pana ārakattā arīnaṃ, arānañca hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi arahanti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:330: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddhoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato panetaṃ padadvayaṃ visuddhimagge buddhānussativaṇṇanāyaṃ pakāsitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:331_0: Pariññātantaṃ tathāgatassāti ettha pana taṃ maññanāvatthu pariññātaṃ tathāgatassātipi
atk-s0201a:331_1: attho veditabbo. Pariññātantaṃ nāma pariññātapāraṃ pariññātāvasānaṃ anavasesato pariññātanti
atk-s0201a:331_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Buddhānañhi sāvakehi saddhiṃ kiñcāpi tena tena maggena kilesappahāne
atk-s0201a:331_3: viseso natthi, pariññāya pana atthi. Sāvakā hi catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ ekadesameva sammasitvā
atk-s0201a:331_4: nibbānaṃ pāpuṇanti. Buddhānaṃ pana aṇuppamāṇampi saṅkhāragataṃ ñāṇena adiṭṭhamatulitamatīritamasacchikataṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a:334_0: 13. Nandī dukkhassa mūlantiādīsu ca nandīti purimataṇhā. Dukkhanti pañcakkhandhā.
atk-s0201a:334_1: Mūlantiādi. Iti viditvāti taṃ purimabhavanandiṃ “imassa dukkhassa mūla”nti evaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0201a:334_2: Bhavāti kammabhavato. Jātīti vipākakkhandhā. Te hi yasmā jāyanti, tasmā “jātī”ti
atk-s0201a:334_3: vuttā. Jātisīsena vā ayaṃ desanā. Etampi “iti viditvā”ti iminā yojetabbaṃ. Ayañhi
atk-s0201a:334_4: ettha attho “kammabhavato upapattibhavo hotīti evañca jānitvā”ti. Bhūtassāti sattassa.
atk-s0201a:334_5: Jarāmaraṇanti jarā ca maraṇañca. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tena upapattibhavena bhūtassa
atk-s0201a:334_6: sattassa khandhānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ hotīti evañca jānitvāti.
atk-s0201a:335_0: Ettāvatā yaṃ bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinno sammasitvā sabbaññutaṃ patto,
atk-s0201a:335_1: tassa paṭiccasamuppādassa paṭivedhā maññanānaṃ abhāvakāraṇaṃ dassento catusaṅkhepaṃ
atk-s0201a:335_2: tisandhiṃ tiyaddhaṃ vīsatākāraṃ tameva paṭiccasamuppādaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:336_0: Kathaṃ pana ettāvatā esa sabbo dassito hotīti. Ettha hi nandīti ayaṃ eko saṅkhepo.
atk-s0201a:336_1: Dukkhassāti vacanato dukkhaṃ dutiyo, bhavā jātīti vacanato bhavo tatiyo, jātijarāmaraṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:336_2: catuttho. Evaṃ tāva cattāro saṅkhepā veditabbā, koṭṭhāsāti attho. Taṇhādukkhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:336_3: pana antaraṃ eko sandhi, dukkhassa ca bhavassa ca antaraṃ dutiyo, bhavassa ca jātiyā
atk-s0201a:336_4: ca antaraṃ tatiyo. Evaṃ catunnaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ antarasadisā catusaṅkhepantarā tayo sandhī veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:337_0: Tattha nandīti atīto addhā, jātijarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato, dukkhañca bhavo ca paccuppannoti
atk-s0201a:337_1: evaṃ tayo addhā veditabbā. Atīte pana pañcasu ākāresu nandīvacanena taṇhā ekā āgatā,
atk-s0201a:337_2: tāya anāgatāpi avijjāsaṅkhāraupādānabhavā paccayalakkhaṇena gahitāva honti. Jātijarāmaraṇavacanena
atk-s0201a:337_3: pana yesaṃ khandhānaṃ tajjātijarāmaraṇaṃ, te vuttā yevāti katvā āyatiṃ viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā gahitāva honti.
atk-s0201a:338_0: Evamete “purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā, upagamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:338_1: upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavo iti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā
atk-s0201a:338_2: paccayā. Idha paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ, pasādo āyatanaṃ, phuṭṭho phasso,
atk-s0201a:338_3: vedayitaṃ vedanā iti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā.
atk-s0201a:338_4: Idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā, upagamanamupādānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:338_5: cetanā bhavo iti ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā.
atk-s0201a:338_6: Āyatiṃ paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ, pasādo āyatanaṃ, phuṭṭho phasso, vedayitaṃ
atk-s0201a:338_7: vedanā iti ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ upapattibhavasmiṃ idha katassa kammassa paccayā”ti
atk-s0201a:338_8: evaṃ niddiṭṭhalakkhaṇā vīsati ākārā idha veditabbā. Evaṃ “nandī dukkhassa mūlanti
atk-s0201a:338_9: iti viditvā bhavā jāti, bhūtassa jarāmaraṇa”nti ettāvatā esa sabbopi catusaṅkhepo
atk-s0201a:338_10: tisandhi tiyaddho vīsatākāro paṭiccasamuppādo dassito hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:339_0: Idāni tasmā tiha, bhikkhave…pe… abhisambuddhoti vadāmīti ettha apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ
atk-s0201a:339_1: katvā padayojanāya atthanigamanaṃ karissāma. Tasmā tihāti tasmā icceva vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:339_2: Tikārahakārā hi nipātā. Sabbasoti anavasesavacanametaṃ. Taṇhānanti nandīti evaṃ vuttānaṃ
atk-s0201a:339_3: sabbataṇhānaṃ. Khayāti lokuttaramaggena accantakkhayā. Virāgādīni khayavevacanāneva.
atk-s0201a:339_4: Yā hi taṇhā khīṇā, virattāpi tā bhavanti niruddhāpi cattāpi paṭinissaṭṭhāpi. Khayāti
atk-s0201a:339_5: vā catumaggakiccasādhāraṇametaṃ. Tato paṭhamamaggena virāgā, dutiyena nirodhā, tatiyena
atk-s0201a:339_6: cāgā, catutthena paṭinissaggāti yojetabbaṃ. Yāhi vā taṇhāhi pathaviṃ pathavito sañjāneyya,
atk-s0201a:339_7: tāsaṃ khayā. Yāhi pathaviṃ maññeyya, tāsaṃ virāgā. Yāhi pathaviyā maññeyya, tāsaṃ
atk-s0201a:339_8: nirodhā. Yāhi pathavito maññeyya, tāsaṃ cāgā. Yāhi pathaviṃ meti maññeyya, tāsaṃ
atk-s0201a:339_9: paṭinissaggā. Yāhi vā pathaviṃ maññeyya, tāsaṃ khayā…pe… yāhi pathaviṃ abhinandeyya,
atk-s0201a:339_10: tāsaṃ paṭinissaggāti evamettha yojanā kātabbā, na kiñci virujjhati.
atk-s0201a:340_0: Anuttaranti uttaravirahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ. Sammāsambodhinti sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ.
atk-s0201a:340_1: Atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhiṃ. Bodhīti rukkhopi maggopi sabbaññutañāṇampi nibbānampi.
atk-s0201a:340_2: “Bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti ca “antarā ca bodhiṃ antarā ca gaya”nti ca
atk-s0201a:340_3: āgataṭṭhānehi rukkho bodhīti vuccati. “Catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo.
atk-s0201a:340_5: amataṃ asaṅkhata”nti āgataṭṭhāne nibbānaṃ. Idha pana bhagavato arahattamaggañāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:341_0: Sāvakānaṃ arahattamaggo anuttarā bodhi hoti na hotīti. Na hoti. Kasmā? Asabbaguṇadāyakattā.
atk-s0201a:341_1: Tesañhi kassaci arahattamaggo arahattaphalameva deti, kassaci tisso vijjā, kassaci
atk-s0201a:341_2: cha abhiññā, kassaci catasso paṭisambhidā, kassaci sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ. Paccekabuddhānampi
atk-s0201a:341_3: paccekabodhiñāṇameva deti. Buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti abhiseko viya rañño
atk-s0201a:341_4: sabbalokissariyabhāvaṃ. Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hotīti.
atk-s0201a:342_0: Abhisambuddhoti abhiññāsi paṭivijjhi, patto adhigatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Iti vadāmīti
atk-s0201a:342_1: iti vadāmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi, paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromīti.
atk-s0201a:342_2: Tatrāyaṃ yojanā – tathāgatopi, bhikkhave…pe… pathaviṃ na maññati…pe… pathaviṃ nābhinandati.
atk-s0201a:342_3: Taṃ kissa hetu, nandī dukkhassa mūlaṃ, bhavā jāti, bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti iti viditvāti.
atk-s0201a:342_4: Tattha iti viditvāti itikāro kāraṇattho. Tena imassa paṭiccasamuppādassa viditattā
atk-s0201a:342_5: paṭividdhattāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kiñca bhiyyo – yasmā ca evamimaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ viditvā
atk-s0201a:342_6: tathāgatassa yā nandīti vuttataṇhā sabbappakārā, sā pahīnā, tāsañca tathāgato sabbaso
atk-s0201a:342_7: taṇhānaṃ khayā…pe… anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho. Tasmā pathaviṃ na maññati…pe…
atk-s0201a:342_8: pathaviṃ nābhinandatīti vadāmīti evaṃ abhisambuddhattā na maññati nābhinandatīti
atk-s0201a:343_0: Atha vā yasmā “nandī dukkhassa mūla”ntiādinā nayena paṭiccasamuppādaṃ viditvā sabbaso
atk-s0201a:343_1: taṇhā khayaṃ gatā, tasmā tiha, bhikkhave, tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā…pe… abhisambuddhoti
atk-s0201a:343_2: vadāmi. So evaṃ abhisambuddhattā pathaviṃ na maññati…pe… nābhinandatīti. Yattha yattha
atk-s0201a:343_3: hi yasmāti avatvā tasmāti vuccati, tattha tattha yasmāti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ, ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:344_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ nidānāvasānato pabhuti yāva abhisambuddhoti vadāmīti sakalasuttantaṃ
atk-s0201a:344_1: bhagavā paresaṃ paññāya alabbhaṇeyyapatiṭṭhaṃ paramagambhīraṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ dassento
atk-s0201a:344_2: ekena puthujjanavārena ekena sekkhavārena catūhi khīṇāsavavārehi dvīhi tathāgatavārehīti
atk-s0201a:344_3: aṭṭhahi mahāvārehi ekamekasmiñca vāre pathavīādīhi catuvīsatiyā antaravārehi paṭimaṇḍetvā
atk-s0201a:345_0: Evaṃ vicitranayadesanāvilāsayuttaṃ panetaṃ suttaṃ karavikarudamañjunā kaṇṇasukhena
atk-s0201a:345_1: paṇḍitajanahadayānaṃ amatābhisekasadisena brahmassarena bhāsamānassāpi. Na te bhikkhū
atk-s0201a:345_2: bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti te pañcasatā bhikkhū idaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ nānumodiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:345_3: Kasmā? Aññāṇakena. Te kira imassa suttassa atthaṃ na jāniṃsu, tasmā nābhinandiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:345_4: Tesañhi tasmiṃ samaye evaṃ vicitranayadesanāvilāsayuttampi etaṃ suttaṃ ghanaputhulena
atk-s0201a:345_5: dussapaṭṭena mukhe bandhaṃ katvā purato ṭhapitamanuññabhojanaṃ viya ahosi. Nanu ca
atk-s0201a:345_6: bhagavā attanā desitaṃ dhammaṃ pare ñāpetuṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0201a:345_7: pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto. So kasmā yathā te na jānanti, tathā desesīti.
atk-s0201a:345_8: Vuttamidaṃ imassa suttassa nikkhepavicāraṇāyaṃ eva “mānabhañjanatthaṃ sabbadhammamūlapariyāyanti
atk-s0201a:345_9: desanaṃ ārabhī”ti, tasmā na yidha puna vattabbamatthi, evaṃ mānabhañjanatthaṃ desitañca
atk-s0201a:345_10: panetaṃ suttaṃ sutvā te bhikkhū taṃyeva kira pathaviṃ diṭṭhigatikopi sañjānāti, sekkhopi
atk-s0201a:345_11: arahāpi tathāgatopi sañjānāti. Kinnāmidaṃ kathaṃ nāmidanti cintentā pubbe mayaṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0201a:345_12: kathitaṃ yaṃkiñci khippameva jānāma, idāni panimassa mūlapariyāyassa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ
atk-s0201a:345_13: vā na jānāma na passāma, aho buddhā nāma appameyyā atulāti uddhaṭadāṭhā viya sappā
atk-s0201a:345_14: nimmadā hutvā buddhupaṭṭhānañca dhammassavanañca sakkaccaṃ āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:346_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā imaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0201a:346_1: “aho buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo, te nāma brāhmaṇapabbajitā tathā mānamadamattā bhagavatā
atk-s0201a:346_2: mūlapariyāyadesanāya nihatamānā katā”ti, ayañcarahi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antarākathā
atk-s0201a:346_3: vippakatā. Atha bhagavā gandhakuṭiyā nikkhamitvā taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:346_4: paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīditvā te bhikkhū āha – “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0201a:346_5: kathāya sannisinnā”ti. Te tamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā etadavoca – “na,
atk-s0201a:346_6: bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi ahaṃ ime evaṃ mānapaggahitasire vicarante nihatamāne
atk-s0201a:346_7: akāsi”nti. Tato imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ atītaṃ ānesi –
atk-s0201a:347_0: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, aññataro disāpāmokkho brāhmaṇo bārāṇasiyaṃ paṭivasati tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:347_1: vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇṭukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako
atk-s0201a:347_2: veyyākaraṇo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo, so pañcamattāni māṇavakasatāni
atk-s0201a:347_3: mante vāceti. Paṇḍitā māṇavakā bahuñca gaṇhanti lahuñca, suṭṭhu ca upadhārenti, gahitañca
atk-s0201a:347_4: tesaṃ na vinassati. Sopi brāhmaṇo ācariyamuṭṭhiṃ akatvā ghaṭe udakaṃ āsiñcanto viya
atk-s0201a:347_5: sabbampi sippaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā te māṇavake etadavoca “ettakamidaṃ sippaṃ diṭṭhadhammasamparāyahita”nti.
atk-s0201a:347_6: Te māṇavakā – “yaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyo jānāti, mayampi taṃ jānāma, mayampi dāni ācariyā
atk-s0201a:347_7: evā”ti mānaṃ uppādetvā tato pabhuti ācariye agāravā nikkhittavattā vihariṃsu. Ācariyo
atk-s0201a:347_8: ñatvā “karissāmi nesaṃ mānaniggaha”nti cintesi. So ekadivasaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0201a:347_9: vanditvā nisinne te māṇavake āha “tātā pañhaṃ pucchissāmi, kaccittha samatthā kathetu”nti.
atk-s0201a:347_10: Te “pucchatha ācariya, pucchatha ācariyā”ti sahasāva āhaṃsu, yathā taṃ sutamadamattā. Ācariyo āha –
atk-s0201a:349: Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto, sa bhūtapacaniṃ pacī”ti. –
atk-s0201a:351_0: Te cintetvā ajānamānā tuṇhī ahesuṃ. Ācariyo āha “alaṃ tātā gacchathajja, sve katheyyāthā”ti
atk-s0201a:351_1: uyyojesi. Te dasapi vīsatipi sampiṇḍitā hutvā na tassa pañhassa ādiṃ, na antamaddasaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:351_2: Āgantvā ācariyassa ārocesuṃ “na imassa pañhassa atthaṃ ājānāmā”ti. Ācariyo tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:354_0: Gāthāyattho – bahūni narānaṃ sīsāni dissanti, sabbāni ca tāni lomasāni sabbāni ca
atk-s0201a:354_1: mahantāni gīvāyameva ca ṭhapitāni, na tālaphalaṃ viya hatthena gahitāni, natthi tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:354_2: imehi dhammehi nānākaraṇaṃ. Ettha pana kocideva kaṇṇavāti attānaṃ sandhāyāha. Kaṇṇavāti
atk-s0201a:354_3: paññavā. Kaṇṇacchiddaṃ pana na kassaci natthi, taṃ sutvā te māṇavakā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā
atk-s0201a:354_4: adhomukhā aṅguliyā bhūmiṃ vilikhantā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:355_0: Atha nesaṃ ahirikabhāvaṃ passitvā ācariyo “uggaṇhatha tātā pañha”nti pañhaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0201a:355_1: Kāloti purebhattakālopi pacchābhattakālopīti evamādi. Bhūtānīti sattādhivacanametaṃ.
atk-s0201a:355_2: Kālo hi bhūtānaṃ na cammamaṃsādīni khādati, apica kho nesaṃ āyuvaṇṇabalāni khepento
atk-s0201a:355_3: yobbaññaṃ maddanto ārogyaṃ vināsento ghasati khādatīti vuccati. Sabbāneva sahattanāti
atk-s0201a:355_4: evaṃ ghasanto ca na kiñci vajjeti, sabbāneva ghasati. Na kevalañca bhūtāniyeva, apica
atk-s0201a:355_5: kho sahattanā attānampi ghasati. Purebhattakālo hi pacchābhattakālaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:355_6: Esa nayo pacchābhattakālādīsu. Yo ca kālaghaso bhūtoti khīṇāsavassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:355_7: So hi āyatiṃ paṭisandhikālaṃ khepetvā khāditvā ṭhitattā “kālaghaso”ti vuccati. Sa
atk-s0201a:355_8: bhūtapacaniṃ pacīti so yāyaṃ taṇhā apāyesu bhūte pacati, taṃ ñāṇagginā paci dayhi
atk-s0201a:355_9: bhasmamakāsi, tena “bhūtapacaniṃ pacī”ti vuccati. “Pajani”ntipi pāṭho. Janikaṃ nibbattikanti attho.
atk-s0201a:356_0: Atha te māṇavakā dīpasahassālokena viya rattiṃ samavisamaṃ ācariyassa vissajjanena
atk-s0201a:356_1: pañhassa atthaṃ pākaṭaṃ disvā “idāni mayaṃ yāvajīvaṃ guruvāsaṃ vasissāma, mahantā
atk-s0201a:356_2: ete ācariyā nāma, mayañhi bahussutamānaṃ uppādetvā catuppadikagāthāyapi atthaṃ na
atk-s0201a:356_3: jānāmā”ti nihatamānā pubbasadisameva ācariyassa vattappaṭipattiṃ katvā saggaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:357: Ahaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tena samayena tesaṃ ācariyo ahosiṃ, ime bhikkhū māṇavakā. Evaṃ pubbepāhaṃ ime evaṃ mānapaggahitasire vicarante nihatamāne akāsinti.
atk-s0201a:358: Imañca jātakaṃ sutvā te bhikkhū pubbepi mayaṃ māneneva upahatāti bhiyyosomattāya nihatamānā hutvā attano upakārakakammaṭṭhānaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:359: Tato bhagavā ekaṃ samayaṃ janapadacārikaṃ caranto vesāliṃ patvā gotamake cetiye viharanto imesaṃ pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ viditvā imaṃ gotamakasuttaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0201a:360_0: “Abhiññāyāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desemi no anabhiññāya, sanidānāhaṃ…pe… sappāṭihāriyāhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:360_1: bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desemi no appāṭihāriyaṃ. Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññāya dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:360_2: desayato…pe… no appāṭihāriyaṃ. Karaṇīyo ovādo, karaṇīyā anusāsanī. Alañca pana vo,
atk-s0201a:360_3: bhikkhave, tuṭṭhiyā alaṃ attamanatāya alaṃ somanassāya. Sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto
atk-s0201a:360_4: dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅghoti. Idamavoca bhagavā, imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:361: Idañca suttaṃ sutvā te pañcasatā bhikkhū tasmiṃyevāsane saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, evāyaṃ desanā etasmiṃ ṭhāne niṭṭhamagamāsīti.
atk-s0201a:366_0: 14. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… sāvatthiyanti sabbāsavasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0201a:366_1: sāvatthīti savatthassa isino nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtā nagarī, yathā kākandī mākandī kosambīti
atk-s0201a:366_2: evaṃ tāva akkharacintakā. Aṭṭhakathācariyā pana bhaṇanti “yaṃkiñci manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ
atk-s0201a:366_3: sabbamettha atthīti sāvatthī. Satthasamāyoge ca kiṃ bhaṇḍamatthīti pucchite sabbamatthī”ti
atk-s0201a:371: Vuddhiṃ vepullataṃ pattaṃ, iddhaṃ phītaṃ manoramaṃ;
atk-s0201a:373_0: Tassaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ. Jetavaneti ettha attano paccatthikajanaṃ jinātīti jeto, raññā
atk-s0201a:373_1: vā attano paccatthikajane jite jātoti jeto, maṅgalakamyatāya vā tassa evaṃnāmameva
atk-s0201a:373_2: katanti jeto, jetassa vanaṃ jetavanaṃ. Tañhi jetena rājakumārena ropitaṃ saṃvaddhitaṃ
atk-s0201a:373_3: paripālitaṃ, so ca tassa sāmī ahosi. Tasmā jetavananti vuccati, tasmiṃ jetavane.
atk-s0201a:373_4: Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmeti ettha sudatto nāma so gahapati mātāpitūhi katanāmavasena.
atk-s0201a:373_5: Sabbakāmasamiddhitāya pana vigatamalamaccheratāya karuṇādiguṇasamaṅgitāya ca niccakālaṃ
atk-s0201a:373_6: anāthānaṃ piṇḍamadāsi, tena anāthapiṇḍikoti saṅkhaṃ gato. Āramanti ettha pāṇino visesena
atk-s0201a:373_8: ca tato tato āgamma ramanti abhiramanti anukkaṇṭhitā hutvā nivasantīti attho. Vuttappakārāya
atk-s0201a:373_9: vā sampattiyā tattha tattha gatepi attano abbhantaraṃyeva ānetvā rametīti ārāmo.
atk-s0201a:373_10: So hi anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā jetassa rājakumārassa hatthato aṭṭhārasahi hiraññakoṭīhi
atk-s0201a:373_11: koṭisantharena kīṇitvā aṭṭhārasahi hiraññakoṭīhi senāsanāni kārāpetvā aṭṭhārasahi
atk-s0201a:373_12: hiraññakoṭīhi vihāramahaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā evaṃ catupaññāsahiraññakoṭipariccāgena buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0201a:373_13: saṅghassa niyyādito. Tasmā “anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo”ti vuccati. Tasmiṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
atk-s0201a:374_1: pacchimasāmiparikittanaṃ. Kimetesaṃ parikittane payojananti. Puññakāmānaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:374_2: Tatra hi dvārakoṭṭhakapāsādamāpane bhūmivikkayaladdhā aṭṭhārasa hiraññakoṭiyo anekakoṭiagghanakā
atk-s0201a:374_3: rukkhā ca jetassa pariccāgo, catupaññāsa koṭiyo anāthapiṇḍikassa. Iti tesaṃ parikittanena
atk-s0201a:374_4: evaṃ puññakāmā puññāni karontīti dassento āyasmā ānando aññepi puññakāme tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjane niyojeti.
atk-s0201a:375_0: Sabbāsavasaṃvarapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhaveti kasmā idaṃ suttamabhāsi? Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0201a:375_1: upakkilesavisodhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā āsavakkhayāya paṭipattidassanatthaṃ. Tattha sabbāsavasaṃvarapariyāyanti
atk-s0201a:375_2: sabbesaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarakāraṇaṃ saṃvarabhūtaṃ kāraṇaṃ, yena kāraṇena te saṃvaritā
atk-s0201a:375_3: pidahitā hutvā anuppādanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ khayaṃ gacchanti pahīyanti nappavattanti,
atk-s0201a:375_4: taṃ kāraṇanti attho. Tattha āsavantīti āsavā, cakkhutopi…pe… manatopi sandanti pavattantīti
atk-s0201a:375_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammato yāva gotrabhuṃ okāsato yāva bhavaggaṃ savantīti vā āsavā, ete
atk-s0201a:375_6: dhamme etañca okāsaṃ anto karitvā pavattantīti attho. Antokaraṇattho hi ayaṃ ākāro.
atk-s0201a:375_7: Cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madirādayo āsavā, āsavā viyātipi āsavā. Lokasmiñhi cirapārivāsikā
atk-s0201a:375_8: madirādayo āsavāti vuccanti. Yadi ca cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena āsavā, eteyeva bhavitumarahanti.
atk-s0201a:375_9: Vuttañhetaṃ “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya, ito pubbe avijjā nāhosī”tiādi.
atk-s0201a:375_10: Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā. Purimāni cettha nibbacanāni
atk-s0201a:375_11: yattha kilesā āsavāti āgacchanti, tattha yujjanti, pacchimaṃ kammepi. Na kevalañca
atk-s0201a:375_12: kammakilesāyeva āsavā, apica kho nānappakārakā uppaddavāpi. Suttesu hi “nāhaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0201a:375_13: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā
atk-s0201a:378: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ; –
atk-s0201a:379_0: Ettha tebhūmakañca kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā. “Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ
atk-s0201a:379_1: saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti ettha parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo
atk-s0201a:379_2: ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā. Te panete āsavā yattha yathā āgatā,
atk-s0201a:380_0: Ete hi vinaye tāva “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ
atk-s0201a:380_1: paṭighātāyā”ti dvedhā āgatā. Saḷāyatane “tayome āvuso āsavā, kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavo”ti
atk-s0201a:380_2: tidhā āgatā. Aññesu ca suttantesu abhidhamme ca teyeva diṭṭhāsavena saha catudhā
atk-s0201a:380_3: āgatā. Nibbedhikapariyāye – “atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā nirayagāminiyā, atthi āsavā
atk-s0201a:380_4: tiracchānayonigāminiyā, atthi āsavā pettivisayagāminiyā, atthi āsavā manussalokagāminiyā,
atk-s0201a:380_5: atthi āsavā devalokagāminiyā”ti pañcadhā āgatā. Chakkanipāte – “atthi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:380_6: āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā”tiādinā nayena chadhā āgatā. Imasmiṃ pana sutte teyeva dassanāpahātabbehi
atk-s0201a:380_7: saddhiṃ sattadhā āgatāti. Ayaṃ tāva āsavapade vacanattho ceva pabhedo ca.
atk-s0201a:381_0: Saṃvarapade pana saṃvarayatīti saṃvaro, pidahati nivāreti pavattituṃ na detīti attho.
atk-s0201a:381_1: Tathā hi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, divā paṭisallīyantena dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā paṭisallīyitu”nti,
atk-s0201a:381_2: “sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃbraūmi, paññāyete pidhīyare”ti ca ādīsu pidhānaṭṭhena saṃvaramāha.
atk-s0201a:381_3: Svāyaṃ saṃvaro pañcavidho hoti sīlasaṃvaro satiñāṇa khanti vīriyasaṃvaroti. Tattha
atk-s0201a:381_4: “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto”ti ayaṃ sīlasaṃvaro. Pātimokkhasīlañhi ettha saṃvaroti
atk-s0201a:381_5: vuttaṃ. “Cakkhundriye saṃvaramāpajjatī”tiādīsu satisaṃvaro. Sati hettha saṃvaroti
atk-s0201a:381_6: vuttā. “Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi, paññāyete pidhīyare”ti ayaṃ ñāṇasaṃvaro. Ñāṇañhettha
atk-s0201a:381_7: pidhīyareti iminā pidhānaṭṭhena saṃvaroti vuttaṃ. “Khamo hoti sītassa…pe…, uppannaṃ
atk-s0201a:381_8: kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā pana nayena idheva khantivīriyasaṃvarā āgatā. Tesañca
atk-s0201a:382_0: Apica pañcavidhopi ayaṃ saṃvaro idha āgatoyeva, tattha khantivīriyasaṃvarā tāva vuttāyeva.
atk-s0201a:382_1: “So tañca anāsanaṃ tañca agocara”nti ayaṃ panettha sīlasaṃvaro. “Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso
atk-s0201a:382_2: cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti ayaṃ satisaṃvaro. Sabbattha paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaro.
atk-s0201a:382_3: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana dassanaṃ paṭisevanā bhāvanā ca ñāṇasaṃvaro. Pariyāyanti etena
atk-s0201a:382_4: dhammāti pariyāyo, uppattiṃ nirodhaṃ vā gacchantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettāvatā “sabbāsavasaṃvarapariyāya”nti
atk-s0201a:382_5: ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:383_0: 15. Idāni jānato ahantiādīsu jānatoti jānantassa. Passatoti passantassa. Dvepi padāni
atk-s0201a:383_1: ekatthāni, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Evaṃ santepi jānatoti ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ upādāya puggalaṃ
atk-s0201a:383_2: niddisati, jānanalakkhaṇañhi ñāṇaṃ. Passatoti ñāṇappabhāvaṃ upādāya, passanappabhāvañhi
atk-s0201a:383_3: ñāṇaṃ. Ñāṇasamaṅgī puggalo cakkhumā viya cakkhunā rūpāni ñāṇena vivaṭe dhamme passati.
atk-s0201a:383_4: Apica yonisomanasikāraṃ uppādetuṃ jānato, ayonisomanasikāro yathā na uppajjati, evaṃ
atk-s0201a:383_5: passatoti ayamettha sāro. Keci panācariyā bahū papañce bhaṇanti, te imasmiṃ atthe na yujjanti.
atk-s0201a:384_0: Āsavānaṃ khayanti āsavappahānaṃ āsavānaṃ accantakkhayasamuppādaṃ khīṇākāraṃ natthibhāvanti
atk-s0201a:384_1: ayameva hi imasmiñca sutte, “āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimutti”ntiādīsu ca āsavakkhayattho.
atk-s0201a:384_2: Aññattha pana maggaphalanibbānānipi āsavakkhayoti vuccanti. Tathā hi –
atk-s0201a:386: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. –
atk-s0201a:390: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. –
atk-s0201a:392_0: No ajānato no apassatoti yo pana na jānāti na passati, tassa no vadāmīti attho. Etena
atk-s0201a:392_1: ye ajānato apassatopi saṃvarādīhiyeva suddhiṃ vadanti, te paṭikkhittā honti. Purimena
atk-s0201a:392_2: vā padadvayena upāyo vutto, iminā anupāyapaṭisedho. Saṅkhepena cettha ñāṇaṃ āsavasaṃvarapariyāyoti dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:393_0: Idāni yaṃ jānato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, taṃ dassetukāmo kiñca, bhikkhave, jānatoti
atk-s0201a:393_1: pucchaṃ ārabhi, tattha jānanā bahuvidhā. Dabbajātiko eva hi koci bhikkhu chattaṃ
atk-s0201a:393_2: kātuṃ jānāti, koci cīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ, tassa īdisāni kammāni vattasīse ṭhatvā
atk-s0201a:393_3: karontassa sā jānanā maggaphalānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti na vattabbā. Yo pana sāsane
atk-s0201a:393_4: pabbajitvā vejjakammādīni kātuṃ jānāti, tassevaṃ jānato āsavā vaḍḍhantiyeva, tasmā
atk-s0201a:393_5: yaṃ jānato passato ca āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, tadeva dassento āha yoniso ca manasikāraṃ
atk-s0201a:394_0: Tattha yoniso manasikāro nāma upāyamanasikāro pathamanasikāro, aniccādīsu aniccanti
atk-s0201a:394_1: ādinā eva nayena saccānulomikena vā cittassa āvaṭṭanā anvāvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro
atk-s0201a:395_0: Ayoniso manasikāroti anupāyamanasikāro uppathamanasikāro. Anicce niccanti dukkhe
atk-s0201a:395_1: sukhanti anattani attāti asubhe subhanti ayoniso manasikāro uppathamanasikāro. Saccappaṭikulena
atk-s0201a:395_2: vā cittassa āvaṭṭanā anvāvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro, ayaṃ vuccati ayoniso
atk-s0201a:395_3: manasikāroti. Evaṃ yoniso manasikāraṃ uppādetuṃ jānato, ayoniso manasikāro ca yathā
atk-s0201a:395_4: na uppajjati, evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
atk-s0201a:396_0: Idāni imassevatthassa yuttiṃ dassento āha ayoniso, bhikkhave…pe… pahīyantīti. Tena
atk-s0201a:396_1: kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti, yasmā ayoniso manasikaroto āsavā uppajjanti, yoniso manasikaroto
atk-s0201a:396_2: pahīyanti, tasmā jānitabbaṃ yoniso manasikāraṃ uppādetuṃ jānato, ayoniso manasikāro
atk-s0201a:396_3: ca yathā na uppajjati, evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotīti, ayaṃ tāvettha saṅkhepavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0201a:397_0: Ayaṃ pana vitthāro – tattha “yoniso ayoniso”ti imehi tāva dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ hoti
atk-s0201a:397_1: upari sakalasuttaṃ. Vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena hi upari sakalasuttaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayoniso manasikāramūlakañca
atk-s0201a:397_2: vaṭṭaṃ, yoniso manasikāramūlakañca vivaṭṭaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ayoniso manasikāro hi vaḍḍhamāno
atk-s0201a:397_3: dve dhamme paripūreti avijjañca bhavataṇhañca. Avijjāya ca sati “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā…pe…
atk-s0201a:397_4: dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. Taṇhāya sati taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ…pe… samudayo
atk-s0201a:397_5: hotī”ti. Evaṃ ayaṃ ayoniso manasikārabahulo puggalo vātavegābhighātena vippanaṭṭhanāvā
atk-s0201a:397_6: viya gaṅgāvaṭṭe patitagokulaṃ viya cakkayante yuttabalibaddo viya ca punappunaṃ bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
atk-s0201a:397_7: āvaṭṭaparivaṭṭaṃ karoti, evaṃ tāva ayoniso manasikāramūlakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ.
atk-s0201a:398_0: Yoniso manasikāro pana vaḍḍhamāno – “yoniso manasikārasampannassetaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:398_1: bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessati, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0201a:398_2: bahulīkarissatī”ti vacanato sammādiṭṭhipamukhaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ paripūreti. Yā
atk-s0201a:398_3: ca sammādiṭṭhi, sā vijjāti tassa vijjuppādā avijjānirodho, “avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho…pe…
atk-s0201a:398_4: evaṃ etassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti evaṃ yoniso manasikāramūlakaṃ
atk-s0201a:398_5: vivaṭṭaṃ veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ imehi dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ hoti upari sakalasuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:399_0: Evaṃ ābaddhe cettha yasmā pubbe āsavappahānaṃ dassetvā pacchā uppatti vuccamānā na
atk-s0201a:399_1: yujjati. Na hi pahīnā puna uppajjanti. Uppannānaṃ pana pahānaṃ yujjati, tasmā uddesapaṭilomatopi
atk-s0201a:400_0: Tattha ayoniso manasikarototi vuttappakāraṃ ayoniso manasikāraṃ uppādayato. Anuppannā
atk-s0201a:400_1: ceva āsavā uppajjantīti ettha ye pubbe appaṭiladdhapubbaṃ cīvarādiṃ vā paccayaṃ upaṭṭhākasaddhivihārikaantevāsikānaṃ
atk-s0201a:400_2: vā aññataraṃ manuññaṃ vatthuṃ paṭilabhitvā, taṃ subhaṃ sukhanti ayoniso manasikaroto,
atk-s0201a:400_3: aññataraññataraṃ vā pana ananubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathā vā tathā vā ayoniso manasikaroto
atk-s0201a:400_4: āsavā uppajjanti, te anuppannā uppajjantīti veditabbā, aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre
atk-s0201a:400_5: anuppannā nāma āsavā na santi. Anubhūtapubbepi ca vatthumhi ārammaṇe vā yassa pakatisuddhiyā
atk-s0201a:400_7: anuppajjitvā pacchā tādisena paccayena sahasā uppajjanti, imepi anuppannā uppajjantīti
atk-s0201a:400_8: veditabbā. Tesuyeva pana vatthārammaṇesu punappunaṃ uppajjamānā uppannā pavaḍḍhantīti
atk-s0201a:400_9: vuccanti. Ito aññathā hi paṭhamuppannānaṃ vaḍḍhi nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:401_0: Yoniso ca kho, bhikkhaveti ettha pana yassa pakatisuddhiyā vā seyyathāpi āyasmato
atk-s0201a:401_1: mahākassapassa bhaddāya ca kāpilāniyā, uddesaparipucchādīhi vā kāraṇehi āsavā nuppajjanti,
atk-s0201a:401_2: so ca jānāti “na kho me āsavā maggena samugghātaṃ gatā, handa nesaṃ samugghātāya
atk-s0201a:401_3: paṭipajjāmī”ti. Tato maggabhāvanāya sabbe samugghāteti. Tassa te āsavā anuppannā
atk-s0201a:401_4: na uppajjantīti vuccanti. Yassa pana kārakasseva sato satisammosena sahasā āsavā
atk-s0201a:401_5: uppajjanti, tato saṃvegamāpajjitvā yoniso padahanto te āsave samucchindati, tassa
atk-s0201a:401_6: uppannā pahīyantīti vuccanti maṇḍalārāmavāsīmahātissabhūtattherassa viya. So kira
atk-s0201a:401_7: tasmiṃyeva vihāre uddesaṃ gaṇhāti, athassa gāme piṇḍāya carato visabhāgārammaṇe kileso
atk-s0201a:401_8: uppajji, so taṃ vipassanāya vikkhambhetvā vihāraṃ agamāsi. Tassa supinantepi taṃ
atk-s0201a:401_9: ārammaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāsi. So “ayaṃ kileso vaḍḍhitvā apāyasaṃvattaniko hotī”ti saṃvegaṃ
atk-s0201a:401_10: janetvā ācariyaṃ āpucchitvā vihārā nikkhamma mahāsaṅgharakkhitattherassa santike
atk-s0201a:401_11: rāgapaṭipakkhaṃ asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gumbantaraṃ pavisitvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ
atk-s0201a:401_12: santharitvā nisajja anāgāmimaggena pañcakāmaguṇikarāgaṃ chinditvā uṭṭhāya ācariyaṃ
atk-s0201a:401_13: vanditvā punadivase uddesamaggaṃ pāpuṇi. Ye pana vattamānuppannā, tesaṃ paṭipattiyā
atk-s0201a:402_0: 16. Idāni “uppannā ca āsavā pahīyantī”ti idameva padaṃ gahetvā ye te āsavā pahīyanti,
atk-s0201a:402_1: tesaṃ nānappakārato aññampi pahānakāraṇaṃ āvikātuṃ desanaṃ vitthārento atthi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:402_2: āsavā dassanā pahātabbātiādimāha yathā taṃ desanāpabhedakusalo dhammarājā. Tattha
atk-s0201a:402_3: dassanā pahātabbāti dassanena pahātabbā. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0201a:404_0: 17. Idāni tāni padāni anupubbato byākātukāmo “katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā dassanā
atk-s0201a:404_1: pahātabbā”ti pucchaṃ katvā mūlapariyāyavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva “idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:404_2: assutavā puthujjano”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha manasikaraṇīye dhamme
atk-s0201a:404_3: nappajānātīti āvajjitabbe samannāharitabbe dhamme na pajānāti. Amanasikaraṇīyeti
atk-s0201a:404_4: tabbiparīte. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Yasmā pana ime dhammā manasikaraṇīyā, ime amanasikaraṇīyāti
atk-s0201a:404_5: dhammato niyamo natthi, ākārato pana atthi. Yenā ākārena manasikariyamānā akusaluppattipadaṭṭhānā
atk-s0201a:404_6: honti, tenākārena na manasikātabbā. Yena kusaluppattipadaṭṭhānā honti, tenākārena
atk-s0201a:404_7: manasikātabbā. Tasmā “ya’ssa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vā kāmāsavo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:405_0: Tattha ya’ssāti ye assa assutavato puthujjanassa. Manasikarototi āvajjayato samannāharantassa.
atk-s0201a:405_1: Anuppanno vā kāmāsavoti ettha samuccayattho vāsaddo, na vikappattho. Tasmā yathā
atk-s0201a:405_2: “yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti
atk-s0201a:405_3: vutte apadā ca dvipadā cāti attho, yathā ca “bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:405_4: vā anuggahāyā”ti vutte bhūtānañca sambhavesīnañcāti attho, yathā ca “aggito vā udakato
atk-s0201a:405_5: vā mithubhedato vā”ti vutte aggito ca udakato ca mithubhedato cāti attho, evamidhāpi
atk-s0201a:405_6: anuppanno ca kāmāsavo uppajjati, uppanno ca kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhatīti attho daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ sesesu.
atk-s0201a:406_0: Ettha ca kāmāsavoti pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo. Bhavāsavoti rupārūpabhave chandarāgo, jhānanikanti
atk-s0201a:406_1: ca sassatucchedadiṭṭhisahagatā. Evaṃ diṭṭhāsavopi bhavāsave eva samodhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:406_2: Avijjāsavoti catūsu saccesu aññāṇaṃ. Tattha kāmaguṇe assādato manasikaroto anuppanno
atk-s0201a:406_3: ca kāmāsavo uppajjati, uppanno ca pavaḍḍhati. Mahaggatadhamme assādato manasikaroto
atk-s0201a:406_4: anuppanno ca bhavāsavo uppajjati, uppanno ca pavaḍḍhati. Tīsu bhūmīsu dhamme catuvipallāsapadaṭṭhānabhāvena
atk-s0201a:406_5: manasikaroto anuppanno ca avijjāsavo uppajjati, uppanno ca pavaḍḍhatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:407_0: Kasmā pana tayo eva āsavā idha vuttāti. Vimokkhapaṭipakkhato. Appaṇihitavimokkhapaṭipakkho
atk-s0201a:407_1: hi kāmāsavo,. Animittasuññatavimokkhapaṭipakkhā itare. Tasmā ime tayo āsave uppādentā
atk-s0201a:407_2: tiṇṇaṃ vimokkhānaṃ abhāgino honti, anuppādentā bhāginoti etamatthaṃ dassentena tayo
atk-s0201a:407_3: eva vuttāti veditabbā. Diṭṭhāsavopi vā ettha vutto yevāti vaṇṇitametaṃ.
atk-s0201a:408_0: Tassa amanasikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ manasikārāti manasikārahetu, yasmā te dhamme manasi
atk-s0201a:408_1: karoti, tasmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo dutiyapadepi. “Anuppannā ceva āsavā uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a:408_2: uppannā ca āsavā pavaḍḍhantī”ti heṭṭhā vuttaāsavānaṃyeva abhedato nigamanametaṃ.
atk-s0201a:409_0: 18. Ettāvatā yo ayaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya dassanā pahātabbe āsave niddisituṃ
atk-s0201a:409_1: assutavā puthujjano vutto, so yasmā “ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppannā ceva
atk-s0201a:409_2: āsavā uppajjantī”ti evaṃ sāmaññato vuttānaṃ ayoniso manasikārapaccayānaṃ kāmāsavādīnampi
atk-s0201a:409_3: adhiṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā tepi āsave teneva puggalena dassetvā idāni dassanā pahātabbe āsave
atk-s0201a:409_4: dassento so evaṃ ayoniso manasi karoti, ahosiṃ nu kho ahantiādimāha. Vicikicchāsīsena
atk-s0201a:409_5: cettha diṭṭhāsavampi dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:410_0: Tassattho, yassa te iminā vuttanayena āsavā uppajjanti, so puthujjano, yo cāyaṃ “assutavā”tiādinā
atk-s0201a:410_1: nayena vutto, so puthujjano evaṃ ayoniso anupāyena uppathena manasi karoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a:410_2: Ahosiṃ nu kho…pe…so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti, so evaṃ ayoniso manasi
atk-s0201a:410_3: karoti, yathāssa “ahaṃ ahosiṃ nu kho”tiādinā nayena vuttā soḷasavidhāpi vicikicchā uppajjatīti.
atk-s0201a:411_0: Tattha ahosiṃ nu kho nanu khoti sassatākārañca adhiccasamuppattiākārañca nissāya
atk-s0201a:411_1: atīte attano vijjamānataṃ avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Kiṃ kāraṇanti na vattabbaṃ. Ummattako
atk-s0201a:411_2: viya hi bālaputhujjano yathā vā tathā vā pavattati. Apica ayoniso manasikāroyevettha
atk-s0201a:411_3: kāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ ayoniso manasikārassa pana kiṃ kāraṇanti. Sveva puthujjanabhāvo ariyānaṃ
atk-s0201a:411_4: adassanādīni vā. Nanu ca puthujjanopi yoniso manasi karotīti. Ko vā evamāha na manasi
atk-s0201a:411_5: karotīti. Na pana tattha puthujjanabhāvo kāraṇaṃ, saddhammassavanakalyāṇamittādīni
atk-s0201a:411_6: tattha kāraṇāni. Na hi macchamaṃsādīni attano attano pakatiyā sugandhāni, abhisaṅkhārapaccayā
atk-s0201a:412: Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgūpapattiyo nissāya khattiyo nu kho ahosiṃ, brāhmaṇavessasuddagahaṭṭhapabbajitadevamanussānaṃ aññataroti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a:413_0: Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ, rassaodātakaṇhappamāṇikaappamāṇikādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:413_1: aññataroti kaṅkhati. Keci pana issaranimmānādiṃ nissāya kena nu kho kāraṇena ahosinti
atk-s0201a:414: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti jātiādīni nissāya khattiyo hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe… devo hutvā manussoti attano paramparaṃ kaṅkhati. Sabbattheva pana addhānanti kālādhivacanametaṃ.
atk-s0201a:415: Bhavissāmi nu kho nanu khoti sassatākārañca ucchedākārañca nissāya anāgate attano vijjamānataṃ avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Sesamettha vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a:416_0: Etarahi vā paccuppannamaddhānanti idāni vā paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā cutipariyantaṃ
atk-s0201a:416_1: sabbampi vattamānakālaṃ gahetvā. Ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hotīti attano khandhesu vicikiccho
atk-s0201a:416_2: hoti. Ahaṃ nu khosmīti attano atthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Yuttaṃ panetanti? Yuttaṃ ayuttanti
atk-s0201a:416_3: kā ettha cintā. Apicettha idaṃ vatthumpi udāharanti. Cūḷamātāya kira putto muṇḍo,
atk-s0201a:416_4: mahāmātāya putto amuṇḍo, taṃ puttaṃ muṇḍesuṃ. So uṭṭhāya ahaṃ nu kho cūḷamātāya puttoti
atk-s0201a:416_5: cintesi. Evaṃ ahaṃ nu khosmīti kaṅkhā hoti.
atk-s0201a:417_0: No nu khosmīti attano natthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Tatrāpi idaṃ vatthu – eko kira macche
atk-s0201a:417_1: gaṇhanto udake ciraṭṭhānena sītibhūtaṃ attano ūruṃ macchoti cintetvā pahari. Aparo
atk-s0201a:417_2: susānapasse khettaṃ rakkhanto bhīto saṅkuṭito sayi. So paṭibujjhitvā attano jaṇṇukāni
atk-s0201a:417_3: dve yakkhāti cintetvā pahari. Evaṃ no nu khosmīti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a:418_0: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyova samāno attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Esa nayo sesesu.
atk-s0201a:418_1: Devo pana samāno devabhāvaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi. Sopi pana “ahaṃ rūpī nu kho arūpī
atk-s0201a:418_2: nu kho”tiādinā nayena kaṅkhati. Khattiyādayo kasmā na jānantīti ce. Apaccakkhā tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:418_3: tattha tattha kule uppatti. Gahaṭṭhāpi ca potthalikādayo pabbajitasaññino. Pabbajitāpi
atk-s0201a:418_4: “kuppaṃ nu kho me kamma”ntiādinā nayena gahaṭṭhasaññino. Manussāpi ca rājāno viya
atk-s0201a:419_0: Kathaṃ nu khosmīti vuttanayameva. Kevalañcettha abbhantare jīvo nāma atthīti gahetvā
atk-s0201a:419_1: tassa saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya dīgho nu khosmi, rassacaturaṃsachaḷaṃsaaṭṭhaṃsasoḷasaṃsādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:419_2: aññatarappakāroti kaṅkhanto kathaṃ nu khosmīti kaṅkhatīti veditabbo. Sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:420: Kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0201a:421_0: 19. Evaṃ soḷasappabhedaṃ vicikicchaṃ dassetvā idāni yaṃ iminā vicikicchāsīsena diṭṭhāsavaṃ
atk-s0201a:421_1: dassetuṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhā. Taṃ dassento tassa evaṃ ayoniso manasikaroto channaṃ
atk-s0201a:421_2: diṭṭhīnantiādimāha. Tattha tassa puggalassa yathā ayaṃ vicikicchā uppajjati, evaṃ
atk-s0201a:421_3: ayoniso manasikaroto tasseva savicikicchassa ayoniso manasikārassa thāmagatattā channaṃ
atk-s0201a:421_4: diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha sabbapadesu vāsaddo vikappattho,
atk-s0201a:421_5: evaṃ vā evaṃ vā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Atthi me attāti cettha sassatadiṭṭhi
atk-s0201a:421_6: sabbakālesu attano atthitaṃ gaṇhāti. Saccato thetatoti bhūtato ca thirato ca, “idaṃ
atk-s0201a:421_7: sacca”nti bhūtato suṭṭhu daḷhabhāvenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Natthi me attāti ayaṃ pana ucchedadiṭṭhi,
atk-s0201a:421_8: sato sattassa tattha tattha vibhavaggahaṇato. Atha vā purimāpi tīsu kālesu atthīti
atk-s0201a:421_9: gahaṇato sassatadiṭṭhi, paccuppannameva atthīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhi. Pacchimāpi
atk-s0201a:421_10: atītānāgatesu natthīti gahaṇato bhasmantāhutiyoti gahitadiṭṭhikānaṃ viya, ucchedadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0201a:421_11: Atīte eva natthīti gaṇhanto adhiccasamuppattikasseva sassatadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0201a:422_0: Attanāva attānaṃ sañjānāmīti saññākkhandhasīsena khandhe attāti gahetvā saññāya avasesakkhandhe
atk-s0201a:422_1: sañjānato iminā attanā imaṃ attānaṃ sañjānāmīti hoti. Attanāva anattānanti saññākkhandhaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:422_2: attāti gahetvā, itare cattāropi anattāti gahetvā saññāya tesaṃ jānato evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:422_3: Anattanāva attānanti saññākkhandhaṃ anattāti. Itare cattāro attāti gahetvā saññāya
atk-s0201a:422_4: tesaṃ jānato evaṃ hoti, sabbāpi sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyova.
atk-s0201a:423_0: Vado vedeyyotiādayo pana sassatadiṭṭhiyā eva abhinivesākārā. Tattha vadatīti vado,
atk-s0201a:423_1: vacīkammassa kārakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Vedayatīti vedeyyo, jānāti anubhavati cāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:423_2: hoti. Kiṃ vedetīti, tatra tatra kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
atk-s0201a:423_3: Tatra tatrāti tesu tesu yonigatiṭṭhitinivāsanikāyesu ārammaṇesu vā. Niccoti uppādavayarahito.
atk-s0201a:423_4: Dhuvoti thiro sārabhūto. Sassatoti sabbakāliko. Avipariṇāmadhammoti attano pakatibhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:423_5: avijahanadhammo, kakaṇṭako viya nānappakārataṃ nāpajjati. Sassatisamanti candasūriyasamuddamahāpathavīpabbatā
atk-s0201a:423_6: lokavohārena sassatiyoti vuccanti. Sassatīhi samaṃ sassatisamaṃ. Yāva sassatiyo tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0201a:423_7: tāva tatheva ṭhassatīti gaṇhato evaṃdiṭṭhi hoti.
atk-s0201a:424_0: Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, diṭṭhigatantiādīsu. Idanti idāni vattabbassa paccakkhanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:424_1: Diṭṭhigatasambandhena ca idanti vuttaṃ, na diṭṭhisambandhena. Ettha ca diṭṭhiyeva
atk-s0201a:424_2: diṭṭhigataṃ, gūthagataṃ viya. Diṭṭhīsu vā gatamidaṃ dassanaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiantogadhattātipi
atk-s0201a:424_3: diṭṭhigataṃ. Diṭṭhiyā vā gataṃ diṭṭhigataṃ. Idañhi atthi me attātiādi diṭṭhiyā gamanamattameva,
atk-s0201a:424_4: natthettha attā vā nicco vā kocīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sā cāyaṃ diṭṭhi dunniggamanaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:424_5: gahanaṃ. Duratikkamaṭṭhena sappaṭibhayaṭṭhena ca kantāro, dubbhikkhakantāravāḷakantārādayo
atk-s0201a:424_6: viya. Sammādiṭṭhiyā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena vilomanaṭṭhena vā visūkaṃ. Kadāci sassatassa,
atk-s0201a:424_7: kadāci ucchedassa gahaṇato virūpaṃ phanditanti vipphanditaṃ. Bandhanaṭṭhena saṃyojanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:424_8: Tenāha “diṭṭhigahanaṃ…pe… diṭṭhisaṃyojana”nti. Idānissa tameva bandhanatthaṃ dassento
atk-s0201a:424_10: saṃyutto puthujjano etehi jātiādīhi na parimuccatīti. Kiṃ vā bahunā, sakalavaṭṭadukkhatopi na muccatīti.
atk-s0201a:425_0: 20. Evaṃ chappabhedaṃ diṭṭhāsavaṃ dassetvā yasmā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmāsavādivacaneneva
atk-s0201a:425_1: dassito hoti. Kāmasukhatthañhi bhavasukhabhavavisuddhiatthañca avijjāya abhibhūtā
atk-s0201a:425_2: ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇā sīlabbatāni parāmasanti, tasmā taṃ adassetvā diṭṭhiggahaṇena
atk-s0201a:425_3: vā tassa gahitattāpi taṃ adassetvāva idāni yo puggalo dassanā pahātabbe āsave pajahati,
atk-s0201a:425_4: taṃ dassetvā tesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānaṃ dassetuṃ pubbe vā ayoniso manasikaroto puthujjanassa
atk-s0201a:425_5: tesaṃ uppattiṃ dassetvā idāni tabbiparītassa pahānaṃ dassetuṃ sutavā ca kho, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:426_0: Tassattho, yāva “so idaṃ dukkha”nti āgacchati, tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayena ca vuttapaccanīkato
atk-s0201a:426_1: ca veditabbo. Paccanīkato ca sabbākārena ariyadhammassa akovidāvinītapaccanīkato
atk-s0201a:426_2: ayaṃ “sutavā ariyasāvako ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:426_3: Apica kho sikhāpattavipassanato pabhuti yāva gotrabhu, tāva tadanurūpena atthena
atk-s0201a:427_0: 21. “So idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādīsu pana ayaṃ atthavibhāvanā, so
atk-s0201a:427_1: catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko ariyasāvako taṇhāvajjā tebhūmakā khandhā dukkhaṃ, taṇhā dukkhasamudayo,
atk-s0201a:427_2: ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodho, nirodhasampāpako maggoti evaṃ pubbeva ācariyasantike
atk-s0201a:427_3: uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhāno aparena samayena vipassanāmaggaṃ samāruḷho samāno te
atk-s0201a:427_4: tebhūmake khandhe idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karoti, upāyena pathena samannāharati
atk-s0201a:427_5: ceva vipassati ca. Ettha hi yāva sotāpattimaggo, tāva manasikārasīseneva vipassanā
atk-s0201a:427_6: vuttā. Yā panāyaṃ tasseva dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā pabhāvikā taṇhā, ayaṃ samudayoti
atk-s0201a:427_7: yoniso manasi karoti. Yasmā pana dukkhañca samudayo ca idaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti
atk-s0201a:427_8: nappavattanti, tasmā yadidaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti yoniso manasi karoti.
atk-s0201a:427_9: Nirodhasampāpakaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yoniso manasi
atk-s0201a:427_10: karoti, upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0201a:428_0: Tatrāyaṃ upāyo, abhiniveso nāma vaṭṭe hoti, vivaṭṭe natthi. Tasmā “ayaṃ atthi imasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:428_1: kāye pathavīdhātu, āpodhātū”tiādinā nayena sakasantatiyaṃ cattāri bhūtāni tadanusārena
atk-s0201a:428_2: upādārūpāni ca pariggahetvā ayaṃ rūpakkhandhoti vavatthapeti. Taṃ vavatthāpayato
atk-s0201a:428_3: uppanne tadārammaṇe cittacetasike dhamme ime cattāro arūpakkhandhāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a:428_4: Tato ime pañcakkhandhā dukkhanti vavatthapeti. Te pana saṅkhepato nāmañca rūpañcāti
atk-s0201a:428_5: dve bhāgāyeva honti. Idañca nāmarūpaṃ sahetu sappaccayaṃ uppajjati. Tassa ayaṃ hetu
atk-s0201a:428_6: ayaṃ paccayoti avijjābhavataṇhākammāhārādike hetupaccaye vavatthapeti. Tato tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:428_7: paccayānañca paccayuppannadhammānañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā ime dhammā
atk-s0201a:428_8: ahutvā hontīti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti, udayabbayapīḷitattā dukkhāti dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:428_9: āropeti. Avasavattanato anattāti anattalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti. Evaṃ tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā
atk-s0201a:429_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhati, ekābhisamayena abhisameti.
atk-s0201a:429_1: Dukkhaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati, samudayaṃ pahānapaṭivedhena, nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena,
atk-s0201a:429_2: maggaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena. Dukkhañca pariññābhisamayena abhisameti…pe… maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayena
atk-s0201a:429_3: abhisameti, no ca kho aññamaññena ñāṇena. Ekañāṇeneva hi esa nirodhaṃ ārammaṇato,
atk-s0201a:429_4: sesāni kiccato paṭivijjhati ceva abhisameti ca. Na hissa tasmiṃ samaye evaṃ hoti
atk-s0201a:429_5: – “ahaṃ dukkhaṃ parijānāmī”ti vā…pe… “maggaṃ bhāvemī”ti vā. Apica khvassa ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:429_6: katvā paṭivedhavasena nirodhaṃ sacchikaroto evaṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhapariññākiccampi
atk-s0201a:429_7: samudayapahānakiccampi maggabhāvanākiccampi karotiyeva. Tassevaṃ upāyena yoniso manasikaroto
atk-s0201a:429_8: tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti, vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi, aṭṭhavatthukā vicikicchā,
atk-s0201a:429_9: “sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”ti sīlabbatānaṃ parāmasanato sīlabbataparāmāsoti. Tattha
atk-s0201a:429_10: catūsu āsavesu sakkāyadiṭṭhisīlabbataparāmāsā diṭṭhāsavena saṅgahitattā āsavā ceva
atk-s0201a:429_11: saṃyojanā ca. Vicikicchā saṃyojanameva, na āsavo. “Dassanā pahātabbā āsavā”ti ettha
atk-s0201a:430_0: “Ime vuccanti…pe… pahātabbā”ti ime sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo dassanā pahātabbā nāma āsavāti
atk-s0201a:430_1: dassento āha. Atha vā yā ayaṃ channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti evaṃ
atk-s0201a:430_2: sarūpeneva sakkāyadiṭṭhi vibhattā. Taṃ sandhāyāha “ime vuccanti, bhikkhave”ti. Sā
atk-s0201a:430_3: ca yasmā sahajātapahānekaṭṭhehi saddhiṃ pahīyati. Diṭṭhāsave hi pahīyamāne taṃsahajāto
atk-s0201a:430_4: catūsu diṭṭhisampayuttacittesu kāmāsavopi avijjāsavopi pahīyati. Pahānekaṭṭho pana
atk-s0201a:430_6: Teneva sampayutto avijjāsavopi, dvīsu domanassacittesu pāṇātipātādinibbattako avijjāsavopi,
atk-s0201a:430_7: tathā vicikicchācittasampayutto avijjāsavopīti evaṃ sabbathāpi avasesā tayopi āsavā
atk-s0201a:430_8: pahīyanti. Tasmā bahuvacananiddeso katoti evamettha attho veditabbo. Esa porāṇānaṃ adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a:431_0: Dassanā pahātabbāti dassanaṃ nāma sotāpattimaggo, tena pahātabbāti attho. Kasmā sotāpattimaggo
atk-s0201a:431_1: dassanaṃ? Paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato. Nanu gotrabhu paṭhamataraṃ passatīti? No na
atk-s0201a:431_2: passati. Disvā kattabbakiccaṃ pana na karoti saṃyojanānaṃ appahānato. Tasmā passatīti
atk-s0201a:431_3: na vattabbo. Yattha katthaci rājānaṃ disvāpi paṇṇākāraṃ datvā kiccanipphattiyā adiṭṭhattā
atk-s0201a:431_4: “ajjāpi rājānaṃ na passāmī”ti vadanto gāmavāsī puriso cettha nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:434_0: 22. Evaṃ dassanena pahātabbe āsave dassetvā idāni tadanantaruddiṭṭhe saṃvarā pahātabbe
atk-s0201a:434_1: dassetuṃ, katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbāti āha. Evaṃ sabbattha sambandho
atk-s0201a:435_0: Nanu ca dassanena bhāvanāyāti imehi dvīhi appahātabbo āsavo nāma natthi, atha kasmā
atk-s0201a:435_1: visuṃ saṃvarādīhi pahātabbe dassetīti. Saṃvarādīhi pubbabhāge vikkhambhitā āsavā
atk-s0201a:435_2: catūhi maggehi samugghātaṃ gacchanti, tasmā tesaṃ maggānaṃ pubbabhāge imehi pañcahākārehi
atk-s0201a:435_3: vikkhambhanappahānaṃ dassento evamāha. Tasmā yo cāyaṃ vutto paṭhamo dassanamaggoyeva,
atk-s0201a:435_4: idāni bhāvanānāmena vuccissanti tayo maggā, tesaṃ sabbesampi ayaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:436_0: Tattha idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Paṭisaṅkhāti paṭisaṅkhāya. Tatthāyaṃ saṅkhāsaddo ñāṇakoṭṭhāsapaññattigaṇanāsu
atk-s0201a:436_1: dissati. “Saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevatī”tiādīsu hi ñāṇe dissati. “Papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācarantī”tiādīsu
atk-s0201a:436_2: koṭṭhāse. “Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhā samaññā”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. “Na sukaraṃ
atk-s0201a:436_3: saṅkhātu”ntiādīsu gaṇanāyaṃ. Idha pana ñāṇe daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:437_0: Paṭisaṅkhā yonisoti hi upāyena pathena paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā paccavekkhitvāti attho.
atk-s0201a:437_1: Ettha ca asaṃvare ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhā yoniso paṭisaṅkhāti veditabbā. Sā cāyaṃ “varaṃ,
atk-s0201a:437_2: bhikkhave, tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṃ
atk-s0201a:437_3: sampalimaṭṭhaṃ, na tveva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho”tiādinā
atk-s0201a:437_4: ādittapariyāyanayena veditabbā. Cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatīti ettha cakkhumeva
atk-s0201a:437_5: indriyaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ, saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, pidahanato thakanatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:437_6: Satiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Cakkhundriye saṃvaro cakkhundriyasaṃvaro. Titthakāko āvāṭakacchapo
atk-s0201a:438_0: Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi. Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya
atk-s0201a:438_1: sati vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā uppajjati. Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0201a:438_2: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā
atk-s0201a:438_3: uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ, tato vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ,
atk-s0201a:438_5: voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati. Tadanantaraṃ javanaṃ javati.
atk-s0201a:439_0: Tatthapi neva bhavaṅgasamaye, na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro
atk-s0201a:439_1: vā atthi. Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti
atk-s0201a:439_2: vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati, ayaṃ asaṃvaro hoti. Evaṃ hontopi so cakkhundriye asaṃvaroti
atk-s0201a:439_3: vuccati. Kasmā? Tasmiñhi sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi.
atk-s0201a:439_4: Yathā kiṃ, yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi anto gharakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo
atk-s0201a:439_5: susaṃvutā, tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti. Nagaradvārena
atk-s0201a:439_6: hi pavisitvā corā yadicchanti, taṃ kareyyuṃ, evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu,
atk-s0201a:439_7: tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipīti.
atk-s0201a:440_0: Tasmiṃ pana sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi.
atk-s0201a:440_1: Yathā kiṃ? Yathā nagaradvāresu susaṃvutesu kiñcāpi anto gharādayo asaṃvutā, tathāpi
atk-s0201a:440_2: antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti. Nagaradvāresu hi pihitesu
atk-s0201a:440_3: corānaṃ paveso natthi, evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi suguttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:440_4: bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi. Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi cakkhundriye
atk-s0201a:440_5: saṃvaroti vutto. Idha cāyaṃ satisaṃvaro adhippetoti veditabbo. Cakkhundriyasaṃvarena
atk-s0201a:440_6: saṃvuto cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṃvuto, upetoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti
atk-s0201a:440_7: imassa vibhaṅge “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti…pe… samannāgato”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:440_8: Taṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā cakkhundriyasaṃvarena saṃvutoti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:441_0: Atha vā saṃvarīti saṃvuto, thakesi pidahīti vuttaṃ hoti. Cakkhundriye saṃvarasaṃvuto
atk-s0201a:441_2: gharadvāre kavāṭaṃ viya saṃvari thakesi pidahīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ayameva cettha attho
atk-s0201a:441_3: sundarataro. Tathā hi “cakkhundriyasaṃvaraṃ asaṃvutassa viharato saṃvutassa viharato”ti
atk-s0201a:442_0: Viharatīti evaṃ cakkhundriyasaṃvarasaṃvuto yena kenaci iriyāpathavihārena viharati.
atk-s0201a:442_1: Yañhissātiādimhi yaṃ cakkhundriyasaṃvaraṃ assa bhikkhuno asaṃvutassa athaketvā apidahitvā
atk-s0201a:442_2: viharantassāti evamattho veditabbo. Atha vā, ye-kārassa yanti ādeso. Hikāro ca padapūraṇo, ye assāti attho.
atk-s0201a:443_0: Uppajjeyyunti nibbatteyyuṃ. Āsavā vighātapariḷāhāti cattāro āsavā ca aññe ca vighātakarā
atk-s0201a:443_1: kilesapariḷāhā vipākapariḷāhā ca. Cakkhudvāre hi iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ āpāthagataṃ kāmassādavasena
atk-s0201a:443_2: assādayato abhinandato kāmāsavo uppajjati, īdisaṃ aññasmimpi sugatibhave labhissāmīti
atk-s0201a:443_3: bhavapatthanāya assādayato bhavāsavo uppajjati, sattoti vā sattassāti vā gaṇhantassa
atk-s0201a:443_4: diṭṭhāsavo uppajjati, sabbeheva sahajātaṃ aññāṇaṃ avijjāsavoti cattāro āsavā uppajjanti.
atk-s0201a:443_5: Tehi sampayuttā apare kilesā vighātapariḷāhā, āyatiṃ vā tesaṃ vipākā. Tepi hi asaṃvutasseva
atk-s0201a:444: Evaṃsa teti evaṃ assa te. Evaṃ etena upāyena na honti, no aññathāti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo paṭisaṅkhā yoniso sotindriyasaṃvarasaṃvutotiādīsu.
atk-s0201a:445_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbāti ime chasu dvāresu cattāro cattāro
atk-s0201a:445_1: katvā catuvīsati āsavā saṃvarena pahātabbāti vuccanti. Sabbattheva cettha satisaṃvaro
atk-s0201a:448_0: 23. Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvarantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge sīlakathāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:448_1: vuttameva. Yañhissāti yaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātādīsu vā aññataraṃ assa. Appaṭisevatoti evaṃ
atk-s0201a:448_2: yoniso appaṭisevantassa. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Kevalaṃ panidha aladdhaṃ cīvarādiṃ
atk-s0201a:448_3: patthayato laddhaṃ vā assādayato kāmāsavassa uppatti veditabbā. Īdisaṃ aññasmimpi
atk-s0201a:448_4: sampattibhave sugatibhave labhissāmīti bhavapatthanāya assādayato bhavāsavassa, ahaṃ
atk-s0201a:448_5: labhāmi na labhāmīti vā mayhaṃ vā idanti attasaññaṃ adhiṭṭhahato diṭṭhāsavassa uppatti
atk-s0201a:448_6: veditabbā. Sabbeheva pana sahajāto avijjāsavoti evaṃ catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ uppatti vipākapariḷāhā
atk-s0201a:449_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbāti ime ekamekasmiṃ paccaye cattāro
atk-s0201a:449_1: cattāro katvā soḷasa āsavā iminā ñāṇasaṃvarasaṅkhātena paccavekkhaṇapaṭisevanena
atk-s0201a:452_0: 24. Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso khamo hoti sītassāti upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā khamo hoti
atk-s0201a:452_1: sītassa sītaṃ khamati sahati, na avīrapuriso viya appamattakenapi sītena calati kampati
atk-s0201a:452_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vijahati. Apica kho lomasanāgatthero viya anappakenāpi sītena phuṭṭho
atk-s0201a:452_3: na calati na kampati, kammaṭṭhānameva manasi karoti. Thero kira cetiyapabbate piyaṅguguhāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:452_4: padhānaghare viharanto antaraṭṭhake himapātasamaye lokantarikaniraye paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0201a:452_5: kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahantova abbhokāse vītināmesi. Evaṃ uṇhādīsupi atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:453_0: Kevalañhi yo bhikkhu adhimattampi uṇhaṃ sahati sveva thero viya, ayaṃ “khamo uṇhassā”ti
atk-s0201a:453_1: veditabbo. Thero kira gimhasamaye pacchābhattaṃ bahicaṅkame nisīdi. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:453_2: manasikaronto sedāpissa kacchehi muccanti. Atha naṃ antevāsiko āha “idha, bhante,
atk-s0201a:453_3: nisīdatha, sītalo okāso”ti. Thero “uṇhabhayenevamhi āvuso idha nisinno”ti avīcimahānirayaṃ
atk-s0201a:453_4: paccavekkhitvā nisīdiyeva. Uṇhanti cettha aggisantāpova veditabbo. Sūriyasantāpavasena
atk-s0201a:454_0: Yo ca dve tayo vāre bhattaṃ vā pānīyaṃ vā alabhamānopi anamatagge saṃsāre attano
atk-s0201a:454_1: pettivisayūpapattiṃ paccavekkhitvā avedhento kammaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatiyeva. Adhimattehi
atk-s0201a:454_2: ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasamphassehi phuṭṭho cāpi tiracchānūpapattiṃ paccavekkhitvā avedhento
atk-s0201a:454_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatiyeva. Sarīsapasamphassena phuṭṭho cāpi anamatagge saṃsāre
atk-s0201a:454_4: sīhabyagghādimukhesu anekavāraṃ parivattitapubbabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā avedhento kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:454_5: na vijahatiyeva padhāniyatthero viya. Ayaṃ “khamo jighacchāya…pe… sarīsapasamphassāna”nti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:455_0: Theraṃ kira khaṇḍacelavihāre kaṇikārapadhāniyaghare ariyavaṃsaṃ suṇantaṃ ghoraviso
atk-s0201a:455_1: sappo ḍaṃsi. Thero jānitvāpi pasannacitto nisinno dhammaṃyeva suṇāti. Visavego thaddho
atk-s0201a:455_2: ahosi. Thero upasampadamaṇḍalaṃ ādiṃ katvā sīlaṃ paccavekkhitvā parisuddhasīlohamasmīti
atk-s0201a:455_3: pītiṃ uppādesi. Saha pītuppādā visaṃ nivattitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi. Thero tattheva cittekaggataṃ
atk-s0201a:456_0: Yo pana akkosavasena durutte duruttattāyeva ca durāgate api antimavatthusaññite vacanapathe
atk-s0201a:456_1: sutvā khantiguṇaṃyeva paccavekkhitvā na vedhati dīghabhāṇakaabhayatthero viya. Ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:457_0: Thero kira paccayasantosabhāvanārāmatāya mahāariyavaṃsappaṭipadaṃ kathesi, sabbo
atk-s0201a:457_1: mahāgāmo āgacchati. Therassa mahāsakkāro uppajjati. Taṃ aññataro mahāthero adhivāsetuṃ
atk-s0201a:457_2: asakkonto dīghabhāṇako ariyavaṃsaṃ kathemīti sabbarattiṃ kolāhalaṃ karosītiādīhi
atk-s0201a:457_3: akkosi. Ubhopi ca attano attano vihāraṃ gacchantā gāvutamattaṃ ekapathena agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:457_4: Sakalagāvutampi so taṃ akkosiyeva. Tato yattha dvinnaṃ vihārānaṃ maggo bhijjati,
atk-s0201a:457_5: tattha ṭhatvā dīghabhāṇakatthero taṃ vanditvā “esa, bhante, tumhākaṃ maggo”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:457_6: So asuṇanto viya agamāsi. Theropi vihāraṃ gantvā pāde pakkhāletvā nisīdi. Tamenaṃ
atk-s0201a:457_7: antevāsiko “kiṃ, bhante, sakalagāvutaṃ paribhāsantaṃ na kiñci avocutthā”ti āha. Thero
atk-s0201a:457_8: “khantiyeva, āvuso, mayhaṃ bhāro, na akkhanti. Ekapaduddhārepi kammaṭṭhānaviyogaṃ
atk-s0201a:457_9: na passāmī”ti āha. Ettha ca vacanameva vacanapathoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:458_0: Yo pana uppannā sārīrikā vedanā dukkhamanaṭṭhena dukkhā, bahalaṭṭhena tibbā, pharusaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:458_1: kharā, tikhiṇaṭṭhena kaṭukā, assādavirahato asātā, manaṃ avaḍḍhanato amanāpā, pāṇaharaṇasamatthatāya
atk-s0201a:458_2: pāṇaharā adhivāsetiyeva, na vedhati. Evaṃ sabhāvo hoti cittalapabbate padhāniyatthero
atk-s0201a:459_0: Therassa kira rattiṃ padhānena vītināmetvā ṭhitassa udaravāto uppajji. So taṃ adhivāsetuṃ
atk-s0201a:459_1: asakkonto āvattati parivattati. Tamenaṃ caṅkamapasse ṭhito piṇḍapātiyatthero āha
atk-s0201a:459_2: “āvuso, pabbajito nāma adhivāsanasīlo hotī”ti. So “sādhu, bhante”ti adhivāsetvā niccalo
atk-s0201a:459_3: sayi. Vāto nābhito yāva hadayaṃ phāleti. Thero vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanto muhuttena
atk-s0201a:460_0: Yañhissāti sītādīsu yaṃkiñci ekadhammampi assa. Anadhivāsayatoti anadhivāsentassa
atk-s0201a:460_1: akkhamantassa. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Āsavuppatti panettha evaṃ veditabbā. Sītena phuṭṭhassa
atk-s0201a:460_2: uṇhaṃ patthayantassa kāmāsavo uppajjati, evaṃ sabbattha. Natthi no sampattibhave
atk-s0201a:460_3: sugatibhave sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vāti bhavaṃ patthayantassa bhavāsavo. Mayhaṃ sītaṃ uṇhanti
atk-s0201a:461_0: “Ime vuccanti…pe… adhivāsanā pahātabbā”ti ime sītādīsu ekamekassa vasena cattāro
atk-s0201a:461_1: cattāro katvā aneke āsavā imāya khantisaṃvarasaṅkhātāya adhivāsanāya pahātabbāti
atk-s0201a:461_2: vuccantīti attho. Ettha ca yasmā ayaṃ khanti sītādidhamme adhivāseti, attano upari
atk-s0201a:461_3: āropetvā vāsetiyeva. Na asahamānā hutvā nirassati, tasmā “adhivāsanā”ti vuccatīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:464_0: 25. Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetīti ahaṃ samaṇoti caṇḍassa hatthissa
atk-s0201a:464_1: āsanne na ṭhātabbaṃ. Tatonidānañhi maraṇampi siyā maraṇamattampi dukkhanti evaṃ upāyena
atk-s0201a:464_2: pathena paccayena paccavekkhitvā caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjeti paṭikkamati. Esa nayo
atk-s0201a:464_3: sabbattha. Caṇḍanti ca duṭṭhaṃ, vāḷanti vuttaṃ hoti. Khāṇunti khadirakhāṇuādiṃ. Kaṇṭakaṭṭhānanti
atk-s0201a:464_4: kaṇṭakānaṃ ṭhānaṃ, yattha kaṇṭakā vijjanti, taṃ okāsanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sobbhanti sabbato
atk-s0201a:464_5: paricchinnataṭaṃ. Papātanti ekato chinnataṭaṃ. Candanikanti ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:464_6: chaḍḍanaṭṭhānaṃ. Oḷigallanti tesaṃyeva sakaddamādīnaṃ sandanokāsaṃ. Taṃ jaṇṇumattampi
atk-s0201a:464_7: asucibharitaṃ hoti, dvepi cetāni ṭhānāni amanussaduṭṭhāni honti. Tasmā tāni vajjetabbāni.
atk-s0201a:464_8: Anāsaneti ettha pana ayuttaṃ āsanaṃ anāsanaṃ, taṃ atthato aniyatavatthukaṃ rahopaṭicchannāsananti
atk-s0201a:464_9: veditabbaṃ. Agocareti etthapi ca ayutto gocaro agocaro, so vesiyādibhedato pañcavidho.
atk-s0201a:464_10: Pāpake mitteti lāmake dussīle mittapatirūpake, amitte vā. Bhajantanti sevamānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:464_11: Viññū sabrahmacārīti paṇḍitā buddhisampannā sabrahmacārayo, bhikkhūnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:464_12: Te hi ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti imaṃ brahmaṃ samānaṃ caranti, tasmā sabrahmacārīti
atk-s0201a:464_13: vuccanti. Pāpakesu ṭhānesūti lāmakesu ṭhānesu. Okappeyyunti saddaheyyuṃ, adhimucceyyuṃ
atk-s0201a:465_0: Yañhissāti hatthiādīsu yaṃkiñci ekampi assa. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Āsavuppatti panettha
atk-s0201a:465_1: evaṃ veditabbā. Hatthiādinidānena dukkhena phuṭṭhassa sukhaṃ patthayato kāmāsavo
atk-s0201a:465_2: uppajjati. Natthi no sampattibhave sugatibhave īdisaṃ dukkhanti bhavaṃ patthentassa
atk-s0201a:465_3: bhavāsavo. Maṃ hatthī maddati, maṃ assoti gāho diṭṭhāsavo. Sabbeheva sampayutto avijjāsavoti.
atk-s0201a:466_0: Ime vuccanti…pe… parivajjanā pahātabbāti ime hatthiādīsu ekekassa vasena cattāro
atk-s0201a:466_1: cattāro katvā aneke āsavā iminā sīlasaṃvarasaṅkhātena parivajjanena pahātabbāti vuccantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:469_0: 26. Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetīti “iti pāyaṃ vitakko akusalo,
atk-s0201a:469_1: itipi sāvajjo, itipi dukkhavipāko, so ca kho attabyābādhāya saṃvattatī”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0201a:469_2: yoniso kāmavitakke ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppannaṃ jātamabhinibbattaṃ
atk-s0201a:469_3: kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti, cittaṃ āropetvā na vāseti, abbhantare vā na vāsetītipi attho.
atk-s0201a:471: Kiṃ kacavaraṃ viya piṭakenāti? Na hi, apica kho naṃ vinodeti tudati vijjhati nīharati.
atk-s0201a:472: Kiṃ balibaddaṃ viya patodenāti? Na hi, atha kho naṃ byantīkaroti vigatantaṃ karoti. Yathāssa antopi nāvasissati antamaso bhaṅgamattampi, tathā naṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:473_0: Kathaṃ pana naṃ tathā karotīti? Anabhāvaṃ gametīti anu anu abhāvaṃ gameti, vikkhambhanappahānena
atk-s0201a:473_1: yathā suvikkhambhito hoti, tathā karotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo byāpādavihiṃsāvitakkesu.
atk-s0201a:474_0: Ettha ca kāmavitakkoti “yo kāmapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko micchāsaṅkappo”ti vibhaṅge
atk-s0201a:474_1: vutto. Esa nayo itaresu. Uppannuppanneti uppanne uppanne, uppannamatteyevāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:474_2: hoti. Sakiṃ vā uppanne vinodetvā dutiyavāre ajjhupekkhitā na hoti, satakkhattumpi
atk-s0201a:474_3: uppanne uppanne vinodetiyeva. Pāpake akusaleti lāmakaṭṭhena pāpake, akosallatāya
atk-s0201a:474_4: akusale. Dhammeti teyeva kāmavitakkādayo sabbepi vā nava mahāvitakke. Tattha tayo
atk-s0201a:474_5: vuttā eva. Avasesā “ñātivitakko janapadavitakko amaravitakko parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0201a:474_6: vitakko lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakko”ti ime cha.
atk-s0201a:475_0: Yañhissāti etesu vitakkesu yaṃkiñci assa, sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Kāmavitakko panettha
atk-s0201a:475_1: kāmāsavo eva. Tabbiseso bhavāsavo. Taṃsampayutto diṭṭhāsavo. Sabbavitakkesu avijjāsavoti
atk-s0201a:476_0: Ime vuccanti…pe… vinodanā pahātabbāti ime kāmavitakkādivasena vuttappakārā āsavā
atk-s0201a:476_1: iminā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vitakke ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇasahitena vīriyasaṃvarasaṅkhātena
atk-s0201a:479_0: 27. Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetīti abhāvanāya ādīnavaṃ, bhāvanāya
atk-s0201a:479_1: ca ānisaṃsaṃ upāyena pathena paccavekkhitvā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti, esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0201a:479_2: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ime uparimaggattayasamayasambhūtā lokuttarabojjhaṅgā eva adhippetā,
atk-s0201a:479_3: tathāpi ādikammikānaṃ bojjhaṅgesu asammohatthaṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakena nesaṃ nayena
atk-s0201a:479_4: atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi. Idha pana lokiyanayaṃ pahāya lokuttaranayo eva gahetabbo.
atk-s0201a:479_5: Tattha satisambojjhaṅgantiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ sattannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva tāva –
atk-s0201a:482_0: Tattha satisambojjhaṅge tāva saraṇaṭṭhena sati. Sā panesā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā, apilāpanalakkhaṇā
atk-s0201a:482_1: vā. Vuttampi hetaṃ “yathā, mahārāja, rañño bhaṇḍāgāriko rañño sāpateyyaṃ apilāpeti,
atk-s0201a:482_2: ettakaṃ, mahārāja, hiraññaṃ, ettakaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ, ettakaṃ sāpateyyanti, evameva kho,
atk-s0201a:482_4: dhamme apilāpeti. Ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti vitthāro. Apilāpanarasā. Kiccavaseneva
atk-s0201a:482_5: hissa etaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ therena vuttaṃ. Asammosarasā vā. Gocarābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0201a:482_6: Sati eva sambojjhaṅgo satisambojjhaṅgo. Tattha bodhiyā bodhissa vā aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo.
atk-s0201a:483_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yā hi ayaṃ dhammasāmaggī, yāya lokiyalokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya
atk-s0201a:483_3: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā “bodhī”ti vuccati. Bujjhatīti kilesasantānaniddāya
atk-s0201a:483_4: uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:483_5: hoti. Yathāha “satta bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho”ti.
atk-s0201a:483_6: Tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgotipi bojjhaṅgo, jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0201a:484_0: Yopesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti
atk-s0201a:484_1: vuccati, tassa bodhissa aṅgotipi bojjhaṅgo, senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā
atk-s0201a:484_2: “bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti vā bojjhaṅgā”ti. Apica “bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā?
atk-s0201a:484_3: Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā, bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā,
atk-s0201a:484_5: attho veditabbo. Pasattho sundaro vā bojjhaṅgoti sambojjhaṅgo. Evaṃ sati eva sambojjhaṅgo
atk-s0201a:484_6: satisambojjhaṅgo. Taṃ satisambojjhaṅgaṃ. Evaṃ tāva ekassa ādipadassa atthato lakkhaṇādīhi
atk-s0201a:485_0: Dutiyādīsu pana catusaccadhamme vicinātīti dhammavicayo. So pana vicayalakkhaṇo,
atk-s0201a:485_1: obhāsanaraso, asammohapaccupaṭṭhāno. Vīrabhāvato vidhinā īrayitabbato ca vīriyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:485_2: Taṃ paggahalakkhaṇaṃ, upatthambhanarasaṃ, anosīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Pīṇayatīti pīti.
atk-s0201a:485_3: Sā pharaṇalakkhaṇā, tuṭṭhilakkhaṇā vā, kāyacittānaṃ pīṇanarasā, tesaṃyeva odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0201a:485_6: avisāralakkhaṇo vā, cittacetasikānaṃ sampiṇḍanaraso, cittaṭṭhitipaccupaṭṭhāno. Ajjhupekkhanato
atk-s0201a:485_7: upekkhā. Sā paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇā, samavāhitalakkhaṇā vā, ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā,
atk-s0201a:485_8: pakkhapātupacchedarasā vā, majjhattabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:485_9: sesapadānampi atthato lakkhaṇādīhi ca vinicchayo viññātabbo.
atk-s0201a:486_0: Kamatoti ettha ca “satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti vacanato sabbesaṃ
atk-s0201a:486_1: sesabojjhaṅgānaṃ upakārakattā satisambojjhaṅgova paṭhamaṃ vutto. Tato paraṃ “so tathā
atk-s0201a:486_2: sato viharanto taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinatī”tiādinā nayena sesabojjhaṅgānaṃ pubbāpariyavacane
atk-s0201a:486_3: payojanaṃ sutteyeva vuttaṃ. Evamettha kamatopi vinicchayo viññātabbo.
atk-s0201a:487_0: Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana bhagavatā satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti. Līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato
atk-s0201a:487_1: sabbatthikato ca. Ettha hi tayo bojjhaṅgā līnassa paṭipakkhā. Yathāha – “yasmiñca
atk-s0201a:487_2: kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
atk-s0201a:487_3: bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:487_4: Tayo uddhaccassa paṭipakkhā. Yathāha – “yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ
atk-s0201a:487_5: cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa
atk-s0201a:487_6: bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti. Eko panettha sabbatthiko. Yathāha
atk-s0201a:487_8: dvinnampi sabbattha icchitabbanti attho. Evaṃ līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato
atk-s0201a:487_9: ca satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti, evamettha anūnādhikatopi vinicchayo viññātabbo.
atk-s0201a:488_0: Evaṃ tāva “satisambojjhaṅga”ntiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ sattannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva atthavaṇṇanaṃ
atk-s0201a:488_1: ñatvā idāni bhāveti vivekanissitantiādīsu evaṃ ñātabbā. Bhāvetīti vaḍḍheti, attano
atk-s0201a:488_2: cittasantāne punappunaṃ janeti abhinibbattetīti attho. Vivekanissitanti viveke nissitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:488_3: Vivekoti vivittatā. Svāyaṃ tadaṅgaviveko vikkhambhanasamucchedapaṭippassaddhi nissaraṇavivekoti
atk-s0201a:488_4: pañcavidho. Tassa nānattaṃ “ariyadhamme avinīto”ti ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:488_5: Ayameva hi tattha vinayoti vutto. Evaṃ etasmiṃ pañcavidhe viveke.
atk-s0201a:489_1: satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetīti ayamattho veditabbo. Tathā hi ayaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto
atk-s0201a:489_2: yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ, ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:489_3: maggakāle pana kiccato samucchedavivekanissitaṃ, ārammaṇato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ
atk-s0201a:489_4: satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti. Pañcavidhavivekanissitantipi eke, te hi na kevalaṃ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesu
atk-s0201a:489_6: uddharanti. Na ca paṭisiddhā aṭṭhakathācariyehi. Tasmā tesaṃ matena etesaṃ jhānānaṃ
atk-s0201a:489_7: pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ. Yathā ca “vipassanākkhaṇe ajjhāsayato
atk-s0201a:489_9: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Esa nayo virāganissitādīsu. Vivekaṭṭhā eva hi virāgādayo.
atk-s0201a:490_0: Kevalañhettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti. Tattha
atk-s0201a:490_1: pariccāgavossaggoti vipassanākkhaṇe ca tadaṅgavasena, maggakkhaṇe ca samucchedavasena
