atk-s0201a:490_3: pana ārammaṇakaraṇena nibbānapakkhandanaṃ. Tadubhayampi imasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaramissake
atk-s0201a:490_4: atthavaṇṇanānaye vaṭṭati. Tathā hi ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese
atk-s0201a:490_5: pariccajati, nibbānañca pakkhandati. Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena
atk-s0201a:490_6: vossaggattaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcāti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0201a:490_8: nibbānapakkhandanavossaggattañca paripaccati, yathā ca paripakko hoti, tathā naṃ
atk-s0201a:491_0: Idha pana nibbānaṃyeva sabbasaṅkhatehi vivittattā viveko, sabbesaṃ virāgabhāvato
atk-s0201a:491_1: virāgo, nirodhabhāvato nirodhoti vuttaṃ. Maggo eva ca vossaggapariṇāmī, tasmā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ
atk-s0201a:491_2: bhāveti vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattiyā vivekanissitaṃ. Tathā virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:491_3: Tañca kho ariyamaggakkhaṇuppattiyā kilesānaṃ samucchedato pariccāgabhāvena ca nibbānapakkhandanabhāvena
atk-s0201a:491_4: ca pariṇataṃ paripakkanti ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo. Esa nayo sesabojjhaṅgesu.
atk-s0201a:492_0: Yañhissāti etesu bojjhaṅgesu yaṃkiñci assa. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Āsavuppattiyaṃ panettha
atk-s0201a:492_1: imesaṃ uparimaggattayasampayuttānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ abhāvitattā ye uppajjeyyuṃ kāmāsavo
atk-s0201a:492_2: bhavāsavo avijjāsavoti tayo āsavā, bhāvayato evaṃsa te āsavā na hontīti ayaṃ nayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:493: Ime vuccanti…pe… bhāvanā pahātabbāti ime tayo āsavā imāya maggattayasampayuttāya bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya pahātabbāti vuccantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:494_0: 28. Idāni imehi sattahākārehi pahīnāsavaṃ bhikkhuṃ thomento āsavappahāne cassa ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0201a:494_1: dassento eteheva ca kāraṇehi āsavappahāne sattānaṃ ussukkaṃ janento yato kho, bhikkhave…pe…
atk-s0201a:494_2: antamakāsi dukkhassāti āha. Tattha yato khoti sāmivacane tokāro, yassa khoti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:494_3: hoti. Porāṇā pana yasmiṃ kāleti vaṇṇayanti. Ye āsavā dassanā pahātabbāti ye āsavā
atk-s0201a:494_4: dassanena pahātabbā, te dassaneneva pahīnā honti, na appahīnesuyeva pahīnasaññī hoti.
atk-s0201a:495_0: Sabbāsavasaṃvarasaṃvutoti sabbehi āsavapidhānehi pihito, sabbesaṃ vā āsavānaṃ pidhānehi
atk-s0201a:495_1: pihito. Acchecchi taṇhanti sabbampi taṇhaṃ chindi, saṃchindi samucchindi. Vivattayi
atk-s0201a:495_2: saṃyojananti dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ parivattayi nimmalamakāsi. Sammāti hetunā kāraṇena.
atk-s0201a:495_3: Mānābhisamayāti mānassa dassanābhisamayā pahānābhisamayā ca. Arahattamaggo hi kiccavasena
atk-s0201a:495_4: mānaṃ passati, ayamassa dassanābhisamayo. Tena diṭṭho pana so tāvadeva pahīyati diṭṭhavisena
atk-s0201a:496_0: Antamakāsi dukkhassāti evaṃ arahattamaggena sammā mānassa diṭṭhattā pahīnattā ca
atk-s0201a:496_1: ye ime “kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati. Haritantaṃ vā”ti evaṃ vuttaantimamariyādanto
atk-s0201a:496_2: ca, “antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikāna”nti evaṃ vuttalāmakanto ca, “sakkāyo eko anto”ti
atk-s0201a:496_3: evaṃ vuttakoṭṭhāsanto ca, “esevanto dukkhassa sabbapaccayasaṅkhayā”ti evaṃ vuttakoṭanto
atk-s0201a:496_4: cāti evaṃ cattāro antā, tesu sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ catutthakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0201a:496_5: antimakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ antamakāsi paricchedaṃ parivaṭumaṃ akāsi. Antimasamussayamattāvasesaṃ
atk-s0201a:497_0: Attamanā te bhikkhūti sakamanā tuṭṭhamanā, pītisomanassehi vā sampayuttamanā hutvā.
atk-s0201a:497_1: Bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti idaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyāpariyosānaṃ bhagavato bhāsitaṃ
atk-s0201a:497_2: sukathitaṃ sulapitaṃ, evametaṃ bhagavā evametaṃ sugatāti matthakena sampaṭicchantā abbhanumodiṃsūti.
atk-s0201a:498: Sesamettha yaṃ na vuttaṃ, taṃ pubbe vuttattā ca suviññeyyattā ca na vuttaṃ. Tasmā sabbaṃ vuttānusārena anupadaso paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:503_0: 29. Evaṃ me sutanti dhammadāyādasuttaṃ. Yasmā panassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo, tasmā
atk-s0201a:503_1: taṃ dassetvā vassa apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Katarāya ca panidaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyā
atk-s0201a:503_2: nikkhittanti. Lābhasakkāre. Bhagavato kira mahālābhasakkāro uppajji. Yathā taṃ cattāro
atk-s0201a:503_3: asaṅkhyeyye pūritadānapāramīsañcayassa. Sabbadisāsu yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṃ
atk-s0201a:503_4: viya sabbapāramiyo ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ dassāmāti sampiṇḍitā viya lābhasakkāramahoghaṃ
atk-s0201a:503_6: āgantvā – “kahaṃ buddho, kahaṃ bhagavā, kahaṃ devadevo, narāsabho, purisasīho”ti
atk-s0201a:503_7: bhagavantaṃ pariyesanti. Sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā
atk-s0201a:503_8: gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuramāhaccatiṭṭhanti ceva anubandhanti ca.
atk-s0201a:503_9: Andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya. Sabbaṃ khandhake tesu tesu suttesu ca āgatanayeneva
atk-s0201a:503_10: veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca bhagavato, evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassāpi.
atk-s0201a:504_0: Vuttampi cetaṃ – “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito
atk-s0201a:504_2: kho sakkato hoti…pe… parikkhārāna”nti. Tathā – “yāvatā kho, cunda, etarahi saṅgho
atk-s0201a:504_3: vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ, cunda, aññaṃ ekasaṅghampi samanupassāmi, evaṃ lābhaggayasaggapattaṃ,
atk-s0201a:505_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ
atk-s0201a:505_1: mahānadīnaṃ udakamiva appameyyo ahosi. Kamena bhikkhū paccayagarukā paccayabāhulikā
atk-s0201a:505_2: ahesuṃ. Pacchābhattampi telamadhuphāṇitādīsu āhaṭesu gaṇḍiṃyeva paharitvā “amhākaṃ
atk-s0201a:505_3: ācariyassa detha, upajjhāyassa dethā”ti uccāsaddamahāsaddaṃ karonti. Sā ca nesaṃ
atk-s0201a:505_4: pavatti bhagavatopi pākaṭā ahosi. Tato bhagavā ananucchavikanti dhammasaṃvegaṃ uppādetvā cintesi –
atk-s0201a:506_0: “Paccayā akappiyāti na sakkā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetuṃ. Paccayapaṭibaddhā hi kulaputtānaṃ
atk-s0201a:506_1: samaṇadhammavutti. Handāhaṃ dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṃ desemi. Sā sikkhākāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ
atk-s0201a:506_2: sikkhāpadapaññatti viya bhavissati nagaradvāre ṭhapitasabbakāyikaādāso viya ca, yathā
atk-s0201a:506_3: hi nagaradvāre ṭhapite sabbakāyike ādāse cattāro vaṇṇā attano chāyaṃ disvā vajjaṃ
atk-s0201a:506_4: pahāya niddosā honti, evameva sikkhākāmā kulaputtā payogamaṇḍanena attānaṃ maṇḍetukāmā
atk-s0201a:506_5: imaṃ sabbakāyikādāsūpamaṃ desanaṃ āvajjitvā āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṃ vajjetvā dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0201a:506_6: pūrentā khippameva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantī”ti. Imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a:507_0: Tattha dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādāti dhammassa me dāyādā,
atk-s0201a:507_1: bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisassa. Yo mayhaṃ dhammo, tassa paṭiggāhakā bhavatha, yañca
atk-s0201a:507_2: kho mayhaṃ āmisaṃ, tassa mā paṭiggāhakā bhavathāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha dhammopi duvidho
atk-s0201a:507_3: – nippariyāyadhammo, pariyāyadhammoti. Āmisampi duvidhaṃ – nippariyāyāmisaṃ, pariyāyāmisanti.
atk-s0201a:507_4: Kathaṃ? Maggaphalanibbānabhedo hi navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo nippariyāyadhammo nibbattitadhammo,
atk-s0201a:507_5: na yena kenaci pariyāyena kāraṇena vā lesena vā dhammo. Yaṃ panidaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissitaṃ
atk-s0201a:507_6: kusalaṃ, seyyathidaṃ, idhekacco vivaṭṭaṃ patthento dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati,
atk-s0201a:507_7: uposathakammaṃ karoti, gandhamālādīhi vatthupūjaṃ karoti, dhammaṃ suṇāti deseti jhānasamāpattiyo
atk-s0201a:507_8: nibbatteti, evaṃ karonto anupubbena nippariyāyadhammaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0201a:507_9: ayaṃ pariyāyadhammo. Tathā cīvarādayo cattāro paccayā nippariyāyāmisameva, na aññena
atk-s0201a:507_10: pariyāyena kāraṇena vā lesena vā āmisaṃ. Yaṃ panidaṃ vaṭṭagāmikusalaṃ, seyyathidaṃ,
atk-s0201a:507_11: idhekacco vaṭṭaṃ patthento sampattibhavaṃ icchamāno dānaṃ deti…pe… samāpattiyo nibbatteti,
atk-s0201a:507_12: evaṃ karonto anupubbena devamanussasampattiṃ paṭilabhati, idaṃ pariyāyāmisaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:508_0: Tattha nippariyāyadhammopi bhagavatoyeva santako. Bhagavatā hi kathitattā bhikkhū
atk-s0201a:508_1: maggaphalanibbānāni adhigacchanti. Vuttampi cetaṃ “so hi brāhmaṇa bhagavā anuppannassa
atk-s0201a:508_2: maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā,
atk-s0201a:508_3: maggaññū maggavidū maggakovido. Maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā
atk-s0201a:508_4: samannāgatā”ti ca – “so hāvuso, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto
atk-s0201a:508_5: ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī
atk-s0201a:508_6: tathāgato”ti ca. Pariyāyadhammopi bhagavatoyeva santako. Bhagavatā hi kathitattā
atk-s0201a:508_7: evaṃ jānanti “vivaṭṭaṃ patthetvā dānaṃ dento…pe… samāpattiyo nibbattento anukkamena
atk-s0201a:508_8: amataṃ nibbānaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti. Nippariyāyāmisampi ca bhagavatoyeva santakaṃ. Bhagavatā
atk-s0201a:508_9: hi anuññātattāyeva bhikkhūhi jīvakavatthuṃ ādiṃ katvā paṇītacīvaraṃ laddhaṃ. Yathāha
atk-s0201a:508_10: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gahapaticīvaraṃ. Yo icchati, paṃsukūliko hotu, yo icchati,
atk-s0201a:508_11: gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyatu. Itarītarenapāhaṃ, bhikkhave, santuṭṭhiṃyeva vaṇṇemī”ti.
atk-s0201a:509_0: Pubbe ca bhikkhū paṇītapiṇḍapātaṃ nālatthuṃ. Sapadānapiṇḍiyālopabhojanā evāhesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:509_1: Tehi rājagahe viharantena bhagavatā – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ
atk-s0201a:509_2: nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadika”nti evaṃ anuññātattāyeva
atk-s0201a:509_3: paṇītabhojanaṃ laddhaṃ. Tathā senāsanaṃ. Pubbe hi akatapabbhārarukkhamūlādisenāsanāyeva
atk-s0201a:509_4: bhikkhū ahesuṃ. Te “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañca leṇānī”ti evaṃ bhagavatā anuññātattāyeva
atk-s0201a:509_5: vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhāti imāni senāsanāni labhiṃsu. Pubbe ca muttaharītakeneva
atk-s0201a:509_6: bhesajjaṃ akaṃsu. Te bhagavatāyeva – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañca bhesajjāni, seyyathidaṃ,
atk-s0201a:509_7: sappi, navanītaṃ, telaṃ, madhu, phāṇita”nti evamādinā nayena anuññātattā nānābhesajjāni labhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:510_0: Pariyāyāmisampi bhagavatoyeva santakaṃ. Bhagavatā hi kathitattā yeva jānanti – “sampattibhavaṃ
atk-s0201a:510_1: patthento dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ…pe… samāpattiyo nibbattetvā anukkamena pariyāyāmisaṃ
atk-s0201a:510_2: dibbasampattiṃ manussasampattiṃ paṭilabhatī”ti. Tadeva, yasmā nippariyāyadhammopi
atk-s0201a:510_3: pariyāyadhammopi nippariyāyāmisampi pariyāyāmisampi bhagavatoyeva santakaṃ, tasmā
atk-s0201a:510_4: tattha attano sāmibhāvaṃ dassento āha – “dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā”ti.
atk-s0201a:511_0: Yo mayhaṃ santako duvidhopi dhammo, tassa dāyādā bhavatha. Yañca kho etaṃ mayhameva
atk-s0201a:511_1: santakaṃ āmisaṃ, tassa dāyādā mā bhavatha. Dhammakoṭṭhāsasseva sāmino bhavatha, mā
atk-s0201a:511_2: āmisakoṭṭhāsassa. Yo hi jinasāsane pabbajitvā paccayaparamo viharati catūsu taṇhuppādesu
atk-s0201a:511_3: sandissamāno nikkhittadhuro dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyaṃ, ayaṃ āmisadāyādo nāma. Tādisā
atk-s0201a:511_4: mā bhavatha. Yo pana anuññātapaccayesu appicchatādīni nissāya paṭisaṅkhā sevamāno
atk-s0201a:511_5: paṭipattiparamo viharati catūsu ariyavaṃsesu sandissamāno, ayaṃ dhammadāyādo nāma.
atk-s0201a:512_0: Idāni yesaṃ tattha etadahosi, bhavissati vā anāgatamaddhānaṃ “kiṃ nu kho bhagavā
atk-s0201a:512_1: sāvakānaṃ alābhatthiko evamāhā”ti, tesaṃ atipaṇītalābhatthiko ahaṃ evaṃ vadāmīti
atk-s0201a:512_2: dassetumāha atthi me tumhesu…pe… no āmisadāyādāti.
atk-s0201a:513_0: Tassāyamattho – atthi me tumhesu anukampā anuddayā hitesitā, kena nu kho kāraṇena
atk-s0201a:513_1: kena upāyena sāvakā dhammadāyādā assu dhammakoṭṭhāsasāmino, no āmisadāyādāti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:513_2: pana adhippāyo, passati kira bhagavā āmisagarukānaṃ āmise upakkhalitānaṃ atītakāle
atk-s0201a:513_3: tāva kapilassa bhikkhuno, “saṅghāṭipi ādittā hotī”tiādinā nayena āgatapāpabhikkhubhikkhunīsikkhamānādīnañca
atk-s0201a:513_4: anekasatānaṃ apāyaparipūraṇattaṃ attano sāsane pabbajitānañca devadattādīnaṃ. Dhammagarukānaṃ
atk-s0201a:513_6: tesaṃ apāyā parimuttiṃ sabbaguṇasampattiñca icchanto āha – “atthi me tumhesu anukampā
atk-s0201a:513_7: kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā”ti. Paccayagaruko ca catuparisantare
atk-s0201a:513_8: kūṭakahāpaṇo viya nibbutaṅgāro viya ca nittejo nippabho hoti. Tato vivattitacitto
atk-s0201a:513_9: dhammagaruko tejavā sīhova abhibhuyyacārī, tasmāpi evamāha – “atthi me…pe… no āmisadāyādā”ti.
atk-s0201a:514_0: Evaṃ “dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā”ti idaṃ anukampāya paṇītataraṃ
atk-s0201a:514_1: lābhaṃ icchantena vuttaṃ, no alābhatthikenāti sāvetvā idāni imassa ovādassa akaraṇe
atk-s0201a:514_2: ādīnavaṃ dassento āha “tumhe ca me, bhikkhave…pe… no dhammadāyādā”ti. Tattha tumhepi
atk-s0201a:514_3: tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthāti tumhepi tena āmisadāyādabhāvena no dhammadāyādabhāvena ādiyā
atk-s0201a:514_4: bhaveyyātha. Apadisitabbā visuṃ kātabbā vavatthapetabbā, viññūhi gārayhā bhaveyyāthāti
atk-s0201a:514_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Kinti? Āmisadāyādā satthusāvakā viharanti, no dhammadāyādāti.
atk-s0201a:515_0: Ahampi tena ādiyo bhaveyyanti ahampi tena tumhākaṃ āmisadāyādabhāvena no dhammadāyādabhāvena
atk-s0201a:515_1: gārayho bhaveyyaṃ. Kinti? Āmisa…pe… dāyādāti. Idaṃ bhagavā tesaṃ atīva mudukaraṇatthamāha.
atk-s0201a:515_2: Ayañhi ettha adhippāyo – sace, bhikkhave, tumhe āmisalolā carissatha, tattha viññū
atk-s0201a:515_3: maṃ garahissanti “kathañhi nāma sabbaññū samāno attano sāvake dhammadāyāde no āmisadāyāde
atk-s0201a:515_4: kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti. Seyyathāpi nāma anākappasampanne bhikkhū disvā ācariyupajjhāye
atk-s0201a:515_5: garahanti “kassime saddhivihārikā, kassantevāsikā”ti; seyyathā vā pana kulakumārake
atk-s0201a:515_6: vā kulakumārikāyo vā dussīle pāpadhamme disvā mātāpitaro garahanti “kassime puttā,
atk-s0201a:515_7: kassa dhītaro”ti; evameva maṃ viññū garahissanti “kathañhi nāma sabbaññū samāno attano
atk-s0201a:515_8: sāvake dhammadāyāde no āmisadāyāde kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:516_0: Evaṃ imassa ovādassa akaraṇe ādīnavaṃ dassetvā karaṇe ānisaṃsaṃ dassento tumhe ca
atk-s0201a:516_1: metiādimāha. Tattha ahampi tena na ādiyo bhaveyyanti seyyathāpi nāma vattaparipūrake
atk-s0201a:516_2: daharabhikkhū uddesaparipucchāsampanne vassasatikatthere viya ākappasampanne disvā,
atk-s0201a:516_3: kassa saddhivihārikā, kassantevāsikāti, asukassāti, “patirūpaṃ therassa, paṭibalo
atk-s0201a:516_4: vata ovadituṃ anusāsitu”nti ācariyupajjhāyā na ādiyā na gārayhā bhavanti, evameva
atk-s0201a:516_5: ahampi tena tumhākaṃ dhammadāyādabhāvena no āmisadāyādabhāvena kassa sāvakā nālakapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0201a:516_8: paccayagedhato vivattamānasā abbhā muttacandasamā viharantīti; “samaṇassa gotamassā”ti
atk-s0201a:516_9: vutte “sabbaññū vata bhagavā, asakkhi vata sāvake āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā
atk-s0201a:516_10: dhammadāyādapaṭipattipūrake kātu”nti viññūnaṃ na ādiyo na gārayho bhaveyyanti. Evamimasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:516_11: pade adhippāyaṃ ñatvā sesaṃ kaṇhapakkhe vuttanayapaccanīkena veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ imassa
atk-s0201a:516_12: ovādassa karaṇe ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ ovādaṃ niyyātento āha – “tasmā tiha
atk-s0201a:517_0: 30. Evamimaṃ ovādaṃ niyyātetvā idāni tassā dhammadāyādapaṭipattiyā paripūrakāriṃ
atk-s0201a:517_1: thometuṃ idhāhaṃ, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Bhagavato hi thomanaṃ sutvāpi hontiyeva tadatthāya paṭipajjitāro.
atk-s0201a:518_0: Tattha idhāti nipātapadametaṃ. Bhuttāvīti bhuttavā, katabhattakiccoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:518_1: Pavāritoti yāvadatthapavāraṇāya pavārito, yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā paṭikkhittabhojano
atk-s0201a:518_2: tittovāti vuttaṃ hoti. Catubbidhā hi pavāraṇā vassaṃvuṭṭhapavāraṇā paccayapavāraṇā
atk-s0201a:518_4: bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretu”nti ayaṃ vassaṃvuṭṭhapavāraṇā. “Icchāmahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:518_5: saṅghaṃ catumāsaṃ bhesajjena pavāretu”nti ca “aññatra punapavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāyā”ti
atk-s0201a:518_6: ca ayaṃ paccayapavāraṇā. “Pavārito nāma asanaṃ paññāyati, bhojanaṃ paññāyati, hatthapāse
atk-s0201a:518_7: ṭhito abhiharati, paṭikkhepo paññāyati, eso pavārito nāmā”ti ayaṃ anatirittapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a:518_8: “Paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresī”ti ayaṃ yāvadatthapavāraṇā.
atk-s0201a:518_9: Ayamidha adhippetā. Tena vuttaṃ “pavāritoti yāvadatthapavāraṇāya pavārito”ti.
atk-s0201a:519_0: Paripuṇṇoti bhojanena paripuṇṇo. Pariyositoti pariyositabhojano, uttarapadalopo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:519_1: Yāvatakaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ, tāvatakaṃ bhuttaṃ hoti, avasitā me bhojanakiriyāti attho.
atk-s0201a:519_2: Suhitoti dhāto, jighacchādukkhābhāvena vā sukhitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yāvadatthoti yāvatako
atk-s0201a:519_3: me bhojanena attho, so sabbo pattoti. Ettha ca purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pacchimāni sādhakāni.
atk-s0201a:519_4: Yo hi pariyosito, so bhuttāvī hoti. Yo ca suhito, so yāvadatthapavāraṇāya pavārito.
atk-s0201a:519_5: Yo yāvadattho, so paripuṇṇoti. Purimāni vā pacchimānaṃ. Yasmā hi bhuttāvī, tasmā
atk-s0201a:519_6: pariyosito. Yasmā pavārito, tasmā suhito. Yasmā paripuṇṇo, tasmā yāvadatthoti. Sabbañcetaṃ
atk-s0201a:520_0: Siyāti ekaṃse ca vikappane ca. “Pathavīdhātu siyā ajjhattikā, siyā bāhirā”ti ekaṃse.
atk-s0201a:520_1: “Siyā aññatarassa bhikkhuno āpatti vītikkamo”ti vikappane. Idha ubhayampi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:520_2: Atirekova atirekadhammo. Tathā chaḍḍanīya dhammo. Adhiko ca chaḍḍetabbo ca, na aññaṃ
atk-s0201a:520_3: kiñci kātabboti attho. Athāti tamhi kāle. Jighacchādubbalyaparetāti jighacchāya ca
atk-s0201a:520_4: dubbalyena ca paretā phuṭṭhā anugatā ca aṭṭhapi dasapi divasāni. Tattha keci jighacchitāpi
atk-s0201a:520_5: na dubbalā honti, sakkonti jighacchaṃ sahituṃ. Ime pana na tādisāti dassetuṃ ubhayamāha.
atk-s0201a:520_6: Tyāhanti te ahaṃ. Sace ākaṅkhathāti yadi icchatha.
atk-s0201a:521_0: Appahariteti apparuḷhaharite, yasmiṃ ṭhāne piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena vinassanadhammāni
atk-s0201a:521_1: tiṇāni natthi, tasminti attho. Tena nittiṇañca mahātiṇagahanaṃ ca, yattha sakaṭenapi
atk-s0201a:521_2: chaḍḍite piṇḍapāte tiṇāni na vinassanti, tañca ṭhānaṃ pariggahitaṃ hoti. Bhūtagāmasikkhāpadassa
atk-s0201a:522_0: Appāṇaketi nippāṇake piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena maritabbapāṇakarahite vā mahāudakakkhandhe.
atk-s0201a:522_1: Parittodake eva hi bhattapakkhepena āḷulite sukhumapāṇakā maranti, na mahātaḷākādīsūti.
atk-s0201a:523_0: Tatrekassāti tesu dvīsu ekassa. Yo imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ suṭṭhu sutavā punappunaṃ āvajjeti
atk-s0201a:523_1: ca, taṃ sandhāyāha vuttaṃ kho panetanti. Ayaṃ vutta-saddo kesohāraṇepi dissati “kāpaṭiko
atk-s0201a:523_2: māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu. Ropitepi “yathā sāradikaṃ bījaṃ, khette vuttaṃ virūhatī”tiādīsu.
atk-s0201a:523_3: Kathitepi “vuttamidaṃ bhagavatā, vuttamidaṃ arahatā”tiādīsu. Idha pana kathite daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:523_4: Kathitaṃ kho panetanti ayañhissa attho. Āmisaññataranti catunnaṃ paccayāmisānaṃ aññataraṃ,
atk-s0201a:523_5: ekanti attho. Yadidanti nipāto, sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanesu tādisova tattha tattha
atk-s0201a:523_6: atthato pariṇāmetabbo. Idha panāssa yo esoti attho. Yo eso piṇḍapāto nāma. Idaṃ āmisaññataranti
atk-s0201a:523_7: vuttaṃ hoti. Yaṃnūnāhanti sādhu vatāhaṃ. Evanti yathā idāni imaṃ khaṇaṃ vītināmemi,
atk-s0201a:524_0: So taṃ piṇḍapātanti so taṃ sadevakena lokena sirasā sampaṭicchitabbarūpaṃ sugatātirittampi
atk-s0201a:524_1: piṇḍapātaṃ abhuñjitvā dhammadāyādabhāvaṃ ākaṅkhamāno ādittasīsūpamaṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0201a:524_2: teneva jighacchādubbalyena evaṃ taṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyya.
atk-s0201a:525_0: Atha dutiyassāti imasmiṃ pana vāre esa saṅkhepo, sace so bhikkhu, yaṃnūnāhaṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a:525_1: vītināmeyyanti cintento evampi cinteyya, pabbajitena kho vāḷamigākule araññe bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0201a:525_2: viya pañcakāmaguṇavāḷākule gāme piṇḍapātopi dukkhaṃ pariyesituṃ. Ayaṃ pana piṇḍapāto
atk-s0201a:525_3: iti pariyesanādīnavavimutto ca sugatātiritto cāti ubhato sujātakhattiyakumāro viya
atk-s0201a:525_4: hoti, yehi ca pañcahi kāraṇehi piṇḍapāto na paribhuñjitabbo hoti. Seyyathidaṃ, puggalaṃ
atk-s0201a:525_5: garahitvā na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “alajjipuggalassa santako”ti. Aparisuddhauppattitāya
atk-s0201a:525_7: na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “piṇḍapātasāmiko bhikkhu jighacchito”ti. So dhāto tasseva
atk-s0201a:525_8: antevāsikādīsu anukampāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti “antevāsikā aññe vā tappaṭibaddhā
atk-s0201a:525_9: jighacchitā”ti, tepi dhātā suhitā, apica kho assaddhatāya na paribhuñjitabbo hoti
atk-s0201a:525_10: “piṇḍapātasāmiko bhikkhu assaddho”ti. Tehi ca kāraṇehi ayaṃ vimutto. Bhagavā hi lajjīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:525_11: aggo, parisuddhuppattiko piṇḍapāto, bhagavā ca dhāto suhito, paccāsīsakopi añño puggalo
atk-s0201a:525_12: natthi, ye loke saddhā, bhagavā tesaṃ aggoti evaṃ cintetvā ca so taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā…pe…
atk-s0201a:525_13: vītināmeyya. Ettāvatā yopi abhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti, sopi bhuñjitabbakameva
atk-s0201a:525_14: piṇḍapātaṃ na bhutto hoti. Yopi bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti, sopi bhuñjitabbakameva
atk-s0201a:525_15: bhutto hoti. Natthi piṇḍapāte viseso. Puggale pana atthi viseso. Tasmā taṃ dassento
atk-s0201a:526_0: Tattha kiñcāpīti anujānanappasaṃsanatthe nipāto. Kiṃ anujānāti? Tassa bhikkhuno taṃ
atk-s0201a:526_1: anavajjaparibhogaṃ. Kiṃ pasaṃsati? Bhutvā samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yadipi
atk-s0201a:526_2: so bhikkhu evaṃ bhuñjitabbameva bhuñjitvā kātabbameva kareyya. Atha kho asuyeva me
atk-s0201a:526_3: purimo bhikkhūti yo purimo bhikkhu tampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:526_4: soyeva mama dvīsu sūresu sūrataro viya dvīsu paṇḍitesu paṇḍitataro viya ca pujjataro
atk-s0201a:526_5: ca pāsaṃsataro ca, dutiyabhikkhuto atirekena pūjanīyo ca pasaṃsanīyo cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:527_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ kāraṇena sādhento taṃ kissa hetūtiādimāha. Tassattho, tattha siyā
atk-s0201a:527_1: tumhākaṃ, kasmā so bhikkhu bhagavato pujjataro ca pāsaṃsataro cāti? Tañhi tassāti
atk-s0201a:527_2: yasmā taṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkhipanaṃ tassa bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ appicchatāya…pe… vīriyārambhāya
atk-s0201a:527_3: saṃvattissati. Kathaṃ? Tassa hi sace aparena samayena paccayesu atricchatā vā pāpicchatā
atk-s0201a:527_4: vā mahicchatā vā uppajjissati. Tato naṃ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭikkhepaṅkusena nivāressati
atk-s0201a:527_5: “are tvaṃ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā īdisaṃ icchaṃ uppādesī”ti evaṃ
atk-s0201a:527_6: paccavekkhamāno. Esa nayo asantuṭṭhiyā asaṃlekhassa cuppannassa nivāraṇe. Evaṃ tāvassa
atk-s0201a:528_0: Subharatāyāti ettha ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā – idhekacco attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi dubbharo
atk-s0201a:528_1: hoti dupposo. Ekacco attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi subharo hoti suposo. Kathaṃ? Yo hi ambilādīni
atk-s0201a:528_2: laddhā anambilādīni pariyesati, aññassa ghare laddhaṃ aññassa ghare chaḍḍento sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:528_3: gāmaṃ vicaritvā rittapattova vihāraṃ pavisitvā nipajjati, ayaṃ attano dubbharo. Yo
atk-s0201a:528_4: pana sālimaṃsodanādīnaṃ patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṃ anattamanabhāvameva
atk-s0201a:528_5: ca dasseti, tesaṃ vā sammukhāva taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ “kiṃ tumhehi dinna”nti apasādento
atk-s0201a:528_6: sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnampi deti, ayaṃ upaṭṭhākānaṃ dubbharo. Etaṃ disvā manussā dūrato
atk-s0201a:528_7: parivajjanti dubbharo bhikkhu na sakkā positunti. Yo pana yaṃkiñci lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ
atk-s0201a:528_8: vā laddhā tuṭṭhacittova bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā attano kammaṃ karoti, ayaṃ attano
atk-s0201a:528_9: subharo. Yo ca paresampi appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā dānaṃ ahīḷetvā attamano
atk-s0201a:528_10: vippasannamukho hutvā tesaṃ sammukhāva paribhuñjitvā yāti, ayaṃ upaṭṭhākānaṃ subharo.
atk-s0201a:528_11: Etaṃ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti – “amhākaṃ bhadanto subharo thokenapi
atk-s0201a:528_12: tussati, mayameva naṃ posissāmā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā posenti.
atk-s0201a:529_0: Tattha sace aparena samayena assa attano vā upaṭṭhākānaṃ vā dubbharatānayena cittaṃ
atk-s0201a:529_1: uppajjissati. Tato naṃ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭikkhepaṅkusena nivāressati – “are tvaṃ sugatātirittampi
atk-s0201a:529_2: piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā īdisaṃ cittaṃ uppādesī”ti evaṃ paccavekkhamāno, evamassa
atk-s0201a:529_3: subharatāya saṃvattissati. Sace panassa kosajjaṃ uppajjissati, tampi etenevaṅkusena
atk-s0201a:529_4: nivāressati – “are tvaṃ nāma tadā sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tathā
atk-s0201a:529_5: jighacchādubbalyaparetopi samaṇadhammaṃ katvā ajja kosajjamanuyuñjasī”ti evaṃ paccavekkhamāno,
atk-s0201a:529_6: evamassa vīriyārambhāya saṃvattissati. Evamassa idaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkhipanaṃ dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0201a:529_7: appicchatāya…pe… vīriyārambhāya saṃvattissati. Evamassime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa
atk-s0201a:530_0: Kathaṃ? Atra hi pāḷiyaṃyeva appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāvīriyārambhavasena tīṇi āgatāni,
atk-s0201a:530_1: sesāni sallekhena saṅgahitāni. Idañhi sabbakathāvatthūnaṃ nāmameva, yadidaṃ sallekho.
atk-s0201a:530_2: Yathāha – “yā ca kho ayaṃ, ānanda, kathā abhisallekhikā cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya
atk-s0201a:530_3: virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. Seyyathidaṃ,
atk-s0201a:530_4: appicchakathā”ti vitthāro. Evaṃ ime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthūni paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:530_5: Dasa kathāvatthūni paripūrāni tisso sikkhā paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:531_0: Kathaṃ? Etesu hi appicchakathā santosakathā asaṃsaggakathā sīlakathāti imā catasso
atk-s0201a:531_2: imā tisso adhicittasikkhasaṅgahitā. Paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathāti
atk-s0201a:531_3: imā tisso adhipaññāsikkhāsaṅgahitāti. Evaṃ dasa kathāvatthūni paripūrāni tisso sikkhā
atk-s0201a:531_4: paripūressanti. Tisso sikkhā paripūrā pañca asekkhadhammakkhandhe paripūressanti.
atk-s0201a:532_0: Kathaṃ? Paripūrā hi adhisīlasikkhā asekkho sīlakkhandhoyeva hoti, adhicittasikkhā
atk-s0201a:532_2: evāti evaṃ tisso sikkhā paripūrā pañca asekkhadhammakkhandhe paripūressanti. Pañca
atk-s0201a:532_3: dhammakkhandhā paripūrā amataṃ nibbānaṃ paripūressanti. Seyyathāpi uparipabbate pāvussako
atk-s0201a:532_4: mahāmegho abhivuṭṭho pabbatakandarasarasākhā paripūreti. Tā paripūrā kusobbhe, kusobbhā
atk-s0201a:532_5: mahāsobbhe, mahāsobbhā kunnadiyo, kunnadiyo mahānadiyo, mahānadiyo mahāsamuddasāgaraṃ
atk-s0201a:532_6: paripūrenti; evameva tassa bhikkhuno ime pañca guṇā paripūrā dasa kathāvatthuni ādiṃ
atk-s0201a:532_7: katvā yāva amataṃ nibbānaṃ paripūressanti. Evamayaṃ bhikkhu dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0201a:532_8: paṭipanno paramadhammadāyādaṃ labhatīti etamatthaṃ sampassamāno bhagavā “taṃ kissa
atk-s0201a:533_0: Evaṃ tassa bhikkhuno pujjatarapāsaṃsatarabhāvaṃ kāraṇena sādhetvā idāni te bhikkhū
atk-s0201a:533_1: tathattāya sanniyojento tasmā tiha me bhikkhavetiādimāha. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti, yasmā
atk-s0201a:533_2: yo taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kareyya, so imehi pañcahi mūlaguṇehi paribāhiro.
atk-s0201a:533_3: Yo pana abhuñjitvā kareyya, so imesaṃ bhāgī hoti – “tasmā tiha me, bhikkhave…pe… no āmisadāyādā”ti.
atk-s0201a:534_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ nidānapariyosānato pabhuti yāva no āmisadāyādāti suttappadesaṃ
atk-s0201a:534_1: bhagavā avoca. Idaṃ vatvāna sugatoti idañca suttappadesaṃ vatvāva sobhanāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0201a:534_2: gatattā sugatoti saṅkhaṃ pattoyeva bhagavā. Uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisī paññattavarabuddhāsanato
atk-s0201a:534_3: uṭṭhahitvā vihāraṃ attano mahāgandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi asambhinnāya eva parisāya. Kasmā dhammathomanatthaṃ.
atk-s0201a:535_0: Buddhā kira apariniṭṭhitāya desanāya vihāraṃ pavisantā dvīhi kāraṇehi pavisanti puggalathomanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:535_1: vā dhammathomanatthaṃ vā. Puggalathomanatthaṃ pavisanto evaṃ cintesi – “imaṃ mayā
atk-s0201a:535_2: saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ, vitthārena avibhattaṃ, dhammapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū uggahetvā
atk-s0201a:535_3: ānandaṃ vā kaccānaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pucchissanti, te mayhaṃ ñāṇena saṃsandetvā kathessanti,
atk-s0201a:535_4: tato dhammapaṭiggāhakā puna maṃ pucchissanti, tesaṃ ahaṃ sukathitaṃ, bhikkhave, ānandena
atk-s0201a:535_5: sukathitaṃ kaccānena, maṃ cepi tumhe etamatthaṃ puccheyyātha, ahampi naṃ evameva
atk-s0201a:535_6: byākareyyanti evaṃ te puggale thomessāmi, tato tesu gāravaṃ janetvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamissanti,
atk-s0201a:535_7: tepi bhikkhū atthe ca dhamme ca niyojessanti, te tehi niyojitā tisso sikkhā paripūrentā
atk-s0201a:536_0: Dhammathomanatthaṃ pavisanto evaṃ cintesi, yathā idheva cintesi – “mayi vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe
atk-s0201a:536_1: tameva āmisadāyādaṃ garahanto dhammadāyādañca thomento imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno
atk-s0201a:536_2: sāriputto dhammaṃ desessati, evaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ ekajjhāsayāya matiyā desitā ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:536_3: desanā aggā ca garukā ca bhavissati pāsāṇacchattasadisā. Caturoghanittharaṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:536_4: titthe ṭhapitā nāvā viya maggagamanaṭṭhena catuyuttaājaññaratho viya ca bhavissati.
atk-s0201a:536_5: Yathā ca ‘evaṃ karontassa ayaṃ daṇḍo’ti parisati āṇaṃ ṭhapetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pāsādaṃ
atk-s0201a:536_6: āruḷhe rājini tattheva nisinno senāpati taṃ raññā ṭhapitaṃ āṇaṃ pavatteti; evampi
atk-s0201a:536_7: mayā ṭhapitaṃ desanaṃ imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno sāriputto thometvā desessati,
atk-s0201a:536_8: evaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ matiyā desitā ayaṃ desanā balavatarā majjhanhikasūriyo viya
atk-s0201a:536_9: pajjalissatī”ti. Evamidha dhammathomanatthaṃ uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0201a:537_0: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu bhagavā nisinnāsaneyeva antarahito cittagatiyā vihāraṃ pavisatīti
atk-s0201a:537_1: veditabbo. Yadi hi kāyagatiyā gaccheyya, sabbā parisā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā gaccheyya,
atk-s0201a:537_2: sā ekavāraṃ bhinnā puna dussannipātā bhaveyyāti bhagavā cittagatiyā eva pāvisi.
atk-s0201a:538_0: 31. Evaṃ paviṭṭhe pana bhagavati bhagavato adhippāyānurūpaṃ taṃ dhammaṃ thometukāmo
atk-s0201a:538_1: tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto…pe…etadavoca. Tattha āyasmāti piyavacanametaṃ. Sāriputtoti
atk-s0201a:538_2: tassa therassa nāmaṃ, tañca kho mātito, na pitito. Rūpasāriyā hi brāhmaṇiyā so putto,
atk-s0201a:538_3: tasmā sāriputtoti vuccati. Acirapakkantassāti pakkantassa sato nacirena. Āvuso, bhikkhaveti
atk-s0201a:538_4: ettha pana buddhā bhagavanto sāvake ālapantā bhikkhaveti ālapanti. Sāvakā pana buddhehi
atk-s0201a:538_5: sadisā mā homāti āvusoti paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā bhikkhaveti bhaṇanti. Buddhehi ca
atk-s0201a:538_6: ālapito bhikkhusaṅgho bhadanteti paṭivacanaṃ deti, sāvakehi āvusoti.
atk-s0201a:539_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, āvusoti ettha kittāvatāti paricchedavacanaṃ, kittakenāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:539_1: hoti. Nukāro pucchāyaṃ. Khokāro nipātamattaṃ. Satthu pavivittassa viharatoti, tīhi
atk-s0201a:539_2: vivekehi kāyacittaupadhivivekehi satthuno viharantassa. Vivekaṃ nānusikkhantīti tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:539_3: vivekānaṃ aññatarampi nānusikkhanti, āmisadāyādāva hontīti imamatthaṃ āyasmā sāriputto
atk-s0201a:540_0: Evaṃ vutte tamatthaṃ sotukāmā bhikkhū dūratopi khotiādimāhaṃsu. Tattha dūratopīti
atk-s0201a:540_1: tiroraṭṭhatopi tirojanapadatopi anekayojanagaṇanatopīti vuttaṃ hoti. Santiketi samīpe.
atk-s0201a:540_2: Aññātunti jānituṃ bujjhituṃ. Āyasmantaṃyeva sāriputtaṃ paṭibhātūti āyasmatoyeva sāriputtassa
atk-s0201a:540_3: bhāgo hotu, āyasmā pana sāriputto attano bhāgaṃ katvā vibhajatūti vuttaṃ hoti. Āyasmato
atk-s0201a:540_4: hi bhāgo yadidaṃ atthakkhānaṃ, amhākaṃ pana savanaṃ bhāgoti ayamettha adhippāyo,
atk-s0201a:540_5: evaṃ saddalakkhaṇena sameti. Keci pana bhaṇanti “paṭibhātūti dissatū”ti. Apare “upaṭṭhātū”ti.
atk-s0201a:540_6: Dhāressantīti uggahessanti pariyāpuṇissanti. Tato nesaṃ kathetukāmo thero tena hītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:540_7: Tattha tenāti kāraṇavacanaṃ. Hikāro nipāto. Yasmā sotukāmāttha, yasmā ca mayhaṃ bhāraṃ
atk-s0201a:540_8: āropayittha, tasmā suṇāthāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tepi bhikkhū therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:541_0: Atha nesaṃ, āmisadāyādaṃ garahantena bhagavatā “tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthā”ti
atk-s0201a:541_1: ekenevākārena vuttamatthaṃ tīhi ākārehi dassento āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca – “idhāvuso,
atk-s0201a:541_2: satthu pavivittassa viharato…pe… ettāvatā kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato
atk-s0201a:542_0: Ettāvatā yañca bhagavā āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṃ garahanto “tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyāthā”ti
atk-s0201a:542_1: āha, yañca attanā pucchaṃ pucchi “kittāvatā nu kho…pe… nānusikkhantī”ti, tassa vitthārato
atk-s0201a:542_2: attho suvibhatto hoti. So ca kho bhagavato ādiyabhāvaṃ anāmasitvāva. Bhagavatoyeva
atk-s0201a:542_3: hi yuttaṃ sāvake anuggaṇhantassa “ahampi tena ādiyo bhavissāmī”ti vattuṃ, na sāvakānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:542_4: Esa nayo sukkapakkhepi, ayaṃ tāvettha anusandhikkamayojanā.
atk-s0201a:543_0: Ayaṃ panatthavaṇṇanā idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane, satthu pavivittassāti satthuno tīhi vivekehi
atk-s0201a:543_1: accantapavivittassa. Vivekaṃ nānusikkhantīti kāyavivekaṃ nānusikkhanti, na paripūrentīti
atk-s0201a:543_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Yadi pana tividhaṃ vivekaṃ sandhāya vadeyya, pucchāya aviseso siyā.
atk-s0201a:543_3: Byākaraṇapakkho hi ayaṃ. Tasmā iminā padena kāyavivekaṃ, “yesañca dhammāna”ntiādinā
atk-s0201a:543_4: cittavivekaṃ, “bāhulikā”tiādinā upadhivivekañca dassetīti evamettha saṅkhepato attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:544_0: Yesañca dhammānanti lobhādayo sandhāyāha, ye parato “tatrāvuso lobho ca pāpako”tiādinā
atk-s0201a:544_1: nayena vakkhati. Nappajahantīti na pariccajanti, cittavivekaṃ na paripūrentīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:544_2: hoti. Bāhulikāti cīvarādibāhullāya paṭipannā. Sāsanaṃ sithilaṃ gaṇhantīti sāthalikā.
atk-s0201a:544_3: Okkamane pubbaṅgamāti ettha okkamanaṃ vuccanti avagamanaṭṭhena pañca nīvaraṇāni,
atk-s0201a:544_4: tena pañcanīvaraṇapubbaṅgamāti vuttaṃ hoti. Paviveketi upadhiviveke nibbāne. Nikkhittadhurāti
atk-s0201a:544_5: oropitadhurā, tadadhigamāya ārambhampi akurumānāti, ettāvatā upadhivivekaṃ na paripūrentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:545_0: Ettāvatā aniyameneva vatvā idāni desanaṃ niyamento “tatrāvuso”tiādimāha. Kasmā? Sāvakā
atk-s0201a:545_1: “tīhi ṭhānehī”ti evañhi aniyametvāva vuccamāne “kampi maññe bhaṇati, na amhe”ti udāsināpi
atk-s0201a:545_2: honti. “Therā navā majjhimā”ti evaṃ pana niyametvā vuccamāne amhe bhaṇatīti ādaraṃ
atk-s0201a:545_3: karonti. Yathā raññā “amaccehi nagaravīthiyo sodhetabbā”ti vuttepi “kena nu kho sodhetabbā”ti
atk-s0201a:545_4: maññamānā na sodhenti, attano attano gharadvāraṃ sodhetabbanti pana bheriyā nikkhantāya
atk-s0201a:545_5: sabbe muhuttena sodhenti ca alaṅkaronti ca, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:546_0: Tattha tatrāti tesu sāvakesu. Therāti dasavasse upādāya vuccanti. Tīhi ṭhānehīti
atk-s0201a:546_1: tīhi kāraṇehi. Ayañhi ṭhānasaddo issariyaṭṭhitikhaṇakāraṇesu dissati. “Kiṃ panāyasmā
atk-s0201a:546_2: devānamindo kammaṃ katvā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto”tiādīsu hi issariye dissati. “Ṭhānakusalo
atk-s0201a:546_3: hoti akkhaṇavedhī”tiādīsu ṭhitiyaṃ. “Ṭhānasovetaṃ tathāgataṃ paṭibhātī”tiādīsu khaṇe.
atk-s0201a:546_4: “Ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato”tiādīsu kāraṇe. Idha pana kāraṇeyeva. Kāraṇañhi
atk-s0201a:546_5: yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttibhāvena, tasmā ṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:547_0: Iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhāti ettha gārayhāti garahitabbā. Therā
atk-s0201a:547_1: nāma samānā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni na upenti, gāmantasenāsanaṃ na
atk-s0201a:547_2: muñcanti, saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ vaḍḍhentā viharanti, kāyavivekampi na paripūrenti, navamajjhimakāle
atk-s0201a:547_3: kīdisā ahesunti evaṃ ninditabbā honti, imaṃ nindaṃ āvuso labhantīti dasseti. Dutiyena
atk-s0201a:547_4: ṭhānenāti etthāpi ime nāma āvuso therāpi samānā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha,
atk-s0201a:547_5: te lobhādidhamme na jahanti, accharāsaṅghātamattampi ekamantaṃ nisīditvā cittekaggataṃ
atk-s0201a:547_6: na labhanti, navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṃ ninditabbā honti, imaṃ nindaṃ
atk-s0201a:547_7: āvuso labhantīti dassetīti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā. Tatiyena ṭhānenāti etthāpi ime nāmāvuso,
atk-s0201a:547_9: viharanti upadhivivekaṃ apūrayamānā, navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti evaṃ ninditabbā
atk-s0201a:547_10: honti, imaṃ nindaṃ, āvuso, labhantīti dassetīti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Esa nayo majjhimanavavāresu.
atk-s0201a:548_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso. Majjhimāti pañcavasse upādāya yāva nava vassā vuccanti. Navāti
atk-s0201a:548_1: ūnapañcavassā vuccanti. Yathā ca tattha navamajjhimakāle kīdisā ahesunti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a:548_2: evamidha navakāle kīdisā ahesuṃ, therakāle kīdisā bhavissanti, majjhimatherakāle
atk-s0201a:549_0: 32. Imasmiñca kaṇhapakkhe vuttapaccanīkanayena sukkapakkhe attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:549_1: panettha saṅkhepo. Ime vata therāpi samānā yojanaparamparāya araññavanapatthāni pantāni
atk-s0201a:549_2: senāsanāni sevanti, gāmantasenāsanaṃ upagantuṃ yuttakālepi na upagacchanti, evaṃ
atk-s0201a:549_3: jiṇṇasarīrāpi āraddhavīriyā paccayadāyakānaṃ pasādaṃ janenti, navamajjhimakāle kīdisā
atk-s0201a:549_4: ahesunti iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā pāsaṃsā bhavanti, pasaṃsaṃ labhanti. Lobhādayo
atk-s0201a:549_5: pahāya cittavivekaṃ pūrenti, ayampi mahāthero saddhivihārikaantevāsikaparivārito
atk-s0201a:549_6: hutvā nisīdituṃ yuttakālepi īdisepi vaye vattamāne bhattakiccaṃ katvā paviṭṭho sāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:549_7: nikkhamati, sāyaṃ paviṭṭho pāto nikkhamati, kasiṇaparikammaṃ karoti, samāpattiyo
atk-s0201a:549_8: nibbatteti, maggaphalāni adhigacchati, sabbathāpi cittavivekaṃ pūretīti iminā dutiyena
atk-s0201a:549_9: ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti, pasaṃsaṃ labhanti. Yasmiṃ kāle therassa paṭṭadukūlakoseyyādīni
atk-s0201a:549_10: sukhasamphassāni lahucīvarādīni yuttāni, tasmimpi nāma kāle ayaṃ mahāthero paṃsukūlāni
atk-s0201a:549_11: dhāreti, asithilaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā vigatanīvaraṇo phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā upadhivivekaṃ
atk-s0201a:549_12: paripūrayamāno viharati, navamajjhimakāle kīdiso ahosīti iminā tatiyena ṭhānena therā
atk-s0201a:549_13: pāsaṃsā bhavanti, pasaṃsaṃ labhantīti. Esa nayo majjhimanavavāresu.
atk-s0201a:550_0: 33. Tatrāvusoti ko anusandhi, evaṃ navahākārehi āmisadāyādapaṭipadaṃ garahanto, navahi
atk-s0201a:550_1: dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṃ thomento, aṭṭhārasahākārehi desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā, ye te “yesañca
atk-s0201a:550_2: dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha, te ca dhamme na pajahantī”ti evaṃ pahātabbadhammā vuttā.
atk-s0201a:550_3: Te sarūpato “ime te”ti dassetumidaṃ “tatrāvuso, lobho cā”tiādimāha, ayaṃ anusandhi.
atk-s0201a:551: Apica heṭṭhā pariyāyeneva dhammo kathito. Āmisaṃ pana pariyāyenapi nippariyāyenapi kathitaṃ. Idāni nippariyāyadhammaṃ lokuttaramaggaṃ kathetumidamāha. Ayaṃ pettha anusandhi.
atk-s0201a:552_0: Tattha tatrāti atītadesanānidassanaṃ, “satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ
atk-s0201a:552_1: nānusikkhantī”tiādinā nayena vuttadesanāyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Lobho ca pāpako, doso
atk-s0201a:552_2: ca pāpakoti ime dve dhammā pāpakā lāmakā, ime pahātabbāti dasseti. Tattha lubbhanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0201a:552_3: lobho. Dussanalakkhaṇo doso. Tesu lobho āmisadāyādassa paccayānaṃ lābhe hoti, doso
atk-s0201a:552_4: alābhe. Lobhena aladdhaṃ pattheti, dosena alabhanto vighātavā hoti. Lobho ca deyyadhamme
atk-s0201a:552_5: hoti, doso adāyake vā amanuññadāyake vā. Lobhena navataṇhāmūlake dhamme paripūreti,
atk-s0201a:553_0: Idāni tesaṃ pahānūpāyaṃ dassento lobhassa ca pahānāyātiādimāha. Tassattho, tassa
atk-s0201a:553_1: pana pāpakassa lobhassa ca dosassa ca pahānāya. Atthi majjhimā paṭipadāti maggaṃ
atk-s0201a:553_2: sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ. Maggo hi lobho eko anto, doso eko antoti ete dve ante na upeti,
atk-s0201a:553_3: na upagacchati, vimutto etehi antehi, tasmā “majjhimā paṭipadā”ti vuccati. Etesaṃ
atk-s0201a:553_4: majjhe bhavattā “majjhimā, paṭipajjitabbato ca paṭipadāti. Tathā kāmasukhallikānuyogo
atk-s0201a:553_5: eko anto, attakilamathānuyogo eko anto, sassataṃ eko anto, ucchedo eko antoti purimanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:554_0: Cakkhukaraṇītiādīhi pana tameva paṭipadaṃ thometi. Sā hi saccānaṃ dassanāya saṃvattati
atk-s0201a:554_1: dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti cakkhukaraṇī. Saccānaṃ ñāṇāya saṃvattati viditakaraṇaṭṭhenāti
atk-s0201a:554_2: ñāṇakaraṇī. Rāgādīnañca vūpasamanato upasamāya saṃvattati. Catunnampi saccānaṃ abhiññeyyabhāvadassanato
atk-s0201a:554_3: abhiññāya saṃvattati. Sambodhoti maggo, tassatthāya saṃvattanato sambodhāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a:554_4: Maggoyeva hi maggatthāya saṃvattati maggena kātabbakiccakaraṇato. Nibbānaṃ nāma appaccayaṃ
atk-s0201a:554_5: tassa pana sacchikiriyāya paccakkhakammāya saṃvattanato nibbānāya saṃvattatīti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:554_6: Ayamettha sāro. Ito aññathā vaṇṇanā papañcā.
atk-s0201a:555: Idāni taṃ majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ sarūpato dassetukāmo “katamā ca sā”ti pucchitvā “ayamevā”tiādinā nayena vissajjeti.
atk-s0201a:556_1: sādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthañca. Vuttañcetaṃ “eseva maggo natthañño dassanassa visuddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:556_2: Svāyaṃ kilesānaṃ ārakattāpi ariyo. Aripahānāya saṃvattatītipi ariyena desitotipi
atk-s0201a:556_3: ariyabhāvappaṭilābhāya saṃvattatītipi ariyo. Aṭṭhahi aṅgehi upetattā aṭṭhaṅgiko,
atk-s0201a:556_4: na ca aṅgavinimutto pañcaṅgikatūriyādīni viya. Kilese mārento gacchati, maggati vā
atk-s0201a:556_5: nibbānaṃ, maggīyati vā nibbānatthikehi, gammati vā tehi paṭipajjīyatīti maggo. Seyyathidanti
atk-s0201a:556_6: nipāto, tassa katamo so iti ceti attho, katamāni vā tāni aṭṭhaṅgānīti. Ekamekañhi
atk-s0201a:556_7: aṅgaṃ maggoyeva. Yathāha “sammādiṭṭhi maggo ceva hetu cā”ti. Porāṇāpi bhaṇanti –
atk-s0201a:557_0: Sammādiṭṭhādīsu cetesu sammā dassanalakkhaṇā sammādiṭṭhi. Sammā abhiniropanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0201a:557_1: sammāsaṅkappo. Sammā pariggahalakkhaṇā sammāvācā. Sammā samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇo sammākammanto.
atk-s0201a:557_2: Sammā vodānalakkhaṇo sammāājīvo. Sammā paggahalakkhaṇo sammāvāyāmo. Sammā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā
atk-s0201a:557_3: sammāsati. Sammā samādhānalakkhaṇo sammāsamādhi. Nibbacanampi nesaṃ sammā passatīti
atk-s0201a:558_0: Tattha sammādiṭṭhi uppajjamānā micchādiṭṭhiṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca avijjañca pajahati,
atk-s0201a:558_1: nibbānañca ārammaṇaṃ karoti, sampayuttadhamme ca passati, te ca kho asammohato, no
atk-s0201a:559: Sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappaṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca pajahati, nibbānañca ārammaṇaṃ karoti, sampayuttadhamme ca sammā abhiniropeti, tasmā “sammāsaṅkappo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:560: Sammāvācā micchāvācaṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca pajahati, nibbānañca ārammaṇaṃ karoti, sampayuttadhamme ca sammā pariggaṇhāti, tasmā “sammāvācā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:561: Sammākammanto micchākammantaṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca pajahati, nibbānañca ārammaṇaṃ karoti, sampayuttadhamme ca sammā samuṭṭhāpeti, tasmā “sammākammanto”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:562: Sammāājīvo micchāājīvaṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca pajahati, nibbānañca ārammaṇaṃ karoti, sampayuttadhamme ca sammā vodāpeti, tasmā “sammāājīvo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:563: Sammāvāyāmo micchāvāyāmaṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca kosajjañca pajahati, nibbānañca ārammaṇaṃ karoti, sampayuttadhamme ca sammā paggaṇhāti, tasmā “sammāvāyāmo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:564: Sammāsati micchāsatiṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca pajahati, nibbānañca ārammaṇaṃ karoti, sampayuttadhamme ca sammā upaṭṭhāpeti, tasmā “sammāsatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:565: Sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhiṃ tappaccanīyakilese ca uddhaccañca pajahati, nibbānañca ārammaṇaṃ karoti, sampayuttadhamme ca sammā samādhiyati, tasmā “sammāsamādhī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:566_0: Idāni ayaṃ kho sā, āvusoti tameva paṭipadaṃ nigamento āha. Tassattho, yvāyaṃ cattāropi
atk-s0201a:566_1: lokuttaramagge ekato katvā kathito “aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”, ayaṃ kho sā, āvuso…pe… nibbānāya saṃvattatīti.
atk-s0201a:567_0: Evaṃ pahātabbadhammesu lobhadose tappahānupāyañca dassetvā idāni aññepi pahātabbadhamme
atk-s0201a:567_1: tesaṃ pahānupāyañca dassento tatrāvuso, kodho cātiādimāha. Tattha kujjhanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0201a:567_2: kodho, caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo vā, āghātakaraṇaraso, dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Upanandhanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0201a:568_1: Yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso, paraguṇehi attano guṇānaṃ samīkaraṇaraso, paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena
atk-s0201a:569_0: Parasampattikhīyanalakkhaṇā issā, tassā akkhamanalakkhaṇā vā, tattha anabhiratirasā,
atk-s0201a:569_1: tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā. Attano sampattinigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ maccheraṃ, attano
atk-s0201a:570_0: Katapāpapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā, tassa nigūhanarasā, tadāvaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā. Attano
atk-s0201a:571: Cittassa uddhumātabhāvalakkhaṇo thambho, appatissayavuttiraso, amaddavatāpaccupaṭṭhāno. Karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo sārambho, vipaccanīkatāraso, agāravapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-s0201a:572: Uṇṇatilakkhaṇo māno, ahaṃkāraraso, uddhumātabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno. Abbhuṇṇatilakkhaṇo atimāno, ativiya ahaṅkāraraso. Accuddhumātabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-s0201a:573_0: Mattabhāvalakkhaṇo mado, madaggāhaṇaraso, ummādapaccupaṭṭhāno. Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
atk-s0201a:573_2: evaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana
atk-s0201a:574_0: Visesato cettha āmisadāyādo attanā alabhanto aññassa lābhino kujjhati, tassa sakiṃ
atk-s0201a:574_1: uppanno kodho kodhoyeva, tatuttari upanāho. So evaṃ kuddho upanayhanto ca santepi
atk-s0201a:574_2: aññassa lābhino guṇe makkheti, ahampi tādisoti ca yugaggāhaṃ gaṇhāti, ayamassa makkho
atk-s0201a:574_3: ca paḷāso ca, evaṃ makkhī paḷāsī tassa lābhasakkārādīsu kiṃ imassa imināti issati
atk-s0201a:574_4: padussati, ayamassa issā. Sace panassa kāci sampatti hoti, tassā tena sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:574_5: na sahati, idamassa maccheraṃ. Lābhahetu kho pana attano santepi dose paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0201a:574_6: ayamassa māyā. Asantepi guṇe pakāseti. Idamassa sāṭheyyaṃ. So evaṃ paṭipanno sace
atk-s0201a:574_7: yathādhippāyaṃ lābhaṃ labhati, tena thaddho hoti amuducitto, nayidaṃ evaṃ kātabbanti
atk-s0201a:574_8: ovadituṃ asakkuṇeyyo, ayamassa thambho. Sace pana naṃ koci kiñci vadati “nayidaṃ
atk-s0201a:574_9: evaṃ kātabba”nti, tena sāraddhacitto hoti bhākuṭikamukho “ko me tva”nti pasayha bhāṇī,
atk-s0201a:574_10: ayamassa sārambho. Tato thambhena “ahameva seyyo”ti attānaṃ maññanto mānī hoti. Sārambhena
atk-s0201a:574_11: “ke ime”ti pare atimaññanto atimānī, ayamassa māno ca atimāno ca. So tehi mānātimānehi
atk-s0201a:574_12: jātimadādianekarūpaṃ madaṃ janeti. Matto samāno kāmaguṇādibhedesu vatthūsu pamajjati,
atk-s0201a:575: Evaṃ āmisadāyādo aparimutto hoti imehi pāpakehi dhammehi aññehi ca evarūpehi. Evaṃ tāvettha pahātabbadhammā veditabbā. Pahānupāyo pāṭhato ca atthato ca sabbattha nibbisesoyeva.
atk-s0201a:576_0: Ñāṇaparicayapāṭavatthaṃ panettha ayaṃ bhedo ca kamo ca bhāvanānayo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:576_1: Tattha bhedo tāva, ayañhi majjhimā paṭipadā kadāci ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti, kadāci
atk-s0201a:576_2: sattaṅgiko. Ayañhi lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānavasena uppajjamāno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti,
atk-s0201a:576_3: avasesajjhānavasena sattaṅgiko. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesato panidha aṭṭhaṅgikoti vutto. Ito
atk-s0201a:576_4: parañhi maggaṅgaṃ natthi. Evaṃ tāvettha bhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:577_0: Yasmā pana sabbakusalānaṃ sammādiṭṭhi seṭṭhā, yathāha “paññā hi seṭṭhā kusalā vadantī”ti.
atk-s0201a:577_1: Kusalavāre ca pubbaṅgamā, yathāha “kathañca, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi pubbaṅgamā hoti,
atk-s0201a:577_2: sammādiṭṭhiṃ sammādiṭṭhīti pajānāti, micchādiṭṭhiṃ micchādiṭṭhīti pajānātī”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0201a:577_3: Yathā cāha “vijjā ca kho, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:577_5: sammāsatissa sammāsamādhi pahotī”ti. Tasmā iminā kamena etāni aṅgāni vuttānīti evamettha kamo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:578_0: Bhāvanānayoti koci samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāveti, koci vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ
atk-s0201a:578_1: samathaṃ. Kathaṃ? Idhekacco paṭhamaṃ upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā uppādeti,
atk-s0201a:578_2: ayaṃ samatho; so tañca taṃsampayutte ca dhamme aniccādīhi vipassati, ayaṃ vipassanā.
atk-s0201a:578_3: Iti paṭhamaṃ samatho, pacchā vipassanā. Tena vuccati “samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ
atk-s0201a:578_4: bhāvetī”ti. Tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati, so taṃ
atk-s0201a:578_5: maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti, tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto
atk-s0201a:578_6: saṃyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti, evaṃ samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāveti.
atk-s0201a:579_0: Idha panekacco vuttappakāraṃ samathaṃ anuppādetvāva pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccādīhi
atk-s0201a:579_1: vipassati, ayaṃ vipassanā. Tassa vipassanāpāripūriyā tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ vossaggārammaṇato
atk-s0201a:579_2: uppajjati cittassa ekaggatā, ayaṃ samatho. Iti paṭhamaṃ vipassanā pacchā samatho.
atk-s0201a:579_3: Tena vuccati “vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvetī”ti. Tassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ
atk-s0201a:579_4: samathaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati, so taṃ maggaṃ āsevati…pe… bahulīkaroti, tassa
atk-s0201a:579_5: taṃ maggaṃ āsevato…pe… anusayā byantīhonti, evaṃ vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāveti.
atk-s0201a:580_0: Samathapubbaṅgamaṃ pana vipassanaṃ bhāvayatopi vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvayatopi
atk-s0201a:580_1: lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe samathavipassanā yuganaddhāva honti. Evamettha bhāvanānayo veditabboti.
atk-s0201a:584_0: 34. Evaṃ me sutanti bhayabheravasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā – athāti avicchedanatthe
atk-s0201a:584_1: nipāto. Khoti avadhāraṇatthe, bhagavato sāvatthiyaṃ vihāre avicchinneyevāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:584_2: hoti. Jāṇussoṇīti netaṃ tassa mātāpitūhi katanāmaṃ, apica kho ṭhānantarapaṭilābhaladdhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:584_3: Jāṇussoṇiṭṭhānaṃ kira nāmetaṃ purohitaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ tassa raññā dinnaṃ, tasmā “jānussoṇī”ti
atk-s0201a:584_4: vuccati. Brahmaṃ aṇatīti brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho. Idameva hi jātibrāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0201a:584_5: niruttivacanaṃ. Ariyā pana bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:585_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti yenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, tasmā yattha bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:585_1: tattha upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi
atk-s0201a:585_2: upasaṅkamitabbo, tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Kena ca kāraṇena
atk-s0201a:586_0: Upasaṅkamīti ca gatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasaṅkamitvāti upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:586_1: Atha vā evaṃ gato tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:586_2: hoti. Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena, evaṃ
atk-s0201a:586_3: sopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi, sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ
atk-s0201a:586_4: ekībhāvaṃ agamāsi. Yāya ca “kacci te, bho gotama, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci
atk-s0201a:586_5: bhoto gotamassa gotamasāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya
atk-s0201a:586_6: kathāya sammodi, taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca
atk-s0201a:586_7: sammodanīyaṃ, atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ
atk-s0201a:586_8: araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sārāṇīyaṃ. Suyyamānasukhato ca sammodanīyaṃ, anussariyamānasukhato
atk-s0201a:586_9: ca sāraṇīyaṃ. Tathā byañjanaparisuddhatāya sammodanīyaṃ, atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti
atk-s0201a:586_10: evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0201a:586_11: yenatthena āgato, taṃ pucchitukāmo ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:587_1: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti, tathā nisīdīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:587_2: Bhummatthe vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Nisīdīti upāvisi. Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ
atk-s0201a:587_3: upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ nisīdanti, ayañca nesaṃ aññataro, tasmā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:588_0: Kathaṃ nisinno pana ekamantaṃ nisinno hotīti. Cha nisajjadose vajjetvā. Seyyathidaṃ,
atk-s0201a:588_1: atidūraṃ accāsannaṃ uparivātaṃ unnatapadesaṃ atisammukhaṃ atipacchāti. Atidūre nisinno
atk-s0201a:588_2: hi sace kathetukāmo hoti, uccāsaddena kathetabbaṃ hoti. Accāsanne nisinno saṅghaṭṭanaṃ
atk-s0201a:588_3: karoti. Uparivāte nisinno sarīragandhena bādhati. Unnatappadese nisinno agāravaṃ
atk-s0201a:588_4: pakāseti. Atisammukhā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, cakkhunā cakkhuṃ āhacca daṭṭhabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:588_5: hoti. Atipacchā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti. Tasmā
atk-s0201a:588_6: ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi, tena vuttaṃ “ekamantaṃ nisīdī”ti.
atk-s0201a:589_0: Yemeti ye ime. Kulaputtāti duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā ācārakulaputtā. Tattha
atk-s0201a:589_1: “tena kho pana samayena raṭṭhapālo nāma kulaputto tasmiṃyeva thullakoṭṭhike aggakulassa
atk-s0201a:589_2: putto”ti evaṃ āgatā uccākulappasutā jātikulaputtā nāma. “Ye te kulaputtā saddhā agārasmā
atk-s0201a:589_3: anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti evaṃ āgatā pana yattha katthaci kule pasutāpi ācārasampannā
atk-s0201a:589_4: ācārakulaputtā nāma. Idha pana dvīhipi kāraṇehi kulaputtāyeva.
atk-s0201a:590_0: Saddhāti saddhāya. Agārasmāti agārato. Anagāriyanti pabbajjaṃ bhikkhubhāvañca. Pabbajjāpi
atk-s0201a:590_1: hi natthettha agāriyanti anagāriyā, agārassa hitaṃ kasigorakkhādikammamettha natthīti
atk-s0201a:590_2: attho. Bhikkhupi natthetassa agāranti anagāro, anagārassa bhāvo anagāriyaṃ. Pabbajitāti
atk-s0201a:590_3: upagatā, evaṃ sabbathāpi anagāriyasaṅkhātaṃ pabbajjaṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ vā upagatāti
atk-s0201a:590_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Pubbaṅgamoti purato gāmī nāyako. Bahukāroti hitakiriyāya bahūpakāro.
atk-s0201a:590_5: Bhavaṃ tesaṃ gotamo samādapetāti te kulaputte bhavaṃ gotamo adhisīlādīni gāhetā sikkhāpetā.
atk-s0201a:590_6: Sā janatāti so janasamūho. Diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjatīti dassanānugatiṃ paṭipajjati, yandiṭṭhiko
atk-s0201a:590_7: bhavaṃ gotamo yaṃkhantiko yaṃruciko, tepi tandiṭṭhikā honti taṃkhantikā taṃrucikāti attho.
atk-s0201a:591_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ evamāhāti? Esa kira pubbe aneke kulaputte agāramajjhe vasante devaputte
atk-s0201a:591_1: viya pañcahi kāmaguṇehi paricāriyamāne anto ca bahi ca susaṃvihitārakkhe disvā, te
atk-s0201a:591_2: aparena samayena bhagavato madhurarasaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saddhāya gharā nikkhamma
atk-s0201a:591_3: pabbajitvā ghāsacchādanaparamatāya santuṭṭhe āraññakesu senāsanesu kenaci arakkhiyamānepi
atk-s0201a:591_4: anussaṅkitāparisaṅkite haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe udaggudagge addasa, disvā ca imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ
atk-s0201a:591_5: “ayaṃ phāsuvihāro kaṃ nissāya uppanno”ti cintento “samaṇaṃ gotama”nti bhagavati pasādaṃ
atk-s0201a:591_6: alattha. So taṃ pasādaṃ nivedetuṃ bhagavato santikaṃ āgato, tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0201a:592_0: Athassa bhagavā taṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchanto abbhanumodanto ca evametaṃ brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:592_1: Vacanasampaṭicchanānumodanatthoyeva hi ettha ayaṃ evanti nipāto. Mamaṃ uddissāti
atk-s0201a:592_2: maṃ uddissa. Saddhāti saddhāyeva. Na iṇaṭṭhā na bhayaṭṭātiādīni sandhāyāha. Īdisānaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:592_3: hi bhagavā pubbaṅgamo, na itaresaṃ. Durabhisambhavāni hīti sambhavituṃ dukkhāni dussahāni,
atk-s0201a:592_4: na sakkā appesakkhehi ajjhogāhitunti vuttaṃ hoti. Araññavanapatthānīti araññāni ca
atk-s0201a:592_5: vanapatthāni ca. Tattha kiñcāpi abhidhamme nippariyāyena, “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhilā
atk-s0201a:592_6: sabbametaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ, tathāpi yantaṃ “pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āraññikaṅganipphādakaṃ
atk-s0201a:593_0: Vanapatthanti gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasīyati
atk-s0201a:593_1: na vapīyati. Vuttampi cetaṃ “vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, vanapatthanti
atk-s0201a:593_2: vanasaṇḍānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ, vanapatthanti bhiṃsanakānametaṃ, vanapatthanti salomahaṃsānametaṃ,
atk-s0201a:593_3: vanapatthanti pariyantānametaṃ, vanapatthanti na manussūpacārānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ
atk-s0201a:593_4: adhivacana”nti. Ettha ca pariyantānanti imamekaṃ pariyāyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesapariyāyehi
atk-s0201a:593_5: vanapatthāni veditabbānī. Pantānīti pariyantāni atidūrāni. Dukkaraṃ pavivekanti kāyavivekaṃ
atk-s0201a:593_6: dukkaraṃ. Durabhiramanti abhiramituṃ na sukhaṃ. Ekatteti ekībhāve. Kiṃ dasseti? Kāyaviveke
atk-s0201a:593_7: katepi tattha cittaṃ abhiramāpetuṃ dukkaraṃ. Dvayaṃdvayārāmo hi ayaṃ lokoti. Haranti
atk-s0201a:593_8: maññeti haranti viya ghasanti viya. Manoti manaṃ. Samādhiṃ alabhamānassāti upacārasamādhiṃ
atk-s0201a:593_9: vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā alabhantassa. Kiṃ dasseti? Īdisassa bhikkhuno tiṇapaṇṇamigādisaddehi
atk-s0201a:593_10: vividhehi ca bhiṃsanakehi vanāni cittaṃ vikkhipanti maññeti, sabbaṃ brāhmaṇo saddhāpabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0201a:595_0: 35. Athassa bhagavā purimanayeneva “evametaṃ brāhmaṇā”tiādīhi taṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0201a:595_1: abbhanumoditvā ca yasmā soḷasasu ṭhānesu ārammaṇapariggaharahitānaṃyeva tādisāni
atk-s0201a:595_2: senāsanāni durabhisambhavāni, na tesu ārammaṇapariggāhayuttānaṃ, attanā ca bodhisatto
atk-s0201a:595_3: samāno tādiso ahosi, tasmā attano tādisānaṃ senāsanānaṃ durabhisambhavataṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:596_0: Tattha pubbeva sambodhāti sambodhato pubbeva, ariyamaggappattito aparabhāgeyevāti
atk-s0201a:596_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Anabhisambuddhassāti appaṭividdhacatusaccassa. Bodhisattasseva satoti
atk-s0201a:596_2: bujjhanakasattasseva sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ arahasattasseva sato, bodhiyā vā sattasseva
atk-s0201a:596_3: laggasseva sato. Dīpaṅkarassa hi bhagavato pādamūle aṭṭhadhammasamodhānena abhinīhārasamiddhito
atk-s0201a:596_4: pabhuti tathāgato bodhiyā satto laggo “pattabbā mayā esā”ti tadadhigamāya parakkamaṃ
atk-s0201a:596_5: amuñcantoyeva āgato, tasmā bodhisattoti vuccati. Tassa mayhanti tassa evaṃ bodhisattasseva
atk-s0201a:596_6: sato mayhaṃ. Ye kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vāti ye keci pabbajjūpagatā vā bhovādino vā.
atk-s0201a:597_2: dosassa hetu, aparisuddhakāyakammantakāraṇāti vuttaṃ hoti. Haveti ekaṃsavacane nipāto.
atk-s0201a:597_3: Akusalanti sāvajjaṃ akkhemañca. Bhayabheravanti bhayañca bheravañca. Cittutrāsassa
atk-s0201a:597_4: ca bhayānakārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tatra bhayaṃ sāvajjaṭṭhena akusalaṃ, bheravaṃ
atk-s0201a:597_5: akkhemaṭṭhenāti veditabbaṃ. Avhāyantīti pakkosanti. Kathaṃ? Te hi pāṇātipātādīni
atk-s0201a:597_6: katvā “mayaṃ ayuttamakamhā, sace no te jāneyyuṃ, yesaṃ aparajjhimhā, idāni anubandhitvā
atk-s0201a:597_7: anayabyasanaṃ āpādeyyu”nti araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:597_8: Te “appamattakampi tiṇasaddaṃ vā paṇṇasaddaṃ vā sutvā, idānimhā naṭṭhā”ti tasanti
atk-s0201a:597_9: vittasanti, āgantvā parehi parivāritā viya baddhā vadhitā viya ca honti. Evaṃ taṃ
atk-s0201a:598_0: Na kho panāhaṃ…pe… paṭisevāmīti ahaṃ kho pana aparisuddhakāyakammanto hutvā araññavanapatthāni
atk-s0201a:598_1: pantāni senāsanāni na paṭisevāmi. Ye hi voti ettha voti nipātamattaṃ. Ariyā vuccanti
atk-s0201a:598_2: buddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca. Parisuddhakāyakammantāti īdisā hutvā. Tesamahaṃ aññataroti
atk-s0201a:598_3: tesaṃ ahampi eko aññataro. Bodhisatto hi gahaṭṭhopi pabbajitopi parisuddhakāyakammantova
atk-s0201a:598_4: hoti. Bhiyyoti atirekatthe nipāto. Pallomanti pannalomataṃ, khemaṃ sotthibhāvanti
atk-s0201a:598_5: attho. Āpādinti āpajjiṃ, atirekaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ atirekena vā sotthibhāvamāpajjinti
atk-s0201a:598_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Araññe vihārāyāti araññe vihāratthāya.
atk-s0201a:601_0: 36. Esa nayo sabbattha. Ayaṃ pana viseso, vacīkammantavāre tāva aparisuddhavacīkammantāti
atk-s0201a:601_1: aparisuddhena musāvādādinā vacīkammantena samannāgatā. Te kathaṃ bhayabheravaṃ avhāyanti?
atk-s0201a:601_2: Te musāvādena parassa atthaṃ bhañjitvā, pisuṇavācāya mittabhedaṃ katvā pharusavācāya
atk-s0201a:601_3: paresaṃ parisamajjhe mammāni tuditvā niratthakavācāya parasattānaṃ kammante nāsetvā
atk-s0201a:601_4: “mayaṃ ayuttamakamhā, sace no te jāneyyuṃ, yesaṃ aparajjhimhā, idāni anubandhitvā
atk-s0201a:601_5: anayabyasanaṃ pāpeyyu”nti araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā gumbantare vā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:601_6: Te “appamattakampi tiṇasaddaṃ vā paṇṇasaddaṃ vā sutvā idānimhā naṭṭhā”ti tasanti
atk-s0201a:601_7: vittasanti āgantvā parehi parivāritā viya baddhā vadhitā viya ca honti. Evaṃ taṃ
atk-s0201a:602_1: samannāgatā. Te kathaṃ bhayabheravaṃ avhāyanti? Te paresaṃ rakkhitagopitesu bhaṇḍesu
atk-s0201a:602_2: abhijjhāvisamalobhaṃ uppādetvā parassa kujjhitvā parasatte micchādassanaṃ gāhāpetvā
atk-s0201a:602_3: mayaṃ ayuttamakamhā…pe… attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti pakkosanti.
atk-s0201a:603_1: ājīvena samannāgatā. Te kathaṃ bhayabheravaṃ avhāyanti? Te evaṃ jīvikaṃ kappetvā
atk-s0201a:603_2: suṇanti – “sāsanasodhakā kira tepiṭakā bhikkhū sāsanaṃ sodhetuṃ nikkhantā, ajja vā
atk-s0201a:603_3: sve vā idhāgamissantī”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā gacchantare vā…pe… tasanti vittasanti.
atk-s0201a:603_4: Te hi āgantvā parivāretvā gahitā viya odātavatthanivāsitā viya ca hontīti. Sesaṃ tādisameva.
atk-s0201a:604_0: 37. Ito paraṃ abhijjhālūtiādīsu kiñcāpi abhijjhābyāpādā manokammantena saṅgahitā
atk-s0201a:604_1: tathāpi nīvaraṇavasena puna vuttāti veditabbā. Tattha abhijjhālūti parabhaṇḍādiabhijjhāyanasīlā.
atk-s0201a:604_2: Kāmesu tibbasārāgāti vatthukāmesu bahalakilesarāgā, te kathaṃ bhayabheravaṃ avhāyanti?
atk-s0201a:604_3: Te avavatthitārammaṇā honti, tesaṃ avavatthitārammaṇānaṃ araññe viharantānaṃ divā
atk-s0201a:604_4: diṭṭhaṃ rattiṃ bhayabheravaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti – “te ākulacittā appamattakenapi tasanti
atk-s0201a:604_5: vittasanti, rajjuṃ vā lataṃ vā disvā sappasaññino honti, khāṇuṃ disvā yakkhasaññino,
atk-s0201a:604_6: thalaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā disvā hatthisaññino sappādīhi anayabyasanaṃ āpāditā viya hontī”ti. Sesaṃ tādisameva.
atk-s0201a:605_0: 38. Byāpannacittāti pakatibhāvavijahanena vipannacittā. Kilesānugatañhi cittaṃ pakatibhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:605_1: vijahati, purāṇabhattabyañjanaṃ viya pūtikaṃ hoti. Paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappāti paduṭṭhacittasaṅkappā,
atk-s0201a:605_2: abhadrakena paresaṃ anatthajanakena cittasaṅkappena samannāgatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Te
atk-s0201a:605_3: kathaṃ bhayabheravaṃ avhāyanti? Bhayabheravāvhāyanaṃ ito pabhuti abhijjhāluvāre vuttanayeneva
atk-s0201a:605_4: veditabbaṃ. Yattha pana viseso bhavissati, tattha vakkhāma. Na kho panāhaṃ byāpannacittoti
atk-s0201a:605_5: ettha pana mettacitto ahaṃ hitacittoti dasseti, īdisā hi bodhisattā honti. Evaṃ sabbattha
atk-s0201a:606: 39. Thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhitāti cittagelaññabhūtena thinena sesanāmakāyagelaññabhūtena middhena ca pariyuṭṭhitā, abhibhūtā gahitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Te niddābahulā honti.
atk-s0201a:607_0: 40. Uddhatāti uddhaccapakatikā vipphandamānacittā, uddhaccena hi ekārammaṇe cittaṃ
atk-s0201a:607_1: vipphandati dhajayaṭṭhiyaṃ vātena paṭākā viya. Avūpasantacittāti anibbutacittā, idha
atk-s0201a:608_0: 41. Kaṅkhī vicikicchīti ettha ekamevidaṃ pañcamaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ. Kiṃ nu kho idanti ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:608_1: kaṅkhanato kaṅkhā, idamevidanti nicchetuṃ asamatthabhāvato vicikicchāti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:609_0: 42. Attukkaṃsanakā paravambhīti ye attānaṃ ukkaṃsenti ukkhipanti, ucce ṭhāne ṭhapenti,
atk-s0201a:609_1: parañca vambhenti garahanti nindanti, nīce ṭhāne ṭhapenti, tesametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:609_2: Te kathaṃ bhayabheravaṃ avhāyanti? Te parehi “asuko ca kira asuko ca attānaṃ ukkaṃsenti,
atk-s0201a:609_3: amhe garahanti, dāse viya karonti, gaṇhatha ne”ti anubaddhā palāyitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0201a:609_4: gacchantare vā gumbantare vāti kāyakammantasadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:610: 43. Chambhīti kāyathambhanalomahaṃsanakarena thambhena samannāgatā. Bhīrukajātikāti bhīrukapakatikā, gāmadārakā viya bhayabahulā asūrā kātarāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:611_0: 44. Lābhasakkārasilokanti ettha labbhatīti lābho, catunnaṃ paccayānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:611_1: Sakkāroti sundarakāro, paccayā eva hi paṇītapaṇītā sundarasundarā ca abhisaṅkharitvā
atk-s0201a:611_2: katā sakkārāti vuccanti. Yā ca parehi attano gāravakiriyā pupphādīhi vā pūjā. Silokoti
atk-s0201a:611_3: vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ etaṃ, lābhañca sakkārañca silokañca lābhasakkārasilokaṃ. Nikāmayamānāti
atk-s0201a:612_0: Eko kira piyagāmiko nāma bhikkhu samādinnadhutaṅgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lābhaṃ disvā “ahampi
atk-s0201a:612_1: dhutaṅgaṃ samādiyitvā lābhaṃ uppādemī”ti cintetvā sosānikaṅgaṃ samādāya susāne vasati.
atk-s0201a:612_2: Athekadivasaṃ eko kammamutto jaraggavo divā gocare caritvā rattiṃ tasmiṃ susāne pupphagumbe
atk-s0201a:612_3: sīsaṃ katvā romanthayamāno aṭṭhāsi. Piyagāmiko rattiṃ caṅkamanā nikkhanto tassa hanusaddaṃ
atk-s0201a:612_4: sutvā cintesi “addhā maṃ lābhagiddho esa susāne vasatīti ñatvā devarājā viheṭhetuṃ
atk-s0201a:612_5: āgato”ti, so jaraggavassa purato añjaliṃ paggahetvā “sappurisa devarāja ajja me ekarattiṃ
atk-s0201a:612_6: khama, sve paṭṭhāya na evaṃ karissāmī”ti namassamāno sabbarattiṃ yācanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:612_7: Tato sūriye uṭṭhite taṃ disvā kattarayaṭṭhiyā paharitvā palāpesi “sabbarattiṃ maṃ bhiṃsāpesī”ti.
atk-s0201a:613_0: 45. Kusītāti kosajjānugatā. Hīnavīriyāti hīnā vīriyena virahitā viyuttā, nibbīriyāti
atk-s0201a:613_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha kusītā kāyikavīriyārambhavirahitā honti, hīnavīriyā cetasikavīriyārambhavirahitā.
atk-s0201a:613_2: Te ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkonti. Tesaṃ avavatthitārammaṇānanti sabbaṃ pubbasadisameva.
atk-s0201a:614_0: 46. Muṭṭhassatīti naṭṭhassatī. Asampajānāti paññārahitā, imassa ca paṭipakkhe “upaṭṭhitassatīhamasmī”ti
atk-s0201a:614_1: vacanato satibhājaniyamevetaṃ. Paññā panettha satidubbalyadīpanatthaṃ vuttā. Duvidhā
atk-s0201a:614_2: hi sati paññāsampayuttā paññāvippayuttā ca. Tattha paññāsampayuttā balavatī, vippayuttā
atk-s0201a:614_3: dubbalā, tasmā yadāpi tesaṃ sati hoti, tadāpi asampajānantā muṭṭhassatīyeva te, dubbalāya
atk-s0201a:614_4: satiyā satikiccābhāvatoti etamatthaṃ dīpetuṃ “asampajānā”ti vuttaṃ. Te evaṃ muṭṭhassatī
atk-s0201a:614_5: asampajānā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkontīti sabbaṃ pubbasadisameva.
atk-s0201a:615_1: laddhokāsena uddhaccena tesaṃ samādhivirahānaṃ cittaṃ nānārammaṇesu paribbhamati,
atk-s0201a:615_2: vanamakkaṭo viya vanasākhāsu uddhaccena ekārammaṇe vipphandati. Pubbe vuttanayenena
atk-s0201a:615_3: te evaṃ asamāhitā vibbhantacittā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkontīti sabbaṃ pubbasadisameva.
atk-s0201a:616_0: 48. Duppaññāti nippaññānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paññā pana duṭṭhā nāma natthi. Eḷamūgāti
atk-s0201a:616_1: elamukhā, kha-kārassa ga-kāro kato. Lālamukhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Duppaññānañhi kathentānaṃ
atk-s0201a:616_2: lālā mukhato galati, lālā ca elāti vuccati. Yathāha “passelamūgaṃ uragaṃ dujjivha”nti.
atk-s0201a:616_3: Tasmā te “eḷamūgā”ti vuccanti. “Elamukhā”tipi pāṭho. “Elamugā”ti keci paṭhanti, apare
atk-s0201a:616_4: “elamukā”tipi, sabbattha “elamukhā”ti attho. Te kathaṃ bhayabheravaṃ avhāyanti? Te
atk-s0201a:616_5: duppaññā eḷamūgā ārammaṇavavatthānamattampi kātuṃ na sakkonti. Tesaṃ avavatthitārammaṇānaṃ
atk-s0201a:616_6: araññe viharantānaṃ divā diṭṭhaṃ rattiṃ bhayabheravaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti “te ākulacittā
atk-s0201a:616_7: appamattakenapi tasanti vittasanti, rajjuṃ vā lataṃ vā disvā sappasaññino honti,
atk-s0201a:616_8: khāṇuṃ disvā yakkhasaññino, thalaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā disvā hatthisaññino sappādīhi anayavyasanaṃ
atk-s0201a:616_9: āpāditā viya hontī”ti. Evaṃ taṃ bhayabheravaṃ attani samāropanaṭṭhena avhāyanti pakkosanti.
atk-s0201a:616_10: Paññāsampannohamasmīti ettha paññāsampannoti paññāya sampanno samannāgato, no ca
atk-s0201a:616_11: kho vipassanāpaññāya, na maggapaññāya, apica kho pana imesu soḷasasu ṭhānesu ārammaṇavavatthānapaññāyāti
atk-s0201a:620_0: 49. Tassa mayhanti ko anusandhi? Bodhisatto kira imāni soḷasārammaṇāni pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0201a:620_1: ca bhayabheravaṃ adisvā bhayabheravaṃ nāma evarūpāsu rattīsu evarūpe senāsane ca
atk-s0201a:620_2: paññāyati, handa naṃ tatthāpi gavesissāmīti bhayabheravagavesanamakāsi, etamatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:620_3: bhagavā idāni brāhmaṇassa dassento tassa mayhantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:621_0: Tattha yā tāti ubhayametaṃ rattīnaṃyeva uddesaniddesavacanaṃ. Abhiññātāti ettha abhīti
atk-s0201a:621_1: lakkhaṇatthe upasaggo. Tasmā abhiññātāti candapāripūriyā candaparikkhayenāti evamādīhi
atk-s0201a:621_2: lakkhaṇehi ñātāti veditabbā. Abhilakkhitāti ettha upasaggamattameva, tasmā abhilakkhitāti
atk-s0201a:622_0: Cātuddasīti pakkhassa paṭhamadivasato pabhuti catuddasannaṃ pūraṇī ekā ratti. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:622_1: pañcadasī aṭṭhamī ca. Pakkhassāti sukkapakkhassa kaṇhapakkhassa ca. Etā tisso tisso
atk-s0201a:622_2: katvā cha rattiyo, tasmā sabbattha pakkhavacanaṃ yojetabbaṃ “pakkhassa cātuddasī
atk-s0201a:622_3: pakkhassa pañcadasī pakkhassa aṭṭhamī”ti. Atha pañcamī kasmā na gahitāti? Asabbakālikattā.
atk-s0201a:622_4: Buddhe kira bhagavati anuppannepi uppajjitvā aparinibbutepi pañcamī anabhilakkhitāyeva,
atk-s0201a:622_5: parinibbute pana dhammasaṅgāhakattherā cintesuṃ “dhammassavanaṃ cirena hotī”ti. Tato
atk-s0201a:622_6: sammannitvā pañcamīti dhammassavanadivasaṃ ṭhapesuṃ, tato pabhuti sā abhilakkhitā
atk-s0201a:622_7: jātā, evaṃ asabbakālikattā ettha na gahitāti.
atk-s0201a:623_0: Tathārūpāsūti tathāvidhāsu. Ārāmacetiyānīti pupphārāmaphalārāmādayo ārāmā eva ārāmacetiyāni.
atk-s0201a:623_1: Cittīkataṭṭhena hi cetiyānīti vuccanti, pūjanīyaṭṭhenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vanacetiyānīti
atk-s0201a:623_3: gāmanigamādidvāresu pūjanīyarukkhāyeva rukkhacetiyāni. Lokiyā hi dibbādhivatthāti
atk-s0201a:623_4: vā maññamānā tesuyeva vā dibbasaññino hutvā ārāmavanarukkhe cittīkaronti, pūjenti,
atk-s0201a:623_5: tena te sabbepi cetiyānīti vuccanti. Bhiṃsanakānīti bhayajanakāni, passatopi suṇatopi
atk-s0201a:623_6: bhayaṃ janenti. Salomahaṃsānīti saheva lomahaṃsena vattanti, pavisamānasseva lomahaṃsajananato.
atk-s0201a:623_7: Appeva nāma passeyyanti api nāma taṃ bhayabheravaṃ passeyyameva. Aparena samayenāti,
atk-s0201a:623_8: “etadahosi yaṃnūnāha”nti evaṃ cintitakālato paṭṭhāya aññena kālena.
atk-s0201a:624_0: Tattha ca me brāhmaṇa viharatoti tathārūpesu senāsanesu yaṃ yaṃ manussānaṃ āyācanaupahārakaraṇārahaṃ
atk-s0201a:624_2: ekanipātaṃ viya yakkharakkhasapisācānaṃ, yaṃ divāpi passantānaṃ hadayaṃ maññe phalati,
atk-s0201a:624_3: taṃ ṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha ca me, brāhmaṇa, viharato”ti. Mago vā āgacchatīti siṅgāni
atk-s0201a:624_4: vā khurāni vā koṭṭento gokaṇṇakhaggadīpivarāhādibhedo mago vā āgacchati, sabbacatuppadānañhi
atk-s0201a:624_5: idha magoti nāmaṃ. Katthaci pana kāḷasiṅgālopi vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:626: Magarāja namo tyatthu, api kiñci labhāmase”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:627_0: Moro vā kaṭṭhaṃ pātetīti moro vā sukkhakaṭṭhaṃ rukkhato cāletvā pāteti. Moraggahaṇena
atk-s0201a:627_1: ca idha sabbapakkhiggahaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, tena yo koci pakkhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā
atk-s0201a:627_2: moro vāti vā saddena añño vā koci pakkhīti. Esa nayo purime magaggahaṇepi. Vāto vā
atk-s0201a:627_3: paṇṇakasaṭaṃ eretīti vāto vā paṇṇakacavaraṃ ghaṭṭeti. Etaṃ nūna taṃ bhayabheravaṃ
atk-s0201a:627_4: āgacchatīti yametaṃ āgacchati, taṃ bhayabheravaṃ nūnāti. Ito pabhuti ca ārammaṇameva
atk-s0201a:627_5: bhayabheravanti veditabbaṃ. Parittassa ca adhimattassa ca bhayassa ārammaṇattā sukhārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:627_6: rūpaṃ sukhamiva. Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ aññadatthu bhayapaṭikaṅkhī viharāmīti ahaṃ kho kiṃ
atk-s0201a:627_7: kāraṇaṃ ekaṃseneva bhayaṃ ākaṅkhamāno icchamāno hutvā viharāmi.
atk-s0201a:628_0: Yathābhūtaṃ yathābhūtassāti yena yena iriyāpathena bhūtassa bhavitassa sato vattamānassa
atk-s0201a:628_1: samaṅgībhūtassa vā. Meti mama santike. Tathābhūtaṃ tathābhūto vāti tena teneva iriyāpathena
atk-s0201a:628_2: bhūto bhavito santo vattamāno samaṅgībhūto vāti attho. So kho ahaṃ…pe… paṭivinemīti
atk-s0201a:628_3: bodhisattassa kira caṅkamantassa tasmiṃ magasiṅgakhurasaddādibhede bhayabheravārammaṇe
atk-s0201a:628_4: āgate neva mahāsatto tiṭṭhati, na nisīdati na sayati, atha kho caṅkamantova parivīmaṃsanto
atk-s0201a:628_5: parivicinanto bhayabheravaṃ na passati, magasiṅgakhurasaddādimattameva cetaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:628_6: so taṃ ñatvā idaṃ nāmetaṃ, na bhayabheravanti tato tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā sayati
atk-s0201a:628_7: vā. Etamatthaṃ dassento “so kho aha”ntiādimāha. Esa nayo sabbapeyyālesu. Ito parañca
atk-s0201a:628_8: iriyāpathapaṭipāṭiyā avatvā āsannapaṭipāṭiyā iriyāpathā vuttāti veditabbā, caṅkamantassa
atk-s0201a:628_9: hi bhayabherave āgate na ṭhito na nisinno na nipanno ṭhitassāpi āgate na caṅkamīti
atk-s0201a:631: 50. Evaṃ bhiṃsanakesupi ṭhānesu attano bhayabheravābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni jhāyīnaṃ sammohaṭṭhānesu attano asammohavihāraṃ dassetuṃ santi kho pana, brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:632_0: Tattha santīti atthi saṃvijjanti upalabbhanti. Rattiṃyeva samānanti rattiṃyeva santaṃ,
atk-s0201a:632_1: divāti sañjānantīti “divaso aya”nti sañjānanti. Divāyeva samānanti divasaṃyeva santaṃ.
atk-s0201a:632_2: Rattīti sañjānantīti “ratti aya”nti sañjānanti. Kasmā panete evaṃsaññino hontīti.
atk-s0201a:632_3: Vuṭṭhānakosallābhāvato vā sakuṇarutato vā. Kathaṃ? Idhekacco odātakasiṇalābhī divā
atk-s0201a:632_4: parikammaṃ katvā divā samāpanno divāyeva vuṭṭhahāmīti manasikāraṃ uppādeti, no ca
atk-s0201a:632_5: kho addhānaparicchede kusalo hoti. So divasaṃ atikkamitvā rattibhāge vuṭṭhāti. Odātakasiṇapharaṇavasena
atk-s0201a:632_6: cassa visadaṃ hoti vibhūtaṃ suvibhūtaṃ. So, divā vuṭṭhahāmīti uppāditamanasikāratāya
atk-s0201a:632_7: odātakasiṇapharaṇavisadavibhūtatāya ca rattiṃyeva samānaṃ divāti sañjānāti. Idha
atk-s0201a:632_8: panekacco nīlakasiṇalābhī rattiṃ parikammaṃ katvā rattiṃ samāpanno rattiṃyeva vuṭṭhahāmīti
atk-s0201a:632_9: manasikāraṃ uppādeti, no ca kho addhānaparicchede kusalo hoti. So rattiṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0201a:632_10: divasabhāge vuṭṭhāti. Nīlakasiṇapharaṇavasena cassa avisadaṃ hoti avibhūtaṃ. So rattiṃ
atk-s0201a:632_12: samānaṃ rattīti sañjānāti. Evaṃ tāva vuṭṭhānakosallābhāvato evaṃsaññino honti.
atk-s0201a:633_0: Sakuṇarutato pana idhekacco antosenāsane nisinno hoti. Atha divā ravanakasakuṇā kākādayo
atk-s0201a:633_1: candālokena divāti maññamānā rattiṃ ravanti, aññehi vā kāraṇehi. So tesaṃ saddaṃ
atk-s0201a:633_2: sutvā rattiṃyeva samānaṃ divāti sañjānāti. Idha panekacco pabbatantare gambhīrāya
atk-s0201a:633_4: kāle nisinno hoti. Atha rattiṃ ravanakasakuṇā ulūkādayo majjhanhikasamayepi tattha
atk-s0201a:633_5: tattha samandhakāre nilīnā rattisaññāya vā aññehi vā kāraṇehi ravanti. So tesaṃ saddaṃ
atk-s0201a:633_6: sutvā divāyeva samānaṃ rattīti sañjānāti. Evaṃ sakuṇarutato evaṃsaññino hontīti.
atk-s0201a:633_7: Idamahanti idaṃ ahaṃ evaṃ sañjānanaṃ. Sammohavihārasmiṃ vadāmīti sammohavihārapariyāpannaṃ
atk-s0201a:633_8: antogadhaṃ, sammohavihārānaṃ aññataraṃ vadāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:634_0: Ahaṃ kho pana brāhmaṇa…pe… sañjānāmīti pākaṭo bodhisattassa rattindivaparicchedo
atk-s0201a:634_2: gato, ettakaṃ pacchābhattakālo, ettakaṃ paṭhamayāmo, ettakaṃ majjhimayāmo, ettakaṃ
atk-s0201a:634_3: pacchimayāmo”ti, tasmā evamāha. Anacchariyañcetaṃ yaṃ pūritapāramī bodhisatto evaṃ
atk-s0201a:634_4: jānāti. Padesañāṇe ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānampi hi rattindivaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a:635_0: Kalyāṇiyamahāvihāre kira godattatthero dvaṅgulakāle bhattaṃ gahetvā aṅgulakāle bhuñjati.
atk-s0201a:635_1: Sūriye adissamānepi pātoyeva senāsanaṃ pavisitvā tāya velāya nikkhamati. Ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0201a:635_2: ārāmikā “sve therassa nikkhamanakāle passāmā”ti bhattaṃ sampādetvā kālatthambhamūle
atk-s0201a:635_3: nisīdiṃsu. Thero dvaṅgulakāleyeva nikkhamati. Tato pabhuti kira sūriye adissamānepi
atk-s0201a:636_0: Ajagaravihārepi kāḷadevatthero antovasse yāmagaṇḍikaṃ paharati, āciṇṇametaṃ therassa.
atk-s0201a:636_1: Na ca yāmayantanāḷikaṃ payojeti, aññe bhikkhū payojenti. Atha nikkhante paṭhame yāme
atk-s0201a:636_2: there muggaraṃ gahetvā ṭhitamatteyeva ekaṃ dve vāre paharanteyeva vā yāmayantaṃ patati,
atk-s0201a:636_3: evaṃ tīsu yāmesu samaṇadhammaṃ katvā thero pātoyeva gāmaṃ pavisitvā piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya
atk-s0201a:636_4: vihāraṃ āgantvā bhojanavelāya pattaṃ gahetvā divā vihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:636_5: karoti. Bhikkhū kālatthambhaṃ disvā therassa adisvā āgamanatthāya pesenti. So bhikkhu
atk-s0201a:636_6: theraṃ divā vihāraṭṭhānā nikkhamantameva vā antarāmagge vā passati. Evaṃ padesañāṇe
atk-s0201a:636_7: ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānampi rattindivaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti, kimaṅgaṃ pana bodhisattānanti.
atk-s0201a:637_0: Yaṃ kho taṃ brāhmaṇa…pe… vadeyyāti ettha pana “yaṃ kho taṃ, brāhmaṇa, asammohadhammo
atk-s0201a:637_1: satto loke uppanno…pe… sukhāya devamanussāna”nti vacanaṃ vadamāno koci sammā vadeyya,
atk-s0201a:637_2: sammā vadamāno siyā, na vitathavādī assa. Mameva taṃ vacanaṃ vadamāno sammā vadeyya,
atk-s0201a:637_3: sammā vadamāno siyā, na vitathavādī assāti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:638_0: Tattha asammohadhammoti asammohasabhāvo. Loketi manussaloke. Bahujanahitāyāti bahujanassa
atk-s0201a:638_2: bahujanassa sukhatthāya, cāgasampattiyā upakaraṇasukhassa dāyakoti. Lokānukampāyāti
atk-s0201a:638_3: lokassa anukampatthāya, mettākaruṇāsampattiyā mātāpitaro viya lokassa rakkhitā gopayitāti.
atk-s0201a:638_4: Atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti idha devamanussaggahaṇena ca bhabbapuggalaveneyyasatteyeva
atk-s0201a:638_5: gahetvā tesaṃ nibbānamaggaphalādhigamāya attano uppattiṃ dassetīti veditabbo. Atthāyāti
atk-s0201a:638_6: hi vutte paramatthatthāya nibbānāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Hitāyāti vutte taṃ sampāpakamaggatthāyāti
atk-s0201a:638_7: vuttaṃ hoti, nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttari hitaṃ nāma natthi. Sukhāyāti vutte
atk-s0201a:638_8: phalasamāpattisukhatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti, tato uttari sukhābhāvato. Vuttañcetaṃ “ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:641_0: 51. Evaṃ bhagavā buddhaguṇapaṭilābhāvasānaṃ attano asammohavihāraṃ brāhmaṇassa dassetvā
atk-s0201a:641_1: idāni yāya paṭipadāya taṃ koṭippattaṃ asammohavihāraṃ adhigato, taṃ pubbabhāgato
atk-s0201a:641_2: pabhuti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:642_0: Keci panāhu “imaṃ asammohavihāraṃ sutvā brāhmaṇassa cittamevaṃ uppannaṃ ‘kāya nu
atk-s0201a:642_1: kho paṭipadāya imaṃ patto’ti, tassa cittamaññāya imāyāhaṃ paṭipadāya imaṃ uttamaṃ
atk-s0201a:643_0: Tattha āraddhaṃ kho pana me, brāhmaṇa, vīriyaṃ ahosīti, brāhmaṇa, na mayā ayaṃ uttamo
atk-s0201a:643_1: asammohavihāro kusītena muṭṭhassatinā sāraddhakāyena vikkhittacittena vā adhigato,
atk-s0201a:643_2: apica kho tadadhigamāya āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ ahosi, bodhimaṇḍe nisinnena
atk-s0201a:643_3: mayā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ ahosi, paggahitaṃ asithilappavattitanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:644_0: Upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhāti na kevalañca vīriyameva, satipi me ārammaṇābhimukhībhāvena
atk-s0201a:644_1: upaṭṭhitā ahosi. Upaṭṭhitattāyeva ca asammuṭṭhā. Passaddho kāyoti kāyacittappassaddhisambhavena
atk-s0201a:644_2: kāyopi me passaddho ahosi. Tattha yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva
atk-s0201a:644_3: hoti, tasmā nāmakāyo rūpakāyoti avisesetvāva passaddho kāyoti vuttaṃ. Asāraddhoti
atk-s0201a:644_4: so ca kho passaddhattāyeva asāraddho, vigatadarathoti vuttaṃ hoti. Samāhitaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0201a:644_5: ekagganti cittampi me sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya ahosi. Samāhitattā
atk-s0201a:644_6: eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandananti, ettāvatā jhānassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā kathitā hoti.
atk-s0201a:645_0: Idāni imāya paṭipadāya adhigataṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vijjāttayapariyosānaṃ
atk-s0201a:645_1: visesaṃ dassento so kho ahantiādimāha. Tattha vivicceva kāmehi…pe… catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:645_2: upasampajja vihāsinti ettha tāva yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge pathavīkasiṇakathāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:645_3: vuttaṃ. Kevalañhi tattha “upasampajja viharatī”ti āgataṃ, idha “vihāsi”nti, ayameva
atk-s0201a:645_4: viseso. Kiṃ katvā pana bhagavā imāni jhānāni upasampajja vihāsīti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā.
atk-s0201a:646_0: Imāni ca pana cattāri jhānāni kesañci cittekaggatatthāni honti, kesañci vipassanāpādakāni,
atk-s0201a:646_1: kesañci abhiññāpādakāni, kesañci nirodhapādakāni, kesañci bhavokkamanatthāni. Tattha
atk-s0201a:646_2: khīṇāsavānaṃ cittekaggatatthāni honti. Te hi samāpajjitvā ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ
atk-s0201a:646_3: viharissāmāti iccevaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattenti. Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
atk-s0201a:646_4: samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassissāmāti nibbattentānaṃ vipassanāpādakāni
atk-s0201a:646_5: honti. Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito
atk-s0201a:646_6: vuṭṭhāya “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”ti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthentā nibbattenti,
atk-s0201a:646_7: tesaṃ abhiññāpādakāni honti. Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0201a:646_8: samāpajjitvā sattāhaṃ acittā hutvā diṭṭheva dhamme nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ
atk-s0201a:646_9: viharissāmāti nibbattenti, tesaṃ nirodhapādakāni honti. Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0201a:646_10: nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhānā brahmaloke uppajjissāmāti nibbattenti, tesaṃ bhavokkamanatthāni honti.
atk-s0201a:647_0: Bhagavatā panidaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ bodhirukkhamūle nibbattitaṃ, taṃ tassa vipassanāpādakañceva
atk-s0201a:650_0: 52. Yesañca guṇānaṃ dāyakaṃ ahosi, tesaṃ ekadesaṃ dassento so evaṃ samāhite cittetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:650_1: Tattha dvinnaṃ vijjānaṃ anupadavaṇṇanā ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vitthārito.
atk-s0201a:650_2: Kevalañhi tattha “so evaṃ samāhite citte…pe… abhininnāmetī”ti vuttaṃ, idha “abhininnāmesi”nti.
atk-s0201a:650_3: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇāti ayañca appanāvāro tattha anāgatoti ayameva viseso. Tattha
atk-s0201a:650_4: soti so ahaṃ. Abhininnāmesinti abhinīhariṃ. Abhininnāmesinti ca vacanato soti ettha
atk-s0201a:651_0: Yasmā cidaṃ bhagavato vasena pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ āgataṃ, tasmā “so tato cuto
atk-s0201a:651_1: idhūpapanno”ti ettha evaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Ettha hi so tato cutoti paṭinivattantassa
atk-s0201a:651_2: paccavekkhaṇaṃ. Tasmā idhūpapannoti imissā idhūpapattiyā anantaraṃ. Amutra udapādinti
