atk-s0201a:651_3: tusitabhavanaṃ sandhāyāhāti veditabbo. Tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmoti tatrāpi tusitabhavane
atk-s0201a:651_4: setaketu nāma devaputto ahosiṃ. Evaṃgottoti tāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ ekagotto. Evaṃvaṇṇoti
atk-s0201a:651_5: suvaṇṇavaṇṇo. Evamāhāroti dibbasudhāhāro. Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti evaṃ dibbasukhapaṭisaṃvedī.
atk-s0201a:651_7: So tato cutoti so ahaṃ tato tusitabhavanato cuto. Idhūpapannoti idha mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbatto.
atk-s0201a:652_0: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇātiādīsu meti mayā. Vijjāti viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā. Kiṃ viditaṃ
atk-s0201a:652_1: karoti? Pubbenivāsaṃ. Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādako
atk-s0201a:652_2: moho vuccati. Tamoti sveva moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena “tamo”ti vuccati. Ālokoti sāyeva
atk-s0201a:652_3: vijjā obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena “āloko”ti vuccati. Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho,
atk-s0201a:652_4: sesaṃ pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Yojanā panettha ayaṃ kho me vijjā adhigatā, tassa me adhigatavijjassa
atk-s0201a:652_5: avijjā vihatā, vinaṭṭhāti attho. Kasmā? Yasmā vijjā uppannā. Esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvaye.
atk-s0201a:653_0: Yathā tanti ettha yathāti opamme. Tanti nipāto. Satiyā avippavāsena appamattassa.
atk-s0201a:653_1: Vīriyātāpena ātāpino. Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa, pesitattassāti
atk-s0201a:653_2: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā
atk-s0201a:653_3: vihaññeyya, vijjā uppajjeyya. Tamo vihaññeyya, āloko uppajjeyya. Evameva mama avijjā
atk-s0201a:653_4: vihatā, vijjā uppannā. Tamo vihato, āloko uppanno. Etassa me padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddha”nti.
atk-s0201a:656: 53. Cutūpapātakathāyaṃ yasmā idha bhagavato vasena pāḷi āgatā, tasmā “passāmi pajānāmī”ti vuttaṃ, ayaṃ viseso. Sesaṃ visuddhimagge vuttasadisameva.
atk-s0201a:657_0: Ettha pana vijjāti dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjā. Avijjāti sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhipaṭicchādikā
atk-s0201a:657_1: avijjā. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti. Yasmā ca pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāsattānaṃ parikammakiccaṃ
atk-s0201a:657_2: nāma natthi. Te hi citte abhininnāmitamatteyeva anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranti,
atk-s0201a:657_3: dibbena cakkhunā satte passanti. Tasmā yo tattha parikammaṃ ādiṃ katvā bhāvanānayo
atk-s0201a:660_0: 54. Tatiyavijjāya so evaṃ samāhite citteti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ
atk-s0201a:660_1: veditabbaṃ. Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyāti arahattamaggañāṇatthāya. Arahattamaggo hi āsavavināsanato
atk-s0201a:660_2: āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati, tatra cetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tappariyāpannattāti. Cittaṃ abhininnāmesinti
atk-s0201a:660_3: vipassanācittaṃ abhinīhariṃ. So idaṃ dukkhanti evamādīsu “ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito
atk-s0201a:660_4: bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ
atk-s0201a:660_5: jāniṃ paṭivijjhiṃ. Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti. Tadubhayampi
atk-s0201a:660_6: yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhati, taṃ tesaṃ appavattiṃ nibbānaṃ ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti.
atk-s0201a:660_7: Tassa sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena
atk-s0201a:660_8: yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ jāniṃ paṭivijjhinti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:661_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ime āsavātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:661_1: Tassa me evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa mayhaṃ evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa.
atk-s0201a:661_2: Saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ katheti. Kāmāsavāti kāmāsavato. Vimuccitthāti
atk-s0201a:661_3: iminā phalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti, maggakkhaṇe hi cittaṃ vimuccati, phalakkhaṇe vimuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:661_4: hoti. Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti. Khīṇā jātītiādīhi
atk-s0201a:661_5: tassa bhūmiṃ, tena hi ñāṇena bhagavā paccavekkhanto “khīṇā jātī”tiādīni abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0201a:661_6: Katamā pana bhagavato jāti khīṇā, kathañca naṃ abbhaññāsīti? Na tāvassa atītā jāti
atk-s0201a:661_7: khīṇā, pubbeva khīṇattā, na anāgatā, anāgate vāyāmābhāvato, na paccuppannā, vijjamānattā.
atk-s0201a:661_8: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhabhedā
atk-s0201a:661_9: jāti, sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā, taṃ so maggabhāvanāya
atk-s0201a:661_10: pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ
atk-s0201a:662_0: Vusitanti vutthaṃ parivutthaṃ, kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0201a:662_1: puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ sattasekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma, khīṇāsavo
atk-s0201a:662_2: vutthavāso. Tasmā bhagavā attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti
atk-s0201a:662_3: abbhaññāsi. Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena
atk-s0201a:662_4: soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ
atk-s0201a:662_5: karonti, khīṇāsavo katakaraṇīyo. Tasmā bhagavā attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ
atk-s0201a:663_0: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃsoḷasakiccabhāvāya, kilesakkhayāya
atk-s0201a:663_1: vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti abbhaññāsi. Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvato imasmā
atk-s0201a:663_2: evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi. Ime
atk-s0201a:663_3: pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya. Te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena
atk-s0201a:664_0: Idāni evaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇādhigamaṃ brāhmaṇassa dassento,
atk-s0201a:664_1: ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇātiādimāha. Tattha vijjāti arahattamaggañāṇavijjā. Avijjāti catusaccapaṭicchādikā
atk-s0201a:664_2: avijjā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Ettāvatā ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ, dibbacakkhunā
atk-s0201a:664_3: paccuppannānāgataṃsañāṇaṃ, āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇanti evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi
atk-s0201a:664_4: sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe saṅgahetvā pakāsento attano asammohavihāraṃ brāhmaṇassa dassesi.
atk-s0201a:667_0: 55. Evaṃ vutte kira brāhmaṇo cintesi – “samaṇo gotamo sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānāti, ajjāpi
atk-s0201a:667_1: ca araññavāsaṃ na vijahati, atthi nu khvassa aññampi kiñci karaṇīya”nti. Athassa
atk-s0201a:667_2: bhagavā ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā iminā ajjhāsayānusandhinā, siyā kho pana tetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:667_3: Tattha siyā kho pana te, brāhmaṇa, evamassāti, brāhmaṇa, kadāci tuyhaṃ evaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:667_4: Na kho panetaṃ brāhmaṇa evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti etaṃ kho pana, brāhmaṇa, tayā mayhaṃ pantasenāsanapaṭisevanaṃ
atk-s0201a:667_5: avītarāgāditāyāti evaṃ na daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ pantasenāsanapaṭisevane akāraṇaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:667_6: kāraṇaṃ dassento dve kho ahantiādimāha. Tattha atthoyeva atthavaso. Tasmā dve kho
atk-s0201a:667_7: ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, atthavaseti ahaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, dve atthe dve kāraṇāni sampassamānoti
atk-s0201a:667_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāranti ettha diṭṭhadhammo nāma ayaṃ paccakkho
atk-s0201a:667_9: attabhāvo. Sukhavihāro nāma catunnampi iriyāpathavihārānaṃ phāsutā, ekakassa hi araññe
atk-s0201a:667_10: antamaso uccārapassāvakiccaṃ upādāya sabbeva iriyāpathā phāsukā honti, tasmā diṭṭhadhammassa
atk-s0201a:667_11: sukhavihāranti ayamattho veditabbo. Pacchimañca janataṃ anukampamānoti kathaṃ araññavāsena
atk-s0201a:667_12: pacchimā janatā anukampitā hoti? Saddhāpabbajitā hi kulaputtā bhagavato araññavāsaṃ
atk-s0201a:667_13: disvā bhagavāpi nāma araññasenāsanāni na muñcati, yassa nevatthi pariññātabbaṃ na
atk-s0201a:667_14: pahātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ na sacchikātabbaṃ, kimaṅgaṃ pana mayanti cintetvā tattha
atk-s0201a:667_15: vasitabbameva maññissanti. Evaṃ khippameva dukkhassantakarā bhavissanti. Evaṃ pacchimā
atk-s0201a:667_16: janatā anukampitā hoti. Etamatthaṃ dassento āha “pacchimañca janataṃ anukampamāno”ti.
atk-s0201a:670_0: 56. Taṃ sutvā attamano brāhmaṇo anukampitarūpātiādimāha. Tattha anukampitarūpāti
atk-s0201a:670_1: anukampitajātikā anukampitasabhāvā. Janatāti janasamūho. Yathā taṃ arahatā sammāsambuddhenāti
atk-s0201a:670_2: yathā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho anukampeyya, tatheva anukampitarūpāti.
atk-s0201a:671_0: Evañca pana vatvā puna taṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
atk-s0201a:671_1: abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotamāti. Tatthāyaṃ abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanesu
atk-s0201a:671_2: dissati. “Abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho”tiādīsu
atk-s0201a:671_3: hi khaye dissati. “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
atk-s0201a:672: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0201a:674: Ādīsu abhirūpe. “Abhikkantaṃ, bhante”tiādīsu abbhanumodane. Idhāpi abbhanumodaneyeva. Yasmā ca abbhanumodane, tasmā sādhu sādhu bho, gotamāti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:676: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho”ti. –
atk-s0201a:677: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo. Atha vā abhikkantanti abhikantaṃ. Atiiṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ, atisundaranti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:678_0: Tattha ekena abhikkantasaddena desanaṃ thometi, ekena attano pasādaṃ. Ayañhettha
atk-s0201a:678_1: adhippāyo – abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā, abhikkantaṃ
atk-s0201a:678_2: yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti. Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:678_3: dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi – bhoto gotamassa vacanaṃ abhikkantaṃ dosanāsanato,
atk-s0201a:678_4: abhikkantaṃ guṇādhigamanato, tathā saddhājananato, paññājananato, sātthato, sabyañjanato,
atk-s0201a:678_5: uttānapadato, gambhīratthato, kaṇṇasukhato, hadayaṅgamato, anattukkaṃsanato, aparavambhanato,
atk-s0201a:679_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi. Tattha nikkujjitanti adhomukhaṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:679_1: heṭṭhāmukhajātaṃ vā. Ukkujjeyyāti upari mukhaṃ kareyya. Paṭicchannanti tiṇapaṇṇādicchāditaṃ.
atk-s0201a:679_2: Vivareyyāti ugghāṭeyya. Mūḷhassāti disāmūḷhassa. Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā
atk-s0201a:680_0: Ayaṃ pana adhippāyayojanā – yathā koci nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyya, evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ
atk-s0201a:680_1: asaddhamme patitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena, yathā paṭicchannaṃ vivareyya. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:680_2: kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0201a:680_3: vivarantena, yathā mūḷhassa maggaṃ ācikkheyya, evaṃ kummaggamicchāmaggappaṭipannassa
atk-s0201a:680_4: me saggamokkhamaggaṃ ācikkhantena, yathā andhakāre telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, evaṃ mohandhakāre
atk-s0201a:680_6: mayhaṃ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0201a:683_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattayapasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto
atk-s0201a:683_1: esāhantiādimāha. Tattha esāhanti eso ahaṃ. Bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti bhavaṃ
atk-s0201a:683_2: me gotamo saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ, aghassa tātā, hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena
atk-s0201a:683_3: bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ gacchāmi, bhajāmi, sevāmi, payirupāsāmi, evaṃ vā jānāmi, bujjhāmīti.
atk-s0201a:683_4: Yesañhi dhātūnaṃ gatiattho, buddhipi tesaṃ attho. Tasmā gacchāmīti imassa jānāmi,
atk-s0201a:683_5: bujjhāmīti ayamattho vutto. Dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge
atk-s0201a:683_6: sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne ca apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo,
atk-s0201a:683_7: so atthato ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca. Vuttañhetaṃ – “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā,
atk-s0201a:683_8: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro. Na kevalañca ariyamaggo
atk-s0201a:683_9: ceva nibbānañca, apica kho ariyaphalehi saddhiṃ pariyattidhammopi. Vuttañhetaṃ chattamāṇavakavimāne –
atk-s0201a:686_0: Ettha rāgavirāgoti maggo kathito. Anejamasokanti phalaṃ. Dhammamasaṅkhatanti nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:686_1: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhāti.
atk-s0201a:686_2: Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātena saṃhatoti saṅgho, so atthato aṭṭha ariyapuggalasamūho. Vuttañhetaṃ tasmiṃyeva vimāne.
atk-s0201a:688: Aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:689: Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā brāhmaṇo tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-s0201a:692_0: Idāni tesu saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ, saraṇagamanaṃ. Yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a:692_1: saraṇagamanappabhedo, saraṇagamanassa phalaṃ, saṃkileso, bhedoti ayaṃ vidhi veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:692_2: Seyyathidaṃ – padatthato tāva hiṃsatīti saraṇaṃ, saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena
atk-s0201a:692_3: bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiparikilesaṃ hanati vināsetīti attho, ratanattayassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:693_0: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati buddho. Bhavakantārā
atk-s0201a:693_1: uttāraṇena assāsadānena ca dhammo. Appakānampi kārānaṃ vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena
atk-s0201a:693_2: saṅgho. Tasmā imināpi pariyāyena ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ. Tappasādataggarutāhi vihatakileso
atk-s0201a:693_3: tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo saraṇagamanaṃ. Taṃsamaṅgisatto saraṇaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a:693_4: vuttappakārena cittuppādena etāni me tīṇi saraṇāni saraṇaṃ, etāni parāyaṇanti evaṃ
atk-s0201a:693_5: upetīti attho. Evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchatīti idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:694_0: Saraṇagamanappabhede pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokiyañca. Tattha lokuttaraṃ
atk-s0201a:694_2: hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati. Lokiyaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena
atk-s0201a:694_3: ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati, taṃ atthato buddhādīsu vatthūsu saddhāpaṭilābho,
atk-s0201a:694_4: saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:695_0: Tayidaṃ catudhā pavattati attasanniyyātanena tapparāyaṇatāya sissabhāvūpagamanena
atk-s0201a:695_1: paṇipātenāti. Tattha attasanniyyātanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa
atk-s0201a:695_2: niyyātemi, dhammassa, saṅghassā”ti evaṃ buddhādīnaṃ attapariccajanaṃ. Tapparāyaṇatā
atk-s0201a:695_3: nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhaparāyaṇo, dhammaparāyaṇo, saṅghaparāyaṇo iti maṃ
atk-s0201a:695_4: dhārethā”ti evaṃ tapparāyaṇabhāvo. Sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ
atk-s0201a:695_5: buddhassa antevāsiko, dhammassa, saṅghassāti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ sissabhāvūpagamo.
atk-s0201a:695_7: buddhādīnaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ karomi, iti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro.
atk-s0201a:695_8: Imesañhi catunnaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṃyeva hoti saraṇagamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:696_0: Apica bhagavato attānaṃ pariccajāmi, dhammassa, saṅghassa attānaṃ pariccajāmi. Jīvitaṃ
atk-s0201a:696_1: pariccajāmi, pariccattoyeva me attā, pariccattaṃyeva me jīvitaṃ, jīvitapariyantikaṃ
atk-s0201a:696_2: buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, buddho me saraṇaṃ leṇaṃ tāṇanti evampi attasanniyyātanaṃ
atk-s0201a:696_3: veditabbaṃ. “Satthārañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ bhagavantameva passeyyaṃ, sugatañca vatāhaṃ
atk-s0201a:696_4: passeyyaṃ bhagavantameva passeyyaṃ, sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ bhagavantameva
atk-s0201a:696_5: passeyya”nti evampi mahākassapassa saraṇagamanaṃ viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:697: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0201a:699_0: Evampi āḷavakādīnaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā. “Atha kho brahmāyu
atk-s0201a:699_1: brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā
atk-s0201a:699_2: bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati, nāmañca sāveti
atk-s0201a:699_3: brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo, brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo”ti evampi paṇipāto daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:700_0: So panesa ñātibhayācariyadakkhiṇeyyavasena catubbidho hoti. Tattha dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātena
atk-s0201a:700_1: saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, na itarehi. Seṭṭhavaseneva hi saraṇaṃ gayhati, seṭṭhavasena bhijjati,
atk-s0201a:700_2: tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā “buddho amhākaṃ ñātako”ti vandati, aggahitameva hoti
atk-s0201a:700_3: saraṇaṃ. Yo vā “samaṇo gotamo rājapūjito mahānubhāvo, avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyā”ti
atk-s0201a:700_4: bhayena vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṃ. Yo vā bodhisattakāle bhagavato santike
atk-s0201a:703: Evarūpaṃ anusāsaniṃ uggahetvā “ācariyo me”ti vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṃ. Yo pana “ayaṃ loke aggadakkhiṇeyyo”ti vandati, teneva gahitaṃ hoti saraṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:704_0: Evaṃ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṃ
atk-s0201a:704_1: “ñātako me aya”nti vandato saraṇagamanaṃ na bhijjati, pageva apabbajitaṃ. Tathā rājānaṃ
atk-s0201a:704_2: bhayavasena vandato, so hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti. Tathā
atk-s0201a:704_3: yaṃkiñci sippaṃ sikkhāpakaṃ titthiyaṃ “ācariyo me aya”nti vandatopi na bhijjatīti
atk-s0201a:705: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ, sabbadukkhakkhayo ānisaṃsaphalaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:706: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0201a:710: Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ;
atk-s0201a:712_0: Apica niccato anupagamanādivasena petassa ānisaṃsaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ,
atk-s0201a:712_1: “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato
atk-s0201a:712_2: upagaccheyya, sukhato upagaccheyya, kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya, mātaraṃ jīvitā
atk-s0201a:712_3: voropeyya, pitaraṃ arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, duṭṭhacitto tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādeyya,
atk-s0201a:712_4: saṅghaṃ bhindeyya, aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:713: Lokiyassa pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:718_0: Aparampi vuttaṃ “atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā
atk-s0201a:718_1: mahāmoggallāno, tenupasaṅkami…pe… ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā
atk-s0201a:718_2: mahāmoggallāno etadavoca ‘sādhu kho devānaminda buddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, buddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:718_3: saraṇagamanahetu kho devānaminda evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ
atk-s0201a:718_4: saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī’ti. Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā
atk-s0201a:718_5: dibbena vaṇṇena sukhena yasena ādhipateyyena dibbehi rūpehi saddehi gandhehi rasehi
atk-s0201a:718_6: phoṭṭhabbehī”ti. Esa nayo dhamme saṅghe ca. Apica velāmasuttādivasenāpi saraṇagamanassa
atk-s0201a:719_0: Tattha lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṃkilissati,
atk-s0201a:719_1: na mahājutikaṃ hoti, na mahāvipphāraṃ. Lokuttarassa natthi saṃkileso. Lokiyassa ca
atk-s0201a:719_2: saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo sāvajjo anavajjo ca. Tattha sāvajjo aññasatthārādīsu
atk-s0201a:719_3: attasanniyyātanādīhi hoti, so aniṭṭhaphalo. Anavajjo kālaṃ kiriyāya, so avipākattā
atk-s0201a:719_4: aphalo. Lokuttarassa pana nevatthi bhedo. Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññasatthāraṃ
atk-s0201a:719_5: na uddisatīti evaṃ saraṇagamanassa saṃkileso ca bhedo ca veditabboti. Upāsakaṃ maṃ
atk-s0201a:719_6: bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretūti maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo “upāsako aya”nti evaṃ dhāretu, jānātūti attho.
atk-s0201a:722: Upāsakavidhikosallatthaṃ panettha ko upāsako, kasmā upāsakoti vuccati, kimassa sīlaṃ, ko ājīvo, kā vipatti, kā sampattīti idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:723_0: Tattha ko upāsakoti yo koci tisaraṇagato gahaṭṭho. Vuttañhetaṃ – “yato kho mahānāma
atk-s0201a:723_1: upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato
atk-s0201a:723_2: hoti. Ettāvatā kho mahānāma upāsako hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:724: Kasmā upāsakoti ratanattayassa upāsanato. So hi buddhaṃ upāsatīti upāsako. Dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ upāsatīti upāsako.
atk-s0201a:725_0: Kimassa sīlanti pañca veramaṇiyo. Yathāha “yato kho mahānāma upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato
atk-s0201a:725_1: hoti adinnādānā, kāmesu micchācārā, musāvādā, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato
atk-s0201a:725_2: hoti. Ettāvatā kho mahānāma upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:726_0: Ko ājīvoti pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvitakappanaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0201a:726_1: “pañcimā, bhikkhave, vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā. Katamā pañca? Satthavaṇijjā, sattavaṇijjā,
atk-s0201a:726_2: maṃsavaṇijjā, majjavaṇijjā, visavaṇijjā. Imā kho, bhikkhave, pañca vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:727_0: Kā vipattīti yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti, ayamassa vipatti. Apica yāya
atk-s0201a:727_1: esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti malañca patikuṭṭho ca. Sāpissa vipattīti veditabbā. Te ca atthato
atk-s0201a:727_2: assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti. Yathāha “pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato
atk-s0201a:727_3: upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca. Katamehi pañcahi?
atk-s0201a:727_4: Assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, kotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, maṅgalaṃ pacceti no kammaṃ,
atk-s0201a:727_5: ito ca bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesati tattha ca pubbakāraṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:728_0: Kā sampattīti yā cassa sīlasampadā ca ājīvasampadā ca, sā sampatti. Ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā
atk-s0201a:728_1: saddhādayo pañca dhammā. Yathāha “pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako
atk-s0201a:728_2: upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca. Katamehi pañcahi? Saddho
atk-s0201a:728_3: hoti, sīlavā hoti, na kotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, kammaṃ pacceti no maṅgalaṃ, na ito
atk-s0201a:728_4: bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ gavesati, idha ca pubbakāraṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:729_0: Ajjataggeti ettha ayaṃ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati. “Ajjatagge, samma
atk-s0201a:729_1: dovārika, āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati. “Teneva
atk-s0201a:729_2: aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyya, ucchaggaṃ veḷagga”ntiādīsu koṭiyaṃ. “Ambilaggaṃ
atk-s0201a:729_3: vā madhuraggaṃ vā tittakaggaṃ vā, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena
atk-s0201a:729_4: vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:729_5: aggamakkhāyatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe. Idha panāyaṃ ādimhi daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā ajjataggeti ajjataṃ
atk-s0201a:729_6: ādiṃ katvā, evamettha attho veditabbo. Ajjatanti ajjabhāvaṃ. Ajjadaggeti vā pāṭho,
atk-s0201a:729_7: da-kāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-s0201a:730_0: Pāṇupetanti pāṇehi upetaṃ, yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva upetaṃ. Anaññasatthukaṃ
atk-s0201a:730_1: tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu
atk-s0201a:730_2: jānātu. Ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindeyya, neva buddhaṃ “na buddho”ti
atk-s0201a:730_3: vā dhammaṃ “na dhammo”ti vā, saṅghaṃ “na saṅgho”ti vā vadeyyanti. Evaṃ attasanniyyātanena
atk-s0201a:730_4: saraṇaṃ gantvā catūhi ca paccayehi pavāretvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-s0201a:735_0: 57. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… āyasmā sāriputtoti anaṅgaṇasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā
atk-s0201a:735_1: – yathā cettha, evaṃ sabbasuttesu. Tasmā ito paraṃ ettakampi avatvā apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃyeva karissāma.
atk-s0201a:736_0: Cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Puggalāti sattā narā posā. Ettāvatā ca puggalavādī mahātheroti
atk-s0201a:736_1: na gahetabbaṃ, ayañhi āyasmā buddhaputtānaṃ seṭṭho, so buddhassa bhagavato desanaṃ
atk-s0201a:738_0: Buddhassa bhagavato duvidhā desanā sammutidesanā, paramatthadesanā cāti. Tattha puggalo
atk-s0201a:738_1: satto itthī puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māroti evarūpā sammutidesanā. Aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:738_2: anattā, khandhā dhātū āyatanāni satipaṭṭhānāti evarūpā paramatthadesanā.
atk-s0201a:739_0: Tattha bhagavā ye sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesaṃ
atk-s0201a:739_1: adhigantuṃ samatthā, tesaṃ sammutidesanaṃ deseti. Ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṃ
atk-s0201a:739_2: sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā, tesaṃ paramatthadesanaṃ
atk-s0201a:739_3: deseti. Tatthāyaṃ upamā, yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanako
atk-s0201a:739_4: ācariyo ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṃ jānanti, tesaṃ damiḷabhāsāya ācikkhati. Ye
atk-s0201a:739_5: andhakabhāsādīsu aññatarāya, tesaṃ tāya tāya bhāsāya. Evaṃ te māṇavakā chekaṃ byattaṃ
atk-s0201a:739_6: ācariyamāgamma khippameva sippaṃ uggaṇhanti. Tattha ācariyo viya buddho bhagavā.
atk-s0201a:739_7: Tayo vedā viya kathetabbabhāvena ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni. Desabhāsākosallamiva sammutiparamatthakosallaṃ.
atk-s0201a:739_9: Ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṃ viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasena desanā
atk-s0201a:746_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti – hirottappadīpanatthaṃ, kammassakatādīpanatthaṃ,
atk-s0201a:746_3: hirīyanti ottappantī”ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti, sammohamāpajjati, paṭisattu
atk-s0201a:746_4: hoti “kimidaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanāni hirīyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti. “Itthī hirīyati
atk-s0201a:746_5: ottappati puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti vutte pana jānāti, na sammohamāpajjati,
atk-s0201a:746_6: na paṭisattu hoti. Tasmā bhagavā hirottappadīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0201a:747: “Khandhā kammassakā dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā kammassakatādīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0201a:748: “Veḷuvanādayo mahāvihārā khandhehi kārāpitā dhātūhi āyatanehī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0201a:749_0: “Khandhā mātaraṃ jīvitā voropenti pitaraṃ arahantaṃ ruhiruppādakammaṃ karonti, saṅghabhedakammaṃ
atk-s0201a:749_1: karonti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā ānantariyadīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:749_2: puggalakathaṃ katheti. “Khandhā mettāyanti dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:750_0: “Khandhā pubbenivāsamanussaranti dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā
atk-s0201a:750_1: pubbenivāsadīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti. “Khandhā dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti dhātuyo
atk-s0201a:750_2: āyatanānī”ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti, sammohamāpajjati, paṭisattu hoti “kimidaṃ
atk-s0201a:750_3: khandhadhātuāyatanāni paṭiggaṇhanti nāmā”ti. “Puggalā paṭiggaṇhanti sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti
atk-s0201a:750_4: vutte pana jānāti, na sammohamāpajjati, na paṭisattu hoti. Tasmā bhagavā dakkhiṇāvisuddhidīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:751_0: Lokasammutiñca buddhā bhagavanto nappajahanti, lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyaṃ lokābhilāpe
atk-s0201a:751_1: ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti. Tasmā bhagavā lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi puggalakathaṃ
atk-s0201a:751_2: katheti. Tasmā ayampi āyasmā lokavohārakusalatāya buddhassa bhagavato desanaṃ avilomento
atk-s0201a:751_3: lokasammutiyaṃ ṭhatvāva cattārome, āvuso, puggalāti āha. Tasmā ettha paramatthavasena
atk-s0201a:752_0: Santo saṃvijjamānāti lokasaṅketavasena atthi upalabbhamānā. Lokasminti sattaloke.
atk-s0201a:752_1: Sāṅgaṇova samānotiādīsu pana aṅgaṇanti katthaci kilesā vuccanti. Yathāha “tattha
atk-s0201a:752_2: katamāni tīṇi aṅgaṇāni? Rāgo aṅgaṇaṃ, doso aṅgaṇaṃ, moho aṅgaṇa”nti. Katthaci yaṃkiñci
atk-s0201a:752_3: malaṃ vā paṅko vā, yathāha “tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:752_4: Katthaci tathārūpo bhūmibhāgo, so bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇantiādīnaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:752_5: Idha pana nānappakārā tibbakilesā “aṅgaṇa”nti adhippetā. Tathā hi vakkhati “pāpakānaṃ
atk-s0201a:752_6: kho etaṃ, āvuso, akusalānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, yadidaṃ aṅgaṇa”nti. Saha aṅgaṇena sāṅgaṇo.
atk-s0201a:753_0: Sāṅgaṇova samānoti sakilesoyeva santo. Atthi me ajjhattaṃ aṅgaṇanti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti
atk-s0201a:753_1: mayhaṃ attano cittasantāne kileso atthītipi na jānāti. “Ime kilesā nāma kakkhaḷā
atk-s0201a:753_2: vāḷā jahitabbā na gahitabbā visaduṭṭhasallasadisā”ti evaṃ yāthāvasarasatopi na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:753_3: Yo atthīti ca jānāti, evañca jānāti. So “atthi me ajjhattaṃ aṅgaṇanti yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a:753_4: pajānātī”ti vuccati. Yassa pana na ca maggena samūhatā kilesā, na ca uppajjanti yena
atk-s0201a:753_5: vā tena vā vāritattā, ayamidha anaṅgaṇoti adhippeto. Natthi me ajjhattaṃ aṅgaṇanti
atk-s0201a:753_6: yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti “mayhaṃ kilesā yena vā tena vā vāritattā natthi, na maggena
atk-s0201a:753_7: samūhatattā”ti na jānāti, “te uppajjamānā mahāanatthaṃ karissanti kakkhaḷā vāḷā visaduṭṭhasallasadisā”ti
atk-s0201a:753_8: evaṃ yāthāvasarasatopi na jānāti. Yo pana “iminā kāraṇena natthī”ti ca jānāti, evañca
atk-s0201a:753_9: jānāti, so “natthi me ajjhattaṃ aṅgaṇanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vuccati. Tatrāti
atk-s0201a:753_10: tesu catūsu puggalesu, tesu vā dvīsu sāṅgaṇesu, yvāyanti yo ayaṃ, yāyantipi pāṭho.
atk-s0201a:754_0: 58. Ko nu kho, āvuso, sāriputta, hetu ko paccayoti ubhayenāpi kāraṇameva pucchati.
atk-s0201a:754_1: Yenimesanti yena hetunā yena paccayena imesaṃ dvinnaṃ eko seṭṭhapuriso eko hīnapurisoti
atk-s0201a:754_2: akkhāyati, so ko hetu ko paccayoti evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Tattha kiñcāpi
atk-s0201a:754_3: “nappajānāti pajānātī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ, pajānanā nappajānanāti idameva ubhayaṃ hetu ceva paccayo ca.
atk-s0201a:755_0: 59. Thero pana attano vicitrapaṭibhānatāya taṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ puna tatrāvusotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:755_1: Tattha tassetaṃ pāṭikaṅkhanti tassa puggalassa etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhitabbaṃ. Idameva esa
atk-s0201a:755_2: pāpuṇissati, na aññanti icchitabbaṃ, avassaṃ bhāvīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Na chandaṃ janessatī”tiādinā
atk-s0201a:756_0: Tattha ca na chandaṃ janessatīti appajānanto tassa aṅgaṇassa pahānatthaṃ kattukamyatāchandaṃ
atk-s0201a:756_1: na janessati. Na vāyamissatīti tato balavataraṃ vāyāmaṃ na karissati, na vīriyaṃ
atk-s0201a:756_2: ārabhissatīti thāmagatavīriyaṃ pana neva ārabhissati, na pavattessatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:756_3: Sāṅgaṇoti imehi rāgādīhi aṅgaṇehi sāṅgaṇo. Saṃkiliṭṭhacittoti tehiyeva suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-s0201a:756_4: kiliṭṭhacitto malīnacitto vibādhitacitto upatāpitacitto ca hutvā. Kālaṃ karissatīti marissati.
atk-s0201a:757_0: Seyyathāpīti yathā nāma. Kaṃsapātīti kaṃsalohabhājanaṃ. Ābhatāti ānītā. Āpaṇā vā
atk-s0201a:757_1: kammārakulā vāti āpaṇato vā kaṃsapātikārakānaṃ kammārānaṃ gharato vā. Rajenāti āgantukarajena
atk-s0201a:757_2: paṃsuādinā. Malenāti tattheva uṭṭhitena lohamalena. Pariyonaddhāti sañchannā. Na
atk-s0201a:757_3: ceva paribhuñjeyyunti udakakhādanīyapakkhipanādīhi paribhogaṃ na kareyyuṃ. Na ca
atk-s0201a:757_4: pariyodapeyyunti dhovanaghaṃsanādīhi na parisuddhaṃ kārāpeyyuṃ. Rajāpatheti rajapathe.
atk-s0201a:757_5: Ayameva vā pāṭho, rajassa āgamanaṭṭhāne vā vuṭṭhānuṭṭhāne vā heṭṭhāmañce vā thusakoṭṭhake
atk-s0201a:757_6: vā bhājanantare vā, yattha rajena okirīyatīti attho. Saṃkiliṭṭhatarā assa malaggahitāti
atk-s0201a:757_7: ettha rajāpathe nikkhipanena saṃkiliṭṭhatarā, aparibhogāpariyodapanehi malaggahitatarāti
atk-s0201a:757_8: vuttaṃ hoti, paṭipucchāvacanañcetaṃ. Tenassa evamattho veditabbo, āvuso, sā kaṃsapāti
atk-s0201a:757_9: evaṃ karīyamānā aparena kālena saṃkiliṭṭhatarā ca malaggahitatarā ca mattikapātīti
atk-s0201a:757_10: vā kaṃsapātīti vā itipi dujjānā bhaveyya nu kho noti, thero taṃ paṭijānanto āha “evamāvuso”ti.
atk-s0201a:757_11: Puna dhammasenāpati opammaṃ sampaṭipādento, evameva khotiādimāha. Tatthevaṃ opammasaṃsandanā
atk-s0201a:757_12: veditabbā – kiliṭṭhakaṃsapātisadiso sāṅgaṇo puggalo. Saṃkiliṭṭhakaṃsapātiyā naparibhuñjanamādiṃ
atk-s0201a:757_13: katvā rajāpathanikkhepo viya tassa puggalassa pabbajjaṃ labhamānassa vejjakammādīsu
atk-s0201a:757_15: viya tassa puggalassa anukkamena ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ anusikkhato vejjakammādikaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:757_16: ettha ṭhitassa sāṅgaṇakālakiriyā. Atha vā anukkamena dukkaṭadubbhāsitavītikkamanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:757_17: ettha ṭhitassa sāṅgaṇakālakiriyā. Atha vā anukkamena pācittiyathullaccayavītikkamanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:758_0: Saṃkiliṭṭhacitto kālaṃ karissatīti ettha ca akusalacittena kālaṃ karissatīti na evamattho
atk-s0201a:758_1: daṭṭhabbo. Sabbasattā hi pakaticittena bhavaṅgacitteneva kālaṃ karonti. Ayaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:758_2: avisodhetvā cittasantānaṃ kālaṃ karissatīti etamatthaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:759_1: ādāsamaṇḍalasadisaṃ kareyyuṃ. Na ca naṃ rajāpatheti pubbe vuttappakāre ṭhāne anikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:759_2: karaṇḍamañjūsādīsu vā ṭhapeyyuṃ, paliveṭhetvā vā nāgadante lageyyuṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayānusāreneva gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:760_0: Upamāsaṃsandanā cettha evaṃ veditabbā – kiliṭṭhakaṃsapātisadiso sāṅgaṇo bhabbapuggalo.
atk-s0201a:760_1: Kiliṭṭhakaṃsapātiyā paribhuñjanamādiṃ katvā suddhaṭṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ viya tassa puggalassa
atk-s0201a:760_2: pabbajjaṃ labhamānassa pesalabhikkhūnaṃ santike pabbajjāpaṭilābho. Ye ovadanti anusāsanti
atk-s0201a:760_3: appamattakampi pamādaṃ disvā daṇḍakammaṃ katvā punappunaṃ sikkhāpenti, saṃkiliṭṭhakaṃsapātiyā
atk-s0201a:760_4: aparakāle parisuddhapariyodātabhāvo viya tassa puggalassa ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ anusikkhato
atk-s0201a:760_5: anukkamena sammāvattapaṭipatti, ettha ṭhitassa anaṅgaṇakālakiriyā. Atha vā anukkamena
atk-s0201a:760_6: parisuddhe sīle patiṭṭhāya attano anurūpaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā dhutaṅgāni samādāya
atk-s0201a:760_7: attano anukūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmantasenāsanavāsaṃ muñcitvā pantasenāsanavāso,
atk-s0201a:760_8: ettha ṭhitassa anaṅgaṇakālakiriyā. Atha vā anukkamena kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭhasamāpattinibbattanena
atk-s0201a:760_9: kilesavikkhambhanaṃ, vipassanāpādakajjhānā vuṭṭhāya vipassanāya kilesānaṃ tadaṅganivāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:760_10: sotāpattiphalādhigamo…pe… arahattasacchikiriyāti ettha ṭhitassa accantaṃ anaṅgaṇakālakiriyā eva.
atk-s0201a:761_0: Tatiyavāre subhanimittanti rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ. Manasi karissatīti tasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:761_1: vipannassati taṃ nimittaṃ āvajjissati. Tassa subhanimittassa manasikārāti tassa puggalassa
atk-s0201a:761_2: subhanimittamanasikārakāraṇā. Anuddhaṃsessatīti hiṃsissati adhibhavissati. Rāgo hi
atk-s0201a:761_3: uppajjanto kusalavāraṃ pacchinditvā sayameva akusalajavanaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanto kusalacittaṃ
atk-s0201a:762_0: Opammasaṃsandanā panettha evaṃ veditabbā – parisuddhakaṃsapātisadiso pakatiyā appakileso
atk-s0201a:762_1: anaṅgaṇapuggalo. Parisuddhakaṃsapātiyā naparibhuñjanaṃ ādiṃ katvā rajāpathe nikkhepo
atk-s0201a:762_2: viya tassa puggalassa pabbajjaṃ labhamānassāti ito paraṃ sabbaṃ paṭhamavārasadisameva.
atk-s0201a:763_0: Catutthavāre subhanimittaṃ na manasi karissatīti tasmiṃ sativirahābhāvato taṃ nimittaṃ
atk-s0201a:763_1: nāvajjissati, sesaṃ dutiyavārānusārena veditabbaṃ. “Ayaṃ kho, āvuso”tiādi “ko nu
atk-s0201a:764_0: 60. Idāni taṃ aṅgaṇaṃ nānappakārato pākaṭaṃ kārāpetukāmenāyasmatā mahāmoggallānena
atk-s0201a:764_1: “aṅgaṇaṃ aṅgaṇa”ntiādinā nayena puṭṭho taṃ byākaronto pāpakānaṃ kho etaṃ, āvusotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:764_2: Tattha icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ, icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ pavattānaṃ nānappakārānaṃ
atk-s0201a:764_3: kopaappaccayānanti attho. Yaṃ idhekaccassāti yena idhekaccassa evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya,
atk-s0201a:764_4: taṃ ṭhānaṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ vijjati atthi, upalabbhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Āpanno assanti āpanno
atk-s0201a:764_5: bhaveyyaṃ. Na ca maṃ bhikkhū jāneyyunti bhikkhū ca maṃ na jāneyyuṃ. Kiṃ panettha
atk-s0201a:764_6: ṭhānaṃ, lābhatthikatā. Lābhatthiko hi bhikkhu pakatiyāpi ca katapuñño manussehi sakkato
atk-s0201a:764_7: garukato evaṃ cinteti “āpattiṃ āpannaṃ bhikkhuṃ therā ñatvā majjhimānaṃ ārocenti,
atk-s0201a:764_8: te navakānaṃ, navakā vihāre vighāsādādīnaṃ, te ovādaṃ āgatānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ, evaṃ
atk-s0201a:764_9: kamena catasso parisā jānanti. Evamassa lābhantarāyo hoti. Aho vatāhaṃ āpattiñca
atk-s0201a:764_10: vata āpanno assaṃ, na ca maṃ bhikkhū jāneyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:765_0: Yaṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhū jāneyyunti yena kāraṇena taṃ bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū jāneyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a:765_1: taṃ kāraṇaṃ vijjati kho pana atthiyeva, no natthi. Therā hi ñatvā majjhimānaṃ ārocenti.
atk-s0201a:765_2: Evaṃ so pubbe vuttanayena catūsu parisāsu pākaṭo hoti. Evaṃ pākaṭo ca ayasābhibhūto
atk-s0201a:765_3: gāmasatampi pavisitvā ummārasatesu ṭhānesu uñchitvā yathādhotena pattena nikkhamati.
atk-s0201a:765_4: Tato jānanti maṃ bhikkhū āpattiṃ āpannoti tehi camhi evaṃ nāsitoti cintetvā, iti
atk-s0201a:765_5: so kupito hoti appatīto so iminā kāraṇena kupito ceva hoti kodhābhibhūto appatīto
atk-s0201a:766_0: Yo ceva kho, āvuso, kopo yo ca appaccayo ubhayametaṃ aṅgaṇanti, āvuso, yo cāyaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahito
atk-s0201a:766_1: kopo, yo ca vedanākkhandhasaṅgahito appaccayo, etaṃ ubhayaṃ aṅgaṇanti evamettha attho
atk-s0201a:766_2: daṭṭhabbo. Idañca tādisānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Lobho pana imassa aṅgaṇassa
atk-s0201a:767_0: Anuraho manti purimasadisameva bhikkhuṃ gahetvā vihārapaccante senāsanaṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0201a:767_1: dvāraṃ thaketvā codente icchati. Ṭhānaṃ kho panetanti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ vijjati, yaṃ taṃ
atk-s0201a:767_2: bhikkhuṃ catuparisamajjhe ānetvā byattā vinītā “tayā asukamhi nāma ṭhāne vejjakammaṃ
atk-s0201a:767_3: kata”ntiādinā nayena codeyyuṃ. So catūsu parisāsu pākaṭo hoti. Evaṃ pākaṭo ca ayasābhibhūtoti
atk-s0201a:768_0: Sappaṭipuggaloti samāno puggalo. Samānoti sāpattiko. Paṭipuggaloti codako. Ayaṃ sāpattikeneva
atk-s0201a:768_1: codanaṃ icchati, tvampi imañcimañca āpattiṃ āpanno, taṃ tāva paṭikarohi pacchā maṃ
atk-s0201a:768_2: codessasīti vattuṃ sakkāti maññamāno. Apica jātiādīhipi samāno puggalo sappaṭipuggalo.
atk-s0201a:768_3: Ayañhi attano jātiyā kulena bāhusaccena byattatāya dhutaṅgenāti evamādīhipi samāneneva
atk-s0201a:768_4: codanaṃ icchati, tādisena vuttaṃ nātidukkhaṃ hotīti maññamāno. Appaṭipuggaloti ettha
atk-s0201a:768_5: ayutto paṭipuggalo appaṭipuggalo. Imehi āpattādīhi asadisattā paṭisattu paṭisallo
atk-s0201a:768_6: codako bhavituṃ ayuttoti vuttaṃ hoti. Iti so kupitoti iti so imāya appaṭipuggalacodanāya evaṃ kupito hoti.
atk-s0201a:769_0: Catutthavāre aho vatāti “aho vata re amhākaṃ paṇḍitakā, aho vata re amhākaṃ bahussutakā
atk-s0201a:769_1: tevijjakā”ti garahāyaṃ dissati. “Aho vata maṃ daharaṃyeva samānaṃ rajje abhisiñceyyu”nti
atk-s0201a:769_2: patthanāyaṃ. Idha patthanāyameva. Paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvāti punappunaṃ pucchitvā.
atk-s0201a:769_3: Ayaṃ bhikkhu lābhatthiko bhagavato attānaṃ paṭipucchitabbaṃ icchati, tañca kho anumatipucchāya,
atk-s0201a:769_4: no maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā antaraṃ katvā. Ayañhi passati bhagavantaṃ sāriputtādayo
atk-s0201a:769_5: mahāthere “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sāriputta, moggallāna, kassapa, rāhula cakkhuṃ niccaṃ
atk-s0201a:769_6: vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evaṃ parisamajjhe paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā dhammaṃ desentaṃ,
atk-s0201a:769_7: manusse ca “tesa paṇḍitā therā satthu cittaṃ ārādhentī”ti vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇante, lābhasakkārañca
atk-s0201a:769_8: upaharante. Tasmā taṃ lābhasakkāraṃ icchanto evaṃ cintetvā nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitakhāṇu
atk-s0201a:770_0: Iti so kupitoti atha bhagavā taṃ amanasikaritvāva aññaṃ theraṃ paṭipucchitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:770_1: deseti, tena so kupito hoti bhagavato ca therassa ca. Kathaṃ bhagavato kuppati? “Ahaṃ
atk-s0201a:770_2: pabbajitakālato pabhuti gandhakuṭipariveṇato bahinikkhamanaṃ na jānāmi, sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0201a:770_3: chāyāva na vijahāmi, maṃ nāma pucchitvā dhammadesanāmattampi natthi. Taṃmuhuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:770_4: diṭṭhamattakameva theraṃ pucchitvā dhammaṃ desetī”ti evaṃ bhagavato kuppati. Kathaṃ
atk-s0201a:770_5: therassa kuppati? “Ayaṃ mahallakatthero bhagavato purato khāṇu viya nisīdati, kadā
atk-s0201a:770_6: nu kho imaṃ dhammakammikā abhabbaṭṭhānaṃ pāpetvā nīharissanti, ayañhi yadi imasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:770_7: vihāre na bhaveyya, avassaṃ bhagavā mayā saddhiṃ sallapeyyā”ti evaṃ therassa kuppati.
atk-s0201a:771_0: Purakkhatvā purakkhatvāti purato purato katvā, samparivāretvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ayampi
atk-s0201a:771_1: lābhatthikoyeva, ayañhi passati bahussute bhikkhū mahāparivārena gāmaṃ pavisante,
atk-s0201a:771_2: cetiyaṃ vandante, tesañca taṃ sampattiṃ disvā upāsake pasanne pasannākāraṃ karonte.
atk-s0201a:771_3: Tasmā evaṃ icchati. Kupitoti ayampi dvīsu ṭhānesu kuppati bhikkhūnaṃ therassa ca.
atk-s0201a:771_4: Kathaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ? “Ime yadeva mayhaṃ uppajjati cīvaraṃ vā piṇḍapāto vā, taṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a:771_5: paribhuñjanti, mayhaṃ pana pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito āgacchantopi natthī”ti evaṃ
atk-s0201a:771_6: bhikkhūnaṃ kuppati. Kathaṃ therassa? “Eso mahallakatthero tesu tesu ṭhānesu sayameva
atk-s0201a:771_7: paññāyati, kudāssu nāma naṃ dhammakammikā nikkaḍḍhissanti, imasmiṃ asati avassaṃ
atk-s0201a:772_0: Bhattaggeti bhojanaṭṭhāne. Aggāsananti saṅghattherāsanaṃ. Aggodakanti dakkhiṇodakaṃ.
atk-s0201a:772_1: Aggapiṇḍanti saṅghattherapiṇḍaṃ. Sabbattha vā agganti paṇītādhivacanametaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0201a:772_2: ahameva labheyyanti icchā nātimahāsāvajjā. Na añño bhikkhu labheyyāti pana atimahāsāvajjā.
atk-s0201a:772_3: Ayampi lābhatthiko pāsādiko hoti cīvaradhāraṇādīhi, kadāci pabbajati, kadāci vibbhamati.
atk-s0201a:772_4: Tena so pubbe laddhapubbaṃ āsanādiṃ pacchā alabhanto evaṃ cintesi. Na so bhikkhu
atk-s0201a:772_5: labheyyāti na so bhikkhu therānaṃ aggāsanādīsu tadanusārena majjhimānaṃ aññesañca
atk-s0201a:772_6: navānaṃ kadāci yaṃ vā taṃ vā sabbanihīnaṃ āsanādiṃ labhati. Kupitoti ayampi dvīsu
atk-s0201a:772_7: ṭhānesu kuppati manussānañca therānañca. Kathaṃ manussānaṃ? “Ime maṅgalādīsu maṃ
atk-s0201a:772_8: nissāya bhikkhū labhanti, ete, ‘bhante, ettake bhikkhū gahetvā amhākaṃ anukampaṃ
atk-s0201a:772_9: karothā’ti vadanti, idāni taṃmuhuttaṃ diṭṭhamattakaṃ mahallakattheraṃ gahetvā gatā,
atk-s0201a:772_10: hotu idāni, nesaṃ kicce uppanne jānissāmī”ti evaṃ manussānaṃ kuppati. Kathaṃ therānaṃ?
atk-s0201a:772_11: “Ime nāma yadi na bhaveyyuṃ, maṃyeva manussā nimanteyyu”nti evaṃ therānaṃ kuppati.
atk-s0201a:773_0: Anumodeyyanti anumodanaṃ kareyyaṃ. Ayampi lābhatthiko yaṃ vā taṃ vā khaṇḍānumodanaṃ
atk-s0201a:773_1: jānāti, “so anumodanaṭṭhāne bahū mātugāmā āgacchanti, tā maṃ sañjānitvā tato pabhuti
atk-s0201a:773_2: thālakabhikkhaṃ dassantī”ti patthento evaṃ cintesi. Ṭhānanti bahussutānaṃ anumodanā
atk-s0201a:773_3: bhāro, tena bahussuto anumodeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kupitoti ayampi tīsu ṭhānesu kuppati
atk-s0201a:773_4: manussānaṃ therassa dhammakathikassa ca. Kathaṃ manussānaṃ? “Ime pubbe maṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0201a:773_5: yācanti ‘amhākaṃ nāgatthero amhākaṃ sumanatthero anumodatū’ti, ajja pana nāvocu”nti
atk-s0201a:773_6: evaṃ manussānaṃ kuppati. Kathaṃ therassa? “Ayaṃ saṅghatthero ‘tumhākaṃ kulupakaṃ
atk-s0201a:773_7: nāgattheraṃ sumanattheraṃ upasaṅkamatha, ayaṃ anumodissatī’ti na bhaṇatī”ti evaṃ
atk-s0201a:773_8: therassa kuppati. Kathaṃ dhammakathikassa? “Therena vuttamatteyeva pahāraṃ laddhakukkuṭo
atk-s0201a:773_9: viya turitaturitaṃ vassati, imaṃ nāma nikkaḍḍhantā natthi, imasmiñhi asati ahameva
atk-s0201a:774_0: Ārāmagatānanti vihāre sannipatitānaṃ. Ayampi lābhatthiko yaṃ vā taṃ vā khaṇḍadhammakathaṃ
atk-s0201a:774_1: jānāti, so passati tādisesu ṭhānesu dviyojanatiyojanato sannipatitvā bhikkhū sabbarattikāni
atk-s0201a:774_2: dhammassavanāni suṇante, tuṭṭhacitte ca dahare vā sāmaṇere vā sādhu sādhūti mahāsaddena
atk-s0201a:774_3: sādhukāraṃ dente, tato dutiyadivase antogāmagate bhikkhū upāsakā pucchanti “ke, bhante,
atk-s0201a:774_4: dhammaṃ kathesu”nti. Te bhaṇanti “asuko ca asuko cā”ti. Taṃ sutvā pasannā manussā
atk-s0201a:774_5: dhammakathikānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ karonti. So taṃ icchamāno evaṃ cintesi. Ṭhānanti bahussutānaṃ
atk-s0201a:774_6: vinicchayakusalānaṃ dhammadesanā bhāro, tena bahussuto deseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kupitoti
atk-s0201a:774_7: catuppadikaṃ gāthampi vattuṃ okāsaṃ alabhamāno kupito hoti attano mandabhāvassa “ahañhi
atk-s0201a:775_0: Bhikkhunīnanti ovādatthaṃ vā uddesatthaṃ vā paripucchatthaṃ vā pūjākaraṇatthaṃ vā
atk-s0201a:775_1: ārāmaṃ āgantvā sannipatitabhikkhunīnaṃ. Ayampi lābhatthiko, tassevaṃ hoti imā mahākulā
atk-s0201a:775_2: pabbajitā bhikkhuniyo, tāsu kulesu pavisetvā nisinnāsu manussā pucchissanti “kassa
atk-s0201a:775_3: santike ovādaṃ vā uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā gaṇhathā”ti. Tato vakkhanti “asuko nāma
atk-s0201a:775_4: ayyo bahussuto, tassa detha karothā”ti, tenassa evaṃ icchā uppajjati. Ṭhānanti ovādādayo
atk-s0201a:775_5: nāma bahussutānaṃ bhāro, tena bahussuto deseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kupitoti ayampi dvīsu
atk-s0201a:775_6: ṭhānesu kuppati, tāsañca bhikkhunīnaṃ “imā pubbe maṃ nissāya uposathappavāraṇādīni
atk-s0201a:775_7: labhanti, tā idāni taṃmuhuttaṃ diṭṭhamattakamahallakattherassa santikaṃ gatā”ti.
atk-s0201a:775_8: Dhammakathikassa ca “esa imāsaṃ sahasā ovādaṃ adāsiyevā”ti.
atk-s0201a:776_0: Upāsakānanti, ārāmagatānaṃ upāsakānaṃ. Nissaṭṭhakammantā nāma mahāupāsakā honti,
atk-s0201a:776_1: te puttabhātukānaṃ kammaṃ niyyātetvā dhammaṃ suṇantā vicaranti, ayaṃ tesaṃ desetuṃ
atk-s0201a:776_2: icchati, kiṃ kāraṇā? Ime pasīditvā upāsikānampi ārocessanti, tato saddhiṃ upāsikāhi
atk-s0201a:776_3: mayhameva lābhasakkāraṃ upaharissantīti. Ṭhānaṃ bahussuteneva yojetabbaṃ. Kupitoti
atk-s0201a:776_4: ayampi dvīsu ṭhānesu kuppati, upāsakānañca “ime aññattha suṇanti, amhākaṃ kulupakassa
atk-s0201a:776_5: santike suṇāmāti nāgacchanti, hotu idāni, tesaṃ uppanne kicce jānissāmī”ti dhammakathikassa
atk-s0201a:777: Upāsikānanti ārāmagatānaṃ. Upāsikā nāma āsanapūjādikaraṇatthaṃ vā uposathadivase vā dhammassavanatthaṃ sannipatitā. Sesaṃ upāsakavāre vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a:778_0: Sakkareyyunti sakkaccañca kareyyuṃ, sundarañca kareyyuṃ. Iminā attani kāraṃ karīyamānaṃ
atk-s0201a:778_1: sakkaccaṃ katañca sundarañca pattheti. Garuṃ kareyyunti bhāriyaṃ kareyyuṃ. Iminā
atk-s0201a:778_2: bhikkhūhi attānaṃ garuṭṭhāne ṭhapīyamānaṃ pattheti. Māneyyunti piyāyeyyuṃ. Pūjeyyunti
atk-s0201a:778_3: evaṃ sakkarontā garuṃ karontā mānentā paccayehi pūjeyyunti paccayapūjaṃ pattheti.
atk-s0201a:778_4: Ṭhānanti “piyo garu bhāvaniyo”ti vuttappakāro bahussuto ca sīlavā ca etaṃ vidhiṃ
atk-s0201a:778_5: arahati tena bhikkhū evarūpaṃ evaṃ kareyyunti vuttaṃ hoti. Kupitoti ayampi dvīsu
atk-s0201a:778_6: ṭhānesu kuppati bhikkhūnañca “ime etaṃ sakkarontī”ti therassa ca “imasmiṃ asati maṃyeva
atk-s0201a:778_7: sakkareyyu”nti. Esa nayo ito paresu tīsu vāresu.
atk-s0201a:779_1: cīvarānaṃ. Idhāpi ahameva lābhī assanti icchā nātimahāsāvajjā. Na añño bhikkhu lābhī
atk-s0201a:780_2: sappitelamadhuphāṇitādīnaṃ uttamabhesajjānaṃ. Sabbatthāpi ṭhānaṃ bahussutehi puññavantehi
atk-s0201a:780_3: ca yojetabbaṃ. Kupitoti sabbatthāpi dvīsu ṭhānesu kuppati, manussānañca “imesaṃ nāma
atk-s0201a:780_4: paricitabhāvopi natthi, dīgharattaṃ ekato vasantassa paṃsukūlatthāya vā piṇḍapātatthāya
atk-s0201a:780_5: vā sappitelādikāraṇā vā gharapaṭipāṭiyā carantassāpi me ekadivasampi kiñci paṇītaṃ
atk-s0201a:780_6: paccayaṃ na denti. Āgantukaṃ mahallakaṃ pana disvāva yaṃ icchati, taṃ dentī”ti, therassa
atk-s0201a:780_7: ca “ayampi mahallako imesaṃ attānaṃ dassentoyeva carati, kudāssu nāma naṃ dhammakammikā
atk-s0201a:780_8: nikkaḍḍheyyuṃ, evaṃ imasmiṃ asati ahameva lābhī assa”nti.
atk-s0201a:781: Imesaṃ kho, etaṃ āvusoti imesaṃ heṭṭhā ekūnavīsativārehi vuttānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:782_0: 61. Dissanti ceva sūyanti cāti na icchāvacarā cakkhunā dissanti, na sotena sūyanti,
atk-s0201a:782_1: manoviññāṇavisayattā. Appahīnaicchāvacarassa pana puggalassa icchāvacaravasena pavattakāyakammaṃ
atk-s0201a:782_2: disvā diṭṭhā viya vacīkammaṃ sutvā sutā viya ca honti, tena vuttaṃ “dissanti ceva
atk-s0201a:782_3: sūyanti cā”ti. Paccakkhakāle dissanti, “asuko kira bhikkhu īdiso”ti tirokkhakāle
atk-s0201a:782_4: sūyanti. Kiñcāpīti anuggahagarahavacanaṃ. Tena āraññikattaṃ anuggaṇhāti, icchāvacarānaṃ appahānaṃ garahati.
atk-s0201a:783_0: Tatrāyaṃ yojanā, kiñcāpi so bhikkhu gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā āraññiko hoti,
atk-s0201a:783_1: ante pantasenāsane vasati, ime cassa ettakā icchāvacarā appahīnā. Kiñcāpi so atirekalābhaṃ
atk-s0201a:783_2: paṭikkhipitvā piṇḍapātiko hoti. Kiñcāpi so loluppacāraṃ vajjetvā sapadānacārī hoti.
atk-s0201a:783_3: Kiñcāpi so gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā paṃsukūliko hoti.
atk-s0201a:784_0: Lūkhacīvaradharoti ettha pana lūkhanti satthalūkhaṃ suttalūkhaṃ rajanalūkhanti tīhi
atk-s0201a:784_1: kāraṇehi lūkhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha satthena khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinnaṃ satthalūkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:784_2: nāma, taṃ agghena parihāyati, thūladīghasuttakena sibbitaṃ suttalūkhaṃ nāma, taṃ
atk-s0201a:784_3: phassena parihāyati kharasamphassaṃ hoti. Rajanena rattaṃ rajanalūkhaṃ nāma, taṃ
atk-s0201a:784_4: vaṇṇena parihāyati dubbaṇṇaṃ hoti. Kiñcāpi so bhikkhu evaṃ satthalūkhasuttalūkharajanalūkhacīvaradharo
atk-s0201a:784_5: hoti, ime cassa ettakā icchāvacarā appahīnā dissanti ceva sūyanti ca, atha kho naṃ
atk-s0201a:784_6: viññū sabrahmacārī neva sakkaronti…pe… na pūjentīti. Taṃ kissa hetūti ettha tanti
atk-s0201a:784_7: nipātamattaṃ, kissa hetūti kiṃ kāraṇā. Te hi tassa…pe… sūyanti ca yasmā tassa te
atk-s0201a:784_8: pāpakā sūyanti cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Imesaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ appahīnattāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a:785_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya pākaṭaṃ karonto seyyathāpītiādimāha. Tattha kuṇapanti matakaḷevaraṃ.
atk-s0201a:785_1: Ahissa kuṇapaṃ ahikuṇapaṃ. Evaṃ itarāni. Atipaṭikūlajigucchanīyabhāvato cettha imāneva
atk-s0201a:785_2: tīṇi vuttānīti veditabbāni. Aññesañhi sasasūkarādīnaṃ kuṇapaṃ manussā kaṭukabhaṇḍādīhi
atk-s0201a:785_3: abhisaṅkharitvā paribhuñjantipi. Imesaṃ pana kuṇapaṃ abhinavampi jigucchantiyeva,
atk-s0201a:785_4: ko pana vādo kālātikkamena pūtibhūte. Racayitvāti vaḍḍhetvā, paripūretvāti attho,
atk-s0201a:785_5: kuṇapaṃ gahetvā kaṃsapātiyaṃ pakkhipitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññissāti aparāya. Paṭikujjitvāti
atk-s0201a:785_6: pidahitvā. Antarāpaṇanti āpaṇānamantare mahājanasaṃkiṇṇaṃ racchāmukhaṃ. Paṭipajjeyyunti
atk-s0201a:785_7: gaccheyyuṃ. Jaññajaññaṃ viyāti cokkhacokkhaṃ viya manāpamanāpaṃ viya. Apica vadhukāpaṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0201a:785_8: viyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vadhukāti janetti vuccati, tassā nīyamānaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ jaññaṃ,
atk-s0201a:785_9: ubhayatthāpi ādaravasena vā pasaṃsāvasena vā punaruttaṃ. “Jaññajaññaṃ byā”tipi pāṭho.
atk-s0201a:786_0: Apāpuritvāti vivaritvā. Tassa saha dassanena amanāpatā ca saṇṭhaheyyāti tassa kuṇapassa
atk-s0201a:786_1: dassanena saheva tassa janassa amanāpatā tiṭṭheyya. Amanāpatāti ca “amanāpamida”nti
atk-s0201a:786_2: uppannacittacetasikānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Esa nayo paṭikulyajegucchatāsu. Jighacchitānampīti
atk-s0201a:786_3: chātānampi. Na bhottukamyatā assāti bhuñjitukāmatā na bhaveyya. Pageva suhitānanti
atk-s0201a:786_4: dhātānaṃ pana paṭhamatarameva bhuñjitukāmatā na bhaveyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:787_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamāsaṃsandanā – parisuddhakaṃsapātisadisaṃ imassa pabbajjāliṅgaṃ, kuṇaparacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:787_1: viya icchāvacarānaṃ appahānaṃ, aparakaṃsapātiyā paṭikujjhanaṃ viya āraññikaṅgādīhi
atk-s0201a:787_2: icchāvacarappaṭicchādanaṃ, kaṃsapātiṃ vivaritvā kuṇapadassanena janassa amanāpatā
atk-s0201a:787_3: viya āraññikaṅgādīni anādiyitvā icchāvacaradassanena sabrahmacārīnaṃ asakkārakaraṇāditāti.
atk-s0201a:788_0: 62. Sukkapakkhe pana, kiñcāpīti anuggahapasaṃsāvacanaṃ, tena āraññikattaṃ anuggaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:788_2: vicinitvā apanītakāḷakaṃ. Anekasūpaṃ anekabyañjananti ettha sūpo nāma hatthahāriyo
atk-s0201a:788_3: vuccati. Byañjananti uttaribhaṅgaṃ, tena macchamaṃsamuggasūpādīhi anekasūpaṃ, nānappakāramaṃsādibyañjanehi
atk-s0201a:788_4: anekabyañjananti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:789_0: Upamāsaṃsandane ca sālivarabhattaracanaṃ viya icchāvacarappahānaṃ, aparakaṃsapātiyā
atk-s0201a:789_2: kaṃsapātiṃ vivaritvā sālivarabhattadassanena janassa manāpatā viya gāmantavihārādīni
atk-s0201a:790_0: 63. Upamā maṃ, āvuso sāriputta, paṭibhātīti mayhaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, upamā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0201a:790_1: Ekaṃ upamaṃ vattukāmo ahanti adhippāyo. Paṭibhātu tanti tuyhaṃ paṭibhātu upaṭṭhātu,
atk-s0201a:790_2: vada tvanti adhippāyo. Ekamidāhanti ettha idāti nipātamattaṃ, ekasmiṃ samaye ahanti
atk-s0201a:790_3: vuttaṃ hoti, bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Rājagahe viharāmi giribbajeti, rājagahanti
atk-s0201a:790_4: tassa nagarassa nāmaṃ. Samantato pana giriparikkhepena vajo viya saṇṭhitattā giribbajanti
atk-s0201a:790_5: vuccati. Tasmiṃ nagare viharāmi, taṃ nissāya ahaṃ viharāmīti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha khvāhanti
atk-s0201a:790_6: atha kho ahaṃ. Ettha ca athāti aññādhikāravacanārambhe nipāto. Khoti padapūraṇamatte.
atk-s0201a:790_7: Pubbaṇhasamayanti divasassa pubbabhāgasamayaṃ. Pubbaṇhasamayeti attho, pubbaṇhe vā
atk-s0201a:790_8: samayaṃ pubbaṇhasamayaṃ, pubbaṇhe ekaṃ khaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti, evaṃ accantasaṃyoge
atk-s0201a:790_10: veditabbaṃ. Gāmappavesanatthāya vā saṇṭhapetvā nivāsanavasena, na hi so tato pubbe anivattho ahosi.
atk-s0201a:791_0: Pattacīvaramādāyāti pattaṃ hatthena cīvaraṃ kāyena ādiyitvā. Piṇḍāyāti piṇḍapātatthāya.
atk-s0201a:791_1: Samītīti tassa nāmaṃ. Yānakāraputtoti rathakāraputto. Paṇḍuputtoti paṇḍussa putto.
atk-s0201a:791_2: Ājīvakoti naggasamaṇako. Purāṇayānakāraputtoti porāṇayānakārakulassa putto. Paccupaṭṭhitoti
atk-s0201a:791_3: upagantvā ṭhito. Vaṅkaṃ nāma ekato kuṭilaṃ. Jimhaṃ nāma sappagatamaggasadisaṃ. Dosanti
atk-s0201a:791_4: phegguvisamagaṇṭhikādi. Yathā yathāti kālatthe nipāto, yadā yadā yasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāleti
atk-s0201a:791_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā tathāti ayampi kālatthoyeva, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāleti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:791_6: So attano suttānulomena cintesi, itaro tena cintitakkhaṇe cintitaṭṭhānameva tacchati.
atk-s0201a:791_7: Attamanoti sakamano tuṭṭhamano pītisomanassehi gahitamano. Attamanavācaṃ nicchāresīti
atk-s0201a:791_8: attamanatāya vācaṃ, attamanabhāvassa vā yuttaṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi udīrayi, pabyāharīti
atk-s0201a:791_9: vuttaṃ hoti. Hadayā hadayaṃ maññe aññāyāti cittena cittaṃ jānitvā viya.
atk-s0201a:792_0: Assaddhāti buddhadhammasaṅghesu saddhāvirahitā. Jīvikatthāti iṇabhayādīhi pīḷitā
atk-s0201a:792_1: bahi jīvituṃ asakkontā idha jīvikatthikā hutvā. Na saddhāti na saddhāya. Saṭhā māyāvinoti
atk-s0201a:792_2: māyāsāṭheyyehi yuttā. Ketabinoti sikkhitakerāṭikā, nipphannathāmagatasāṭheyyāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:792_4: vuccati. Unnaḷāti uggatanaḷā, uṭṭhitatucchamānāti vuttaṃ hoti. Capalāti pattacīvaramaṇḍanādinā
atk-s0201a:792_5: cāpallena yuttā. Mukharāti mukhakharā, kharavacanāti vuttaṃ hoti, vikiṇṇavācāti asaṃyatavacanā,
atk-s0201a:792_6: divasampi niratthakavacanappalāpino. Indriyesu aguttadvārāti chasu indriyesu asaṃvutakammadvārā.
atk-s0201a:792_7: Bhojane amattaññunoti bhojane yā mattā jānitabbā pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu
atk-s0201a:792_8: yuttatā, tassā ajānanakā. Jāgariyaṃ ananuyuttāti jāgare ananuyuttā. Sāmaññe anapekkhavantoti
atk-s0201a:792_9: samaṇadhamme nirapekkhā, dhammānudhammappaṭipattirahitāti attho. Sikkhāya na tibbagāravāti
atk-s0201a:792_10: sikkhāpadesu bahulagāravā na honti, āpattivītikkamabahulā vā. Bāhulikātiādi dhammadāyāde
atk-s0201a:793_0: Saddhā agārasmāti pakatiyāpi saddhā, pabbajitāpi saddhāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā.
atk-s0201a:793_1: Pivanti maññe ghasanti maññeti pivanti viya ghasanti viya. Attamanavācaṃ nicchārentā
atk-s0201a:793_2: vacasā pivanti viya, abbhanumodantā manasā ghasanti viya. Sādhu vatāti sundaraṃ vata.
atk-s0201a:793_3: Sabrahmacārīti rassampi vaṭṭati dīghampi. Rasse sati sāriputtassa upari hoti, dīghe
atk-s0201a:793_4: sati sabrahmacārīnaṃ. Yadā sāriputtassa upari hoti, tadā sabrahmacārī sāriputto amhe
atk-s0201a:793_5: akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvāti attho. Yadā sabrahmacārīnaṃ, tadā sabrahmacārayo akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvāti
atk-s0201a:793_6: attho. Daharoti taruṇo. Yuvāti yobbanabhāve ṭhito. Maṇḍanakajātikoti alaṅkārakasabhāvo.
atk-s0201a:793_7: Tattha koci taruṇopi yuvā na hoti yathā atitaruṇo, koci yuvāpi maṇḍanakajātiko na
atk-s0201a:793_8: hoti yathā upasantasabhāvo, ālasiyabyasanādīhi vā abhibhūto, idha pana daharo ceva
atk-s0201a:793_9: yuvā ca maṇḍanakajātiko ca adhippeto, tasmā evamāha. Uppalādīni lokasammatattā vuttāni.
atk-s0201a:793_10: Itiha teti evaṃ te. Ubho mahānāgāti dvepi mahānāgā, dvepi hi ete aggasāvakā “mahānāgā”ti
atk-s0201a:793_11: vuccanti. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho, chandādīhi na gacchantīti nāgā, tena tena maggena
atk-s0201a:793_12: pahīne kilese na āgacchantīti nāgā, nānappakārakaṃ āguṃ na karontīti nāgā, ayamettha
atk-s0201a:793_13: saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana mahāniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Apica –
atk-s0201a:798_0: Evamettha attho veditabbo. Mahantā nāgā mahānāgā, aññehi khīṇāsavanāgehi pujjatarā
atk-s0201a:798_1: ca pāsaṃsatarā cāti attho. Aññamaññassāti añño aññassa. Samanumodiṃsūti samaṃ anumodiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:798_2: Tattha imāya upamāya mahāmoggallāno anumodi, paṭibhātu taṃ āvusoti dhammasenāpati.
atk-s0201a:803: 64. Evaṃ me sutanti ākaṅkheyyasuttaṃ. Tattha sampannasīlāti tividhaṃ sampannaṃ paripuṇṇasamaṅgimadhuravasena. Tattha –
atk-s0201a:805: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na naṃ vāretumussahe”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:806_0: Idaṃ paripuṇṇasampannaṃ nāma. “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato
atk-s0201a:806_1: samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato”ti idaṃ samaṅgisampannaṃ nāma. “Imissā,
atk-s0201a:806_2: bhante, mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatalaṃ sampannaṃ, seyyathāpi khuddamadhuṃ aneḷakaṃ,
atk-s0201a:806_3: evamassāda”nti idaṃ madhurasampannaṃ nāma. Idha pana paripuṇṇasampannampi samaṅgisampannampi
atk-s0201a:806_4: vaṭṭati. Tasmā sampannasīlāti paripuṇṇasīlā hutvātipi sīlasamaṅgino hutvātipi evamettha
atk-s0201a:806_5: attho vedibbo. Sīlanti kenaṭṭhena sīlaṃ? Sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ. Tassa vitthārakathā
atk-s0201a:807_0: Tattha “paripuṇṇasīlā”ti iminā atthena khettadosavigamena khettapāripūrī viya sīladosavigamena
atk-s0201a:807_1: sīlapāripūrī vuttā hoti. Yathā hi khettaṃ bījakhaṇḍaṃ vappakhaṇḍaṃ udakakhaṇḍaṃ ūsakhaṇḍanti
atk-s0201a:808_0: Tattha bījakhaṇḍaṃ nāma yattha antarantarā bījāni khaṇḍāni vā pūtīni vā honti, tāni
atk-s0201a:808_1: yattha vapanti, tattha sassaṃ na uṭṭheti, khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti. Vappakhaṇḍaṃ nāma
atk-s0201a:808_2: yattha akusalo bījāni vapanto antarantarā nipāteti. Evañhi sabbattha sassaṃ na uṭṭheti,
atk-s0201a:808_3: khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti. Udakakhaṇḍaṃ nāma yattha katthaci udakaṃ atibahu vā na vā hoti,
atk-s0201a:808_4: tatrāpi hi sassāni na uṭṭhenti, khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti. Ūsakhaṇḍaṃ nāma yattha kassako
atk-s0201a:808_5: kismiñci padese naṅgalena bhūmiṃ cattāro pañca vāre kasanto atigambhīraṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:808_6: tato ūsaṃ uppajjati, tatrāpi hi sassaṃ na uṭṭheti, khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti, tādisañca
atk-s0201a:808_7: khettaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti na mahānisaṃsaṃ, tatrāpi hi bahumpi vapitvā appaṃ labhati.
atk-s0201a:808_8: Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ dosānaṃ vigamā khettaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti. Tādisañca khettaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-s0201a:808_9: hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ. Evameva khaṇḍaṃ chiddaṃ sabalaṃ kammāsanti catudosasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0201a:808_10: sīlaṃ aparipūraṃ hoti. Tādisañca sīlaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti, na mahānisaṃsaṃ. Imesaṃ
atk-s0201a:808_11: pana catunnaṃ dosānaṃ vigamā sīlakhettaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, tādisañca sīlaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ.
atk-s0201a:809_0: “Sīlasamaṅgino”ti iminā panatthena sīlena samaṅgibhūtā samodhānaṃ gatā samannāgatā
atk-s0201a:809_1: hutvā viharathāti idameva vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha dvīhi kāraṇehi sampannasīlatā hoti
atk-s0201a:809_2: sīlavipattiyā ca ādīnavadassanena sīlasampattiyā ca ānisaṃsadassanena. Tadubhayampi
atk-s0201a:810_0: Tattha “sampannasīlā”ti ettāvatā kira bhagavā catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā”ti
atk-s0201a:810_1: iminā tattha jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ vitthāretvā dassesīti dīpavihāravāsī sumanatthero āha.
atk-s0201a:810_2: Antevāsiko panassa tepiṭakacūḷanāgatthero āha – ubhayatthāpi pātimokkhasaṃvaro bhagavatā
atk-s0201a:810_3: vutto, pātimokkhasaṃvaroyeva hi sīlaṃ. Itarāni pana tīṇi sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma
atk-s0201a:810_4: atthīti ananujānanto vatvā āha – “indriyasaṃvaro nāma chadvārarakkhāmattakameva,
atk-s0201a:810_5: ājīvapārisuddhi dhammena samena paccayuppattimattakaṃ, paccayanissitaṃ paṭiladdhapaccaye
atk-s0201a:810_7: sīlaṃ. Yassa so bhinno, ayaṃ chinnasīso viya puriso hatthapāde sesāni rakkhissatīti
atk-s0201a:810_8: na vattabbo. Yassa pana so arogo, ayaṃ acchinnasīso viya puriso jīvitaṃ sesāni puna
atk-s0201a:810_9: pākatikāni katvā rakkhituṃ sakkoti. Tasmā ‘sampannasīlā’ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ
atk-s0201a:810_10: uddisitvā ‘sampannapātimokkhā’ti tasseva vevacanaṃ vatvā taṃ vitthāretvā dassento
atk-s0201a:811_1: ācārena ca gocarena ca sampannā. Aṇumattesūti appamattakesu. Vajjesūti akusaladhammesu.
atk-s0201a:811_2: Bhayadassāvīti bhayadassino. Samādāyāti sammā ādiyitvā. Sikkhatha sikkhāpadesūti
atk-s0201a:811_3: sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhatha. Apica samādāya sikkhatha
atk-s0201a:811_4: sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu sikkhitabbaṃ kāyikaṃ vācasikañca, taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:811_5: samādāya sikkhathāti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana sabbānetāni pātimokkhasaṃvarādīni
atk-s0201a:812_0: 65. Ākaṅkheyya ceti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? Sīlānisaṃsadassanatthaṃ. Sacepi acirapabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0201a:812_1: vā duppaññānaṃ vā evamassa “bhagavā sīlaṃ pūrethāti vadati, ko nu kho sīlapūraṇe
atk-s0201a:812_2: ānisaṃso, ko viseso, kā vaḍḍhī”ti? Tesaṃ sattarasa ānisaṃse dassetuṃ evamāha. Appeva
atk-s0201a:812_3: nāma etaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyamanāpatādiāsavakkhayapariyosānaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ sutvāpi
atk-s0201a:812_4: sīlaṃ paripūreyyunti. Visakaṇṭakavāṇijo viya. Visakaṇṭakavāṇijo nāma guḷavāṇijo vuccati.
atk-s0201a:813_0: So kira guḷaphāṇitakhaṇḍasakkharādīni sakaṭenādāya paccantagāmaṃ gantvā “visakaṇṭakaṃ
atk-s0201a:813_1: gaṇhatha, visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti ugghosesi. Taṃ sutvā gāmikā “visaṃ nāma kakkhaḷaṃ,
atk-s0201a:813_2: yo naṃ khādati, so marati, kaṇṭakampi vijjhitvā māreti, ubhopete kakkhaḷā, ko ettha
atk-s0201a:813_3: ānisaṃso”ti gehadvārāni thakesuṃ, dārake ca palāpesuṃ. Taṃ disvā vāṇijo “avohārakusalā
atk-s0201a:813_4: ime gāmikā, handa ne upāyena gaṇhāpemī”ti “atimadhuraṃ gaṇhatha, atisāduṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0201a:813_5: guḷaṃ phāṇitaṃ sakkharaṃ samagghaṃ labbhati, kūṭamāsakakūṭakahāpaṇādīhipi labbhatī”ti
atk-s0201a:813_6: ugghosesi. Taṃ sutvā gāmikā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā āgantvā bahumpi mūlaṃ datvā gahesuṃ. Tattha
atk-s0201a:813_7: vāṇijassa “visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti ugghosanaṃ viya bhagavato “sampannasīlā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:813_8: viharatha…pe… samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesū”ti vacanaṃ. “Ubhopete kakkhaḷā, ko
atk-s0201a:813_9: ettha ānisaṃso”ti gāmikānaṃ cintanaṃ viya bhagavā “sampannasīlā viharathā”ti āha,
atk-s0201a:813_10: “sīlañca nāmetaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ pharusaṃ khiḍḍādipaccanīkaṃ, ko nu kho sampannasīlānaṃ
atk-s0201a:813_11: ānisaṃso”ti bhikkhūnaṃ cintanaṃ. Atha tassa vāṇijassa “atimadhuraṃ gaṇhathā”tiādivacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:814_0: Tattha ākaṅkheyya ceti yadi ākaṅkheyya yadi iccheyya. Piyo ca assanti piyacakkhūhi
atk-s0201a:814_1: sampassitabbo, sinehuppattiyā padaṭṭhānabhūto bhaveyyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Manāpoti tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:814_2: manavaḍḍhanako, tesaṃ vā manena pattabbo, mettacittena pharitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:814_3: Garūti tesaṃ garuṭṭhāniyo pāsāṇacchattasadiso. Bhāvanīyoti “addhā ayamāyasmā jānaṃ
atk-s0201a:814_4: jānāti passaṃ passatī”ti evaṃ sambhāvanīyo. Sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti catupārisuddhisīlesuyeva
atk-s0201a:814_5: paripūrakārī assa, anūnena paripūritākārena samannāgato bhaveyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0201a:814_6: cetosamathamanuyuttoti attano cittasamathe yutto, ettha hi ajjhattanti vā attanoti
atk-s0201a:814_7: vā etaṃ ekatthaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Bhummatthe panetaṃ samathanti upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:814_8: Anūti iminā upasaggena yoge siddhaṃ. Anirākatajjhānoti bahi anīhaṭajjhāno, avināsitajjhāno
atk-s0201a:814_9: vā, nīharaṇavināsatthañhi idaṃ nirākaraṇaṃ nāma. Thambhaṃ niraṃkatvā nivātavuttītiādīsu
atk-s0201a:815_0: Vipassanāya samannāgatoti sattavidhāya anupassanāya yutto, sattavidhā anupassanā
atk-s0201a:815_1: nāma aniccānupassanā dukkhānupassanā anattānupassanā nibbidānupassanā virāgānupassanā
atk-s0201a:815_2: nirodhānupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanāti. Tā visuddhimagge vitthāritā. Brūhetā suññāgārānanti
atk-s0201a:815_3: vaḍḍhetā suññāgārānaṃ, ettha ca samathavipassanāvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā rattindivaṃ
atk-s0201a:815_4: suññāgāraṃ pavisitvā nisīdamāno bhikkhu “brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti veditabbo. Ekabhūmakādipāsāde
atk-s0201a:815_5: kurumānopi pana neva suññāgārānaṃ brūhetāti daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0201a:816_0: Ettāvatā ca yathā taṇhāvicaritadesanā paṭhamaṃ taṇhāvasena āraddhāpi taṇhāpadaṭṭhānattā
atk-s0201a:816_1: mānadiṭṭhīnaṃ mānadiṭṭhiyo osaritvā kamena papañcattayadesanā jātā, evamayaṃ desanā
atk-s0201a:816_2: paṭhamaṃ adhisīlasikkhāvasena āraddhāpi sīlapadaṭṭhānattā samathavipassanānaṃ samathavipassanāyo
atk-s0201a:817_0: Ettha hi “sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”ti ettāvatā adhisīlasikkhā vuttā. “Ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0201a:817_2: ettāvatā adhipaññāsikkhā, “brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti iminā pana samathavasena suññāgāravaḍḍhane
atk-s0201a:817_3: adhicittasikkhā, vipassanāvasena adhipaññāsikkhāti evaṃ dvepi sikkhā saṅgahetvā vuttā.
atk-s0201a:817_4: Ettha ca “ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyutto anirākatajjhāno”ti imehi padehi sīlānurakkhikā
atk-s0201a:817_5: eva cittekaggatā kathitā. “Vipassanāyā”ti iminā padena sīlānurakkhiko saṅkhārapariggaho.
atk-s0201a:818_0: Kathaṃ cittekaggatā sīlamanurakkhati? Yassa hi cittekaggatā natthi, so byādhimhi
atk-s0201a:818_1: uppanne vihaññati, so byādhivihato vikkhittacitto sīlaṃ vināsetvāpi byādhivūpasamaṃ
atk-s0201a:818_2: kattā hoti. Yassa pana cittekaggatā atthi, so taṃ byādhidukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā samāpattiṃ
atk-s0201a:818_3: samāpajjati, samāpannakkhaṇe dukkhaṃ dūrāpakataṃ hoti, balavatarasukhamuppajjati.
atk-s0201a:819_0: Kathaṃ saṅkhārapariggaho sīlamanurakkhati? Yassa hi saṅkhārapariggaho natthi, tassa
atk-s0201a:819_1: “mama rūpaṃ mama viññāṇa”nti attabhāve balavamamattaṃ hoti, so tathārūpesu dubbhikkhabyādhibhayādīsu
atk-s0201a:819_2: sampattesu sīlaṃ vināsetvāpi attabhāvaṃ posetā hoti. Yassa pana saṅkhārapariggaho
atk-s0201a:819_3: atthi, tassa attabhāve balavamamattaṃ vā sineho vā na hoti, so tathārūpesu dubbhikkhabyādhibhayādīsu
atk-s0201a:819_4: sampattesu sacepissa antāni bahi nikkhamanti, sacepi ussussati visussati, khaṇḍākhaṇḍiko
atk-s0201a:819_5: vā hoti satadhāpi sahassadhāpi, neva sīlaṃ vināsetvā attabhāvaṃ posetā hoti. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:819_6: saṅkhārapariggaho sīlamanurakkhati. “Brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti iminā pana tasseva ubhayassa
atk-s0201a:820_0: Evaṃ bhagavā yasmā “sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo cassaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti
atk-s0201a:820_1: ime cattāro dhamme ākaṅkhantena natthaññaṃ kiñci kātabbaṃ, aññadatthu sīlādiguṇasamannāgatena
atk-s0201a:820_2: bhavitabbaṃ, idiso hi sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo. Vuttampi hetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:822: Attano kamma kubbānaṃ, taṃ jano kurute piya”nti. ;
atk-s0201a:823_0: Tasmā “ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo cassaṃ manāpo ca garu
atk-s0201a:823_1: ca bhāvanīyo cāti sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī…pe… suññāgārāna”nti vatvā idāni yasmā
atk-s0201a:823_2: paccayalābhādiṃ patthayantenāpi idameva karaṇīyaṃ, na aññaṃ kiñci, tasmā “ākaṅkheyya
atk-s0201a:823_3: ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu lābhī assa”ntiādimāha. Na cettha bhagavā lābhanimittaṃ sīlādiparipūraṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:823_4: kathetīti veditabbo. Bhagavā hi ghāsesanaṃ chinnakatho na vācaṃ payuttaṃ bhaṇeti,
atk-s0201a:823_5: evaṃ sāvake ovadati, so kathaṃ lābhanimittaṃ sīlādiparipūraṇaṃ kathessati, puggalajjhāsayavasena
atk-s0201a:823_6: panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yesañhi evaṃ ajjhāsayo bhaveyya “sace mayaṃ catūhi paccayehi na kilameyyāma,
atk-s0201a:823_7: sīlādiṃ pūretuṃ sakkuṇeyyāmā”ti, tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasena bhagavā evamāha. Apica rasānisaṃso
atk-s0201a:823_8: esa sīlassa, yadidaṃ cattāro paccayā nāma. Tathā hi paṇḍitamanussā koṭṭhādīsu ṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0201a:823_9: nīharitvā puttādīnampi adatvā attanāpi aparibhuñjitvā sīlavantānaṃ dentīti sīlassa
atk-s0201a:824_0: Tatiyavāre yesāhanti yesaṃ ahaṃ. Tesaṃ te kārāti tesaṃ devānaṃ vā manussānaṃ vā te
atk-s0201a:824_1: mayi katā paccayadānakārā. Devāpi hi sīlādiguṇayuttānaṃ paccaye denti, na kevalaṃ
atk-s0201a:824_2: manussāyeva, sakko viya āyasmato mahākassapassa. Mahapphalā mahānisaṃsāti ubhayametaṃ
atk-s0201a:824_3: atthato ekaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Mahantaṃ vā lokiyasukhaṃ phalantīti mahapphalā.
atk-s0201a:824_4: Mahato lokuttarasukhassa ca paccayā hontīti mahānisaṃsā. Sīlādiguṇayuttassa hi kaṭacchubhikkhāpi
atk-s0201a:824_5: pañcaratanamattāya bhūmiyā paṇṇasālāpi katvā dinnā anekāni kappasahassāni duggativinipātato
atk-s0201a:824_6: rakkhati, pariyosāne ca amatāya parinibbānadhātuyāpaccayo hoti. “Khīrodanaṃ ahamadāsi”ntiādīni
atk-s0201a:824_7: cettha vatthūni, sakalameva vā petavatthu vimānavatthu ca sādhakaṃ. Tasmā paccayadāyakehi
atk-s0201a:824_8: attani katānaṃ kārānaṃ mahapphalataṃ icchantenāpi sīlādiguṇayutteneva bhavitabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:825_0: Catutthavāre ñātīti sassusasurapakkhikā. Sālohitāti ekalohitasambaddhā pītipitāmahādayo.
atk-s0201a:825_1: Petāti peccabhāvaṃ gatā. Kālaṅkatāti matā. Tesaṃ tanti tesaṃ taṃ mayi pasannacittataṃ
atk-s0201a:825_2: vā pasannena cittena anussaraṇaṃ vā. Yassa hi bhikkhuno kālaṅkato pitā vā mātā vā
atk-s0201a:825_3: “amhākaṃ ñātako thero sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo”ti pasannacitto hutvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ anussarati,
atk-s0201a:825_4: tassa so cittappasādopi taṃ anussaraṇamattampi mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:825_5: anekāni kappasatasahassāni duggatito vāretuṃ ante ca amataṃ pāpetuṃ samatthameva
atk-s0201a:825_6: hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sīlasampannā samādhisampannā
atk-s0201a:825_7: paññā, vimutti, vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā, dassanaṃpāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0201a:825_8: bahukāraṃ vadāmi. Savanaṃ, anussatiṃ, anupabbajjaṃ, upasaṅkamanaṃ, payirupāsanaṃpāhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:825_9: bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahukāraṃ vadāmī”ti. Tasmā ñātisālohitānaṃ attani cittappasādassa
atk-s0201a:825_10: anussatiyā ca mahapphalataṃ icchantenāpi sīlādiguṇayutteneva, bhavitabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:826_0: 66. Pañcamavāre aratiratisaho assanti aratiyā ratiyā ca saho abhibhavitā ajjhottharitā
atk-s0201a:826_1: bhaveyyaṃ. Ettha ca aratīti adhikusalesu dhammesu pantasenāsanesu ca ukkaṇṭhā. Ratīti
atk-s0201a:826_2: pañcakāmaguṇarati. Na ca maṃ arati saheyyāti mañca arati na abhibhaveyya na maddeyya
atk-s0201a:826_3: na ajjhotthareyya. Uppannanti jātaṃ nibbattaṃ. Sīlādiguṇayutto hi aratiñca ratiñca
atk-s0201a:826_4: sahati ajjhottharati madditvā tiṭṭhati. Tasmā īdisaṃ attānaṃ icchantenāpi sīlādiguṇayutteneva
atk-s0201a:827_0: Chaṭṭhavāre bhayaṃ cittutrāsopi ārammaṇampi. Bheravaṃ ārammaṇameva. Sesaṃ pañcamavāre
atk-s0201a:827_1: vuttanayameva. Sīlādiguṇayutto hi bhayabheravaṃ sahati ajjhottharati madditvā tiṭṭhati
atk-s0201a:828_0: Thero kira maggaṃ paṭipanno aññataraṃ pāsādikaṃ araññaṃ disvā “idhevajja samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:828_1: katvā gamissāmī”ti maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0201a:828_2: ābhujitvā nisīdi. Rukkhadevatāya dārakā therassa sīlatejena sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ
atk-s0201a:828_3: asakkontā vissaramakaṃsu. Devatāpi rukkhaṃ cālesi. Thero acalova nisīdi. Sā devatā
atk-s0201a:828_4: dhūmāyi, pajjali, neva sakkhi theraṃ cāletuṃ, tato upāsakavaṇṇenāgantvā vanditvā
atk-s0201a:828_5: aṭṭhāsi. “Ko eso”ti vuttā “ahaṃ, bhante, etasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā”ti avoca.
atk-s0201a:828_6: Tvaṃ ete vikāre akāsīti. Āma bhanteti. Kasmāti ca vuttā āha – “tumhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:828_7: sīlatejena dārakā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā vissaramakaṃsu, sāhaṃ tumhe palāpetuṃ
atk-s0201a:828_8: evamakāsi”nti. Thero āha – “atha kasmā idha, bhante, mā vasatha, mayhaṃ aphāsūti
atk-s0201a:828_9: paṭikacceva nāvacāsi. Idāni pana mā kiñci avaca, ariyakoṭiyamahādatto amanussabhayena
atk-s0201a:828_10: gatoti vacanato lajjāmi, tenāhaṃ idheva vasissaṃ, tvaṃ pana ajjekadivasaṃ yattha
atk-s0201a:828_11: katthaci vasāhī”ti. Evaṃ sīlādiguṇayutto bhayabheravasaho hoti. Tasmā īdisamattānaṃ
atk-s0201a:829_0: Sattamavāre ābhicetasikānanti abhicetoti abhikkantaṃ visuddhacittaṃ vuccati, adhicittaṃ
atk-s0201a:829_1: vā, abhicetasi jātāni ābhicetasikāni, abhiceto sannissitānīti vā ābhicetasikāni.
atk-s0201a:829_3: attabhāvo vuccati, tattha sukhavihārabhūtānanti attho, rūpāvacarajjhānānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:829_4: Tāni hi appetvā nisinnā jhāyino imasmiṃyeva attabhāve asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ nekkhammasukhaṃ
atk-s0201a:829_5: vindanti, tasmā “diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānī”ti vuccanti. Nikāmalābhīti nikāmena lābhī
atk-s0201a:829_6: attano icchāvasena lābhī, icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjituṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:829_7: Akicchalābhīti sukheneva paccanīkadhamme vikkhambhetvā samāpajjituṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:829_8: hoti. Akasiralābhīti akasirānaṃ vipulānaṃ lābhī, yathāparicchedeyeva vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthoti
atk-s0201a:829_9: vuttaṃ hoti. Ekacco hi lābhīyeva hoti, na pana sakkoti icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjituṃ.
atk-s0201a:829_10: Ekacco sakkoti tathā samāpajjituṃ, pāribandhike pana kicchena vikkhambheti. Ekacco
atk-s0201a:829_11: tathā samāpajjati, pāribandhike ca akiccheneva vikkhambheti, na sakkoti nāḷikāyantaṃ
atk-s0201a:829_12: viya yathāparicchedeyeva ca vuṭṭhātuṃ. Yo pana imaṃ tividhampi sampadaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a:830_0: Evaṃ abhiññāpādake jhāne vutte kiñcāpi abhiññānaṃ vāro āgato, atha kho naṃ bhagavā
atk-s0201a:830_1: aggahetvāva yasmā na kevalaṃ abhiññāpādakajjhānāni ca abhiññāyoyeva ca sīlānaṃ ānisaṃso,
atk-s0201a:830_2: apica kho cattāri āruppajhānānipi tayo ca heṭṭhimā ariyamaggā, tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ pariyādiyitvā
atk-s0201a:830_3: dassetuṃ ākaṅkheyya ce…pe… ye te santāti evamādimāha.
atk-s0201a:831_0: Tattha santāti aṅgasantatāya ceva ārammaṇasantatāya ca. Vimokkhāti paccanīkadhammehi
atk-s0201a:831_1: vimuttattā ārammaṇe ca adhimuttattā. Atikkamma rūpeti rūpāvacarajjhāne atikkamitvā,
atk-s0201a:831_2: ye te vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe santāti padasambandho, itarathā hi atikkamma rūpe kiṃ
atk-s0201a:831_3: karotīti na paññāyeyyuṃ. Āruppāti ārammaṇato ca vipākato ca rūpavirahitā. Kāyena
atk-s0201a:831_4: phusitvāti nāmakāyena phusitvā pāpuṇitvā, adhigantvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ vuttānameva.
atk-s0201a:831_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yopi bhikkhu ime vimokkhe phusitvā viharitukāmo, sopi sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”ti.
atk-s0201a:832_1: tiṇṇaṃ bandhanānaṃ. Tāni hi saṃyojenti khandhagatibhavādīhi khandhagatibhavādayo,
atk-s0201a:832_2: kammaṃ vā phalena, tasmā saṃyojanānīti vuccanti, bandhanānīti attho. Parikkhayāti
atk-s0201a:832_3: parikkhayena. Sotāpannoti sotaṃ āpanno. Sototi ca maggassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sotāpannoti
atk-s0201a:832_4: taṃsamaṅgipuggalassa. Yathāha “soto sototi hidaṃ, sāriputta, vuccati. Katamo nu kho,
atk-s0201a:832_5: sāriputta, sototi? Ayameva hi, bhante, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Seyyathidaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi…pe…
atk-s0201a:832_6: sammāsamādhīti. Sotāpanno sotāpannoti hidaṃ, sāriputta, vuccati. Katamo nu kho, sāriputta,
atk-s0201a:832_7: sotāpannoti? Yo hi, bhante, iminā aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0201a:832_8: sotāpanno, yoyaṃ āyasmā evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto”ti. Idha pana maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0201a:832_9: tasmā phalaṭṭho “sotāpanno”ti veditabbo. Avinipātadhammoti vinipātetīti vinipāto,
atk-s0201a:832_10: nāssa vinipāto dhammoti avinipātadhammo, na attānaṃ apāye vinipātasabhāvoti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:832_11: hoti. Kasmā? Ye dhammā apāyagamaniyā, tesaṃ pahīnattā. Sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ gati
atk-s0201a:832_12: assāti sambodhiparāyaṇo, uparimaggattayaṃ avassaṃ sampāpakoti attho. Kasmā? Paṭiladdhapaṭhamamaggattā.
atk-s0201a:833_0: Dasamavāre paṭhamamaggena parikkhīṇānipi tīṇi saṃyojanāni sakadāgāmimaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:833_1: vuttāni. Rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttāti etesaṃ tanubhāvena, tanuttakaraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:833_2: Tattha dvīhi kāraṇehi tanuttaṃ veditabbaṃ adhiccuppattiyā ca pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya
atk-s0201a:833_3: ca. Sakadāgāmissa hi vaṭṭānusārimahājanasseva kilesā abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti, kadāci
atk-s0201a:833_4: karahaci uppajjanti viraḷākārā hutvā, viraḷavāpite khette aṅkurā viya. Uppajjamānāpi
atk-s0201a:833_5: ca vaṭṭānusārimahājanasseva maddantā pharantā chādentā andhakāraṃ karontā na uppajjanti,
atk-s0201a:833_6: mandamandā uppajjanti tanukākārā hutvā, abbhapaṭalamiva makkhikāpattamiva ca.
atk-s0201a:834_0: Tattha keci therā bhaṇanti “sakadāgāmissa kilesā kiñcāpi cirena uppajjanti, bahalāva
atk-s0201a:834_1: uppajjanti, tathā hissa puttā ca dhītaro ca dissantī”ti, etaṃ pana appamāṇaṃ. Puttadhītaro
atk-s0201a:834_2: hi aṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanamattenapi hontīti. Dvīhiyeva kāraṇehissa kilesānaṃ tanuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:835_0: Sakadāgāmīti sakiṃ āgamanadhammo. Sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvāti ekavāraṃyeva imaṃ
atk-s0201a:835_1: manussalokaṃ paṭisandhivasena āgantvā. Yopi hi idha sakadāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā idheva
atk-s0201a:835_2: parinibbāti, sopi idha na gahito. Yopi idha maggaṃ bhāvetvā devesu upapajjitvā tattheva
atk-s0201a:835_3: parinibbāti. Yopi devaloke maggaṃ bhāvetvā tattheva parinibbāti. Yopi devaloke maggaṃ
atk-s0201a:835_4: bhāvetvā idheva manussaloke nibbattitvā parinibbāti. Yo pana idha maggaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-s0201a:835_5: devaloke nibbatto, tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā puna idheva upapajjitvā parinibbāti,
atk-s0201a:835_6: ayamidha gahitoti veditabbo. Dukkhassantaṃ kareyyanti vaṭṭadukkhassa paricchedaṃ
atk-s0201a:835_7: kareyyaṃ. Sīlesvevāti īdiso hotukāmopi sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti.
atk-s0201a:836_0: Ekādasamavāre pañcannanti gaṇanaparicchedo. Orambhāgiyānanti oraṃ vuccati heṭṭhā,
atk-s0201a:836_1: heṭṭhābhāgiyānanti attho, kāmāvacaraloke uppattipaccayānanti adhippāyo. Saṃyojanānanti
atk-s0201a:836_2: bandhanānaṃ, tāni kāmarāgabyāpādasaṃyojanehi saddhiṃ pubbe vuttasaṃyojanāneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a:836_3: Yassa hi etāni appahīnāni, so kiñcāpi bhavagge uppanno hoti, atha kho āyuparikkhayā
atk-s0201a:836_4: kāmāvacare nibbattatiyeva, gilitabalisamacchūpamo svāyaṃ puggalo dīghasuttakena pāde
atk-s0201a:836_5: baddhavihaṅgūpamo cāti veditabbo. Pubbe vuttānampi cettha vacanaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthamevāti
atk-s0201a:836_7: brahmaloke parinibbāyī. Anāvattidhammo tasmā lokāti tato brahmalokā paṭisandhivasena
atk-s0201a:836_8: puna anāvattisabhāvo. Sīlesvevāti īdiso hotukāmopi sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti.
atk-s0201a:837_0: 68. Evaṃ anāgāmimagge vutte kiñcāpi catutthamaggassa vāro āgato, atha kho naṃ bhagavā
atk-s0201a:837_1: aggahetvāva yasmā na kevalā āsavakkhayābhiññā eva sīlānaṃ ānisaṃso, apica kho lokiyapañcābhiññāyopi,
atk-s0201a:837_2: tasmā tāpi dassetuṃ, yasmā ca āsavakkhaye kathite desanā niṭṭhitā hoti, evañca sati
atk-s0201a:837_3: imesaṃ guṇānaṃ akathitattā ayaṃ kathā muṇḍābhiññākathā nāma bhaveyya, tasmā ca abhiññāpāripūriṃ
atk-s0201a:837_4: katvā dassetumpi, yasmā ca anāgāmimagge ṭhitassa sukhena iddhivikuppanā ijjhati,
atk-s0201a:837_5: samādhiparibandhānaṃ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ samūhatattā, anāgāmī hi sīlesu ca samādhimhi
atk-s0201a:837_6: ca paripūrakārī, tasmā yuttaṭṭhāneyeva lokiyābhiññāyo dassetumpi “ākaṅkheyya ce…pe…
atk-s0201a:838: Tattha “anekavihitaṃ iddhividha”ntiādinā nayena āgatānaṃ pañcannampi lokiyābhiññānaṃ pāḷivaṇṇanā saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttā.
atk-s0201a:839_0: 69. Chaṭṭhābhiññāya āsavānaṃ khayāti arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ khayā. Anāsavanti
atk-s0201a:839_1: āsavavirahitaṃ. Cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttinti ettha cetovacanena arahattaphalasampayuttova
atk-s0201a:839_2: samādhi, paññāvacanena taṃsampayuttā paññāva vuttā. Tattha ca samādhi rāgato vimuttattā
atk-s0201a:839_3: cetovimutti, paññā avijjāya vimuttattā paññāvimuttīti veditabbā. Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0201a:839_4: “yo hissa, bhikkhave, samādhi, tadassa samādhindriyaṃ. Yā hissa, bhikkhave, paññā,
atk-s0201a:839_5: tadassa paññindriyaṃ. Iti kho, bhikkhave, rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttī”ti,
atk-s0201a:839_6: apicettha samathaphalaṃ cetovimutti, vipassanāphalaṃ paññāvimuttīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:840_0: Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanoyeva paññāya
atk-s0201a:840_1: paccakkhaṃ katvā, aparapaccayena ñatvāti attho. Upasampajja vihareyyanti pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0201a:840_2: sampādetvā vihareyyaṃ. Sīlesvevāti evaṃ sabbāsave niddhunitvā cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ
atk-s0201a:841_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sīlānisaṃsakathaṃ yāva arahattā kathetvā idāni sabbampi taṃ sīlānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0201a:841_1: sampiṇḍetvā dassento nigamanaṃ āha “sampannasīlā, bhikkhave…pe… idametaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0201a:841_2: vutta”nti. Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho, “sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharatha…pe… samādāya
atk-s0201a:841_3: sikkhatha sikkhāpadesū”ti iti yaṃ taṃ mayā pubbe evaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ sabbampi sampannasīlo
atk-s0201a:841_4: bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpo, garu bhāvanīyo paccayānaṃ lābhī, paccayadāyakānaṃ
atk-s0201a:841_6: bhayabheravasaho, rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānañca lābhī, heṭṭhimāni tīṇi
atk-s0201a:841_7: sāmaññaphalāni pañca lokiyābhiññā āsavakkhayañāṇanti ca ime ca guṇe sayaṃ abhiññā
atk-s0201a:841_8: sacchikattā hoti, etaṃ paṭicca idaṃ sandhāya vuttanti. Idamavoca bhagavā, attamanā
atk-s0201a:845_0: 70. Evaṃ me sutanti vatthasuttaṃ. Tattha seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vatthanti upamāvacanamevetaṃ.
atk-s0201a:845_1: Upamaṃ karonto ca bhagavā katthaci paṭhamaṃyeva upamaṃ dassetvā pacchā atthaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a:845_2: katthaci paṭhamamatthaṃ dassetvā pacchā upamaṃ, katthaci upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā
