atk-s0201a:980_0: Mūlatoti paṭipāṭiyā satta kammapathā ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosaamohavasena
atk-s0201a:980_1: timūlā honti. Ñāṇavippayuttacittena viramantassa dvimūlā. Anabhijjhā ñāṇasampayuttacittena
atk-s0201a:980_2: viramantassa dvimūlā. Ñāṇavippayuttacittena ekamūlā. Alobho pana attanāva attano
atk-s0201a:980_3: mūlaṃ na hoti, abyāpādepi eseva nayo. Sammādiṭṭhi alobhādosavasena dvimūlāvāti.
atk-s0201a:981_0: Alobho kusalamūlantiādīsu na lobhoti alobho, lobhapaṭipakkhassa dhammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:981_1: Adosāmohesupi eseva nayo. Tesu alobho sayañca kusalaṃ, imesañca pāṇātipātā veramaṇīādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:981_2: kusalānaṃ kesañci sampayuttappabhāvakaṭṭhena kesañci upanissayapaccayaṭṭhena mūlanti
atk-s0201a:982_0: Idāni sabbampi taṃ saṅkhepena ca vitthārena ca desitamatthaṃ nigamento yato kho āvusotiādiappanāvāramāha.
atk-s0201a:982_1: Tattha evaṃ akusalaṃ pajānātīti evaṃ yathāniddiṭṭhadasākusalakammapathavasena akusalaṃ
atk-s0201a:982_2: pajānāti. Evaṃ akusalamūlantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ettāvatā ekena nayena catusaccakammaṭṭhānikassa
atk-s0201a:982_3: yāva arahattā niyyānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Ettha hi ṭhapetvā abhijjhaṃ dasa akusalakammapathā
atk-s0201a:982_4: ca kusalakammapathā ca dukkhasaccaṃ. Abhijjhā ca lobho akusalamūlañcāti ime dve dhammā
atk-s0201a:982_5: nippariyāyena samudayasaccaṃ. Pariyāyena pana sabbepi kammapathā dukkhasaccaṃ. Sabbāni
atk-s0201a:982_6: kusalākusalamūlāni samudayasaccaṃ. Ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ. Dukkhaṃ parijānanto
atk-s0201a:982_7: samudayaṃ pajahamāno nirodhaṃ pajānanto ariyamaggo maggasaccanti iti dve saccāni
atk-s0201a:983_0: So sabbaso rāgānusayaṃ pahāyāti so evaṃ akusalādīni pajānanto sabbākārena rāgānusayaṃ
atk-s0201a:983_1: pajahitvā. Paṭighānusayaṃ paṭivinodetvāti paṭighānusayañca sabbākāreneva nīharitvāti
atk-s0201a:983_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Ettāvatā anāgāmimaggo kathito. Asmīti diṭṭhimānānusayaṃ samūhanitvāti
atk-s0201a:983_3: pañcasu khandhesu kañci dhammaṃ anavakārīkaritvā “asmī”ti iminā samūhaggahaṇākārena
atk-s0201a:984_0: Tattha diṭṭhimānānusayanti diṭṭhisadisaṃ mānānusayanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ayañhi mānānusayo
atk-s0201a:984_1: asmīti pavattattā diṭṭhisadiso hoti, tasmā evaṃ vutto. Imañca asmimānaṃ vitthārato
atk-s0201a:985_0: Avijjaṃ pahāyāti vaṭṭamūlaṃ avijjaṃ pajahitvā. Vijjaṃ uppādetvāti tassā avijjāya
atk-s0201a:985_1: samugghāṭikaṃ arahattamaggavijjaṃ uppādetvā. Ettāvatā arahattamaggo kathito. Diṭṭheva
atk-s0201a:985_2: dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti asmiṃyeva attabhāve vaṭṭadukkhassa paricchedakaro
atk-s0201a:985_3: hoti. Ettāvatāpi kho, āvusoti desanaṃ niyyāteti, imāya kammapathadesanāya vuttamanasikārappaṭivedhavasenapīti
atk-s0201a:985_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Evaṃ anāgāmimaggaarahattamaggehi desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:988_0: 90. Sādhāvusoti kho…pe… āgato imaṃ saddhammanti evaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa kusalākusalamukhena
atk-s0201a:988_1: catusaccadesanaṃ sutvā taṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ “sādhāvuso”ti iminā vacanena
atk-s0201a:988_2: te bhikkhū abhinanditvā imasseva vacanassa samuṭṭhāpakena cittena anumoditvā vacasā
atk-s0201a:988_3: sampaṭicchitvā cetasā sampiyāyitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Idāni yasmā thero nānappakārena
atk-s0201a:988_4: catusaccadesanaṃ desetuṃ paṭibalo, yathāha “sāriputto, bhikkhave, pahoti cattāri
atk-s0201a:988_5: ariyasaccāni vitthārena ācikkhituṃ desetu”nti yasmā vā uttarimpi desetukāmova hutvā
atk-s0201a:988_6: “ettāvatāpi kho”ti avaca, tasmā aparenapi nayena saccadesanaṃ sotukāmā te bhikkhū
atk-s0201a:988_7: āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ uttariṃ pañhaṃ apucchiṃsu. Tena sayameva pucchitvā vissajjitapañhato
atk-s0201a:988_8: uttariṃ siyā kho panāvuso, aññopi pariyāyo bhaveyya aññampi kāraṇanti iminā nayena
atk-s0201a:988_9: aññaṃ atirekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu, purimapañhassa vā uparibhāge pucchiṃsūti vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:988_10: hoti. Atha nesaṃ byākaramāno thero siyā, āvusotiādimāha. Tatthāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā,
atk-s0201a:988_11: āhāranti paccayaṃ. Paccayo hi āharati attano phalaṃ, tasmā “āhāro”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:989_0: Bhūtānaṃ vā sattānantiādīsu bhūtāti sañjātā, nibbattā. Sambhavesīnanti ye sambhavaṃ
atk-s0201a:989_1: jātiṃ nibbattiṃ esanti gavesanti. Tattha catūsu yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujā sattā yāva
atk-s0201a:989_2: aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti, tāva sambhavesino nāma. Aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca
atk-s0201a:989_3: bhinditvā bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma. Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesino
atk-s0201a:989_4: nāma. Dutiyacittakkhaṇato pabhuti bhūtā nāma. Yena yena vā iriyāpathena jāyanti,
atk-s0201a:989_5: yāva te tato aññaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tāva sambhavesino nāma. Tato paraṃ bhūtā nāma.
atk-s0201a:990_0: Atha vā bhūtāti jātā abhinibbattā, ye bhūtāyeva na puna bhavissantīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:990_1: tesaṃ khīṇāsavānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sambhavamesantīti sambhavesino. Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā
atk-s0201a:990_2: āyatimpi sambhavaṃ esantānaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Evaṃ sabbathāpi
atk-s0201a:990_3: imehi dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyati. Vāsaddo cettha sampiṇḍanattho, tasmā
atk-s0201a:991_0: Ṭhitiyāti ṭhitatthaṃ. Anuggahāyāti anuggahatthaṃ upakāratthaṃ. Vacanabhedo cesa,
atk-s0201a:991_1: attho pana dvinnampi padānaṃ ekoyeva. Atha vā ṭhitiyāti tassa tassa sattassa uppannadhammānaṃ
atk-s0201a:991_2: anuppabandhavasena avicchedāya. Anuggahāyāti anuppannānaṃ uppādāya. Ubhopi cetāni
atk-s0201a:991_3: bhūtānaṃ ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya ca. Sambhavesīnaṃ vā ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya cāti
atk-s0201a:991_4: evaṃ ubhayattha daṭṭhabbāni. Kabaḷīkāro āhāroti kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharitabbato kabaḷīkāro
atk-s0201a:991_5: āhāro, odanakummāsādivatthukāya ojāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Oḷāriko vā sukhumo vāti vatthuoḷārikatāya
atk-s0201a:991_6: oḷāriko, vatthusukhumatāya sukhumo. Sabhāvena pana sukhumarūpapariyāpannattā kabaḷīkāro
atk-s0201a:991_7: āhāro sukhumova hoti. Sāpi cassa vatthuto oḷārikatā sukhumatā ca upādāyupādāya veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:992_0: Kumbhīlānañhi āhāraṃ upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Kumbhīlā kira pāsāṇe gilanti.
atk-s0201a:992_1: Te ca nesaṃ kucchippattāva vilīyanti. Morā sappavicchikādipāṇe khādanti. Morānaṃ
atk-s0201a:992_2: pana āhāraṃ upādāya taracchānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Te kira tivassachaḍḍitāni visāṇāni
atk-s0201a:992_3: ceva aṭṭhīni ca khādanti. Tāni ca nesaṃ kheḷena temitamatteneva kandamūlaṃ viya mudukāni
atk-s0201a:992_4: honti. Taracchānampi āhāraṃ upādāya hatthīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Tepi nānārukkhasākhāyo
atk-s0201a:992_5: khādanti. Hatthīnaṃ āhārato gavayagokaṇṇamigādīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Te kira nissārāni
atk-s0201a:992_6: nānārukkhapaṇṇādīni khādanti. Tesampi āhārato gunnaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Te allasukkhatiṇāni
atk-s0201a:992_7: khādanti. Tesaṃ āhārato sasānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Sasānaṃ āhārato sakuṇānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0201a:992_8: Sakuṇānaṃ āhārato paccantavāsīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Paccantavāsīnaṃ āhārato gāmabhojakānaṃ
atk-s0201a:992_9: āhāro sukhumo. Gāmabhojakānaṃ āhārato rājarājamahāmattānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Tesampi
atk-s0201a:992_10: āhārato cakkavattino āhāro sukhumo. Cakkavattino āhārato bhummadevānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0201a:992_11: Bhummadevānaṃ āhārato cātumahārājikānaṃ āhāro sukhumo. Evaṃ yāva paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:992_12: āhāro vitthāretabbo, tesaṃ āhāro sukhumotveva niṭṭhaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:993_0: Ettha ca oḷārike vatthusmiṃ ojā parittā hoti dubbalā, sukhume balavatī. Tathā hi
atk-s0201a:993_1: ekapattapūrampi yāguṃ pīvato muhutteneva jighacchito hoti, yaṃkañcideva khāditukāmo.
atk-s0201a:993_2: Sappiṃ pana pasaṭamattaṃ pivitvā divasaṃ abhottukāmo hoti. Tattha vatthu parissamaṃ
atk-s0201a:993_3: vinodeti, na pana sakkoti pāletuṃ. Ojā pāleti, na sakkoti parissamaṃ vinodetuṃ. Dve
atk-s0201a:993_4: pana ekato hutvā parissamañceva vinodenti pālenti cāti.
atk-s0201a:994_0: Phasso dutiyoti cakkhusamphassādi chabbidhopi phasso. Etesu catūsu āhāresu dutiyo
atk-s0201a:994_1: āhāroti veditabbo. Desanānayo eva cesa. Tasmā iminā nāma kāraṇena dutiyo vā tatiyo
atk-s0201a:994_2: vāti idamettha na gavesitabbaṃ. Manosañcetanāti cetanā eva vuccati. Viññāṇanti yaṃkiñci cittaṃ.
atk-s0201a:995_0: Etthāha, yadi paccayaṭṭho āhāraṭṭho, atha kasmā aññesupi sattānaṃ paccayesu vijjamānesu
atk-s0201a:995_1: imeyeva cattāro vuttāti? Vuccate, ajjhattikasantatiyā visesapaccayattā. Visesapaccayo
atk-s0201a:995_2: hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro. Nāmakāye vedanāya
atk-s0201a:995_3: phasso, viññāṇassa manosañcetanā, nāmarūpassa viññāṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:996: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati. Tathā phassapaccayā vedanā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti.
atk-s0201a:997: Ko panettha āhāro, kiṃ āharatīti? Kabaḷīkārāhāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āharati. Phassāhāro tisso vedanā, manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave, viññāṇāhāro paṭisandhināmarūpanti.
atk-s0201a:998_0: Kathaṃ? Kabaḷīkārāhāro tāva mukhe ṭhapitamattoyeva aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti. Dantavicuṇṇitaṃ
atk-s0201a:998_1: pana ajjhohariyamānaṃ ekekaṃ sitthaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetiyeva. Evaṃ ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āharati.
atk-s0201a:999_0: Phassāhāro pana sukhavedaniyo phasso uppajjamāno sukhavedanaṃ āharati, tathā dukkhavedaniyo
atk-s0201a:999_1: dukkhaṃ, adukkhamasukhavedaniyo adukkhamasukhanti evaṃ sabbathāpi phassāhāro tisso vedanā āharati.
atk-s0201a:1000: Manosañcetanāhāro kāmabhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kāmabhavaṃ āharati, rūpārūpabhavūpagāni taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ. Evaṃ sabbathāpi manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave āharati.
atk-s0201a:1001_0: Viññāṇāhāro pana ye ca paṭisandhikkhaṇe taṃsampayuttakā tayo khandhā, yāni ca tisantativasena
atk-s0201a:1001_1: tiṃsarūpāni uppajjanti, sahajātādipaccayanayena tāni āharatīti vuccati. Evaṃ viññāṇāhāro
atk-s0201a:1002_0: Ettha ca manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave āharatīti sāsavā kusalākusalacetanāva vuttā.
atk-s0201a:1002_1: Viññāṇaṃ paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ āharatīti paṭisandhiviññāṇameva vuttaṃ. Avisesena pana
atk-s0201a:1003: Etesu catūsu āhāresu kabaḷīkārāhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti. Phasso phusantoyeva, manosañcetanā āyūhamānāva. Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva.
atk-s0201a:1004_0: Kathaṃ? Kabaḷīkārāhāro hi upatthambhentoyeva kāyaṭṭhapanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1004_1: Kammajanitopi hi ayaṃ kāyo kabaḷīkārāhārena upatthambhito dasapi vassāni vassasatampi
atk-s0201a:1004_2: yāva āyuparimāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā mātuyā janitopi dārako dhātiyā thaññādīni
atk-s0201a:1004_3: pāyetvā posiyamānova ciraṃ tiṭṭhati, yathā cupatthambhena upatthambhitagehaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:1005_0: “Yathā mahārāja gehe patante aññena dārunā upatthambhenti, aññena dārunā upatthambhitaṃ
atk-s0201a:1005_1: santaṃ evaṃ taṃ gehaṃ na patati, evameva kho mahārāja ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṃ
atk-s0201a:1006_0: Evaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti. Evaṃ sādhentopi ca kabaḷīkāro
atk-s0201a:1006_1: āhāro dvinnaṃ rūpasantatīnaṃ paccayo hoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa ca upādinnassa ca. Kammajānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1006_2: anupālako hutvā paccayo hoti. Āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ janako hutvā paccayo hoti.
atk-s0201a:1007_0: Phasso pana sukhādivatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva sukhādivedanāpavattanena sattānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1007_1: ṭhitiyā hoti. Manosañcetanā kusalākusalakammavasena āyūhamānāyeva bhavamūlanipphādanato
atk-s0201a:1007_2: sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti. Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva nāmarūpappavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1008_0: Evaṃ upatthambhanādivasena āhārakiccaṃ sādhayamānesu panetesu cattāri bhayāni daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0201a:1008_1: Seyyathidaṃ, kabaḷīkārāhāre nikantiyeva bhayaṃ, phasse upagamanameva, manosañcetanāya
atk-s0201a:1008_2: āyūhanameva, viññāṇe abhinipātoyeva bhayanti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Kabaḷīkārāhāre hi nikantiṃ
atk-s0201a:1008_3: katvā sītādīnaṃ purekkhatā sattā āhāratthāya muddāgaṇanādikammāni karontā anappakaṃ
atk-s0201a:1008_4: dukkhaṃ nigacchanti. Ekacce ca imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammādikāya anesanāya
atk-s0201a:1008_5: āhāraṃ pariyesantā diṭṭhepi dhamme gārayhā honti. Samparāyepi tassa saṅghāṭipi ādittā
atk-s0201a:1008_6: sampajjalitātiādinā lakkhaṇasaṃyutte vuttanayena samaṇapetā honti. Imināva tāva kāraṇena
atk-s0201a:1009_0: Phassaṃ upagacchantāpi phassassādino paresaṃ rakkhitagopitesu dārādīsu bhaṇḍesu aparajjhanti.
atk-s0201a:1009_1: Te saha bhaṇḍena bhaṇḍasāmikā gahetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ vā chinditvā saṅkārakūṭesu
atk-s0201a:1009_2: chaḍḍenti. Rañño vā niyyātenti. Tato ne rājā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārāpeti. Kāyassa
atk-s0201a:1009_3: ca bhedā duggati nesaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā hoti. Iti phassassādamūlakaṃ diṭṭhadhammikampi
atk-s0201a:1009_4: samparāyikampi bhayaṃ sabbamāgatameva hoti. Iminā kāraṇena phassāhāre upagamanameva
atk-s0201a:1010: Kusalākusalakammāyūhaneneva pana tammūlakaṃ tīsu bhavesu bhayaṃ sabbamāgataṃyeva hoti. Iminā kāraṇena manosañcetanāhāre āyūhanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1011_0: Paṭisandhiviññāṇañca yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne abhinipatati, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ
atk-s0201a:1011_1: gahetvāva nibbattati, tasmiñca nibbatte sabbabhayāni nibbattāniyeva honti, tammūlakattāti,
atk-s0201a:1011_2: iminā kāraṇena viññāṇāhāre abhinipātoyeva bhayanti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1012_0: Evaṃ sabhayesu pana imesu āhāresu sammāsambuddho kabaḷīkārāhāre nikantipariyādānatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:1012_1: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dve jāyampatikā”tiādinā nayena puttamaṃsūpamaṃ desesi. Phassāhāre
atk-s0201a:1012_2: nikantipariyādānatthaṃ “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gāvī niccammā”tiādinā nayena niccammagāvūpamaṃ
atk-s0201a:1012_4: nayena aṅgārakāsūpamaṃ desesi. Viññāṇāhāre nikantipariyādānatthaṃ “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:1013_0: Tatrāyaṃ bhūtamatthaṃ katvā saṅkhepato atthayojanā, dve kira jāyampatikā puttaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a:1013_1: parittena pātheyyena yojanasatikaṃ kantāramaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu. Tesaṃ paññāsa yojanāni
atk-s0201a:1013_2: gantvā pātheyyaṃ niṭṭhāsi. Te khuppipāsāturā viraḷacchāyāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Tato puriso
atk-s0201a:1013_3: bhariyaṃ āha “bhadde ito samantā paññāsa yojanāni gāmo vā nigamo vā natthi, tasmā
atk-s0201a:1013_4: yaṃ taṃ purisena kātabbaṃ bahumpi kasigorakkhādikammaṃ, na dāni sakkā taṃ mayā kātuṃ,
atk-s0201a:1013_5: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ
atk-s0201a:1013_6: nittharāhī”ti. Sāpi āha “sāmi mayā dāni yaṃ taṃ itthiyā kātabbaṃ bahumpi suttakantanādikammaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1013_7: taṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:1013_8: puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti. Tato so taṃ āha “bhadde mātugāmamaraṇena
atk-s0201a:1013_9: dvinnaṃ maraṇaṃ paññāyati. Na hi mando kumāro mātaraṃ vinā jīvituṃ sakkoti. Yadi
atk-s0201a:1013_10: pana mayaṃ jīvāma, puna dārakaṃ labheyyāma, handa dāni puttakaṃ māretvā maṃsaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a:1014_0: Tato mātā puttamāha “tāta pitu santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti. So agamāsi. Athassa pitā “mayā
atk-s0201a:1014_1: puttakaṃ posessāmīti kasigorakkhādīhi anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhūtaṃ, na sakkomi puttaṃ
atk-s0201a:1014_2: māretuṃ, tvaṃyeva tava puttakaṃ mārehī”ti vatvā “tāta mātusantikameva gacchāhī”ti
atk-s0201a:1014_3: āha. So agamāsi. Athassa mātāpi “mayā puttaṃ patthentiyā govatakukkuravatadevatāyācanādīhipi
atk-s0201a:1014_4: tāva anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ, ko pana vādo kucchinā pariharantiyā? Na sakkāhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1014_5: puttaṃ māretu”nti vatvā “tāta pitusantikaṃyeva gacchāhī”ti āha. Evaṃ so dvinnaṃ antarā
atk-s0201a:1014_6: gacchantoyeva mato. Te taṃ disvā paridevitvā pubbe vuttanayeneva maṃsāni gahetvā
atk-s0201a:1014_7: khādantā pakkamiṃsu. Tesaṃ so puttamaṃsāhāro navahi kāraṇehi paṭikulattā neva davāya
atk-s0201a:1014_8: hoti, na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, kevalaṃ kantāranittharaṇatthāyeva hoti.
atk-s0201a:1015_0: Katamehi navahi kāraṇehi paṭikūloti ce? Sajātimaṃsatāya ñātimaṃsatāya puttamaṃsatāya
atk-s0201a:1015_1: piyaputtamaṃsatāya taruṇamaṃsatāya āmakamaṃsatāya agorasamaṃsatāya aloṇatāya adhūpitatāyāti.
atk-s0201a:1015_2: Tasmā yo bhikkhu kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ evaṃ puttamaṃsasadisaṃ passati, so tattha nikantiṃ
atk-s0201a:1016_0: Niccammagāvūpamāyaṃ pana yathā sā gāvī gīvato yāva khurā, tāva cammaṃ uddāletvā muttā
atk-s0201a:1016_1: yaṃ yadeva nissāya tiṭṭhati, tattha pāṇakehi khajjamānā dukkhassevādhikaraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:1016_2: evaṃ phassopi yaṃ yadeva vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ vā nissāya tiṭṭhati, taṃtaṃvatthārammaṇasambhavassa
atk-s0201a:1016_3: vedayitadukkhassa adhikaraṇameva hoti. Tasmā yo bhikkhu phassāhāraṃ evaṃ niccammagāvisadisaṃ
atk-s0201a:1016_4: passati, so tattha nikantiṃ pariyādiyati, ayaṃ niccammagāvūpamāyaṃ atthayojanā.
atk-s0201a:1017_0: Aṅgārakāsūpamāyaṃ pana yathā sā aṅgārakāsu, evaṃ mahāpariḷāhaṭṭhena tayo bhavā. Yathā
atk-s0201a:1017_1: nānābāhāsu gahetvā tattha upakaḍḍhakā dve purisā, evaṃ bhavesu upakaḍḍhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:1017_2: manosañcetanā. Tasmā yo bhikkhu manosañcetanāhāraṃ evaṃ aṅgārakāsūpakaḍḍhakapurisasadisaṃ
atk-s0201a:1017_3: passati, so tattha nikantiṃ pariyādiyati, ayaṃ aṅgārakāsūpamāyaṃ atthayojanā.
atk-s0201a:1018_0: Sattisatāhatūpamāyaṃ pana yena so puriso pubbaṇhasamaye sattisatena haññati, tamassa
atk-s0201a:1018_1: sarīre vaṇamukhasataṃ katvā antarā aṭṭhatvā vinivijjhitvā aparabhāgeyeva patati,
atk-s0201a:1018_2: evaṃ itarāni dve sattisatāni, evamassa patitokāse apatitvā apatitvā gatāhi sattīhi
atk-s0201a:1018_3: sabbasarīraṃ chiddāvachiddameva hoti, tassa ekavaṇamukhepi uppannassa dukkhassa pamāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1018_4: natthi, ko pana vādo tīsu vaṇamukhasatesu? Tattha sattinipātakālo viya paṭisandhiviññāṇanibbattakālo.
atk-s0201a:1018_5: Vaṇamukhajananaṃ viya khandhajananaṃ. Vaṇamukhesu dukkhavedanuppādo viya jātesu khandhesu
atk-s0201a:1018_6: vaṭṭamūlakanānāvidhadukkhuppādo. Aparo nayo, āgucārī puriso viya paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1018_7: Tassa sattighātehi uppannavaṇamukhāni viya viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ. Vaṇamukhapaccayā
atk-s0201a:1018_8: tassa purisassa kakkhaḷadukkhuppādo viya nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇassa dvattiṃsakammakāraṇaaṭṭhanavutirogādivasena
atk-s0201a:1018_9: nānappakārakadukkhuppādo daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā yo bhikkhu viññāṇāhāraṃ evaṃ sattisatāhatasadisaṃ
atk-s0201a:1018_10: passati. So tattha nikantiṃ pariyādiyati, ayaṃ sattisatāhatūpamāyaṃ atthayojanā.
atk-s0201a:1019: So evaṃ imesu āhāresu nikantiṃ pariyādiyanto cattāropi āhāre parijānāti, yesu pariññātesu sabbampi pariññātaṃ vatthu pariññātameva hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0201a:1020_0: “Kabaḷīkāre, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāte pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññāto hoti. Pañcakāmaguṇike
atk-s0201a:1020_1: rāge pariññāte natthi taṃ saṃyojanaṃ, yena saṃyojanena saṃyutto ariyasāvako puna
atk-s0201a:1020_2: imaṃ lokaṃ āgaccheyya. Phasse, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāte tisso vedanā pariññātā
atk-s0201a:1020_3: honti. Tīsu vedanāsu pariññātāsu ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmi.
atk-s0201a:1020_4: Manosañcetanāya, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāte tisso taṇhā pariññātā honti. Tīsu taṇhāsu
atk-s0201a:1020_5: pariññātāsu ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmi. Viññāṇe, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:1020_6: āhāre pariññāte nāmarūpaṃ pariññātaṃ hoti. Nāmarūpe pariññāte ariyasāvakassa natthi
atk-s0201a:1021_0: Taṇhāsamudayā āhārasamudayoti purimataṇhāsamudayā paṭisandhikānaṃ āhārānaṃ samudayo
atk-s0201a:1021_1: nibbatto hotīti attho. Kathaṃ? Paṭisandhikkhaṇe hi tisantativasena uppannasamatiṃsarūpabbhantare
atk-s0201a:1021_2: jātā ojā atthi. Ayaṃ taṇhāpaccayā nibbatto upādinnakakabaḷīkārāhāro. Paṭisandhicittasampayuttā
atk-s0201a:1021_3: pana phassacetanā sayañca cittaṃ viññāṇanti ime taṇhāpaccayā nibbattā upādinnakaphassamanosañcetanā
atk-s0201a:1021_4: viññāṇāhārāti. Evaṃ tāva purimataṇhāsamudayā paṭisandhikānaṃ āhārānaṃ samudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1021_5: Yasmā panidha upādinnakāpi anupādinnakāpi āhārā missetvā kathitā, tasmā anupādinnakānampi
atk-s0201a:1021_6: evaṃ taṇhāsamudayā āhārasamudayo veditabbo. Aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittasamuṭṭhitesu hi
atk-s0201a:1021_7: rūpesu ojā atthi, ayaṃ sahajātataṇhāpaccayā nibbatto anupādinnakakabaḷīkārāhāro.
atk-s0201a:1021_8: Lobhasahagatacittasampayuttā pana phassacetanā sayañca cittaṃ viññāṇanti ime taṇhāpaccayā
atk-s0201a:1022_0: Taṇhānirodhā āhāranirodhoti imissā upādinnakānañca anupādinnakānañca āhārānaṃ paccayabhūtāya
atk-s0201a:1022_1: taṇhāya nirodhena āhāranirodho paññāyati. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Ayaṃ pana viseso,
atk-s0201a:1022_2: idha cattāripi saccāni sarūpeneva vuttāni. Yathā ca idha, evaṃ ito uttarimpi sabbavāresūti.
atk-s0201a:1022_3: Tasmā sabbattha asammuyhantena saccāni uddharitabbāni. Sabbavāresu ca “ettāvatāpi
atk-s0201a:1022_4: kho āvuso”ti idaṃ desanāniyyātanaṃ tattha tattha desitadhammavasena yojetabbaṃ. Tassa
atk-s0201a:1022_5: idha tāva ayaṃ yojanā ettāvatāpīti imāya āhāradesanāya vuttamanasikārappaṭivedhavasenāpīti
atk-s0201a:1025_0: 91. Idāni “sādhāvuso”ti purimanayeneva therassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā
atk-s0201a:1025_1: te bhikkhū uttarimpi pañhaṃ pucchiṃsu. Thero ca nesaṃ aññenapi pariyāyena byākāsi.
atk-s0201a:1025_2: Esa nayo ito paresupi sabbavāresu. Tasmā ito paraṃ evarūpāni vacanāni anāmasitvā
atk-s0201a:1025_3: yena yena pariyāyena byākaroti, tassa tasseva atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāma. Imassa pana vārassa
atk-s0201a:1025_4: saṅkhepadesanāyaṃ dukkhañca pajānātīti ettha dukkhanti dukkhasaccaṃ. Vitthāradesanāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1025_5: pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge saccaniddese vuttamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1028_0: 92. Ito paraṃ paṭiccasamuppādavasena desanā hoti. Tattha jarāmaraṇavāre tāva tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1028_1: tesanti ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddesoti ñātabbo. Yā devadattassa
atk-s0201a:1028_2: jarā, yā somadattassa jarāti evañhi divasampi kathentassa neva sattā pariyādānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1028_3: gacchanti. Imehi pana dvīhi padehi na koci satto apariyādinno hoti. Tasmā vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:1029_0: Tamhi tamhīti ayaṃ gatijātivasena anekesaṃ nikāyānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso. Sattanikāyeti
atk-s0201a:1029_1: sādhāraṇaniddesena niddiṭṭhassa sarūpanidassanaṃ. Jarā jīraṇatātiādīsu pana jarāti
atk-s0201a:1029_2: sabhāvaniddeso. Jīraṇatāti ākāraniddeso. Khaṇḍiccantiādayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā.
atk-s0201a:1029_3: Pacchimā dve pakatiniddesā. Ayañhi jarāti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā, tenassāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1029_4: sabhāvaniddeso. Jīraṇatāti iminā ākārato. Tenassāyaṃ ākāraniddeso. Khaṇḍiccanti iminā
atk-s0201a:1029_5: kālātikkame dantanakhānaṃ khaṇḍitabhāvakaraṇakiccato. Pāliccanti iminā kesalomānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1029_6: palitabhāvakaraṇakiccato. Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ milāpetvā tace valittabhāvakaraṇakiccato
atk-s0201a:1029_7: dīpitā. Tenassā ime khaṇḍiccantiādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā. Tehi imesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1029_8: vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā dassitā. Yatheva hi udakassa vā aggino
atk-s0201a:1029_9: vā vātassa vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ sambhaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo
atk-s0201a:1029_10: hoti, na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni, evameva jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena
atk-s0201a:1029_11: gatamaggo pākaṭo, cakkhuṃ ummīletvāpi gayhati. Na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarā, na hi
atk-s0201a:1030_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattatāya
atk-s0201a:1030_1: āyukkhayacakkhādiindriyaparipākasaññitāya pakatiyā dīpitā. Tenassime pacchimā dve
atk-s0201a:1031_0: Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati, tasmā jarā “āyuno saṃhānī”ti phalūpacārena
atk-s0201a:1031_1: vuttā. Yasmā ca daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni
atk-s0201a:1031_2: cakkhādīni indriyāni jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni āluḷitāni avisadāni oḷārikampi attano
atk-s0201a:1031_3: visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti, tasmā “indriyānaṃ paripāko”tipi phalūpacāreneva
atk-s0201a:1031_4: vuttā. Sā panāyaṃ evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1032_0: Tattha dantādīsu khaṇḍabhāvādidassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma. Arūpadhammesu
atk-s0201a:1032_1: pana tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma. Tattha yvāyaṃ khaṇḍādibhāvo
atk-s0201a:1032_2: dissati, so tādisānaṃ dantādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā vaṇṇoyeva, taṃ cakkhunā disvā manodvārena
atk-s0201a:1032_3: cintetvā “ime dantā jarāya pahaṭā”ti jaraṃ jānāti udakaṭṭhāne baddhāni gosīsādīni
atk-s0201a:1032_4: oloketvā heṭṭhā udakassa atthibhāvaṃ jānanaṃ viya. Puna avīci savīcīti evampi duvidhā
atk-s0201a:1032_5: hoti. Tattha maṇikanakarajatapavāḷasūriyādīnaṃ mandadasakādīsu pāṇīnaṃ viya pupphaphalapallavādīsu
atk-s0201a:1032_6: ca apāṇīnaṃ viya antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ duviññeyyattā jarā avīcijarā nāma,
atk-s0201a:1032_7: nirantarajarāti attho. Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1033_0: Ito paraṃ, tesaṃ tesantiādi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Cuti cavanatātiādīsu pana cutīti
atk-s0201a:1033_1: cavanakavasena vuccati, ekacatupañcakkhandhānaṃ sāmaññavacanametaṃ. Cavanatāti bhāvavacanena
atk-s0201a:1033_3: ghaṭasseva bhinnassa bhinnānaṃ cutikkhandhānaṃ yena kenaci pariyāyena ṭhānābhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1033_4: Maccu maraṇanti maccusaṅkhātaṃ maraṇaṃ. Tena samucchedamaraṇādīni nisedheti. Kālo
atk-s0201a:1033_5: nāma antako, tassa kiriyāti kālakiriyā. Etena lokasammutiyā maraṇaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0201a:1034_0: Idāni paramatthena dīpetuṃ, khandhānaṃ bhedotiādimāha. Paramatthena hi khandhāyeva
atk-s0201a:1034_1: bhijjanti, na satto nāma koci marati. Khandhesu pana bhijjamānesu satto marati, bhinnesu matoti vohāro hoti.
atk-s0201a:1035_0: Ettha ca catuvokāravasena khandhānaṃ bhedo, ekavokāravasena kaḷevarassa nikkhepo.
atk-s0201a:1035_1: Catuvokāravasena vā khandhānaṃ bhedo, sesadvayavasena kaḷevarassa nikkhepo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1035_2: Kasmā? Bhavadvayepi rūpakāyasaṅkhātassa kaḷevarassa sambhavato. Atha vā yasmā ca
atk-s0201a:1035_3: cātumahārājikādīsu khandhā bhijjanteva, na kiñci nikkhipanti, tasmā tesaṃ vasena
atk-s0201a:1035_4: khandhānaṃ bhedo, manussādīsu kaḷevarassa nikkhepo. Ettha ca kaḷevarassa nikkhepakāraṇato
atk-s0201a:1035_5: maraṇaṃ kaḷevarassa nikkhepoti vuttanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:1036: Iti ayañca jarā idañca maraṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuccatāvusoti idaṃ ubhayampi ekato katvā jarāmaraṇanti kathīyati. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1039_0: 93. Jātivāre jāti sañjātītiādīsu jāyanaṭṭhena jāti, sā aparipuṇṇāyatanavasena yuttā.
atk-s0201a:1039_1: Sañjāyanaṭṭhena sañjāti, sā paripuṇṇāyatanavasena yuttā. Okkamanaṭṭhena okkanti,
atk-s0201a:1039_2: sā aṇḍajajalābujavasena yuttā. Te hi aṇḍakosañca vatthikosañca okkamantā pavisantā
atk-s0201a:1039_3: viya paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti. Abhinibbattanaṭṭhena abhinibbatti, sā saṃsedajaopapātikavasena
atk-s0201a:1039_4: yuttā, te hi pākaṭāyeva hutvā nibbattanti. Ayaṃ tāva vohāradesanā.
atk-s0201a:1040_0: Idāni paramatthadesanā hoti. Khandhāyeva hi paramatthato pātubhavanti, na satto.
atk-s0201a:1040_1: Tattha ca khandhānanti ekavokārabhave ekassa catuvokārabhave catunnaṃ pañcavokārabhave
atk-s0201a:1040_2: pañcannampi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pātubhāvoti uppatti. Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra
atk-s0201a:1040_3: uppajjamānāyatanavaseneva saṅgaho veditabbo. Paṭilābhoti santatiyaṃ pātubhāvoyeva.
atk-s0201a:1040_4: Pātubhavantāneva hi tāni paṭiladdhāni nāma honti. Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso jātīti iminā padena
atk-s0201a:1040_5: vohārato paramatthato ca desitāya jātiyā nigamanaṃ karotīti. Bhavasamudayāti ettha
atk-s0201a:1040_6: pana jātiyā paccayabhūto kammabhavo veditabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1043_0: 94. Bhavavāre kāmabhavoti kammabhavo ca upapattibhavo ca. Tattha kammabhavo nāma
atk-s0201a:1043_1: kāmabhavūpagaṃ kammameva. Tañhi upapattibhavassa kāraṇattā “sukho buddhānamuppādo
atk-s0201a:1043_2: dukkho pāpassa uccayo”tiādīni viya phalavohārena bhavoti vuttaṃ. Upapattibhavo nāma
atk-s0201a:1043_3: tena kammena nibbattaṃ upādinnakhandhapañcakaṃ. Tañhi tattha bhavatīti katvā bhavoti
atk-s0201a:1043_4: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sabbathāpi idaṃ kammañca upapatti ca ubhayampetamidha “kāmabhavo”ti
atk-s0201a:1043_5: vuttaṃ. Esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesu. Upādānasamudayāti ettha pana upādānaṃ kusalakammabhavassa
atk-s0201a:1043_6: upanissayavaseneva paccayo hoti. Akusalakammabhavassa upanissayavasenapi sahajātādivasenapi.
atk-s0201a:1043_7: Upapattibhavassa pana sabbassāpi upanissayavaseneva. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1046_0: 95. Upādānavāre kāmupādānantiādīsu vatthukāmaṃ upādiyati etena, sayaṃ vā taṃ upādiyatīti
atk-s0201a:1046_1: kāmupādānaṃ. Kāmo ca so upādānañcāti vā kāmupādānaṃ. Upādānanti daḷhaggahaṇaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1046_2: Daḷhattho hi ettha upasaddo, “upāyāsa upakaṭṭhā”tiādīsu viya pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassetaṃ
atk-s0201a:1046_3: adhivacanaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato panetaṃ “tattha katamaṃ kāmupādānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1047_0: Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Atha vā diṭṭhiṃ upādiyati, upādiyanti
atk-s0201a:1047_1: vā etena diṭṭhinti diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Upādiyati hi purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi. Upādiyanti
atk-s0201a:1047_2: ca tāya diṭṭhiṃ. Yathāha “sassato attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”ntiādi,
atk-s0201a:1047_4: saṅkhepo. Vitthārato panetaṃ “tattha katamaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ natthi dinna”nti vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1048_0: Tathā sīlabbataṃ upādiyanti etena, sayaṃ vā taṃ upādiyati, sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcāti
atk-s0201a:1048_1: vā sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Gosīlagovatādīni hi evaṃ suddhīti abhinivesato sayameva upādānāni
atk-s0201a:1048_2: ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato panetaṃ “tattha katamaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ, ito bahiddhā
atk-s0201a:1049_0: Idāni vadanti etenāti vādo. Upādiyanti etenāti upādānaṃ. Kiṃ vadanti, upādiyanti
atk-s0201a:1049_1: vā? Attānaṃ. Attano vādupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ. Attavādamattameva vā attāti upādiyati
atk-s0201a:1049_2: etenāti attavādupādānaṃ, vīsativatthukāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ayamettha
atk-s0201a:1049_3: saṅkhepo. Vitthārato panetaṃ “tattha katamaṃ attavādupādānaṃ, idha assutavā puthujjano
atk-s0201a:1050: Taṇhāsamudayāti ettha taṇhā kāmupādānassa upanissayavasena anantarasamanantaranatthivigatāsevanavasena vā paccayo. Avasesānaṃ pana sahajātādivasenāpi. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1053_0: 96. Taṇhāvāre rūpataṇhā…pe… dhammataṇhāti evaṃ cakkhudvārādīsu javanavīthiyaṃ pavattāya
atk-s0201a:1053_1: taṇhāya “seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputto”ti evamādīsu pitito nāmaṃ viya pitisadisārammaṇato
atk-s0201a:1053_2: nāmaṃ. Ettha ca rūpārammaṇā taṇhā, rūpe taṇhāti rūpataṇhā. Sā kāmarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ
atk-s0201a:1053_3: assādentī pavattamānā kāmataṇhā. Sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ
atk-s0201a:1053_4: sassatanti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā bhavataṇhā. Ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena
atk-s0201a:1053_5: rūpaṃ ucchijjati vinassati pecca na bhavissatīti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā vibhavataṇhāti
atk-s0201a:1053_6: evaṃ tividhā hoti. Yathā ca rūpataṇhā, tathā saddataṇhādayopīti etāni aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni
atk-s0201a:1053_7: honti. Tāni ajjhattarūpādīsu aṭṭhārasa, bahiddhārūpādīsu aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa. Iti
atk-s0201a:1053_8: atītāni chattiṃsa, anāgatāni chattiṃsa, paccuppannāni chattiṃsāti aṭṭhasataṃ. “Ajjhattikassupādāya
atk-s0201a:1053_9: ‘asmī’ti hoti, ‘itthasmī’ti hotī”ti vā evamādīnā ajjhattikarūpādinissitāni aṭṭhārasa,
atk-s0201a:1053_10: “bāhirassupādāya ‘iminā asmī’ti hoti, ‘iminā itthasmī’ti hotī”ti vā evamādinā bāhirarūpādinissitāni
atk-s0201a:1053_11: aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa. Iti atītāni chattiṃsa, anāgatāni chattiṃsa, paccuppannāni
atk-s0201a:1053_12: chattiṃsāti evampi aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritāni honti. Puna saṅgahe karīyamāne rūpādīsu
atk-s0201a:1053_13: ārammaṇesu chaḷeva taṇhākāyā tissoyeva kāmataṇhādayo hontīti evaṃ –
atk-s0201a:1056_0: Vedanāsamudayāti ettha pana vedanāti vipākavedanā adhippetā. Sā kathaṃ chasu dvāresu
atk-s0201a:1056_1: taṇhāya paccayo hotīti ce? Assādanīyato. Sukhāya hi vedanāya assādanena sattā vedanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1056_2: mamāyantā vedanāya taṇhaṃ uppādetvā vedanārāgarattā hutvā cakkhudvāre iṭṭhameva rūpaṃ
atk-s0201a:1056_3: patthenti, laddhā ca naṃ assādenti, ārammaṇadāyakānañca cittakārādīnaṃ sakkāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:1056_4: Tathā sotadvārādīsu iṭṭhe ca saddādayo patthenti, laddhā ca ne assādenti, ārammaṇadāyakānañca
atk-s0201a:1056_6: Yathā kiṃ? Yathā puttasinehena puttaṃ mamāyantā dhātiyā sakkāraṃ karonti, sappāyasappikhīrādīniyeva
atk-s0201a:1056_7: naṃ pāyenti ceva bhojenti ca. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a:1059_0: 97. Vedanāvāre vedanākāyāti vedanāsamūhā. Cakkhusamphassajā vedanā…pe… manosamphassajā
atk-s0201a:1059_1: vedanāti etaṃ “cakkhusamphassajā vedanā atthi kusalā, atthi akusalā, atthi abyākatā”ti
atk-s0201a:1059_2: evaṃ vibhaṅge āgatattā cakkhudvārādīsu pavattānaṃ kusalākusalābyākatavedanānaṃ “sāriputto,
atk-s0201a:1059_3: mantāṇiputto”ti evamādīsu mātito nāmaṃ viya mātisadisavatthuto nāmaṃ. Vacanattho
atk-s0201a:1059_4: panettha cakkhusamphassahetu jātā vedanā cakkhusamphassajā vedanāti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0201a:1059_5: Ayaṃ tāvettha sabbasaṅgāhikakathā. Vipākavasena pana cakkhudvāre dve cakkhuviññāṇāni,
atk-s0201a:1059_6: dve manodhātuyo, tisso manoviññāṇadhātuyoti etāhi sampayuttavasena vedanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1060_0: Phassasamudayāti ettha pana pañcadvāre pañcavatthukavedanānaṃ sahajātacakkhusamphassādisamudayā
atk-s0201a:1060_1: samudayo hoti. Avasesānaṃ cakkhusamphassādayo upanissayādivasena paccayā. Manodvāre
atk-s0201a:1063_0: 98. Phassavāre cakkhusamphassoti cakkhumhi samphasso. Esa nayo sabbattha. Cakkhusamphasso…pe…
atk-s0201a:1063_1: kāyasamphassoti ettāvatā ca kusalākusalavipākā pañcavatthukā dasa samphassā vuttā
atk-s0201a:1063_2: honti. Manosamphassoti iminā sesā bāvīsati lokiyavipākamanasampayuttaphassā. Saḷāyatanasamudayāti
atk-s0201a:1063_3: channaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samudayena imassa chabbidhassāpi samphassassa samudayo
atk-s0201a:1066_0: 99. Saḷāyatanavāre cakkhāyatanantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge khandhaniddese
atk-s0201a:1066_1: ceva āyatananiddese ca vuttanayameva. Nāmarūpasamudayāti ettha pana yaṃ nāmaṃ yañca
atk-s0201a:1066_2: rūpaṃ, yañca nāmarūpaṃ yassa āyatanassa paccayo hoti, tassa vasena visuddhimagge
atk-s0201a:1069_0: 100. Nāmarūpavāre namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ. Ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ. Vitthāravāre panassa
atk-s0201a:1069_1: vedanāti vedanākkhandho. Saññāti saññākkhandho. Cetanā phasso manasikāroti saṅkhārakkhandho
atk-s0201a:1069_2: veditabbo. Kāmañca aññepi saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahitā dhammā santi, ime pana tayo sabbadubbalesupi
atk-s0201a:1069_3: cittesu santi. Tasmā etesaṃyeva vasenettha saṅkhārakkhandhopi dassito. Cattāri ca
atk-s0201a:1069_4: mahābhūtānīti ettha cattārīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Mahābhūtānīti pathavīāpatejavāyānametaṃ
atk-s0201a:1069_5: adhivacanaṃ. Yena pana kāraṇena tāni mahābhūtānīti vuccanti, yo cettha añño vinicchayanayo,
atk-s0201a:1070_0: Catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti ettha pana catunnanti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1070_1: cattāri ca mahābhūtānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Upādāyāti upādiyitvā, gahetvāti attho. Nissāyātipi
atk-s0201a:1070_2: eke. Vattamānanti ayañcettha pāṭhaseso. Samūhatthe vā etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Tena catunnañca
atk-s0201a:1070_3: mahābhūtānaṃ samūhaṃ upādāya pavattamānaṃ rūpanti ayamattho veditabbo. Evaṃ sabbatthāpi
atk-s0201a:1070_4: yāni cattāri pathavīādīni mahābhūtāni, yañca catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vattamānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1070_5: cakkhāyatanādibhedena abhidhammapāḷiyameva vuttaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ sabbampi
atk-s0201a:1070_6: “rūpa”nti veditabbaṃ. Viññāṇasamudayāti ettha pana yaṃ viññāṇaṃ yassa nāmassa yassa
atk-s0201a:1070_7: ca rūpassa yassa ca nāmarūpassa paccayo hoti, tassa vasena visuddhimagge paṭiccasamuppādaniddese
atk-s0201a:1070_8: vuttanayeneva viññāṇasamudayā nāmarūpasamudayo veditabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1073_0: 101. Viññāṇavāre cakkhuviññāṇanti cakkhumhi viññāṇaṃ, cakkhuto vā jātaṃ viññāṇanti
atk-s0201a:1073_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Evaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni. Itaraṃ pana manoyeva viññāṇanti
atk-s0201a:1073_3: ettha pana yo saṅkhāro yassa viññāṇassa paccayo hoti, tassa vasena saṅkhārasamudayā
atk-s0201a:1076_0: 102. Saṅkhāravāre abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇo saṅkhāro. Vitthāravāre panassa kāyasaṅkhāroti
atk-s0201a:1076_1: kāyato pavattasaṅkhāro, kāyadvāre copanavasena pavattānaṃ kāmāvacarakusalato aṭṭhannaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1076_2: akusalato dvādasannanti vīsatiyā kāyasañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vacīsaṅkhāroti
atk-s0201a:1076_3: vacito pavattasaṅkhāro, vacīdvāre vacanabhedavasena pavattānaṃ vīsatiyā eva vacīsañcetanānametaṃ
atk-s0201a:1076_4: adhivacanaṃ. Cittasaṅkhāroti cittato pavattasaṅkhāro, kāyavacīdvāre copanaṃ akatvā
atk-s0201a:1076_5: raho nisīditvā cintayantassa pavattānaṃ lokiyakusalākusalavasena ekūnatiṃsamanosañcetanānametaṃ
atk-s0201a:1076_6: adhivacanaṃ. Avijjāsamudayāti ettha pana kusalānaṃ upanissayavasena akusalānaṃ sahajātādivasenāpi
atk-s0201a:1079_0: 103. Avijjāvāre dukkhe aññāṇanti dukkhasacce aññāṇaṃ, mohassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Esa
atk-s0201a:1079_1: nayo samudaye aññāṇantiādīsu. Tattha catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhe aññāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ antogadhato
atk-s0201a:1079_2: vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca. Tathā hi taṃ dukkhasaccapariyāpannattā dukkhe
atk-s0201a:1079_4: ārammaṇaṃ, dukkhasaccañca etaṃ paṭicchādeti, tassa yāthāvalakkhaṇappaṭivedhanivāraṇena,
atk-s0201a:1080_0: Samudaye aññāṇaṃ tīhi kāraṇehi veditabbaṃ vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca.
atk-s0201a:1080_1: Nirodhe paṭipadāyañca aññāṇaṃ ekeneva kāraṇena veditabbaṃ paṭicchādanato. Nirodhapaṭipadāya
atk-s0201a:1080_2: hi paṭicchādakameva aññāṇaṃ tesaṃ yāthāvalakkhaṇappaṭivedhanivāraṇena, tesu ca ñāṇappavattiyā
atk-s0201a:1080_3: appadānena. Na pana tattha antogadhaṃ, tasmiṃ saccadvaye apariyāpannattā. Na tassa
atk-s0201a:1080_4: taṃ saccadvayaṃ vatthu, asahajātattā. Nārammaṇaṃ, tadārabbha appavattanato. Pacchimañhi
atk-s0201a:1080_5: saccadvayaṃ gambhīrattā duddasaṃ, na cettha andhabhūtaṃ aññāṇaṃ pavattati. Purimaṃ
atk-s0201a:1080_6: pana vañcaniyaṭṭhena sabhāvalakkhaṇassa duddasattā gambhīraṃ, tattha vipallāsaggāhavasena pavattati.
atk-s0201a:1081_0: Apica dukkheti ettāvatā saṅgahato vatthuto ārammaṇato kiccato ca avijjā dīpitā. Dukkhasamudayeti
atk-s0201a:1081_1: ettāvatā vatthuto ārammaṇato kiccato ca. Dukkhanirodhe dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyāti
atk-s0201a:1081_2: ettāvatā kiccato. Avisesato pana aññāṇanti etena sabhāvato niddiṭṭhāti ñātabbā. Āsavasamudayāti
atk-s0201a:1081_3: ettha pana kāmāsavabhavāsavā sahajātādivasena avijjāya paccayā honti. Avijjāsavo
atk-s0201a:1081_4: upanissayavaseneva. Pubbuppannā cettha avijjā avijjāsavoti veditabbā. Sā aparāparuppannāya
atk-s0201a:1084_0: 104. Āsavavāre avijjāsamudayāti ettha avijjā kāmāsavabhavāsavānaṃ sahajātādivasena
atk-s0201a:1084_1: paccayo hoti. Avijjāsavassa upanissayavaseneva. Aparāparuppannā cettha avijjā avijjāsavoti
atk-s0201a:1084_2: veditabbā. Pubbuppannā avijjāyevassa aparāparuppannassa avijjāsavassa upanissayapaccayo
atk-s0201a:1084_3: hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti. Ayaṃ vāro yā esā paṭiccasamuppādapadesu jeṭṭhikā avijjā,
atk-s0201a:1084_4: tassāpi paccayadassanavasena vutto. Evaṃ vuttena vārena saṃsārassa anamataggatā sādhitā
atk-s0201a:1084_5: hoti. Kathaṃ? Āsavasamudayena hi avijjāsamudayo. Avijjāsamudayenāpi āsavasamudayo.
atk-s0201a:1084_6: Evaṃ āsavā avijjāya avijjāpi āsavānaṃ paccayoti katvā pubbakoṭi na paññāyati avijjāya,
atk-s0201a:1084_7: tassā apaññāyanato saṃsārassa anamataggatā siddhā hotīti.
atk-s0201a:1085_0: Evaṃ sabbepime imasmiṃ sutte kammapathavāro āhāravāro dukkhavāro jarā-maraṇa-jāti-bhava-upādāna-taṇhā-vedanā-phassa-saḷāyatana-nāmarūpa-
atk-s0201a:1086_0: Tesu ekekassa vārassa saṅkhepavitthāravasena dvidhā vibhattā dvattiṃsaṭṭhānāni honti.
atk-s0201a:1086_1: Iti imasmiṃ sutte imesu dvattiṃsaṭṭhānesu cattāri saccāni kathitāni. Etesaṃyeva vitthāravasena
atk-s0201a:1086_2: vuttesu soḷasasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ kathitaṃ. Therassa pana matena dvattiṃsāyapi ṭhānesu
atk-s0201a:1086_3: cattāri saccāni cattāro ca maggā kathitāti. Iti sakalepi pañcamahānikāyasaṅgahite
atk-s0201a:1086_4: buddhavacane natthi taṃ suttaṃ, yattha dvattiṃsakkhattuṃ cattāri saccāni dvattiṃsakkhattuñca
atk-s0201a:1087_0: Idamavocāyasmā sāriputtoti idaṃ dvattiṃsāya catusaccapariyāyehi dvattiṃsāya arahattapariyāyehīti
atk-s0201a:1087_1: catusaṭṭhiyā kāraṇehi alaṅkaritvā sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ āyasmā sāriputto avoca, attamanā
atk-s0201a:1087_2: te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
atk-s0201a:1092_0: 105. Evaṃ me sutanti satipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ. Tattha kurūsu viharatīti kurunāmakā jānapadino
atk-s0201a:1092_1: rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena kurūti vuccati, tasmiṃ kurūsu
atk-s0201a:1092_2: janapade. Aṭṭhakathācariyā panāhu – mandhātukāle tīsu dīpesu manussā jambudīpo nāma
atk-s0201a:1092_4: atiramaṇīyoti sutvā raññā mandhātucakkavattinā cakkaratanaṃ purakkhatvā cattāro dīpe
atk-s0201a:1092_5: anusaṃyāyantena saddhiṃ āgamaṃsu. Tato rājā pariṇāyakaratanaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0201a:1097_0: Rājā cakkaratanaṃ purakkhatvā tattha agamāsi. Cattāro mahārājāno “mandhātumahārājā
atk-s0201a:1097_1: āgato”ti sutvāva “mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo rājā na sakkā yuddhena paṭibāhitu”nti sakarajjaṃ
atk-s0201a:1097_2: niyyātesuṃ. So taṃ gahetvā puna pucchi – “atthi nu kho ito ramaṇīyataraṃ ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0201a:1097_3: Athassa tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ kathayiṃsu – “tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ, deva, ramaṇīyataraṃ, tattha
atk-s0201a:1097_4: sakkassa devarañño ime cattāro mahārājāno paricārakā dovārikabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0201a:1097_5: Sakko devarājā mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo. Tassimāni pana upabhogaṭṭhānāni, yojanasahassubbedho
atk-s0201a:1097_6: vejayantapāsādo, pañcayojanasatubbedhā sudhammā devasabhā, diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko vejayantaratho,
atk-s0201a:1097_7: tathā erāvaṇo hatthī, dibbarukkhasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nandanavanaṃ cittalatāvanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1097_8: phārusakavanaṃ missakavanaṃ. Yojanasatubbedho pāricchattako koviḷāro, tassa heṭṭhā
atk-s0201a:1097_10: paṇḍukambalasilā, yassā mudutāya sakkassa nisīdato upaḍḍhakāyo anupavisatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1098_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tattha gantukāmo cakkaratanaṃ abbhukkiri. Taṃ ākāse patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:1098_1: caturaṅginiyā senāya. Atha dvinnaṃ devalokānaṃ vemajjhato cakkaratanaṃ otaritvā pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1098_2: patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ pariṇāyakaratanappamukhāya caturaṅginiyā senāya. Rājā ekakova
atk-s0201a:1098_3: tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ agamāsi. Sakko “mandhātā āgato”ti sutvāva tassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:1098_4: – “svāgataṃ te, mahārāja, sakaṃ te, mahārāja. Anusāsa, mahārājā”ti vatvā saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:1098_5: nāṭakehi rajjaṃ dvebhāge katvā ekaṃ bhāgamadāsi. Rañño tāvatiṃsabhavane patiṭṭhitamattasseva
atk-s0201a:1099_0: Tassa kira sakkena saddhiṃ paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ nisinnassa akkhinimisamattena nānattaṃ
atk-s0201a:1099_1: paññāyati. Taṃ asallakkhentā devā sakkassa ca tassa ca nānatte muyhanti. So tattha
atk-s0201a:1099_2: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāno yāva chattiṃsa sakkā uppajjitvā cutā, tāva rajjaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0201a:1099_3: atittoyeva kāmehi tato cavitvā attano uyyāne patiṭṭhito vātātapena phuṭṭhagatto kālamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:1100_0: Cakkaratane pana pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhite pariṇāyakaratanaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe mandhātuupāhanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1100_1: likhāpetvā idaṃ mandhāturajjanti rajjamanusāsi. Tepi tīhi dīpehi āgatamanussā puna
atk-s0201a:1100_2: gantuṃ asakkontā pariṇāyakaratanaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva mayaṃ rañño ānubhāvena āgatā,
atk-s0201a:1100_3: idāni gantuṃ na sakkoma, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ no dehī”ti yāciṃsu. So tesaṃ ekekaṃ janapadamadāsi.
atk-s0201a:1100_4: Tattha pubbavidehato āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso tāyeva purimasaññāya videharaṭṭhanti
atk-s0201a:1100_5: nāmaṃ labhi. Aparagoyānato āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso aparantajanapadoti nāmaṃ
atk-s0201a:1100_6: labhi. Uttarakuruto āgatamanussehi āvasitapadeso kururaṭṭhanti nāmaṃ labhīti. Bahuke
atk-s0201a:1100_7: pana gāmanigamādayo upādāya bahuvacanena voharīyati. Tena vuttaṃ “kurūsu viharatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1101_0: Kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamoti. Kammāsadhammanti ettha keci dha-kārassa da-kārena
atk-s0201a:1101_1: atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Kammāso ettha damitoti kammāsadammo. Kammāsoti kammāsapādo porisādo
atk-s0201a:1101_2: vuccati. Tassa kira pāde khāṇukena viddhaṭṭhāne vaṇo ruhanto cittadārusadiso hutvā
atk-s0201a:1101_3: ruhi, tasmā kammāsapādoti paññāyittha. So ca tasmiṃ okāse damito porisādabhāvato
atk-s0201a:1101_4: paṭisedhito. Kena? Mahāsattena. Katarasmiṃ jātaketi? Mahāsutasomajātaketi eke. Ime
atk-s0201a:1101_5: pana therā jayaddisajātaketi vadanti. Tadā hi mahāsattena kammāsapādo damito. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:1106_0: Keci pana dha-kāreneva atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Kururaṭṭhavāsīnaṃ kira kuruvattadhammo
atk-s0201a:1106_1: tasmiṃ kammāso jāto, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ kammāso ettha dhammo jātoti kammāsadhammanti
atk-s0201a:1106_2: vuccati. Tattha niviṭṭhanigamassāpi etadeva nāmaṃ. Bhummavacanena kasmā na vuttanti?
atk-s0201a:1106_3: Avasanokāsato. Bhagavato kira tasmiṃ nigame vasanokāso koci vihāro nāhosi. Nigamato
atk-s0201a:1106_4: pana apakkamma aññatarasmiṃ udakasampanne ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge mahāvanasaṇḍo ahosi.
atk-s0201a:1106_5: Tattha bhagavā vihāsi. Taṃ nigamaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā, tasmā evamettha attho veditabbo
atk-s0201a:1106_6: “kurūsu viharati kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamo, taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1108_0: 106. Ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggoti. Kasmā bhagavā idaṃ suttamabhāsi? Kururaṭṭhavāsīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1108_2: upāsakā upāsikāyo utupaccayādisampannattā tassa raṭṭhassa sappāyautupaccayasevanena
atk-s0201a:1108_3: niccaṃ kallasarīrā kallacittā ca honti. Te cittasarīrakallatāya anuggahitapaññābalā
atk-s0201a:1108_4: gambhīrakathaṃ pariggahetuṃ samatthā honti. Tena tesaṃ bhagavā imaṃ gambhīradesanāpaṭiggahaṇasamatthataṃ
atk-s0201a:1108_5: sampassanto ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu kammaṭṭhānaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvā idaṃ gambhīratthaṃ
atk-s0201a:1108_6: satipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ abhāsi. Yathā hi puriso suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakaṃ labhitvā tattha nānāpupphāni
atk-s0201a:1108_7: pakkhipeyya, suvaṇṇamañjūsaṃ vā pana labhitvā sattaratanāni pakkhipeyya, evaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0201a:1108_8: kururaṭṭhavāsiparisaṃ labhitvā gambhīradesanaṃ desesi. Tenevettha aññānipi gambhīratthāni
atk-s0201a:1108_9: dīghanikāye mahānidānaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ imasmiṃ majjhimanikāye sāropamaṃ rukkhūpamaṃ
atk-s0201a:1108_10: raṭṭhapālaṃ māgaṇḍiyaṃ āneñjasappāyanti aññānipi suttāni desesi.
atk-s0201a:1109_0: Apica tasmiṃ janapade catasso parisā pakatiyāva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā
atk-s0201a:1109_2: kathenti. Udakatitthasuttakantanaṭṭhānādīsupi niratthakakathā nāma na pavattati.
atk-s0201a:1109_3: Sace kāci itthī “amma tvaṃ kataraṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ manasikarosī”ti pucchitā
atk-s0201a:1109_4: “na kiñcī”ti vadati. Taṃ garahanti “dhiratthu tava jīvitaṃ, jīvamānāpi tvaṃ matasadisā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1109_5: Atha naṃ “mā dāni puna evamakāsī”ti ovaditvā aññataraṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpenti.
atk-s0201a:1109_6: Yā pana “ahaṃ asukaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaromī”ti vadati. Tassā “sādhu sādhū”ti
atk-s0201a:1109_7: sādhukāraṃ datvā “tava jīvitaṃ sujīvitaṃ, tvaṃ nāma manussattaṃ pattā, tavatthāya
atk-s0201a:1109_8: sammāsambuddho uppanno”tiādīhi pasaṃsanti. Na kevalañcettha manussajātiyāyeva satipaṭṭhānamanasikārayuttā,
atk-s0201a:1109_9: te nissāya viharantā tiracchānagatāpi. Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira naṭako suvapotakaṃ
atk-s0201a:1109_10: gahetvā sikkhāpento vicarati. So bhikkhunupassayaṃ upanissāya vasitvā gamanakāle
atk-s0201a:1109_11: suvapotakaṃ pamussitvā gato. Taṃ sāmaṇeriyo gahetvā paṭijaggiṃsu. Buddharakkhitotissa
atk-s0201a:1109_12: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Taṃ ekadivasaṃ purato nisinnaṃ disvā mahātherī āha – “buddharakkhitā”ti?
atk-s0201a:1113_0: Āvuso, pabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma vissaṭṭhaattabhāvena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:1113_1: kocideva manasikāro icchitabbo, tvaṃ pana aññaṃ na sakkhissasi “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1113_2: karohīti. So theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyanto carati.
atk-s0201a:1114_0: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ pātova toraṇagge nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapamānaṃ eko sakuṇo nakhapañjarena
atk-s0201a:1114_1: aggahesi. So “kiri kirī”ti saddamakāsi. Sāmaṇeriyo sutvā “ayye buddharakkhito sakuṇena
atk-s0201a:1114_2: gahito, mocema na”nti leḍḍuādīni gahetvā anubandhitvā mocesuṃ. Taṃ ānetvā purato
atk-s0201a:1116: Na ayye aññaṃ cintesiṃ, “aṭṭhipuñjova aṭṭhipuñjaṃ gahetvā gacchati, katarasmimpi ṭhāne vippakirissatī”ti evaṃ ayye aṭṭhipuñjameva cintesinti.
atk-s0201a:1117_0: Sādhu sādhu, buddharakkhita, anāgate bhavakkhayassa te paccayo bhavissatīti. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:1117_1: tattha tiracchānagatāpi satipaṭṭhānamanasikārayuttā, tasmā nesaṃ bhagavā satipaṭṭhānabuddhimeva
atk-s0201a:1120: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisisaṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0201a:1121_0: Bahūni nāmāni. Svāyaṃ idha ayananāmena vutto. Tasmā ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggoti
atk-s0201a:1121_1: ettha ekamaggo ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo, na dvedhāpathabhūtoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:1121_2: Atha vā ekena ayitabboti ekāyano. Ekenāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vūpakaṭṭhena pavivittacittena.
atk-s0201a:1121_3: Ayitabboti paṭipajjitabbo. Ayanti vā etenāti ayano, saṃsārato nibbānaṃ gacchantīti
atk-s0201a:1121_4: attho. Ekassa ayano ekāyano, ekassāti seṭṭhassa. Sabbasattānaṃ seṭṭho ca bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:1121_5: tasmā bhagavatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kiñcāpi hi tena aññepi ayanti, evaṃ santepi bhagavatova
atk-s0201a:1121_6: so ayano tena uppāditattā. Yathāha “so hi, brāhmaṇa, bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa
atk-s0201a:1121_7: uppādetā”tiādi. Ayatīti vā ayano, gacchati pavattatīti attho. Ekasmiṃ ayanoti ekāyano,
atk-s0201a:1121_8: imasmiṃyeva dhammavinaye pavattati, na aññatrāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha “imasmiṃ kho,
atk-s0201a:1121_9: subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhatī”ti. Desanābhedoyeva heso,
atk-s0201a:1121_10: attho paneko. Apica ekaṃ ayatīti ekāyano. Pubbabhāge nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavattopi
atk-s0201a:1121_11: aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha brahmā sahampati –
atk-s0201a:1126_0: Keci pana “na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yantī”ti gāthānayena yasmā ekavāraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:1126_1: Tasmā “ekāyano”ti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. Imassa hi atthassa sakiṃ ayanoti iminā
atk-s0201a:1126_2: byañjanena bhavitabbaṃ. Yadi pana ekaṃ ayanamassa ekā gati pavattīti evamatthaṃ yojetvā
atk-s0201a:1126_3: vucceyya, byañjanaṃ yujjeyya, attho pana ubhayathāpi na yujjati. Kasmā? Idha pubbabhāgamaggassa
atk-s0201a:1126_4: adhippetattā. Kāyādicatuārammaṇappavatto hi pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamaggo idha adhippeto,
atk-s0201a:1126_5: na lokuttaro. So ca anekavārampi ayati, anekañcassa ayanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1127_0: Pubbepi ca imasmiṃ pade mahātherānaṃ sākacchā ahosiyeva. Tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero “pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamaggo”ti
atk-s0201a:1127_1: āha. Ācariyo panassa tipiṭakacūḷasumatthero “missakamaggo”ti āha. Pubbabhāgo bhanteti.
atk-s0201a:1127_2: Missako āvusoti. Ācariye punappunaṃ bhaṇante appaṭibāhitvā tuṇhī ahosi. Pañhaṃ avinicchinitvāva
atk-s0201a:1127_3: uṭṭhahiṃsu. Athācariyatthero nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ gacchanto “mayā missakamaggo kathito,
atk-s0201a:1127_4: cūḷanāgo pubbabhāgoti ādāya voharati, ko nu kho ettha nicchayo”ti suttantaṃ ādito
atk-s0201a:1127_5: paṭṭhāya parivattento “yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṃ bhāveyya
atk-s0201a:1127_6: satta vassānī”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne sallakkhesi, lokuttaramaggo uppajjitvā satta vassāni
atk-s0201a:1127_7: tiṭṭhamāno nāma natthi, mayā vutto missakamaggo na labbhati, cūḷanāgena diṭṭho pubbabhāgamaggova
atk-s0201a:1127_8: labbhatīti ñatvā aṭṭhamiyaṃ dhammassavane saṅghuṭṭhe agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:1128_0: Porāṇakattherā kira piyadhammassavanā honti. Saddaṃ sutvāva “ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ, ahaṃ
atk-s0201a:1128_1: paṭhama”nti ekappahāreneva osaranti. Tasmiñca divase cūḷanāgattherassa vāro. Tena
atk-s0201a:1128_2: dhammāsane nisīditvā vījaniṃ gahetvā pubbagāthāsu vuttāsu therassa āsanapiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1128_3: ṭhitassa etadahosi “raho nisīditvā na vakkhāmī”ti. Porāṇakattherā hi anusūyakā honti,
atk-s0201a:1128_4: na attano rucimeva ucchubhāraṃ viya evaṃ ukkhipitvā vicaranti, kāraṇameva gaṇhanti,
atk-s0201a:1128_5: akāraṇaṃ vissajjenti. Tasmā thero “āvuso cūḷanāgā”ti āha. So ācariyassa viya saddoti
atk-s0201a:1128_6: dhammaṃ ṭhapetvā “kiṃ bhante”ti āha. Āvuso cūḷanāga mayā vutto missakamaggo na labbhati,
atk-s0201a:1129_0: Thero cintesi “amhākaṃ ācariyo sabbapariyattiko tepiṭako sutabuddho, evarūpassapi
atk-s0201a:1129_1: nāma bhikkhuno ayaṃ pañho āluḷeti, anāgate mama bhātikā imaṃ pañhaṃ āluḷessantīti
atk-s0201a:1129_2: suttaṃ gahetvā imaṃ pañhaṃ niccalaṃ karissāmī”ti paṭisambhidāmaggato “ekāyanamaggo
atk-s0201a:1136_0: Maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo? Nibbānagamanaṭṭhena nibbānatthikehi magganiyaṭṭhena ca.
atk-s0201a:1136_1: Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi kiliṭṭhacittānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1136_2: sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya. Tathā hi imināva maggena ito satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1136_4: buddhe ādiṃ katvā sakyamunipariyosānā aneke sammāsambuddhā anekasatā paccekabuddhā
atk-s0201a:1136_5: gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā ariyasāvakā cāti ime sattā sabbe cittamalaṃ pavāhetvā paramavisuddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:1136_6: pattā. Rūpamalavasena pana saṃkilesavodānapaññattiyeva natthi. Tathā hi –
atk-s0201a:1140: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
atk-s0201a:1141: Yathāha “cittasaṃkilesā, bhikkhave, sattā saṃkilissanti, cittavodānā visujjhantī”ti. Tañca cittavodānaṃ iminā satipaṭṭhānamaggena hoti. Tenāha “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1142_0: Sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca samatikkamāya, pahānāyāti
atk-s0201a:1142_1: attho. Ayañhi maggo bhāvito santatimahāmattādīnaṃ viya sokasamatikkamāya, paṭācārādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1142_2: viya ca paridevasamatikkamāya ca saṃvattati. Tenāha “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1143: “Yaṃ pubbe taṃ visodhehi, pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0201a:1144: Majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:1145: Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:1147: “Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;
atk-s0201a:1149_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā. Yasmā pana kāyavedanācittadhammesu kañci
atk-s0201a:1149_1: dhammaṃ anāmasitvā bhāvanā nāma natthi, tasmā tepi imināva maggena sokaparideve samatikkantāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1150_0: Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1150_1: dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya, nirodhāyāti attho. Ayañhi maggo bhāvito tissattherādīnaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:1150_2: dukkhassa, sakkādīnaṃ viya ca domanassassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a:1151_0: Tatrāyaṃ atthadīpanā – sāvatthiyaṃ kira tisso nāma kuṭumbikaputto cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo
atk-s0201a:1151_1: pahāya pabbajitvā agāmake araññe viharati. Tassa kaniṭṭhabhātubhariyā “gacchatha
atk-s0201a:1151_2: naṃ jīvitā voropethā”ti pañcasate core pesesi. Te gantvā theraṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1151_3: Thero āha “kasmā āgatattha upāsakā”ti? Taṃ jīvitā voropessāmāti. Pāṭibhogaṃ me upāsakā
atk-s0201a:1151_4: gahetvā ajjekarattiṃ jīvitaṃ dethāti. Ko te, samaṇa, imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāṭibhogo bhavissatīti?
atk-s0201a:1151_5: Thero mahantaṃ pāsāṇaṃ gahetvā dve ūruṭṭhīni bhinditvā “vaṭṭati upāsakā pāṭibhogo”ti
atk-s0201a:1151_6: āha. Te apakkamitvā caṅkamanasīse aggiṃ katvā nipajjiṃsu. Therassa vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā
atk-s0201a:1151_7: sīlaṃ paccavekkhato parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ uppajji. Tato anukkamena
atk-s0201a:1151_8: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā aruṇuggamane arahattaṃ patto
atk-s0201a:1156_0: Aparepi tiṃsa bhikkhū bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññavihāre vassaṃ
atk-s0201a:1156_1: upagantvā “āvuso, tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammova kātabbo, na aññamaññassa santikaṃ āgantabba”nti
atk-s0201a:1156_2: vatvā vihariṃsu. Tesaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā paccūsasamaye pacalāyantānaṃ eko byaggho
atk-s0201a:1156_3: āgantvā ekekaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā gacchati. Na koci “maṃ byaggho gaṇhī”ti vācampi nicchāresi.
atk-s0201a:1156_4: Evaṃ pañcasu dasasu bhikkhūsu khāditesu uposathadivase “itare, āvuso, kuhi”nti pucchitvā
atk-s0201a:1156_5: ñatvā ca “idāni gahitena, gahitomhīti vattabba”nti vatvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1157_0: Atha aññataraṃ daharabhikkhuṃ purimanayeneva byaggho gaṇhi. So “byaggho, bhante”ti
atk-s0201a:1157_1: āha. Bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍe ca ukkāyo ca gahetvā mocessāmāti anubandhiṃsu. Byaggho
atk-s0201a:1157_2: bhikkhūnaṃ agatiṃ chinnataṭaṭṭhānaṃ āruyha taṃ bhikkhuṃ pādaṅguṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:1157_3: khādituṃ ārabhi. Itarepi “idāni, sappurisa, amhehi kattabbaṃ natthi, bhikkhūnaṃ viseso
atk-s0201a:1157_4: nāma evarūpe ṭhāne paññāyatī”ti āhaṃsu. So byagghamukhe nipannova taṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā
atk-s0201a:1157_5: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento yāva gopphakā khāditasamaye sotāpanno hutvā, yāva jaṇṇukā khāditasamaye
atk-s0201a:1157_6: sakadāgāmī, yāva nābhiyā khāditasamaye anāgāmī hutvā, hadayarūpe akhāditeyeva saha
atk-s0201a:1157_7: paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0201a:1161: Kāmaṃ khādatu maṃ byaggho, bhakkho kāyo amittānaṃ;
atk-s0201a:1163_0: Aparopi pītamallatthero nāma gihikāle tīsu rajjesu paṭākaṃ gahetvā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ
atk-s0201a:1163_1: āgamma rājānaṃ disvā raññā katānuggaho ekadivasaṃ kilañjakāpaṇasāladvārena gacchanto
atk-s0201a:1163_2: “rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha, taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya
atk-s0201a:1163_3: sukhāya bhavissatī”ti natumhākavaggaṃ sutvā cintesi “neva kira rūpaṃ attano, na vedanā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1163_4: So taṃyeva aṅkusaṃ katvā nikkhamitvā mahāvihāraṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajito
atk-s0201a:1163_5: upasampanno dvemātikā paguṇaṃ katvā tiṃsa bhikkhū gahetvā gabalavāliyaaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā
atk-s0201a:1163_6: samaṇadhammamakāsi. Pādesu avahantesu jaṇṇukehi caṅkamati. Tamenaṃ rattiṃ eko migaluddako
atk-s0201a:1163_7: migoti maññamāno sattiyā pahari. Satti vinivijjhitvā gatā. So taṃ sattiṃ harāpetvā
atk-s0201a:1163_8: pahāramukhāni tiṇavaṭṭiyā pūrāpetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ attānaṃ nisīdāpetvā okāsaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0201a:1163_9: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā ukkāsitasaddena āgatānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1165: Na tumhākamidaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ jaheyyātha bhikkhavo.
atk-s0201a:1168_0: Atha naṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu “sace, bhante, sammāsambuddho arogo abhavissā, addhā te muddhamatthake
atk-s0201a:1168_1: hatthaṃ pasāretvā sīsaṃ parāmaseyyā”ti. Ettāvatā ayaṃ maggo tissattherādīnaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:1169_0: Sakko pana devānamindo attano pañcavidhaṃ pubbanimittaṃ disvā maraṇabhayasantajjito
atk-s0201a:1169_1: domanassajāto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi. So upekkhāpañhavissajjanāvasāne
atk-s0201a:1169_2: asītisahassāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Sā cassa upapatti puna pākatikāva ahosi.
atk-s0201a:1170_0: Subrahmāpi devaputto accharāsahassaparivāro saggasampattiṃ anubhoti, tattha pañcasatā
atk-s0201a:1170_1: accharāyo rukkhato pupphāni ocinantiyo cavitvā niraye upapannā. So “kiṃ imā cirāyantī”ti
atk-s0201a:1170_2: upadhārento tāsaṃ niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā “kittakaṃ nu kho mama āyū”ti upaparikkhanto
atk-s0201a:1170_3: attanopi āyuparikkhayaṃ viditvā tattheva niraye nibbattanabhāvaṃ disvā bhīto ativiya
atk-s0201a:1170_4: domanassajāto hutvā “imaṃ me domanassaṃ satthā vinayissati na añño”ti avasesā pañcasatā
atk-s0201a:1170_5: accharāyo gahetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0201a:1173: Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:1177_0: So desanāpariyosāne pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya taṃ sampattiṃ
atk-s0201a:1177_1: thāvaraṃ katvā devalokameva agamāsīti. Evamayaṃ maggo bhāvito sakkādīnaṃ viya domanassassa
atk-s0201a:1178_0: Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, tassa adhigamāya, pattiyāti
atk-s0201a:1178_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttarassa maggassa
atk-s0201a:1178_2: adhigamāya saṃvattati. Tenāha “ñāyassa adhigamāyā”ti. Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti
atk-s0201a:1178_3: taṇhāvānavirahitattā nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya, attapaccakkhatāyāti
atk-s0201a:1178_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṃ sādheti. Tenāha
atk-s0201a:1179_0: Tattha kiñcāpi “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vutte sokasamatikkamādīni atthato siddhāneva
atk-s0201a:1179_1: honti, ṭhapetvā pana sāsanayuttikovide aññesaṃ na pākaṭāni, na ca bhagavā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0201a:1179_2: sāsanayuttikovidaṃ janaṃ katvā pacchā dhammaṃ deseti. Tena teneva pana suttena taṃ
atk-s0201a:1179_3: taṃ atthaṃ ñāpeti. Tasmā idha yaṃ yaṃ atthaṃ ekāyanamaggo sādheti, taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0201a:1179_4: katvā dassento “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādimāha. Yasmā vā yā sattānaṃ visuddhi
atk-s0201a:1179_5: ekāyanamaggena saṃvattati, sā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamena hoti, sokaparidevānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1179_6: samatikkamo dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamena, dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamo ñāyassādhigamena,
atk-s0201a:1179_7: ñāyassādhigamo nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya. Tasmā imampi kamaṃ dassento “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti
atk-s0201a:1180_0: Apica vaṇṇabhaṇanametaṃ ekāyanamaggassa. Yatheva hi bhagavā “dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:1180_1: desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1180_2: parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsessāmi, yadidaṃ chachakkānī”ti chachakkadesanāya aṭṭhahi
atk-s0201a:1180_3: padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, yathā ca ariyavaṃsadesanāya “cattārome, bhikkhave, ariyavaṃsā
atk-s0201a:1180_4: aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṃkīyanti, na saṃkīyissanti,
atk-s0201a:1180_5: appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti navahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, evaṃ imassapi
atk-s0201a:1180_6: ekāyanamaggassa sattānaṃ visuddhiyātiādīhi sattahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a:1181_0: Kasmā iti ce? Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ. Vaṇṇabhāsanañhi sutvā te bhikkhū
atk-s0201a:1181_1: “ayaṃ kira maggo hadayasantāpabhūtaṃ sokaṃ, vācāvippalāpabhūtaṃ paridevaṃ, kāyikaasātabhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a:1181_2: dukkhaṃ, cetasikaasātabhūtaṃ domanassanti cattāro upaddave hanati, visuddhiṃ ñāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1181_3: nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:1181_4: dhāretabbaṃ vācetabbaṃ, imañca maggaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ maññissanti. Iti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1181_5: ussāhajananatthaṃ vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, kambalavāṇijādayo kambalādīnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ viya.
atk-s0201a:1182_0: Yathā hi satasahassagghanikapaṇḍukambalavāṇijena kambalaṃ gaṇhathāti ugghositepi
atk-s0201a:1182_1: asukakambaloti na tāva manussā jānanti. Kesakambalavālakambalādayopi hi duggandhā
atk-s0201a:1182_2: kharasamphassā kambalātveva vuccanti. Yadā pana tena gandhārako rattakambalo sukhumo
atk-s0201a:1182_3: ujjalo sukhasamphassoti ugghositaṃ hoti, tadā ye pahonti, te gaṇhanti. Ye na pahonti,
atk-s0201a:1182_4: tepi dassanakāmā honti, evamevaṃ “ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo”ti vuttepi asukamaggoti
atk-s0201a:1182_5: na tāva pākaṭo hoti. Nānappakārakā hi aniyyānamaggāpi maggātveva vuccanti. “Sattānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1182_6: visuddhiyā”tiādimhi pana vutte “ayaṃ kira maggo cattāro upaddave hanati, tayo visese
atk-s0201a:1182_7: āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:1182_8: vācetabbaṃ, imañca maggaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ maññissantīti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1183_0: Yadidanti nipāto, ye imeti ayamassa attho. Cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo, tena na tato
atk-s0201a:1183_1: heṭṭhā na uddhanti satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṃ dīpeti. Satipaṭṭhānāti tayo satipaṭṭhānā
atk-s0201a:1183_2: satigocaropi, tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0201a:1183_3: “Catunnaṃ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha…pe….
atk-s0201a:1183_4: Ko ca, bhikkhave, kāyassa samudayo? Āhārasamudayā kāyasamudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro
atk-s0201a:1183_5: satipaṭṭhānanti vuccati. Tathā “kāyo paṭṭhānaṃ, no sati. Sati paṭṭhānañceva sati
atk-s0201a:1183_6: cā”tiādīsupi. Tassattho – patiṭṭhāti asminti paṭṭhānaṃ. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati. Satiyā
atk-s0201a:1183_7: paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Padhānaṭṭhānanti vā paṭṭhānaṃ. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1183_8: hatthiṭṭhānaassaṭṭhānādīni viya. “Tayo satipaṭṭhānā, yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno
atk-s0201a:1183_9: satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī”ti etthāpi tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā
atk-s0201a:1183_11: attho. Kena paṭṭhapetabbatoti? Satiyā. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānanti. “Cattāro
atk-s0201a:1183_12: satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva
atk-s0201a:1183_13: “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati. Tassattho – patiṭṭhātīti paṭṭhānaṃ, upaṭṭhāti okkantitvā
atk-s0201a:1183_14: pakkhanditvā pavattatīti attho. Satiyeva paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Atha vā saraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:1183_15: sati, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paṭṭhānaṃ. Iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Idamidha adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1184_0: Yadi evaṃ, kasmā “satipaṭṭhānā”ti bahuvacanaṃ? Satibahuttā. Ārammaṇabhedena hi bahukā
atk-s0201a:1184_1: etā satiyo. Atha maggoti kasmā ekavacanaṃ? Maggaṭṭhena ekattā. Catassopi hi etā satiyo
atk-s0201a:1184_2: maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti. Vuttañhetaṃ “maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo? Nibbānagamanaṭṭhena,
atk-s0201a:1184_3: nibbānatthikehi magganīyaṭṭhena cā”ti. Catassopi cetā aparabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0201a:1184_4: kiccaṃ sādhayamānā nibbānaṃ gacchanti. Ādito paṭṭhāya ca nibbānatthikehi maggīyanti,
atk-s0201a:1184_5: tasmā catassopi eko maggoti vuccanti. Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva
atk-s0201a:1184_6: desanā hoti, “mārasenappamaddanaṃ vo, bhikkhave, maggaṃ desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha…pe…
atk-s0201a:1184_7: katamo ca, bhikkhave, mārasenappamaddano maggo? Yadidaṃ sattabojjhaṅgā”tiādīsu viya
atk-s0201a:1184_8: hi yathā mārasenappamaddanoti ca sattabojjhaṅgāti ca atthato ekaṃ, byañjanamevettha
atk-s0201a:1184_9: nānaṃ. Evaṃ ekāyanamaggoti ca cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti ca atthato ekaṃ, byañjanamevettha
atk-s0201a:1184_10: nānaṃ. Tasmā maggaṭṭhena ekattā ekavacanaṃ, ārammaṇabhedena satibahuttā bahuvacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1185_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti? Veneyyahitattā.
atk-s0201a:1185_2: dvedhā pavattesu veneyyesu mandassa taṇhācaritassa oḷārikaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1185_3: visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa sukhumaṃ vedanānupassanaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Diṭṭhicaritassāpi
atk-s0201a:1185_4: mandassa nātippabhedagataṃ cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa atippabhedagataṃ
atk-s0201a:1185_5: dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ. Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena adhigantabbanimittaṃ
atk-s0201a:1185_6: paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa oḷārikārammaṇe asaṇṭhahanato dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1185_7: Vipassanāyānikassapi mandassa nātippabhedagatārammaṇaṃ tatiyaṃ, tikkhassa atippabhedagatārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1185_8: catutthaṃ. Iti cattārova vuttā anūnā anadhikāti.
atk-s0201a:1186_0: Subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsapahānatthaṃ vā. Kāyo hi asubho, tattha ca subhavipallāsavipallatthā
atk-s0201a:1186_1: sattā, tesaṃ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0201a:1186_2: satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Sukhaṃ niccaṃ attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā,
atk-s0201a:1186_3: cittaṃ aniccaṃ, dhammā anattā, tesu ca sukhaniccaattavipallāsavipallatthā sattā,
atk-s0201a:1186_4: tesaṃ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pahānatthaṃ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti
atk-s0201a:1186_5: evaṃ subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsapahānatthaṃ vā cattārova vuttā anūnā anadhikāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1187: Na kevalañca vipallāsapahānatthameva, atha kho caturoghayogāsavaganthaupādānaagatipahānatthampi catubbidhāhārapariññatthañca cattārova vuttāti veditabbā. Ayaṃ tāva pakaraṇanayo.
atk-s0201a:1188_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1188_1: ārammaṇavasena cattāroti etadeva vuttaṃ. Yathā hi catudvāre nagare pācīnato āgacchantā
atk-s0201a:1188_2: pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti, dakkhiṇato
atk-s0201a:1188_3: pacchimato uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena
atk-s0201a:1188_4: nagarameva pavisanti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Nagaraṃ viya hi nibbānamahānagaraṃ.
atk-s0201a:1188_5: Dvāraṃ viya aṭṭhaṅgiko lokuttaramaggo. Pācīnadisādayo viya kāyādayo.
atk-s0201a:1189_0: Yathā pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva
atk-s0201a:1189_1: pavisanti, evaṃ kāyānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-s0201a:1190_0: Yathā dakkhiṇato āgacchantā dakkhiṇadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇadvārena
atk-s0201a:1190_1: nagarameva pavisanti, evaṃ vedanānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1190_2: bhāvetvā vedanānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena ariyamaggena ekaṃ nibbānameva osaranti.
atk-s0201a:1191_0: Yathā pacchimato āgacchantā pacchimadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pacchimadvārena
atk-s0201a:1191_1: nagarameva pavisanti, evaṃ cittānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1191_2: bhāvetvā cittānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena ariyamaggena ekaṃ nibbānameva osaranti.
atk-s0201a:1192_0: Yathā uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva
atk-s0201a:1192_1: pavisanti, evaṃ dhammānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-s0201a:1193: Evaṃ saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattārova vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1194_0: Katame cattāroti kathetukamyatā pucchā. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Bhikkhaveti dhammapaṭiggāhakapuggalālapanametaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1194_1: Bhikkhūti paṭipattisampādakapuggalanidassanametaṃ. Aññepi ca devamanussā paṭipattiṃ
atk-s0201a:1194_2: sampādentiyeva, seṭṭhattā pana paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanato ca, “bhikkhū”ti
atk-s0201a:1194_3: āha. Bhagavato hi anusāsaniṃ sampaṭicchantesu bhikkhu seṭṭho, sabbappakārāya anusāsaniyā
atk-s0201a:1194_4: bhājanabhāvato, tasmā seṭṭhattā “bhikkhū”ti āha. Tasmiṃ gahite pana sesā gahitāva
atk-s0201a:1194_5: honti rājagamanādīsu rājaggahaṇena sesaparisā viya. Yo ca imaṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0201a:1194_6: so bhikkhu nāma hotīti paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatopi “bhikkhū”ti āha. Paṭipannako
atk-s0201a:1194_7: hi devo vā hotu manusso vā, “bhikkhū”ti saṅkhaṃ gacchatiyeva. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:1198: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:1199_0: Kāyeti rūpakāye. Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca dhammānaṃ samūhaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:1199_1: hatthikāyarathakāyādayo viya kāyoti adhippeto. Yathā ca samūhaṭṭhena, evaṃ kucchitānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1199_2: āyaṭṭhena. Kucchitānañhi paramajegucchānaṃ so āyotipi kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1199_3: vacanattho, āyanti tatoti āyo. Ke āyanti? Kucchitā kesādayo. Iti kucchitānaṃ āyoti
atk-s0201a:1199_4: kāyo. Kāyānupassīti kāyamanupassanasīlo, kāyaṃ vā anupassamāno.
atk-s0201a:1200_0: “Kāye”ti ca vatvāpi puna “kāyānupassī”ti dutiyaṃ kāyaggahaṇaṃ asammissato vavatthānaghanavinibbhogādidassanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:1200_1: katanti veditabbaṃ. Tena na kāye vedanānupassī vā, cittadhammānupassī vā, atha kho
atk-s0201a:1200_2: kāyānupassīyevāti kāyasaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato
atk-s0201a:1200_3: vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Tathā na kāye aṅgapaccaṅgavimuttaekadhammānupassī, nāpi
atk-s0201a:1200_5: kāyo, tatthapi na bhūtupādāyavinimuttaekadhammānupassī, atha kho rathasambhārānupassako
atk-s0201a:1200_7: kadalikkhandhapattavaṭṭivinibbhujanako viya rittamuṭṭhiviniveṭhako viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassīyevāti
atk-s0201a:1200_8: nānappakārato samūhavaseneva kāyasaṅkhātassa vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito
atk-s0201a:1200_9: hoti. Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci
atk-s0201a:1200_10: dhammo dissati, yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1201: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;
atk-s0201a:1202: Apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷho, bajjhamāno na muccatī”ti. –
atk-s0201a:1203_0: Ghanavinibbhogādidassanatthanti vuttaṃ. Ādisaddena cettha ayampi attho veditabbo
atk-s0201a:1203_1: – ayañhi ekasmiṃ kāye kāyānupassīyeva, na aññadhammānupassī. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā
atk-s0201a:1203_2: anudakabhūtāyapi marīciyā udakānupassino honti, na evaṃ aniccadukkhānattaasubhabhūteyeva
atk-s0201a:1203_3: imasmiṃ kāye niccasukhaattasubhabhāvānupassī, atha kho kāyānupassī aniccadukkhānattaasubhākārasamūhānupassīyevāti.
atk-s0201a:1203_4: Atha vā yvāyaṃ parato “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā…pe… so satova assasatī”tiādinā
atk-s0201a:1203_5: nayena assāsapassāsādicuṇṇikajātaaṭṭhikapariyosāno kāyo vutto, yo ca “idhekacco pathavikāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1203_6: aniccato anupassati āpokāyaṃ tejokāyaṃ vāyokāyaṃ kesakāyaṃ lomakāyaṃ chavikāyaṃ cammakāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1203_7: maṃsakāyaṃ ruhirakāyaṃ nahārukāyaṃ aṭṭhikāyaṃ aṭṭhimiñjakāya”nti paṭisambhidāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1203_8: kāyo vutto, tassa sabbassa imasmiṃyeva kāye anupassanato “kāye kāyānupassī”ti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:1204_0: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā evaṃ gahetabbassa yassa kassaci ananupassanato
atk-s0201a:1204_1: tassa tasseva pana kesālomādikassa nānādhammasamūhassa anupassanato kāye kesādidhammasamūhasaṅkhātakāyānupassīti
atk-s0201a:1204_2: evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Apica “imasmiṃ kāye aniccato anupassati, no niccato”tiādinā
atk-s0201a:1204_3: nayena paṭisambhidāyaṃ āgatanayassa sabbasseva aniccalakkhaṇādino ākārasamūhasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0201a:1205_0: Tathā hi ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1205_1: sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccato anupassati, no niccato. Dukkhato anupassati,
atk-s0201a:1205_2: no sukhato. Anattato anupassati, no attato. Nibbindati, no nandati. Virajjati, no
atk-s0201a:1205_3: rajjati. Nirodheti, no samudeti. Paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati. So taṃ aniccato anupassanto
atk-s0201a:1205_4: niccasaññaṃ pajahati, dukkhato anupassanto sukhasaññaṃ pajahati, anattato anupassanto
atk-s0201a:1205_5: attasaññaṃ pajahati, nibbindanto nandiṃ pajahati, virajjanto rāgaṃ pajahati, nirodhento
atk-s0201a:1205_6: samudayaṃ pajahati, paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1206_0: Viharatīti iriyati. Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātāpetīti ātāpo, vīriyassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1206_1: Ātāpo assa atthīti ātāpī. Sampajānoti sampajaññasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgato. Satimāti
atk-s0201a:1206_2: kāyapariggāhikāya satiyā samannāgato. Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā
atk-s0201a:1206_3: paññāya anupassati, na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi. Tenevāha “satiñca
atk-s0201a:1206_4: khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti. Tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti
atk-s0201a:1206_5: ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānakammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yasmā anātāpino
atk-s0201a:1206_6: antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti, asampajāno upāyapariggahe anupāyaparivajjane ca sammuyhati,
atk-s0201a:1206_7: muṭṭhassati upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti, tenassa taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1206_8: na sampajjati, tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati. Tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:1207_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0201a:1207_1: vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ. Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena
atk-s0201a:1207_2: vā vinayitvā. Loketi tasmiṃyeva kāye. Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti
atk-s0201a:1207_3: adhippeto. Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīyati, vedanādīsupi
atk-s0201a:1207_4: pahīyatiyeva, tasmā “pañcapi upādānakkhandhā loko”ti vibhaṅge vuttaṃ. Lokasaṅkhātattā
atk-s0201a:1207_5: vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yaṃ panāha “tattha katamo loko? Sveva
atk-s0201a:1207_6: kāyo loko”ti. Ayamevettha attho, tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ vineyyāti evaṃ sambandho
atk-s0201a:1207_7: daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā panettha abhijjhāgahaṇena kāmacchando, domanassaggahaṇena byāpādo
atk-s0201a:1208_0: Visesena cettha abhijjhāvinayena kāyasampattimūlakassa anurodhassa, domanassavinayena
atk-s0201a:1208_1: pana kāyavipattimūlakassa virodhassa, abhijjhāvinayena ca kāye abhiratiyā, domanassavinayena
atk-s0201a:1208_2: kāyabhāvanāya anabhiratiyā, abhijjhāvinayena kāye abhūtānaṃ subhasukhabhāvādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1208_3: pakkhepassa, domanassavinayena ca kāye bhūtānaṃ asubhāsukhabhāvādīnaṃ apanayanassa
atk-s0201a:1208_4: ca pahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvo yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1208_5: Yogānubhāvo hi esa, yadidaṃ anurodhavirodhavippamutto aratiratisaho abhūtapakkhepabhūtāpanayanavirahito
atk-s0201a:1208_6: ca hoti. Anurodhavirodhavippamutto cesa aratiratisaho abhūtaṃ apakkhipanto bhūtañca
atk-s0201a:1209_0: Aparo nayo “kāye kāyānupassī”ti ettha anupassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. “Viharatī”ti
atk-s0201a:1209_1: ettha vuttavihārena kammaṭṭhānikassa kāyapariharaṇaṃ. “Ātāpī”tiādīsu ātāpena sammappadhānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1209_2: satisampajaññena sabbatthikakammaṭṭhānaṃ, kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇūpāyo vā, satiyā vā
atk-s0201a:1210_0: Vibhaṅge pana “anupassī”ti tattha katamā anupassanā? Yā paññā pajānanā…pe… sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-s0201a:1210_1: Ayaṃ vuccati anupassanā. Imāya anupassanāya upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato
atk-s0201a:1210_2: upapanno sampanno samannāgato. Tena vuccati anupassīti.
atk-s0201a:1211: Viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. Tena vuccati viharatīti.
atk-s0201a:1212: Ātāpīti tattha katamo ātāpo? Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho…pe… sammāvāyāmo. Ayaṃ vuccati ātāpo. Iminā ātāpena upeto hoti…pe… samannāgato. Tena vuccati ātāpīti.
atk-s0201a:1213: Sampajānoti tattha katamaṃ sampajaññaṃ? Yā paññā pajānanā…pe… sammādiṭṭhi. Idaṃ vuccati sampajaññaṃ. Iminā sampajaññena upeto hoti…pe… samannāgato. Tena vuccati sampajānoti.
atk-s0201a:1214: Satimāti tattha katamā sati? Yā sati anussati…pe… sammāsati. Ayaṃ vuccati sati. Imāya satiyā upeto hoti…pe… samannāgato. Tena vuccati satimāti.
atk-s0201a:1215_0: Vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti tattha katamo loko? Sveva kāyo loko, pañcapi upādānakkhandhā
atk-s0201a:1215_1: loko. Ayaṃ vuccati loko. Tattha katamā abhijjhā? Yo rāgo sārāgo anunayo anurodho
atk-s0201a:1215_2: nandī nandīrāgo cittassa sārāgo, ayaṃ vuccati abhijjhā. Tattha katamaṃ domanassaṃ?
atk-s0201a:1215_3: Yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ, cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ…pe… dukkhā vedanā.
atk-s0201a:1215_4: Idaṃ vuccati domanassaṃ. Iti ayañca abhijjhā idañca domanassaṃ imamhi loke vinītā
atk-s0201a:1215_5: honti paṭivinītā santā vūpasantā samitā vūpasamitā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā
atk-s0201a:1215_6: byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā, tena vuccati vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti
atk-s0201a:1215_7: evametesaṃ padānamattho vutto. Tena saha ayaṃ aṭṭhakathānayo yathā saṃsandati, evaṃ
atk-s0201a:1216_0: Vedanāsu… citte… dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati…pe… vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti
atk-s0201a:1216_1: ettha pana vedanānupassīti evamādīsu vedanādīnaṃ puna vacane payojanaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1216_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Vedanāsu vedanānupassī, citte cittānupassī, dhammesu dhammānupassīti
atk-s0201a:1216_3: ettha pana vedanāti tisso vedanā, tā ca lokiyā eva. Cittampi lokiyaṃ, tathā dhammā.
atk-s0201a:1216_4: Tesaṃ vibhāgo niddesavāre pākaṭo bhavissati. Kevalaṃ panidha yathā vedanā anupassitabbā,
atk-s0201a:1216_5: tathā anupassanto vedanāsu vedanānupassīti veditabbo. Esa nayo cittadhammesupi. Kathañca
atk-s0201a:1216_6: vedanā anupassitabbāti? Sukhā tāva vedanā dukkhato, dukkhā sallato, adukkhamasukhā aniccato. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:1219: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:1220_0: Sabbā eva cetā dukkhātipi anupassitabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ “yaṃkiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:1220_1: taṃ dukkhasminti vadāmī”ti. Sukhadukkhatopi ca anupassitabbā. Yathāha “sukhā vedanā
atk-s0201a:1220_2: ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā”ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Apica aniccādisattānupassanāvasenapi
atk-s0201a:1220_3: anupassitabbā. Sesaṃ niddesavāreyeva pākaṭaṃ bhavissati. Cittadhammesupi cittaṃ tāva
atk-s0201a:1220_5: niddesavāre āgatasarāgādibhedānañca vasena anupassitabbaṃ. Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1220_7: vasena anupassitabbā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Kāmañcettha yassa kāyasaṅkhāte loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ
atk-s0201a:1220_8: pahīnaṃ, tassa vedanādilokesupi taṃ pahīnameva. Nānāpuggalavasena pana nānācittakkhaṇikasatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāvasena
atk-s0201a:1220_9: ca sabbattha vuttaṃ. Yato vā ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hoti. Tenevassa tattha
atk-s0201a:1223_1: upakaraṇāni kattukāmo ekaṃ mahāveṇuṃ labhitvā catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ veṇukhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0201a:1223_2: gahetvā phāletvā taṃ taṃ upakaraṇaṃ kareyya, evameva bhagavā satipaṭṭhānadesanāya
