atk-s0201a:1387_8: atthaṅgamo, vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana visuddhimagge
atk-s0201a:1388_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ pañcakkhandhapariggahaṇena attano vā dhammesu, parassa vā
atk-s0201a:1388_1: dhammesu, kālena vā attano, kālena vā parassa dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati. Samudayavayā
atk-s0201a:1388_2: panettha “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādīnaṃ pañcasu khandhesu vuttānaṃ paññāsāya
atk-s0201a:1388_3: lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena nīharitabbā. Ito paraṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a:1389: Kevalañhi idha khandhapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā khandhapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1392_0: 117. Evaṃ pañcakkhandhavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni āyatanavasena vibhajituṃ
atk-s0201a:1392_1: puna caparantiādimāha. Tattha chasu ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesūti cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1392_2: jivhā kāyo manoti imesu chasu ajjhattikesu rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso phoṭṭhabbo dhammāti
atk-s0201a:1392_3: imesu chasu bāhiresu. Cakkhuṃ ca pajānātīti cakkhupasādaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0201a:1392_4: pajānāti. Rūpe ca pajānātīti bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0201a:1392_5: pajānāti. Yañca tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati saṃyojananti yañca taṃ cakkhuṃ ceva
atk-s0201a:1392_7: dasavidhaṃ saṃyojanaṃ uppajjati, tañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:1393_0: Kathaṃ panetaṃ uppajjatīti? Cakkhudvāre tāva āpāthagataṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ kāmassādavasena
atk-s0201a:1393_1: assādayato abhinandato kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati. Aniṭṭhārammaṇe kujjhato paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1393_2: uppajjati. “Ṭhapetvā maṃ na koci añño etaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ samattho atthī”ti
atk-s0201a:1393_3: maññato mānasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati. “Etaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ niccaṃ dhuva”nti gaṇhato diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1393_4: uppajjati. “Etaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ satto nu kho, sattassa nu kho”ti vicikicchato vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1393_5: uppajjati. “Sampattibhave vata no idaṃ sulabhaṃ jāta”nti bhavaṃ patthentassa bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1393_6: uppajjati. “Āyatimpi evarūpaṃ sīlabbataṃ samādiyitvā sakkā laddhu”nti sīlabbataṃ
atk-s0201a:1393_7: samādiyantassa sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati. “Aho vata etaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1393_8: aññe na labheyyu”nti usūyato issāsaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati. Attanā laddhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1393_9: aññassa maccharāyato macchariyasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati. Sabbeheva sahajātaaññāṇavasena
atk-s0201a:1394_0: Yathā ca anuppannassāti yena kāraṇena asamudācāravasena anuppannassa tassa dasavidhassāpi
atk-s0201a:1394_1: saṃyojanassa uppādo hoti, tañca kāraṇaṃ pajānāti. Yathā ca uppannassāti appahīnaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:1394_2: pana samudācāravasena vā uppannassa tassa dasavidhassāpi saṃyojanassa yena kāraṇena
atk-s0201a:1394_3: pahānaṃ hoti, tañca kāraṇaṃ pajānāti. Yathā ca pahīnassāti tadaṅgavikkhambhanappahānavasena
atk-s0201a:1394_4: pahīnassāpi tassa dasavidhassa saṃyojanassa yena kāraṇena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti, tañca
atk-s0201a:1394_5: pajānāti. Kena kāraṇena panassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti? Diṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsaissāmacchariyabhedassa
atk-s0201a:1394_6: tāva pañcavidhassa saṃyojanassa sotāpattimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti. Kāmarāgapaṭighasaṃyojanadvayassa
atk-s0201a:1395: Sotañca pajānāti sadde cā tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Apicettha āyatanakathā vitthārato visuddhimagge āyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:1396_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ ajjhattikāyatanapariggahaṇena attano vā dhammesu, bāhirāyatanapariggahaṇena
atk-s0201a:1396_1: parassa vā dhammesu, kālena vā attano, kālena vā parassa dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a:1396_3: arūpāyatanesu manāyatanassa viññāṇakkhandhe, dhammāyatanassa sesakkhandhesu vuttanayena
atk-s0201a:1396_4: nīharitabbā. Lokuttaradhammā na gahetabbā. Ito paraṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a:1397: Kevalañhi idha āyatanapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā āyatanapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1400_0: 118. Evaṃ cha ajjhattikabāhirāyatanavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni bojjhaṅgavasena
atk-s0201a:1400_1: vibhajituṃ puna caparanti ādimāha. Tattha bojjhaṅgesūti bujjhanakasattassa aṅgesu.
atk-s0201a:1400_2: Santanti paṭilābhavasena saṃvijjamānaṃ. Satisambojjhaṅganti satisaṅkhātaṃ sambojjhaṅgaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1400_3: Ettha hi sambujjhati āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhi, yāya vā so
atk-s0201a:1400_4: satiādikāya sattadhammasāmaggiyā sambujjhati kilesaniddāto uṭṭhāti, saccāni vā paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0201a:1400_5: sā dhammasāmaggī sambodhi. Tassa sambodhissa, tassā vā sambodhiyā aṅganti sambojjhaṅgaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1400_6: Tena vuttaṃ “satisaṅkhātaṃ sambojjhaṅga”nti. Sesasambojjhaṅgesupi imināva nayena
atk-s0201a:1401_0: Asantanti appaṭilābhavasena avijjamānaṃ. Yathā ca anuppannassātiādīsu pana satisambojjhaṅgassa
atk-s0201a:1401_1: tāva – “atthi, bhikkhave, satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā, tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro,
atk-s0201a:1401_2: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa
atk-s0201a:1401_3: bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha
atk-s0201a:1401_4: satiyeva satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā. Yonisomanasikāro vuttalakkhaṇoyeva, taṃ
atk-s0201a:1402_0: Apica cattāro dhammā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti satisampajaññaṃ muṭṭhassatipuggalaparivajjanatā
atk-s0201a:1402_1: upaṭṭhitassatipuggalasevanatā tadadhimuttatāti. Abhikkantādīsu hi sattasu ṭhānesu
atk-s0201a:1402_4: ca satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati. Evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena
atk-s0201a:1403_0: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa pana – “atthi, bhikkhave, kusalākusalā dhammā…pe… kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā
atk-s0201a:1403_1: dhammā, tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
atk-s0201a:1403_2: uppādāya, uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya
atk-s0201a:1404_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paripucchakatā
atk-s0201a:1405_0: Vatthuvisadakiriyāti ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Yadā hissa
atk-s0201a:1405_1: kesanakhalomā atidīghā honti, sarīraṃ vā ussannadosañceva sedamalamakkhitañca, tadā
atk-s0201a:1405_2: ajjhattikaṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ. Yadā pana cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1405_3: duggandhaṃ hoti, senāsanaṃ vā uklāpaṃ, tadā bāhiraṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1405_5: ucchādananhāpanena ca ajjhattikaṃ vatthu visadaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1406_1: ajjhattikabāhire vatthusmiṃ avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1406_2: hoti, aparisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
atk-s0201a:1406_3: Visade pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ
atk-s0201a:1406_4: hoti, parisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
atk-s0201a:1407_0: Indriyasamattapaṭipādanā nāma saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ samabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Sace hissa
atk-s0201a:1407_1: saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, itarāni mandāni. Tato vīriyindriyaṃ paggahakiccaṃ, satindriyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1407_2: upaṭṭhānakiccaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ avikkhepakiccaṃ, paññindriyaṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0201a:1407_3: na sakkoti. Tasmā taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ
atk-s0201a:1407_4: jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena hāpetabbaṃ. Vakkalittherassa vatthu cettha nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1407_5: Sace pana vīriyindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0201a:1407_6: sakkoti, na itarāni itarakiccabhedaṃ. Tasmā taṃ passaddhādibhāvanāya hāpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1407_7: Tatrāpi soṇattherassa vatthu dassetabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ
atk-s0201a:1408_0: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ ca samataṃ pasaṃsanti. Balavasaddho
atk-s0201a:1408_1: hi mandapañño mudhāpasanno hoti, avatthusmiṃ pasīdati. Balavapañño mandasaddho kerāṭikapakkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1408_2: bhajati. Bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hoti. Cittuppādamatteneva kusalaṃ
atk-s0201a:1408_3: hotīti atidhāvitvā dānādīni akaronto niraye uppajjati. Ubhinnaṃ samatāya vatthusmiṃyeva
atk-s0201a:1408_4: pasīdati. Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ adhibhavati.
atk-s0201a:1408_5: Balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃ vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ adhibhavati. Samādhi
atk-s0201a:1408_6: pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati. Vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ
atk-s0201a:1408_7: uddhacce patituṃ na labhati. Tasmā tadubhayaṃ samaṃ kātabbaṃ. Ubhayasamatāya hi appanā hoti.
atk-s0201a:1409_0: Apica samādhikammikassa balavatīpi saddhā vaṭṭati. Evaṃ saddahanto okappento appanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1409_1: pāpuṇissati. Samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati, evañhi
atk-s0201a:1409_2: so appanaṃ pāpuṇāti. Vipassanākammikassa paññā balavatī vaṭṭati, evañhi so lakkhaṇappaṭivedhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1409_3: pāpuṇāti. Ubhinnaṃ pana samatāyapi appanā hotiyeva. Sati pana sabbattha balavatī
atk-s0201a:1409_4: vaṭṭati. Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato,
atk-s0201a:1409_5: kosajjapakkhikena ca samādhinā kosajjapātato rakkhati. Tasmā sā loṇadhūpanaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:1409_6: sabbabyañjanesu sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbarājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbā.
atk-s0201a:1409_7: Tenāha – “sati ca pana sabbatthikā vuttā bhagavatā. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Cittañhi sati paṭisaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1409_8: ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā ca sati, na ca vinā satiyā cittassa paggahaniggaho hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1410_3: gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā. Tadadhimuttatā
atk-s0201a:1410_5: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:1411_1: tattha yoniso manasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa
atk-s0201a:1411_2: uppādāya, uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā
atk-s0201a:1412_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇatā
atk-s0201a:1413_0: Tattha nirayesu pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato paṭṭhāya mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanakālepi,
atk-s0201a:1413_2: pana sakaṭavāhanādikālepi, pettivisaye anekānipi vassasahassāni ekaṃ buddhantarampi
atk-s0201a:1413_4: attabhāvena vātātapādidukkhānubhavanakālepi na sakkā vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ uppādetuṃ.
atk-s0201a:1413_5: Ayameva te bhikkhu kālo vīriyakaraṇāyāti evaṃ apāyabhayaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1414_0: “Na sakkā kusītena navalokuttaradhammaṃ laddhuṃ, āraddhavīriyeneva sakkā ayamānisaṃso
atk-s0201a:1414_2: te gatamaggo gantabbo, so ca na sakkā kusītena gantu”nti evaṃ gamanavīthiṃ paccavekkhantassāpi
atk-s0201a:1414_3: uppajjati. “Ye taṃ piṇḍapātādīhi upaṭṭhahanti, ime te manussā neva ñātakā, na dāsakammakarā,
atk-s0201a:1414_4: nāpi ‘taṃ nissāya jīvissāmā’ti te paṇītāni piṇḍapātādīni denti, atha kho attano kārānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1414_5: mahapphalataṃ paccāsīsamānā denti, satthārāpi ‘ayaṃ ime paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyadaḷhībahulo
atk-s0201a:1414_6: sukhaṃ viharissatī’ti na evaṃ sampassatā tuyhaṃ paccayā anuññātā, atha kho ‘ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:1414_7: ime paribhuñjamāno samaṇadhammaṃ katvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissatī’ti te paccayā anuññātā,
atk-s0201a:1414_8: so dāni tvaṃ kusīto viharanto na taṃ piṇḍaṃ apacāyissasi, āraddhavīriyasseva hi piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1414_9: nāma hotī”ti evaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati mahāmittattherassa viya.
atk-s0201a:1415_0: Thero kira kassakaleṇe nāma paṭivasati. Tassa ca gocaragāme ekā mahāupāsikā theraṃ
atk-s0201a:1415_1: puttaṃ katvā paṭijaggati. Sā ekadivasaṃ araññaṃ gacchantī dhītaraṃ āha – “amma asukasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:1415_2: ṭhāne purāṇataṇḍulā, asukasmiṃ khīraṃ, asukasmiṃ sappi, asukasmiṃ phāṇitaṃ, tava
atk-s0201a:1415_3: bhātikassa ayyamittassa āgatakāle bhattaṃ pacitvā khīrasappiphāṇitehi saddhiṃ dehi,
atk-s0201a:1415_4: tvaṃ ca bhuñjeyyāsi, ahaṃ pana hiyyo pakkaṃ pārivāsikabhattaṃ kañjikena bhuttāmhī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1415_5: Divā kiṃ bhuñjissasi ammāti? Sākapaṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā kaṇataṇḍulehi ambilayāguṃ pacitvā ṭhapehi ammāti.
atk-s0201a:1416_0: Thero cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ nīharantova taṃ saddaṃ sutvā attānaṃ ovadi – “mahāupāsikā
atk-s0201a:1416_1: kira kañjiyena pārivāsikabhattaṃ bhuñji, divāpi kaṇapaṇṇambilayāguṃ bhuñjissati,
atk-s0201a:1416_2: tuyhaṃ atthāya pana purāṇataṇḍulādīni ācikkhati, taṃ nissāya kho panesā neva khettaṃ
atk-s0201a:1416_3: na vatthuṃ na bhattaṃ na vatthaṃ paccāsīsati, tisso pana sampattiyo patthayamānā
atk-s0201a:1416_4: deti, tvaṃ etissā tā sampattiyo dātuṃ sakkhissasi na sakkhissasīti, ayaṃ kho pana
atk-s0201a:1416_5: piṇḍapāto tayā sarāgena sadosena samohena na sakkā gaṇhitunti pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:1416_6: gaṇṭhikaṃ muñcitvā nivattitvā kassakaleṇameva gantvā pattaṃ heṭṭhāmañce cīvaraṃ cīvaravaṃse
atk-s0201a:1416_7: ṭhapetvā arahattaṃ apāpuṇitvā na nikkhamissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nisīdi. Dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0201a:1416_8: appamatto hutvā nivutthabhikkhu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purebhattameva arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0201a:1416_9: vikasitaṃ viya padumaṃ mahākhīṇāsavo sitaṃ karontova nikkhami. Leṇadvāre rukkhamhi adhivatthā devatā –
atk-s0201a:1418: Yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0201a:1419: Evaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā “bhante, piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ tumhādisānaṃ arahantānaṃ bhikkhaṃ datvā mahallakitthiyo dukkhā muccissantī”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1420_0: Thero uṭṭhahitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā kālaṃ olokento pātoyevāti ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0201a:1420_1: gāmaṃ pāvisi. Dārikāpi bhattaṃ sampādetvā “idāni me bhātā āgamissati, idāni āgamissatī”ti
atk-s0201a:1420_2: dvāraṃ olokayamānā nisīdi. Sā there gharadvāraṃ sampatte pattaṃ gahetvā sappiphāṇitayojitassa
atk-s0201a:1420_3: khīrapiṇḍapātassa pūretvā hatthe ṭhapesi. Thero “sukhaṃ hotū”ti anumodanaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:1420_4: pakkāmi. Sāpi taṃ olokayamānāva aṭṭhāsi. Therassa hi tadā ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo
atk-s0201a:1420_5: ahosi, vippasannāni indriyāni, mukhaṃ bandhanā pamuttatālapakkaṃ viya ativiya virocittha.
atk-s0201a:1420_6: Mahāupāsikā araññā āgantvā “kiṃ amma, bhātiko te āgato”ti pucchi. Sā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0201a:1420_7: ārocesi. Sā upāsikā “ajja me puttassa pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti ñatvā “abhiramati
atk-s0201a:1420_8: te amma bhātā buddhasāsane na ukkaṇṭhatī”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1421_0: “Mahantaṃ kho panetaṃ satthu dāyajjaṃ, yadidaṃ sattaariyadhanaṃ nāma, taṃ na sakkā
atk-s0201a:1421_1: kusītena gahetuṃ. Yathā hi vippaṭipannaṃ puttaṃ mātāpitaro ‘ayaṃ amhākaṃ aputto’ti
atk-s0201a:1421_2: paribāhiraṃ karonti, so tesaṃ accayena dāyajjaṃ na labhati, evaṃ kusītopi idaṃ ariyadhanadāyajjaṃ
atk-s0201a:1421_3: na labhati, āraddhavīriyova labhatī”ti dāyajjamahattataṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1421_4: “Mahā kho pana te satthā, satthuno hi mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakālepi abhinikkhamanepi
atk-s0201a:1421_6: parinibbānakālepi dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha, yuttaṃ nu te evarūpassa satthuno
atk-s0201a:1421_7: sāsane ‘pabbajitvā kusītena bhavitu”’nti evaṃ satthumahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1422_0: Jātiyāpi – “tvaṃ idāni na lāmakajātiko, asambhinnāya mahāsammatapaveṇiyā āgato, ukkākarājavaṃse
atk-s0201a:1422_1: jātosi, suddhodhanamahārājassa mahāmāyādeviyā ca nattā, rāhulabhaddassa kaniṭṭho,
atk-s0201a:1422_2: tayā nāma evarūpena jinaputtena hutvā na yuttaṃ kusītena viharitu”nti evaṃ jātimahattaṃ
atk-s0201a:1422_3: paccavekkhatopi uppajjati. “Sāriputtamoggallānā ceva asīti ca mahāsāvakā vīriyeneva
atk-s0201a:1422_4: lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu, tvaṃ etesaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjissasi
atk-s0201a:1422_5: na paṭipajjissasī”ti evaṃ sabrahmacārimahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati. Kucchiṃ
atk-s0201a:1422_7: āraddhavīriye pahitatte puggale sevantassāpi, ṭhānanisajjādīsu vīriyuppādanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:1422_8: ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:1423_1: yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya,
atk-s0201a:1423_2: uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti
atk-s0201a:1423_3: evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā nāma, tassa uppādakamanasikāro
atk-s0201a:1424_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti buddhānussati dhammasaṅghasīlacāgadevatānussati
atk-s0201a:1425_0: Buddhaguṇe anussarantassāpi hi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo
atk-s0201a:1425_1: uppajjati. Dhammasaṅghaguṇe anussarantassāpi, dīgharattaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā rakkhitaṃ
atk-s0201a:1425_3: dubbhikkhabhayādīsu paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ datvā “evaṃ nāma adamhā”ti cāgaṃ
atk-s0201a:1425_4: paccavekkhantassāpi, gihinopi evarūpe kāle sīlavantānaṃ dinnadānaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-s0201a:1425_5: yehi guṇehi samannāgatā devatā devattaṃ pattā, tathārūpānaṃ guṇānaṃ attani atthitaṃ
atk-s0201a:1425_6: paccavekkhantassāpi, “samāpattiyā vikkhambhitā kilesā saṭṭhipi, sattatipi vassāni
atk-s0201a:1425_9: rajasadise lūkhapuggale parivajjantassāpi, buddhādīsu pasādabahule muducitte siniddhapuggale
atk-s0201a:1425_11: ṭhānanisajjādīsu pītiuppādanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa
atk-s0201a:1426_1: yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya,
atk-s0201a:1426_2: uppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā
atk-s0201a:1427_0: Apica satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paṇītabhojanasevanatā
atk-s0201a:1428_0: Paṇītañhi siniddhaṃ sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjantassāpi, sītuṇhesu utūsu ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu
atk-s0201a:1428_1: sappāyaṃ utuṃ ca iriyāpathaṃ ca sevantassāpi passaddhi uppajjati. Yo pana mahāpurisajātiko
atk-s0201a:1428_2: sabbautuiriyāpathakkhamova hoti, na taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yassa sabhāgavisabhāgatā
atk-s0201a:1428_3: atthi, tasseva visabhāge utuiriyāpathe vajjetvā sabhāge sevantassāpi uppajjati. Majjhattapayogo
atk-s0201a:1428_4: vuccati attano ca parassa ca kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇā, iminā majjhattapayogena uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1428_5: Yo leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paraṃ viheṭhayamānova vicarati. Evarūpaṃ sāraddhakāyaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0201a:1428_6: parivajjantassāpi, saṃyatapādapāṇiṃ passaddhakāyaṃ puggalaṃ sevantassāpi, ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-s0201a:1428_7: passaddhiuppādanatthāya ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa panassa
atk-s0201a:1429_1: yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya,
atk-s0201a:1429_2: uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā
atk-s0201a:1429_3: saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha samathova samathanimittaṃ, avikkhepaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:1430_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti vatthuvisadakiriyatā
atk-s0201a:1430_1: indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā nimittakusalatā samaye cittassa paggahaṇatā samaye cittassa
atk-s0201a:1430_2: niggahaṇatā samaye sampahaṃsanatā samaye ajjhupekkhanatā asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā
atk-s0201a:1431_0: Nimittakusalatā nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā. Samaye cittassa paggahaṇatāti
atk-s0201a:1431_1: yasmiṃ samaye atisithilavīriyatādīhi līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayavīriyasambojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpanena
atk-s0201a:1431_2: tassa paggahaṇaṃ. Samaye cittassa niggahaṇatāti yasmiṃ samaye accāraddhavīriyatādīhi
atk-s0201a:1431_4: tassa niggahaṇaṃ. Samaye sampahaṃsanatāti yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paññāpayogamandatāya
atk-s0201a:1431_5: vā upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇena
atk-s0201a:1431_6: saṃvejeti. Aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūni nāma jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni cattāri, apāyadukkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1431_7: pañcamaṃ, atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ
atk-s0201a:1431_8: dukkhanti. Ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena ca pasādaṃ janeti. Ayaṃ vuccati “samaye sampahaṃsanatā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1432_0: Samaye ajjhupekkhanatā nāma yasmiṃ samaye sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ
atk-s0201a:1432_1: anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tadāssa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
atk-s0201a:1432_2: na byāpāraṃ āpajjati sārathi viya samappavattesu. Assesu. Ayaṃ vuccati “samaye ajjhupekkhanatā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1432_3: Asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā nāma upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā appattānaṃ vikkhittacittānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1432_4: puggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ. Samāhitapuggalasevanatā nāma upacārena vā appanāya
atk-s0201a:1432_5: vā samāhitacittānaṃ sevanā bhajanā payirupāsanā. Tadadhimuttatā nāma ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-s0201a:1432_6: samādhiuppādanatthaṃyeva ninnapoṇapabbhāracittatā. Evañhi paṭipajjato esa uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1432_7: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:1433_1: yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya,
atk-s0201a:1433_2: uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā
atk-s0201a:1433_3: saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ uppādo hoti. Tattha upekkhāyeva upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā nāma.
atk-s0201a:1434_0: Apica pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā
atk-s0201a:1435_0: Tattha dvīhākārehi sattamajjhattataṃ samuṭṭhāpeti – “tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā
atk-s0201a:1435_1: attano kammena gamissasi, esopi attano kammena āgantvā attano kammena gamissati,
atk-s0201a:1435_2: tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī”ti evaṃ kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇena ca, “paramatthato sattoyeva
atk-s0201a:1435_3: natthi, so tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī”ti evaṃ nissattapaccavekkhaṇena ca. Dvīhevākārehi saṅkhāramajjhattataṃ
atk-s0201a:1435_4: samuṭṭhāpeti – “idaṃ cīvaraṃ anupubbena vaṇṇavikāraṃ ceva jiṇṇabhāvaṃ ca upagantvā
atk-s0201a:1435_5: pādapuñchanacoḷakaṃ hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiyā chaḍḍanīyaṃ bhavissati, sace panassa sāmiko
atk-s0201a:1435_6: bhaveyya, nāssa evaṃ vinassituṃ dadeyyā”ti evaṃ asāmikabhāvaṃ paccavekkhaṇena, “anaddhaniyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1435_7: idaṃ tāvakālika”nti evaṃ tāvakālikatāpaccavekkhaṇena ca. Yathā ca cīvare, evaṃ pattādīsupi yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0201a:1436_0: Sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatāti ettha yo puggalo gihi vā attano puttadhītādike,
atk-s0201a:1436_1: pabbajito vā attano antevāsikasamānupajjhāyakādike mamāyati, sahattheneva nesaṃ kesacchedanasūcikammacīvaradhovanarajanapattapacanādīni
atk-s0201a:1436_2: karoti, muhuttampi apassanto “asuko sāmaṇero kuhiṃ, asuko daharo kuhi”nti bhantamigo
atk-s0201a:1436_3: viya ito cito ca āloketi, aññena kesacchedanādīnaṃ atthāya “muhuttaṃ tāva asukaṃ
atk-s0201a:1436_4: pesethā”ti yācīyamānopi “amhepi taṃ attano kammaṃ na kārema, tumhe taṃ gahetvā kilamessathā”ti
atk-s0201a:1436_5: na deti. Ayaṃ sattakelāyano nāma. Yo pana pattacīvarathālakakattarayaṭṭhiādīni mamāyati,
atk-s0201a:1436_6: aññassa hatthena parāmasitumpi na deti, tāvakālikaṃ yācito “mayampi idaṃ mamāyantā
atk-s0201a:1436_7: na paribhuñjāma, tumhākaṃ kiṃ dassāmā”ti vadati. Ayaṃ saṅkhārakelāyano nāma. Yo pana
atk-s0201a:1436_8: tesu dvīsupi vatthūsu majjhatto udāsino. Ayaṃ sattasaṅkhāramajjhatto nāma. Iti ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:1436_9: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo evarūpaṃ sattasaṅkhārakelāyanaṃ puggalaṃ ārakā parivajjantassāpi,
atk-s0201a:1436_11: uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:1437_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā satta sambojjhaṅge pariggaṇhitvā, parassa vā, kālena
atk-s0201a:1437_1: vā attano, kālena vā parassa bojjhaṅge pariggaṇhitvā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0201a:1437_2: Samudayavayā panettha bojjhaṅgānaṃ nibbattinirodhavasena veditabbā. Ito paraṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0201a:1438: Kevalañhi idha bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā bojjhaṅgapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1441: 119. Evaṃ sattabojjhaṅgavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni catusaccavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1442_0: Tattha idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmake dhamme “idaṃ
atk-s0201a:1442_1: dukkha”nti yathāsabhāvato pajānāti, tasseva kho pana dukkhassa janikaṃ samuṭṭhāpikaṃ
atk-s0201a:1442_2: purimataṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti, ubhinnaṃ appavattiṃ nibbānaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti,
atk-s0201a:1442_4: paṭipadā”ti yathāsabhāvato pajānātīti attho. Avasesā ariyasaccakathā visuddhimagge vitthāritāyeva.
atk-s0201a:1443_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā cattāri saccāni pariggaṇhitvā, parassa vā, kālena
atk-s0201a:1443_1: vā attano, kālena vā parassa cattāri saccāni pariggaṇhitvā dhammesu dhammānupassī
atk-s0201a:1443_2: viharati. Samudayavayā panettha catunnaṃ saccānaṃ yathāsambhavato uppattinivattivasena
atk-s0201a:1444: Kevalañhi idha catusaccapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā saccapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1446_0: Ettāvatā ānāpānaṃ catuiriyāpathaṃ catusampajaññaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ catudhātuvavatthānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1446_1: navasivathikā vedanānupassanā cittānupassanā nīvaraṇapariggaho khandhapariggaho āyatanapariggaho
atk-s0201a:1446_2: bojjhaṅgapariggaho saccapariggahoti ekavīsati kammaṭṭhānāni vuttāni. Tesu ānāpānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1446_3: dvattiṃsākāro navasivathikāti ekādasa appanākammaṭṭhānāni honti. Dīghabhāṇakamahāsīvatthero
atk-s0201a:1446_4: pana “navasivathikā ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttā”ti āha. Tasmā tassa matena dveyeva
atk-s0201a:1446_5: appanākammaṭṭhānāni, sesāni upacārakammaṭṭhānāni. Kiṃ panetesu sabbesu abhiniveso
atk-s0201a:1446_6: jāyatīti? Na jāyati. Iriyāpathasampajaññanīvaraṇabojjhaṅgesu hi abhiniveso na jāyati,
atk-s0201a:1446_7: sesesu jāyatīti. Mahāsīvatthero panāha – “etesupi abhiniveso jāyati, ayañhi atthi
atk-s0201a:1446_8: nu kho me cattāro iriyāpathā, udāhu natthi, atthi nu kho me catusampajaññaṃ, udāhu
atk-s0201a:1446_9: natthi, atthi nu kho me pañcanīvaraṇā, udāhu natthi, atthi nu kho me sattabojjhaṅgā,
atk-s0201a:1446_10: udāhu natthīti evaṃ pariggaṇhāti, tasmā sabbattha abhiniveso jāyatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1447_0: 137. Yo hi koci, bhikkhaveti yo hi koci bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā
atk-s0201a:1447_1: vā. Evaṃ bhāveyyāti ādito paṭṭhāya vuttena bhāvanānukkamena bhāveyya. Pāṭikaṅkhanti
atk-s0201a:1447_2: paṭikaṅkhitabbaṃ, avassaṃ bhāvīti attho. Aññāti arahattaṃ. Sati vā upādiseseti upādānasese
atk-s0201a:1448_0: Evaṃ sattannaṃ vassānaṃ vasena sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassetvā puna tato appatarepi
atk-s0201a:1448_1: kāle dassento “tiṭṭhantu, bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Sabbampi cetaṃ majjhimasseva neyyapuggalassa
atk-s0201a:1448_2: vasena vuttaṃ. Tikkhapaññaṃ pana sandhāya – “pāto anusiṭṭho sāyaṃ visesaṃ adhigamissati,
atk-s0201a:1448_3: sāyaṃ anusiṭṭho pāto visesaṃ adhigamissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1449_0: Iti bhagavā “evaṃniyyānikaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāsana”nti dassetvā ekavīsatiyāpi ṭhānesu
atk-s0201a:1449_1: arahattanikūṭena desitaṃ desanaṃ niyyātento “ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo…pe… iti
atk-s0201a:1449_2: yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti āha. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1457_0: 139. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷasīhanādasuttaṃ. Yasmā panassa atthuppattiko nikkhepo, tasmā
atk-s0201a:1457_1: taṃ dassetvā cassa anupubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Katarāya panidaṃ atthuppattiyā
atk-s0201a:1457_2: nikkhittanti? Lābhasakkārapaccayā titthiyaparidevite. Bhagavato kira dhammadāyādasutte
atk-s0201a:1457_3: vuttanayena mahālābhasakkāro uppajji. Catuppamāṇiko hi ayaṃ lokasannivāso, rūpappamāṇo
atk-s0201a:1457_4: rūpappasanno, ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno, lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno, dhammappamāṇo
atk-s0201a:1457_5: dhammappasannoti imesaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena catudhā ṭhito.
atk-s0201a:1458_0: Tesaṃ idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ – katamo ca puggalo rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno? Idhekacco puggalo
atk-s0201a:1458_1: ārohaṃ vā passitvā pariṇāhaṃ vā passitvā saṇṭhānaṃ vā passitvā pāripūriṃ vā passitvā
atk-s0201a:1458_2: tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasādaṃ janeti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno.
atk-s0201a:1459_0: Katamo ca puggalo ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno? Idhekacco puggalo paravaṇṇanāya parathomanāya
atk-s0201a:1459_1: parapasaṃsanāya paravaṇṇahārikāya, tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasādaṃ janeti, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0201a:1460_0: Katamo ca puggalo lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno? Idhekacco puggalo cīvaralūkhaṃ vā passitvā
atk-s0201a:1460_1: pattalūkhaṃ vā passitvā, senāsanalūkhaṃ vā passitvā vividhaṃ vā dukkarakārikaṃ passitvā
atk-s0201a:1460_2: tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasādaṃ janeti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno.
atk-s0201a:1461_0: Katamo ca puggalo dhammappamāṇo dhammappasanno? Idhekacco puggalo sīlaṃ vā passitvā
atk-s0201a:1461_1: samādhiṃ vā passitvā paññaṃ vā passitvā tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasādaṃ janeti, ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:1462_2: tārāgaṇasamujjalaṃ viya gaganatalaṃ sabbaphāliphullaṃ viya ca yojanasatubbedhaṃ pāricchattakaṃ
atk-s0201a:1462_3: aṭṭhārasaratanubbedhaṃ byāmappabhāparikkhepaṃ sassirikaṃ anopamasarīraṃ disvā sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati.
atk-s0201a:1463_0: Ghosappamāṇopi, bhagavatā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dasa pāramiyo
atk-s0201a:1463_1: dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyo pūritā aṅgapariccāgo puttadārapariccāgo,
atk-s0201a:1463_2: rajjapariccāgo attapariccāgo nayanapariccāgo ca katotiādinā nayena pavattaṃ ghosaṃ
atk-s0201a:1464_0: Lūkhappamāṇopi bhagavato cīvaralūkhaṃ disvā “sace bhagavā agāraṃ ajjhāvasissa, kāsikavatthameva
atk-s0201a:1464_1: adhārayissa. Pabbajitvā panānena sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarena santussamānena bhāriyaṃ kata”nti
atk-s0201a:1464_2: sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati. Pattalūkhampi disvā – “iminā agāraṃ ajjhāvasantena rattavarasuvaṇṇabhājanesu
atk-s0201a:1464_3: cakkavattibhojanārahaṃ sugandhasālibhojanaṃ paribhuttaṃ, pabbajitvā pana pāsāṇamayaṃ
atk-s0201a:1464_4: pattaṃ ādāya uccanīcakuladvāresu sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā laddhapiṇḍiyālopena santussamāno
atk-s0201a:1464_5: bhāriyaṃ karotī”ti sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati. Senāsanalūkhaṃ disvāpi – “ayaṃ agāraṃ
atk-s0201a:1464_6: ajjhāvasanto tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu tividhanāṭakaparivāro dibbasampattiṃ
atk-s0201a:1464_7: viya rajjasiriṃ anubhavitvā idāni pabbajjūpagato rukkhamūlasenāsanādīsu dāruphalakasilāpaṭṭapīṭhamañcakādīhi
atk-s0201a:1464_8: santussamāno bhāriyaṃ karotī”ti sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati. Dukkarakārikamassa disvāpi
atk-s0201a:1464_10: appāṇakaṃ jhānaṃ jhāyissati, sarīre ca jīvite ca anapekkho viharissati, aho dukkarakārako
atk-s0201a:1465_0: Dhammappamāṇopi bhagavato sīlaguṇaṃ samādhiguṇaṃ paññāguṇaṃ jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattisampadaṃ
atk-s0201a:1465_1: abhiññāpāripūriṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ devorohaṇaṃ pāthikaputtadamanādīni ca anekāni
atk-s0201a:1465_2: acchariyāni disvā sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati, te evaṃ pasannā bhagavato mahantaṃ
atk-s0201a:1465_3: lābhasakkāraṃ abhiharanti. Titthiyānaṃ pana bāverujātake kākassa viya lābhasakkāro
atk-s0201a:1467: Kākaṃ tattha apūjesuṃ, maṃsena ca phalena ca.
atk-s0201a:1469: Atha lābho ca sakkāro, vāyasassa ahāyatha.
atk-s0201a:1473: Atha lābho ca sakkāro, titthiyānaṃ ahāyathā”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:1474: Te evaṃ pahīnalābhasakkārā rattiṃ ekadvaṅgulamattaṃ obhāsetvāpi sūriyuggamane khajjopanakā viya hatappabhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:1476: Nidassayanti obhāsaṃ, etesaṃ visayo hi so.
atk-s0201a:1481: Yadā ca buddho lokasmiṃ, udeti amitappabho;
atk-s0201a:1482: Nippabhā titthiyā honti, sūriye khajjupakā yathāti.
atk-s0201a:1483_0: Te evaṃ nippabhā hutvā kacchupiḷakādīhi kiṇṇasarīrā paramapārijuññapattā yena buddho
atk-s0201a:1483_1: yena dhammo yena saṅgho yena ca mahājanassa sannipāto, tena tena gantvā antaravīthiyampi
atk-s0201a:1484_0: “Kiṃ bho samaṇoyeva gotamo samaṇo, mayaṃ assamaṇā; samaṇasseva gotamassa sāvakā samaṇā,
atk-s0201a:1484_1: amhākaṃ sāvakā assamaṇā? Samaṇasseva gotamassa sāvakānañcassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1484_2: na amhākaṃ, sāvakānañca no dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ? Nanu samaṇopi gotamo samaṇo, mayampi
atk-s0201a:1484_3: samaṇā. Samaṇassapi gotamassa sāvakā samaṇā, amhākampi sāvakā samaṇā. Samaṇassapi
atk-s0201a:1484_4: gotamassa sāvakānañcassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, amhākampi sāvakānañca no dinnaṃ mahapphalañceva?
atk-s0201a:1484_5: Samaṇassapi gotamassa sāvakānañcassa detha karotha, amhākampi sāvakānañca no detha
atk-s0201a:1484_6: sakkarotha? Nanu samaṇo gotamo purimāni divasāni uppanno, mayaṃ pana loke uppajjamāneyeva uppannā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1485_0: Evaṃ nānappakāraṃ viravanti. Atha bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyoti catasso
atk-s0201a:1485_1: parisā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā bhagavato ārocesuṃ “titthiyā bhante idañcidañca kathentī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1485_2: Taṃ sutvā bhagavā – “mā tumhe, bhikkhave, titthiyānaṃ vacanena ‘aññatra samaṇo atthī’ti
atk-s0201a:1485_3: saññino ahuvatthā”ti vatvā aññatitthiyesu samaṇabhāvaṃ paṭisedhento idheva ca anujānanto
atk-s0201a:1485_4: imissā atthuppattiyā idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇoti idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0201a:1486_0: Tattha idhevāti imasmiṃyeva sāsane. Ayaṃ pana niyamo sesapadesupi veditabbo. Dutiyādayopi
atk-s0201a:1486_1: hi samaṇā idheva, na aññattha. Samaṇoti sotāpanno. Tenevāha – “katamo ca, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:1486_2: paṭhamo samaṇo? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno
atk-s0201a:1486_3: hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo samaṇo”ti.
atk-s0201a:1487_0: Dutiyoti sakadāgāmī. Tenevāha – “katamo ca? Bhikkhave, dutiyo samaṇo. Idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:1487_1: bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakideva
atk-s0201a:1487_2: imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo samaṇo”ti.
atk-s0201a:1488_0: Tatiyoti anāgāmī. Tenevāha – “katamo ca, bhikkhave, tatiyo samaṇo? Idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:1488_1: bhikkhu pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī
atk-s0201a:1488_2: anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo samaṇo”ti.
atk-s0201a:1489_0: Catutthoti arahā. Tenevāha – “katamo ca, bhikkhave, catuttho samaṇo? Idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:1489_1: bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ
atk-s0201a:1489_2: abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho samaṇo”ti. Iti
atk-s0201a:1490_0: Suññāti rittā tucchā. Parappavādāti cattāro sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatikā,
atk-s0201a:1490_1: cattāro antānantikā, cattāro amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhiccasamuppannikā, soḷasa saññīvādā,
atk-s0201a:1490_2: aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā, satta ucchedavādā, pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti
atk-s0201a:1490_3: ime sabbepi brahmajāle āgatā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo. Ito bāhirānaṃ paresaṃ vādā parappavādā
atk-s0201a:1490_4: nāma. Te sabbepi imehi catūhi phalaṭṭhakasamaṇehi suññā, na hi te ettha santi. Na
atk-s0201a:1490_5: kevalañca eteheva suññā, catūhi pana maggaṭṭhakasamaṇehipi catunnaṃ maggānaṃ atthāya
atk-s0201a:1490_6: āraddhavipassakehipīti dvādasahipi samaṇehi suññā eva. Imameva atthaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā
atk-s0201a:1497: “Dutiyopi samaṇo natthi, tatiyopi samaṇo natthi, catutthopi samaṇo natthi. Suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1498_0: Ettha hi padesavattīti āraddhavipassako adhippeto. Tasmā sotāpattimaggassa āraddhavipassakaṃ
atk-s0201a:1498_1: maggaṭṭhaṃ phalaṭṭhanti tayopi ekato katvā samaṇopi natthīti āha. Sakadāgāmimaggassa
atk-s0201a:1498_2: āraddhavipassakaṃ maggaṭṭhaṃ phalaṭṭhanti tayopi ekato katvā dutiyopi samaṇo natthīti
atk-s0201a:1499_0: Kasmā panete aññattha natthīti? Akhettatāya. Yathā hi na āragge sāsapo tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:1499_1: na udakapiṭṭhe aggi jalati, na piṭṭhipāsāṇe bījāni ruhanti, evameva bāhiresu titthāyatanesu
atk-s0201a:1499_2: na ime samaṇā uppajjanti, imasmiṃyeva pana sāsane uppajjanti. Kasmā? Khettatāya.
atk-s0201a:1499_3: Tesaṃ akhettatā ca khettatā ca ariyamaggassa abhāvato ca bhāvato ca veditabbā. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0201a:1500_0: “Yasmiṃ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati, samaṇopi
atk-s0201a:1500_1: tattha na upalabbhati, dutiyopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati, tatiyopi tattha samaṇo
atk-s0201a:1500_2: na upalabbhati, catutthopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati. Yasmiñca kho, subhadda,
atk-s0201a:1500_3: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati, samaṇopi tattha upalabbhati, dutiyopi
atk-s0201a:1500_4: tattha…pe…. Catutthopi tattha samaṇo upalabbhati. Imasmiṃ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye
atk-s0201a:1500_5: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati, idheva, subhadda, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo,
atk-s0201a:1500_6: idha tatiyo samaṇo, idha catuttho samaṇo, suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1501_0: Evaṃ yasmā titthāyatanaṃ akhettaṃ, sāsanaṃ khettaṃ, tasmā yathā surattahatthapādo
atk-s0201a:1501_1: sūrakesarako sīho migarājā na susāne vā saṅkārakūṭe vā paṭivasati, tiyojanasahassavitthataṃ
atk-s0201a:1501_2: pana himavantaṃ ajjhogāhetvā maṇiguhāyaṃyeva paṭivasati. Yathā ca chaddanto nāgarājā
atk-s0201a:1501_3: na gocariyahatthikulādīsu navasu nāgakulesu uppajjati, chaddantakuleyeva uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1501_4: Yathā ca valāhako assarājā na gadrabhakule vā ghoṭakakule vā uppajjati, sindhuyā
atk-s0201a:1501_5: tīre pana sindhavakuleyeva uppajjati. Yathā ca sabbakāmadadaṃ manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1501_6: na saṅkārakūṭe vā paṃsupabbatādīsu vā uppajjati, vepullapabbatabbhantareyeva uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1501_7: Yathā ca timirapiṅgalo maccharājā na khuddakapokkharaṇīsu uppajjati, caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre
atk-s0201a:1501_8: mahāsamuddeyeva uppajjati. Yathā ca diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko supaṇṇarājā na gāmadvāre
atk-s0201a:1501_9: eraṇḍavanādīsu paṭivasati, mahāsamuddaṃ pana ajjhogāhetvā simbalidahavaneyeva paṭivasati.
atk-s0201a:1501_10: Yathā ca dhataraṭṭho suvaṇṇahaṃso na gāmadvāre āvāṭakādīsu paṭivasati, navutihaṃsasahassaparivāro
atk-s0201a:1501_11: hutvā cittakūṭapabbateyeva paṭivasati. Yathā ca catuddīpissaro cakkavattirājā na
atk-s0201a:1501_12: nīcakule uppajjati, asambhinnajātikhattiyakuleyeva pana uppajjati. Evameva imesu
atk-s0201a:1501_13: samaṇesu ekasamaṇopi na aññatitthāyatane uppajjati, ariyamaggaparikkhitte pana buddhasāsaneyeva
atk-s0201a:1501_14: uppajjati. Tenāha bhagavā “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā samaṇehi
atk-s0201a:1502_0: Sammā sīhanādaṃ nadathāti ettha sammāti hetunā nayena kāraṇena. Sīhanādanti seṭṭhanādaṃ
atk-s0201a:1502_1: abhītanādaṃ appaṭinādaṃ. Imesañhi catunnaṃ samaṇānaṃ idheva atthitāya ayaṃ nādo seṭṭhanādo
atk-s0201a:1502_2: nāma hoti uttamanādo. “Ime samaṇā idheva atthī”ti vadantassa aññato bhayaṃ vā āsaṅkā
atk-s0201a:1502_3: vā natthīti abhītanādo nāma hoti. “Amhākampi sāsane ime samaṇā atthī”ti pūraṇādīsu
atk-s0201a:1502_4: ekassāpi uṭṭhahitvā vattuṃ asamatthatāya ayaṃ nādo appaṭinādo nāma hoti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:1503_0: 140. Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjatīti idaṃ kho pana kāraṇaṃ vijjati. Yaṃ aññatitthiyāti
atk-s0201a:1503_1: yena kāraṇena aññatitthiyā. Ettha ca titthaṃ jānitabbaṃ, titthakaro jānitabbo titthiyā
atk-s0201a:1503_2: jānitabbā, titthiyasāvakā jānitabbā. Titthaṃnāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo. Ettha hi sattā
atk-s0201a:1503_3: taranti uppalavanti ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti, tasmā titthanti vuccanti. Tāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1503_4: uppādetā titthakaro nāma. Tassa laddhiṃ gahetvā pabbajitā titthiyā nāma. Tesaṃ paccayadāyakā
atk-s0201a:1503_5: titthiyasāvakāti veditabbā. Paribbājakāti gihibandhanaṃ pahāya pabbajjūpagatā. Assāsoti
atk-s0201a:1503_6: avassayo patiṭṭhā upatthambho. Balanti thāmo. Yena tumheti yena assāsena vā balena vā evaṃ vadetha.
atk-s0201a:1504_0: Atthi kho no, āvuso, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhenāti ettha
atk-s0201a:1504_1: ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yo so bhagavā samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā
atk-s0201a:1504_2: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, tena bhagavatā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayaṃ
atk-s0201a:1504_3: jānatā, hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ passatā. Apica pubbenivāsādīhi
atk-s0201a:1504_4: jānatā, dibbena cakkhunā passatā. Tīhi vijjāhi chahi vā pana abhiññāhi jānatā, sabbattha
atk-s0201a:1504_5: appaṭihatena samantacakkhunā passatā. Sabbadhammajānanasamatthāya paññāya jānatā,
atk-s0201a:1504_6: sabbasattānaṃ cakkhuvisayātītāni tirokuṭṭādigatāni vāpi rūpāni ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunā
atk-s0201a:1504_7: passatā. Attahitasādhikāya samādhipadaṭṭhānāya paṭivedhapaññāya jānatā, parahitasādhikāya
atk-s0201a:1504_8: karuṇāpadaṭṭhānāya desanāpaññāya passatā. Arīnaṃ hatattā paccayādīnaṃ arahattā ca
atk-s0201a:1504_9: arahatā, sammā sāmañca saccānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhena. Antarāyikadhamme vā jānatā,
atk-s0201a:1504_10: niyyānikadhamme passatā. Kilesārīnaṃ hatattā arahatā, sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1504_11: buddhattā sammāsambuddhenāti, evaṃ catuvesārajjavasena catūhi ākārehi thomitena cattāro
atk-s0201a:1504_12: dhammā akkhātā, ye mayaṃ attani sampassamānā evaṃ vadema, na rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1505_0: Satthari pasādoti “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā nayena buddhaguṇe anussarantānaṃ uppannappasādo.
atk-s0201a:1505_1: Dhamme pasādoti “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”tiādinā nayena dhammaguṇe anussarantānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1505_2: uppannappasādo. Sīlesu paripūrakāritāti ariyakantesu sīlesu paripūrakāritā. Ariyakantasīlāni
atk-s0201a:1505_3: nāma pañcasīlāni. Tāni hi bhavantaragatopi ariyasāvako attano ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantopi
atk-s0201a:1505_4: na vītikkamati. Sacepi hi naṃ koci vadeyya – “imaṃ sakalaṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0201a:1505_5: khuddakamakkhikaṃ jīvitā voropehī”ti, aṭṭhānametaṃ, yaṃ so tassa vacanaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0201a:1505_6: Evaṃ ariyānaṃ sīlāni kantāni piyāni manāpāni. Tāni sandhāya vuttaṃ “sīlesu paripūrakāritā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1506_0: Sahadhammikā kho panāti bhikkhu bhikkhunī sikkhamānā sāmaṇero sāmaṇerī upāsako upāsikāti
atk-s0201a:1506_1: ete satta sahadhammacārino. Etesu hi bhikkhu bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sahadhammaṃ carati
atk-s0201a:1506_2: samānasikkhatāya. Tathā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi…pe… upāsikā upāsikāhi, sotāpanno sotāpannehi,
atk-s0201a:1506_3: sakadāgāmī…pe… anāgāmīhi sahadhammaṃ carati. Tasmā sabbepete sahadhammikāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:1506_4: Apicettha ariyasāvakāyeva adhippetā. Tesañhi bhavantarepi maggadassanamhi vivādo
atk-s0201a:1506_5: natthi, tasmā te accantaṃ ekadhammacāritāya sahadhammikā. Iminā, “suppaṭipanno bhagavato
atk-s0201a:1506_6: sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā nayena saṅghaṃ anussarantānaṃ uppannappasādo kathito. Ettāvatā
atk-s0201a:1507: Ime kho no, āvusoti, āvuso, ime cattāro dhammā tena bhagavatā amhākaṃ assāso ceva balañcāti akkhātā, ye mayaṃ attani sampassamānā evaṃ vadema.
atk-s0201a:1508_0: 141. Yo amhākaṃ satthāti iminā pūraṇakassapādike cha satthāro apadissanti. Yathā
atk-s0201a:1508_1: pana idāni sāsane ācariyupajjhāyādīsu “amhākaṃ ācariyo, amhākaṃ upajjhāyo”ti gehasitapemaṃ
atk-s0201a:1508_2: hoti. Evarūpaṃ pemaṃ sandhāya “satthari pasādo”ti vadanti. Thero panāha – “yasmā
atk-s0201a:1508_3: satthā nāma na ekassa, na dvinnaṃ hoti, sadevakassa lokassa ekova satthā, tasmā titthiyā
atk-s0201a:1508_4: ‘amhākaṃ satthā’ ti ekapadeneva satthāraṃ visuṃ katvā imināva padena viruddhā parājitā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1508_5: Dhamme pasādoti idaṃ pana yathā idāni sāsane “amhākaṃ dīghanikāyo amhākaṃ majjhimanikāyo”ti
atk-s0201a:1508_6: mamāyanti, evaṃ attano attano pariyattidhamme gehasitapemaṃ sandhāya vadanti. Sīlesūti
atk-s0201a:1508_7: ajasīlagosīlameṇḍakasīlakukkurasīlādīsu. Idha no āvusoti ettha idhāti pasādaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0201a:1508_8: vadanti. Ko adhippayāsoti ko adhikappayogo. Yadidanti yamidaṃ tumhākañceva amhākañca
atk-s0201a:1508_9: nānākaraṇaṃ vadeyyātha. Taṃ kiṃ nāma? Tumhākampi hi catūsu ṭhānesu pasādo, amhākampi.
atk-s0201a:1508_10: Nanu etasmiṃ pasāde tumhe ca amhe ca dvedhā bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ekasadisāti vācāya
atk-s0201a:1509_0: Atha nesaṃ taṃ samadhurataṃ bhindanto bhagavā evaṃ vādinotiādimāha. Tattha ekā niṭṭhāti
atk-s0201a:1509_1: yā tassa pasādassa pariyosānabhūtā niṭṭhā, kiṃ sā ekā, udāhu puthūti evaṃ pucchathāti
atk-s0201a:1509_2: vadati. Yasmā pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye niṭṭhaṃ apaññapento nāma natthi, brāhmaṇānañhi
atk-s0201a:1509_3: brahmaloko niṭṭhā, mahātāpasānaṃ ābhassarā, paribbājakānaṃ subhakiṇhā, ājīvakānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1509_4: “anantamānaso”ti evaṃ parikappito asaññībhavo. Imasmiṃ sāsane pana arahattaṃ niṭṭhā.
atk-s0201a:1509_5: Sabbeva cete arahattameva niṭṭhāti vadanti. Diṭṭhivasena pana brahmalokādīni paññapenti.
atk-s0201a:1509_6: Tasmā attano attano laddhivasena ekameva niṭṭhaṃ paññapenti, taṃ dassetuṃ bhagavā
atk-s0201a:1510_0: Idāni bhikkhūnampi ekā niṭṭhā, titthiyānampi ekā niṭṭhāti dvīsu aṭṭakārakesu viya
atk-s0201a:1510_1: ṭhitesu bhagavā anuyogavattaṃ dassento sā panāvuso, niṭṭhā sarāgassa, udāhu vītarāgassātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1510_2: Tattha yasmā rāgarattādīnaṃ niṭṭhā nāma natthi. Yadi siyā, soṇasiṅgālādīnampi siyāti
atk-s0201a:1510_3: imaṃ dosaṃ passantānaṃ titthiyānaṃ “vītarāgassa āvuso sā niṭṭhā”tiādinā nayena byākaraṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1511_0: Tattha viddasunoti paṇḍitassa. Anuruddhapaṭiviruddhassāti rāgena anuruddhassa kodhena
atk-s0201a:1511_1: paṭiviruddhassa. Papañcārāmassa papañcaratinoti ettha āramanti etthāti ārāmo. Papañco
atk-s0201a:1511_2: ārāmo assāti papañcārāmo. Papañce rati assāti papañcarati. Papañcoti ca mattapamattākārabhāvena
atk-s0201a:1511_3: pavattānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhimānānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Idha pana taṇhādiṭṭhiyova adhippetā.
atk-s0201a:1511_4: Sarāgassātiādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu ekova kileso āgato. Tassa ākārato nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1511_5: Sarāgassāti hi vuttaṭṭhāne pañcakāmaguṇikarāgavasena gahito. Sataṇhassāti bhavataṇhāvasena.
atk-s0201a:1511_7: papañcuppattidassanavasena. Sarāgassāti vā ettha akusalamūlavasena gahito. Sataṇhassāti
atk-s0201a:1511_8: ettha taṇhāpaccayā upādānadassanavasena. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Thero panāha “kasmā
atk-s0201a:1511_9: evaṃ viddhaṃsetha? Ekoyeva hi ayaṃ lobho rajjanavasena rāgoti vutto. Taṇhākaraṇavasena
atk-s0201a:1511_10: taṇhā. Gahaṇaṭṭhena upādānaṃ. Yugaḷavasena anurodhapaṭivirodho. Papañcuppattidassanaṭṭhena papañco”ti.
atk-s0201a:1512: 142. Idāni imesaṃ kilesānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ diṭṭhivādaṃ dassento dvemā, bhikkhave, diṭṭhiyotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1513_0: Tattha bhavadiṭṭhīti sassatadiṭṭhi. Vibhavadiṭṭhīti ucchedadiṭṭhi. Bhavadiṭṭhiṃ allīnāti
atk-s0201a:1513_1: taṇhādiṭṭhivasena sassatadiṭṭhiṃ allīnā. Upagatāti taṇhādiṭṭhivaseneva upagatā. Ajjhositāti
atk-s0201a:1513_2: taṇhādiṭṭhivaseneva anupaviṭṭhā. Vibhavadiṭṭhiyā te paṭiviruddhāti te sabbe ucchedavādīhi
atk-s0201a:1513_3: saddhiṃ – “tumhe andhabālā na jānātha, sassato ayaṃ loko, nāyaṃ loko ucchijjatī”ti
atk-s0201a:1513_4: paṭiviruddhā niccaṃ kalahabhaṇḍanapasutā viharanti. Dutiyavārepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:1514_0: Samudayañcātiādīsu dve diṭṭhīnaṃ samudayā khaṇikasamudayo paccayasamudayo ca. Khaṇikasamudayo
atk-s0201a:1514_1: diṭṭhīnaṃ nibbatti. Paccayasamudayo aṭṭha ṭhānāni. Seyyathidaṃ, khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1514_2: avijjāpi, phassopi, saññāpi, vitakkopi, ayonisomanasikāropi, pāpamittopi, paratoghosopi
atk-s0201a:1514_3: diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ. “Khandhā hetu khandhā paccayo diṭṭhīnaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena.
atk-s0201a:1514_4: Evaṃ khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ. Avijjā… phasso… saññā… vitakko… ayonisomanasikāro…
atk-s0201a:1514_5: pāpamitto… paratoghoso hetu, paratoghoso paccayo diṭṭhīnaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena.
atk-s0201a:1514_6: Evaṃ paratoghosopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ”. Atthaṅgamāpi dveyeva khaṇikatthaṅgamo paccayatthaṅgamo
atk-s0201a:1514_7: ca. Khaṇikatthaṅgamo nāma khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhānaṃ. Paccayatthaṅgamo
atk-s0201a:1514_8: nāma sotāpattimaggo. Sotāpattimaggo hi diṭṭhiṭṭhānasamugghātoti vutto.
atk-s0201a:1515_0: Assādanti diṭṭhimūlakaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “yaṃdiṭṭhiko satthā hoti,
atk-s0201a:1515_1: taṃdiṭṭhikā sāvakā honti. Yaṃdiṭṭhikā satthāraṃ sāvakā sakkaronti, garuṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a:1515_3: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhadhammiko ānisaṃso”ti. Ādīnavanti diṭṭhiggahaṇamūlakaṃ
atk-s0201a:1515_4: upaddavaṃ. So vaggulivataṃ ukkuṭikappadhānaṃ kaṇṭakāpassayatā pañcātapatappanaṃ sānupapātapatanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1515_5: kesamassuluñcanaṃ appoṇakaṃ jhānantiādīnaṃ vasenaṃ veditabbo. Nissaraṇanti diṭṭhīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1515_6: nissaraṇaṃ nāma nibbānaṃ. Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānantīti ye etaṃ sabbaṃ yathāsabhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:1515_7: na jānanti. Na parimuccanti dukkhasmāti sakalavaṭṭadukkhato na parimuccanti. Iminā
atk-s0201a:1515_8: etesaṃ niṭṭhā nāma natthīti dasseti. Parimuccanti dukkhasmāti sakalavaṭṭadukkhato
atk-s0201a:1515_9: parimuccanti. Iminā etesaṃ niṭṭhā nāma atthīti dvinnaṃ aṭṭakārakānaṃ aṭṭaṃ chindanto
atk-s0201a:1516: 143. Idāni diṭṭhicchedanaṃ dassento cattārimāni, bhikkhave, upādānānītiādimāha. Tesaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttāyeva.
atk-s0201a:1517_0: Sabbupādānapariññāvādā paṭijānamānāti mayaṃ sabbesaṃ upādānānaṃ pariññaṃ samatikkamaṃ
atk-s0201a:1517_1: vadāmāti evaṃ paṭijānamānā. Na sammā sabbupādānapariññanti sabbesaṃ upādānānaṃ samatikkamaṃ
atk-s0201a:1517_2: sammā na paññapenti. Keci kāmupādānamattassa pariññaṃ paññapenti. Keci diṭṭhupādānamattassa
atk-s0201a:1517_3: paññapenti, keci sīlabbatupādānassāpi. Attavādupādānassa pana pariññaṃ paññapento
atk-s0201a:1517_4: nāma natthi. Tesaṃ pana bhedaṃ dassento kāmupādānassa pariññaṃ paññapentītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1517_5: Tattha sabbepi kāmupādānassa pariññaṃ paññapentiyeva, channavuti pāsaṇḍāpi hi “kāmā
atk-s0201a:1517_6: kho pabbajitena na sevitabbā”ti vatthupaṭisevanaṃ kāmaṃ kappatīti na paññapenti,
atk-s0201a:1517_7: akappiyameva katvā paññapenti. Ye pana sevanti, te theyyena sevanti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:1518_0: Yasmā “natthi dinna”ntiādīni gahetvā caranti. “Sīlena suddhi vatena suddhi, bhāvanāya
atk-s0201a:1518_1: suddhī”ti gaṇhanti, attupaladdhiṃ na pajahanti, tasmā na diṭṭhupādānassa, na sīlabbatupādānassa,
atk-s0201a:1518_2: na attavādupādānassa pariññaṃ paññapenti. Taṃ kissa hetūti taṃ apaññāpanaṃ etesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1518_3: kissa hetu, kiṃ kāraṇā? Imāni hi te bhontoti yasmā te bhonto imāni tīṇi kāraṇāni
atk-s0201a:1518_4: yathāsabhāvato na jānantīti attho. Ye panettha dvinnaṃ pariññānaṃ paññāpanakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1518_5: diṭṭhiñceva sīlabbatañca “etaṃ pahātabba”nti yathāsabhāvato jānanti. Te sandhāya
atk-s0201a:1518_6: parato dve vārā vuttā. Tattha ye “atthi dinna”ntiādīni gaṇhanti, te diṭṭhupādānassa
atk-s0201a:1518_7: pariññaṃ paññapenti. Ye pana “na sīlena suddhi, na vatena suddhi, na bhāvanāya suddhī”ti
atk-s0201a:1518_8: gaṇhanti, te sīlabbatupādānassa pariññaṃ paññapenti. Attavādupādānassa pariññaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:1518_9: ekopi paññapetuṃ na sakkoti. Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhinopi hi candimasūriye pāṇinā parimajjitvā
atk-s0201a:1518_10: caramānāpi ca titthiyā tisso pariññā paññapenti. Attavādaṃ muñcituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a:1518_11: Tasmā punappunaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva patanti. Pathavijigucchanasasako viya hi ete.
atk-s0201a:1519_0: Tatthāyaṃ atthasallāpikā upamā – pathavī kira sasakaṃ āha – “bho sasakā”ti. Sasako
atk-s0201a:1519_1: āha – “ko eso”ti. “Kasmā mameva upari sabbairiyāpathe kappento uccārapassāvaṃ karonto
atk-s0201a:1519_2: maṃ na jānāsī”ti. “Suṭṭhu tayā ahaṃ diṭṭho, mayā akkantaṭṭhānampi aṅgulaggehi phuṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1519_3: viya hoti, vissaṭṭhaudakaṃ appamattakaṃ, karīsaṃ katakaphalamattaṃ. Hatthiassādīhi
atk-s0201a:1519_4: pana akkantaṭṭhānampi mahantaṃ, passāvopi nesaṃ ghaṭamatto hoti, uccāropi pacchimatto
atk-s0201a:1519_5: hoti, alaṃ mayhaṃ tayā”ti uppatitvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne patito. Tato naṃ pathavī āha –
atk-s0201a:1519_6: “are dūraṃ gatopi nanu mayhaṃ upariyeva patitosī”ti. So puna taṃ jigucchanto uppatitvā
atk-s0201a:1519_7: aññattha patito, evaṃ vassasahassampi uppatitvā patamāno sasako pathaviṃ muñcituṃ
atk-s0201a:1519_8: na sakkoti. Evamevaṃ titthiyā sabbūpādānapariññaṃ paññapentopi kāmupādānādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:1519_9: samatikkamaṃ paññapenti. Attavādaṃ pana muñcituṃ na sakkonti, asakkontā punappunaṃ
atk-s0201a:1520_0: Evaṃ yaṃ titthiyā samatikkamituṃ na sakkonti, tassa vasena diṭṭhicchedavādaṃ vatvā
atk-s0201a:1520_1: idāni pasādapacchedavādaṃ dassento evarūpe kho, bhikkhave, dhammavinayetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1520_2: Tattha dhammavinayeti dhamme ceva vinaye ca, ubhayenapi aniyyānikasāsanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:1520_3: “Yo satthari pasādo so na sammaggato”ti aniyyānikasāsanamhi hi satthā kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:1520_4: sīhopi hoti, byagghopi hoti, dīpipi acchopi taracchopi. Sāvakā panassa migāpi sūkarāpi
atk-s0201a:1520_5: pasadāpi honti, so “ime mayhaṃ pubbe upaṭṭhākā paccayadāyakā”ti khantiṃ vā mettaṃ
atk-s0201a:1520_6: vā anuddayaṃ vā akatvā tesaṃ upari patitvā lohitaṃ pivati, thūlathūlamaṃsānipi khādati.
atk-s0201a:1520_7: Satthā vā pana biḷāro hoti, sāvakā kukkuṭā vā mūsikā vā. Atha ne vuttanayeneva anukampaṃ
atk-s0201a:1520_8: akatvā khādati. Atha vā satthā nirayapālo hoti, sāvakā nerayikasattā. So “ime mayhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1520_9: pubbe upaṭṭhākā paccayadāyakā”ti anukampaṃ akatvā vividhā kammakāraṇā karoti, ādittepi
atk-s0201a:1520_10: rathe yojeti, aṅgārapabbatampi āropeti, lohakumbhiyampi khipati, anekehipi dukkhadhammehi
atk-s0201a:1520_11: sampayojeti. Sāvakā vā pana kālaṃ katvā sīhādayo honti, satthā migādīsu aññataro.
atk-s0201a:1520_12: Te “imaṃ mayaṃ pubbe catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahimhā, satthā no aya”nti tasmiṃ khantiṃ
atk-s0201a:1520_13: vā mettaṃ vā anuddayaṃ vā akatvā vuttanayeneva anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti. Evaṃ aniyyānikasāsane
atk-s0201a:1520_14: yo satthari pasādo, so na sammaggato hoti, kañci kālaṃ gantvāpi pacchā vinassatiyeva.
atk-s0201a:1521_0: Yo dhamme pasādoti aniyyānikasāsanasmiñhi dhamme pasādo nāma, uggahitapariyāpuṭa
atk-s0201a:1521_1: – dhāritavācittamattake tantidhamme pasādo hoti, vaṭṭamokkho panettha natthi. Tasmā
atk-s0201a:1521_2: yo ettha pasādo, so punappunaṃ vaṭṭameva gambhīraṃ karotīti sāsanasmiṃ asammaggato
atk-s0201a:1522_0: Yā sīlesu paripūrakāritāti yāpi ca aniyyānikasāsane ajasīlādīnaṃ vasena paripūrakāritā,
atk-s0201a:1522_1: sāpi yasmā vaṭṭamokkhaṃ bhavanissaraṇaṃ na sampāpeti, sampajjamānā pana tiracchānayoniṃ
atk-s0201a:1522_2: āvahati, vipaccamānā nirayaṃ, tasmā sā na sammaggatā akkhāyati. Yā sahadhammikesūti
atk-s0201a:1522_3: aniyyānikasāsanasmiñhi ye sahadhammikā, tesu yasmā ekacce kālaṃ katvā sīhādayopi
atk-s0201a:1522_4: honti, ekacce migādayo, tattha sīhādibhūtā “ime amhākaṃ sahadhammikā ahesu”nti migādibhūtesu
atk-s0201a:1522_5: khantiādīni akatvā pubbe vuttanayeneva nesaṃ mahādukkhaṃ uppādenti. Tasmā ettha sahadhammikesu
atk-s0201a:1523_0: Idaṃ pana sabbampi kāraṇabhedaṃ ekato katvā dassento bhagavā taṃ kissa hetu? Evañhetaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1523_1: bhikkhave, hotītiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ saṃkhepattho – evañhetaṃ, bhikkhave, hoti, yaṃ
atk-s0201a:1523_2: mayā vuttaṃ “yo satthari pasādo so na sammaggato akkhāyatī”tiādi, taṃ evameva hoti.
atk-s0201a:1523_3: Kasmā? Yasmā te pasādādayo durakkhāte dhammavinaye …pe… asammāsambuddhappavediteti,
atk-s0201a:1523_4: ettha hi yathā tanti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Tattha durakkhāteti dukkathite, dukkhathitattāyeva
atk-s0201a:1523_5: duppavedite. So panesa yasmā maggaphalatthāya na niyyāti, tasmā aniyyāniko. Rāgādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1523_6: upasamāya asaṃvattanato anupasamasaṃvattaniko. Na sammāsambuddhena sabbaññunā paveditoti
atk-s0201a:1523_8: Ettāvatā bhagavā titthiyesu pasādo surāpītasiṅgāle pasādo viya niratthakoti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:1524_0: Eko kira kāḷasiṅgālo rattiṃ nagaraṃ paviṭṭho surājallikaṃ khāditvā punnāgavane nipajjitvā
atk-s0201a:1524_1: niddāyanto sūriyuggamane pabujjhitvā cintesi “imasmiṃ kāle na sakkā gantuṃ, bahū
atk-s0201a:1524_2: amhākaṃ verino, ekaṃ vañcetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So ekaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā imaṃ
atk-s0201a:1524_3: vañcessāmīti “ayya brāhmaṇā”ti āha. Ko eso brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosatīti. “Ahaṃ, sāmī, ito
atk-s0201a:1524_4: tāva ehīti. Kiṃ bhoti? Maṃ bahigāmaṃ nehi, ahaṃ te dve kahāpaṇasatāni dassāmīti.
atk-s0201a:1524_5: Sopi nayissāmīti taṃ pādesu gaṇhi. Are bāla brāhmaṇa, na mayhaṃ kahāpaṇā chaḍḍitakā
atk-s0201a:1524_6: atthi, dullabhā kahāpaṇā, sādhukaṃ maṃ gaṇhāhīti. Kathaṃ bho gaṇhāmīti? Uttarāsaṅgena
atk-s0201a:1524_7: gaṇṭhikaṃ katvā aṃse laggetvā gaṇhāhīti. Brāhmaṇo taṃ tathā gahetvā dakkhiṇadvārasamīpaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1524_8: gantvā ettha otāremīti pucchi. Kataraṭṭhānaṃ nāma etanti? Mahādvāraṃ etanti. Are
atk-s0201a:1524_9: bāla, brāhmaṇa, kiṃ tava ñātakā antaradvāre kahāpaṇaṃ ṭhapenti, parato maṃ harā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1524_10: So punappunaṃ thokaṃ thokaṃ gantvā “ettha otāremi ettha otāremī”ti pucchitvā tena
atk-s0201a:1524_11: tajjito khemaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha otārehīti vutto otāretvā sāṭakaṃ gaṇhi. Kāḷasiṅgālo
atk-s0201a:1524_12: āha “ahaṃ te dve kahāpaṇasatāni dassāmīti avocaṃ. Mayhaṃ pana kahāpaṇā bahū, na dve
atk-s0201a:1524_13: kahāpaṇasatāneva, yāva ahaṃ kahāpaṇe āharāmi, tāva tvaṃ sūriyaṃ olokento tiṭṭhā”ti
atk-s0201a:1524_14: vatvā thokaṃ gantvā nivattetvā puna brāhmaṇaṃ āha “ayya brāhmaṇa mā ito olokehi,
atk-s0201a:1524_15: sūriyameva olokento tiṭṭhā”ti. Evañca pana vatvā ketakavanaṃ pavisitvā yathāruciṃ
atk-s0201a:1524_16: pakkanto. Brāhmaṇassapi sūriyaṃ olokentasseva nalāṭato ceva kacchehi ca sedā mucciṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1526: Sippikānaṃ sataṃ natthi, kuto kaṃsasatā duve”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:1527: Evaṃ yathā kāḷasiṅgāle pasādo niratthako, evaṃ titthiyesupīti.
atk-s0201a:1528_0: 144. Aniyyānikasāsane pasādassa niratthakabhāvaṃ dassetvā niyyānikasāsane tassa sātthakataṃ
atk-s0201a:1528_1: dassetuṃ tathāgato ca kho, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha kāmupādānassa pariññaṃ paññapetīti
atk-s0201a:1528_2: arahattamaggena kāmupādānassa pahānapariññaṃ samatikkamaṃ paññapeti, itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1528_3: upādānānaṃ sotāpattimaggena pariññaṃ paññapeti. Evarūpe kho, bhikkhave, dhammavinayeti,
atk-s0201a:1528_4: bhikkhave, evarūpe dhamme ca vinaye ca. Ubhayenapi niyyānikasāsanaṃ dasseti. Satthari
atk-s0201a:1528_5: pasādoti evarūpe sāsane yo satthari pasādo, so sammaggato akkhāyati, bhavadukkhanissaraṇāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0201a:1529_0: Tatrimāni vatthūni – bhagavā kira vediyakapabbate indasālaguhāyaṃ paṭivasati. Atheko
atk-s0201a:1529_1: ulūkasakuṇo bhagavati gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisante upaḍḍhamaggaṃ anugacchati, nikkhamante
atk-s0201a:1529_2: upaḍḍhamaggaṃ paccuggamanaṃ karoti. So ekadivasaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ sāyanhasamaye bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ
atk-s0201a:1529_3: nisinnaṃ pabbatā oruyha vanditvā pakkhe paṇāmetvā añjaliṃ paggayha sīsaṃ heṭṭhā katvā
atk-s0201a:1529_4: dasabalaṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavā taṃ oloketvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi. Ānandatthero
atk-s0201a:1529_5: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti pucchi. “Passānanda, imaṃ
atk-s0201a:1529_6: ulūkasakuṇaṃ, ayaṃ mayi ca bhikkhusaṅghe ca cittaṃ pasādetvā satasahassakappe devesu
atk-s0201a:1529_7: ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā somanasso nāma paccekabuddho bhavissatī”ti āha –
atk-s0201a:1531: Sukhitosi tvaṃ ayya kosiya, kāluṭṭhitaṃ passasi buddhavaraṃ.
atk-s0201a:1536_0: Aññānipi cettha rājagahanagare sumanamālākāravatthu mahābherivādakavatthu morajikavatthu
atk-s0201a:1536_1: vīṇāvādakavatthu saṅkhadhamakavatthūti evamādīni vatthūni vitthāretabbāni. Evaṃ niyyānikasāsane
atk-s0201a:1537_0: Dhamme pasādoti niyyānikasāsanamhi dhamme pasādo sammaggato hoti. Saramatte nimittaṃ
atk-s0201a:1537_1: gahetvā suṇantānaṃ tiracchānagatānampi sampattidāyako hoti, paramatthe kiṃ pana vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1538: Sīlesu paripūrakāritāti niyyānikasāsanamhi sīlesu paripūrakāritāpi sammaggatā hoti, saggamokkhasampattiṃ āvahati. Tattha chattamāṇavakavatthusāmaṇeravatthuādīni dīpetabbāni.
atk-s0201a:1539: Sahadhammikesūti niyyānikasāsane sahadhammikesu piyamanāpatāpi sammaggatā hoti, mahāsampattiṃ āvahati. Ayamattho vimānapetavatthūhi dīpetabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:1548: Tassā me passa vimānaṃ, accharā kāmavaṇṇinīhamasmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1549: Taṃ kissa hetūtiādi vuttanayānusāreneva yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1550_0: 145. Idāni yesaṃ upādānānaṃ titthiyā na sammā pariññaṃ paññapenti, tathāgato paññapeti,
atk-s0201a:1550_1: tesaṃ paccayaṃ dassetuṃ ime ca, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha kiṃnidānātiādīsu nidānādīni
atk-s0201a:1550_2: sabbāneva kāraṇavevacanāni. Kāraṇañhi yasmā phalaṃ nideti handa, naṃ gaṇhathāti appeti
atk-s0201a:1550_3: viya, tasmā nidānanti vuccati. Yasmā taṃ tato jāyati samudeti pabhavati, tasmā samudayo,
atk-s0201a:1550_4: jāti, pabhavoti vuccati. Ayaṃ panettha padattho – kiṃ nidānaṃ etesanti kiṃnidānā.
atk-s0201a:1550_5: Ko samudayo etesanti kiṃsamudayā. Kā jāti etesanti kiṃjātikā. Ko pabhavo etesanti
atk-s0201a:1550_6: kiṃpabhavā. Yasmā pana tesaṃ taṇhā yathāvuttena atthena nidānañceva samudayo ca jāti
atk-s0201a:1550_7: ca pabhavo ca, tasmā “taṇhānidānā”tiādimāha. Evaṃ sabbapadesu attho veditabbo. Yasmā
atk-s0201a:1550_8: pana bhagavā na kevalaṃ upādānasseva paccayaṃ jānāti, upādānassa paccayabhūtāya taṇhāyapi,
atk-s0201a:1550_9: taṇhādipaccayānaṃ vedanādīnampi paccayaṃ jānātiyeva, tasmā taṇhā cāyaṃ, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1551_0: Yato ca khoti yasmiṃ kāle. Avijjā pahīnā hotīti vaṭṭamūlikā avijjā anuppādanirodhena
atk-s0201a:1551_1: pahīnā hoti. Vijjā uppannāti arahattamaggavijjā uppannā. So avijjāvirāgā vijjuppādāti.
atk-s0201a:1551_2: So bhikkhu avijjāya ca pahīnattā vijjāya ca uppannattā. Neva kāmupādānaṃ upādiyatīti
atk-s0201a:1551_3: neva kāmupādānaṃ gaṇhāti na upeti, na sesāni upādānāni. Anupādiyaṃ na paritassatīti
atk-s0201a:1551_4: evaṃ kiñci upādānaṃ aggaṇhanto taṇhāparitassanāya na paritassati. Aparitassanti aparitassanto
atk-s0201a:1551_5: taṇhaṃ anuppādento. Paccattaṃyeva parinibbāyatīti sayameva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati.
atk-s0201a:1551_6: Evamassa āsavakkhayaṃ dassetvā idāni khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno paccavekkhaṇaṃ dassento
atk-s0201a:1556_0: 146. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ. Tattha vesāliyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Taṃ
atk-s0201a:1556_1: kira aparāparaṃ visālībhūtatāya “vesālī”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbakathā
atk-s0201a:1556_2: – bārāṇasirañño kira aggamahesiyā kucchimhi gabbho saṇṭhāsi. Sā ñatvā rañño nivedesi.
atk-s0201a:1556_3: Rājā gabbhaparihāraṃ adāsi. Sā sammā pariharīyamānā gabbhaparipākakāle vijāyanagharaṃ
atk-s0201a:1556_4: pāvisi. Puññavantīnaṃ paccūsasamaye gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, sā ca tāsaṃ aññatarā, tena
atk-s0201a:1556_6: deviyo suvaṇṇabimbasadise putte vijāyanti, aggamahesī maṃsapesinti rañño purato mama
atk-s0201a:1556_7: avaṇṇo uppajjeyyā”ti cintetvā tena avaṇṇabhayena taṃ maṃsapesiṃ ekasmiṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:1556_8: paṭikujjitvā rājamuddikāya lañchetvā gaṅgāya sote pakkhipāpesi. Manussehi chaḍḍitamatte
atk-s0201a:1556_10: aggamahesiyā pajā”ti likhitvā bandhiṃsu. Tato taṃ bhājanaṃ ūmibhayādīhi anupaddutaṃ gaṅgāsotena pāyāsi.
atk-s0201a:1557_0: Tena ca samayena aññataro tāpaso gopālakakulaṃ nissāya gaṅgātīre viharati. So pātova
atk-s0201a:1557_1: gaṅgaṃ otiṇṇo taṃ bhājanaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā paṃsukūlasaññāya aggahesi. Athettha
atk-s0201a:1557_2: taṃ akkharapaṭṭikaṃ rājamuddikālañchanaṃ ca disvā muñcitvā taṃ maṃsapesiṃ addasa,
atk-s0201a:1557_3: disvānassa etadahosi “siyā gabbho, tathā hissa duggandhapūtikabhāvo natthī”ti. Assamaṃ
atk-s0201a:1557_4: netvā suddhe okāse ṭhapesi. Atha aḍḍhamāsaccayena dve maṃsapesiyo ahesuṃ. Tāpaso
atk-s0201a:1557_5: disvā sādhutaraṃ ṭhapesi. Tato puna aḍḍhamāsaccayena ekamekissā maṃsapesiyā hatthapādasīsānamatthāya
atk-s0201a:1557_6: pañca pañca piḷakā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha tato aḍḍhamāsaccayena ekā maṃsapesi suvaṇṇabimbasadiso
atk-s0201a:1558_0: Tesu tāpasassa puttasineho uppajji, aṅguṭṭhakato cassa khīraṃ nibbatti. Tato pabhuti
atk-s0201a:1558_1: ca khīrabhattaṃ alabhittha, so bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā khīraṃ dārakānaṃ mukhe āsiñcati.
atk-s0201a:1558_2: Tesaṃ udaraṃ yaṃ yaṃ pavisati, taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ maṇibhājanagataṃ viya dissati, evaṃ
atk-s0201a:1558_3: nicchavī ahesuṃ. Apare āhu “sibbetvā ṭhapitā viya nesaṃ aññamaññaṃ līnā chavi ahosī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1558_4: Evaṃ te nicchavitāya vā līnacchavitāya vā licchavīti paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1559_0: Tāpaso dārake posento ussūre gāmaṃ sikkhāya pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati. Tassa
atk-s0201a:1559_1: taṃ byāpāraṃ ñatvā gopālakā āhaṃsu – “bhante, pabbajitānaṃ dārakaposanaṃ palibodho,
atk-s0201a:1559_2: amhākaṃ dārake detha, mayaṃ posessāma, tumhe attano kammaṃ karothā”ti. Tāpaso sādhūti
atk-s0201a:1559_3: paṭissuṇi. Gopālakā dutiyadivase maggaṃ samaṃ katvā pupphehi okiritvā dhajapaṭākā
atk-s0201a:1559_4: ussāpetvā tūriyehi vajjamānehi assamaṃ āgatā. Tāpaso – “mahāpuññā dārakā appamādena
atk-s0201a:1559_5: vaḍḍhetha, vaḍḍhetvā ca aññamaññaṃ āvāhavivāhaṃ karotha, pañcagorasena rājānaṃ tosetvā
atk-s0201a:1559_6: bhūmibhāgaṃ gahetvā nagaraṃ māpetha, tattha kumāraṃ abhisiñcathā”ti vatvā dārake
atk-s0201a:1559_7: adāsi. Te sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā dārake netvā posesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:1560_0: Dārakā vuddhimanvāya kīḷantā vivādaṭṭhānesu aññe gopālakadārake hatthenapi pādenapi
atk-s0201a:1560_1: paharanti. Te rodanti. “Kissa rodathā”ti ca mātāpitūhi vuttā “ime nimmātāpitikā tāpasapositā
atk-s0201a:1560_2: amhe atipaharantī”ti vadanti. Tato tesaṃ mātāpitaro “ime dārakā aññe dārake vināsenti
atk-s0201a:1560_3: dukkhāpenti, na ime saṅgahetabbā, vajjetabbā ime”ti āhaṃsu. Tato pabhuti kira so
atk-s0201a:1560_4: padeso vajjīti vuccati yojanasatiko parimāṇena. Atha taṃ padesaṃ gopālakā rājānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1560_5: tosetvā aggahesuṃ. Tattha ca nagaraṃ māpetvā soḷasavassuddesikaṃ kumāraṃ abhisiñcitvā
atk-s0201a:1560_6: rājānaṃ akaṃsu. Tāya cassa dārikāya saddhiṃ vivāhaṃ katvā katikaṃ akaṃsu “bāhirakadārikā
atk-s0201a:1560_7: na ānetabbā, ito dārikā na kassaci dātabbā”ti. Tesaṃ paṭhamasaṃvāsena dve dārakā
atk-s0201a:1560_8: jātā dhītā ca putto ca. Evaṃ soḷasakkhattuṃ dve dve jātā. Tato tesaṃ dārakānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
atk-s0201a:1560_9: vaḍḍhantānaṃ ārāmuyyānanivāsaṭṭhānaparivārasampattiṃ gahetuṃ appahontā nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0201a:1560_10: gāvutantarena gāvutantarena parikkhipiṃsu. Tassa punappunaṃ visālīkatattā vesālītveva
atk-s0201a:1560_11: nāmaṃ jātaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “vesāliyanti evaṃ nāmake nagare”ti.
atk-s0201a:1561_0: 01 Bahinagareti nagarassa bahi, na ambapālivanaṃ viya antonagarasmiṃ. Ayaṃ pana jīvakambavanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1561_1: viya nagarassa bahiddhā vanasaṇḍo. Tena vuttaṃ “bahinagare”ti. Aparapureti purassa
atk-s0201a:1561_2: apare, pacchimadisāyanti attho. Vanasaṇḍeti so kira vanasaṇḍo nagarassa pacchimadisāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1561_3: gāvutamatte ṭhāne. Tattha manussā bhagavato gandhakuṭiṃ katvā taṃ parivāretvā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1561_5: Tena vuttaṃ “aparapure vanasaṇḍe”ti. Sunakkhattoti tassa nāmaṃ. Licchavīnaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:1561_6: puttattā licchaviputtoti vutto. Acirapakkantoti vibbhamitvā gihibhāvūpagamanena adhunāpakkanto.
atk-s0201a:1561_7: Parisatīti parisamajjhe. Uttarimanussadhammāti ettha manussadhammā nāma dasakusalakammapathā.
atk-s0201a:1561_8: Te paṭisedhetuṃ na sakkoti. Kasmā? Upārambhabhayā. Vesāliyañhi bahū manussā ratanattaye
atk-s0201a:1561_9: pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā. Te dasakusalakammapathamattampi natthi
atk-s0201a:1561_10: samaṇassa gotamassāti vutte tvaṃ kattha bhagavantaṃ pāṇaṃ hanantaṃ addasa, kattha
atk-s0201a:1561_11: adinnaṃ ādiyantantiādīni vatvā attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāsi? Kiṃ dantā me atthīti pāsāṇasakkharā
atk-s0201a:1561_12: khādasi, ahinaṅguṭṭhe gaṇhituṃ vāyamasi, kakacadantesu pupphāvaḷikaṃ kīḷituṃ icchasi?
atk-s0201a:1561_13: Mukhato te dante pātessāmāti vadeyyuṃ. So tesaṃ upārambhabhayā evaṃ vattuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:1564: Tato uttariṃ pana visesādhigamaṃ paṭisedhento uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesoti āha.
atk-s0201a:1565_0: Tattha alamariyaṃ ñātunti alamariyo, ariyabhāvāya samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ñāṇadassanameva
atk-s0201a:1565_1: ñāṇadassanaviseso. Alamariyo ca so ñāṇadassanaviseso cāti alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso.
atk-s0201a:1565_2: Ñāṇadassananti dibbacakkhupi vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi
atk-s0201a:1565_3: vuccati. “Appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādhetī”ti hi ettha dibbacakkhu ñāṇadassanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1565_4: nāma. “Ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetī”ti ettha vipassanāñāṇaṃ. “Abhabbā
atk-s0201a:1565_5: te ñāṇadassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāyā”ti ettha maggo. “Ayamañño uttari manussadhammā
atk-s0201a:1565_6: alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsu vihāro”ti ettha phalaṃ. “Ñāṇañca pana me
atk-s0201a:1565_7: dassanaṃ udapādi, akuppā me cetovimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti
atk-s0201a:1565_8: ettha paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi sattāhakālaṅkato āḷāro
atk-s0201a:1565_9: kāḷāmo”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Idha pana lokuttaramaggo adhippeto. Tañhi so bhagavato paṭisedheti.
atk-s0201a:1566_0: Takkapariyāhatanti iminā ācariyaṃ paṭibāhati. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – samaṇena gotamena
atk-s0201a:1566_1: ācariye upasaṅkamitvā sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ gahitaṃ nāma natthi, takkapariyāhataṃ
atk-s0201a:1566_2: pana takketvā evaṃ bhavissati evaṃ bhavissatīti takkapariyāhataṃ dhammaṃ desetīti.
atk-s0201a:1566_3: Vīmaṃsānucaritanti iminā cassa lokiyapaññaṃ anujānāti. Samaṇo gotamo paññavā, so
atk-s0201a:1566_4: taṃ paññāsaṅkhātaṃ indavajirūpamaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ evaṃ vaṭṭissati, evaṃ vaṭṭissatīti ito
atk-s0201a:1566_5: cito ca anucarāpetvā vīmaṃsāya anucaritaṃ dhammaṃ deseti. Sayaṃpaṭibhānanti imināssa
atk-s0201a:1566_6: dhammesu paccakkhabhāvaṃ paṭibāhati. Evaṃ hissa ahosi – samaṇassa gotamassa sukhumaṃ
atk-s0201a:1566_7: dhammantaraṃ vipassanā vā maggo vā phalaṃ vā paccavekkhaṇā vā natthi, ayaṃ pana laddhapariso,
atk-s0201a:1566_8: rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ viya naṃ cattāro vaṇṇā parivārenti, suphusitaṃ panassa dantāvaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1566_9: mudukā jivhā, madhuro saro, anelagaḷā vācā, so yaṃ yadevassa upaṭṭhāti, taṃ taṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a:1567_0: Yassa ca khvāssa atthāya dhammo desitoti yassa ca kho atthāya assa dhammo desito.
atk-s0201a:1568_0: So niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti so dhammo yo taṃ yathādesitaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:1568_1: tassa takkarassa sammā hetunā nayena kāraṇena vaṭṭadukkhakkhayāya niyyāti gacchati
atk-s0201a:1568_2: tamatthaṃ sādhetīti dīpeti. Idaṃ panesa na attano ajjhāsayena vadati. Buddhānañhi
atk-s0201a:1568_3: dhammo aniyyānikoti evamevaṃ pavedeyya, na pana sakkoti vattuṃ. Kasmā? Upārambhabhayā.
atk-s0201a:1568_4: Vesāliyañhi bahū sotāpanna-sakadāgāmi-anāgāmiupāsakā. Te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “sunakkhatta
atk-s0201a:1568_5: tvaṃ bhagavatā desitadhammo aniyyānikoti vadasi, yadi ayaṃ dhammo aniyyāniko, imasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:1568_6: nagare ime kasmā ettakā sotāpannā jātā, ettakā sakadāgāmī, ettakā anāgāmīti pubbe
atk-s0201a:1568_7: vuttanayena upārambhaṃ kareyyu”nti. So iminā upārambhabhayena aniyyānikoti vattuṃ
atk-s0201a:1568_8: asakkonto ajjunena vissaṭṭhakaṇḍaṃ viya assa dhammo amogho niyyāti, abbhantare panassa
atk-s0201a:1569_0: Assosi khoti vesāliyaṃ brāhmaṇakulaseṭṭhikulādīsu tattha tattha parisamajjhe evaṃ
atk-s0201a:1569_1: bhāsamānassa taṃ vacanaṃ suṇi, na pana paṭisedhesi. Kasmā? Kāruññatāya. Evaṃ kirassa
atk-s0201a:1569_2: ahosi ayaṃ kuddho jhāyamānaṃ veḷuvanaṃ viya pakkhittaloṇaṃ uddhanaṃ viya ca kodhavasena
atk-s0201a:1569_3: paṭapaṭāyati, mayā paṭibāhito pana mayipi āghātaṃ bandhissati, evamassa tathāgate
atk-s0201a:1569_4: ca mayi cāti dvīsu janesu āghāto atibhāriyo bhavissatīti kāruññatāya na paṭisedhesi.
atk-s0201a:1569_5: Api cassa evaṃ ahosi, buddhānaṃ avaṇṇakathanaṃ nāma puṇṇacande dosāropanasadisaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1569_6: ko imassa kathaṃ gaṇhissati? Sayameva kheḷe pacchinne mukhe sukkhe oramissatīti iminā
atk-s0201a:1569_7: kāraṇena na paṭisedhesi. Piṇḍapātapaṭikkantoti piṇḍapātapariyesanato apagato.
atk-s0201a:1570_0: 147. Kodhanoti caṇḍo pharuso. Moghapurisoti tucchapuriso. Yassa hi tasmiṃ attabhāve
atk-s0201a:1570_1: maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi, taṃ buddhā “moghapuriso”ti vadanti. Upanissaye satipi
atk-s0201a:1570_2: tasmiṃ khaṇe magge vā phale vā asati “moghapuriso”ti vadantiyeva. Imassa pana tasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:1570_3: attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo samucchinnoyeva, tena taṃ “moghapuriso”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1570_4: Kodhā ca panassa esā vācā bhāsitāti esā ca panassa vācā kodhena bhāsitā.
atk-s0201a:1571_0: Kasmā panesa bhagavato kuddhoti? Ayañhi pubbe bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ
atk-s0201a:1571_1: pucchi. Athassa bhagavā kathesi. So dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattetvā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā devaloke
atk-s0201a:1571_3: devaputte ca devadhītaro ca disvā etesaṃ evarūpāya attabhāvasampattiyā ṭhitānaṃ kīvamadhuro
atk-s0201a:1571_4: nu kho saddo bhavissatīti saddaṃ sotukāmo hutvā dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dibbasotadhātuparikammaṃ
atk-s0201a:1571_5: pucchi. Bhagavā panassa dibbasotadhātuyā upanissayo natthīti ñatvā parikammaṃ na
atk-s0201a:1571_6: kathesi. Na hi buddhā upanissayavirahita tassa parikammaṃ kathenti. So bhagavati
atk-s0201a:1571_7: āghātaṃ bandhitvā cintesi “ahaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paṭhamaṃ dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ pucchiṃ,
atk-s0201a:1571_8: so ‘mayhaṃ taṃ sampajjatu vā mā vā sampajjatū’ti kathesi. Ahaṃ pana paccattapurisakārena
atk-s0201a:1571_9: taṃ nibbattetvā dibbasotadhātuparikammaṃ pucchiṃ, taṃ me na kathesi. Addhāssa evaṃ
atk-s0201a:1571_10: hoti ‘ayaṃ rājapabbajito dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0201a:1571_11: cetopariyañāṇaṃ nibbattetvā āsavānaṃ khayañāṇaṃ nibbattetvā mayā samasamo bhavissatī’ti
atk-s0201a:1571_12: issāmacchariyavasena mayhaṃ na kathetī”ti. Bhiyyoso āghātaṃ bandhitvā kāsāyāni chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0201a:1571_13: gihibhāvaṃ patvāpi na tuṇhībhūto vicarati. Dasabalaṃ pana asatā tucchena abbhācikkhanto
atk-s0201a:1571_14: vicarati. Tenāha bhagavā “kodhā ca panassa esā vācā bhāsitā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1572_0: Vaṇṇo heso, sāriputtāti, sāriputta, tathāgatena satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0201a:1572_1: pāramiyo pūrentena etadatthameva vāyāmo kato “desanādhammo me niyyāniko bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:1572_2: Tasmā yo evaṃ vadeyya, so vaṇṇaṃyeva tathāgatassa bhāsati. Vaṇṇo heso, sāriputta,
atk-s0201a:1572_3: tathāgatassa guṇo eso tathāgatassa, na aguṇoti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:1573_0: Ayampi hi nāma sāriputtātiādinā kiṃ dasseti? Sunakkhattena paṭisiddhassa uttarimanussadhammassa
atk-s0201a:1573_1: attani atthitaṃ dasseti. Bhagavā kira ayaṃ, sāriputta, sunakkhatto moghapuriso natthi
atk-s0201a:1573_2: tathāgatassa uttarimanussadhammoti vadati. Mayhañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0201a:1573_3: iddhividhañāṇaṃ nāma atthi, dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ nāma atthi, cetopariyañāṇaṃ nāma
atk-s0201a:1573_4: atthi, dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma atthi, catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ nāma atthi, aṭṭhasu parisāsu
atk-s0201a:1573_5: akampanañāṇaṃ nāma atthi, catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ nāma atthi, pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1573_6: nāma atthi, sabbepi cete uttarimanussadhammāyeva. Evarūpesu uttarimanussadhammesu
atk-s0201a:1573_7: ekassāpi vijānanasamatthaṃ dhammanvayamattampi nāma etassa moghapurisassa na bhavissatīti
atk-s0201a:1573_8: etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ayampi hi nāma sāriputtātiādinā nayena imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha
atk-s0201a:1573_9: anvetīti anvayo, jānāti, anubujjhatīti attho. Dhammassa anvayo dhammanvayo, taṃ taṃ
atk-s0201a:1573_11: evarūpampi nāma mayhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ vijjamānameva
atk-s0201a:1573_12: atthīti jānituṃ tassa moghapurisassa dhammanvayopi na bhavissatīti dasseti. Iddhividhañāṇādīsupi
atk-s0201a:1576_0: 148. Ettha ca kiñcāpi cetopariyañāṇānantaraṃ tisso vijjā vattabbā siyuṃ, yasmā pana
atk-s0201a:1576_1: tāsu vuttāsu upari dasabalañāṇaṃ na paripūrati, tasmā tā avatvā tathāgatassa dasabalañāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1576_2: paripūraṃ katvā dassento dasa kho panimāni sāriputtātiādimāha. Tattha tathāgatabalānīti
atk-s0201a:1576_3: aññehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatasseva balāni. Yathā vā pubbabuddhānaṃ balāni puññussayasampattiyā
atk-s0201a:1576_4: āgatāni, tathā āgatabalānītipi attho. Tattha duvidhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ kāyabalañca
atk-s0201a:1576_5: ñāṇabalañca. Tesu kāyabalaṃ hatthikulānusārena veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi –
atk-s0201a:1579_0: Imāni hi dasa hatthikulāni. Tattha kālāvakanti pakatihatthikulaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ
atk-s0201a:1579_1: dasannaṃ purisānaṃ kāyabalaṃ, taṃ ekassa kālāvakahatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ kālāvakānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1579_2: balaṃ, taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gaṅgeyyānaṃ, taṃ ekassa paṇḍarassa. Yaṃ
atk-s0201a:1579_3: dasannaṃ paṇḍarānaṃ, taṃ ekassa tambassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ tambānaṃ, taṃ ekassa piṅgalassa.
atk-s0201a:1579_4: Yaṃ dasannaṃ piṅgalānaṃ, taṃ ekassa gandhahatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gandhahatthīnaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1579_5: taṃ ekassa maṅgalassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ maṅgalānaṃ, taṃ ekassa hemavatassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0201a:1579_6: hemavatānaṃ, taṃ ekassa uposathassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ uposathānaṃ, taṃ ekassa chaddantassa.
atk-s0201a:1579_7: Yaṃ dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ taṃ ekassa tathāgatassa. Nārāyanasaṅghātabalantipi idameva
atk-s0201a:1579_8: vuccati. Tadetaṃ pakatihatthigaṇanāya hatthīnaṃ koṭisahassānaṃ purisagaṇanāya dasannaṃ
atk-s0201a:1579_9: purisakoṭisahassānaṃ balaṃ hoti. Idaṃ tāva tathāgatassa kāyabalaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1580_0: Ñāṇabalaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ tāva āgatameva. Dasabalañāṇaṃ, catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ, aṭṭhasu
atk-s0201a:1580_2: āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni sattasattati ñāṇānīti evaṃ aññānipi anekāni ñāṇasahassāni,
atk-s0201a:1580_3: etaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ nāma. Idhāpi ñāṇabalameva adhippetaṃ. Ñāṇañhi akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhena ca balanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1581_0: Yehi balehi samannāgatoti yehi dasahi ñāṇabalehi upeto samupeto. Āsabhaṃ ṭhānanti
atk-s0201a:1581_1: seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ uttamaṭṭhānaṃ. Āsabhā vā pubbabuddhā, tesaṃ ṭhānanti attho. Apica gavasatajeṭṭhako
atk-s0201a:1581_2: usabho, gavasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho. Vajasatajeṭṭhako vā usabho, vajasahassajeṭṭhako
atk-s0201a:1581_3: vasabho. Sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi
atk-s0201a:1581_4: akampaniyo nisabho, so idha usabhoti adhippeto. Idampi hi tassa pariyāyavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1581_5: Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ. Ṭhānanti catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1581_6: Idaṃ pana āsabhaṃ viyāti āsabhaṃ. Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho usabhabalena
atk-s0201a:1581_7: samannāgato catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati, evaṃ tathāgatopi
atk-s0201a:1581_8: dasahi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ uppīḷetvā
atk-s0201a:1581_9: sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:1581_10: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānova taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, upagacchati na paccakkhāti attani
atk-s0201a:1582_0: Parisāsūti aṭṭhasu parisāsu. Sīhanādaṃ nadatīti seṭṭhanādaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadati, sīhanādasadisaṃ
atk-s0201a:1582_1: vā nādaṃ nadati. Ayamattho sīhanādasuttena dīpetabbo. Yathā vā sīho sahanato hananato
atk-s0201a:1582_2: ca sīhoti vuccati, evaṃ tathāgato lokadhammānaṃ sahanato parappavādānañca hananato
atk-s0201a:1582_3: sīhoti vuccati. Evaṃ vuttassa sīhassa nādaṃ sīhanādaṃ. Tattha yathā sīho sīhabalena
atk-s0201a:1582_4: samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati, evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi
atk-s0201a:1582_5: tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso iti rūpantiādinā
atk-s0201a:1582_6: nayena nānāvidhadesanāvilāsasampannaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati. Tena vuttaṃ “parisāsu sīhanādaṃ
atk-s0201a:1582_7: nadatī”ti. Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetīti ettha brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ. Cakka-saddo panāyaṃ –
atk-s0201a:1585: Dhammacakke idha mato, tañca dvedhā vibhāvaye.
atk-s0201a:1586_0: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu hi ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:1586_1: sampattiyaṃ dissati. “Pādatalesu cakkāni jātānī”ti ettha lakkhaṇe. “Cakkaṃva vahato
atk-s0201a:1586_2: pada”nti ettha rathaṅge. “Catucakkaṃ navadvāra”nti ettha iriyāpathe. “Dadaṃ bhuñja
atk-s0201a:1586_3: mā ca pamādo, cakkaṃ pavattaya sabbapāṇina”nti ettha dāne. “Dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pāturahosī”ti
atk-s0201a:1586_4: ettha ratanacakke. “Mayā pavattitaṃ cakka”nti ettha dhammacakke. “Icchāhatassa posassa,
atk-s0201a:1586_5: cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti ettha uracakke. “Khurapariyantena cepi cakkenā”ti ettha
atk-s0201a:1586_6: paharaṇacakke. “Asanivicakka”nti ettha asanimaṇḍale. Idha panāyaṃ dhammacakke adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:1587_0: Taṃ pana dhammacakkaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti paṭivedhañāṇañceva desanāñāṇañca. Tattha paññāpabhāvitaṃ
atk-s0201a:1587_1: attano ariyabalāvahaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ. Karuṇāpabhāvitaṃ sāvakānaṃ ariyabalāvahaṃ desanāñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1587_2: Tattha paṭivedhañāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppannanti duvidhaṃ. Tañhi abhinikkhamanato yāva
atk-s0201a:1587_3: arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. Tusitabhavanato vā yāva mahābodhipallaṅke
atk-s0201a:1587_4: arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. Dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya
