atk-s0201a:1910_1: yañhi udakaṃ gambhīraṃ na puthulaṃ. Puthulaṃ vā pana na gambhīraṃ, na taṃ aṇṇavoti
atk-s0201a:1910_2: vuccati. Yaṃ pana gambhīrañceva puthulañca, taṃ aṇṇavoti vuccati. Tasmā mahantaṃ
atk-s0201a:1910_3: udakaṇṇavanti mahantaṃ puthulaṃ gambhīraṃ udakanti ayamettha attho. Sāsaṅkaṃ nāma
atk-s0201a:1910_4: yattha corānaṃ nivutthokāso dissati. Ṭhitokāso, nisinnokāso, nipannokāso dissati.
atk-s0201a:1910_5: Sappaṭibhayaṃ nāma yattha corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā
atk-s0201a:1910_6: dissanti. Uttarasetūti udakaṇṇavassa upari baddho setu. Kullaṃ bandhitvāti kullo
atk-s0201a:1910_7: nāma taraṇatthāya kalāpaṃ katvā baddho. Pattharitvā baddhā pana padaracāṭiādayo uḷumpoti
atk-s0201a:1910_8: vuccanti. Uccāretvāti ṭhapetvā. Kiccakārīti pattakārī yuttakārī, patirūpakārīti attho.
atk-s0201a:1910_9: Dhammāpi vo pahātabbāti ettha dhammāti samathavipassanā. Bhagavā hi samathepi chandarāgaṃ
atk-s0201a:1910_10: pajahāpesi, vipassanāyapi. Samathe chandarāgaṃ kattha pajahāpesi? “Iti kho, udāyi,
atk-s0201a:1910_11: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassapi pahānaṃ vadāmi, passasi no tvaṃ, udāyi, taṃ saṃyojanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1910_12: aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vā, yassāhaṃ no pahānaṃ vadāmī”ti ettha samathe chandarāgaṃ pajahāpesi.
atk-s0201a:1910_13: “Imaṃ ce tumhe, bhikkhave, diṭṭhiṃ evaṃ parisuddhaṃ evaṃ pariyodātaṃ na allīyetha
atk-s0201a:1910_14: na kelāyetha na dhanāyethā”ti ettha vipassanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahāpesi. Idha pana
atk-s0201a:1910_15: ubhayattha pajahāpento “dhammāpi vo pahātabbā, pageva adhammā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:1911_0: Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – bhikkhave, ahaṃ evarūpesu santappaṇītesu dhammesu chandarāgappahānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1911_1: vadāmi, kiṃ pana imasmiṃ asaddhamme gāmadhamme vasaladhamme duṭṭhulle odakantike,
atk-s0201a:1911_2: yattha ayaṃ ariṭṭho moghapuriso niddosasaññī pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgaṃ nālaṃ
atk-s0201a:1911_3: antarāyāyāti vadati. Ariṭṭhena viya na tumhehi mayhaṃ sāsane kalalaṃ vā kacavaraṃ
atk-s0201a:1911_4: vā pakkhipitabbanti evaṃ bhagavā imināpi ovādena ariṭṭhaṃyeva niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:1912_0: 241. Idāni yo pañcasu khandhesu tividhaggāhavasena ahaṃ mamanti gaṇhāti, so mayhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1912_1: sāsane ayaṃ ariṭṭho viya kalalaṃ kacavaraṃ pakkhipatīti dassento chayimāni, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:1912_2: Tattha diṭṭhiṭṭhānānīti diṭṭhipi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā ārammaṇampi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1912_3: diṭṭhiyā paccayopi. Rūpaṃ etaṃ mamātiādīsu etaṃ mamāti taṇhāggāho. Esohamasmīti mānaggāho.
atk-s0201a:1912_4: Eso me attāti diṭṭhiggāho. Evaṃ rūpārammaṇā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo kathitā honti. Rūpaṃ
atk-s0201a:1912_5: pana attāti na vattabbaṃ. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Diṭṭhaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, sutaṃ saddāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1912_6: mutaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tañhi patvā gahetabbato mutanti
atk-s0201a:1912_7: vuttaṃ. Avasesāni sattāyatanāni viññātaṃ nāma. Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā
atk-s0201a:1912_8: vā pattaṃ. Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ. Anuvicaritaṃ manasāti
atk-s0201a:1912_9: cittena anusañcaritaṃ. Lokasmiñhi pariyesitvā pattampi atthi, pariyesitvā nopattampi.
atk-s0201a:1912_10: Apariyesitvā pattampi atthi, apariyesitvā nopattampi. Tattha pariyesitvā pattaṃ pattaṃ
atk-s0201a:1912_11: nāma. Pariyesitvā nopattaṃ pariyesitaṃ nāma. Apariyesitvā pattañca, apariyesitvā
atk-s0201a:1913_0: Atha vā pariyesitvā pattampi apariyesitvā pattampi pattaṭṭhena pattaṃ nāma. Pariyesitvā
atk-s0201a:1913_1: nopattaṃ pariyesitaṃ nāma. Apariyesitvā nopattaṃ manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma. Sabbaṃ vā
atk-s0201a:1913_2: etaṃ manasā anuvicaritattā manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma. Iminā viññāṇārammaṇā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0201a:1913_3: kathitā, desanāvilāsena heṭṭhā diṭṭhādiārammaṇavasena viññāṇaṃ dassitaṃ. Yampi taṃ
atk-s0201a:1913_4: diṭṭhiṭṭhānanti yampi etaṃ so lokotiādinā nayena pavattaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1914_0: So loko so attāti yā esā “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā nayena pavattā diṭṭhi
atk-s0201a:1914_1: loko ca attā cāti gaṇhāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. So pecca bhavissāmīti so ahaṃ paralokaṃ
atk-s0201a:1914_2: gantvā nicco bhavissāmi, dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo bhavissāmi, sinerumahāpathavīmahāsamuddādīhi
atk-s0201a:1914_3: sassatīhi samaṃ tatheva ṭhassāmi. Tampi etaṃ mamāti tampi dassanaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi,
atk-s0201a:1914_4: eso me attāti samanupassati. Iminā diṭṭhārammaṇā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo kathitā. Vipassanāya
atk-s0201a:1914_5: paṭivipassanākāle viya pacchimadiṭṭhiyā purimadiṭṭhiggahaṇakāle evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:1915_0: Sukkapakkhe rūpaṃ netaṃ mamāti rūpe taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhā paṭikkhittā. Vedanādīsupi
atk-s0201a:1915_1: eseva nayo. Samanupassatīti imassa pana padassa taṇhāsamanupassanā mānasamanupassanā
atk-s0201a:1915_2: diṭṭhisamanupassanā ñāṇasamanupassanāti catasso samanupassanāti attho. Tā kaṇhapakkhe
atk-s0201a:1915_3: tissannaṃ samanupassanānaṃ, sukkapakkhe ñāṇasamanupassanāya vasena veditabbā. Asati
atk-s0201a:1915_4: na paritassatīti avijjamāne bhayaparitassanāya taṇhāparitassanāya vā na paritassati.
atk-s0201a:1915_5: Iminā bhagavā ajjhattakkhandhavināse aparitassamānaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassento desanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0201a:1916_0: 242. Evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhūti evaṃ bhagavatā vutte aññataro anusandhikusalo
atk-s0201a:1916_1: bhikkhu – “bhagavatā ajjhattakkhandhavināse aparitassantaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā desanā
atk-s0201a:1916_2: niṭṭhāpitā, ajjhattaṃ aparitassante kho pana sati ajjhattaṃ paritassakena bahiddhā
atk-s0201a:1916_3: parikkhāravināse paritassakena aparitassakena cāpi bhavitabbaṃ. Iti imehi catūhi
atk-s0201a:1916_4: kāraṇehi ayaṃ pañho pucchitabbo”ti cintetvā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā añjaliṃ paggayha
atk-s0201a:1916_5: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca. Bahiddhā asatīti bahiddhā parikkhāravināse. Ahu vata meti
atk-s0201a:1916_6: ahosi vata me bhaddakaṃ yānaṃ vāhanaṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇanti attho. Taṃ vata me natthīti
atk-s0201a:1916_7: taṃ vata idāni mayhaṃ natthi, rājūhi vā corehi vā haṭaṃ, agginā vā daḍḍhaṃ, udakena
atk-s0201a:1916_8: vā vuḷhaṃ, paribhogena vā jiṇṇaṃ. Siyā vata meti bhaveyya vata mayhaṃ yānaṃ vāhanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1916_9: hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ sāli vīhi yavo godhumo. Taṃ vatāhaṃ na labhāmīti tamahaṃ alabhamāno
atk-s0201a:1916_10: tadanucchavikaṃ kammaṃ akatvā nisinnattā idāni na labhāmīti socati, ayaṃ agāriyasocanā,
atk-s0201a:1917_0: Aparitassanāvāre na evaṃ hotīti yehi kilesehi evaṃ bhaveyya, tesaṃ pahīnattā na evaṃ
atk-s0201a:1917_3: nibbānatthāya. Nibbānañhi āgamma sabbasaṅkhārāiñjitāni, sabbasaṅkhāracalanāni sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni
atk-s0201a:1917_4: sammanti vūpasammanti, tasmā taṃ, “sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti vuccati. Tadeva ca āgamma
atk-s0201a:1917_5: khandhūpadhi kilesūpadhi abhisaṅkhārūpadhi, pañcakāmaguṇūpadhīti ime upadhayo paṭinissajjiyanti,
atk-s0201a:1917_6: taṇhā khīyati virajjati nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ, “sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo
atk-s0201a:1917_7: virāgo nirodho”ti vuccati. Nibbānāyāti ayaṃ panassa sarūpaniddeso, iti sabbeheva
atk-s0201a:1917_8: imehi padehi nibbānassa sacchikiriyatthāya dhammaṃ desentassāti ayamattho dīpito.
atk-s0201a:1917_9: Tassevaṃ hotīti tassa diṭṭhigatikassa ucchijjissāmi nāmassu, vinassissāmi nāmassu,
atk-s0201a:1917_10: nāssu nāma bhavissāmīti evaṃ hoti. Diṭṭhigatikassa hi tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:1917_11: katvā desiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantassa tāso uppajjati. Vuttañhetaṃ – “tāso heso, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:1917_12: asutavato puthujjanassa no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:1918_0: 243. Ettāvatā bahiddhāparikkhāravināse tassanakassa ca notassanakassa ca ajjhattakkhandhavināse
atk-s0201a:1918_1: tassanakassa ca notassanakassa cāti imesaṃ vasena catukkoṭikā suññatā kathitā. Idāni
atk-s0201a:1918_2: bahiddhā parikkhāraṃ pariggahaṃ nāma katvā, vīsativatthukaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ attavādupādānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1918_3: nāma katvā, sakkāyadiṭṭhipamukhā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhinissayaṃ nāma katvā tikoṭikaṃ
atk-s0201a:1918_4: suññataṃ dassetuṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, pariggahantiādimāha. Tattha pariggahanti bahiddhā
atk-s0201a:1918_5: parikkhāraṃ. Pariggaṇheyyāthāti yathā viññū manusso pariggaṇheyya. Ahampi kho taṃ,
atk-s0201a:1918_6: bhikkhaveti, bhikkhave, tumhepi na passatha, ahampi na passāmi, iti evarūpo pariggaho
atk-s0201a:1918_7: natthīti dasseti. Evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1919_0: 244. Evaṃ tikoṭikaṃ suññataṃ dassetvā idāni ajjhattakkhandhe attāti bahiddhā parikkhāre
atk-s0201a:1919_1: attaniyanti katvā dvikoṭikaṃ dassento attani vā, bhikkhave, satītiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0201a:1919_2: ayaṃ saṅkhepattho, bhikkhave, attani vā sati idaṃ me parikkhārajātaṃ attaniyanti
atk-s0201a:1919_3: assa, attaniyeva vā parikkhāre sati ayaṃ me attā imassa parikkhārassa sāmīti, evaṃ
atk-s0201a:1919_4: ahanti. Sati mamāti, mamāti sati ahanti yuttaṃ bhaveyya. Saccatoti bhūtato, thetatoti tathato thirato vā.
atk-s0201a:1920_0: Idāni ime pañcakkhandhe aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti evaṃ tiparivaṭṭavasena aggaṇhanto
atk-s0201a:1920_1: ayaṃ ariṭṭho viya mayhaṃ sāsane kalalaṃ kacavaraṃ pakkhipatīti dassento taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
atk-s0201a:1920_2: bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vātiādimāha. Tattha aniccaṃ, bhanteti, bhante, yasmā hutvā
atk-s0201a:1920_3: na hoti, tasmā aniccaṃ. Uppādavayavattito vipariṇāmatāvakālikaniccapaṭikkhepaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:1920_4: vāti catūhi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ. Dukkhaṃ, bhanteti, bhante, paṭipīḷanākārena dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1920_7: nu taṃ samanupassituṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti yuttaṃ nu kho taṃ imesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1920_8: tiṇṇaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhānaṃ vasena ahaṃ mamāti evaṃ gahetuṃ. No hetaṃ, bhanteti
atk-s0201a:1920_9: iminā te bhikkhū avasavattanākārena rūpaṃ, bhante, anattāti paṭijānanti. Suññaassāmikaanissaraattapaṭikkhepaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:1921_0: Bhagavā hi katthaci aniccavasena anattattaṃ dasseti, katthaci dukkhavasena, katthaci
atk-s0201a:1921_1: ubhayavasena. “Cakkhu attāti yo vadeyya, taṃ na upapajjati, cakkhussa uppādopi vayopi
atk-s0201a:1921_2: paññāyati. Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, attā me uppajjati ca veti cāti
atk-s0201a:1921_3: iccassa evamāgataṃ hoti, tasmā taṃ na upapajjati cakkhu attāti yo vadeyya, iti cakkhu
atk-s0201a:1921_4: anattā”ti imasmiñhi chachakkasutte aniccavasena anattataṃ dasseti. “Rūpañca hidaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1921_5: bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe
atk-s0201a:1921_6: ‘evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī’ti. Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ anattā,
atk-s0201a:1921_7: tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati rūpe ‘evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me
atk-s0201a:1921_8: rūpaṃ mā ahosī”’ti imasmiṃ anattalakkhaṇasutte dukkhavasena anattataṃ dasseti. “Rūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1921_9: bhikkhave, aniccaṃ, yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā, yadanattā taṃ
atk-s0201a:1921_10: ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba”nti
atk-s0201a:1921_11: imasmiṃ arahattasutte ubhayavasena anattataṃ dasseti. Kasmā? Aniccaṃ dukkhañca pākaṭaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1922_0: Paribhogabhājanādīsu hi bhinnesu aho aniccanti vadanti, aho anattāti vattā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:1922_1: Sarīre gaṇḍapiḷakādīsu vā uṭṭhitāsu kaṇṭakena vā viddhā aho dukkhanti vadanti, aho
atk-s0201a:1922_2: anattāti pana vattā nāma natthi. Kasmā? Idañhi anattalakkhaṇaṃ nāma avibhūtaṃ duddasaṃ
atk-s0201a:1922_3: duppaññāpanaṃ. Tena taṃ bhagavā aniccavasena vā dukkhavasena vā ubhayavasena vā dasseti.
atk-s0201a:1922_4: Tayidaṃ imasmimpi teparivaṭṭe aniccadukkhavaseneva dassitaṃ. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:1923: Tasmā tiha, bhikkhaveti, bhikkhave, yasmā etarahi aññadāpi rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, tasmāti attho. Yaṃkiñci rūpantiādīni visuddhimagge khandhaniddese vitthāritāneva.
atk-s0201a:1924_0: 245. Nibbindatīti ukkaṇṭhati. Ettha ca nibbidāti vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā adhippetā.
atk-s0201a:1924_1: Vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanāya hi bahūni nāmāni. Esā hi katthaci saññagganti vuttā. Katthaci
atk-s0201a:1924_3: Katthaci tammayatāpariyādānanti. Katthaci tīhi nāmehi. Katthaci dvīhīti.
atk-s0201a:1925_0: Tattha poṭṭhapādasutte tāva “saññā kho, poṭṭhapāda, paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, pacchā ñāṇa”nti
atk-s0201a:1925_1: evaṃ saññagganti vuttā. Susimasutte “pubbe kho, susima, dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, pacchā
atk-s0201a:1925_2: nibbāne ñāṇa”nti evaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti vuttā. Dasuttarasutte “paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhipadhāniyaṅga”nti
atk-s0201a:1925_3: evaṃ pārisuddhipadāniyaṅganti vuttā. Rathavinīte “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:1925_4: bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti evaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuttā. Saḷāyatanavibhaṅge
atk-s0201a:1925_5: “atammayataṃ, bhikkhave, nissāya atammayataṃ āgamma yāyaṃ upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā,
atk-s0201a:1925_6: taṃ abhinivajjetvā yāyaṃ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā, taṃ nissāya taṃ āgamma evametissā
atk-s0201a:1925_7: pahānaṃ hoti, evametissā samatikkamo hotī”ti evaṃ tammayatāpariyādānanti vuttā. Paṭisambhidāmagge
atk-s0201a:1925_8: “yā ca muñcitukamyatā, yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā, yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā, ime dhammā
atk-s0201a:1925_9: ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti evaṃ tīhi nāmehi vuttā. Paṭṭhāne “anulomaṃ gotrabhussa
atk-s0201a:1925_10: anantarapaccayena paccayo, anulomaṃ vodānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti evaṃ dvīhi
atk-s0201a:1925_11: nāmehi vuttā. Imasmiṃ pana alagaddasutte nibbindatīti nibbidānāmena āgatā.
atk-s0201a:1926: Nibbidā virajjatīti ettha virāgoti maggo virāgā vimuccatīti ettha virāgena maggena vimuccatīti phalaṃ kathitaṃ. Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotīti idha paccavekkhaṇā kathitā.
atk-s0201a:1927_0: Evaṃ vimuttacittaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa yathābhūtehi pañcahi kāraṇehi
atk-s0201a:1927_1: nāmaṃ gaṇhanto ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Avijjāti vaṭṭamūlikā avijjā. Ayañhi
atk-s0201a:1927_2: durukkhipanaṭṭhena palighoti vuccati. Tenesa tassa ukkhittattā ukkhittapalighoti
atk-s0201a:1927_3: vutto. Tālāvatthukatāti sīsacchinnatālo viya katā, samūlaṃ vā tālaṃ uddharitvā tālassa
atk-s0201a:1927_4: vatthu viya katā, yathā tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ puna so tālo na paññāyati, evaṃ puna apaññattibhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:1927_5: nītāti attho. Ponobbhavikoti punabbhavadāyako. Jātisaṃsārotiādīsu jāyanavasena ceva
atk-s0201a:1927_6: saṃsaraṇavasena ca evaṃ laddhanāmānaṃ punabbhavakhandhānaṃ paccayo kammābhisaṅkhāro.
atk-s0201a:1927_7: So hi punappunaṃ uppattikaraṇavasena parikkhipitvā ṭhitattā parikkhāti vuccati, tenesa
atk-s0201a:1927_8: tassā saṃkiṇṇattā vikiṇṇattā saṃkiṇṇaparikkhoti vutto. Taṇhāti vaṭṭamūlikā taṇhā.
atk-s0201a:1927_9: Ayañhi gambhīrānugataṭṭhena esikāti vuccati. Tenesa tassā abbūḷhattā luñcitvā chaḍḍitattā
atk-s0201a:1927_10: abbūḷhesikoti vutto. Orambhāgiyānīti oraṃ bhajanakāni kāmabhave upapattipaccayāni.
atk-s0201a:1927_11: Etāni hi kavāṭaṃ viya nagaradvāraṃ cittaṃ pidahitvā ṭhitattā aggaḷāti vuccanti. Tenesa
atk-s0201a:1927_12: tesaṃ nirākatattā bhinnattā niraggaḷoti vutto. Ariyoti nikkileso parisuddho. Pannaddhajoti
atk-s0201a:1927_14: pannā orohitā assāti pannabhāro. Apica idha mānabhārasseva oropitattā pannabhāroti
atk-s0201a:1927_15: adhippeto. Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi ca visaṃyutto. Idha pana mānasaṃyogeneva
atk-s0201a:1927_16: visaṃyuttattā visaṃyuttoti adhippeto. Asmimānoti rūpe asmīti māno, vedanāya… saññāya…
atk-s0201a:1928_0: Ettāvatā bhagavatā maggena kilese khepetvā nirodhasayanavaragatassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1928_1: phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā viharato khīṇāsavassa kālo dassito. Yathā hi dve nagarāni
atk-s0201a:1928_2: ekaṃ coranagaraṃ, ekaṃ khemanagaraṃ. Atha ekassa mahāyodhassa evaṃ bhaveyya – “yāvimaṃ
atk-s0201a:1928_3: coranagaraṃ tiṭṭhati, tāva khemanagaraṃ bhayato na muccati, coranagaraṃ anagaraṃ
atk-s0201a:1928_4: karissāmī”ti sannāhaṃ katvā khaggaṃ gahetvā coranagaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nagaradvāre
atk-s0201a:1928_5: ussāpite esikatthambhe khaggena chinditvā sadvārabāhakaṃ kavāṭaṃ chinditvā palighaṃ
atk-s0201a:1928_6: ukkhipitvā pākāraṃ bhindanto parikkhaṃ saṃkiritvā nagarasobhanatthāya ussite dhaje
atk-s0201a:1928_7: pātetvā nagaraṃ agginā jhāpetvā khemanagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādaṃ abhiruyha ñātigaṇaparivuto
atk-s0201a:1928_8: surasabhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya, evaṃ coranagaraṃ viya sakkāyo, khemanagaraṃ viya nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1928_9: mahāyodho viya yogāvacaro. Tassevaṃ hoti, “yāva sakkāyavaṭṭaṃ vattati, tāva dvattiṃsakammakāraṇaaṭṭhanavutirogapañcavīsatimahābhayehi
atk-s0201a:1928_10: parimuccanaṃ natthī”ti. So mahāyodho viya sannāhaṃ sīlasannāhaṃ katvā, paññākhaggaṃ
atk-s0201a:1928_11: gahetvā khaggena esikatthambhe viya arahattamaggena taṇhesikaṃ luñcitvā, so yodho
atk-s0201a:1928_12: sadvārabāhakaṃ nagarakavāṭaṃ viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanaggaḷaṃ ugghāṭetvā, so yodho
atk-s0201a:1928_13: palighaṃ viya, avijjāpalighaṃ ukkhipitvā, so yodho pākāraṃ bhindanto parikkhaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:1928_14: kammābhisaṅkhāraṃ bhindanto jātisaṃsāraparikkhaṃ saṃkiritvā, so yodho nagarasobhanatthāya
atk-s0201a:1928_15: ussāpite dhaje viya mānaddhaje pātetvā sakkāyanagaraṃ jhāpetvā, so yodho khemanagare
atk-s0201a:1928_16: uparipāsāde surasabhojanaṃ viya kilesanibbānaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitvā amatanirodhārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1929_0: 246. Idāni evaṃ vimuttacittassa khīṇāsavassa parehi anadhigamanīyaviññāṇataṃ dassento
atk-s0201a:1929_1: evaṃ vimuttacittaṃ khotiādimāha. Tattha anvesanti anvesantā gavesantā. Idaṃ nissitanti
atk-s0201a:1929_2: idaṃ nāma nissitaṃ. Tathāgatassāti ettha sattopi tathāgatoti adhippeto, uttamapuggalo
atk-s0201a:1929_3: khīṇāsavopi. Ananuvijjoti asaṃvijjamāno vā avindeyyo vā. Tathāgatoti hi satte gahite
atk-s0201a:1929_4: asaṃvijjamānoti attho vaṭṭati, khīṇāsave gahite avindeyyoti attho vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:1930_0: Tattha purimanaye ayamadhippāyo – bhikkhave, ahaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme dharamānakaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:1930_1: khīṇāsavaṃ tathāgato satto puggaloti na paññapemi. Appaṭisandhikaṃ pana parinibbutaṃ
atk-s0201a:1930_2: khīṇāsavaṃ sattoti vā puggaloti vā kiṃ paññapessāmi? Ananuvijjo tathāgato. Na hi
atk-s0201a:1930_3: paramatthato satto nāma koci atthi, tassa avijjamānassa idaṃ nissitaṃ viññāṇanti
atk-s0201a:1930_4: anvesantāpi kiṃ adhigacchissanti? Kathaṃ paṭilabhissantīti attho. Dutiyanaye ayamadhippāyo
atk-s0201a:1930_5: – bhikkhave, ahaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme dharamānakaṃyeva khīṇāsavaṃ viññāṇavasena indādīhi
atk-s0201a:1930_6: avindiyaṃ vadāmi. Na hi saindā devā sabrahmakā sapajāpatikā anvesantāpi khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0201a:1930_7: vipassanācittaṃ vā maggacittaṃ vā phalacittaṃ vā, idaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ nissāya vattatīti
atk-s0201a:1930_8: jānituṃ sakkonti. Te appaṭisandhikassa parinibbutassa kiṃ jānissantīti?
atk-s0201a:1931_0: Asatāti asantena. Tucchāti tucchakena. Musāti musāvādena. Abhūtenāti yaṃ natthi,
atk-s0201a:1931_1: tena. Abbhācikkhantīti abhiācikkhanti, abhibhavitvā vadanti. Venayikoti vinayati
atk-s0201a:1931_2: vināsetīti vinayo, so eva venayiko, sattavināsakoti adhippāyo. Yathā cāhaṃ na, bhikkhaveti,
atk-s0201a:1931_3: bhikkhave, yena vākārena ahaṃ na sattavināsako. Yathā cāhaṃ na vadāmīti yena vā kāraṇena
atk-s0201a:1931_4: ahaṃ sattavināsaṃ na paññapemi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathāhaṃ na sattavināsako, yathā
atk-s0201a:1931_5: ca na sattavināsaṃ paññapemi, tathā maṃ te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā “venayiko samaṇo
atk-s0201a:1931_6: gotamo”ti vadantā sattavināsako samaṇo gotamoti ca, “sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ
atk-s0201a:1931_7: vibhavaṃ paññapetī”ti vadantā sattavināsaṃ paññapetīti ca asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhantīti.
atk-s0201a:1932_0: Pubbe cāti pubbe mahābodhimaṇḍamhiyeva ca. Etarahi cāti etarahi dhammadesanāyañca.
atk-s0201a:1932_1: Dukkhañceva paññapemi, dukkhassa ca nirodhanti dhammacakkaṃ appavattetvā bodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0201a:1932_2: viharantopi dhammacakkappavattanato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ desentopi catusaccameva paññapemīti
atk-s0201a:1932_3: attho. Ettha hi dukkhaggahaṇena tassa mūlabhūto samudayo, nirodhaggahaṇena taṃsampāpako
atk-s0201a:1932_4: maggo gahitova hotīti veditabbo. Tatra ceti tasmiṃ catusaccappakāsane. Pareti saccāni
atk-s0201a:1932_5: ājānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthapuggalā. Akkosantīti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti.
atk-s0201a:1932_6: Paribhāsantīti vācāya paribhāsanti. Rosenti vihesentīti rosessāma vihesessāmāti adhippāyena
atk-s0201a:1932_7: ghaṭṭenti dukkhāpenti. Tatrāti tesu akkosādīsu, tesu vā parapuggalesu. Āghātoti kopo.
atk-s0201a:1933_0: Tatra ceti catusaccappakāsaneyeva. Pareti catusaccappakāsanaṃ ājānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0201a:1933_1: samatthapuggalā. Ānandoti ānandapīti. Uppilāvitattanti uppilāpanapīti. Tatra ceti
atk-s0201a:1933_2: catusaccappakāsanamhiyeva. Tatrāti sakkārādīsu. Yaṃ kho idaṃ pubbe pariññātanti idaṃ
atk-s0201a:1933_3: khandhapañcakaṃ pubbe bodhimaṇḍe tīhi pariññāhi pariññātaṃ. Tatthameti tasmiṃ khandhapañcake
atk-s0201a:1933_4: ime. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Tatrāpi tathāgatassa ime sakkārā mayi karīyantīti vā ahaṃ ete
atk-s0201a:1933_5: anubhavāmīti vā na hoti. Pubbe pariññātakkhandhapañcakaṃyeva ete sakkāre anubhotīti
atk-s0201a:1933_6: ettakameva hotīti. Tasmāti yasmā saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthā tathāgatampi akkosanti,
atk-s0201a:1934_0: 247. Tasmā tiha, bhikkhave, yaṃ na tumhākanti yasmā attaniyepi chandarāgappahānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1934_1: dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati, tasmā yaṃ na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahathāti attho.
atk-s0201a:1934_2: Yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyyāti yathā yathā iccheyya tathā tathā kareyya. Na hi no etaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1934_3: bhante, attā vāti, bhante, etaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ amhākaṃ neva attā na amhākaṃ
atk-s0201a:1934_4: rūpaṃ na viññāṇanti vadanti. Attaniyaṃ vāti amhākaṃ cīvarādiparikkhāropi na hotīti
atk-s0201a:1934_5: attho. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaṃ na tumhākaṃ taṃ pajahathāti bhagavā, khandhapañcakaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:1934_6: na tumhākanti dassetvā pajahāpeti, tañca kho na uppāṭetvā, luñcitvā vā. Chandarāgavinayena panetaṃ pajahāpeti.
atk-s0201a:1935_0: 248. Evaṃ svākkhātoti ettha tiparivaṭṭato paṭṭhāya yāva imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āharitumpi vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:1935_1: paṭilomena pemamattakena saggaparāyaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āharitumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:1935_2: Svākkhātoti sukathito. Sukathitattā eva uttāno vivaṭo pakāsito. Chinnapilotikoti
atk-s0201a:1935_3: pilotikā vuccati chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ tattha tattha sibbitaṃ gaṇṭhikataṃ jiṇṇaṃ vatthaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1935_4: taṃ yassa natthi, aṭṭhahatthaṃ vā navahatthaṃ vā ahatasāṭakaṃ nivattho, so chinnapilotiko
atk-s0201a:1935_5: nāma. Ayampi dhammo tādiso, na hettha kohaññādivasena chinnabhinnasibbitagaṇṭhikatabhāvo
atk-s0201a:1935_6: atthi. Apica kacavaro pilotikoti vuccati. Imasmiñca sāsane samaṇakacavaraṃ nāma patiṭṭhātuṃ
atk-s0201a:1941_0: Iti samaṇakacavarassa chinnattāpi ayaṃ dhammo chinnapilotiko nāma hoti. Vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1941_1: natthi paññāpanāyāti tesaṃ vaṭṭaṃ apaññattibhāvaṃ gataṃ nippaññattikaṃ jātaṃ. Evarūpo
atk-s0201a:1941_2: mahākhīṇāsavo evaṃ svākkhāte sāsaneyeva uppajjati. Yathā ca khīṇāsavo, evaṃ anāgāmiādayopi.
atk-s0201a:1942_0: Tattha dhammānusārino saddhānusārinoti ime dve sotāpattimaggaṭṭhā honti. Yathāha
atk-s0201a:1942_1: – “katamo ca puggalo dhammānusārī? Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya
atk-s0201a:1942_2: paṭipannassa paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, paññāvāhiṃ paññāpubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ
atk-s0201a:1942_3: bhāveti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo dhammānusārī. Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno
atk-s0201a:1942_4: puggalo dhammānusārī, phale ṭhito diṭṭhippatto. Katamo ca puggalo saddhānusārī? Yassa
atk-s0201a:1942_5: puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:1942_6: saddhāvāhiṃ saddhāpubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāveti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo saddhānusārī.
atk-s0201a:1942_7: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo saddhānusārī, phale ṭhito saddhāvimutto”ti.
atk-s0201a:1942_8: Yesaṃ mayi saddhāmattaṃ pemamattanti iminā yesaṃ añño ariyadhammo natthi, tathāgate
atk-s0201a:1942_9: pana saddhāmattaṃ pemamattameva hoti. Te vipassakapuggalā adhippetā. Vipassakabhikkhūnañhi
atk-s0201a:1942_10: evaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnānaṃ dasabale ekā saddhā ekaṃ pemaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:1942_11: Tāya saddhāya tena pemena hatthe gahetvā sagge ṭhapitā viya honti, niyatagatikā kira
atk-s0201a:1942_12: ete. Porāṇakattherā pana evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ cūḷasotāpannoti vadanti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0201a:1946_0: 249. Evaṃ me sutanti vammikasuttaṃ. Tattha āyasmāti piyavacanametaṃ. Kumārakassapoti
atk-s0201a:1946_1: tassa nāmaṃ. Kumārakāle pabbajitattā pana bhagavatā, “kassapaṃ pakkosatha, idaṃ phalaṃ
atk-s0201a:1946_2: vā khādanīyaṃ vā kassapassa dethā”ti vutte, katarassa kassapassāti kumārakassapassāti
atk-s0201a:1946_3: evaṃ gahitanāmattā tato paṭṭhāya vuḍḍhakālepi “kumārakassapo” tveva vuccati. Apica
atk-s0201a:1946_4: raññā posāvanikaputtattāpi taṃ “kumārakassapo”ti sañjāniṃsu. Ayaṃ panassa pubbayogato
atk-s0201a:1947_0: Thero kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle seṭṭhiputto ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0201a:1947_1: citrakathiṃ ekaṃ attano sāvakaṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapentaṃ disvā bhagavato sattāhaṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1947_2: datvā, “ahampi bhagavā anāgate ekassa buddhassa ayaṃ thero viya citrakathī sāvako
atk-s0201a:1947_3: bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā puññāni karonto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0201a:1948_0: Tadā kira parinibbutassa bhagavato sāsane osakkante pañca bhikkhū nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0201a:1948_1: pabbataṃ abhiruyha samaṇadhammaṃ akaṃsu. Saṅghatthero tatiyadivase arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:1948_2: Anuthero catutthadivase anāgāmī ahosi. Itare tayo visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkontā devaloke
atk-s0201a:1948_3: nibbattiṃsu. Tesaṃ ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesu ca manussesu ca sampattiṃ anubhontānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1948_4: eko takkasilāyaṃ rājakule nibbattitvā pukkusāti nāma rājā hutvā bhagavantaṃ uddissa
atk-s0201a:1948_5: pabbajitvā rājagahaṃ gacchanto kumbhakārasālāyaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā anāgāmiphalaṃ
atk-s0201a:1948_6: patto. Eko ekasmiṃ samuddapaṭṭane kulaghare nibbattitvā nāvaṃ āruyha bhinnanāvo dārucīrāni
atk-s0201a:1948_7: nivāsetvā lābhasampattiṃ patto, “ahaṃ arahā”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā, “na tvaṃ arahā,
atk-s0201a:1948_8: gaccha satthāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchā”ti atthakāmāya devatāya codito tathā katvā arahattaphalaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:1949_0: Eko rājagahe ekissā kuladārikāya kucchimhi uppanno. Sā ca paṭhamaṃ mātāpitaro yācitvā
atk-s0201a:1949_1: pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā kulagharaṃ gatā gabbhasaṇṭhitampi ajānantī sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā
atk-s0201a:1949_2: tena anuññātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā. Tassā gabbhininimittaṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ
atk-s0201a:1949_3: pucchiṃsu, so “assamaṇī”ti āha. Dasabalaṃ pucchiṃsu, satthā upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0201a:1949_4: Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā sodhento, – “pure
atk-s0201a:1949_5: laddho gabbho, pabbajjā arogā”ti āha. Satthā “suvinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇa”nti therassa
atk-s0201a:1949_6: sādhukāraṃ adāsi. Sā bhikkhunī suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi, taṃ gahetvā rājā
atk-s0201a:1949_7: pasenadi kosalo posāpesi. “Kassapo”ti cassa nāmaṃ katvā aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu
atk-s0201a:1949_8: santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi. Iti rañño posāvanikaputtattāpi taṃ “kumārakassapo”ti sañjāniṃsūti.
atk-s0201a:1950_0: Andhavaneti evaṃnāmake vane. Taṃ kira vanaṃ dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ kāle avijahitanāmaṃ
atk-s0201a:1950_1: andhavanaṃtveva paññāyati. Tatrāyaṃ paññattivibhāvanā – appāyukabuddhānañhi sarīradhātu
atk-s0201a:1950_2: na ekagghanā hoti. Adhiṭṭhānānubhāvena vippakiriyati. Teneva amhākampi bhagavā, –
atk-s0201a:1950_3: “ahaṃ na ciraṭṭhitiko, appakehi sattehi ahaṃ diṭṭho, yehi na diṭṭho, teva bahutarā,
atk-s0201a:1950_4: te me dhātuyo ādāya tattha tattha pūjentā saggaparāyaṇā bhavissantī”ti parinibbānakāle,
atk-s0201a:1950_5: “attano sarīraṃ vippakiriyatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Dīghāyukabuddhānaṃ pana suvaṇṇakkhandho
atk-s0201a:1951_0: Kassapassāpi bhagavato tatheva aṭṭhāsi. Tato mahājanā sannipatitvā, “dhātuyo ekagghanā
atk-s0201a:1951_1: na sakkā viyojetuṃ, kiṃ karissāmā”ti sammantayitvā ekagghanameva cetiyaṃ karissāma,
atk-s0201a:1951_2: kittakaṃ pana hotu tanti āhaṃsu. Eke sattayojaniyanti āhaṃsu. Etaṃ atimahantaṃ, anāgate
atk-s0201a:1951_3: jaggituṃ na sakkā, chayojanaṃ hotu, pañcayojanaṃ… catuyojanaṃ… tiyojanaṃ… dviyojanaṃ…
atk-s0201a:1951_4: ekayojanaṃ hotūti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā iṭṭhakā kīdisā hontūti bāhirante iṭṭhakā rattasuvaṇṇamayā
atk-s0201a:1951_5: ekagghanā satasahassagghanikā hontu, abbhantarimante paññāsasahassagghanikā. Haritālamanosilāhi
atk-s0201a:1951_6: mattikākiccaṃ kayiratu, telena udakakiccanti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā cattāri mukhāni catudhā
atk-s0201a:1951_7: vibhajiṃsu. Rājā ekaṃ mukhaṃ gaṇhi, rājaputto pathavindarakumāro ekaṃ, amaccānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1951_8: jeṭṭhako hutvā senāpati ekaṃ, janapadānaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā seṭṭhi ekaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1952_0: Tattha dhanasampannatāya rājāpi suvaṇṇaṃ nīharāpetvā attanā gahitamukhe kammaṃ ārabhi,
atk-s0201a:1952_1: uparājāpi, senāpatipi. Seṭṭhinā gahitamukhe pana kammaṃ olīyati. Tato yasorato nāma
atk-s0201a:1952_2: eko upāsako tepiṭako bhāṇako anāgāmī ariyasāvako, so kammaṃ olīyatīti ñatvā pañca
atk-s0201a:1952_4: ṭhatvā parinibbuto. Tassa yojanikaṃ ratanacetiyaṃ kayirati, yo yaṃ dātuṃ ussahati
atk-s0201a:1952_5: suvaṇṇaṃ vā hiraññaṃ vā sattaratanaṃ vā haritālaṃ vā manosilaṃ vā, so taṃ detū”ti
atk-s0201a:1952_6: samādapesi. Manussā attano attano thāmena hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni adaṃsu. Asakkontā telataṇḍulādīni
atk-s0201a:1952_7: dentiyeva. Upāsako telataṇḍulādīni kammakārānaṃ bhattavetanatthaṃ pahiṇāti, avasesehi
atk-s0201a:1952_8: suvaṇṇaṃ cetāpetvā pahiṇāti, evaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ acari.
atk-s0201a:1953_0: Cetiye kammaṃ niṭṭhitanti cetiyaṭṭhānato paṇṇaṃ pahiṇiṃsu – “niṭṭhitaṃ kammaṃ ācariyo
atk-s0201a:1953_1: āgantvā cetiyaṃ vandatū”ti. Sopi paṇṇaṃ pahiṇi – “mayā sakalajambudīpo samādapito,
atk-s0201a:1953_2: yaṃ atthi, taṃ gahetvā kammaṃ niṭṭhāpentū”ti. Dvepi paṇṇāni antarāmagge samāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1953_3: Ācariyassa paṇṇato pana cetiyaṭṭhānato paṇṇaṃ paṭhamataraṃ ācariyassa hatthaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:1953_4: So paṇṇaṃ vācetvā cetiyaṃ vandissāmīti ekakova nikkhami. Antarāmagge aṭaviyaṃ pañca
atk-s0201a:1953_5: corasatāni uṭṭhahiṃsu. Tatrekacce taṃ disvā iminā sakalajambudīpato hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:1953_6: sampiṇḍitaṃ, nidhikumbhī no pavaṭṭamānā āgatāti avasesānaṃ ārocetvā taṃ aggahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:1953_7: Kasmā tātā, maṃ gaṇhathāti? Tayā sakalajambudīpato sabbaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ sampiṇḍitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:1953_8: amhākampi thokaṃ thokaṃ dehīti. Kiṃ tumhe na jānātha, kassapo bhagavā parinibbuto,
atk-s0201a:1953_9: tassa yojanikaṃ ratanacetiyaṃ kayirati, tadatthāya mayā samādapitaṃ, no attano atthāya.
atk-s0201a:1953_10: Taṃ taṃ laddhaladdhaṭṭhānato tattheva pesitaṃ, mayhaṃ pana nivatthasāṭakamattaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:1954_0: Eke, “evametaṃ vissajetha ācariya”nti āhaṃsu. Eke, “ayaṃ rājapūjito amaccapūjito,
atk-s0201a:1954_1: amhesu kañcideva nagaravīthiyaṃ disvā rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ ārocetvā anayavyasanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1954_2: pāpuṇāpeyyā”ti āhaṃsu. Upāsako, “tātā, nāhaṃ evaṃ karissāmī”ti āha. Tañca kho tesu
atk-s0201a:1954_3: kāruññena, na attano jīvitanikantiyā. Atha tesu gahetabbo vissajjetabboti vivadantesu
atk-s0201a:1954_4: gahetabboti laddhikā eva bahutarā hutvā jīvitā voropayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1955_0: Tesaṃ balavaguṇe ariyasāvake aparādhena nibbutadīpasikhā viya akkhīni antaradhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1955_1: Te, “kahaṃ bho cakkhu, kahaṃ bho cakkhū”ti vippalapantā ekacce ñātakehi gehaṃ nītā.
atk-s0201a:1955_2: Ekacce noñātakā anāthāti tattheva aṭaviyaṃ rukkhamūle paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasiṃsu. Aṭaviṃ
atk-s0201a:1955_3: āgatamanussā kāruññena tesaṃ taṇḍulaṃ vā puṭabhattaṃ vā paribbayaṃ vā denti. Dārupaṇṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1955_4: atthāya gantvā āgatā manussā kuhiṃ gatatthāti vutte andhavanaṃ gatamhāti vadanti.
atk-s0201a:1955_5: Evaṃ dvinnampi buddhānaṃ kāle taṃ vanaṃ andhavanaṃtveva paññāyati. Kassapabuddhakāle
atk-s0201a:1955_6: panetaṃ chaḍḍitajanapade aṭavi ahosi. Amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyā avidūre jetavanassa
atk-s0201a:1955_7: piṭṭhibhāge pavivekakāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ padhānagharaṃ ahosi, tattha
atk-s0201a:1955_8: āyasmā kumārakassapo tena samayena sekhapaṭipadaṃ pūrayamāno viharati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:1956_0: Aññatarā devatāti nāmagottavasena apākaṭā ekā devatāti attho. “Abhijānāti no, bhante,
atk-s0201a:1956_1: bhagavā ahuñātaññatarassa mahesakkhassa saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ bhāsitā”ti
atk-s0201a:1956_2: ettha pana abhiññāto sakkopi devarājā aññataroti vutto. Devatāti ca idaṃ devānampi
atk-s0201a:1956_3: devadhītānampi sādhāraṇavacanaṃ. Imasmiṃ panatthe devo adhippeto. Abhikkantāya rattiyāti
atk-s0201a:1956_5: bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho, uddisatu, bhante,
atk-s0201a:1956_6: bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti evamādīsu khaye dissati. “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1956_7: puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti evamādīsu sundare.
atk-s0201a:1957: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0201a:1959_0: Evamādīsu abhirūpe. “Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotamā”ti evamādīsu abbhanumodane. Idha pana
atk-s0201a:1959_1: khaye. Tena abhikkantāya rattiyāti parikkhīṇāya rattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatthāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1959_2: devaputto majjhimayāmasamanantare āgatoti veditabbo. Abhikkantavaṇṇāti idha abhikkantasaddo
atk-s0201a:1959_4: dissati. Tattha, “suvaṇṇavaṇṇosi bhagavā”ti evamādīsu chaviyā. “Kadā saññūḷhā pana
atk-s0201a:1959_5: te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu thutiyaṃ. “Cattārome, bho gotama,
atk-s0201a:1959_6: vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu kulavagge. “Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhathenoti vuccatī”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0201a:1959_7: kāraṇe. “Mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā”ti evamādīsu saṇṭhāne. “Tayo pattassa
atk-s0201a:1959_8: vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu pamāṇe. “Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā”ti evamādīsu rūpāyatane. So idha
atk-s0201a:1959_9: chaviyaṃ daṭṭhabbo. Tena abhikkantavaṇṇāti abhirūpachaviiṭṭhavaṇṇā, manāpavaṇṇāti
atk-s0201a:1959_10: vuttaṃ hoti. Devatā hi manussalokaṃ āgacchamānā pakativaṇṇaṃ pakatiiddhiṃ pajahitvā
atk-s0201a:1959_11: oḷārikaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā atirekavaṇṇaṃ atirekaiddhiṃ māpetvā naṭasamajjādīni gacchantā
atk-s0201a:1959_12: manussā viya abhisaṅkhatena kāyena āgacchanti. Ayampi devaputto tatheva āgato. Tena
atk-s0201a:1960_1: Tathā hissa, “kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariya”nti evamādīsu anavasesattamattho.
atk-s0201a:1960_2: “Kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī”ti
atk-s0201a:1960_3: evamādīsu yebhuyyatā. “Kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti evamādīsu abyāmissatā.
atk-s0201a:1960_4: “Kevalaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ nūna ayamāyasmā”ti evamādīsu anatirekatā. “Āyasmato anuruddhassa
atk-s0201a:1960_5: bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṃ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito”ti evamādīsu daḷhatthatā.
atk-s0201a:1960_6: “Kevalī vusitavā uttamapurisoti vuccatī”ti evamādīsu visaṃyogo. Idha panassa anavasesattamatthoti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:1961_1: Tathā hissa, “okappaniyametaṃ bhoto gotamassa, yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti
atk-s0201a:1961_2: evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ
atk-s0201a:1961_3: paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro. “Yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0201a:1961_4: kālo. “Iccāyasmā kappo”ti evamādīsu paññatti. “Alaṅkatā kappitakesamassū”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0201a:1961_5: chedanaṃ. “Kappati dvaṅgulakappo”ti evamādīsu vikappo. “Atthi kappo nipajjitu”nti
atk-s0201a:1961_6: evamādīsu leso. “Kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ obhāsetvā”ti evamādīsu samantabhāvo. Idha
atk-s0201a:1961_7: panassa samantabhāvo attho adhippeto. Tasmā kevalakappaṃ andhavananti ettha anavasesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1962_0: Obhāsetvāti vatthālaṅkārasarīrasamuṭṭhitāya ābhāya pharitvā, candimā viya ca sūriyo
atk-s0201a:1962_1: viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho. Ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsīti ekasmiṃ ante,
atk-s0201a:1962_2: ekasmiṃ okāse aṭṭhāsi. Etadavocāti etaṃ “bhikkhu bhikkhū”tiādivacanamavoca. Kasmā
atk-s0201a:1962_3: panāyaṃ avanditvā samaṇavohāreneva kathetīti? Samaṇasaññāsamudācāreneva. Evaṃ kirassa
atk-s0201a:1962_4: ahosi – “ayaṃ antarā kāmāvacare vasi. Ahaṃ pana asmi tato kālato paṭṭhāya brahmacārī”ti
atk-s0201a:1962_5: samaṇasaññāvassa samudācarati, tasmā avanditvā samaṇavohāreneva katheti. Pubbasahāyo
atk-s0201a:1962_6: kireso devaputto therassa. Kuto paṭṭhāyāti? Kassapasammāsambuddhakālato paṭṭhāya.
atk-s0201a:1962_7: Yo hi pubbayoge āgatesu pañcasu sahāyesu anuthero catutthadivase anāgāmī ahosīti
atk-s0201a:1962_8: vutto, ayaṃ so. Tadā kira tesu saṅghattherassa arahatteneva saddhiṃ abhiññā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:1962_9: So, “mayhaṃ kiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti vehāsaṃ uppatitvā anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0201a:1962_10: uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya āgantvā, “imaṃ, āvuso, piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā appamattā
atk-s0201a:1962_11: samaṇadhammaṃ karothā”ti āha. Itare āhaṃsu – “na, āvuso, amhākaṃ evaṃ katikā atthi
atk-s0201a:1962_12: – ‘yo paṭhamaṃ visesaṃ nibbattetvā piṇḍapātaṃ āharati, tenābhataṃ bhuñjitvā sesehi
atk-s0201a:1962_13: samaṇadhammo kātabbo’ti. Tumhe attano upanissayena kiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpayittha. Mayampi
atk-s0201a:1962_14: sace no upanissayo bhavissati, kiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāma. Papañco esa amhākaṃ, gacchatha
atk-s0201a:1962_15: tumhe”ti. So yathāphāsukaṃ gantvā āyupariyosāne parinibbāyi.
atk-s0201a:1963_0: Punadivase anuthero anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchakāsi, tassa abhiññāyo āgamiṃsu. Sopi tatheva
atk-s0201a:1963_1: piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā tehi paṭikkhitto yathāphāsukaṃ gantvā āyupariyosāne suddhāvāse
atk-s0201a:1963_2: nibbatti. So suddhāvāse ṭhatvā te sahāye olokento, eko tadāva parinibbuto, eko adhunā
atk-s0201a:1963_3: bhagavato santike ariyabhūmiṃ patto, eko lābhasakkāraṃ nissāya, “ahaṃ arahā”ti cittaṃ
atk-s0201a:1963_4: uppādetvā suppārakapaṭṭane vasatīti disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “na tvaṃ arahā, na arahattamaggaṃ
atk-s0201a:1963_5: paṭipanno, gaccha bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇāhī”ti uyyojesi. Sopi antaraghare
atk-s0201a:1963_6: bhagavantaṃ ovādaṃ yācitvā, “tasmā tiha te bāhiya evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ
atk-s0201a:1963_7: hotū”ti bhagavatā saṃkhittena ovadito ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0201a:1964_0: Tato añño eko atthi, so kuhinti olokento andhavane sekkhapaṭipadaṃ pūrayamāno viharatīti
atk-s0201a:1964_1: disvā cintesi – “sahāyakassa santike gamissāmīti, gacchantena pana tucchahatthena
atk-s0201a:1964_2: agantvā kiñci paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati, sahāyo kho pana me nirāmiso pabbatamatthake
atk-s0201a:1964_3: vasanto mayā ākāse ṭhatvā dinnaṃ piṇḍapātampi aparibhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0201a:1964_4: idāni āmisapaṇṇākāraṃ kiṃ gaṇhissati? Dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti brahmaloke
atk-s0201a:1964_5: ṭhitova ratanāvaḷiṃ ganthento viya pannarasa pañhe vibhajitvā taṃ dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0201a:1964_6: ādāya āgantvā sahāyassa avidūre ṭhatvā attano samaṇasaññāsamudācāravasena taṃ anabhivādetvāva,
atk-s0201a:1964_7: “bhikkhu bhikkhū”ti ālapitvā ayaṃ vammikotiādimāha. Tattha turitālapanavasena bhikkhu
atk-s0201a:1964_8: bhikkhūti āmeḍitaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yathā vā ekaneva tilakena nalāṭaṃ na sobhati, taṃ
atk-s0201a:1964_9: parivāretvā aññesupi dinnesu phullitamaṇḍitaṃ viya sobhati, evaṃ ekeneva padena vacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1964_10: na sobhati, parivārikapadena saddhiṃ phullitamaṇḍitaṃ viya sobhatīti taṃ parivārikapadavasena
atk-s0201a:1965_0: Ayaṃ vammikoti purato ṭhito vammiko nāma natthi, desanāvasena pana purato ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0201a:1965_1: dassento viya ayanti āha. Laṅginti satthaṃ ādāya khaṇanto palighaṃ addasa. Ukkhipa
atk-s0201a:1965_2: laṅgiṃ abhikkhaṇa sumedhāti tāta, paṇḍita, laṅgī nāma rattiṃ dhūmāyati divā pajjalati.
atk-s0201a:1965_3: Ukkhipeta paraṃ parato khaṇāti. Evaṃ sabbapadesu attho daṭṭhabbo. Uddhumāyikanti
atk-s0201a:1965_4: maṇḍūkaṃ. Caṅkavāranti khāraparissāvanaṃ. Kummanti kacchapaṃ. Asisūnanti maṃsacchedakaṃ
atk-s0201a:1965_5: asiñceva adhikuṭṭanañca. Maṃsapesinti nisadapotappamāṇaṃ allamaṃsapiṇḍaṃ. Nāganti
atk-s0201a:1965_7: Mā nāgaṃ ghaṭṭesīti daṇḍakakoṭiyā vā vallikoṭiyā vā paṃsucuṇṇaṃ vā pana khipamāno
atk-s0201a:1965_8: mā nāgaṃ ghaṭṭayi. Namo karohi nāgassāti uparivātato apagamma suddhavatthaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0201a:1965_9: nāgassa namakkāraṃ karohi. Nāgena adhisayitaṃ dhanaṃ nāma yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā
atk-s0201a:1965_10: khādato na khīyati, nāgo te adhisayitaṃ dhanaṃ dassati, tasmā namo karohi nāgassāti.
atk-s0201a:1965_11: Ito vā pana sutvāti yathā dukkhakkhandhe itoti sāsane nissakaṃ, na tathā idha. Idha
atk-s0201a:1965_12: pana devaputte nissakkaṃ, tasmā ito vā panāti mama vā pana santikā sutvāti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a:1966_1: nāmaṃ. Yatheva hi bāhirako vammiko, vamatīti vantakoti vantussayoti vantasinehasambandhoti
atk-s0201a:1966_2: catūhi kāraṇehi vammikoti vuccati. So hi ahimaṅgusaundūragharagoḷikādayo nānappakāre
atk-s0201a:1966_3: pāṇake vamatīti vammiko. Upacikāhi vantakoti vammiko. Upacikāhi vamitvā mukhatuṇḍakena
atk-s0201a:1966_4: ukkhittapaṃsucuṇṇena kaṭippamāṇenapi porisappamāṇenapi ussitoti vammiko. Upacikāhi
atk-s0201a:1966_5: vantakheḷasinehena ābaddhatāya sattasattāhaṃ deve vassantepi na vippakiriyati, nidāghepi
atk-s0201a:1966_6: tato paṃsumuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ muṭṭhinā pīḷiyamāne sineho nikkhamati, evaṃ vantasinehena
atk-s0201a:1966_7: sambaddhoti vammiko. Evamayaṃ kāyopi, “akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādinā nayena nānappakārakaṃ
atk-s0201a:1966_8: asucikalimalaṃ vamatīti vammiko. Buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā imasmiṃ attabhāve nikantipariyādānena
atk-s0201a:1966_9: attabhāvaṃ chaḍḍetvā gatāti ariyehi vantakotipi vammiko. Yehi cāyaṃ tīhi aṭṭhisatehi
atk-s0201a:1966_10: ussito nhārusambaddho maṃsāvalepano allacammapariyonaddho chavirañjito satte vañceti,
atk-s0201a:1966_11: taṃ sabbaṃ ariyehi vantamevāti vantussayotipi vammiko. “Taṇhā janeti purisaṃ, cittamassa
atk-s0201a:1966_12: vidhāvatī”ti evaṃ taṇhāya janitattā ariyehi vanteneva taṇhāsinehena sambaddho ayanti
atk-s0201a:1966_13: vantasinehena sambaddhotipi vammiko. Yathā ca vammikassa anto nānappakārā pāṇakā
atk-s0201a:1966_14: tattheva jāyanti, uccārapassāvaṃ karonti, gilānā sayanti, matā patanti. Iti so tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1966_15: sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hoti. Evaṃ khattiyamahāsālādīnampi kāyo
atk-s0201a:1966_16: ayaṃ gopitarakkhito maṇḍitappasādhito mahānubhāvānaṃ kāyoti acintetvā chavinissitā
atk-s0201a:1966_17: pāṇā cammanissitā pāṇā maṃsanissitā pāṇā nhārunissitā pāṇā aṭṭhinissitā pāṇā aṭṭhimiñjanissitā
atk-s0201a:1966_18: pāṇāti evaṃ kulagaṇanāya asītimattāni kimikulasahassāni antokāyasmiṃyeva jāyanti,
atk-s0201a:1966_19: uccārapassāvaṃ karonti, gelaññena āturitāni sayanti, matāni patanti, iti ayampi tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1966_20: pāṇānaṃ sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hotīti “vammiko” tveva saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:1966_21: gato. Tenāha bhagavā – “vammikoti kho, bhikkhu, imassa cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
atk-s0201a:1967_0: Mātāpettikasambhavassāti mātito ca pitito ca nibbattena mātāpettikena sukkasoṇitena
atk-s0201a:1967_1: sambhūtassa. Odanakummāsūpacayassāti odanena ceva kummāsena ca upacitassa vaḍḍhitassa.
atk-s0201a:1967_4: khuddakasambāhanena parimaddanadhammo. Daharakāle vā ūrūsu sayāpetvā gabbhavāsena
atk-s0201a:1967_5: dussaṇṭhitānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgānaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ añchanapīḷanādivasena parimaddanadhammo.
atk-s0201a:1967_6: Evaṃ pariharatopi ca bhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo bhijjati ceva vikirati ca, evaṃ sabhāvoti
atk-s0201a:1967_8: kathito, aniccabhedaviddhaṃsanapadehi atthaṅgamo. Evaṃ sattahipi padehi cātumahābhūtikassa
atk-s0201a:1967_9: kāyassa uccāvacabhāvo vaḍḍhiparihāni samudayatthaṅgamo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1968_0: Divā kammanteti divā kattabbakammante. Dhūmāyanāti ettha ayaṃ dhūmasaddo kodhe taṇhāya
atk-s0201a:1968_1: vitakke pañcasu kāmaguṇesu dhammadesanāya pakatidhūmeti imesu atthesu vattati. “Kodho
atk-s0201a:1968_2: dhūmo bhasmanimosavajja”nti ettha hi kodhe vattati. “Icchādhūmāyitā sattā”ti ettha
atk-s0201a:1968_3: taṇhāya. “Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre dhūmāyanto nisinno
atk-s0201a:1971: Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsitā;
atk-s0201a:1973_0: Ettha pañcakāmaguṇesu. “Dhūmaṃ kattā hotī”ti ettha dhammadesanāya. “Dhajo rathassa
atk-s0201a:1973_1: paññāṇaṃ, dhūmo paññāṇamaggino”ti ettha pakatidhūme. Idha panāyaṃ vitakke adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:1974_0: Tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacananti tathāgato hi sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0201a:1974_1: nāma. Yathāha – “sattannaṃ kho, bhikkhu, dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo. Katamesaṃ
atk-s0201a:1974_2: sattannaṃ? Rāgo bāhito hoti, doso… moho… māno… sakkāyadiṭṭhi… vicikicchā… sīlabbataparāmāso
atk-s0201a:1974_3: bāhito hoti. Imesaṃ bhikkhu sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo”ti. Sumedhoti
atk-s0201a:1974_4: sundarapañño. Sekkhassāti ettha sikkhatīti sekkho. Yathāha – “sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu,
atk-s0201a:1974_5: tasmā sekkhoti vuccati. Kiñca sikkhati? Adhisīlampi sikkhati, adhicittampi sikkhati,
atk-s0201a:1975_0: Paññāya adhivacananti lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ, na āvudhasatthassa.
atk-s0201a:1975_1: Vīriyārambhassāti kāyikacetasikavīriyassa. Taṃ paññāgatikameva hoti. Lokiyāya paññāya
atk-s0201a:1975_2: lokiyaṃ, lokuttarāya paññāya lokuttaraṃ. Ettha panāyaṃ atthadīpanā –
atk-s0201a:1976_0: Eko kira jānapado brāhmaṇo pātova māṇavakehi saddhiṃ gāmato nikkhamma divasaṃ araññe
atk-s0201a:1976_1: mante vācetvā sāyaṃ gāmaṃ āgacchati. Antarāmagge ca eko vammiko atthi. So rattiṃ
atk-s0201a:1976_2: dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati. Brāhmaṇo antevāsiṃ sumedhaṃ māṇavaṃ āha – “tāta, ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:1976_3: vammiko rattiṃ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati, vikāramassa passissāma, bhinditvā naṃ cattāro
atk-s0201a:1976_4: koṭṭhāse katvā khipāhī”ti. So sādhūti kudālaṃ gahetvā samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:1976_5: tathā akāsi. Tatra ācariyabrāhmaṇo viya bhagavā. Sumedhamāṇavako viya sekkho bhikkhu.
atk-s0201a:1976_6: Vammiko viya kāyo. “Tāta, ayaṃ vammiko rattiṃ dhūmāyati, divā pajjalati, vikāramassa
atk-s0201a:1976_7: passissāma, bhinditvā naṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā khipāhī”ti brāhmaṇena vuttakālo
atk-s0201a:1976_8: viya, “bhikkhu cātumahābhūtikaṃ kāyaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā pariggaṇhāhī”ti bhagavatā
atk-s0201a:1976_9: vuttakālo. Tassa sādhūti kudālaṃ gahetvā tathākaraṇaṃ viya sekkhassa bhikkhuno, “yo
atk-s0201a:1976_10: vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddhabhāvo, ayaṃ pathavīdhātu. Yo dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesu ābandhanabhāvo,
atk-s0201a:1976_11: ayaṃ āpodhātu. Yo catūsu koṭṭhāsesu paripācanabhāvo, ayaṃ tejodhātu. Yo chasu koṭṭhāsesu
atk-s0201a:1976_12: vitthambhanabhāvo, ayaṃ vāyodhātū”ti evaṃ catudhātuvavatthānavasena kāyapariggaho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:1977_0: Laṅgīti kho, bhikkhūti kasmā bhagavā avijjaṃ laṅgīti katvā dassesīti? Yathā hi nagarassa
atk-s0201a:1977_1: dvāraṃ pidhāya palighe yojite mahājanassa gamanaṃ pacchijjati, ye nagarassa anto,
atk-s0201a:1977_2: te antoyeva honti. Ye bahi, te bahiyeva. Evameva yassa ñāṇamukhe avijjālaṅgī patati,
atk-s0201a:1977_3: tassa nibbānasampāpakaṃ ñāṇagamanaṃ pacchijjati, tasmā avijjaṃ laṅgīti katvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a:1977_4: Pajaha avijjanti ettha kammaṭṭhānauggahaparipucchāvasena avijjāpahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1978_0: Uddhumāyikāti kho, bhikkhūti ettha uddhumāyikamaṇḍūko nāma no mahanto, nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇo
atk-s0201a:1978_1: hoti, purāṇapaṇṇantare vā gacchantare vā valliantare vā vasati. So daṇḍakoṭiyā vā
atk-s0201a:1978_2: vallikoṭiyā vā paṃsucuṇṇakena vā ghaṭṭito āyamitvā mahanto parimaṇḍalo beluvapakkappamāṇo
atk-s0201a:1978_3: hutvā cattāro pāde ākāsagate katvā pacchinnagamano hutvā amittavasaṃ yāti, kākakulalādibhattameva
atk-s0201a:1978_4: hoti. Evameva ayaṃ kodho paṭhamaṃ uppajjanto cittāvilamattakova hoti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0201a:1978_5: aniggahito vaḍḍhitvā mukhavikulanaṃ pāpeti. Tadā aniggahito hanusañcopanaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0201a:1978_6: Tadā aniggahito pharusavācānicchāraṇaṃ pāpeti. Tadā aniggahito disāvilokanaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0201a:1978_7: Tadā aniggahito ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaṃ pāpeti. Tadā aniggahito pāṇinā leḍḍudaṇḍasatthaparāmasanaṃ
atk-s0201a:1978_8: pāpeti. Tadā aniggahito daṇḍasatthābhinipātaṃ pāpeti. Tadā aniggahito paraghātanampi
atk-s0201a:1978_9: attaghātanampi pāpeti. Vuttampi hetaṃ – “yato ayaṃ kodho paraṃ ghātetvā attānaṃ ghāteti,
atk-s0201a:1978_10: ettāvatāyaṃ kodho paramussadagato hoti paramavepullappatto”ti. Tattha yathā uddhumāyikāya
atk-s0201a:1978_11: catūsu pādesu ākāsagatesu gamanaṃ pacchijjati, uddhumāyikā amittavasaṃ gantvā kākādibhattaṃ
atk-s0201a:1978_12: hoti, evameva kodhasamaṅgīpuggalo kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti, amittavasaṃ
atk-s0201a:1978_13: yāti, sabbesaṃ mārānaṃ yathākāmakaraṇīyo hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – “uddhumāyikāti kho,
atk-s0201a:1978_14: bhikkhu, kodhūpāyāsassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Tattha balavappatto kodhova kodhūpāyāso.
atk-s0201a:1979_0: Dvidhāpathoti ettha, yathā puriso sadhano sabhogo kantāraddhānamaggappaṭipanno dvedhāpathaṃ
atk-s0201a:1979_1: patvā, “iminā nu kho gantabbaṃ, iminā gantabba”nti nicchetuṃ asakkonto tattheva tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:1979_2: atha naṃ corā uṭṭhahitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti, evameva kho mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a:1979_3: nisinno bhikkhu buddhādīsu kaṅkhāya uppannāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:1979_4: atha naṃ kilesamārādayo sabbe mārā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti, iti vicikicchā dvedhāpathasamā
atk-s0201a:1979_5: hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – “dvidhāpathoti kho, bhikkhu, vicikicchāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
atk-s0201a:1979_6: Pajaha vicikicchanti ettha kammaṭṭhānauggahaparipucchāvasena vicikicchāpahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1980_0: Caṅgavāranti ettha, yathā rajakehi khāraparissāvanamhi udake pakkhitte eko udakaghaṭo
atk-s0201a:1980_1: dvepi dasapi vīsatipi ghaṭasatampi paggharatiyeva, pasaṭamattampi udakaṃ na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:1980_2: evameva nīvaraṇasamaṅgino puggalassa abbhantare kusaladhammo na tiṭṭhati. Tenāha
atk-s0201a:1980_3: bhagavā – “caṅgavāranti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ adhivacana”nti. Pajaha
atk-s0201a:1981_0: Kummoti ettha, yathā kacchapassa cattāro pādā sīsanti pañceva aṅgāni honti, evameva
atk-s0201a:1981_1: sabbepi saṅkhatā dhammā gayhamānā pañceva khandhā bhavanti. Tenāha bhagavā – “kummoti
atk-s0201a:1981_2: kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti. Pajaha pañcupādānakkhandheti
atk-s0201a:1982_0: Asisūnāti ettha, yathā sūnāya upari maṃsaṃ ṭhapetvā asinā koṭṭenti, evamime sattā
atk-s0201a:1982_1: vatthukāmatthāya kilesakāmehi ghātayamānā vatthukāmānaṃ upari katvā kilesakāmehi
atk-s0201a:1982_2: kantitā koṭṭitā ca honti. Tenāha bhagavā – “asisūnāti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ
atk-s0201a:1982_3: adhivacana”nti. Pajaha pañca kāmaguṇeti ettha pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1983_0: Maṃsapesīti kho, bhikkhūti ettha ayaṃ maṃsapesi nāma bahujanapatthitā khattiyādayo
atk-s0201a:1983_1: manussāpi naṃ patthenti kākādayo tiracchānāpi. Ime hi sattā avijjāya sammattā nandirāgaṃ
atk-s0201a:1983_2: upagamma vaṭṭaṃ vaḍḍhenti. Yathā vā maṃsapesi ṭhapitaṭhapitaṭṭhāne laggati, evamime
atk-s0201a:1983_3: sattā nandirāgabaddhā vaṭṭe lagganti, dukkhaṃ patvāpi na ukkaṇṭhanti, iti nandirāgo
atk-s0201a:1983_4: maṃsapesisadiso hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – “maṃsapesīti kho, bhikkhu, nandirāgassetaṃ
atk-s0201a:1983_5: adhivacana”nti. Pajaha nandīrāganti ettha catutthamaggena nandīrāgappahānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1984_0: Nāgoti kho, bhikkhu, khīṇāsavassetaṃ bhikkhuno adhivacananti ettha yenatthena khīṇāsavo
atk-s0201a:1984_1: nāgoti vuccati, so anaṅgaṇasutte pakāsito eva. Namo karohi nāgassāti khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0201a:1984_2: buddhanāgassa, “buddho so bhagavā bodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, danto so bhagavā damathāya
atk-s0201a:1984_3: dhammaṃ deseti, santo so bhagavā samathāya dhammaṃ deseti, tiṇṇo so bhagavā taraṇāya
atk-s0201a:1984_4: dhammaṃ deseti, parinibbuto so bhagavā parinibbānāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti evaṃ namakkāraṃ
atk-s0201a:1984_5: karohīti ayamettha attho. Iti idaṃ suttaṃ therassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ahosi. Theropi idameva
atk-s0201a:1984_6: suttaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patto. Ayametassa atthoti
atk-s0201a:1984_7: ayaṃ etassa pañhassa attho. Iti bhagavā ratanarāsimhi maṇikūṭaṃ gaṇhanto viya yathānusandhināva
atk-s0201a:1988_0: 252. Evaṃ me sutanti rathavinītasuttaṃ. Tattha rājagaheti evaṃnāmake nagare, tañhi
atk-s0201a:1988_1: mandhātumahāgovindādīhi pariggahitattā rājagahanti vuccati. Aññepettha pakāre vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0201a:1988_2: Kiṃ tehi? Nāmametaṃ tassa nagarassa. Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca
atk-s0201a:1988_3: nagaraṃ hoti, sesakāle suññaṃ hoti yakkhapariggahitaṃ, tesaṃ vasantavanaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:1988_4: Veḷuvane kalandakanivāpeti veḷuvananti tassa uyyānassa nāmaṃ, taṃ kira veḷūhi parikkhittaṃ
atk-s0201a:1988_5: ahosi aṭṭhārasahatthena ca pākārena, gopuraṭṭālakayuttaṃ nīlobhāsaṃ manoramaṃ, tena
atk-s0201a:1988_6: veḷuvananti vuccati. Kalandakānañcettha nivāpaṃ adaṃsu, tena kalandakanivāpoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:1989_0: Pubbe kira aññataro rājā tattha uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ āgato surāmadena matto divāseyyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1989_1: upagato supi. Parijanopissa, “sutto rājā”ti pupphaphalādīhi palobhiyamāno ito cito
atk-s0201a:1989_2: ca pakkāmi, atha surāgandhena aññatarasmā susirarukkhā kaṇhasappo nikkhamitvā raññābhimukho
atk-s0201a:1989_3: āgacchati. Taṃ disvā rukkhadevatā, “rañño jīvitaṃ dammī”ti kāḷakavesena āgantvā kaṇṇamūle
atk-s0201a:1989_4: saddamakāsi. Rājā paṭibujjhi, kaṇhasappo nivatto. So taṃ disvā, “imāya mama jīvitaṃ
atk-s0201a:1989_5: dinna”nti kāḷakānaṃ tattha nivāpaṃ paṭṭhapesi, abhayaghosanañca ghosāpesi. Tasmā
atk-s0201a:1989_6: taṃ tato pabhuti kalandakanivāpanti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ. Kalandakāti kāḷakānaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0201a:1990_0: Jātibhūmikāti jātibhūmivāsino. Tattha jātibhūmīti jātaṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ kho panetaṃ neva
atk-s0201a:1990_1: kosalamahārājādīnaṃ na caṅkībrāhamaṇādīnaṃ na sakkasuyāmasantusitādīnaṃ na asītimahāsāvakādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:1990_2: na aññesaṃ sattānaṃ jātaṭṭhānaṃ “jātibhūmī”ti vuccati. Yassa pana jātadivase dasasahassilokadhātu
atk-s0201a:1990_4: virocamānā paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu viya akampittha, jaccandhādīnañca rūpadassanādīni
atk-s0201a:1990_5: anekāni pāṭihāriyāni pavattiṃsu, tassa sabbaññubodhisattassa jātaṭṭhānasākiyajanapado
atk-s0201a:1992_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhāti temāsaṃ vassaṃvuṭṭhā pavāritapavāraṇā hutvā. Bhagavā etadavocāti “kacci,
atk-s0201a:1992_1: bhikkhave, khamanīya”ntiādīhi vacanehi āgantukapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā etaṃ, “ko nu kho,
atk-s0201a:1992_2: bhikkhave”tiādivacanamavoca. Te kira bhikkhu, – “kacci, bhikkhave, khamanīyaṃ kacci
atk-s0201a:1992_3: yāpanīyaṃ, kaccittha appakilamathena addhānaṃ āgatā, na ca piṇḍakena kilamittha,
atk-s0201a:1992_4: kuto ca tumhe, bhikkhave, āgacchathā”ti paṭisanthāravasena pucchitā – “bhagavā sākiyajanapade
atk-s0201a:1992_5: kapilavatthāhārato jātibhūmito āgacchāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Atha bhagavā neva suddhodanamahārājassa,
atk-s0201a:1992_6: na sakkodanassa, na sukkodanassa, na dhotodanassa, na amitodanassa, na amittāya deviyā,
atk-s0201a:1992_7: na mahāpajāpatiyā, na sakalassa sākiyamaṇḍalassa ārogyaṃ pucchi. Atha kho attanā
atk-s0201a:1992_8: ca dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ parañca tattha samādapetāraṃ paṭipattisampannaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0201a:1992_9: pucchanto idaṃ – “ko nu kho, bhikkhave”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a:1993_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā suddhodanādīnaṃ ārogyaṃ apucchitvā evarūpaṃ bhikkhumeva pucchati?
atk-s0201a:1993_1: Piyatāya. Buddhānañhi paṭipannakā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo ca piyā honti
atk-s0201a:1993_2: manāpā. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Dhammagarutāya. Dhammagaruno hi tathāgatā, so ca nesaṃ dhammagarubhāvo,
atk-s0201a:1993_3: “dukkhaṃ kho agāravo viharati, appatisso”ti iminā ajapālanigrodhamūle uppannajjhāsayena
atk-s0201a:1993_4: veditabbo. Dhammagarutāyeva hi bhagavā mahākassapattherassa abhinikkhamanadivase
atk-s0201a:1993_5: paccuggamanaṃ karonto tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ agamāsi. Atirekatiyojanasataṃ maggaṃ gantvā
atk-s0201a:1993_6: gaṅgātīre dhammaṃ desetvā mahākappinaṃ saparisaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhapesi. Ekasmiṃ pacchābhatte
atk-s0201a:1993_7: pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ maggaṃ gantvā kumbhakārassa nivesane tiyāmarattiṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0201a:1993_8: katvā pukkusātikulaputtaṃ anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhapesi. Vīsayojanasataṃ gantvā vanavāsisāmaṇerassa
atk-s0201a:1993_9: anuggahaṃ akāsi. Saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ gantvā khadiravaniyattherassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a:1993_10: Anuruddhatthero pācīnavaṃsadāye nisinno mahāpurisavitakkaṃ vitakketīti ñatvā tattha
atk-s0201a:1993_11: ākāsena gantvā therassa purato oruyha sādhukāramadāsi. Koṭikaṇṇasoṇattherassa ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:1993_12: senāsanaṃ paññapāpetvā paccūsakāle dhammadesanaṃ ajjhesitvā sarabhaññapariyosāne
atk-s0201a:1993_13: sādhukāramadāsi. Tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ gantvā tiṇṇaṃ kulaputtānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne gosiṅgasālavane
atk-s0201a:1993_14: sāmaggirasānisaṃsaṃ kathesi. Kassapopi bhagavā – “anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhito ariyasāvako
atk-s0201a:1993_15: aya”nti vissāsaṃ uppādetvā ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa nivesanaṃ gantvā sahatthā āmisaṃ gahetvā paribhuñji.
atk-s0201a:1994_0: Amhākaṃyeva bhagavā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya jetavanato bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0201a:1994_1: cārikaṃ nikkhami. Kosalamahārājaanāthapiṇḍikādayo nivattetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Anāthapiṇḍiko
atk-s0201a:1994_2: gharaṃ āgantvā domanassappatto nisīdi. Atha naṃ puṇṇā nāma dāsī domanassappattosi
atk-s0201a:1994_3: sāmīti āha. “Āma je, satthāraṃ nivattetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, atha me imaṃ temāsaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:1994_4: vā sotuṃ, yathādhippāyaṃ vā dānaṃ dātuṃ na labhissāmī”ti cintā uppannāti. Ahampi
atk-s0201a:1994_5: sāmi satthāraṃ nivattessāmīti. Sace nivattetuṃ sakkosi, bhujissāyeva tvanti. Sā gantvā
atk-s0201a:1994_6: dasabalassa pādamūle nipajjitvā “nivattatha bhagavā”ti āha. Puṇṇe tvaṃ parapaṭibaddhajīvikā
atk-s0201a:1994_7: kiṃ me karissasīti. Bhagavā mayhaṃ deyyadhammo natthīti tumhepi jānātha, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0201a:1994_8: nivattanapaccayā panāhaṃ tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhahissāmīti. Bhagavā
atk-s0201a:1994_9: sādhu sādhu puṇṇeti sādhukāraṃ katvā nivattetvā jetavanameva paviṭṭho. Ayaṃ kathā
atk-s0201a:1994_10: pākaṭā ahosi. Seṭṭhi sutvā puṇṇāya kira bhagavā nivattitoti taṃ bhujissaṃ katvā dhītuṭṭhāne
atk-s0201a:1994_11: ṭhapesi. Sā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbaji, pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhi. Athassā satthā
atk-s0201a:1997: Gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ patvā abhiññātā sāvikā ahosīti. Evaṃ dhammagaruno tathāgatā.
atk-s0201a:1998_0: Nandakatthere upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ dhammaṃ desentepi bhagavā anahātova gantvā tiyāmarattiṃ
atk-s0201a:1998_1: ṭhitakova dhammakathaṃ sutvā desanāpariyosāne sādhukāramadāsi. Thero āgantvā vanditvā,
atk-s0201a:1998_2: “kāya velāya, bhante, āgatatthā”ti pucchi. Tayā suttante āraddhamatteti. Dukkaraṃ
atk-s0201a:1998_3: karittha, bhante, buddhasukhumālā tumheti. Sace tvaṃ, nanda, kappaṃ desetuṃ sakkuṇeyyāsi,
atk-s0201a:1998_4: kappamattampāhaṃ ṭhitakova suṇeyyanti bhagavā avoca. Evaṃ dhammagaruno tathāgatā.
atk-s0201a:1998_5: Tesaṃ dhammagarutāya paṭipannakā piyā honti, tasmā paṭipannake pucchi. Paṭipannako
atk-s0201a:1998_6: ca nāma attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, parahitāya paṭipanno no attahitāya, no
atk-s0201a:1998_7: attahitāya ca paṭipanno no parahitāya ca, attahitāya ca paṭipanno parahitāya cāti catubbidho hoti.
atk-s0201a:1999_0: Tattha yo sayaṃ dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ lābhī hoti, paraṃ tattha na ovadati na anusāsati
atk-s0201a:1999_1: āyasmā bākulo viya. Ayaṃ attahitāya paṭipanno nāma no parahitāya paṭipanno, evarūpaṃ
atk-s0201a:1999_2: bhikkhuṃ bhagavā na pucchati. Kasmā? Na mayhaṃ sāsanassa vaḍḍhipakkhe ṭhitoti.
atk-s0201a:2000_0: Yo pana dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ alābhī, paraṃ tehi ovadati tena katavattasādiyanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2000_1: upanando sakyaputto viya, ayaṃ parahitāya paṭipanno nāma no attahitāya, evarūpampi
atk-s0201a:2000_2: na pucchati. Kasmā? Assa taṇhā mahāpacchi viya appahīnāti.
atk-s0201a:2001_0: Yo attanāpi dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ alābhī, parampi tehi na ovadati, lāḷudāyī viya,
atk-s0201a:2001_1: ayaṃ neva attahitāya paṭipanno na parahitāya, evarūpampi na pucchati. Kasmā? Assa
atk-s0201a:2002_0: Yo pana sayaṃ dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ lābhī, parampi tehi ovadati, ayaṃ attahitāya
atk-s0201a:2002_1: ceva parahitāya ca paṭipanno nāma sāriputtamoggallānamahākassapādayo asītimahātherā
atk-s0201a:2002_2: viya, evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchati. Kasmā? Mayhaṃ sāsanassa vuḍḍhipakkhe ṭhitoti. Idhāpi
atk-s0201a:2003_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā puṭṭhānaṃ pana tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhagavā attano jātibhūmiyaṃ ubhayahitāya
atk-s0201a:2003_1: paṭipannaṃ dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchati, ko nu kho tattha evarūpoti na
atk-s0201a:2003_2: aññamaññaṃ cintanā vā samantanā vā ahosi. Kasmā? Āyasmā hi mantāṇiputto tasmiṃ janapade
atk-s0201a:2003_3: ākāsamajjhe ṭhito cando viya sūriyo viya ca pākaṭo paññāto. Tasmā te bhikkhū meghasaddaṃ
atk-s0201a:2003_4: sutvā ekajjhaṃ sannipatitamoraghaṭā viya ghanasajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ, āraddhabhikkhū viya
atk-s0201a:2003_5: ca attano ācariyaṃ puṇṇattheraṃ bhagavato ārocentā therassa ca guṇaṃ bhāsituṃ appahontehi
atk-s0201a:2003_6: mukhehi ekappahāreneva puṇṇo nāma, bhante, āyasmātiādimāhaṃsu. Tattha puṇṇoti tassa
atk-s0201a:2003_7: therassa nāmaṃ. Mantāṇiyā pana so putto, tasmā mantāṇiputtoti vuccati. Sambhāvitoti
atk-s0201a:2005_0: Appicchoti icchāvirahito niiccho nittaṇho. Ettha hi byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ viya, attho
atk-s0201a:2005_1: pana niravaseso. Na hi tassa anto aṇumattāpi pāpikā icchā nāma atthi. Khīṇāsavo hesa
atk-s0201a:2005_2: sabbaso pahīnataṇho. Apicettha atricchatā pāpicchatā mahicchatā appicchatāti ayaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2006_0: Tattha sakalābhe atittassa paralābhe patthanā atricchatā nāma. Tāya samannāgatassa
atk-s0201a:2006_1: ekabhājena pakkapūvopi attano patte patito na supakko viya khuddako viya ca khāyati.
atk-s0201a:2006_2: Sveva parassa patte pakkhitto supakko viya mahanto viya ca khāyati. Asantaguṇasambhāvanatā
atk-s0201a:2006_3: pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā pāpicchatā nāma, sā, “idhekacco assaddho samāno saddhoti
atk-s0201a:2006_4: maṃ jano jānātū”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva, tāya samannāgato puggalo kohaññe
atk-s0201a:2006_5: patiṭṭhāti. Santaguṇasambhāvanā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā mahicchatā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2006_6: Sāpi, “idhekacco saddho samāno saddhoti maṃ jano jānātūti icchati, sīlavā samāno
atk-s0201a:2006_7: sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti iminā nayena āgatāyeva, tāya samannāgato puggalo dussantappayo
atk-s0201a:2006_8: hoti, vijātamātāpissa cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0201a:2009_0: Santaguṇanigūhanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññutā appicchatā nāma, tāya samannāgato
atk-s0201a:2009_1: puggalo attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya, “saddho samāno saddhoti maṃ
atk-s0201a:2009_2: jano jānātūti na icchati. Sīlavā, pavivitto, bahussuto, āraddhavīriyo, samādhisampanno,
atk-s0201a:2009_3: paññavā, khīṇāsavo samāno khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati, seyyathāpi majjhantikatthero.
atk-s0201a:2010_0: Thero kira mahākhīṇāsavo ahosi, pattacīvaraṃ panassa pādamattameva agghati, so asokassa
atk-s0201a:2010_1: dhammarañño vihāramahadivase saṅghatthero ahosi. Athassa atilūkhabhāvaṃ disvā manussā,
atk-s0201a:2010_2: “bhante, thokaṃ bahi hothā”ti āhaṃsu. Thero, “mādise khīṇāsave rañño saṅgahaṃ akaronte
atk-s0201a:2010_3: añño ko karissatī”ti pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā saṅghattherassa ukkhittapiṇḍaṃ gaṇhantoyeva
atk-s0201a:2010_4: ummujji. Evaṃ khīṇāsavo samāno, “khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2010_5: appiccho pana bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti, uppannaṃ lābhaṃ thāvaraṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:2010_6: dāyakānaṃ cittaṃ ārādheti, yathā yathā hi so attano appicchatāya appaṃ gaṇhāti, tathā
atk-s0201a:2010_7: tathā tassa vatte pasannā manussā bahū denti.
atk-s0201a:2011_0: Aparopi catubbidho appiccho – paccayaappiccho dhutaṅgaappiccho pariyattiappiccho
atk-s0201a:2011_1: adhigamaappicchoti. Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayaappiccho nāma, so dāyakassa
atk-s0201a:2011_2: vasaṃ jānāti, deyyadhammassa vasaṃ jānāti, attano thāmaṃ jānāti. Yadi hi deyyadhammo
atk-s0201a:2011_3: bahu hoti, dāyako appaṃ dātukāmo, dāyakassa vasena appaṃ gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammo appo,
atk-s0201a:2011_4: dāyako bahuṃ dātukāmo, deyyadhammassa vasena appaṃ gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammopi bahu, dāyakopi
atk-s0201a:2011_5: bahuṃ dātukāmo, attano thāmaṃ ñatvā pamāṇeneva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2012_0: Dhutaṅgasamādānassa attani atthibhāvaṃ najānāpetukāmo dhutaṅgaappiccho nāma. Tassa
atk-s0201a:2012_1: vibhāvanatthaṃ imāni vatthūni – sosānikamahāsumanatthero kira saṭṭhi vassāni susāne
atk-s0201a:2012_2: vasi, añño ekabhikkhupi na aññāsi, tenevāha –
atk-s0201a:2014: Dutiyo maṃ na jāneyya, aho sosānikuttamo”ti.
atk-s0201a:2015_0: Cetiyapabbate dvebhātiyattherā vasiṃsu. Tesu kaniṭṭho upaṭṭhākena pesitā ucchukhaṇḍikā
atk-s0201a:2015_1: gahetvā jeṭṭhassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Paribhogaṃ, bhante, karothāti. Therassa ca bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0201a:2015_2: katvā mukhaṃ vikkhālanakālo ahosi. So alaṃ, āvusoti āha. Kacci, bhante, ekāsanikatthāti.
atk-s0201a:2015_3: Āharāvuso, ucchukhaṇḍikāti paññāsa vassāni ekāsaniko samānopi dhutaṅgaṃ nigūhamāno
atk-s0201a:2015_4: paribhogaṃ katvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā puna dhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gato.
atk-s0201a:2016_0: Yo pana sāketakatissatthero viya bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ pariyattiappiccho
atk-s0201a:2016_1: nāma. Thero kira khaṇo natthīti uddesaparipucchāsu okāsaṃ akaronto maraṇakkhayaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2016_2: bhante, labhissathāti codito gaṇaṃ vissajjetvā kaṇikāravālikasamuddavihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0201a:2016_3: Tattha antovassaṃ theranavamajjhimānaṃ upakāro hutvā mahāpavāraṇāya uposathadivase
atk-s0201a:2017: Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ adhigamaappiccho nāma, tayo kulaputtā viya ghaṭikārakumbhakāro viya ca.
atk-s0201a:2018_0: Āyasmā pana puṇṇo atricchataṃ pāpicchataṃ mahicchatañca pahāya sabbaso icchāpaṭipakkhabhūtāya
atk-s0201a:2018_1: alobhasaṅkhātāya parisuddhāya appicchatāya samannāgatattā appiccho nāma ahosi. Bhikkhūnampi,
atk-s0201a:2018_2: “āvuso, atricchatā pāpicchatā mahicchatāti ime dhammā pahātabbā”ti tesu ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0201a:2018_3: dassetvā evarūpaṃ appicchataṃ samādāya vattitabbanti appicchakathaṃ kathesi. Tena
atk-s0201a:2018_4: vuttaṃ “attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca bhikkhūnaṃ kattā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2020_0: Idāni attanā ca santuṭṭhotiādīsu visesatthameva dīpayissāma. Yojanā pana vuttanayeneva
atk-s0201a:2020_1: veditabbā. Santuṭṭhoti itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato. So panesa santoso dvādasavidho
atk-s0201a:2020_2: hoti. Seyyathidaṃ, cīvare yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathasāruppasantosoti
atk-s0201a:2021_0: Idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā. So teneva yāpeti aññaṃ na
atk-s0201a:2021_1: pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa cīvare yathālābhasantoso. Atha yo pakatidubbalo
atk-s0201a:2021_2: vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā, garucīvaraṃ pārupanto kilamati, so sabhāgena bhikkhunā
atk-s0201a:2021_3: saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa cīvare yathābalasantoso.
atk-s0201a:2021_4: Aparo paṇītapaccayalābhī hoti, so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni
atk-s0201a:2021_5: vā pana cīvarāni labhitvā idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ idaṃ bahussutānaṃ anurūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2021_6: idaṃ gilānānaṃ idaṃ appalābhānaṃ hotūti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito
atk-s0201a:2021_7: vā nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa
atk-s0201a:2022_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ
atk-s0201a:2022_1: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana
atk-s0201a:2022_2: attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, yenassa paribhuttena
atk-s0201a:2022_3: aphāsu hoti, so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0201a:2022_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathābalasantoso. Aparo
atk-s0201a:2022_5: bahuṃ paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhigilānānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2022_6: datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2023_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā, so tena neva somanassaṃ
atk-s0201a:2023_1: na paṭighaṃ uppādeti, antamaso tiṇasanthārakenāpi yathāladdheneva tussati, ayamassa
atk-s0201a:2023_2: senāsane yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā
atk-s0201a:2023_3: senāsanaṃ labhati, yatthassa vasato aphāsu hoti, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā
atk-s0201a:2023_4: tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa senāsane yathābalasantoso.
atk-s0201a:2023_5: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati, so tāni
atk-s0201a:2023_6: cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhigilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi
atk-s0201a:2023_7: santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa senāsane yathāsāruppasantoso. Yopi, “uttamasenāsanaṃ nāma
atk-s0201a:2023_8: pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha nisinnassa thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, niddābhibhūtassa puna paṭibujjhato
atk-s0201a:2023_9: pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0201a:2023_10: so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayampissa
atk-s0201a:2024_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so yaṃ labhati, teneva
atk-s0201a:2024_1: santussati, aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathālābhasantoso.
atk-s0201a:2024_2: Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa
atk-s0201a:2024_3: hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā tehi bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova
atk-s0201a:2024_4: hoti, ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathābalasantoso. Aparo mahāpuñño bahuṃ telamadhuphāṇitādipaṇītabhesajjaṃ
atk-s0201a:2024_5: labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhigilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2024_6: ābhatakena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2024_7: ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ, “gaṇha, bhante, yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu
atk-s0201a:2024_8: aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati, atha muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇitanti catumadhuraṃ
atk-s0201a:2024_9: paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakeneva bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa
atk-s0201a:2025_0: Imesaṃ pana paccekaṃ paccayesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ santosānaṃ yathāsāruppasantosova aggo.
atk-s0201a:2025_1: Āyasmā puṇṇo ekekasmiṃ paccaye imehi tīhi santosehi santuṭṭho ahosi. Santuṭṭhikathañcāti
atk-s0201a:2025_2: bhikkhūnampi ca imaṃ santuṭṭhikathaṃ kattāva ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2027_0: Pavivittoti kāyapaviveko cittapaviveko upadhipavivekoti imehi tīhi pavivekehi samannāgato.
atk-s0201a:2027_1: Tattha eko gacchati, eko tiṭṭhati, eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0201a:2027_2: pavisati, eko paṭikkamati, eko caṅkamamadhiṭṭhāti, eko carati, eko viharatīti ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2027_3: kāyapaviveko nāma. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo pana cittapaviveko nāma. Nibbānaṃ upadhipaviveko
atk-s0201a:2027_4: nāma. Vuttampi hetaṃ – “kāyapaviveko ca vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhammābhiratānaṃ. Cittapaviveko
atk-s0201a:2027_5: ca parisuddhacittānaṃ paramavodānappattānaṃ. Upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2027_6: visaṅkhāragatāna”nti. Pavivekakathanti bhikkhūnampi ca imaṃ pavivekakathaṃ kattā.
atk-s0201a:2029_0: Asaṃsaṭṭhoti pañcavidhena saṃsaggena virahito. Savanasaṃsaggo dassanasaṃsaggo samullapanasaṃsaggo
atk-s0201a:2029_1: sambhogasaṃsaggo kāyasaṃsaggoti pañcavidho saṃsaggo. Tesu idha bhikkhu suṇāti, “asukasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2029_2: gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā kumārikā vā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya
atk-s0201a:2029_3: samannāgatā”ti. So taṃ sutvā saṃsīdati visīdati na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2029_4: sikkhādubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā hīnāyāvattatīti evaṃ parehi vā kathīyamānaṃ rūpādisampattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2029_5: attanā vā hasitalapitagītasaddaṃ suṇantassa sotaviññāṇavīthivasena uppanno rāgo savanasaṃsaggo
atk-s0201a:2029_6: nāma. So anitthigandhapaccekabodhisattassa ca pañcaggaḷaleṇavāsītissadaharassa ca vasena veditabbo –
atk-s0201a:2030_0: Daharo kira ākāsena gacchanto girigāmavāsikammāradhītāya pañcahi kumārīhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2030_1: padumasaraṃ gantvā nhatvā padumāni ca pilandhitvā madhurassarena gāyantiyā saddaṃ
atk-s0201a:2030_2: sutvā kāmarāgena viddho visesā parihāyitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇi. Idha bhikkhu na
atk-s0201a:2030_3: heva kho suṇāti, apica kho sāmaṃ passati itthiṃ vā kumāriṃ vā abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2030_4: pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ. So taṃ disvā saṃsīdati visīdati
atk-s0201a:2030_5: na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhādubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā hīnāyāvattatīti
atk-s0201a:2030_6: evaṃ visabhāgarūpaṃ olokentassa pana cakkhuviññāṇavīthivasena uppannarāgo dassanasaṃsaggo
atk-s0201a:2031_0: Eko kira daharo kāladīghavāpidvāravihāraṃ uddesatthāya gato. Ācariyo tassa antarāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2031_1: disvā okāsaṃ na karoti. So punappunnaṃ anubandhati. Ācariyo sace antogāme na carissasi.
atk-s0201a:2031_2: Dassāmi te uddesanti āha. So sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā uddese niṭṭhite ācariyaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0201a:2031_3: gacchanto ācariyo me imasmiṃ gāme carituṃ na deti, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇanti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0201a:2031_4: gāmaṃ pāvisi, ekā kuladhītā pītakavatthaṃ nivāsetvā gehe ṭhitā daharaṃ disvā sañjātarāgā
atk-s0201a:2031_5: uḷuṅkena yāguṃ āharitvā tassa patte pakkhipitvā nivattitvā mañcake nipajji. Atha
atk-s0201a:2031_6: naṃ mātāpitaro kiṃ ammāti pucchiṃsu, dvārena gataṃ daharaṃ labhamānā jīvissāmi, alabhamānā
atk-s0201a:2031_7: marissāmīti. Mātāpitaro vegena gantvā gāmadvāre daharaṃ patvā vanditvā, “nivattatha,
atk-s0201a:2031_8: bhante, bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti āhaṃsu. Daharo alaṃ gacchāmīti. Te, “idaṃ nāma, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2031_9: kāraṇa”nti yācitvā – “amhākaṃ, bhante, gehe ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ atthi, ekāyeva no
atk-s0201a:2031_10: dhītā, tvaṃ no jeṭṭhaputtaṭṭhāne ṭhassasi, sukhena sakkā jīvitu”nti āhaṃsu. Daharo,
atk-s0201a:2031_11: “na mayhaṃ iminā palibodhena attho”ti anādiyitvāva pakkanto.
atk-s0201a:2032_0: Mātāpitaro gantvā, “amma, nāsakkhimhā daharaṃ nivattetuṃ, yaṃ aññaṃ sāmikaṃ icchasi,
atk-s0201a:2032_1: taṃ labhissasi, uṭṭhehi khāda ca piva cā”ti āhaṃsu. Sā anicchantī sattāhaṃ nirāhārā
atk-s0201a:2032_2: hutvā kālamakāsi. Mātāpitaro tassā sarīrakiccaṃ katvā taṃ pītakavatthaṃ dhuravihāre
atk-s0201a:2032_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu, bhikkhū vatthaṃ khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ katvā bhājayiṃsu. Eko mahallako
atk-s0201a:2032_4: attano koṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā kalyāṇīvihāraṃ āgato. Sopi daharo cetiyaṃ vandissāmīti tattheva
atk-s0201a:2032_5: gantvā divāṭṭhāne nisīdi. Mahallako taṃ vatthakhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā, “iminā me parissāvanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2032_6: vicārethā”ti daharaṃ avoca. Daharo mahāthera “kuhiṃ laddha”nti āha. So sabbaṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2032_7: kathesi. So taṃ sutvāva, “evarūpāya nāma saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ nālattha”nti rāgagginā
atk-s0201a:2033_0: Aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena uppannarāgo pana samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma. Bhikkhuno
atk-s0201a:2033_1: bhikkhuniyā santakaṃ, bhikkhuniyā vā bhikkhussa santakaṃ gahetvā paribhogakaraṇavasena
atk-s0201a:2033_2: uppannarāgo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma. So evaṃ veditabbo – maricavaṭṭivihāramahe kira
atk-s0201a:2033_3: bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ navutisahassāni eva ahesuṃ. Eko sāmaṇero uṇhayāguṃ
atk-s0201a:2033_4: gahetvā gacchanto sakiṃ cīvarakaṇṇe ṭhapesi, sakiṃ bhūmiyaṃ. Ekā sāmaṇerī disvā ettha
atk-s0201a:2033_5: pattaṃ ṭhapetvā yāhīti thālakaṃ adāsi. Te aparabhāge ekasmiṃ bhaye uppanne parasamuddaṃ
atk-s0201a:2033_6: agamaṃsu. Tesu bhikkhunī puretaraṃ agamāsi. Sā, “eko kira sīhaḷabhikkhu āgato”ti
atk-s0201a:2033_7: sutvā therassa santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā nisinnā, – “bhante, maricavaṭṭivihāramahakāle
atk-s0201a:2033_8: tumhe kativassā”ti pucchi. Tadāhaṃ sattavassikasāmaṇero. Tvaṃ pana kativassāti? Ahaṃ
atk-s0201a:2033_9: sattavassikasāmaṇerīyeva ekassa sāmaṇerassa uṇhayāguṃ gahetvā gacchantassa pattaṭhapanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2033_10: thālakamadāsinti. Thero, “ahaṃ so”ti vatvā thālakaṃ nīharitvā dassesi. Te ettakeneva
atk-s0201a:2033_11: saṃsaggena brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontā dvepi saṭṭhivassakāle vibbhamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2034_0: Hatthagāhādivasena pana uppannarāgo kāyasaṃsaggo nāma. Tatridaṃ vatthu – mahācetiyaṅgaṇe
atk-s0201a:2034_1: kira daharabhikkhū sajjhāyaṃ gaṇhanti. Tesaṃ piṭṭhipasse daharabhikkhuniyo dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2034_2: suṇanti. Tatreko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento ekissā daharabhikkhuniyā kāyaṃ chupi. Sā
atk-s0201a:2034_3: taṃ hatthaṃ gahetvā attano urasmiṃ ṭhapesi, ettakena saṃsaggena dvepi vibbhamitvā gihibhāvaṃ pattā.
atk-s0201a:2036_0: Imesu pana pañcasu saṃsaggesu bhikkhuno bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ savanadassanasamullapanasambhogakāyaparāmāsā
atk-s0201a:2036_1: niccampi hontiyeva, bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ ṭhapetvā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sesā kālena kālaṃ
atk-s0201a:2036_2: honti; tathā upāsakaupāsikāhi saddhiṃ sabbepi kālena kālaṃ honti. Tesu hi kilesuppattito
atk-s0201a:2036_3: cittaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ. Eko hi bhikkhu gāhagāhako hoti, eko gāhamuttako, eko muttagāhako, eko muttamuttako.
atk-s0201a:2037_0: Tattha yaṃ bhikkhuṃ manussāpi āmisena upalāpetvā gahaṇavasena upasaṅkamanti, bhikkhupi
atk-s0201a:2037_1: pupphaphalādīhi upalāpetvā gahaṇavasena upasaṅkamati, ayaṃ gāhagāhako nāma. Yaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:2037_2: manussā vuttanayena upasaṅkamanti, bhikkhu dakkhiṇeyyavasena upasaṅkamati, ayaṃ gāhamuttako
atk-s0201a:2037_3: nāma. Yassa manussā dakkhiṇeyyavasena cattāro paccaye denti, bhikkhu pupphaphalādīhi
atk-s0201a:2037_4: upalāpetvā gahaṇavasena upasaṅkamati, ayaṃ muttagāhako nāma. Yassa manussāpi dakkhiṇeyyavasena
atk-s0201a:2037_5: cattāro paccaye denti, bhikkhupi cūḷapiṇḍapātiyatissatthero viya dakkhiṇeyyavasena
atk-s0201a:2038_0: Theraṃ kira ekā upāsikā dvādasa vassāni upaṭṭhahi. Ekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ gāme aggi uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0201a:2038_1: gehāni jhāpesi. Aññesaṃ kulūpakabhikkhū āgantvā – “kiṃ upāsike, api kiñci bhaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2038_2: arogaṃ kātuṃ asakkhitthā”ti paṭisanthāraṃ akaṃsu. Manussā, “amhākaṃ mātu kulūpakatthero
atk-s0201a:2038_3: bhuñjanavelāyameva āgamissatī”ti āhaṃsu. Theropi punadivase bhikkhācāravelaṃ sallakkhetvāva
atk-s0201a:2038_4: āgato. Upāsikā koṭṭhacchāyāya nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ sampādetvā adāsi. There bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0201a:2038_5: katvā pakkante manussā āhaṃsu – “amhākaṃ mātu kulūpakatthero bhuñjanavelāyameva āgato”ti.
atk-s0201a:2038_6: Upāsikā, “tumhākaṃ kulūpakā tumhākaṃyeva anucchavikā, mayhaṃ thero mayheva anucchaviko”ti
atk-s0201a:2038_7: āha. Āyasmā pana mantāṇiputto imehi pañcahi saṃsaggehi catūhipi parisāhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2038_8: asaṃsaṭṭho gāhamuttako ceva muttamuttako ca ahosi. Yathā ca sayaṃ asaṃsaṭṭho, evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2039_0: Āraddhavīriyoti paggahitavīriyo, paripuṇṇakāyikacetasikavīriyoti attho. Yo hi bhikkhu
atk-s0201a:2039_1: gamane uppannakilesaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti, ṭhāne uppannakilesaṃ nisajjaṃ, nisajjāya
atk-s0201a:2039_2: uppannakilesaṃ sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti, mantena kaṇhasappaṃ uppīḷetvā gaṇhanto
atk-s0201a:2039_3: viya, amittaṃ gīvāya akkamanto viya ca vicarati, ayaṃ āraddhavīriyo nāma. Thero ca
atk-s0201a:2039_4: tādiso ahosi. Bhikkhūnampi tatheva vīriyārambhakathaṃ kattā ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2040_0: Sīlasampannotiādīsu sīlanti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Samādhīti vipassanāpādakā aṭṭha
atk-s0201a:2040_1: samāpattiyo. Paññāti lokiyalokuttarañāṇaṃ. Vimuttīti ariyaphalaṃ. Vimuttiñāṇadassananti
atk-s0201a:2040_2: ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Thero sayampi sīlādīhi sampanno ahosi bhikkhūnampi
atk-s0201a:2040_3: sīlādikathaṃ kattā. Svāyaṃ dasahi kathāvatthūhi ovadatīti ovādako. Yathā pana eko
atk-s0201a:2040_4: ovadatiyeva, sukhumaṃ atthaṃ parivattetvā jānāpetuṃ na sakkoti. Na evaṃ thero. Thero
atk-s0201a:2040_5: pana tāni dasa kathāvatthūni viññāpetīti viññāpako. Eko viññāpetuṃ sakkoti, kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2040_6: dassetuṃ na sakkoti. Thero kāraṇampi sandassetīti sandassako. Eko vijjamānaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2040_7: dasseti, gāhetuṃ pana na sakkoti. Thero gāhetumpi sakkotīti samādapako. Evaṃ samādapetvā
atk-s0201a:2040_8: pana tesu kathāvatthūsu ussāhajananavasena bhikkhū samuttejetīti samuttejako. Ussāhajāte
atk-s0201a:2042_0: 253. Suladdhalābhāti aññesampi manussattabhāvapabbajjādiguṇalābhā nāma honti. Āyasmato
atk-s0201a:2042_1: pana puṇṇassa suladdhalābhā ete, yassa satthu sammukhā evaṃ vaṇṇo abbhuggatoti attho.
atk-s0201a:2042_2: Apica apaṇḍitehi vaṇṇakathanaṃ nāma na tathā lābho, paṇḍitehi vaṇṇakathanaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:2042_3: lābho. Gihī hi vā vaṇṇakathanaṃ na tathā lābho, gihī hi “vaṇṇaṃ kathessāmī”ti, “amhākaṃ
atk-s0201a:2042_4: ayyo saṇho sakhilo sukhasambhāso, vihāraṃ āgatānaṃ yāgubhattaphāṇitādīhi saṅgahaṃ
atk-s0201a:2042_5: karotī”ti kathento avaṇṇameva katheti. “Avaṇṇaṃ kathessāmī”ti “ayaṃ thero mandamando
atk-s0201a:2042_6: viya abalabalo viya bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viya natthi iminā saddhiṃ vissāso”ti kathento
