atk-s0201a:2151_5: ākiñcaññāyatane nibbattoti addasa. Taṃ sandhāyāha – “ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2151_6: Mahājāniyoti sattadivasabbhantare pattabbamaggaphalato parihīnattā mahatī jāni assāti
atk-s0201a:2151_7: mahājāniyo. Akkhaṇe nibbattattā gantvā desiyamānaṃ dhammampissa sotuṃ sotappasādo
atk-s0201a:2151_8: natthi, idha dhammadesanaṭṭhānaṃ āgamanapādāpi natthi, evaṃ mahājāniyo jātoti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2151_9: Abhidosakālaṅkatoti aḍḍharatte kālaṅkato. Ñāṇañca pana meti mayhampi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2151_10: udapādi. Idhāpi kira bhagavā devatāya vacanena sanniṭṭhānaṃ akatvā sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0201a:2151_11: olokento “hiyyo aḍḍharatte kālaṅkatvā udako rāmaputto nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nibbatto”ti
atk-s0201a:2151_12: addasa. Tasmā evamāha. Sesaṃ purimanayasadisameva. Bahukārāti bahūpakārā. Padhānapahitattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2151_13: upaṭṭhahiṃsūti padhānatthāya pesitattabhāvaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne pariveṇasammajjanena pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2151_14: gahetvā anubandhanena mukhodakadantakaṭṭhadānādinā ca upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Ke pana te pañcavaggiyā nāma? Yete –
atk-s0201a:2156_0: Bodhisattassa jātakāle supinapaṭiggāhakā ceva lakkhaṇapaṭiggāhakā ca aṭṭha brāhmaṇā.
atk-s0201a:2156_1: Tesu tayo dvedhā byākariṃsu – “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasamāno
atk-s0201a:2156_2: rājā hoti cakkavattī, pabbajamāno buddho”ti. Pañca brāhmaṇā ekaṃsabyākaraṇā ahesuṃ
atk-s0201a:2156_3: – “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāre na tiṭṭhati, buddhova hotī”ti. Tesu purimā
atk-s0201a:2156_4: tayo yathāmantapadaṃ gatā, ime pana pañca mantapadaṃ atikkantā. Te attanā laddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2156_5: puṇṇapattaṃ ñātakānaṃ vissajjetvā “ayaṃ mahāpuriso agāraṃ na ajjhāvasissati, ekantena
atk-s0201a:2156_6: buddho bhavissatī”ti nibbitakkā bodhisattaṃ uddissa samaṇapabbajjaṃ pabbajitā. Tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2157_0: Ete kira daharakāleyeva bahū mante jāniṃsu, tasmā te brāhmaṇā ācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2157_1: Te pacchā amhehi puttadārajaṭaṃ chaḍḍetvā na sakkā bhavissati pabbajitunti daharakāleyeva
atk-s0201a:2157_2: pabbajitvā ramaṇīyāni senāsanāni paribhuñjantā vicariṃsu. Kālena kālaṃ pana “kiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2157_3: bho, mahāpuriso mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto”ti pucchanti. Manussā, “kuhiṃ tumhe
atk-s0201a:2157_4: mahāpurisaṃ passissatha, tīsu pāsādesu tividhanāṭakamajjhe devo viya sampattiṃ anubhotī”ti
atk-s0201a:2157_5: vadanti. Te sutvā, “na tāva mahāpurisassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gacchatī”ti appossukkā
atk-s0201a:2157_6: vihariṃsuyeva. Kasmā panettha bhagavā, “bahukārā kho ime pañcavaggiyā”ti āha? Kiṃ
atk-s0201a:2157_7: upakārakānaṃyeva esa dhammaṃ deseti, anupakārakānaṃ na desetīti? No na deseti. Paricayavasena
atk-s0201a:2157_8: hesa āḷārañceva kālāmaṃ udakañca rāmaputtaṃ olokesi. Etasmiṃ pana buddhakkhette ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2157_9: aññāsikoṇḍaññaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Kasmā? Tathāvidhaupanissayattā.
atk-s0201a:2158_0: Pubbe kira puññakaraṇakāle dve bhātaro ahesuṃ. Te ekatova sassaṃ akaṃsu. Tattha jeṭṭhakassa
atk-s0201a:2158_1: “ekasmiṃ sasse navavāre aggasassadānaṃ mayā dātabba”nti ahosi. So vappakāle bījaggaṃ
atk-s0201a:2158_2: nāma datvā gabbhakāle kaniṭṭhena saddhiṃ mantesi – “gabbhakāle gabbhaṃ phāletvā dassāmā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2158_3: Kaniṭṭho “taruṇasassaṃ nāsetukāmosī”ti āha. Jeṭṭho kaniṭṭhassa ananuvattanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2158_4: ñatvā khettaṃ vibhajitvā attano koṭṭhāsato gabbhaṃ phāletvā khīraṃ nīharitvā sappiphāṇitehi
atk-s0201a:2158_5: yojetvā adāsi, puthukakāle puthukaṃ kāretvā adāsi, lāyane lāyanaggaṃ veṇikaraṇe veṇaggaṃ
atk-s0201a:2158_6: kalāpādīsu kalāpaggaṃ khaḷaggaṃ bhaṇḍaggaṃ koṭṭhagganti evaṃ ekasasse navavāre aggadānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2158_7: adāsi. Kaniṭṭho panassa uddharitvā adāsi, tesu jeṭṭho aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero jāto,
atk-s0201a:2158_8: kaniṭṭho subhaddaparibbājako. Iti ekasmiṃ sasse navannaṃ aggadānānaṃ dinnattā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2158_9: theraṃ añño paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. “Bahukārā kho ime
atk-s0201a:2159_0: Isipatane migadāyeti tasmiṃ kira padese anuppanne buddhe paccekasambuddhā gandhamādanapabbate
atk-s0201a:2159_1: sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā vītināmetvā nirodhā vuṭṭhāya nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā
atk-s0201a:2159_2: anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā pattacīvaramādāya ākāsena āgantvā nipatanti. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2159_3: cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakiccā gamanakālepi tatoyeva uppatitvā
atk-s0201a:2159_4: gacchanti. Iti isayo ettha nipatanti uppatanti cāti taṃ ṭhānaṃ isipatananti saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2159_5: gataṃ. Migānaṃ pana abhayatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “isipatane migadāye”ti.
atk-s0201a:2160_0: 285. Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti gayāya ca bodhissa ca vivare tigāvutantare
atk-s0201a:2160_1: ṭhāne. Bodhimaṇḍato hi gayā tīṇi gāvutāni. Bārāṇasī aṭṭhārasa yojanāni. Upako bodhimaṇḍassa
atk-s0201a:2160_2: ca gayāya ca antare bhagavantaṃ addasa. Antarāsaddena pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2160_3: kataṃ. Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva
atk-s0201a:2160_4: antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti. So dutiyapadenapi yojetabbo hoti. Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2160_5: na pāpuṇāti. Idha pana yojetvā eva vuttoti. Addhānamaggapaṭipannanti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0201a:2160_6: maggaṃ paṭipannaṃ, dīghamaggapaṭipannanti attho. Addhānamaggagamanasamayassa hi vibhaṅge
atk-s0201a:2161_0: Sabbābhibhūti sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhito. Sabbavidūti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2161_1: avediṃ aññāsiṃ. Sabbesu dhammesu anupalittoti sabbesu tebhūmakadhammesu kilesalepanena
atk-s0201a:2161_2: anupalitto. Sabbaṃ jahoti sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ jahitvā ṭhito. Taṇhākkhaye vimuttoti
atk-s0201a:2161_3: taṇhākkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto. Sayaṃ abhiññāyāti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2161_4: attanāva jānitvā. Kamuddiseyyanti kaṃ aññaṃ “ayaṃ me ācariyo”ti uddiseyyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2162_0: Na me ācariyo atthīti lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthi. Natthi me paṭipuggaloti
atk-s0201a:2162_1: mayhaṃ paṭibhāgapuggalo nāma natthi. Sammāsambuddhoti sahetunā nayena cattāri saccāni
atk-s0201a:2162_2: sayaṃ buddho. Sītibhūtoti sabbakilesagginibbāpanena sītibhūto. Kilesānaṃyeva nibbutattā
atk-s0201a:2162_3: nibbuto. Kāsinaṃ puranti kāsiraṭṭhe nagaraṃ. Āhañchaṃ amatadundubhinti dhammacakkapaṭilābhāya
atk-s0201a:2162_4: amatabheriṃ paharissāmīti gacchāmi. Arahasi anantajinoti anantajinoti bhavituṃ yutto.
atk-s0201a:2162_5: Hupeyya pāvusoti, āvuso, evampi nāma bhaveyya. Pakkāmīti vaṅkahārajanapadaṃ nāma agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2163_0: Tatthekaṃ migaluddakagāmakaṃ nissāya vāsaṃ kappesi. Jeṭṭhakaluddako taṃ upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2163_1: Tasmiñca janapade caṇḍā makkhikā honti. Atha naṃ ekāya cāṭiyā vasāpesuṃ, migaluddako
atk-s0201a:2163_2: dūre migavaṃ gacchanto “amhākaṃ arahante mā pamajjī”ti chāvaṃ nāma dhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā
atk-s0201a:2163_3: agamāsi saddhiṃ puttabhātukehi. Sā cassa dhītā dassanīyā hoti koṭṭhāsasampannā. Dutiyadivase
atk-s0201a:2163_4: upako gharaṃ āgato taṃ dārikaṃ sabbaṃ upacāraṃ katvā parivisituṃ upagataṃ disvā rāgena
atk-s0201a:2163_5: abhibhūto bhuñjitumpi asakkonto bhājanena bhattaṃ ādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2163_6: ekamante nikkhipitvā sace chāvaṃ labhāmi, jīvāmi, no ce, marāmīti nirāhāro sayi.
atk-s0201a:2163_7: Sattame divase māgaviko āgantvā dhītaraṃ upakassa pavattiṃ pucchi. Sā “ekadivasameva
atk-s0201a:2163_8: āgantvā puna nāgatapubbo”ti āha. Māgaviko āgataveseneva naṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāmīti
atk-s0201a:2163_9: taṃkhaṇaṃyeva gantvā “kiṃ, bhante, apphāsuka”nti pāde parāmasanto pucchi. Upako nitthunanto
atk-s0201a:2163_10: parivattatiyeva. So “vadatha bhante, yaṃ mayā sakkā kātuṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2163_11: āha. Upako, “sace chāvaṃ labhāmi, jīvāmi, no ce, idheva maraṇaṃ seyyo”ti āha. Jānāsi
atk-s0201a:2163_12: pana, bhante, kiñci sippanti. Na jānāmīti. Na, bhante, kiñci sippaṃ ajānantena sakkā
atk-s0201a:2164_0: So āha – “nāhaṃ kiñci sippaṃ jānāmi, apica tumhākaṃ maṃsahārako bhavissāmi, maṃsañca
atk-s0201a:2164_1: vikkīṇissāmī”ti. Māgaviko, “amhākampi etadeva ruccatī”ti uttarasāṭakaṃ datvā gharaṃ
atk-s0201a:2164_2: ānetvā dhītaraṃ adāsi. Tesaṃ saṃvāsamanvāya putto vijāyi. Subhaddotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2164_3: Chāvā tassa rodanakāle “maṃsahārakassa putta, migaluddakassa putta mā rodī”tiādīni
atk-s0201a:2164_4: vadamānā puttatosanagītena upakaṃ uppaṇḍesi. Bhadde tvaṃ maṃ anāthoti maññasi. Atthi
atk-s0201a:2164_5: me anantajino nāma sahāyo. Tassāhaṃ santike gamissāmīti āha. Chāvā evamayaṃ aṭṭīyatīti
atk-s0201a:2164_6: ñatvā punappunaṃ katheti. So ekadivasaṃ anārocetvāva majjhimadesābhimukho pakkāmi.
atk-s0201a:2165_0: Bhagavā ca tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane mahāvihāre. Atha kho bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2165_1: paṭikacceva bhikkhū āṇāpesi – “yo, bhikkhave, ‘anantajino’ti pucchamāno āgacchati,
atk-s0201a:2165_2: tassa maṃ dasseyyāthā”ti. Upakopi kho “kuhiṃ anantajino vasatī”ti pucchanto anupubbena
atk-s0201a:2165_3: sāvatthiṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe ṭhatvā kuhiṃ anantajinoti pucchi. Taṃ bhikkhū bhagavato
atk-s0201a:2165_4: santikaṃ nayiṃsu. So bhagavantaṃ disvā – “sañjānātha maṃ bhagavā”ti āha. Āma, upaka,
atk-s0201a:2165_5: sañjānāmi, kuhiṃ pana tvaṃ vasitthāti. Vaṅkahārajanapade, bhanteti. Upaka, mahallakosi
atk-s0201a:2165_6: jāto pabbajituṃ sakkhissasīti. Pabbajissāmi, bhanteti. Bhagavā pabbājetvā tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2165_7: adāsi. So kammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karonto anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya kālaṃ katvā avihesu
atk-s0201a:2165_8: nibbatto. Nibbattakkhaṇeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti. Avihesu nibbattamattā hi satta janā
atk-s0201a:2169: Upako palagaṇḍo ca, pukkusāti ca te tayo;
atk-s0201a:2170: Bhaddiyo khaṇḍadevo ca, bahuraggi ca saṅgiyo;
atk-s0201a:2171: Te hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upajjhagu”nti. ;
atk-s0201a:2172_0: 286. Saṇṭhapesunti katikaṃ akaṃsu. Bāhullikoti cīvarabāhullādīnaṃ atthāya paṭipanno.
atk-s0201a:2172_1: Padhānavibbhantoti padhānato vibbhanto bhaṭṭho parihīno. Āvatto bāhullāyāti cīvarādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2172_2: bahulabhāvatthāya āvatto. Apica kho āsanaṃ ṭhapetabbanti apica kho panassa uccakule
atk-s0201a:2172_3: nibbattassa āsanamattaṃ ṭhapetabbanti vadiṃsu. Nāsakkhiṃsūti buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā
atk-s0201a:2172_4: abhibhūtā attano katikāya ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācarantīti
atk-s0201a:2172_5: gotamāti, āvusoti ca vadanti. Āvuso gotama, mayaṃ uruvelāyaṃ padhānakāle tuyhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2172_6: gahetvā vicarimhā, mukhodakaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ adamhā, vutthapariveṇaṃ sammajjimhā, pacchā
atk-s0201a:2172_7: ko te vattappaṭipattimakāsi, kacci amhesu pakkantesu na cintayitthāti evarūpiṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2172_8: kathentīti attho. Iriyāyāti dukkarairiyāya. Paṭipadāyāti dukkarapaṭipattiyā. Dukkarakārikāyāti
atk-s0201a:2172_9: pasatapasata-muggayūsādiāharakaraṇādinā dukkarakaraṇena. Abhijānātha me noti abhijānātha
atk-s0201a:2172_10: nu mama. Evarūpaṃ pabhāvitametanti etaṃ evarūpaṃ vākyabhedanti attho. Api nu ahaṃ
atk-s0201a:2172_11: uruvelāya padhāne tumhākaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ anukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ rattiṃ vā divā vā āgantvā,
atk-s0201a:2172_12: – “āvuso, mā vitakkayittha, mayhaṃ obhāso vā nimittaṃ vā paññāyatī”ti evarūpaṃ kañci
atk-s0201a:2172_13: vacanabhedaṃ akāsinti adhippāyo. Te ekapadeneva satiṃ labhitvā uppannagāravā, “handa
atk-s0201a:2172_14: addhā esa buddho jāto”ti saddahitvā no hetaṃ, bhanteti āhaṃsu. Asakkhiṃ kho ahaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2172_15: bhikkhave, pañcavaggiye bhikkhū saññāpetunti ahaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcavaggiye bhikkhū
atk-s0201a:2172_16: buddho ahanti jānāpetuṃ asakkhiṃ. Tadā pana bhagavā uposathadivaseyeva āgacchi. Attano
atk-s0201a:2172_17: buddhabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā koṇḍaññattheraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2172_18: kathesi. Suttapariyosāne thero aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2172_19: Sūriye dharamāneyeva desanā niṭṭhāsi. Bhagavā tattheva vassaṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0201a:2173_0: Dvepi sudaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū ovadāmītiādi pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya piṇḍapātatthāyapi
atk-s0201a:2173_1: gāmaṃ appavisanadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tesañhi bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṭṭhānesu uppannamalavisodhanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2173_2: bhagavā antovihāreyeva ahosi. Uppanne uppanne kammaṭṭhānamale tepi bhikkhū bhagavato
atk-s0201a:2173_3: santikaṃ gantvā pucchanti. Bhagavāpi tesaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā malaṃ vinodeti.
atk-s0201a:2173_4: Atha nesaṃ bhagavatā evaṃ nīhaṭabhattena ovadiyamānānaṃ vappatthero pāṭipadadivase
atk-s0201a:2173_5: sotāpanno ahosi. Bhaddiyatthero dutiyāyaṃ, mahānāmatthero tatiyāyaṃ, assajitthero
atk-s0201a:2173_6: catutthiyaṃ. Pakkhassa pana pañcamiyaṃ sabbeva te ekato sannipātetvā anattalakkhaṇasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2173_7: kathesi, suttapariyosāne sabbepi arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tenāha – “atha kho,
atk-s0201a:2173_8: bhikkhave, pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū mayā evaṃ ovadiyamānā…pe… anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2173_9: ajjhagamaṃsu…pe… natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. Ettakaṃ kathāmaggaṃ bhagavā yaṃ pubbe
atk-s0201a:2173_10: avaca – “tumhepi mamañceva pañcavaggiyānañca maggaṃ āruḷhā, ariyapariyesanā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0201a:2173_11: pariyesanā”ti imaṃ ekameva anusandhiṃ dassento āhari.
atk-s0201a:2174_0: 287. Idāni yasmā na agāriyānaṃyeva pañcakāmaguṇapariyesanā hoti, anagāriyānampi cattāro
atk-s0201a:2174_1: paccaye appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantānaṃ pañcakāmaguṇavasena anariyapariyesanā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2174_2: tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ pañcime, bhikkhave, kāmaguṇātiādimāha. Tattha navarattesu pattacīvarādīsu
atk-s0201a:2174_3: cakkhuviññeyyā rūpātiādayo cattāro kāmaguṇā labbhanti. Raso panettha paribhogaraso
atk-s0201a:2174_4: hoti. Manuññe piṇḍapāte bhesajje ca pañcapi labbhanti. Senāsanamhi cīvare viya cattāro.
atk-s0201a:2174_5: Raso pana etthāpi paribhogarasova. Ye hi keci, bhikkhaveti kasmā ārabhi? Evaṃ pañca
atk-s0201a:2174_6: kāmaguṇe dassetvā idāni ye evaṃ vadeyyuṃ, “pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya anariyapariyesanā
atk-s0201a:2174_7: nāma kuto, ariyapariyesanāva pabbajitāna”nti, tesaṃ paṭisedhanatthāya “pabbajitānampi
atk-s0201a:2174_8: catūsu paccayesu appaccavekkhaṇaparibhogo anariyapariyesanā evā”ti dassetuṃ imaṃ
atk-s0201a:2174_9: desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha gadhitāti taṇhāgedhena gadhitā. Mucchitāti taṇhāmucchāya mucchitā.
atk-s0201a:2174_10: Ajjhopannāti taṇhāya ajjhogāḷhā. Anādīnavadassāvinoti ādīnavaṃ apassantā. Anissaraṇapaññāti
atk-s0201a:2174_11: nissaraṇaṃ vuccati paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Te tena virahitā.
atk-s0201a:2175_0: Idāni tassatthassa sādhakaṃ upamaṃ dassento seyyathāpi, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tatrevaṃ
atk-s0201a:2175_1: opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ – āraññakamago viya hi samaṇabrāhmaṇā, luddakena araññe
atk-s0201a:2175_2: ṭhapitapāso viya cattāro paccayā, tassa luddassa pāsarāsiṃ ajjhottharitvā sayanakālo
atk-s0201a:2175_3: viya tesaṃ cattāro paccaye appaccavekkhitvā paribhogakālo. Luddake āgacchante magassa
atk-s0201a:2175_4: yena kāmaṃ agamanakālo viya samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyakālo, māravasaṃ
atk-s0201a:2175_5: upagatabhāvoti attho. Magassa pana abaddhassa pāsarāsiṃ adhisayitakālo viya samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2175_6: catūsu paccayesu paccavekkhaṇaparibhogo, luddake āgacchante magassa yena kāmaṃ gamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2175_7: viya samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ māravasaṃ anupagamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vissatthoti nibbhayo nirāsaṅko.
atk-s0201a:2180_0: 288. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṃ. Tattha sabbasetena vaḷavābhirathenāti,
atk-s0201a:2180_1: “setā sudaṃ assā yuttā honti setālaṅkārā. Seto ratho setālaṅkāro setaparivāro, setā
atk-s0201a:2180_2: rasmiyo, setā patodalaṭṭhi, setaṃ chattaṃ, setaṃ uṇhīsaṃ, setāni vatthāni, setā upāhanā,
atk-s0201a:2180_3: setāya sudaṃ vālabījaniyā bījiyatī”ti evaṃ vuttena sakalasetena catūhi vaḷavāhi yuttarathena.
atk-s0201a:2181_0: Ratho ca nāmeso duvidho hoti – yodharatho, alaṅkārarathoti. Tattha yodharatho caturassasaṇṭhāno
atk-s0201a:2181_1: hoti nātimahā, dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā janānaṃ gahaṇasamattho. Alaṅkāraratho mahā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2181_2: dīghato dīgho, puthulato puthulo. Tattha chattaggāhako vālabījaniggāhako tālavaṇṭaggāhakoti
atk-s0201a:2181_3: evaṃ aṭṭha vā dasa vā sukhena ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā sakkonti, ayampi
atk-s0201a:2181_4: alaṅkārarathoyeva. So sabbo sacakkapañjarakubbaro rajataparikkhitto ahosi. Vaḷavā
atk-s0201a:2181_5: pakatiyā setavaṇṇāva. Pasādhanampi tādisaṃ rajatamayaṃ ahosi. Rasmiyopi rajatapanāḷi
atk-s0201a:2181_6: suparikkhittā. Patodalaṭṭhipi rajataparikkhittā. Brāhmaṇopi setavatthaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0201a:2181_7: setaṃyeva uttarāsaṅgamakāsi, setavilepanaṃ vilimpi, setamālaṃ pilandhi, dasasu aṅgulīsu
atk-s0201a:2181_8: aṅgulimuddikā, kaṇṇesu kuṇḍalānīti evamādialaṅkāropissa rajatamayova ahosi. Parivārabrāhmaṇāpissa
atk-s0201a:2181_9: dasasahassamattā tatheva setavatthavilepanamālālaṅkārā ahesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “sabbasetena
atk-s0201a:2182_0: Sāvatthiyā niyyātīti so kira channaṃ channaṃ māsānaṃ ekavāraṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2182_1: karoti. Ito ettakehi divasehi nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karissatīti puretarameva ghosanā
atk-s0201a:2182_2: karīyati; taṃ sutvā ye nagarato na pakkantā, te na pakkamanti. Ye pakkantā, tepi,
atk-s0201a:2182_3: “puññavato sirisampattiṃ passissāmā”ti āgacchanti. Yaṃ divasaṃ brāhmaṇo nagaraṃ anuvicarati,
atk-s0201a:2182_4: tadā pātova nagaravīthiyo sammajjitvā vālikaṃ okiritvā lājapañcamehi pupphehi abhippakiritvā
atk-s0201a:2182_5: puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapetvā kadaliyo ca dhaje ca ussāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ dhūpitavāsitaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:2182_6: Brāhmaṇo pātova sīsaṃ nhāyitvā purebhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vuttanayeneva setavatthādīhi
atk-s0201a:2182_7: attānaṃ alaṅkaritvā pāsādā oruyha rathaṃ abhiruhati. Atha naṃ te brāhmaṇā sabbasetavatthavilepanamālālaṅkārā
atk-s0201a:2182_8: setacchattāni gahetvā parivārenti; tato mahājanassa sannipātanatthaṃ paṭhamaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2182_9: taruṇadārakānaṃ phalāphalāni vikiritvā tadanantaraṃ māsakarūpāni; tadanantaraṃ kahāpaṇe
atk-s0201a:2182_10: vikiranti; mahājanā sannipatanti. Ukkuṭṭhiyo ceva celukkhepā ca pavattanti. Atha
atk-s0201a:2182_11: brāhmaṇo maṅgalikasovatthikādīsu maṅgalāni ceva suvatthiyo ca karontesu mahāsampattiyā
atk-s0201a:2182_12: nagaraṃ anuvicarati. Puññavantā manussā ekabhūmakādipāsāde āruyha sukapattasadisāni
atk-s0201a:2182_13: vātapānakavāṭāni vivaritvā olokenti. Brāhmaṇopi attano yasasirisampattiyā nagaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2182_14: ajjhottharanto viya dakkhiṇadvārābhimukho hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “sāvatthiyā niyyātī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2183_0: Divā divassāti divasassa divā, majjhanhakāleti attho. Pilotikaṃ paribbājakanti pilotikāti
atk-s0201a:2183_1: evaṃ itthiliṅgavohāravasena laddhanāmaṃ paribbājakaṃ. So kira paribbājako daharo
atk-s0201a:2183_2: paṭhamavaye ṭhito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo buddhupaṭṭhāko, pātova tathāgatassa ceva mahātherānañca
atk-s0201a:2183_3: upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā tidaṇḍakuṇḍikādiparikkhāraṃ ādāya jetavanā nikkhamitvā nagarābhimukho
atk-s0201a:2183_4: pāyāsi. Taṃ esa dūratova āgacchantaṃ addasa. Etadavocāti anukkamena santikaṃ āgataṃ
atk-s0201a:2183_5: sañjānitvā etaṃ, “handa kuto nu bhavaṃ vacchāyano āgacchatī”ti gottaṃ kittento vacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2183_6: avoca. Paṇḍito maññeti bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paṇḍitoti maññati, udāhu
atk-s0201a:2184_0: Ko cāhaṃ, bhoti, bho, samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānane ahaṃ ko nāma? Ko
atk-s0201a:2184_1: ca samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānissāmīti kuto cāhaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0201a:2184_2: paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānissāmi, kena kāraṇena jānissāmīti? Evaṃ sabbathāpi attano ajānanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2184_3: dīpeti. Sopi nūnassa tādisovāti yo samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jāneyya,
atk-s0201a:2184_4: sopi nūna dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto tādiso buddhoyeva bhaveyya. Sineruṃ
atk-s0201a:2184_5: vā himavantaṃ vā pathaviṃ vā ākāsaṃ vā pametukāmena tappamāṇova daṇḍo vā rajju vā
atk-s0201a:2184_6: laddhuṃ vaṭṭati. Samaṇassa gotamassa paññaṃ jānantenapi tassa ñāṇasadisameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2184_7: laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Ādaravasena panettha āmeḍitaṃ kataṃ. Uḷārāyāti uttarāya
atk-s0201a:2184_8: seṭṭhāya. Ko cāhaṃ, bhoti, bho, ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa pasaṃsane ko nāma? Ko ca
atk-s0201a:2184_9: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsissāmīti kena kāraṇena pasaṃsissāmi? Pasatthapasatthoti sabbaguṇānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2184_10: uttaritarehi sabbalokapasatthehi attano guṇeheva pasattho, na tassa aññehi pasaṃsanakiccaṃ
atk-s0201a:2184_11: atthi. Yathā hi campakapupphaṃ vā nīluppalaṃ vā padumaṃ vā lohitacandanaṃ vā attano
atk-s0201a:2184_12: vaṇṇagandhasiriyāva pāsādikañceva sugandhañca, na tassa āgantukehi vaṇṇagandhehi
atk-s0201a:2184_13: thomanakiccaṃ atthi. Yathā ca maṇiratanaṃ vā candamaṇḍalaṃ vā attano ālokeneva obhāsati,
atk-s0201a:2184_14: na tassa aññena obhāsanakiccaṃ atthi. Evaṃ samaṇo gotamo sabbalokapasatthehi attano
atk-s0201a:2184_15: guṇeheva pasattho thomito sabbalokassa seṭṭhataṃ pāpito, na tassa aññena pasaṃsanakiccaṃ
atk-s0201a:2185_0: Ke pasatthā nāma? Rājā pasenadi kosalo kāsikosalavāsikehi pasattho, bimbisāro aṅgamagadhavāsīhi.
atk-s0201a:2185_1: Vesālikā licchavī vajjiraṭṭhavāsīhi pasatthā. Pāveyyakā mallā, kosinārakā mallā,
atk-s0201a:2185_2: aññepi te te khattiyā tehi tehi jānapadehi pasatthā. Caṅkīādayo brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇagaṇehi,
atk-s0201a:2185_3: anāthapiṇḍikādayo upāsakā anekasatehi upāsakagaṇehi, visākhādayo upāsikā anekasatāhi
atk-s0201a:2185_4: upāsikāhi, sakuludāyiādayo paribbājakā anekehi paribbājakasatehi, uppalavaṇṇātheriādikā
atk-s0201a:2185_5: mahāsāvikā anekehi bhikkhunisatehi, sāriputtattherādayo mahāsāvakā anekasatehi bhikkhūhi,
atk-s0201a:2185_6: sakkādayo devā anekasahassehi devehi, mahābrahmādayo brahmāno anekasahassehi brahmehi
atk-s0201a:2185_7: pasatthā. Te sabbepi dasabalaṃ thomenti vaṇṇenti, pasaṃsantīti bhagavā “pasatthapasattho”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2186_0: Atthavasanti atthānisaṃsaṃ. Athassa paribbājako attano pasādakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto seyyathāpi,
atk-s0201a:2186_1: bho, kusalo nāgavanikotiādimāha. Tattha nāgavanikoti nāgavanavāsiko anuggahitasippo
atk-s0201a:2186_2: puriso. Parato pana uggahitasippo puriso nāgavanikoti āgato. Cattāri padānīti cattāri
atk-s0201a:2187_0: 289. Khattiyapaṇḍitetiādīsu paṇḍiteti paṇḍiccena samannāgate. Nipuṇeti saṇhe sukhumabuddhino,
atk-s0201a:2187_2: parehi saddhiṃ katavādaparicaye ca. Vālavedhirūpeti vālavedhidhanuggahasadise. Te
atk-s0201a:2187_3: bhindantā maññe carantīti vālavedhi viya vālaṃ sukhumānipi paresaṃ diṭṭhigatāni attano
atk-s0201a:2187_4: paññāgatena bhindantā viya carantīti attho. Pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharontīti dupadampi tipadampi
atk-s0201a:2187_5: catuppadampi pañhaṃ karonti. Vādaṃ āropessāmāti dosaṃ āropessāma. Na ceva samaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2187_6: gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchantīti; kasmā na pucchanti? Bhagavā kira parisamajjhe dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2187_7: desento parisāya ajjhāsayaṃ oloketi, tato passati – “ime khattiyapaṇḍitā guḷhaṃ rahassaṃ
atk-s0201a:2187_8: pañhaṃ ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā āgatā”ti. So tehi apuṭṭhoyeva evarūpe pañhe pucchāya ettakā
atk-s0201a:2187_9: dosā, vissajjane ettakā, atthe pade akkhare ettakāti ime pañhe pucchanto evaṃ puccheyya,
atk-s0201a:2187_10: vissajjento evaṃ vissajjeyyāti, iti ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ānīte pañhe dhammakathāya
atk-s0201a:2187_11: antare pakkhipitvā viddhaṃseti. Khattiyapaṇḍitā “seyyo vata no, ye mayaṃ ime pañhe
atk-s0201a:2187_12: na pucchimhā, sace hi mayaṃ puccheyyāma, appatiṭṭheva no katvā samaṇo gotamo khipeyyā”ti attamanā bhavanti.
atk-s0201a:2188_0: Apica buddhā nāma dhammaṃ desentā parisaṃ mettāya pharanti, mettāpharaṇena dasabale
atk-s0201a:2188_1: mahājanassa cittaṃ pasīdati, buddhā ca nāma rūpaggappattā honti dassanasampannā madhurassarā
atk-s0201a:2188_2: mudujivhā suphusitadantāvaraṇā amatena hadayaṃ siñcantā viya dhammaṃ kathenti. Tatra
atk-s0201a:2188_3: nesaṃ mettāpharaṇena pasannacittānaṃ evaṃ hoti – “evarūpaṃ advejjhakathaṃ amoghakathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2188_4: niyyānikakathaṃ kathentena bhagavatā saddhiṃ na sakkhissāma paccanīkaggāhaṃ gaṇhitu”nti
atk-s0201a:2189_0: Aññadatthūti ekaṃsena. Sāvakā sampajjantīti saraṇagamanavasena sāvakā honti. Tadanuttaranti
atk-s0201a:2189_1: taṃ anuttaraṃ. Brahmacariyapariyosānanti maggabrahmacariyassa pariyosānabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2189_2: tadatthāya hi te pabbajanti. Manaṃ vata, bho, anassāmāti, bho, sace mayaṃ na upasaṅkameyyāma,
atk-s0201a:2189_3: iminā thokena anupasaṅkamanamattena apayirupāsanamatteneva naṭṭhā bhaveyyāma. Upasaṅkamanamattakena
atk-s0201a:2189_4: panamhā na naṭṭhāti attho. Dutiyapadaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ. Assamaṇāva samānātiādīsu
atk-s0201a:2189_5: pāpānaṃ asamitattā assamaṇāva. Abāhitattā ca pana abrāhmaṇāva. Kilesārīnaṃ ahatattā
atk-s0201a:2190_0: 290. Udānaṃ udānesīti udāhāraṃ udāhari. Yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2190_1: vissanditvā gacchati, taṃ avasekoti vuccati, yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2190_2: ajjhottharitvā gacchati, taṃ oghoti vuccati. Evameva yaṃ pītimayaṃ vacanaṃ hadayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2190_3: gahetuṃ na sakkoti, adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi nikkhamati, taṃ udānanti
atk-s0201a:2190_4: vuccati. Evarūpaṃ pītimayaṃ vacanaṃ nicchāresīti attho. Hatthipadopamoti hatthipadaṃ
atk-s0201a:2190_5: upamā assa dhammassāti hatthipadopamo. So na ettāvatā vitthārena paripūro hotīti
atk-s0201a:2190_6: dasseti. Nāgavanikoti uggahitahatthisippo hatthivanacāriko. Atha kasmā idha kusaloti
atk-s0201a:2190_7: na vuttoti? Parato “yo hoti kusalo”ti vibhāgadassanato. Yo hi koci pavisati, yo pana
atk-s0201a:2190_8: kusalo hoti, so neva tāva niṭṭhaṃ gacchati. Tasmā idha kusaloti avatvā parato vutto.
atk-s0201a:2191_0: 291. Vāmanikāti rassā āyāmatopi na dīghā mahākucchihatthiniyo. Uccā ca nisevitanti
atk-s0201a:2191_1: sattaṭṭharatanubbedhe vaṭarukkhādīnaṃ khandhappadese ghaṃsitaṭṭhānaṃ. Uccā kāḷārikāti
atk-s0201a:2191_2: uccā ca yaṭṭhisadisapādā hutvā, kāḷārikā ca dantānaṃ kaḷāratāya. Tāsaṃ kira eko danto
atk-s0201a:2191_3: unnato hoti, eko onato. Ubhopi ca viraḷā honti, na āsannā. Uccā ca dantehi ārañjitānīti
atk-s0201a:2191_4: sattaṭṭharatanubbedhe vaṭarukkhādīnaṃ khandhappadese pharasunā pahataṭṭhānaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:2191_5: dāṭṭhāhi chinnaṭṭhānaṃ. Uccā kaṇerukā nāmāti uccā ca yaṭṭhisadisadīghapādā hutvā,
atk-s0201a:2191_6: kaṇerukā ca dantānaṃ kaṇerutāya, tā kira makuḷadāṭhā honti. Tasmā kaṇerukāti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:2191_7: So niṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti so nāgavaniko yassa vatāhaṃ nāgassa anupadaṃ āgato, ayameva
atk-s0201a:2191_8: so, na añño. Yañhi ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ padaṃ disvā vāmanikānaṃ padaṃ idaṃ bhavissatīti
atk-s0201a:2191_9: niṭṭhaṃ na gato, yampi tato orabhāge disvā kāḷārikānaṃ bhavissati, kaṇerukānaṃ bhavissatīti
atk-s0201a:2191_10: niṭṭhaṃ na gato, sabbaṃ taṃ imasseva mahāhatthino padanti mahāhatthiṃ disvāva niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2192_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – nāgavanaṃ viya hi ādito paṭṭhāya yāva
atk-s0201a:2192_1: nīvaraṇappahānā dhammadesanā veditabbā. Kusalo nāgavaniko viya yogāvacaro; mahānāgo
atk-s0201a:2192_2: viya sammāsambuddho; mahantaṃ hatthipadaṃ viya jhānābhiññā. Nāgavanikassa tattha
atk-s0201a:2192_3: tattha hatthipadaṃ disvāpi vāmanikānaṃ padaṃ bhavissati, kāḷārikānaṃ kaṇerukānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2192_4: padaṃ bhavissatīti aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvo viya yogino, imā jhānābhiññā nāma bāhirakaparibbājakānampi
atk-s0201a:2192_5: santīti aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvo. Nāgavanikassa, tattha tattha mayā diṭṭhaṃ padaṃ imasseva
atk-s0201a:2192_6: mahāhatthino, na aññassāti mahāhatthiṃ disvā niṭṭhaṅgamanaṃ viya ariyasāvakassa arahattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2192_7: patvāva niṭṭhaṅgamanaṃ. Idañca pana opammasaṃsandanaṃ matthake ṭhatvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2192_8: Imasmimpi ṭhāne vaṭṭatiyeva. Anukkamāgataṃ pana pāḷipadaṃ gahetvā idheva kataṃ. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2192_9: idhāti desāpadese nipāto. Svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha – “idha
atk-s0201a:2192_10: tathāgato loke uppajjatī”ti. Katthaci sāsanaṃ. Yathāha – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo,
atk-s0201a:2192_11: idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti. Katthaci okāsaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:2194: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:2195_0: Katthaci padapūraṇamattameva. Yathāha – “idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito”ti.
atk-s0201a:2195_1: Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “brāhmaṇa imasmiṃ loke
atk-s0201a:2196_0: Tattha tathāgatasaddo mūlapariyāye, arahantiādayo visuddhimagge vitthāritā. Loke
atk-s0201a:2196_1: uppajjatīti ettha pana lokoti okāsaloko sattaloko saṅkhāralokoti tividho. Idha pana
atk-s0201a:2196_2: sattaloko adhippeto. Sattaloke uppajjamānopi ca tathāgato na devaloke, na brahmaloke,
atk-s0201a:2196_3: manussalokeyeva uppajjati. Manussalokepi na aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe, imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe.
atk-s0201a:2196_4: Tatrāpi na sabbaṭṭhānesu, “puratthimāya disāya gajaṅgalaṃ nāma nigamo. Tassāparena
atk-s0201a:2196_5: mahāsālo, tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. Puratthimadakkhiṇāya disāya
atk-s0201a:2196_6: sallavatī nāma nadī, tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. Dakkhiṇāya disāya
atk-s0201a:2196_7: setakaṇṇikaṃ nāma nigamo, tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. Pacchimāya
atk-s0201a:2196_8: disāya thūṇaṃ nāma brāhmaṇagāmo, tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. Uttarāya
atk-s0201a:2196_9: disāya usiraddhajo nāma pabbato, tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe”ti evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2196_10: paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate vitthārato aḍḍhateyyayojanasate parikkhepato navayojanasate
atk-s0201a:2196_11: majjhimapadese uppajjati. Na kevalañca tathāgatova, paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asīti
atk-s0201a:2196_12: mahātherā buddhamātā buddhapitā cakkavattī rājā aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā
atk-s0201a:2196_13: ettheva uppajjanti. Tattha tathāgato sujātāya dinnamadhupāyasabhojanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:2196_14: yāva arahattamaggo, tāva uppajjati nāma. Arahattaphale uppanno nāma. Mahābhinikkhamanato
atk-s0201a:2196_15: vā yāva arahattamaggo. Tusitabhavanato vā yāva arahattamaggo. Dīpaṅkarapādamūlato
atk-s0201a:2196_16: vā yāva arahattamaggo, tāva uppajjati nāma. Arahattaphale uppanno nāma. Idha sabbapaṭhamaṃ
atk-s0201a:2196_17: uppannabhāvaṃ sandhāya uppajjatīti vuttaṃ, tathāgato loke uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho.
atk-s0201a:2197_0: So imaṃ lokanti so bhagavā imaṃ lokaṃ, idāni vattabbaṃ nidasseti. Sadevakanti saha
atk-s0201a:2197_1: devehi sadevakaṃ. Evaṃ saha mārena samārakaṃ. Saha brahmunā sabrahmakaṃ. Saha samaṇabrāhmaṇehi
atk-s0201a:2197_2: sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ. Pajātattā pajā, taṃ pajaṃ. Saha devamanussehi sadevamanussaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2197_7: Evamettha tīhi padehi okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko, dvīhi pajāvasena sattalokova gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2198_0: Aparo nayo – sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaradevaloko gahito. Samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko.
atk-s0201a:2198_2: sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko avasesasabbasattaloko vā.
atk-s0201a:2199_0: Apicettha sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbassa lokassa sacchikatabhāvamāha.
atk-s0201a:2199_1: Tato yesaṃ ahosi – “māro mahānubhāvo chakāmāvacarissaro vasavattī. Kiṃ sopi etena
atk-s0201a:2199_2: sacchikato”ti? Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto samārakanti āha. Yesaṃ pana ahosi – “brahmā
atk-s0201a:2199_3: mahānubhāvo, ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati, dvīhi…pe… dasahi
atk-s0201a:2199_4: aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati, anuttarañca jhānasamāpattisukhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2199_5: paṭisaṃvedeti. Kiṃ sopi sacchikato”ti? Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto sabrahmakanti āha.
atk-s0201a:2199_6: Tato ye cintesuṃ – “puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇā sāsanassa paccatthikā, kiṃ tepi sacchikatā”ti?
atk-s0201a:2199_7: Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajanti āha. Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2199_8: sacchikatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā atha sammutideve avasesamanusse ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena
atk-s0201a:2199_9: sesasattalokassa sacchikatabhāvaṃ pakāsento sadevamanussanti āha. Ayamettha bhāvānukkamo.
atk-s0201a:2199_10: Porāṇā panāhu – sadevakanti devatāhi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ. Samārakanti mārena saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2199_11: avasesalokaṃ. Sabrahmakanti brahmehi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ. Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage
atk-s0201a:2199_12: satte tīhākārehi tīsu padesu pakkhipetvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ
atk-s0201a:2199_13: pajaṃ sadevamanussa”nti āha. Evaṃ pañcahi padehi tena tenākārena tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti.
atk-s0201a:2200_0: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti sayanti sāmaṃ aparaneyyo hutvā. Abhiññāti abhiññāya,
atk-s0201a:2200_1: adhikena ñāṇena ñatvāti attho. Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Etena anumānādipaṭikkhepo
atk-s0201a:2200_2: kato hoti. Pavedetīti bodheti viññāpeti pakāseti. So dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a:2200_3: pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2200_4: dhammaṃ deseti. Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti.
atk-s0201a:2200_5: Ādimhipi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā deseti. Majjhepi… pariyosānepi kalyāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2200_6: bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā desetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2201_0: Tattha atthi desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ, atthi sāsanassa. Desanāya tāva catuppadikāyapi
atk-s0201a:2201_1: gāthāya paṭhamapādo ādi nāma, tato dve majjhaṃ nāma, ante eko pariyosānaṃ nāma. Ekānusandhikassa
atk-s0201a:2201_2: suttassa nidānamādi, idamavocāti pariyosānaṃ, ubhinnaṃ antarā majjhaṃ. Anekānusandhikassa
atk-s0201a:2201_3: suttassa paṭhamānusandhi ādi, ante anusandhi pariyosānaṃ, majjhe eko vā dve vā bahū
atk-s0201a:2201_4: vā majjhameva. Sāsanassa pana sīlasamādhivipassanā ādi nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “ko
atk-s0201a:2201_5: cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ, diṭṭhi ca ujukā”ti. “Atthi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:2201_6: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ vutto pana ariyamaggo majjhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2201_7: nāma, phalañceva nibbānañca pariyosānaṃ nāma. “Etadatthamidaṃ, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyametaṃ
atk-s0201a:2201_8: sāraṃ, etaṃ pariyosāna”nti hi ettha phalaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ. “Nibbānogadhañhi,
atk-s0201a:2201_9: āvuso visākha, brahmacariyaṃ vussati nibbānaparāyaṇaṃ nibbānapariyosāna”nti ettha
atk-s0201a:2201_10: nibbānaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ. Idha desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2201_11: hi dhammaṃ desento ādimhi sīlaṃ dassetvā majjhe maggaṃ pariyosāne nibbānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2201_12: Tena vuttaṃ – “so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇa”nti.
atk-s0201a:2204_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti yassa hi yāgubhattaitthipurisādivaṇṇanā nissitā desanā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2204_1: na so sātthaṃ deseti. Bhagavā pana tathārūpaṃ desanaṃ pahāya catusatipaṭṭhānādinissitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2204_2: desanaṃ deseti. Tasmā “sātthaṃ desetī”ti vuccati. Yassa pana desanā ekabyañjanādiyuttā
atk-s0201a:2204_3: vā sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā sabbavissaṭṭhasabbaniggahītabyañjanā vā, tassa damiḷakirāsavarādimilakkhūnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2204_4: bhāsā viya byañjanapāripūriyā abhāvato abyañjanā nāma desanā hoti. Bhagavā pana –
atk-s0201a:2206: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
atk-s0201a:2207: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ deseti. Tasmā “sabyañjanaṃ dhammaṃ desetī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2208_0: Kevalaparipuṇṇanti ettha kevalanti sakalādhivacanaṃ. Paripuṇṇanti anūnādhikavacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2208_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “sakalaparipuṇṇameva deseti, ekadesanāpi aparipuṇṇā natthī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2208_2: Parisuddhanti nirupakkilesaṃ. Yo hi idaṃ dhammadesanaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ vā sakkāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2208_3: vā labhissāmīti deseti, tassa aparisuddhā desanā hoti. Bhagavā pana lokāmisanirapekkho
atk-s0201a:2208_4: hitapharaṇena mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena deseti.
atk-s0201a:2208_5: Tasmā “parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ desetī”ti vuccati. Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti ettha brahmacariyanti
atk-s0201a:2208_6: sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ. Tasmā brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti so dhammaṃ deseti
atk-s0201a:2208_7: ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe… parisuddhaṃ, evaṃ desento ca sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2208_8: brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Brahmacariyanti seṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:2208_9: brahmabhūtaṃ cariyaṃ. Brahmabhūtānaṃ vā buddhādīnaṃ cariyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2209_0: Taṃ dhammanti taṃ vuttappakārasampadaṃ dhammaṃ. Suṇāti gahapati vāti kasmā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0201a:2209_1: gahapatiṃ niddisatīti? Nihatamānattā ussannattā ca. Yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato
atk-s0201a:2209_2: pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti. Brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2209_3: karonti. Hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Gahapatidārakā
atk-s0201a:2209_4: pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā nihatamānadappā
atk-s0201a:2209_5: honti. Te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā
atk-s0201a:2209_6: vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ. Itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā
atk-s0201a:2209_7: pabbajitā nāma na bahukā, gahapatikāva bahukā, iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0201a:2210_0: Aññatarasmiṃ vāti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ. Paccājātoti patijāto. Tathāgate
atk-s0201a:2210_1: saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammassāmimhi tathāgate “sammāsambuddho
atk-s0201a:2210_2: vata bhagavā”ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti evaṃ paccavekkhati. Sambādho
atk-s0201a:2210_3: gharāvāsoti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti,
atk-s0201a:2210_4: tathāpi nesaṃ sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhoyeva. Rajopathoti rāgarajādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2210_5: uṭṭhānaṭṭhānanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Āgamanapathotipi vaṭṭati. Alagganaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:2210_6: abbhokāso viyāti abbhokāso. Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsādadevavimānādīsu pihitadvāravātapānesu
atk-s0201a:2210_7: paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati na sajjati na bajjhati. Tena vuttaṃ – “abbhokāso
atk-s0201a:2210_8: pabbajjā”ti. Apica sambādho gharāvāso kusalakiriyāya okāsābhāvato. Rajopatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2210_9: viya rajānaṃ kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato. Abbhokāso pabbajjā kusalakiriyāya yathāsukhaṃ okāsasabbhāvato.
atk-s0201a:2211_0: Nayidaṃ sukaraṃ…pe… pabbajeyyanti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepakathā – yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2211_1: ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ. Ekadivasampi
atk-s0201a:2211_2: ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ, saṅkhalikhitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2211_3: likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ, idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2211_4: ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca
atk-s0201a:2211_5: massuñca ohāretvā kāsāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-s0201a:2211_6: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti. Ettha
atk-s0201a:2211_7: ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati, tañca pabbajjāya
atk-s0201a:2211_8: natthi. Tasmā pabbajjā anagāriyāti ñātabbā, taṃ anagāriyaṃ. Pabbajeyyanti paṭipajjeyyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2211_9: Appaṃ vāti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti, sahassato paṭṭhāya mahā.
atk-s0201a:2211_10: Ābandhanaṭṭhena ñāti eva parivaṭṭo ñātiparivaṭṭo. So vīsatiyā heṭṭhā appo hoti, vīsatiyā paṭṭhāya mahā.
atk-s0201a:2212_0: 292. Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca,
atk-s0201a:2212_1: yattha cete saha jīvanti ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino honti, taṃ bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0201a:2212_2: sājīvañca tattha sikkhanabhāvena samāpannoti bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno. Samāpannoti
atk-s0201a:2212_3: sikkhaṃ paripūrento, sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho. Pāṇātipātaṃ
atk-s0201a:2212_4: pahāyātiādīsu pāṇātipātādikathā heṭṭhā vitthāritā eva. Pahāyāti imaṃ pāṇātipātacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0201a:2212_5: dussīlyaṃ pajahitvā. Paṭivirato hotīti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato
atk-s0201a:2212_6: viratova hoti. Nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthoti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā
atk-s0201a:2212_7: ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti attho. Ettha ca ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2212_8: daṇḍaṃ sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vihiṃsanabhāvato satthanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2212_9: Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalakaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0201a:2212_10: na taṃ parūpaghātatthāya. Tasmā nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Lajjīti
atk-s0201a:2212_11: pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya lajjāya samannāgato. Dayāpannoti dayaṃ mettacittataṃ āpanno.
atk-s0201a:2212_12: Sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti sabbe pāṇabhūte hitena anukampako. Tāya dayāpannatāya
atk-s0201a:2212_13: sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho. Viharatīti iriyati pāleti.
atk-s0201a:2213_0: Dinnameva ādiyatīti dinnādāyī. Cittenapi dinnameva paṭikaṅkhatīti dinnapāṭikaṅkhī.
atk-s0201a:2213_1: Thenetīti theno. Na thenena athenena. Athenattāyeva sucibhūtena. Attanāti attabhāvena,
atk-s0201a:2213_2: athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2214_0: Abrahmacariyanti aseṭṭhacariyaṃ. Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ācāraṃ caratīti brahmacārī. Ārācārīti
atk-s0201a:2214_1: abrahmacariyato dūracārī. Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti
atk-s0201a:2214_2: laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā. Gāmadhammāti gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammā.
atk-s0201a:2215_0: Saccaṃ vadatīti saccavādī. Saccena saccaṃ sandahati ghaṭetīti saccasandho, na antarantarā
atk-s0201a:2215_1: musā vadatīti attho. Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati, kadāci saccaṃ, tassa musāvādena
atk-s0201a:2215_2: antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati. Tasmā na so saccasandho, ayaṃ pana na tādiso,
atk-s0201a:2215_3: jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti saccasandho. Thetoti
atk-s0201a:2215_4: thiro, thirakathoti attho. Eko hi puggalo haliddirāgo viya, thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇu
atk-s0201a:2215_5: viya, assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na thirakatho hoti. Eko pāsāṇalekhā viya
atk-s0201a:2215_6: indakhilo viya ca thirakatho hoti; asinā sīse chijjantepi dve kathā na katheti; ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2215_7: vuccati theto. Paccayikoti pattiyāyitabbako, saddhāyikoti attho. Ekacco hi puggalo
atk-s0201a:2215_8: na paccayiko hoti, “idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukenā”ti vutte “mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā”ti
atk-s0201a:2215_9: vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Eko paccayiko hoti, “idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukenā”ti vutte, “yadi
atk-s0201a:2215_10: tena vuttaṃ, idameva pamāṇaṃ, idāni upaparikkhitabbaṃ natthi, evameva ida”nti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0201a:2215_11: āpajjati, ayaṃ vuccati paccayiko. Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ
atk-s0201a:2216_0: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ ito sutvāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ, tesaṃ bhedāya. Bhinnānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2216_1: vā sandhātāti dvinnampi mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena
atk-s0201a:2216_2: bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ
atk-s0201a:2216_3: na yutta”ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā. Anuppadātāti sandhānānuppadātā, dve jane
atk-s0201a:2216_4: samagge disvā, “tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta”ntiādīni
atk-s0201a:2216_5: vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho. Samaggo ārāmo assāti samaggārāmo. Yattha samaggā
atk-s0201a:2216_6: natthi, tattha vasitumpi na icchatīti attho. “Samaggarāmo”tipi pāḷi, ayamevettha
atk-s0201a:2216_7: attho. Samaggaratoti samaggesu rato, te pahāya aññatra gantumpi na icchatīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2216_8: Samagge disvāpi sutvāpi nandatīti samagganandī. Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā
atk-s0201a:2216_9: vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti, taṃ sāmaggiguṇaparidīpakameva vācaṃ bhāsati, na itaranti.
atk-s0201a:2217_0: Nelāti elaṃ vuccati doso, nāssā elanti nelā, niddosāti attho. “Nelaṅgo setapacchādo”ti
atk-s0201a:2217_1: ettha vuttanelaṃ viya. Kaṇṇasukhāti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2217_2: viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti
atk-s0201a:2217_3: pemanīyā. Hadayaṃ gacchati, apaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-s0201a:2217_4: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī, pure saṃvaddhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī, purassa
atk-s0201a:2217_5: esātipi porī, nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. Nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā honti, pitimattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2217_6: pitāti, mātimattaṃ mātāti, bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti. Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa
atk-s0201a:2217_7: kantā hotīti bahujanakantā. Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuddhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-s0201a:2218_0: Kālena vadatīti kālavādī, vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho. Bhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a:2218_2: katvā vadatīti atthavādī. Navalokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti dhammavādī.
atk-s0201a:2218_3: Saṃvaravinayapahānavinayasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti vinayavādī. Nidhānaṃ vuccati
atk-s0201a:2218_4: ṭhapanokāso, nidhānamassā atthīti nidhānavatī, hadaye nidhātabba yuttavācaṃ bhāsitāti
atk-s0201a:2218_5: attho. Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na
atk-s0201a:2218_6: akālena bhāsati, yuttakālaṃ pana avekkhitvā bhāsatīti attho. Sāpadesanti saupamaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2218_7: sakāraṇanti attho. Pariyantavatinti paricchedaṃ dassetvā yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati,
atk-s0201a:2218_8: evaṃ bhāsatīti attho. Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
atk-s0201a:2218_9: atthasampannaṃ, yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati, tena atthena saṃhitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2218_10: vācaṃ bhāsati, na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2219_0: 293. Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhāti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti
atk-s0201a:2219_1: pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca
atk-s0201a:2219_2: samārambhā, chedanabhedanapacanādibhāvena vikopanā paṭiviratoti attho. Ekabhattikoti
atk-s0201a:2219_3: pātarāsabhattaṃ sāyamāsabhattanti dve bhattāni. Tesu pātarāsabhattaṃ antomajjhanhikena
atk-s0201a:2219_4: paricchinnaṃ, itaraṃ majjhanhikato uddhaṃ antoaruṇena. Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ
atk-s0201a:2219_5: bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ekabhattiko”ti. Rattiyā bhojanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2219_6: ratti, tato uparatoti rattūparato. Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṃgamanā bhojanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2219_7: vikālabhojanaṃ nāma. Tato viratattā virato vikālabhojanā. Sāsanassa ananulomattā
atk-s0201a:2219_8: visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ. Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā
atk-s0201a:2219_9: ca gītā ca vāditā ca, antamaso mayūranaccanādivasenāpi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā
atk-s0201a:2219_10: dassanā cāti naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā. Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi
atk-s0201a:2219_11: payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti. Mālādīsu
atk-s0201a:2219_12: mālāti yaṃkiñci pupphaṃ. Gandhanti yaṃkiñci gandhajātaṃ. Vilepananti chavirāgakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2219_13: Tattha piḷandhanto dhāreti nāma. Ūnaṭṭhānaṃ pūrento maṇḍeti nāma. Gandhavasena chavirāgavasena
atk-s0201a:2219_14: ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma. Ṭhānaṃ vuccati kāraṇaṃ. Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya
atk-s0201a:2219_15: tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti, tato paṭiviratoti attho.
atk-s0201a:2220_0: Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṃ. Mahāsayanaṃ akappiyattharaṇaṃ. Tato paṭiviratoti
atk-s0201a:2220_1: attho. Jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṃ. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo lohamāsako jatumāsako dārumāsakoti
atk-s0201a:2220_2: ye vohāraṃ gacchanti, tassa ubhayassapi paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato, neva naṃ uggaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:2220_3: na uggaṇhāpeti, na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyatīti attho. Āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇāti sālivīhiyavagodhūmakaṅguvarakakudrūsakasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0201a:2220_4: sattavidhassāpi āmakadhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā. Na kevalañca etesaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva,
atk-s0201a:2220_5: āmasanampi bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva. Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa
atk-s0201a:2220_6: anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, no āmasanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2221_0: Itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha itthīti purisantaragatā, itarā kumārikā nāma. Tāsaṃ
atk-s0201a:2221_1: paṭiggahaṇampi āmasanampi akappiyameva. Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva
atk-s0201a:2221_2: tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati, “kappiyakārakaṃ dammi, ārāmikaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ vutte
atk-s0201a:2221_3: pana vaṭṭati. Ajeḷakādīsu khettavatthupariyosānesu kappiyākappiyanayo vinayavasena
atk-s0201a:2221_4: upaparikkhitabbo. Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati. Vatthu nāma yasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2221_5: aparaṇṇaṃ ruhati. Yattha vā ubhayampi ruhati, taṃ khettaṃ. Tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo
atk-s0201a:2221_6: vatthu. Khettavatthusīsena cettha vāpitaḷākādīnipi saṅgahitāneva. Dūteyyaṃ vuccati
atk-s0201a:2221_7: dūtakammaṃ, gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ. Pahiṇagamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2221_8: vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ. Anuyogo nāma tadubhayakaraṇaṃ, tasmā
atk-s0201a:2222_0: Kayavikkayāti kayā ca vikkayā ca. Tulākūṭādīsu kūṭanti vañcanaṃ. Tattha tulākūṭaṃ
atk-s0201a:2222_1: tāva rūpakūṭaṃ aṅgakūṭaṃ gahaṇakūṭaṃ paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2222_2: rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā sarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya
atk-s0201a:2222_3: deti. Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge.
atk-s0201a:2222_4: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti, dadanto agge. Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma
atk-s0201a:2222_5: tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto
atk-s0201a:2222_6: aggabhāge. Kaṃso vuccati suvaṇṇapāti, tāya vañcanaṃ kaṃsakūṭaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-s0201a:2222_7: katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karoti, tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva
atk-s0201a:2222_8: addhakulaṃ pavisitvā, “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ
atk-s0201a:2222_9: dātukāmā honti. Tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte – “vīmaṃsitvā
atk-s0201a:2222_10: gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbā pātiyo datvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2223_0: Mānakūṭaṃ nāma hadayabhedasikhābhedarajjubhedavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha hadayabhedo
atk-s0201a:2223_1: sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhā chiddena mānena, “saṇikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2223_2: āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti; dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya
atk-s0201a:2223_3: sīghaṃ pūretvā deti. Sikhābhedo tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto
atk-s0201a:2223_4: saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti. Rajjubhedo
atk-s0201a:2223_5: khettavatthuminanakāle labbhati. Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-s0201a:2224_0: Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti sāmike assāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ. Vañcananti tehi tehi
atk-s0201a:2224_1: upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. Tatridamekaṃ vatthu – eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca
atk-s0201a:2224_2: gahetvā āgacchati. Tameko dhutto, “kiṃ, bho, migo agghati, kiṃ migapotako”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2224_3: “Migo dve kahāpaṇe migapotako eka”nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a:2224_4: thokaṃ gantvā nivatto, “na me, bho, migapotakena attho, migaṃ me dehī”ti āha. Tena
atk-s0201a:2224_5: hi “dve kahāpaṇe dehī”ti. So āha – “nanu te, bho, mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinno”ti.
atk-s0201a:2224_6: Āma dinnoti. “Imampi migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako
atk-s0201a:2224_7: migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantī”ti. So kāraṇaṃ vadatīti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2225_0: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti, amaṇiṃ maṇinti, asuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2225_1: suvaṇṇanti katvā paṭirūpakena vañcanaṃ. Sāciyogoti kuṭilayogo, etesaṃyeva ukkoṭanādīnametaṃ
atk-s0201a:2225_2: nāmaṃ, tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2225_3: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti. Taṃ pana vañcaneneva
atk-s0201a:2225_4: saṅgahitaṃ. Chedanādīsu chedananti hatthacchedanādi. Vadhoti māraṇaṃ. Bandhoti rajjubandhanādīhi
atk-s0201a:2225_5: bandhanaṃ. Viparāmosoti himaviparāmoso gumbaviparāmosoti duvidho. Yaṃ himapātasamaye
atk-s0201a:2225_6: himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggapaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti, ayaṃ himaviparāmoso. Yaṃ
atk-s0201a:2225_7: gumbādīhi paṭicchannā musanti, ayaṃ gumbaviparāmoso. Ālopo vuccati gāmanigamādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2225_8: vilopakaraṇaṃ. Sahasākāroti sāhasikakiriyā, gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2225_9: ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ. Evametasmā chedana…pe… sahasākārā paṭivirato hoti.
atk-s0201a:2226_0: 294. So santuṭṭho hotīti svāyaṃ bhikkhu heṭṭhā vuttena catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena
atk-s0201a:2226_1: itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato hoti. Iminā pana dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena
atk-s0201a:2226_2: samannāgatassa bhikkhuno aṭṭha parikkhārā vaṭṭanti tīṇi cīvarāni patto dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsi
atk-s0201a:2226_3: ekā sūci kāyabandhanaṃ parissāvananti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:2227: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0201a:2229_0: Te sabbepi kāyaparihārikāpi honti kucchiparihārikāpi. Kathaṃ? Ticīvaraṃ tāva nivāsetvā
atk-s0201a:2229_1: pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakāle kāyaṃ pariharati posetīti kāyaparihārikaṃ hoti, cīvarakaṇṇena
atk-s0201a:2229_2: udakaṃ parissāvetvā pivanakāle khāditabbaphalāphalaggahaṇakāle ca kucchiṃ pariharati
atk-s0201a:2229_3: posetīti kucchiparihārikaṃ hoti. Pattopi tena udakaṃ uddharitvā nahānakāle kuṭiparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle
atk-s0201a:2229_4: ca kāyaparihāriko hoti, āhāraṃ gahetvā bhuñjanakāle kucchiparihāriko hoti. Vāsipi
atk-s0201a:2229_7: cīvarasibbanakāle kāyaparihārikā hoti, pūvaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vijjhitvā khādanakāle kucchiparihārikā.
atk-s0201a:2229_8: Kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā vicaraṇakāle kāyaparihārikaṃ, ucchuādīni bandhitvā gahaṇakāle
atk-s0201a:2229_9: kucchiparihārikaṃ. Parissāvanaṃ tena udakaṃ parissāvetvā nahānakāle, senāsanaparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle
atk-s0201a:2229_10: ca kāyaparihārikaṃ, pānīyaparissāvanakāle teneva tilataṇḍulaputhukādīni gahetvā khādanakāle
atk-s0201a:2229_11: ca kucchiparihārikaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa parikkhāramattā.
atk-s0201a:2230_0: Navaparikkhārikassa pana seyyaṃ pavisantassa tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṃ vā kuñcikā
atk-s0201a:2230_1: vā vaṭṭati. Dasaparikkhārikassa nisīdanaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati. Ekādasaparikkhārikassa
atk-s0201a:2230_2: kattarayaṭṭhi vā telanāḷikā vā vaṭṭati. Dvādasaparikkhārikassa chattaṃ vā upāhanā
atk-s0201a:2230_3: vā vaṭṭati. Etesu ca aṭṭhaparikkhārikova santuṭṭho, itare asantuṭṭhā, mahicchā mahābhārāti
atk-s0201a:2230_4: na vattabbā. Etepi hi appicchāva santuṭṭhāva subharāva sallahukavuttinova. Bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2230_5: pana nayimaṃ suttaṃ tesaṃ vasena kathesi, aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa vasena kathesi. So
atk-s0201a:2230_6: hi khuddakavāsiñca sūciñca parissāvane pakkhipitvā pattassa anto ṭhapetvā pattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2230_7: aṃsakūṭe laggetvā ticīvaraṃ kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvā yenicchakaṃ sukhaṃ pakkamati. Paṭinivattetvā
atk-s0201a:2230_8: gahetabbaṃ nāmassa na hoti, iti imassa bhikkhuno sallahukavuttitaṃ dassento bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:2231_1: Samādāyeva pakkamatīti taṃ aṭṭhaparikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2231_2: katvāva gacchati, “mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko”tissa saṅgo vā baddho vā na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2231_3: so jiyā mutto saro viya, yūthā apakkanto mattahatthī viya icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2231_4: vanasaṇḍaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vanapabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto ekova tiṭṭhati, ekova nisīdati,
atk-s0201a:2237_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento seyyathāpītiādimāha. Tattha pakkhī sakuṇoti pakkhayutto
atk-s0201a:2237_1: sakuṇo. Ḍetīti uppatati. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – sakuṇā nāma “asukasmiṃ padese
atk-s0201a:2237_2: rukkho paripakkaphalo”ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni
atk-s0201a:2237_3: vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti. “Idaṃ ajjatanāya idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī”ti nesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2237_4: na hoti. Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti, na tattha pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2237_5: vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti, atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkho hutvā yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a:2237_6: so tena sapattabhārova – uppatitvā gacchati. Evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo nirapekkhoyeva
atk-s0201a:2237_7: pakkamati. Tena vuttaṃ “samādāyeva pakkamatī”ti. Ariyenāti niddosena. Ajjhattanti
atk-s0201a:2238_0: 295. So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu
atk-s0201a:2238_1: cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvāti attho. Sesapadesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2238_2: visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Abyāsekasukhanti kilesehi anavasittasukhaṃ, avikiṇṇasukhantipi
atk-s0201a:2238_3: vuttaṃ. Indriyasaṃvarasukhañhi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2238_4: hoti. So abhikkante paṭikkanteti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato
atk-s0201a:2238_5: bhikkhu imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu sattasu ṭhānesu satisampajaññavasena sampajānakārī
atk-s0201a:2238_6: hoti. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ satipaṭṭhāne vuttameva.
atk-s0201a:2239_0: 296. So iminā cātiādinā kiṃ dasseti? Araññavāsassa paccayasampattiṃ dasseti. Yassa
atk-s0201a:2239_1: hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi, tassa araññavāso na ijjhati, tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi
atk-s0201a:2239_2: vā saddhiṃ vattabbataṃ āpajjati, araññe adhivatthā devatā, “kiṃ evarūpassa pāpabhikkhuno
atk-s0201a:2239_3: araññavāsenā”ti bheravasaddaṃ sāventi, hatthehi sīsaṃ paharitvā palāyanākāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:2239_4: “Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ akāsī”ti ayaso pattharati.
atk-s0201a:2239_5: Yassa panete cattāro paccayā atthi, tassa araññavāso ijjhati, so hi attano sīlaṃ
atk-s0201a:2239_6: paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato
atk-s0201a:2239_7: vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati, araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2239_8: bhāsanti, itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.
atk-s0201a:2240_0: Tattha vivittanti suññaṃ appasaddaṃ, appanigghosanti attho. Etadeva hi sandhāya vibhaṅge,
atk-s0201a:2240_1: “vivittanti santike cepi senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi,
atk-s0201a:2240_2: tena taṃ vivitta”nti vuttaṃ. Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ, mañcapīṭhādīnametaṃ
atk-s0201a:2240_3: adhivacanaṃ. Tenāha – “senāsananti mañcopi senāsanaṃ, pīṭhampi bhisipi bimbohanampi,
atk-s0201a:2240_4: vihāropi aḍḍhayogopi, pāsādopi, hammiyampi, guhāpi, aṭṭopi, māḷopi, leṇampi, veḷugumbopi,
atk-s0201a:2240_5: rukkhamūlampi, maṇḍapopi senāsanaṃ, yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti, sabbametaṃ
atk-s0201a:2240_6: senāsana”nti. Apica “vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā”ti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2240_7: nāma. “Mañco pīṭhaṃ, bhisi bimbohana”nti idaṃ mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ nāma. “Cimilikā,
atk-s0201a:2240_8: cammakhaṇḍo, tiṇasanthāro, paṇṇasanthāro”ti idaṃ santhatasenāsanaṃ nāma. “Yattha
atk-s0201a:2240_9: vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantī”ti idaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2240_10: hoti, taṃ sabbampi senāsanaggahaṇena gahitameva. Imassa pana sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa
atk-s0201a:2241_0: Tattha araññanti “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā, sabbametaṃ arañña”nti idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2241_1: vasena āgataṃ araññaṃ. “Āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti idaṃ
atk-s0201a:2241_2: pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ, tassa lakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2241_3: Rukkhamūlanti yaṃkiñci sandacchāyaṃ vivittaṃ rakkhamūlaṃ. Pabbatanti selaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2241_4: hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu
atk-s0201a:2241_5: sītena vātena vījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Kandaranti kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena
atk-s0201a:2241_6: dāritaṃ, udakena bhinnaṃ pabbatappadesaṃ, yaṃ nadītumbantipi nadīkuñjantipi vadanti.
atk-s0201a:2241_7: Tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālikā honti, matthake maṇivitānaṃ viya vanagahanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2241_8: maṇikkhandhasadisaṃ udakaṃ sandati. Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni
atk-s0201a:2241_9: sītāni katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññāpetvā nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2241_10: karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Giriguhanti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antarā, ekasmiṃyeva vā
atk-s0201a:2241_11: umaṅgasadisaṃ mahāvivaraṃ. Susānalakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Vanapatthanti atikkamitvā
atk-s0201a:2241_12: manussānaṃ upacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasanti na vapanti. Tenevāha – “vanapatthanti
atk-s0201a:2241_13: dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”ntiādi. Abbhokāsanti acchannaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno panettha
atk-s0201a:2241_14: cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasati. Palālapuñjanti palālarāsiṃ. Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ
atk-s0201a:2241_15: nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbādīnampi upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:2241_16: heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2242_0: Pacchābhattanti bhattassa pacchato. Piṇḍapātapaṭikkantoti piṇḍapātapariyesanato paṭikkanto.
atk-s0201a:2242_1: Pallaṅkanti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. Ābhujitvāti bandhitvā. Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti
atk-s0201a:2242_2: uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0201a:2242_3: Evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanahārūni na paṇamanti. Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā
atk-s0201a:2242_4: khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā na uppajjanti. Tāsu anuppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
atk-s0201a:2242_5: hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati, vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati. Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti
atk-s0201a:2242_6: kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā, mukhasamīpe vā katvāti attho. Teneva vibhaṅge
atk-s0201a:2242_7: vuttaṃ – “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā, tena
atk-s0201a:2242_8: vuccati parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti. Atha vā “parīti pariggahaṭṭho, mukhanti
atk-s0201a:2242_9: niyyānattho, satīti upaṭṭhānattho, tena vuccati parimukhaṃ sati”nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2242_10: vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepo “pariggahitaniyyānasatiṃ katvā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2243_0: Abhijjhaṃ loketi ettha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko, tasmā pañcasu
atk-s0201a:2243_1: upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho. Vigatābhijjhenāti
atk-s0201a:2243_2: vikkhambhanavasena pahīnattā vigatābhijjhena, na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenāti attho. Abhijjhāya
atk-s0201a:2243_3: cittaṃ parisodhetīti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parimoceti. Yathā naṃ sā muñcati ceva, muñcitvā
atk-s0201a:2243_4: ca na puna gaṇhāti, evaṃ karotīti attho. Byāpādapadosaṃ pahāyātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2243_5: Byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikammāsādayo viya purimapakatiṃ pajahatīti byāpādo. Vikārāpattiyā
atk-s0201a:2243_6: padussati, paraṃ vā padūseti vināsetīti padoso. Ubhayametaṃ kodhassevādhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2243_7: Thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ. Middhaṃ cetasikagelaññaṃ. Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2243_8: Ālokasaññīti rattimpi divā diṭṭhaālokasañjānanasamatthatāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya
atk-s0201a:2243_9: saññāya samannāgato. Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato. Idaṃ ubhayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2243_10: ālokasaññāya upakārattā vuttaṃ. Uddhaccañca kukkuccañca uddhaccakukkuccaṃ. Tiṇṇavicikicchoti
atk-s0201a:2243_11: vicikicchaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā ṭhito. “Kathamidaṃ kathamida”nti evaṃ nappavattatīti
atk-s0201a:2243_12: akathaṃkathī. Kusalesu dhammesūti anavajjesu dhammesu. “Ime nu kho kusalā, kathamime
atk-s0201a:2243_13: kusalā”ti evaṃ na vicikicchati na kaṅkhatīti attho. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, imesu pana
atk-s0201a:2243_14: nīvaraṇesu vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedato yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2244_0: 297. Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti ime pañca nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya
atk-s0201a:2244_1: paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti, uppannā api aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññā ucchinditvā
atk-s0201a:2244_2: pātenti; tasmā “paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā”ti vuccanti. Tathāgatapadaṃ itipīti idampi
atk-s0201a:2244_3: tathāgatassa ñāṇapadaṃ ñāṇavaḷañjaṃ ñāṇena akkantaṭṭhānanti vuccati. Tathāgatanisevitanti
atk-s0201a:2244_4: tathāgatassa ñāṇaphāsukāya nighaṃsitaṭṭhānaṃ. Tathāgatārañjitanti tathāgatassa ñāṇadāṭhāya ārañjitaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2245_0: 299. Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti yathāsabhāvaṃ pajānāti. Natveva tāva ariyasāvako niṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2245_1: gato hotīti imā jhānābhiññā bāhirakehipi sādhāraṇāti na tāva niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti. Maggakkhaṇepi
atk-s0201a:2245_2: apariyositakiccatāya na tāva niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti. Apica kho niṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti apica
atk-s0201a:2245_3: kho pana maggakkhaṇe mahāhatthiṃ passanto nāgavaniko viya sammāsambuddho bhagavāti
atk-s0201a:2245_4: iminā ākārena tīsu ratanesu niṭṭhaṃ gacchati. Niṭṭhaṃ gato hotīti evaṃ maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0201a:2245_5: niṭṭhaṃ gacchanto arahattaphalakkhaṇe pariyositasabbakiccatāya sabbākārena tīsu ratanesu
atk-s0201a:2249_0: 300. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāhatthipadopamasuttaṃ. Tattha jaṅgalānanti pathavītalacārīnaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2249_1: Pāṇānanti sapādakapāṇānaṃ. Padajātānīti padāni. Samodhānaṃ gacchantīti odhānaṃ pakkhepaṃ
atk-s0201a:2249_2: gacchanti. Aggamakkhāyatīti seṭṭhaṃ akkhāyati. Yadidaṃ mahantattenāti mahantabhāvena
atk-s0201a:2249_3: aggaṃ akkhāyati, na guṇavasenāti attho. Ye keci kusalā dhammāti ye keci lokiyā vā
atk-s0201a:2249_4: lokuttarā vā kusalā dhammā. Saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti ettha catubbidho saṅgaho – sajātisaṅgaho,
atk-s0201a:2249_5: sañjātisaṅgaho, kiriyasaṅgaho, gaṇanasaṅgahoti. Tattha “sabbe khattiyā āgacchantu
atk-s0201a:2249_6: sabbe brāhmaṇā”ti evaṃ samānajātivasena saṅgaho sajātisaṅgaho nāma. “Sabbe kosalakā
atk-s0201a:2249_7: sabbe māgadhakā”ti evaṃ sañjātidesavasena saṅgaho sañjātisaṅgaho nāma. “Sabbe rathikā
atk-s0201a:2249_8: sabbe dhanuggahā”ti evaṃ kiriyavasena saṅgaho kiriyasaṅgaho nāma. “Cakkhāyatanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2249_9: katamakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchatīti? Cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati. Hañci
atk-s0201a:2249_10: cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhena
atk-s0201a:2249_11: saṅgahita”nti, ayaṃ gaṇanasaṅgaho nāma. Imasmimpi ṭhāne ayameva adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:2250_0: Nanu ca “catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ kati kusalā kati akusalā kati abyākatāti pañhassa
atk-s0201a:2250_1: vissajjane samudayasaccaṃ akusalaṃ, maggasaccaṃ kusalaṃ, nirodhasaccaṃ abyākataṃ,
atk-s0201a:2250_2: dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākata”nti āgatattā catubhūmakampi
atk-s0201a:2250_3: kusalaṃ diyaḍḍhameva saccaṃ bhajati. Atha kasmā mahāthero catūsu ariyasaccesu gaṇanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2250_4: gacchatīti āhāti? Saccānaṃ antogadhattā. Yathā hi “sādhikamidaṃ, bhikkhave, diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ
atk-s0201a:2250_5: anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchati, yattha attakāmā kulaputtā sikkhanti. Tisso imā,
atk-s0201a:2250_6: bhikkhave, sikkhā adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhā adhipaññāsikkhā”ti ettha sādhikamidaṃ
atk-s0201a:2250_7: diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ ekā adhisīlasikkhāva hoti, taṃ sikkhantopi tisso sikkhā sikkhatīti
atk-s0201a:2250_8: dassito, sikkhānaṃ antogadhattā. Yathā ca ekassa hatthipadassa catūsu koṭṭhāsesu
atk-s0201a:2250_9: ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse otiṇṇānipi dvīsu tīsu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu otiṇṇānipi siṅgālasasamigādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2250_10: pādāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gatāneva honti. Hatthipadato amuccitvā tasseva antogadhattā.
atk-s0201a:2250_11: Evameva ekasmimpi dvīsupi tīsupi catūsupi saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatā dhammā catūsu saccesu
atk-s0201a:2250_12: gaṇanaṃ gatāva honti; saccānaṃ antogadhattāti diyaḍḍhasaccagaṇanaṃ gatepi kusaladhamme
atk-s0201a:2250_13: “sabbe te catūsu ariyasaccesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti āha. “Dukkhe ariyasacce”tiādīsu
atk-s0201a:2250_14: uddesapadesu ceva jātipi dukkhātiādīsu niddesapadesu ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimagge
atk-s0201a:2251_0: 301. Yathā hi cheko vilīvakāro sujātaṃ veḷuṃ labhitvā catudhā chetvā tato tayo koṭṭhāse
atk-s0201a:2251_1: ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā pañcadhā bhindeyya, tatopi cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0201a:2251_2: phālento pañca pesiyo kareyya, tato catasso ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā kucchibhāgaṃ piṭṭhibhāganti
atk-s0201a:2251_3: dvidhā phāletvā piṭṭhibhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā kucchibhāgaṃ ādāya tato samuggabījanitālavaṇṭādinānappakāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2251_4: veḷuvikatiṃ kareyya, so piṭṭhibhāgañca itarā ca catasso pesiyo itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse
atk-s0201a:2251_5: itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse kammāya na upanessatīti na vattabbo. Ekappahārena pana upanetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2251_6: na sakkā, anupubbena upanessati. Evameva ayaṃ mahātheropi vilīvakāro sujātaṃ veḷuṃ
atk-s0201a:2251_7: labhitvā cattāro koṭṭhāse viya, imaṃ mahantaṃ suttantaṃ ārabhitvā catuariyasaccavasena
atk-s0201a:2251_8: mātikaṃ ṭhapesi. Vilīvakārassa tayo koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gahetvā tassa pañcadhā
atk-s0201a:2251_9: karaṇaṃ viya therassa tīṇi ariyasaccāni ṭhapetvā ekaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ gahetvā bhājentassa
atk-s0201a:2251_10: khandhavasena pañcadhā karaṇaṃ. Tato yathā so vilīvakāro cattāro koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2251_11: ekaṃ bhāgaṃ gahetvā pañcadhā phālesi, evaṃ thero cattāro arūpakkhandhe ṭhapetvā rūpakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2251_12: vibhajanto cattāri ca mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpanti pañcadhā
atk-s0201a:2251_13: akāsi. Tato yathā so vilīvakāro catasso pesiyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gahetvā kucchibhāgaṃ
atk-s0201a:2251_14: piṭṭhibhāganti dvidhā phālesi, evaṃ thero upādāya rūpañca tisso ca dhātuyo ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2251_15: ekaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vibhajanto ajjhattikabāhiravasena dvidhā dassesi. Yathā so vilīvakāro
atk-s0201a:2251_16: piṭṭhibhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā kucchibhāgaṃ ādāya nānappakāraṃ vilīvavikatiṃ akāsi, evaṃ thero
atk-s0201a:2251_17: bāhiraṃ pathavīdhātuṃ ṭhapetvā ajjhattikaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vīsatiyā ākārehi vibhajitvā
atk-s0201a:2252_0: Yathā pana vilīvakāro piṭṭhibhāgañca itarā ca cattasso pesiyo itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse
atk-s0201a:2252_1: itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse anupubbena kammāya upanessati, na hi sakkā ekappahārena upanetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2252_2: evaṃ theropi bāhirañca pathavīdhātuṃ itarā ca tisso dhātuyo upādārūpañca itare ca
atk-s0201a:2252_3: cattāro arūpino khandhe itarāni ca tīṇi ariyasaccāni anupubbena vibhajitvā dassessati,
atk-s0201a:2252_4: na hi sakkā ekappahārena dassetuṃ. Apica rājaputtūpamāyapi ayaṃ kamo vibhāvetabbo –
atk-s0201a:2253_0: Eko kira mahārājā, tassa parosahassaṃ puttā. So tesaṃ piḷandhanaparikkhāraṃ catūsu
atk-s0201a:2253_1: peḷāsu ṭhapetvā jeṭṭhaputtassa appesi – “idaṃ te, tāta, bhātikānaṃ piḷandhanabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0201a:2253_2: tathārūpe chaṇe sampatte piḷandhanaṃ no dehīti yācantānaṃ dadeyyāsī”ti. So “sādhu
atk-s0201a:2253_3: devā”ti sāragabbhe paṭisāmesi, tathārūpe chaṇadivase rājaputtā rañño santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0201a:2253_4: “piḷandhanaṃ no, tāta, detha, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Tātā, jeṭṭhabhātikassa
atk-s0201a:2253_5: vo hatthe mayā piḷandhanaṃ ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ āharāpetvā piḷandhathāti. Te sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā
atk-s0201a:2253_6: tassa santikaṃ gantvā, “tumhākaṃ kira no hatthe piḷandhanabhaṇḍaṃ, taṃ dethā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2253_7: So evaṃ karissāmīti gabbhaṃ vivaritvā, catasso peḷāyo nīharitvā tisso ṭhapetvā ekaṃ
atk-s0201a:2253_8: vivaritvā, tato pañca samugge nīharitvā cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā, tato pañcasu
atk-s0201a:2253_9: karaṇḍesu nīharitesu cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā pidhānaṃ passe ṭhapetvā tato
atk-s0201a:2253_10: hatthūpagapādūpagādīni nānappakārāni piḷandhanāni nīharitvā adāsi. So kiñcāpi itarehi
atk-s0201a:2253_11: catūhi karaṇḍehi itarehi catūhi samuggehi itarāhi tīhi peḷāhi na tāva bhājetvā deti,
atk-s0201a:2253_12: anupubbena pana dassati, na hi sakkā ekappahārena dātuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2254_0: Tattha mahārājā viya bhagavā daṭṭhabbo. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “rājāhamasmi selāti bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:2254_1: dhammarājā anuttaro”ti. Jeṭṭhaputto viya sāriputtatthero, vuttampi cetaṃ – “yaṃ kho
atk-s0201a:2254_2: taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya, ‘bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jāto dhammajo
atk-s0201a:2254_3: dhammanimmito dhammadāyādo, no āmisadāyādo’ti sāriputtameva taṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya,
atk-s0201a:2254_4: bhagavato putto…pe… no āmisadāyādo”ti. Parosahassarājaputtā viya bhikkhusaṅgho daṭṭhabbo. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:2257_0: Rañño tesaṃ puttānaṃ piḷandhanaṃ catūsu peḷāsu pakkhipitvā jeṭṭhaputtassa hatthe
atk-s0201a:2257_1: ṭhapitakālo viya bhagavato dhammasenāpatissa hatthe catusaccappakāsanāya ṭhapitakālo,
atk-s0201a:2257_2: tenevāha – “sāriputto, bhikkhave, pahoti cattāri ariyasaccāni vitthārena ācikkhituṃ
atk-s0201a:2257_3: desetuṃ paññāpetuṃ paṭṭhapetuṃ vivarituṃ vibhajituṃ uttānīkātu”nti. Tathārūpe khaṇe
atk-s0201a:2257_4: tesaṃ rājaputtānaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā piḷandhanaṃ yācanakālo viya bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0201a:2257_5: vassūpanāyikasamaye āgantvā dhammadesanāya yācitakālo. Upakaṭṭhāya kira vassūpanāyikāya
atk-s0201a:2257_6: idaṃ suttaṃ desitaṃ. Rañño, “tātā, jeṭṭhabhātikassa vo hatthe mayā piḷandhanaṃ ṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2257_7: taṃ āharāpetvā piḷandhathā”ti vuttakālo viya sambuddhenāpi, “sevetha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:2257_8: sāriputtamoggallāne, bhajatha, bhikkhave, sāriputtamoggallāne. Paṇḍitā bhikkhū anuggāhakā
atk-s0201a:2257_9: sabrahmacārīna”nti evaṃ dhammasenāpatino santike bhikkhūnaṃ pesitakālo.
atk-s0201a:2258_0: Rājaputtehi rañño kathaṃ sutvā jeṭṭhabhātikassa santikaṃ gantvā piḷandhanaṃ yācitakālo
atk-s0201a:2258_1: viya bhikkhūhi satthukathaṃ sutvā dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkamma dhammadesanaṃ āyācitakālo.
atk-s0201a:2258_2: Jeṭṭhabhātikassa gabbhaṃ vivaritvā catasso peḷāyo nīharitvā ṭhapanaṃ viya dhammasenāpatissa
atk-s0201a:2258_3: imaṃ suttantaṃ ārabhitvā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ vasena mātikāya ṭhapanaṃ. Tisso peḷāyo
atk-s0201a:2258_4: ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā tato pañcasamugganīharaṇaṃ viya tīṇi ariyasaccāni ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2258_5: dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ vibhajantassa pañcakkhandhadassanaṃ. Cattāro samugge ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2258_6: ekaṃ vivaritvā tato pañcakaraṇḍanīharaṇaṃ viya cattāro arūpakkhandhe ṭhapetvā ekaṃ
atk-s0201a:2259_0: 302. Cattāro karaṇḍe ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā pidhānaṃ passe ṭhapetvā hatthūpagapādūpagādipiḷandhanadānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2259_1: viya tīṇi mahābhūtāni upādārūpañca ṭhapetvā ekaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vibhajantassa bāhiraṃ
atk-s0201a:2259_2: tāva pidhānaṃ viya ṭhapetvā ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā nānāsabhāvato vīsatiyā ākārehi
atk-s0201a:2260_0: Tassa pana rājaputtassa tehi catūhi karaṇḍehi catūhi samuggehi tīhi ca peḷāhi pacchā
atk-s0201a:2260_1: anupubbena nīharitvā piḷandhanadānaṃ viya therassāpi itaresañca tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2260_2: upādārūpānañca catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānañca tiṇṇaṃ ariyasaccānañca pacchā anupubbena
atk-s0201a:2260_3: bhājetvā dassanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ panetaṃ “katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā pathavīdhātū”tiādi
atk-s0201a:2260_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha ajjhattaṃ paccattanti ubhayampetaṃ niyakādhivacanameva. Kakkhaḷanti
atk-s0201a:2260_5: thaddhaṃ. Kharigatanti pharusaṃ. Upādinnanti na kammasamuṭṭhānameva, avisesena pana
atk-s0201a:2260_6: sarīraṭṭhakassetaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Sarīraṭṭhakañhi upādinnaṃ vā hotu, anupādinnaṃ vā, ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena
atk-s0201a:2260_7: sabbaṃ upādinnameva nāma. Seyyathidaṃ – kesā lomā…pe… udariyaṃ karīsanti idaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa
atk-s0201a:2260_8: kulaputtassa ajjhattikapathavīdhātuvasena tāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhattaṃ. Ettha pana
atk-s0201a:2260_9: manasikāraṃ ārabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gahetukāmena yaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0201a:2260_10: sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthāritameva. Matthaluṅgaṃ pana na idha pāḷiāruḷhaṃ. Tampi
atk-s0201a:2260_12: acetanā abyākatā suññā thaddhā pathavīdhātu evā”ti manasi kātabbaṃ. Yaṃ vā panaññampīti
atk-s0201a:2260_13: idaṃ itaresu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu anugatāya pathavīdhātuyā gahaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yā ceva
atk-s0201a:2260_14: kho pana ajjhattikā pathavīdhātūti yā ca ayaṃ vuttappakārā ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0201a:2260_15: Yā ca bāhirāti yā ca vibhaṅge, “ayo lohaṃ tipu sīsa”ntiādinā nayena āgatā bāhirā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0201a:2261_0: Ettāvatā therena ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu nānāsabhāvato vīsatiyā ākārehi vitthārena
atk-s0201a:2261_1: dassitā, bāhirā saṅkhepena. Kasmā? Yasmiñhi ṭhāne sattānaṃ ālayo nikanti patthanā
atk-s0201a:2261_2: pariyuṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmāso balavā hoti, tattha tesaṃ ālayādīnaṃ uddharaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2261_3: buddhā vā buddhasāvakā vā vitthārakathaṃ kathenti. Yattha pana na balavā, tattha
atk-s0201a:2261_4: kattabbakiccābhāvato saṅkhepena kathenti. Yathā hi kassako khettaṃ kasamāno yattha
atk-s0201a:2261_5: mūlasantānakānaṃ balavatāya naṅgalaṃ laggati, tattha goṇe ṭhapetvā paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā
atk-s0201a:2261_6: mūlasantānakāni chetvā chetvā uddharanto bahuṃ vāyāmaṃ karoti. Yattha tāni natthi,
atk-s0201a:2261_7: tattha balavaṃ payogaṃ katvā goṇe piṭṭhiyaṃ paharamāno kasatiyeva, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2262_0: Pathavīdhāturevesāti duvidhāpesā thaddhaṭṭhena kakkhaḷaṭṭhena pharusaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā
atk-s0201a:2262_1: pathavīdhātuyeva, āvusoti ajjhattikaṃ bāhirāya saddhiṃ yojetvā dasseti. Yasmā bāhirāya
atk-s0201a:2262_2: pathavīdhātuyā acetanābhāvo pākaṭo, na ajjhattikāya, tasmā sā bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisā
atk-s0201a:2262_3: acetanāyevāti gaṇhantassa sukhapariggaho hoti. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā dantena goṇena saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2262_4: yojito adanto katipāhameva visūkāyati vipphandati, atha na cirasseva damathaṃ upeti.
atk-s0201a:2262_5: Evaṃ ajjhattikāpi bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisāti gaṇhantassa katipāhameva acetanābhāvo
atk-s0201a:2262_6: na upaṭṭhāti, atha na cirenevassā acetanābhāvo pākaṭo hoti. Taṃ netaṃ mamāti taṃ
atk-s0201a:2262_7: ubhayampi na etaṃ mama, na esohamasmi, na eso me attāti evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya
atk-s0201a:2262_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathābhūtanti yathāsabhāvaṃ, tañhi aniccādisabhāvaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti
atk-s0201a:2263_0: Hoti kho so, āvusoti kasmā ārabhi? Bāhiraāpodhātuvasena bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā vināsaṃ
atk-s0201a:2263_1: dassetvā tato visesatarena upādinnāya sarīraṭṭhakapathavīdhātuyā vināsadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2263_2: Pakuppatīti āposaṃvaṭṭavasena vaḍḍhamānā kuppati. Antarahitā tasmiṃ samaye bāhirā
atk-s0201a:2263_3: pathavīdhātu hotīti tasmiṃ samaye koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe khārodakena vilīyamānā
atk-s0201a:2263_4: udakānugatā hutvā sabbā pabbatādivasena saṇṭhitā pathavīdhātu antarahitā hoti. Vilīyitvā
atk-s0201a:2263_5: udakameva hoti. Tāva mahallikāyāti tāva mahantāya.
atk-s0201a:2266_0: Evaṃ bahalatteneva mahantāya, vitthārato pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷappamāṇāya.
atk-s0201a:2266_1: Aniccatāti hutvā abhāvatā. Khayadhammatāti khayaṃ gamanasabhāvatā. Vayadhammatāti
atk-s0201a:2266_2: vayaṃ gamanasabhāvatā. Vipariṇāmadhammatāti pakativijahanasabhāvatā, iti sabbehipi
atk-s0201a:2266_3: imehi padehi aniccalakkhaṇameva vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana aniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2266_4: taṃ anattāti tīṇipi lakkhaṇāni āgatāneva honti. Mattaṭṭhakassāti parittaṭṭhitikassa,
atk-s0201a:2266_5: tattha dvīhākārehi imassa kāyassa parittaṭṭhititā veditabbā ṭhitiparittatāya ca sarasaparittatāya
atk-s0201a:2266_6: ca. Ayañhi atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha, na jīvati, na jīvissati. Anāgate cittakkhaṇe
atk-s0201a:2266_7: jīvissati, na jīvati, na jīvittha. Paccuppanne cittakkhaṇe jīvati, na jīvittha, na
atk-s0201a:2269: Idaṃ etasseva parittaṭṭhitidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ ṭhitiparittatāya parittaṭṭhititā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2270_0: Assāsapassāsūpanibaddhādibhāvena panassa sarasaparittatā veditabbā. Sattānañhi assāsūpanibaddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2270_1: jīvitaṃ, passāsūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, assāsapassāsūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, mahābhūtūpanibaddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2270_2: jīvitaṃ, kabaḷīkārāhārūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, viññāṇūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitanti visuddhimagge vitthāritaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2271_0: Taṇhupādinnassāti taṇhāya ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhassa ahanti vā mamanti vā asmīti vā.
atk-s0201a:2271_1: Atha khvāssa notevettha hotīti atha kho assa bhikkhuno evaṃ tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā
atk-s0201a:2271_2: passantassa ettha ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā ahanti vātiādi tividho taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāho
atk-s0201a:2271_3: noteva hoti, na hotiyevāti attho. Yathā ca āpodhātuvasena, evaṃ tejodhātuvāyodhātuvasenapi
atk-s0201a:2271_4: bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā antaradhānaṃ hoti. Idha pana ekaṃyeva āgataṃ. Itarānipi atthato veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a:2272_0: Tañce, āvusoti idha tassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa bhikkhuno sotadvāre pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapento
atk-s0201a:2272_1: balaṃ dasseti. Akkosantīti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti. Paribhāsantīti tayā idañcidañca
atk-s0201a:2272_2: kataṃ, evañca evañca taṃ karissāmāti vācāya paribhāsanti. Rosentīti ghaṭṭenti. Vihesentīti
atk-s0201a:2272_3: dukkhāpenti, sabbaṃ vācāya ghaṭṭanameva vuttaṃ. So evanti so dhātukammaṭṭhāniko evaṃ
