atk-s0201a:2272_4: sampajānāti. Uppannā kho me ayanti sampativattamānuppannabhāvena ca samudācāruppannabhāvena
atk-s0201a:2272_5: ca uppannā. Sotasamphassajāti upanissayavasena sotasamphassato jātā sotadvārajavanavedanā,
atk-s0201a:2272_6: phasso aniccoti sotasamphasso hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccoti passati. Vedanādayopi sotasamphassasampayuttāva
atk-s0201a:2272_7: veditabbā. Dhātārammaṇamevāti dhātusaṅkhātameva ārammaṇaṃ. Pakkhandatīti otarati.
atk-s0201a:2272_8: Pasīdatīti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe pasīdati, bhummavacanameva vā etaṃ. Byañjanasandhivasena
atk-s0201a:2272_9: “dhātārammaṇamevā”ti vuttaṃ, dhātārammaṇeyevāti ayamettha attho. Adhimuccatīti dhātuvasena
atk-s0201a:2272_10: evanti adhimokkhaṃ labhati, na rajjati, na dussati. Ayañhi sotadvāramhi ārammaṇe
atk-s0201a:2272_11: āpāthagate mūlapariññāāgantukatāvakālikavasena pariggahaṃ karoti, tassa vitthārakathā
atk-s0201a:2272_12: satipaṭṭhāne satisampajaññapabbe vuttā. Sā pana tattha cakkhudvāravasena vuttā, idha
atk-s0201a:2273_0: Evaṃ katapariggahassa hi dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa balavavipassakassa sacepi cakkhudvārādīsu
atk-s0201a:2273_1: ārammaṇe āpāthagate ayoniso āvajjanaṃ uppajjati, voṭṭhabbanaṃ patvā ekaṃ dve vāre
atk-s0201a:2273_2: āsevanaṃ labhitvā cittaṃ bhavaṅgameva otarati, na rāgādivasena uppajjati, ayaṃ koṭippatto
atk-s0201a:2273_3: tikkhavipassako. Aparassa rāgādivasena ekaṃ vāraṃ javanaṃ javati, javanapariyosāne
atk-s0201a:2273_4: pana rāgādivasena evaṃ me javanaṃ javitanti āvajjato ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2273_5: puna vāraṃ tathā na javati. Aparassa ekavāraṃ evaṃ āvajjato puna dutiyavāraṃ rāgādivasena
atk-s0201a:2273_6: javanaṃ javatiyeva, dutiyavārāvasāne pana evaṃ me javanaṃ javitanti āvajjato ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2273_7: pariggahitameva hoti, tatiyavāre tathā na uppajjati. Ettha pana paṭhamo atitikkho,
atk-s0201a:2273_8: tatiyo atimando, dutiyassa pana vasena imasmiṃ sutte, laṭukikopame, indriyabhāvane
atk-s0201a:2274_0: Evaṃ sotadvāre pariggahitavasena dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa balaṃ dassetvā idāni kāyadvāre
atk-s0201a:2274_1: dīpento tañce, āvusotiādimāha. Aniṭṭhārammaṇañhi patvā dvīsu vāresu kilamati sotadvāre
atk-s0201a:2274_2: ca kāyadvāre ca. Tasmā yathā nāma khettassāmī puriso kudālaṃ gahetvā khettaṃ anusañcaranto
atk-s0201a:2274_3: yattha vā tattha vā mattikapiṇḍaṃ adatvā dubbalaṭṭhānesuyeva kudālena bhūmiṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0201a:2274_4: satiṇamattikapiṇḍaṃ deti. Evameva mahāthero anāgate sikkhākāmā padhānakammikā kulaputtā
atk-s0201a:2274_5: imesu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ paṭṭhapetvā khippameva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantīti
atk-s0201a:2274_6: imesuyeva dvīsu dvāresu gāḷhaṃ katvā saṃvaraṃ desento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2275_0: Tattha samudācarantīti upakkamanti. Pāṇisamphassenāti pāṇippahārena, itaresupi eseva
atk-s0201a:2275_1: nayo. Tathābhūtoti tathāsabhāvo. Yathābhūtasminti yathāsabhāve. Kamantīti pavattanti.
atk-s0201a:2275_2: Evaṃ buddhaṃ anussaratotiādīsu itipi so bhagavātiādinā nayena anussarantopi buddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2275_3: anussarati, vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatāti anussarantopi anussaratiyeva. Svākkhāto
atk-s0201a:2275_4: bhagavatā dhammotiādinā nayena anussarantopi dhammaṃ anussarati, kakacūpamovādaṃ
atk-s0201a:2275_5: anussarantopi anussaratiyeva. Suppaṭipannotiādinā nayena anussarantopi saṅghaṃ anussarati,
atk-s0201a:2275_6: kakacokantanaṃ adhivāsayamānassa bhikkhuno guṇaṃ anussaramānopi anussaratiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2276_0: Upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātīti idha vipassanupekkhā adhippetā. Upekkhā kusalanissitā
atk-s0201a:2276_1: saṇṭhātīti idha chaḷaṅgupekkhā, sā panesā kiñcāpi khīṇāsavassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0201a:2276_2: arajjanādivasena pavattati, ayaṃ pana bhikkhu vīriyabalena bhāvanāsiddhiyā attano
atk-s0201a:2276_3: vipassanaṃ khīṇāsavassa chaḷaṅgupekkhāṭhāne ṭhapetīti vipassanāva chaḷaṅgupekkhā nāma jātā.
atk-s0201a:2277_0: 303. Āpodhātuniddese āpogatanti sabbaāpesu gataṃ allayūsabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ. Pittaṃ semhantiādīsu
atk-s0201a:2277_1: pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Pakuppatīti
atk-s0201a:2277_2: oghavasena vaḍḍhati, samuddato vā udakaṃ uttarati, ayamassa pākatiko pakopo, āposaṃvaṭṭakāle
atk-s0201a:2277_3: pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ udakapūrameva hoti. Ogacchantīti heṭṭhā gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2277_4: uddhane āropitaudakaṃ viya khayaṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇanti. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2278_0: 304. Tejodhātuniddese tejogatanti sabbatejesu gataṃ uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ. Tejo eva vā
atk-s0201a:2278_1: tejobhāvaṃ gatanti tejogataṃ. Purime āpogatepi pacchime vāyogatepi eseva nayo. Yena
atk-s0201a:2278_2: cāti yena tejogatena. Tasmiṃ kuppite ayaṃ kāyo santappati, ekāhikajarādibhāvena usumajāto
atk-s0201a:2278_3: hoti. Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrati, indriyavekallattaṃ balaparikkhayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2278_4: valipalitādibhāvañca pāpuṇāti. Yena ca pariḍayhatīti yena kuppitena ayaṃ kāyo dayhati,
atk-s0201a:2278_5: so ca puggalo dayhāmi dayhāmīti kandanto satadhotasappigosītacandanādilepañca tālavaṇṭavātañca
atk-s0201a:2278_6: paccāsīsati. Yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti yena taṃ
atk-s0201a:2278_7: asitaṃ vā odanādi, pītaṃ vā pānakādi, khāyitaṃ vā piṭṭhakhajjakādi, sāyitaṃ vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi
atk-s0201a:2278_8: sammā paripākaṃ gacchati, rasādibhāvena vivekaṃ gacchatīti attho. Ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0201a:2278_9: Vitthārato pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2279_0: Haritantanti haritameva. Allatiṇādiṃ āgamma nibbāyatīti attho. Panthantanti mahāmaggameva.
atk-s0201a:2279_1: Selantanti pabbataṃ. Udakantanti udakaṃ. Ramaṇīyaṃ vā bhūmibhāganti tiṇagumbādirahitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2279_2: vivittaṃ abbhokāsaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ. Anāhārāti nirāhārā nirupādānā, ayampi pakatiyāva
atk-s0201a:2279_3: tejovikāro vutto, tejosaṃvaṭṭakāle pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ jhāpetvā chārikāmattampi
atk-s0201a:2279_4: na tiṭṭhati. Nhārudaddulenāti cammanillekhanena. Aggiṃ gavesantīti evarūpaṃ sukhumaṃ
atk-s0201a:2279_5: upādānaṃ gahetvā aggiṃ pariyesanti, yaṃ appamattakampi usumaṃ labhitvā pajjalati,
atk-s0201a:2280_0: 305. Vāyodhātuniddese uddhaṅgamā vātāti uggārahikkārādipavattakā uddhaṃ ārohanavātā.
atk-s0201a:2280_1: Adhogamā vātāti uccārapassāvādinīharaṇakā adho orohanavātā. Kucchisayā vātāti antānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2280_2: bahivātā. Koṭṭhāsayā vātāti antānaṃ antovātā. Aṅgamaṅgānusārinoti dhamanījālānusārena
atk-s0201a:2280_3: sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakavātā. Assāsoti antopavisananāsikavāto.
atk-s0201a:2280_4: Passāsoti bahinikkhamananāsikavāto. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2280_5: siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2281_0: Gāmampi vahatīti sakalagāmampi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kurumānā ādāya gacchati, nigamādīsupi
atk-s0201a:2281_1: eseva nayo. Idha vāyosaṃvaṭṭakāle koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaviddhaṃsanavasena vāyodhātuvikāro
atk-s0201a:2281_2: dassito. Vidhūpanenāti aggibījanakena. Ossavaneti chadanagge, tena hi udakaṃ savati,
atk-s0201a:2281_3: tasmā taṃ “ossavana”nti vuccati. Sesamidhāpi purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2282_0: 306. Seyyathāpi, āvusoti idha kiṃ dasseti? Heṭṭhā kathitānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ nissattabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2282_1: Kaṭṭhanti dabbasambhāraṃ. Vallinti ābandhanavalliṃ. Tiṇanti chadanatiṇaṃ. Mattikanti
atk-s0201a:2282_2: anulepamattikaṃ. Ākāso parivāritoti etāni kaṭṭhādīni anto ca bahi ca parivāretvā
atk-s0201a:2282_3: ākāso ṭhitoti attho. Agāraṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti agāranti paṇṇattimattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2282_4: Kaṭṭhādīsu pana visuṃ visuṃ rāsikatesu kaṭṭharāsivallirāsītveva vuccati. Evameva
atk-s0201a:2282_5: khoti evameva aṭṭhiādīni anto ca bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso, tāneva aṭṭhiādīni
atk-s0201a:2282_6: paṭicca rūpaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati, sarīranti vohāraṃ gacchati. Yathā kaṭṭhādīni
atk-s0201a:2282_7: paṭicca gehanti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ agāraṃ khattiyagehaṃ brāhmaṇagehanti vuccati, evamidampi
atk-s0201a:2282_8: khattiyasarīraṃ brāhmaṇasarīranti vuccati, na hettha koci satto vā jīvo vā vijjati.
atk-s0201a:2283_0: Ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhūti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? Heṭṭhā upādārūpaṃ cattāro ca
atk-s0201a:2283_1: arūpino khandhā tīṇi ca ariyasaccāni na kathitāni, idāni tāni kathetuṃ ayaṃ desanā
atk-s0201a:2283_2: āraddhāti. Tattha cakkhuṃ aparibhinnanti cakkhupasāde niruddhepi upahatepi pittasemhalohitehi
atk-s0201a:2283_3: palibuddhepi cakkhu cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti, paribhinnameva
atk-s0201a:2283_4: hoti, cakkhuviññāṇassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ aparibhinnaṃ nāma. Bāhirā
atk-s0201a:2283_5: ca rūpāti bāhirā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpā. Tajjo samannāhāroti taṃ cakkhuñca rūpe ca
atk-s0201a:2283_6: paṭicca bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā uppajjanamanasikāro, bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanasamatthaṃ cakkhudvāre
atk-s0201a:2283_7: kiriyamanodhātucittanti attho. Taṃ rūpānaṃ anāpāthagatattāpi aññāvihitassapi na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2284_0: Yaṃ tathābhūtassātiādīsu dvāravasena cattāri saccāni dasseti. Tattha tathābhūtassāti
atk-s0201a:2284_1: cakkhuviññāṇena sahabhūtassa, cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅginoti attho. Rūpanti cakkhuviññāṇassa
atk-s0201a:2284_2: na rūpajanakattā cakkhuviññāṇakkhaṇe tisamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ, tadanantaracittakkhaṇe catusamuṭṭhānampi
atk-s0201a:2284_3: labbhati. Saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti gaṇanaṃ gacchati. Vedanādayo cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttāva.
atk-s0201a:2284_4: Viññāṇampi cakkhuviññāṇameva. Ettha ca saṅkhārāti cetanāva vuttā. Saṅgahoti ekato
atk-s0201a:2284_5: saṅgaho. Sannipātoti samāgamo. Samavāyoti rāsi. Yo paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passatīti yo
atk-s0201a:2284_6: paccaye passati. So dhammaṃ passatīti so paṭiccasamuppannadhamme passati, chandotiādi
atk-s0201a:2284_7: sabbaṃ taṇhāvevacanameva, taṇhā hi chandakaraṇavasena chando. Ālayakaraṇavasena ālayo.
atk-s0201a:2284_8: Anunayakaraṇavasena anunayo. Ajjhogāhitvā gilitvā gahanavasena ajjhosānanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2284_9: Chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti nibbānasseva vevacanaṃ, iti tīṇi saccāni pāḷiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2284_10: āgatāneva maggasaccaṃ āharitvā gahetabbaṃ, yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo
atk-s0201a:2284_11: vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi bhāvanāpaṭivedho, ayaṃ maggoti. Bahukataṃ
atk-s0201a:2284_12: hotīti ettāvatāpi bahuṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti, ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, sotantiādivāresupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2285_0: Manodvāre pana ajjhattiko mano nāma bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Taṃ niruddhampi āvajjanacittassa
atk-s0201a:2285_1: paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandathāmagatameva pavattamānampi paribhinnaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2285_2: Āvajjanassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ aparibhinnaṃ nāma. Bāhirā ca dhammāti
atk-s0201a:2285_3: dhammārammaṇaṃ. Neva tāva tajjassāti idaṃ bhavaṅgasamayeneva kathitaṃ. Dutiyavāro
atk-s0201a:2285_5: vā, aññavihitakaṃ sandhāya vutto. Imasmiṃ vāre rūpanti catusamuṭṭhānampi labbhati.
atk-s0201a:2285_6: Manoviññāṇañhi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, vedanādayo manoviññāṇasampayuttā, viññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇameva.
atk-s0201a:2285_7: Saṅkhārā panettha phassacetanāvaseneva gahitā. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Iti
atk-s0201a:2285_8: mahāthero heṭṭhā ekadesameva sammasanto āgantvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā heṭṭhā parihīnadesanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2285_9: sabbaṃ taṃtaṃdvāravasena bhājetvā dassento yathānusandhināva suttantaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:2289: 307. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāsāropamasuttaṃ. Tattha acirapakkanteti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ruhiruppādakammaṃ katvā nacirapakkante saliṅgeneva pāṭiyekke jāte.
atk-s0201a:2290_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputtoti kiñcāpi asukakulaputtoti na niyāmito, devadattaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2290_1: pana sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. So hi asambhinnāya mahāsammatapaveṇiyā okkākavaṃse
atk-s0201a:2290_2: jātattā jātikulaputto. Otiṇṇoti yassa jāti anto anupaviṭṭhā, so jātiyā otiṇṇo nāma.
atk-s0201a:2290_3: Jarādīsupi eseva nayo. Lābhasakkārādīsupi lābhoti cattāro paccayā. Sakkāroti tesaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2290_4: sukatabhāvo. Silokoti vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ. Abhinibbattetīti uppādeti. Apaññātāti dvinnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2290_5: janānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne na paññāyanti, ghāsacchādanamattampi na labhanti. Appesakkhāti
atk-s0201a:2290_6: appaparivārā, purato vā pacchato vā gacchantaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0201a:2291_0: Sārena sārakaraṇīyanti rukkhasārena kattabbaṃ akkhacakkayuganaṅgalādikaṃ yaṃkiñci.
atk-s0201a:2291_1: Sākhāpalāsaṃ aggahesi brahmacariyassāti maggaphalasārassa sāsanabrahmacariyassa cattāro
atk-s0201a:2291_2: paccayā sākhāpalāsaṃ nāma, taṃ aggahesi. Tena ca vosānaṃ āpādīti teneva ca alamettāvatā
atk-s0201a:2292_0: 310. Ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādhetīti devadatto pañcābhiñño, dibbacakkhu ca pañcannaṃ abhiññānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2292_1: matthake ṭhitaṃ, taṃ imasmiṃ sutte “ñāṇadassana”nti vuttaṃ. Ajānaṃ apassaṃ viharantīti
atk-s0201a:2292_2: kiñci sukhumaṃ rūpaṃ ajānantā antamaso paṃsupisācakampi apassantā viharanti.
atk-s0201a:2293_0: 311. Asamayavimokkhaṃ ārādhetīti, “katamo asamayavimokkho? Cattāro ca ariyamaggā
atk-s0201a:2293_1: cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca, ayaṃ asamayavimokkho”ti evaṃ vutte navalokuttaradhamme
atk-s0201a:2293_2: ārādheti sampādeti paṭilabhati. Lokiyasamāpattiyo hi appitappitakkhaṇeyeva paccanīkadhammehi
atk-s0201a:2293_3: vimuccanti, tasmā, “katamo samayavimokkho? Cattāri ca jhānāni catasso ca arūpāvacarasamāpattiyo,
atk-s0201a:2293_4: ayaṃ samayavimokkho”ti evaṃ samayavimokkhoti vuttā. Lokuttaradhammā pana kālena kālaṃ
atk-s0201a:2293_5: vimuccanti, sakiṃ vimuttāni hi maggaphalāni vimuttāneva honti. Nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi
atk-s0201a:2293_6: accantaṃ vimuttamevāti ime nava dhammā asamayavimokkhoti vuttā.
atk-s0201a:2294_0: Akuppā cetovimuttīti arahattaphalavimutti. Ayamattho etassāti etadatthaṃ, arahattaphalatthamidaṃ
atk-s0201a:2294_1: brahmacariyaṃ. Ayaṃ etassa atthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Etaṃ sāranti etaṃ arahattaphalaṃ
atk-s0201a:2294_2: brahmacariyassa sāraṃ. Etaṃ pariyosānanti etaṃ arahattaphalaṃ brahmacariyassa pariyosānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2294_3: esā koṭi, na ito paraṃ pattabbaṃ atthīti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:2298_0: 312. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷasāropamasuttaṃ. Tattha piṅgalakocchoti so brāhmaṇo piṅgaladhātuko.
atk-s0201a:2298_1: Kocchoti panassa nāmaṃ, tasmā “piṅgalakoccho”ti vuccati. Saṅghinotiādīsu pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto
atk-s0201a:2298_2: saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti saṅghino. Sveva gaṇo etesaṃ atthīti gaṇino. Ācārasikkhāpanavasena
atk-s0201a:2298_3: tassa gaṇassa ācariyāti gaṇācariyā. Ñātāti paññātā pākaṭā. “Appicchā santuṭṭhā, appicchatāya
atk-s0201a:2298_4: vatthampi na nivāsentī”tiādinā nayena samuggato yaso etesaṃ atthīti yasassino. Titthakarāti
atk-s0201a:2298_5: laddhikarā. Sādhusammatāti ime sādhu sundarā sappurisāti evaṃ sammatā. Bahujanassāti
atk-s0201a:2298_6: assutavato andhabālaputhujjanassa. Idāni te dassento seyyathidaṃ pūraṇotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2298_7: Tattha pūraṇoti tassa satthupaṭiññassa nāmaṃ. Kassapoti gottaṃ. So kira aññatarassa
atk-s0201a:2298_8: kulassa ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamāno jāto, tenassa “pūraṇo”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Maṅgaladāsattā
atk-s0201a:2298_9: cassa “dukkaṭa”nti vattā natthi, akataṃ vā na katanti. “So kimahamettha vasāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2298_10: palāyi. Athassa corā vatthāni acchindiṃsu. So paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi
atk-s0201a:2298_11: ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi. Manussā taṃ disvā, “ayaṃ samaṇo arahā appiccho,
atk-s0201a:2298_12: natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamanti. So “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena
atk-s0201a:2298_13: idaṃ uppanna”nti tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi, tadeva pabbajjaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0201a:2298_14: Tassa santike aññepi pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu, taṃ sandhāyāha “pūraṇo kassapo”ti.
atk-s0201a:2299_0: Makkhalīti tassa nāmaṃ. Gosālāya jātattā gosāloti dutiyaṃ nāmaṃ. Taṃ kira sakaddamāya
atk-s0201a:2299_1: bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ, “tāta, mā khalī”ti sāmiko āha. So pamādena
atk-s0201a:2299_2: khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho. Sāmiko upadhāvitvā sāṭakakaṇṇe
atk-s0201a:2299_3: aggahesi. Sopi sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāyi, sesaṃ pūraṇasadisameva.
atk-s0201a:2300_0: Ajitoti tassa nāmaṃ. Kesakambalaṃ dhāretīti kesakambalo. Iti nāmadvayaṃ saṃsanditvā
atk-s0201a:2300_1: “ajito kesakambalo”ti vuccati. Tattha kesakambalo nāma manussakesehi katakambalo,
atk-s0201a:2300_2: tato paṭikiṭṭhataraṃ vatthaṃ nāma natthi. Yathāha – “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni
atk-s0201a:2300_3: kānici tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ, kesakambalo tesaṃ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyati, kesakambalo,
atk-s0201a:2300_4: bhikkhave, sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso”ti.
atk-s0201a:2301_0: Pakudhoti tassa nāmaṃ. Kaccāyanoti gottaṃ. Iti nāmagottaṃ saṃsanditvā, “pakudho kaccāyano”ti
atk-s0201a:2301_1: vuccati. Sītudakapaṭikkhittako esa, vaccaṃ katvāpi udakakiccaṃ na karoti, uṇhodakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2301_2: vā kañjiyaṃ vā labhitvā karoti, nadiṃ vā maggodakaṃ vā atikkamma, “sīlaṃ me bhinna”nti
atk-s0201a:2301_3: vālikathūpaṃ katvā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati, evarūpo nissirikaladdhiko esa.
atk-s0201a:2302_0: Sañjayoti tassa nāmaṃ. Belaṭṭhassa puttoti belaṭṭhaputto. Amhākaṃ gaṇṭhanakileso
atk-s0201a:2302_1: palibujjhanakileso natthi, kilesagaṇṭharahitā mayanti evaṃ vāditāya laddhanāmavasena
atk-s0201a:2302_2: nigaṇṭho. Nāṭassa puttoti nāṭaputto. Abbhaññaṃsūti yathā tesaṃ paṭiññā, tatheva jāniṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2302_3: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace nesaṃ sā paṭiññā niyyānikā sabbe abbhaññaṃsu. No ce, na abbhaññaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2302_4: Tasmā kiṃ tesaṃ paṭiññā niyyānikā na niyyānikāti, ayametassa pañhassa attho. Atha
atk-s0201a:2302_5: bhagavā nesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvakathanena atthābhāvato alanti paṭikkhipitvā upamāya
atk-s0201a:2302_6: atthaṃ pavedento dhammameva desetuṃ, dhammaṃ, te brāhmaṇa, desessāmīti āha.
atk-s0201a:2303_0: 320. Tattha sacchikiriyāyāti sacchikaraṇatthaṃ. Na chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatāchandaṃ
atk-s0201a:2303_1: na janayati. Na vāyamatīti vāyāmaṃ parakkamaṃ na karoti. Olīnavuttiko ca hotīti līnajjhāsayo
atk-s0201a:2303_2: hoti. Sāthalikoti sithilaggāhī, sāsanaṃ sithilaṃ katvā gaṇhāti, daḷhaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2304_0: 323. Idha, brāhmaṇa bhikkhu, vivicceva kāmehīti kathaṃ ime paṭhamajjhānādidhammā
atk-s0201a:2304_1: ñāṇadassanena uttaritarā jātāti? Nirodhapādakattā. Heṭṭhā paṭhamajjhānādidhammā hi
atk-s0201a:2304_2: vipassanāpādakā, idha nirodhapādakā, tasmā uttaritarā jātāti veditabbā. Iti bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2304_3: idampi suttaṃ yathānusandhināva niṭṭhapesi. Desanāvasāne brāhmaṇo saraṇesu patiṭṭhitoti.
atk-s0201a:2312_0: 325. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ. Tattha nātike viharatīti nātikā nāma ekaṃ
atk-s0201a:2312_1: taḷākaṃ nissāya dvinnaṃ cūḷapitimahāpitiputtānaṃ dve gāmā, tesu ekasmiṃ gāme. Giñjakāvasatheti
atk-s0201a:2312_2: iṭṭhakāmaye āvasathe. Ekasmiṃ kira samaye bhagavā mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto vajjiraṭṭhe
atk-s0201a:2312_3: cārikaṃ caramāno nātikaṃ anuppatto. Nātikavāsino manussā bhagavato mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0201a:2312_4: dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannahadayā, “satthu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karissāmā”ti mantetvā iṭṭhakāheva
atk-s0201a:2312_5: bhittisopānatthambhe vāḷarūpādīni dassento pāsādaṃ katvā sudhāya limpitvā mālākammalatākammādīni
atk-s0201a:2312_6: niṭṭhāpetvā bhummattharaṇamañcapīṭhādīni paññapetvā satthu niyyātesuṃ. Aparāparaṃ
atk-s0201a:2312_8: Iti so vihāro mahā ahosi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “giñjakāvasathe”ti.
atk-s0201a:2313_0: Gosiṅgasālavanadāyeti tattha ekassa jeṭṭhakarukkhassa khandhato gosiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2313_1: hutvā viṭapaṃ uṭṭhahi, taṃ rukkhaṃ upādāya sabbampi taṃ vanaṃ gosiṅgasālavananti
atk-s0201a:2313_2: saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. Dāyoti avisesena araññassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tasmā gosiṅgasālavanadāyeti gosiṅgasālavanaaraññeti
atk-s0201a:2313_3: attho. Viharantīti sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavamānā viharanti. Imesañhi kulaputtānaṃ uparipaṇṇāsake
atk-s0201a:2313_4: puthujjanakālo kathito, idha khīṇāsavakālo. Tadā hi te laddhassādā laddhapatiṭṭhā
atk-s0201a:2313_5: adhigatapaṭisambhidā khīṇāsavā hutvā sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavamānā tattha vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2314_1: asītimahāsāvakesu vā, antamaso dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaānandattherampi kañci anāmantetvā
atk-s0201a:2314_2: sayameva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya anīkā nissaṭo hatthī viya, yūthā nissaṭo kāḷasīho viya,
atk-s0201a:2314_3: vātacchinno valāhako viya ekakova upasaṅkami. Kasmā panettha bhagavā sayaṃ agamāsīti?
atk-s0201a:2314_4: Tayo kulaputtā sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavantā viharanti, tesaṃ paggaṇhanato, pacchimajanataṃ
atk-s0201a:2314_5: anukampanato dhammagarubhāvato ca. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “ahaṃ ime kulaputte paggaṇhitvā
atk-s0201a:2314_6: ukkaṃsitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ nesaṃ desessāmī”ti. Evaṃ tāva paggaṇhanato
atk-s0201a:2314_7: agamāsi. Aparampissa ahosi – “anāgate kulaputtā sammāsambuddho samaggavāsaṃ vasantānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2314_8: santikaṃ sayaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathetvā tayo kulaputte paggaṇhi,
atk-s0201a:2314_9: ko nāma samaggavāsaṃ na vaseyyāti samaggavāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ maññamānā khippameva dukkhassantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2314_10: karissantī”ti. Evaṃ pacchimajanataṃ anukampanatopi agamāsi. Buddhā ca nāma dhammagaruno
atk-s0201a:2314_11: honti, so ca nesaṃ dhammagarubhāvo rathavinīte āvikatova. Iti imasmā dhammagarubhāvatopi
atk-s0201a:2315_0: Dāyapāloti araññapālo. So taṃ araññaṃ yathā icchiticchitappadesena manussā pavisitvā
atk-s0201a:2315_1: tattha pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā niyyāsaṃ vā dabbasambhāraṃ vā na haranti, evaṃ vatiyā
atk-s0201a:2315_2: parikkhittassa tassa araññassa yojite dvāre nisīditvā taṃ araññaṃ rakkhati, pāleti.
atk-s0201a:2315_3: Tasmā “dāyapālo”ti vutto. Attakāmarūpāti attano hitaṃ kāmayamānasabhāvā hutvā viharanti.
atk-s0201a:2315_4: Yo hi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammadūtakammapahiṇagamanādīnaṃ vasena ekavīsatianesanāhi
atk-s0201a:2315_5: jīvikaṃ kappeti, ayaṃ na attakāmarūpo nāma. Yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā ekavīsatianesanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2315_6: pahāya catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhāya buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sappāyadhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:2315_7: aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmantaṃ pahāya araññaṃ
atk-s0201a:2315_8: pavisitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ kurumāno viharati, ayaṃ attakāmo
atk-s0201a:2315_9: nāma. Tepi tayo kulaputtā evarūpā ahesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “attakāmarūpā viharantī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2316_0: Mā tesaṃ aphāsumakāsīti tesaṃ mā aphāsukaṃ akāsīti bhagavantaṃ vāresi. Evaṃ kirassa
atk-s0201a:2316_1: ahosi – “ime kulaputtā samaggā viharanti, ekaccassa ca gataṭṭhāne bhaṇḍanakalahavivādā
atk-s0201a:2316_2: vattanti, tikhiṇasiṅgo caṇḍagoṇo viya ovijjhanto vicarati, athekamaggena dvinnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2316_3: gamanaṃ na hoti, kadāci ayampi evaṃ karonto imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ samaggavāsaṃ bhindeyya.
atk-s0201a:2316_4: Pāsādiko ca panesa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo surasagiddho maññe, gatakālato paṭṭhāya paṇītadāyakānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2316_5: attano upaṭṭhākānañca vaṇṇakathanādīhi imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ appamādavihāraṃ bhindeyya.
atk-s0201a:2316_6: Vasanaṭṭhānāni cāpi etesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibaddhāni paricchinnāni tisso ca paṇṇasālā
atk-s0201a:2316_7: tayo caṅkamā tīṇi divāṭṭhānāni tīṇi mañcapīṭhāni. Ayaṃ pana samaṇo mahākāyo vuḍḍhataro
atk-s0201a:2316_8: maññe bhavissati. So akāle ime kulaputte senāsanā vuṭṭhāpessati. Evaṃ sabbathāpi
atk-s0201a:2316_9: etesaṃ aphāsu bhavissatī”ti. Taṃ anicchanto, “mā tesaṃ aphāsukamakāsī”ti bhagavantaṃ vāresi.
atk-s0201a:2317_0: Kiṃ panesa jānanto vāresi, ajānantoti? Ajānanto. Kiñcāpi hi tathāgatassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato
atk-s0201a:2317_1: paṭṭhāya dasasahassacakkavāḷakampanādīni pāṭihāriyāni pavattiṃsu, araññavāsino pana
atk-s0201a:2317_2: dubbalamanussā sakammappasutā tāni sallakkhetuṃ na sakkonti. Sammāsambuddho ca nāma
atk-s0201a:2317_4: ca buddhānubhāvaṃ dassento vicarati, tadā ko esoti apucchitvāva jānitabbo hoti. Tadā
atk-s0201a:2317_5: pana bhagavā sabbampi taṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ cīvaragabbhena paṭicchādetvā valāhakagabbhena
atk-s0201a:2317_6: paṭicchanno puṇṇacando viya sayameva pattacīvaramādāya aññātakavesena agamāsi. Iti
atk-s0201a:2318_0: Etadavocāti thero kira mā samaṇāti dāyapālassa kathaṃ sutvāva cintesi – “mayaṃ tayo
atk-s0201a:2318_1: janā idha viharāma, aññe pabbajitā nāma natthi, ayañca dāyapālo pabbajitena viya
atk-s0201a:2318_2: saddhiṃ katheti, ko nu kho bhavissatī”ti divāṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya dvāre ṭhatvā maggaṃ
atk-s0201a:2318_3: olokento bhagavantaṃ addasa. Bhagavāpi therassa saha dassaneneva sarīrobhāsaṃ muñci,
atk-s0201a:2318_4: asītianubyañjanavirājitā byāmappabhā pasāritasuvaṇṇapaṭo viya virocittha. Thero,
atk-s0201a:2318_5: “ayaṃ dāyapālo phaṇakataṃ āsivisaṃ gīvāya gahetuṃ hatthaṃ pasārento viya loke aggapuggalena
atk-s0201a:2318_6: saddhiṃ kathentova na jānāti, aññatarabhikkhunā viya saddhiṃ kathetī”ti nivārento
atk-s0201a:2319_0: Tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ akatvā upasaṅkami? Evaṃ kirassa ahosi
atk-s0201a:2319_1: – “mayaṃ tayo janā samaggavāsaṃ vasāma, sacāhaṃ ekakova paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2319_2: samaggavāso nāma na bhavissatī”ti piyamitte gahetvāva paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi. Yathā
atk-s0201a:2319_3: ca bhagavā mayhaṃ piyo, evaṃ sahāyānampi me piyoti, tehi saddhiṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātukāmo
atk-s0201a:2319_4: sayaṃ akatvāva upasaṅkami. Keci pana tesaṃ therānaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre caṅkamanakoṭiyā
atk-s0201a:2319_5: bhagavato āgamanamaggo hoti, tasmā thero tesaṃ saññaṃ dadamānova gatoti. Abhikkamathāti
atk-s0201a:2319_6: ito āgacchatha. Pāde pakkhālesīti vikasitapadumasannibhehi jālahatthehi maṇivaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2319_7: udakaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇesu piṭṭhipādesu udakamabhisiñcitvā pādena pādaṃ ghaṃsanto
atk-s0201a:2319_8: pakkhālesi. Buddhānaṃ kāye rajojallaṃ nāma na upalimpati, kasmā pakkhālesīti? Sarīrassa
atk-s0201a:2319_9: utuggahaṇatthaṃ, tesañca cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ. Amhehi abhihaṭena udakena bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2319_10: pāde pakkhālesi, paribhogaṃ akāsīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ balavasomanassavasena cittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2319_11: pīṇitaṃ hoti, tasmā pakkhālesi. Āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ bhagavā etadavocāti so kira tesaṃ vuḍḍhataro.
atk-s0201a:2320_0: 326. Tassa saṅgahe kate sesānaṃ katova hotīti theraññeva etaṃ kacci vo anuruddhātiādivacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2320_1: avoca. Tattha kaccīti pucchanatthe nipāto. Voti sāmivacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kacci
atk-s0201a:2320_2: anuruddhā tumhākaṃ khamanīyaṃ, iriyāpatho vo khamati? Kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci vo jīvitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2320_3: yāpeti ghaṭiyati? Kacci piṇḍakena na kilamatha, kacci tumhākaṃ sulabhapiṇḍaṃ, sampatte
atk-s0201a:2320_4: vo disvā manussā uḷuṅkayāguṃ vā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ vā dātabbaṃ maññantīti bhikkhācāravattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2320_5: pucchati. Kasmā? Paccayena akilamantena hi sakkā samaṇadhammo kātuṃ, vattameva vā
atk-s0201a:2320_6: etaṃ pabbajitānaṃ. Atha tena paṭivacane dinne, “anuruddhā, tumhe rājapabbajitā mahāpuññā,
atk-s0201a:2320_7: manussā tumhākaṃ araññe vasantānaṃ adatvā kassa aññassa dātabbaṃ maññissanti, tumhe
atk-s0201a:2320_8: pana etaṃ bhuñjitvā kiṃ nu kho migapotakā viya aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭentā viharatha,
atk-s0201a:2320_9: udāhu sāmaggibhāvo vo atthī”ti sāmaggirasaṃ pucchanto, kacci pana vo, anuruddhā, samaggātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2321_0: Tattha khīrodakībhūtāti yathā khīrañca udakañca aññamaññaṃ saṃsandati, visuṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2321_1: ekattaṃ viya upeti, kacci evaṃ sāmaggivasena ekattūpagatacittuppādā viharathāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2321_2: Piyacakkhūhīti mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā olokanacakkhūni piyacakkhūni nāma. Kacci
atk-s0201a:2321_3: tathārūpehi cakkhūhi aññamaññaṃ sampassantā viharathāti pucchati. Tagghāti ekaṃsatthe
atk-s0201a:2321_4: nipāto. Ekaṃsena mayaṃ, bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā kathaṃ panāti ettha yathāti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2321_5: Kathanti kāraṇapucchā. Kathaṃ pana tumhe evaṃ viharatha, kena kāraṇena viharatha,
atk-s0201a:2321_6: taṃ me kāraṇaṃ brūthāti vuttaṃ hoti. Mettaṃ kāyakammanti mettacittavasena pavattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2321_7: kāyakammaṃ. Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ceva parammukhā ca. Itaresupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2322_0: Tattha sammukhā kāyavacīkammāni sahavāse labbhanti, itarāni vippavāse. Manokammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2322_1: sabbattha labbhati. Yañhi sahavasantesu ekena mañcapīṭhaṃ vā dārubhaṇḍaṃ vā mattikābhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0201a:2322_2: vā bahi dunnikkhittaṃ hoti, taṃ disvā kenidaṃ vaḷañjitanti avaññaṃ akatvā attanā
atk-s0201a:2322_3: dunnikkhittaṃ viya gahetvā paṭisāmentassa paṭijaggitabbayuttaṃ vā pana ṭhānaṃ paṭijaggantassa
atk-s0201a:2322_4: sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti. Ekasmiṃ pakkante tena dunnikkhittaṃ senāsanaparikkhāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2322_5: tatheva nikkhipantassa paṭijaggitabbayuttaṭṭhānaṃ vā pana paṭijaggantassa parammukhā
atk-s0201a:2322_6: mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti. Sahavasantassa pana tehi saddhiṃ madhuraṃ sammodanīyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2322_7: kathaṃ paṭisanthārakathaṃ sāraṇīyakathaṃ dhammīkathaṃ sarabhaññaṃ sākacchaṃ pañhapucchanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2322_8: pañhavissajjananti evamādikaraṇe sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti. Theresu pana
atk-s0201a:2322_9: pakkantesu mayhaṃ piyasahāyo nandiyatthero kimilatthero evaṃ sīlasampanno, evaṃ ācārasampannotiādiguṇakathanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2322_10: parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti. Mayhaṃ piyamitto nandiyatthero kimilatthero
atk-s0201a:2322_11: avero hotu, abyāpajjo sukhī hotūti evaṃ samannāharato pana sammukhāpi parammukhāpi
atk-s0201a:2323_0: Nānā hi kho no, bhante, kāyāti kāyañhi piṭṭhaṃ viya mattikā viya ca omadditvā ekato
atk-s0201a:2323_1: kātuṃ na sakkā. Ekañca pana maññe cittanti cittaṃ pana no hitaṭṭhena nirantaraṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:2323_2: aviggahaṭṭhena samaggaṭṭhena ekamevāti dasseti. Kathaṃ panetaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:2323_3: itaresaṃ cittavasena vattiṃsūti? Ekassa patte malaṃ uṭṭhahati, ekassa cīvaraṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2323_4: hoti, ekassa paribhaṇḍakammaṃ hoti. Tattha yassa patte malaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ, tena mamāvuso,
atk-s0201a:2323_5: patte malaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ pacituṃ vaṭṭatīti vutte itare mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ dhovitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2323_6: mayhaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ kātabbanti avatvā araññaṃ pavisitvā dārūni āharitvā chinditvā
atk-s0201a:2323_7: pattakaṭāhe paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā tato paraṃ cīvaraṃ vā dhovanti, paribhaṇḍaṃ vā karonti.
atk-s0201a:2323_8: Mamāvuso, cīvaraṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ dhovituṃ vaṭṭati, mama paṇṇasālā uklāpā paribhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0201a:2324_0: 327. Sādhu sādhu, anuruddhāti bhagavā heṭṭhā na ca mayaṃ, bhante, piṇḍakena kilamimhāti
atk-s0201a:2324_1: vutte na sādhukāramadāsi. Kasmā? Ayañhi kabaḷīkāro āhāro nāma imesaṃ sattānaṃ apāyalokepi
atk-s0201a:2324_2: devamanussalokepi āciṇṇasamāciṇṇova. Ayaṃ pana lokasannivāso yebhuyyena vivādapakkhando,
atk-s0201a:2324_3: apāyaloke devamanussalokepi ime sattā paṭiviruddhā eva, etesaṃ sāmaggikālo dullabho,
atk-s0201a:2324_4: kadācideva hotīti samaggavāsassa dullabhattā idha bhagavā sādhukāramadāsi. Idāni
atk-s0201a:2324_5: tesaṃ appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchanto kacci pana vo, anuruddhātiādimāha. Tattha voti
atk-s0201a:2324_6: nipātamattaṃ paccattavacanaṃ vā, kacci tumheti attho. Amhākanti amhesu tīsu janesu.
atk-s0201a:2324_7: Piṇḍāya paṭikkamatīti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā paccāgacchati. Avakkārapātinti atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0201a:2324_8: apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekaṃ samuggapātiṃ dhovitvā ṭhapeti.
atk-s0201a:2325_0: Yo pacchāti te kira therā na ekatova bhikkhācāraṃ pavisanti, phalasamāpattiratā hete.
atk-s0201a:2325_1: Pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā vattappaṭipattiṃ pūretvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā kālaparicchedaṃ
atk-s0201a:2325_2: katvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdanti. Tesu yo paṭhamataraṃ nisinno attano kālaparicchedavasena
atk-s0201a:2325_3: paṭhamataraṃ uṭṭhāti; so piṇḍāya caritvā paṭinivatto bhattakiccaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā jānāti
atk-s0201a:2325_4: – “dve bhikkhū pacchā, ahaṃ paṭhamataraṃ āgato”ti. Atha pattaṃ pidahitvā āsanapaññāpanādīni
atk-s0201a:2325_5: katvā yadi patte paṭivisamattameva hoti, nisīditvā bhuñjati. Yadi atirekaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2325_6: avakkārapātiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pātiṃ pidhāya bhuñjati. Katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0201a:2325_7: vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya osāpetvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a:2325_8: Dutiyopi āgantvāva jānāti – “eko paṭhamaṃ āgato, eko pacchato”ti. So sace patte bhattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2325_9: pamāṇameva hoti, bhuñjati. Sace mandaṃ, avakkārapātito gahetvā bhuñjati. Sace atirekaṃ
atk-s0201a:2325_10: hoti, avakkārapātiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pamāṇameva bhuñjitvā purimatthero viya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2325_11: pavisati. Tatiyopi āgantvāva jānāti – “dve paṭhamaṃ āgatā, ahaṃ pacchato”ti. Sopi
atk-s0201a:2325_12: dutiyatthero viya bhuñjitvā katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya
atk-s0201a:2325_13: osāpetvā āsanāni ukkhipitvā paṭisāmeti; pānīyaghaṭe vā paribhojanīyaghaṭe vā avasesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2325_14: udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā ghaṭe nikujjitvā avakkārapātiyaṃ sace avasesabhattaṃ hoti, taṃ vuttanayena
atk-s0201a:2325_15: jahitvā pātiṃ dhovitvā paṭisāmeti; bhattaggaṃ sammajjati. Tato kacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0201a:2325_16: sammajjaniṃ ukkhipitvā upacikāhi muttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pattacīvaramādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2325_17: pavisati. Idaṃ therānaṃ bahivihāre araññe bhattakiccakaraṇaṭṭhāne bhojanasālāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2326_0: Yo passatītiādi pana nesaṃ antovihāre vattanti veditabbaṃ. Tattha vaccaghaṭanti ācamanakumbhiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2326_1: Rittanti rittakaṃ. Tucchanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Avisayhanti ukkhipituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2326_2: atibhāriyaṃ. Hatthavikārenāti hatthasaññāya. Te kira pānīyaghaṭādīsu yaṃkiñci tucchakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2326_3: gahetvā pokkharaṇiṃ gantvā anto ca bahi ca dhovitvā udakaṃ parissāvetvā tīre ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2326_4: aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ hatthavikārena āmantenti, odissa vā anodissa vā saddaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0201a:2326_5: Kasmā odissa saddaṃ na karonti? Taṃ bhikkhuṃ saddo bādheyyāti. Kasmā anodissa saddaṃ
atk-s0201a:2326_6: na karonti? Anodissa sadde dinne, “ahaṃ pure, ahaṃ pure”ti dvepi nikkhameyyuṃ, tato
atk-s0201a:2326_7: dvīhi kattabbakamme tatiyassa kammacchedo bhaveyya. Saṃyatapadasaddo pana hutvā aparassa
atk-s0201a:2326_8: bhikkhuno divāṭṭhānasantikaṃ gantvā tena diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā hatthasaññaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:2326_9: tāya saññāya itaro āgacchati, tato dve janā hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbantā dvīsu hatthesu
atk-s0201a:2326_10: ṭhapetvā upaṭṭhapenti. Taṃ sandhāyāha – “hatthavikārena dutiyaṃ āmantetvā hatthavilaṅghakena upaṭṭhapemā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2327_0: Pañcāhikaṃ kho panāti cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyanti idaṃ tāva pakatidhammassavanameva,
atk-s0201a:2327_1: taṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā pañcame pañcame divase dve therā nātivikāle nhāyitvā anuruddhattherassa
atk-s0201a:2327_2: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti. Tattha tayopi nisīditvā tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0201a:2327_3: pañhaṃ pucchanti, aññamaññaṃ vissajjenti, tesaṃ evaṃ karontānaṃyeva aruṇaṃ uggacchati.
atk-s0201a:2327_4: Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettāvatā therena bhagavatā appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchitena pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva
atk-s0201a:2327_5: appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjitaṃ hoti. Aññesañhi bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ pavisanakālo,
atk-s0201a:2327_6: nikkhamanakālo, nivāsanaparivattanaṃ, cīvarapārupanaṃ, antogāme piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ dhammakathanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2327_7: anumodanaṃ, gāmato nikkhamitvā bhattakiccakaraṇaṃ, pattadhovanaṃ, pattaosāpanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2327_8: pattacīvarapaṭisāmananti papañcakaraṇaṭṭhānāni etāni. Tasmā thero amhākaṃ ettakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2327_9: ṭhānaṃ muñcitvā pamādakālo nāma natthīti dassento pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0201a:2328_0: 328. Athassa bhagavā sādhukāraṃ datvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ pucchanto puna atthi pana votiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2328_1: Tattha uttari manussadhammāti manussadhammato uttari. Alamariyañāṇadassanavisesoti
atk-s0201a:2328_2: ariyabhāvakaraṇasamattho ñāṇaviseso. Kiñhi no siyā, bhanteti kasmā, bhante, nādhigato
atk-s0201a:2328_3: bhavissati, adhigatoyevāti. Yāva devāti yāva eva.
atk-s0201a:2329_0: 329. Evaṃ paṭhamajjhānādhigame byākate dutiyajjhānādīni pucchanto etassa pana votiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2329_2: Sesaṃ sabbattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Pacchimapañhe pana lokuttarañāṇadassanavasena
atk-s0201a:2329_3: adhigataṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ pucchanto alamariyañāṇadassanavisesoti āha. Theropi pucchānurūpeneva
atk-s0201a:2329_4: byākāsi. Tattha yasmā vedayitasukhato avedayitasukhaṃ santataraṃ paṇītataraṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2329_5: tasmā aññaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ uttaritaraṃ vā paṇītataraṃ vā na samanupassāmāti āha.
atk-s0201a:2330_0: 330. Dhammiyā kathāyāti sāmaggirasānisaṃsappaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya. Sabbepi
atk-s0201a:2330_1: te catūsu saccesu pariniṭṭhitakiccā, tena tesaṃ paṭivedhatthāya kiñci kathetabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2330_2: natthi. Sāmaggirasena pana ayañca ayañca ānisaṃsoti sāmaggirasānisaṃsameva nesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2330_3: bhagavā kathesi. Bhagavantaṃ anusaṃyāyitvāti anugantvā. Te kira bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2330_4: gahetvā thokaṃ agamaṃsu, atha bhagavā vihārassa pariveṇapariyantaṃ gatakāle, “āharatha
atk-s0201a:2330_5: me pattacīvaraṃ, tumhe idheva tiṭṭhathā”ti pakkāmi. Tato paṭinivattitvāti tato ṭhitaṭṭhānato
atk-s0201a:2330_6: nivattitvā. Kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ āyasmatoti bhagavantaṃ nissāya pabbajjādīni adhigantvāpi
atk-s0201a:2330_7: attano guṇakathāya aṭṭiyamānā adhigamappicchatāya āhaṃsu. Imāsañca imāsañcāti paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2330_8: lokiyalokuttarānaṃ. Cetasā ceto paricca viditoti ajja me āyasmanto lokiyasamāpattiyā
atk-s0201a:2330_9: vītināmesuṃ, ajja lokuttarāyāti evaṃ cittena cittaṃ paricchinditvā viditaṃ. Devatāpi
atk-s0201a:2330_10: meti, bhante anuruddha, ajja ayyo nandiyatthero, ajja ayyo kimilatthero imāya ca
atk-s0201a:2330_11: imāya ca samāpattiyā vītināmesīti evamārocesunti attho. Pañhābhipuṭṭhenāti tampi
atk-s0201a:2330_12: mayā sayaṃ viditanti vā devatāhi ārocitanti vā ettakeneva mukhaṃ me sajjanti kathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2330_13: samuṭṭhāpetvā apuṭṭheneva me na kathitaṃ. Bhagavatā pana pañhābhipuṭṭhena pañhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2330_14: abhipucchitena satā byākataṃ, tatra me kiṃ na rocathāti āha.
atk-s0201a:2331_0: 331. Dīghoti “maṇi māṇivaro dīgho, atho serīsako sahā”ti evaṃ āgato aṭṭhavīsatiyā
atk-s0201a:2331_1: yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ abbhantaro eko devarājā. Parajanoti tasseva yakkhassa nāmaṃ. Yena
atk-s0201a:2331_2: bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti so kira vessavaṇena pesito etaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchanto bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2331_3: sayaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā giñjakāvasathato gosiṅgasālavanassa antare disvā bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2331_4: attanā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gosiṅgasālavane tiṇṇaṃ kulaputtānaṃ santikaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2331_5: Ajja mahatī dhammadesanā bhavissati. Mayāpi tassā desanāya bhāginā bhavitabbanti
atk-s0201a:2331_6: adissamānena kāyena satthu padānupadiko gantvā avidūre ṭhatvā dhammaṃ sutvā satthari
atk-s0201a:2331_7: gacchantepi na gato, – “ime therā kiṃ karissantī”ti dassanatthaṃ pana tattheva ṭhito.
atk-s0201a:2331_8: Atha te dve there anuruddhattheraṃ paliveṭhente disvā, – “ime therā bhagavantaṃ nissāya
atk-s0201a:2331_9: pabbajjādayo sabbaguṇe adhigantvāpi bhagavatova maccharāyanti, na sahanti, ativiya
atk-s0201a:2331_10: nilīyanti paṭicchādenti, na dāni tesaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ dassāmi, pathavito yāva brahmalokā
atk-s0201a:2331_11: etesaṃ guṇe pakāsessāmī”ti cintetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2332_0: Lābhā vata, bhanteti ye, bhante, vajjiraṭṭhavāsino bhagavantañca ime ca tayo kulaputte
atk-s0201a:2332_1: passituṃ labhanti, vandituṃ labhanti, deyyadhammaṃ dātuṃ labhanti, dhammaṃ sotuṃ
atk-s0201a:2332_2: labhanti, tesaṃ lābhā, bhante, vajjīnanti attho. Saddaṃ sutvāti so kira attano yakkhānubhāvena
atk-s0201a:2332_3: mahantaṃ saddaṃ katvā sakalaṃ vajjiraṭṭhaṃ ajjhottharanto taṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi. Tena
atk-s0201a:2332_4: cassa tesu rukkhapabbatādīsu adhivatthā bhummā devatā saddaṃ assosuṃ. Taṃ sandhāya
atk-s0201a:2332_5: vuttaṃ – “saddaṃ sutvā”ti. Anussāvesunti mahantaṃ saddaṃ sutvā sāvesuṃ. Esa nayo
atk-s0201a:2332_6: sabbattha. Yāva brahmalokāti yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā. Tañcepi kulanti, “amhākaṃ
atk-s0201a:2332_7: kulato nikkhamitvā ime kulaputtā pabbajitā evaṃ sīlavanto guṇavanto ācārasampannā
atk-s0201a:2332_8: kalyāṇadhammā”ti evaṃ tañcepi kulaṃ ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaṃ anussareyyāti
atk-s0201a:2332_9: evaṃ sabbattha attho daṭṭhabbo. Iti bhagavā yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:2336_0: 332. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāgosiṅgasuttaṃ. Tattha gosiṅgasālavanadāyeti idaṃ vasanaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2336_1: vuttaṃ. Aññesu hi suttesu, “sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti
atk-s0201a:2336_2: evaṃ paṭhamaṃ gocaragāmaṃ dassetvā pacchā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti. Imasmiṃ pana mahāgosiṅgasutte
atk-s0201a:2336_3: bhagavato gocaragāmo anibandho, kocideva gocaragāmo bhavissati. Tasmā vasanaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0201a:2336_4: paridīpitaṃ. Araññanidānakaṃ nāmetaṃ suttanti. Sambahulehīti bahukehi. Abhiññātehi
atk-s0201a:2336_5: abhiññātehīti sabbattha vissutehi pākaṭehi. Therehi sāvakehi saddhinti pātimokkhasaṃvarādīhi
atk-s0201a:2336_6: thirakārakeheva dhammehi samannāgatattā therehi, savanante jātattā sāvakehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2336_7: ekato. Idāni te there sarūpato dassento, āyasmatā ca sāriputtenātiādimāha. Tatthāyasmā
atk-s0201a:2336_8: sāriputto attano sīlādīhi guṇehi buddhasāsane abhiññāto. Cakkhumantānaṃ gaganamajjhe
atk-s0201a:2336_9: ṭhito sūriyo viya cando viya, samuddatīre ṭhitānaṃ sāgaro viya ca pākaṭo paññāto.
atk-s0201a:2336_10: Na kevalañcassa imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇavaseneva mahantatā veditabbā, ito aññesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2336_11: dhammadāyādasuttaṃ anaṅgaṇasuttaṃ sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ sīhanādasuttaṃ rathavinītaṃ mahāhatthipadopamaṃ
atk-s0201a:2336_12: mahāvedallaṃ cātumasuttaṃ dīghanakhaṃ anupadasuttaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbasuttaṃ saccavibhaṅgasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2336_13: piṇḍapātapārisuddhi sampasādanīyaṃ saṅgītisuttaṃ dasuttarasuttaṃ pavāraṇāsuttaṃ susimasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2336_15: etadagganti imesampi suttānaṃ vasena therassa mahantatā veditabbā. Etadaggasmiñhi,
atk-s0201a:2336_16: “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2337_0: Mahāmoggallānopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto
atk-s0201a:2337_1: pākaṭo mahā. Apicassa anumānasuttaṃ, cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ māratajjaniyasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2337_3: devalokagamanaṃ vimānavatthu petavatthu therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi
atk-s0201a:2337_4: vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo. Etadaggasmiñhi, “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2338_0: Mahākassapopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto
atk-s0201a:2338_1: pākaṭo mahā. Apicassa cīvaraparivattanasuttaṃ jiṇṇacīvarasuttaṃ candopamaṃ sakalaṃ
atk-s0201a:2338_2: kassapasaṃyuttaṃ mahāariyavaṃsasuttaṃ therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi
atk-s0201a:2338_3: vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo. Etadaggasmiñhi, “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2339_0: Anuruddhattheropi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto
atk-s0201a:2339_1: pākaṭo mahā. Apicassa cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ naḷakapānasuttaṃ anuttariyasuttaṃ upakkilesasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2339_2: anuruddhasaṃyuttaṃ mahāpurisavitakkasuttaṃ therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi
atk-s0201a:2339_3: vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo. Etadaggasmiñhi, “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2340_0: Āyasmatā ca revatenāti ettha pana dve revatā khadiravaniyarevato ca kaṅkhārevato
atk-s0201a:2340_1: ca. Tattha khadiravaniyarevato dhammasenāpatittherassa kaniṭṭhabhātiko, na so idha
atk-s0201a:2340_2: adhippeto. “Akappiyo guḷo, akappiyā muggā”ti evaṃ kaṅkhābahulo pana thero idha revatoti
atk-s0201a:2340_3: adhippeto. Sopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto
atk-s0201a:2340_4: pākaṭo mahā. Apicassa abhinikkhamanenapi etadaggenapi mahantabhāvo veditabbo. Etadaggasmiñhi,
atk-s0201a:2340_5: “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yadidaṃ kaṅkhārevato”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2341_0: Ānandattheropi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto
atk-s0201a:2341_1: pākaṭo mahā. Apicassa sekkhasuttaṃ bāhitikasuttaṃ āneñjasappāyaṃ gopakamoggallānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2341_2: bahudhātukaṃ cūḷasuññataṃ mahāsuññataṃ acchariyabbhutasuttaṃ bhaddekarattaṃ mahānidānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2341_4: imesampi vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo. Etadaggasmiñhi, “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
atk-s0201a:2341_5: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2342_0: Aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehīti na kevalañca eteheva, aññehi ca mahāguṇatāya
atk-s0201a:2342_1: pākaṭehi abhiññātehi bahūhi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṃ bhagavā gosiṅgasālavanadāye
atk-s0201a:2342_2: viharatīti attho. Āyasmā hi sāriputto sayaṃ mahāpañño aññepi bahū mahāpaññe bhikkhū
atk-s0201a:2342_3: gahetvā tadā dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihāsi. Āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sayaṃ iddhimā, āyasmā
atk-s0201a:2342_4: mahākassapo sayaṃ dhutavādo, āyasmā anuruddho sayaṃ dibbacakkhuko, āyasmā revato
atk-s0201a:2342_5: sayaṃ jhānābhirato, āyasmā ānando sayaṃ bahussuto aññepi bahū bahussute bhikkhū gahetvā
atk-s0201a:2342_6: tadā dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihāsi, evaṃ tadā ete ca aññe ca abhiññātā mahātherā tiṃsasahassamattā
atk-s0201a:2343_0: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti phalasamāpattivivekato vuṭṭhito. Yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkamīti
atk-s0201a:2343_1: thero kira paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito pacchimalokadhātuṃ olokento vanante kīḷantassa mattakhattiyassa
atk-s0201a:2343_2: kaṇṇato patamānaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ viya, saṃharitvā samugge pakkhipamānaṃ rattakambalaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2343_3: maṇināgadantato patamānaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ viya ca atthaṃ gacchamānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2343_4: paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ addasa. Tadanantaraṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento
atk-s0201a:2343_5: nemiyaṃ gahetvā parivattayamānaṃ rajatacakkaṃ viya, rajatakūṭato nikkhamantaṃ khīradhārāmaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0201a:2343_6: viya, sapakkhe papphoṭetvā gaganatale pakkhandamānaṃ setahaṃsaṃ viya ca meghavaṇṇāya
atk-s0201a:2343_8: ekūnapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ addasa. Tato sālavanaṃ olokesi. Tasmiñhi samaye
atk-s0201a:2343_9: sālarukkhā mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā sabbapāliphullā dukūlapārutā viya, muttākalāpavinaddhā
atk-s0201a:2343_10: viya ca virociṃsu. Bhūmitalaṃ pupphasantharapūjāya paṭimaṇḍitaṃ viya, tattha tattha
atk-s0201a:2343_11: nipatantena pupphareṇunā lākhārasena siñcamānaṃ viya ca ahosi. Bhamaramadhukaragaṇā
atk-s0201a:2343_12: kusumareṇumadamattā upagāyamānā viya vanantaresu vicaranti. Tadā ca uposathadivasova
atk-s0201a:2343_13: hoti. Atha thero, “kāya nu kho ajja ratiyā vītināmessāmī”ti cintesi, ariyasāvakā
atk-s0201a:2343_14: ca nāma piyadhammassavanā honti. Athassa etadahosi – “ajja mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa
atk-s0201a:2343_15: dhammasenāpatittherassa santikaṃ gantvā dhammaratiyā vītināmessāmī”ti. Gacchanto
atk-s0201a:2343_16: pana ekakova agantvā “mayhaṃ piyasahāyaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2343_17: nisinnaṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2344_0: Evamāvusoti kho āyasmā mahākassapoti theropi yasmā piyadhammassavanova ariyasāvako,
atk-s0201a:2344_1: tasmā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gacchāvuso, tvaṃ, mayhaṃ sīsaṃ vā rujjati piṭṭhi vāti kiñci
atk-s0201a:2344_2: lesāpadesaṃ akatvā tuṭṭhahadayova, “evamāvuso”tiādimāha. Paṭissutvā ca nisinnaṭṭhānato
atk-s0201a:2344_3: vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā mahāmoggallānaṃ anubandhi. Tasmiṃ samaye dve mahātherā
atk-s0201a:2344_4: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitāni dve candamaṇḍalāni viya, dve sūriyamaṇḍalāni viya, dve chaddantanāgarājāno
atk-s0201a:2344_5: viya, dve sīhā viya, dve byagghā viya ca virociṃsu. Anuruddhattheropi tasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0201a:2344_6: divāṭṭhāne nisinno dve mahāthere sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ gacchante disvā pacchimalokadhātuṃ
atk-s0201a:2344_7: olokento sūriyaṃ vanantaṃ pavisantaṃ viya, pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento candaṃ vanantato
atk-s0201a:2344_8: uggacchantaṃ viya, sālavanaṃ olokento sabbapāliphullameva sālavanañca disvā ajja
atk-s0201a:2344_9: uposathadivaso, ime ca me jeṭṭhabhātikā dhammasenāpatissa santikaṃ gacchanti, mahantena
atk-s0201a:2344_10: dhammassavanena bhavitabbaṃ, ahampi dhammassavanassa bhāgī bhavissāmīti nisinnaṭṭhānato
atk-s0201a:2344_11: vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā mahātherānaṃ padānupadiko hutvā nikkhami. Tena
atk-s0201a:2344_12: vuttaṃ – “atha kho āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno āyasmā ca mahākassapo āyasmā ca anuruddho
atk-s0201a:2344_13: yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṃsū”ti. Upasaṅkamiṃsūti. Paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā tayo candā
atk-s0201a:2344_14: viya, sūriyā viya, sīhā viya ca virocamānā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2345_0: 333. Evaṃ upasaṅkamante pana te mahāthere āyasmā ānando attano divāṭṭhāne nisinnoyeva
atk-s0201a:2345_1: disvā, “ajja mahantaṃ dhammassavanaṃ bhavissati, mayāpi tassa bhāginā bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2345_2: na kho pana ekakova gamissāmi, mayhaṃ piyasahāyampi revatattheraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2345_3: sabbaṃ mahāmoggallānassa mahākassapassa anuruddhassa upasaṅkamane vuttanayeneva vitthārato
atk-s0201a:2345_4: veditabbaṃ. Iti te dve janā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā dve candā viya, sūriyā viya, sīhā viya
atk-s0201a:2345_5: ca virocamānā upasaṅkamiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “addasā kho āyasmā sāriputto”tiādi. Disvāna
atk-s0201a:2345_6: āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocāti dūratova disvā anukkamena kathāupacāraṃ sampattametaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2345_7: “etu kho āyasmā”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Ramaṇīyaṃ, āvusoti ettha duvidhaṃ rāmaṇeyyakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2345_8: vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ puggalarāmaṇeyyakañca. Tattha vanaṃ nāma nāgasalaḷasālacampakādīhi
atk-s0201a:2345_9: sañchannaṃ hoti bahalacchāyaṃ pupphaphalūpagaṃ vividharukkhaṃ udakasampannaṃ gāmato
atk-s0201a:2345_10: nissaṭaṃ, idaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0201a:2348: Vanaṃ pana sacepi ujjaṅgale hoti nirudakaṃ viralacchāyaṃ kaṇṭakasamākiṇṇaṃ, buddhādayopettha ariyā viharanti, idaṃ puggalarāmaṇeyyakaṃ nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0201a:2349: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0201a:2351_0: Idha pana taṃ duvidhampi labbhati. Tadā hi gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ hoti
atk-s0201a:2351_1: kusumagandhasugandhaṃ, sadevake cettha loke aggapuggalo sammāsambuddho tiṃsasahassamattehi
atk-s0201a:2351_2: abhiññātabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ viharati. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “ramaṇīyaṃ, āvuso ānanda,
atk-s0201a:2352_0: Dosināti dosāpagatā, abbhaṃ mahikā dhūmo rajo rāhūti imehi pañcahi upakkilesehi virahitāti
atk-s0201a:2352_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbapāliphullāti sabbattha pāliphullā, mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā apupphitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2352_2: nāma natthi. Dibbā maññe gandhā sampavantīti dibbā mandārapupphakoviḷārapāricchattakacandanacuṇṇagandhā
atk-s0201a:2353_0: Kathaṃrūpena, āvuso ānandāti ānandatthero tesaṃ pañcannaṃ therānaṃ saṅghanavakova.
atk-s0201a:2353_1: Kasmā thero taṃyeva paṭhamaṃ pucchatīti? Mamāyitattā. Te hi dve therā aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0201a:2353_2: mamāyiṃsu. Sāriputtatthero, “mayā kattabbaṃ satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ karotī”ti ānandattheraṃ
atk-s0201a:2353_3: mamāyi. Ānandatthero bhagavato sāvakānaṃ aggoti sāriputtattheraṃ mamāyi, kuladārake
atk-s0201a:2353_4: pabbājetvā sāriputtattherassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpesi. Sāriputtattheropi tatheva
atk-s0201a:2353_5: akāsi. Evaṃ ekamekena attano pattacīvaraṃ datvā pabbājetvā upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpitāni pañca
atk-s0201a:2353_6: bhikkhusatāni ahesuṃ. Āyasmā ānando paṇītāni cīvarādīnipi labhitvā therasseva deti.
atk-s0201a:2354_0: Eko kira brāhmaṇo cintesi – “buddharatanassa ca saṅgharatanassa ca pūjā paññāyati,
atk-s0201a:2354_1: kathaṃ nu kho dhammaratanaṃ pūjitaṃ nāma hotī”ti? So bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2354_2: pucchi. Bhagavā āha – “sacesi, brāhmaṇa, dhammaratanaṃ pūjitukāmo, ekaṃ bahussutaṃ
atk-s0201a:2354_3: pūjehī”ti bahussutaṃ, bhante, ācikkhathāti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchati. So bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0201a:2354_4: upasaṅkamitvā bahussutaṃ, bhante, ācikkhathāti āha. Ānandatthero brāhmaṇāti. Brāhmaṇo
atk-s0201a:2354_5: theraṃ sahassagghanikena cīvarena pūjesi. Thero taṃ gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2354_6: Bhagavā “kuto, ānanda, laddha”nti āha. Ekena, bhante, brāhmaṇena dinnaṃ, idaṃ panāhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2354_7: āyasmato sāriputtassa dātukāmoti. Dehi, ānandāti. Cārikaṃ pakkanto, bhanteti. Āgatakāle
atk-s0201a:2354_8: dehīti. Sikkhāpadaṃ, bhante, paññattanti. Kadā pana sāriputto āgamissatīti? Dasāhamattena,
atk-s0201a:2354_9: bhanteti. “Anujānāmi, ānanda, dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ nikkhipitu”nti sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0201a:2354_10: paññapesi. Sāriputtattheropi tatheva yaṃkiñci manāpaṃ labhati, taṃ ānandattherassa
atk-s0201a:2354_11: deti. Evaṃ te therā aññamaññaṃ mamāyiṃsu, iti mamāyitattā paṭhamaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2355_0: Apica anumatipucchā nāmesā khuddakato paṭṭhāya pucchitabbā hoti. Tasmā thero cintesi
atk-s0201a:2355_1: – “ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ ānandaṃ pucchissāmi, ānando attano paṭibhānaṃ byākarissati. Tato
atk-s0201a:2355_2: revataṃ, anuruddhaṃ, mahākassapaṃ, mahāmoggallānaṃ pucchissāmi. Mahāmoggallāno attano
atk-s0201a:2355_3: paṭibhānaṃ byākarissati. Tato pañcapi therā maṃ pucchissanti, ahampi attano paṭibhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2355_4: byākarissāmī”ti. Ettāvatāpi ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā na bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2355_5: atha mayaṃ sabbepi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma, satthā sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0201a:2355_6: byākarissati. Ettāvatā ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā bhavissati. Yathā
atk-s0201a:2355_7: hi janapadamhi uppanno aṭṭo gāmabhojakaṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmiṃ nicchituṃ asakkonte janapadabhojakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2355_8: pāpuṇāti, tasmiṃ asakkonte mahāvinicchayaamaccaṃ, tasmiṃ asakkonte senāpatiṃ, tasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2355_9: asakkonte uparājaṃ, tasmiṃ vinicchituṃ asakkonte rājānaṃ pāpuṇāti, raññā vinicchitakālato
atk-s0201a:2355_10: paṭṭhāya aṭṭo aparāparaṃ na sañcarati, rājavacaneneva chijjati. Evamevaṃ ahañhi paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0201a:2355_11: ānandaṃ pucchissāmi…pe… atha mayaṃ sabbepi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma, satthā
atk-s0201a:2355_12: sabbaññutaññāṇena byākarissati. Ettāvatā ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā
atk-s0201a:2355_13: bhavissati. Evaṃ anumatipucchaṃ pucchanto thero paṭhamaṃ ānandattheraṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2356_0: Bahussuto hotīti bahu assa sutaṃ hoti, navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ pāḷianusandhipubbāparavasena
atk-s0201a:2356_1: uggahitaṃ hotīti attho. Sutadharoti sutassa ādhārabhūto. Yassa hi ito gahitaṃ ito
atk-s0201a:2356_2: palāyati, chiddaghaṭe udakaṃ viya na tiṭṭhati, parisamajjhe ekaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2356_3: vā kathetuṃ vā vācetuṃ vā na sakkoti, ayaṃ na sutadharo nāma. Yassa pana uggahitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2356_4: buddhavacanaṃ uggahitakālasadisameva hoti, dasapi vīsatipi vassāni sajjhāyaṃ akarontassa
atk-s0201a:2356_5: na nassati, ayaṃ sutadharo nāma. Sutasannicayoti sutassa sannicayabhūto. Yathā hi
atk-s0201a:2356_6: sutaṃ hadayamañjūsāya sannicitaṃ silāyaṃ lekhā viya, suvaṇṇaghaṭe pakkhittasīhavasā
atk-s0201a:2356_7: viya ca ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ sutasannicayo nāma. Dhātāti ṭhitā paguṇā. Ekaccassa
atk-s0201a:2356_8: hi uggahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhātaṃ paguṇaṃ niccalitaṃ na hoti, asukasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2356_9: vā kathehīti vutte sajjhāyitvā saṃsanditvā samanuggāhitvā jānissāmīti vadati. Ekaccassa
atk-s0201a:2356_10: dhātaṃ paguṇaṃ bhavaṅgasotasadisaṃ hoti, asukasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehīti vutte
atk-s0201a:2356_11: uddharitvā tameva katheti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “dhātā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2357_0: Vacasā paricitāti suttadasaka-vaggadasaka-paṇṇāsadasakānaṃ vasena vācāya sajjhāyitā.
atk-s0201a:2357_1: Manasānupekkhitāti cittena anupekkhitā, yassa vācāya sajjhāyitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ manasā
atk-s0201a:2357_2: cintentassa tattha tattha pākaṭaṃ hoti. Mahādīpaṃ jāletvā ṭhitassa rūpagataṃ viya
atk-s0201a:2357_3: paññāyati. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā”ti. Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti
atk-s0201a:2357_4: atthato ca kāraṇato ca paññāya suppaṭividdhā. Parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehīti ettha
atk-s0201a:2357_5: padameva atthassa byañjanato padabyañjanaṃ, taṃ akkharapāripūriṃ katvā dasavidhabyañjanabuddhiyo
atk-s0201a:2357_6: aparihāpetvā vuttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nāma hoti, evarūpehi padabyañjanehīti attho. Apica
atk-s0201a:2357_7: yo bhikkhu parisati dhammaṃ desento suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhapitvā aññaṃ upārambhakaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2357_8: suttaṃ āharati, tassa upamaṃ katheti, tadatthaṃ ohāreti, evamidaṃ gahetvā ettha khipanto
atk-s0201a:2357_9: ekapasseneva pariharanto kālaṃ ñatvā vuṭṭhahati. Nikkhittasuttaṃ pana nikkhattamattameva
atk-s0201a:2357_10: hoti, tassa kathā aparimaṇḍalā nāma hoti. Yo pana suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:2357_11: bahi ekapadampi agantvā pāḷiyā anusandhiñca pubbāparañca amakkhento ācariyehi dinnanaye
atk-s0201a:2357_12: ṭhatvā tulikāya paricchindanto viya, gambhīramātikāya udakaṃ pesento viya, padaṃ
atk-s0201a:2357_13: koṭṭento sindhavājānīyo viya gacchati, tassa kathā parimaṇḍalā nāma hoti. Evarūpiṃ
atk-s0201a:2358_0: Anuppabandhehīti ettha yo bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathento suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā ārabhitvā
atk-s0201a:2358_1: āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya turitaturito araṇiṃ manthento viya, uṇhakhādanīyaṃ khādanto
atk-s0201a:2358_2: viya, pāḷiyā anusandhipubbāparesu gahitaṃ gahitameva aggahitaṃ aggahitameva ca katvā
atk-s0201a:2358_3: purāṇapaṇṇantaresu caramānaṃ godhaṃ uṭṭhapento viya tattha tattha paharanto osāpento
atk-s0201a:2358_4: ohāya gacchati. Yopi dhammaṃ kathento kālena sīghaṃ kālena dandhaṃ kālena mahāsaddaṃ
atk-s0201a:2358_5: kālena khuddakasaddaṃ karoti. Yathā petaggi kālena jalati, kālena nibbāyati, evameva
atk-s0201a:2358_6: idha petaggidhammakathiko nāma hoti, parisāya uṭṭhātukāmāya punappunaṃ ārabhati.
atk-s0201a:2358_7: Yopi kathento tattha tattha vitthāyati, nitthunanto kandanto viya katheti, imesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2358_8: sabbesampi kathā appabandhā nāma hoti. Yo pana suttaṃ ārabhitvā ācariyehi dinnanaye
atk-s0201a:2358_9: ṭhito acchinnadhāraṃ katvā nadīsotaṃ viya pavatteti, ākāsagaṅgato bhassamānaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2358_10: viya nirantaraṃ kathaṃ pavatteti, tassa kathā anuppabandhā hoti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2358_12: Evarūpenāti evarūpena bahussutena bhikkhunā tathārūpeneva bhikkhusatena bhikkhusahassena
atk-s0201a:2358_13: vā saṅghāṭikaṇṇena vā saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ, pallaṅkena vā pallaṅkaṃ āhacca nisinnena gosiṅgasālavanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2358_14: sobheyya. Iminā nayena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2359: 334. Paṭisallānaṃ assa ārāmoti paṭisallānārāmo. Paṭisallāne ratoti paṭisallānarato.
atk-s0201a:2360_0: 335. Sahassaṃ lokānanti sahassaṃ lokadhātūnaṃ. Ettakañhi therassa dhuvasevanaṃ āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2360_1: ākaṅkhamāno pana thero anekānipi cakkavāḷasahassāni voloketiyeva. Uparipāsādavaragatoti
atk-s0201a:2360_2: sattabhūmakassa vā navabhūmakassa vā pāsādavarassa upari gato. Sahassaṃ nemimaṇḍalānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2360_3: volokeyyāti pāsādapariveṇe nābhiyā patiṭṭhitānaṃ nemivaṭṭiyā nemivaṭṭiṃ āhacca ṭhitānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2360_4: nemimaṇḍalānaṃ sahassaṃ vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokeyya, tassa nābhiyopi pākaṭā honti,
atk-s0201a:2360_5: arāpi arantarānipi nemiyopi. Evameva kho, āvusoti, āvuso, evaṃ ayampi dibbacakkhuko
atk-s0201a:2360_6: bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā atikkantamānusakena sahassaṃ lokānaṃ voloketi. Tassa pāsāde
atk-s0201a:2360_7: ṭhitapurisassa cakkanābhiyo viya cakkavāḷasahasse sinerusahassaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Arā
atk-s0201a:2360_8: viya dīpā pākaṭā honti. Arantarāni viya dīpaṭṭhitamanussā pākaṭā honti. Nemiyo viya
atk-s0201a:2362_0: 337. No ca saṃsādentīti na osādenti. Sahetukañhi sakāraṇaṃ katvā pañhaṃ pucchituṃ
atk-s0201a:2362_1: vissajjitumpi asakkonto saṃsādeti nāma. Evaṃ na karontīti attho. Pavattinī hotīti
atk-s0201a:2363: 338. Yāya vihārasamāpattiyāti yāya lokiyāya vihārasamāpattiyā, yāya lokuttarāya vihārasamāpattiyā.
atk-s0201a:2364_0: 339. Sādhu sādhu sāriputtāti ayaṃ sādhukāro ānandattherassa dinno. Sāriputtattherena
atk-s0201a:2364_1: pana saddhiṃ bhagavā ālapati. Esa nayo sabbattha. Yathā taṃ ānandovāti yathā ānandova
atk-s0201a:2364_2: sammā byākaraṇamāno byākareyya, evaṃ byākataṃ ānandena attano anucchavikameva, ajjhāsayānurūpameva
atk-s0201a:2364_3: byākatanti attho. Ānandatthero hi attanāpi bahussuto, ajjhāsayopissa evaṃ hoti –
atk-s0201a:2364_4: “aho vata sāsane sabrahmacārī bahussutā bhaveyyu”nti. Kasmā? Bahussutassa hi kappiyākappiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2364_5: sāvajjānavajjaṃ, garukalahukaṃ satekicchātekicchaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Bahussuto uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2364_6: āvajjitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, imasmiṃ samādhi, imasmiṃ vipassanā, imasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2364_7: maggaphalanibbānānīti sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā, samādhissa āgataṭṭhāne samādhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2364_8: pūretvā vipassanāya āgataṭṭhāne vipassanāgabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā maggaṃ bhāvetvā phalaṃ
atk-s0201a:2364_9: sacchikaroti. Tasmā therassa evaṃ ajjhāsayo hoti – “aho vata sabrahmacārī ekaṃ vā
atk-s0201a:2364_10: dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye uggahetvā āvajjantā sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhānesu
atk-s0201a:2364_11: sīlādīni paripūretvā anukkamena maggaphalanibbānāni sacchikareyyu”nti. Sesavāresupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2365_0: 340. Āyasmā hi revato jhānajjhāsayo jhānābhirato, tasmāssa evaṃ hoti – “aho vata
atk-s0201a:2365_1: sabrahmacārī ekikā nisīditvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā
atk-s0201a:2365_2: jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti. Tasmā evaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0201a:2366_0: 341. Āyasmā anuruddho dibbacakkhuko, tassa evaṃ hoti – “aho vata sabrahmacārī ālokaṃ
atk-s0201a:2366_1: vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā anekesu cakkavāḷasahassesu cavamāne ca upapajjamāne ca
atk-s0201a:2366_2: satte disvā vaṭṭabhayena cittaṃ saṃvejetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2367_0: 342. Āyasmā mahākassapo dhutavādo, tassa evaṃ hoti – “aho vata sabrahmacārī dhutavādā
atk-s0201a:2367_1: hutvā dhutaṅgānubhāvena paccayataṇhaṃ milāpetvā aparepi nānappakāre kilese dhunitvā
atk-s0201a:2367_2: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti. Tasmā evaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0201a:2368_0: 343. Āyasmā mahāmoggallāno samādhipāramiyā matthakaṃ patto, sukhumaṃ pana cittantaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2368_1: khandhantaraṃ dhātvantaraṃ āyatanantaraṃ jhānokkantikaṃ ārammaṇokkantikaṃ aṅgavavatthānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2368_3: ābhidhammikadhammakathikasseva pākaṭaṃ. Anābhidhammiko hi dhammaṃ kathento – “ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2368_4: sakavādo ayaṃ paravādo”ti na jānāti. Sakavādaṃ dīpessāmīti paravādaṃ dīpeti, paravādaṃ
atk-s0201a:2368_5: dīpessāmīti sakavādaṃ dīpeti, dhammantaraṃ visaṃvādeti. Ābhidhammiko sakavādaṃ sakavādaniyāmeneva,
atk-s0201a:2368_6: paravādaṃ paravādaniyāmeneva dīpeti, dhammantaraṃ na visaṃvādeti. Tasmā therassa
atk-s0201a:2368_7: evaṃ hoti – “aho vata sabrahmacārī ābhidhammikā hutvā sukhumesu ṭhānesu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā
atk-s0201a:2368_8: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti. Tasmā evaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0201a:2369_0: 344. Āyasmā sāriputto paññāpāramiyā matthakaṃ patto, paññavāyeva ca cittaṃ attano
atk-s0201a:2369_1: vase vattetuṃ sakkoti, na duppañño. Duppañño hi uppannassa cittassa vase vattetvā
atk-s0201a:2369_2: ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi katipāheneva gihibhāvaṃ patvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:2369_3: Tasmā therassa evaṃ hoti – “aho vata sabrahmacārī acittavasikā hutvā cittaṃ attano
atk-s0201a:2369_4: vase vattetvā sabbānassa visevitavipphanditāni bhañjitvā īsakampi bahi nikkhamituṃ
atk-s0201a:2369_5: adentā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti. Tasmā evaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0201a:2370_0: 345. Sabbesaṃ vo, sāriputta, subhāsitaṃ pariyāyenāti sāriputta, yasmā saṅghārāmassa
atk-s0201a:2370_1: nāma bahussutabhikkhūhipi sobhanakāraṇaṃ atthi, jhānābhiratehipi, dibbacakkhukehipi,
atk-s0201a:2370_2: dhutavādehipi, ābhidhammikehipi, acittavasikehipi sobhanakāraṇaṃ atthi. Tasmā sabbesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2370_3: vo subhāsitaṃ pariyāyena, tena tena kāraṇena subhāsitameva, no dubbhāsitaṃ. Apica
atk-s0201a:2370_4: mamapi suṇāthāti apica mamapi vacanaṃ suṇātha. Na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmīti
atk-s0201a:2370_5: na tāva ahaṃ imaṃ caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya ābhujitaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi, na
atk-s0201a:2370_6: mocessāmīti attho. Idaṃ kira bhagavā paripākagate ñāṇe rajjasiriṃ pahāya katābhinikkhamano
atk-s0201a:2370_7: anupubbena bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya aparājitapallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0201a:2370_8: daḷhasamādāno hutvā nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ bhinditvā paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0201a:2370_9: unnādento sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhi, taṃ attano mahābodhipallaṅkaṃ sandhāya evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2370_10: Apica pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamānopi paṭipattisāraṃ puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ dassento
atk-s0201a:2370_11: evamāha. Passati hi bhagavā – “anāgate evaṃ ajjhāsayā kulaputtā iti paṭisañcikkhissanti,
atk-s0201a:2370_12: ‘bhagavā mahāgosiṅgasuttaṃ kathento idha, sāriputta, bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ…pe… evarūpena
atk-s0201a:2370_13: kho, sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobheyyāti āha, mayaṃ bhagavato ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2370_14: gaṇhissāmā’ti pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya daḷhasamādānā
atk-s0201a:2370_15: hutvā ‘arahattaṃ appatvā imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ na bhindissāmā’ti samaṇadhammaṃ kātabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2370_16: maññissanti, te evaṃ paṭipannā katipāheneva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantī”ti,
atk-s0201a:2370_17: imaṃ pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamāno paṭipattisāraṃ puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ dassento
atk-s0201a:2370_18: evamāha. Evarūpena kho, sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobheyyāti, sāriputta,
atk-s0201a:2370_19: evarūpena bhikkhunā nippariyāyeneva gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobheyyāti yathānusandhināva
atk-s0201a:2374_0: 346. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāgopālakasuttaṃ. Tattha tisso kathā ekanāḷikā, caturassā,
atk-s0201a:2374_1: nisinnavattikāti. Tattha pāḷiṃ vatvā ekekapadassa atthakathanaṃ ekanāḷikā nāma. Apaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2374_2: gopālakaṃ dassetvā, apaṇḍitaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetvā, paṇḍitaṃ gopālakaṃ dassetvā, paṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2374_3: bhikkhuṃ dassetvāti catukkaṃ bandhitvā kathanaṃ caturassā nāma. Apaṇḍitaṃ gopālakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2374_4: dassetvā pariyosānagamanaṃ, apaṇḍitaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamanaṃ, paṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2374_5: gopālakaṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamanaṃ, paṇḍitaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamananti
atk-s0201a:2374_6: ayaṃ nisinnavattikā nāma. Ayaṃ idha sabbācariyānaṃ āciṇṇā.
atk-s0201a:2375_0: Ekādasahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehīti ekādasahi aguṇakoṭṭhāsehi. Gogaṇanti gomaṇḍalaṃ. Pariharitunti
atk-s0201a:2375_1: pariggahetvā vicarituṃ. Phātiṃ kātunti vaḍḍhiṃ āpādetuṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ loke. Na
atk-s0201a:2375_2: rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ na jānāti. Gaṇanato na jānāti nāma attano
atk-s0201a:2375_3: gunnaṃ sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vāti saṅkhyaṃ na jānāti. So gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā
atk-s0201a:2375_4: gogaṇaṃ gaṇetvā, ajja ettikā na dissantīti dve tīṇi gāmantarāni vā aṭaviṃ vā vicaranto
atk-s0201a:2375_5: na pariyesati, aññesaṃ gāvīsu attano gogaṇaṃ paviṭṭhāsupi gogaṇaṃ gaṇetvā, “imā ettikā
atk-s0201a:2375_6: gāvo na amhāka”nti yaṭṭhiyā pothetvā na nīharati, tassa naṭṭhā gāviyo naṭṭhāva honti.
atk-s0201a:2375_7: Paragāviyo gahetvā vicarantaṃ gosāmikā disvā, “ayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ amhākaṃ dhenuṃ
atk-s0201a:2375_8: gaṇhātī”ti tajjetvā attano gāviyo gahetvā gacchanti. Tassa gogaṇopi parihāyati, pañcagorasaparibhogatopi
atk-s0201a:2375_9: paribāhiro hoti. Vaṇṇato na jānāti nāma – “ettikā gāvo setā, ettikā rattā, ettikā
atk-s0201a:2375_10: kāḷā, ettikā kabarā ettikā nīlā”ti na jānāti, so gāvīsu haṭāsu vā…pe… pañcagorasaparibhogatopi paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2376_0: Na lakkhaṇakusalo hotīti gāvīnaṃ sarīre kataṃ dhanusattisūlādibhedaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na
atk-s0201a:2376_1: jānāti, so gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā ajja asukalakkhaṇā ca asukalakkhaṇā ca gāvo
atk-s0201a:2377_0: Na āsāṭikaṃ hāretāti gunnaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi pahaṭaṭṭhānesu vaṇo hoti. Tattha nīlamakkhikā
atk-s0201a:2377_1: aṇḍakāni pātenti, tesaṃ āsāṭikāti nāma. Tāni daṇḍena apanetvā bhesajjaṃ dātabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2377_2: hoti. Bālo gopālako tathā na karoti, tena vuttaṃ – “na āsāṭikaṃ hāretā hotī”ti. Tassa
atk-s0201a:2377_3: gunnaṃ vaṇā vaḍḍhanti, gambhīrā honti, pāṇakā kucchiṃ pavisanti, gāvo gelaññābhibhūtā
atk-s0201a:2377_4: neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ, na pānīyaṃ pātuṃ sakkonti. Tattha gunnaṃ khīraṃ
atk-s0201a:2377_5: chijjati, goṇānaṃ javo hāyati, ubhayesaṃ jīvitantarāyo hoti. Evamassa gogaṇopi parihāyati,
atk-s0201a:2378_0: Na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hotīti gunnaṃ vuttanayeneva sañjāto vaṇo bhesajjaṃ datvā vākena
atk-s0201a:2378_1: vā cīrakena vā bandhitvā paṭicchādetabbo hoti. Bālo gopālako tathā na karoti, athassa
atk-s0201a:2378_2: gunnaṃ vaṇehi yūsā paggharanti, tā aññamaññaṃ nighaṃsenti, tena aññesampi vaṇā jāyanti.
atk-s0201a:2378_3: Evaṃ gāvo gelaññābhibhūtā neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2379_0: Na dhūmaṃ kattā hotīti antovasse ḍaṃsamakasādīnaṃ ussannakāle gogaṇe vajaṃ paviṭṭhe
atk-s0201a:2379_1: tattha tattha dhūmo kātabbo hoti, apaṇḍito gopālako taṃ na karoti. Gogaṇo sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2379_2: ḍaṃsādīhi upadduto niddaṃ alabhitvā punadivase araññe tattha tattha rukkhamūlādīsu
atk-s0201a:2379_3: nipajjitvā niddāyati, neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ…pe… pañcagorasaparibhogatopi paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2380_0: Na titthaṃ jānātīti titthaṃ samanti vā visamanti vā sagāhanti vā niggāhanti vā na
atk-s0201a:2380_1: jānāti, so atitthena gāviyo otāreti. Tāsaṃ visamatitthe pāsāṇādīni akkamantīnaṃ pādā
atk-s0201a:2380_2: bhijjanti, sagāhaṃ gambhīraṃ titthaṃ otiṇṇā kumbhīlādayo gāhā gaṇhanti. Ajja ettikā
atk-s0201a:2380_3: gāvo naṭṭhā, ajja ettikāti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Evamassa gogaṇopi parihāyati, pañcagorasatopi paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2381_0: Na pītaṃ jānātīti pītampi apītampi na jānāti. Gopālakena hi “imāya gāviyā pītaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2381_1: imāya na pītaṃ, imāya pānīyatitthe okāso laddho, imāya na laddho”ti evaṃ pītāpītaṃ
atk-s0201a:2381_2: jānitabbaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ pana divasabhāgaṃ araññe gogaṇaṃ rakkhitvā pānīyaṃ pāyessāmīti
atk-s0201a:2381_3: nadiṃ vā taḷākaṃ vā gahetvā gacchati. Tattha mahāusabhā ca anuusabhā ca balavagāviyo
atk-s0201a:2381_4: ca dubbalāni ceva mahallakāni ca gorūpāni siṅgehi vā phāsukāhi vā paharitvā attano
atk-s0201a:2381_5: okāsaṃ katvā ūruppamāṇaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā yathākāmaṃ pivanti. Avasesā okāsaṃ alabhamānā
atk-s0201a:2381_6: tīre ṭhatvā kalalamissakaṃ udakaṃ pivanti, apītā eva vā honti. Atha ne gopālako piṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2381_7: paharitvā puna araññaṃ paveseti, tattha apītagāviyo pipāsāya sukkhamānā yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2381_8: tiṇāni khādituṃ na sakkonti, tattha gunnaṃ khīraṃ chijjati, goṇānaṃ javo hāyati…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2382_0: Na vīthiṃ jānātīti “ayaṃ maggo samo khemo, ayaṃ visamo sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo”ti na
atk-s0201a:2382_1: jānāti. So samaṃ khemaṃ maggaṃ vajjetvā gogaṇaṃ itaraṃ maggaṃ paṭipādeti, tattha
atk-s0201a:2382_2: gāvo sīhabyagghādīnaṃ gandhena coraparissayena vā abhibhūtā bhantamigasappaṭibhāgā
atk-s0201a:2382_3: gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā tiṭṭhanti, neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādanti, na pānīyaṃ pivanti,
atk-s0201a:2382_4: tattha gunnaṃ khīraṃ chijjati…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2383_0: Na gocarakusalo hotīti gopālakena hi gocarakusalena bhavitabbaṃ, pañcāhikavāro vā
atk-s0201a:2383_1: sattāhikavāro vā jānitabbo, ekadisāya gogaṇaṃ cāretvā punadivase tattha na cāretabbo.
atk-s0201a:2383_2: Mahatā hi gogaṇena ciṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ bheritalaṃ viya suddhaṃ hoti nittiṇaṃ, udakampi āluḷīyati.
atk-s0201a:2383_3: Tasmā pañcame vā sattame vā divase puna tattha cāretuṃ vaṭṭati, ettakena hi tiṇampi
atk-s0201a:2383_4: paṭiviruhati, udakampi pasīdati. Ayaṃ pana imaṃ pañcāhikavāraṃ vā sattāhikavāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2383_5: vā na jānāti, divase divase rakkhitaṭṭhāneyeva rakkhati. Athassa gogaṇo haritatiṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2383_6: na labhati, sukkhatiṇaṃ khādanto kalalamissakaṃ udakaṃ pivati, tattha gunnaṃ khīraṃ
atk-s0201a:2384_0: Anavasesadohī ca hotīti paṇḍitagopālakena yāva vacchakassa maṃsalohitaṃ saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:2384_1: tāva ekaṃ dve thane ṭhapetvā sāvasesadohinā bhavitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vacchakassa kiñci anavasesetvā
atk-s0201a:2384_2: duhati, khīrapako vaccho khīrapipāsāya sukkhati, saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto kampamāno mātu
atk-s0201a:2384_3: purato patitvā kālaṅkaroti. Mātā puttakaṃ disvā, “mayhaṃ puttako attano mātukhīraṃ
atk-s0201a:2384_4: pātumpi na labhatī”ti puttasokena na yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ, na pānīyaṃ pātuṃ
atk-s0201a:2384_5: sakkoti, thanesu khīraṃ chijjati. Evamassa gogaṇopi parihāyati, pañcagorasatopi paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2385_0: Gunnaṃ pituṭṭhānaṃ karontīti gopitaro. Gāvo pariṇayanti yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantīti
atk-s0201a:2385_1: gopariṇāyakā. Na atirekapūjāyāti paṇḍito hi gopālako evarūpe usabhe atirekapūjāya
atk-s0201a:2385_2: pūjeti, paṇītaṃ gobhattaṃ deti, gandhapañcaṅgulikehi maṇḍeti, mālaṃ pilandheti, siṅge
atk-s0201a:2385_3: suvaṇṇarajatakosake ca dhāreti, rattiṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā celavitānassa heṭṭhā sayāpeti.
atk-s0201a:2385_4: Ayaṃ pana tato ekasakkārampi na karoti, usabhā atirekapūjaṃ alabhamānā gogaṇaṃ na
atk-s0201a:2385_5: rakkhanti, parissayaṃ na vārenti. Evamassa gogaṇo parihāyati, pañcagorasato paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2386_0: 347. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Na rūpaññū hotīti, “cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2386_1: upādāyarūpa”nti evaṃ vuttarūpaṃ dvīhākārehi na jānāti gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā.
atk-s0201a:2386_2: Gaṇanato na jānāti nāma, “cakkhāyatanaṃ, sota-ghāna-jivhā-kāyāyatanaṃ, rūpa-sadda-gandha-rasa-phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2386_3: itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, kāyaviññatti, vacīviññatti, ākāsadhātu,
atk-s0201a:2386_4: āpodhātu, rūpassa lahutā, mudutā, kammaññatā, upacayo, santati, jaratā, rūpassa aniccatā,
atk-s0201a:2386_5: kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatā pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsāti na jānāti. Seyyathāpi
atk-s0201a:2386_6: so gopālako gaṇanato gunnaṃ rūpaṃ na jānāti, tathūpamo ayaṃ bhikkhu. So gaṇanato
atk-s0201a:2386_7: rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā paccayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2386_8: sallakkhetvā lakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti. So yathā
atk-s0201a:2386_9: tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati, evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane sīlasamādhivipassanāmaggaphalanibbānehi
atk-s0201a:2386_10: na vaḍḍhati, yathā ca so gopālako pañcahi gorasehi paribāhiro hoti, evaṃ asekkhena
atk-s0201a:2386_11: sīlakkhandhena, asekkhena samādhi, paññā, vimutti, vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhenāti
atk-s0201a:2387_0: Samuṭṭhānato na jānāti nāma, “ettakaṃ rūpaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānaṃ, ettakaṃ dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2387_1: ettakaṃ tisamuṭṭhānaṃ, ettakaṃ catusamuṭṭhānaṃ, ettakaṃ na kutocisamuṭṭhātī”ti na
atk-s0201a:2387_2: jānāti. Seyyathāpi so gopālako vaṇṇato gunnaṃ rūpaṃ na jānāti, tathūpamo ayaṃ bhikkhu.
atk-s0201a:2387_3: So samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2388_0: Na lakkhaṇakusalo hotīti kammalakkhaṇo bālo, kammalakkhaṇo paṇḍitoti evaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2388_1: kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ paṇḍitabālalakkhaṇanti na jānāti. So evaṃ ajānanto bāle vajjetvā
atk-s0201a:2388_2: paṇḍite na sevati, bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite asevanto kappiyākappiyaṃ kusalākusalaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ
atk-s0201a:2388_3: garukalahukaṃ satekicchaatekicchaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ na jānāti; taṃ ajānanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2388_4: gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti. So yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati, evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2388_5: imasmiṃ sāsane yathāvuttehi sīlādīhi na vaḍḍhati, gopālako viya ca pañcahi gorasehi
atk-s0201a:2389_0: Na āsāṭikaṃ hāretā hotīti uppannaṃ kāmavitakkanti evaṃ vutte kāmavitakkādike na vinodeti,
atk-s0201a:2389_1: so imaṃ akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā vitakkavasiko hutvā vicaranto kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2389_2: gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti, so yathā tassa gopālakassa…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2390_0: Na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hotīti cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hotītiādinā nayena
atk-s0201a:2390_1: sabbārammaṇesu nimittaṃ gaṇhanto yathā so gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti, evaṃ saṃvaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2390_2: na sampādeti. So vivaṭadvāro vicaranto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2391_0: Na dhūmaṃ kattā hotīti so gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karoti, dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2391_1: vā sarabhaññaṃ vā upanisinnakathaṃ vā anumodanaṃ vā na karoti. Tato naṃ manussā bahussuto
atk-s0201a:2391_2: guṇavāti na jānanti, te guṇāguṇaṃ ajānantā catūhi paccayehi saṅgahaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0201a:2391_3: So paccayehi kilamamāno buddhavacanaṃ sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2391_4: gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2392_0: Na titthaṃ jānātīti titthabhūte bahussutabhikkhū na upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto,
atk-s0201a:2392_1: “idaṃ, bhante, byañjanaṃ kathaṃ ropetabbaṃ, imassa bhāsitassa ko attho, imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0201a:2392_2: pāḷi kiṃ vadeti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne attho kiṃ dīpetī”ti evaṃ na paripucchati na paripañhati,
atk-s0201a:2392_3: na jānāpetīti attho. Tassa te evaṃ aparipucchato avivaṭañceva na vivaranti, bhājetvā
atk-s0201a:2392_4: na dassenti, anuttānīkatañca na uttānīkaronti, apākaṭaṃ na pākaṭaṃ karonti. Anekavihitesu
atk-s0201a:2392_5: ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesūti anekavidhāsu kaṅkhāsu ekaṃ kaṅkhampi na paṭivinodenti.
atk-s0201a:2392_6: Kaṅkhā eva hi kaṅkhāṭhāniyā dhammā nāma. Tattha ekaṃ kaṅkhampi na nīharantīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2392_7: So evaṃ bahussutatitthaṃ anupasaṅkamitvā sakaṅkho kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2392_8: na sakkoti. Yathā ca so gopālako titthaṃ na jānāti, evaṃ ayampi bhikkhu dhammatitthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2392_9: na jānāti, ajānanto avisaye pañhaṃ pucchati, abhidhammikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kappiyākappiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2392_10: pucchati, vinayadharaṃ upasaṅkamitvā rūpārūpaparicchedaṃ pucchati. Te avisaye puṭṭhā
atk-s0201a:2392_11: kathetuṃ na sakkonti, so attanā sakaṅkho kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2393_0: Na pītaṃ jānātīti yathā so gopālako pītāpītaṃ na jānāti, evaṃ dhammūpasañhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ
atk-s0201a:2393_1: na jānāti na labhati, savanamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ nissāya ānisaṃsaṃ na vindati,
atk-s0201a:2393_2: dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā sakkaccaṃ na suṇāti, nisinno niddāyati, kathaṃ katheti,
atk-s0201a:2393_3: aññavihitako hoti, so sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ asuṇanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na
atk-s0201a:2394_0: Na vīthiṃ jānātīti so gopālako maggāmaggaṃ viya, – “ayaṃ lokiyo ayaṃ lokuttaro”ti
atk-s0201a:2394_1: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti. Ajānanto lokiyamagge abhinivisitvā
atk-s0201a:2394_2: lokuttaraṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2395_0: Na gocarakusalo hotīti so gopālako pañcāhikavāre sattāhikavāre viya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne,
atk-s0201a:2395_1: “ime lokiyā ime lokuttarā”ti yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti. Ajānanto sukhumaṭṭhānesu attano
atk-s0201a:2395_2: ñāṇaṃ carāpetvā lokiyasatipaṭṭhāne abhinivisitvā lokuttaraṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2396_0: Anavasesadohī ca hotīti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto anavasesaṃ duhati. Niddesavāre
atk-s0201a:2396_1: panassa abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentīti abhiharitvā pavārenti. Ettha dve abhihārā vācābhihāro
atk-s0201a:2396_2: ca paccayābhihāro ca. Vācābhihāro nāma manussā bhikkhussa santikaṃ gantvā, “vadeyyātha,
atk-s0201a:2396_3: bhante, yenattho”ti pavārenti. Paccayābhihāro nāma vatthādīni vā telaphāṇitādīni
atk-s0201a:2396_4: vā gahetvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ gantvā, “gaṇhatha, bhante, yāvatakena attho”ti vadanti.
atk-s0201a:2396_5: Tatra bhikkhu mattaṃ na jānātīti bhikkhu tesu paccayesu pamāṇaṃ na jānāti, – “dāyakassa
atk-s0201a:2396_6: vaso veditabbo, deyyadhammassa vaso veditabbo, attano thāmo veditabbo”ti rathavinīte
atk-s0201a:2396_7: vuttanayena pamāṇayuttaṃ aggahetvā yaṃ āharanti, taṃ sabbaṃ gaṇhātīti attho. Manussā
atk-s0201a:2396_8: vippaṭisārino na puna abhiharitvā pavārenti. So paccayehi kilamanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2396_9: gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe… paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2397_0: Te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hotīti so gopālako mahāusabhe viya te there bhikkhū imāya
atk-s0201a:2397_1: āvi ceva raho ca mettāya kāyakammādikāya atirekapūjāya na pūjeti. Tato therā, – “ime
atk-s0201a:2397_2: amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontī”ti navake bhikkhū dvīhi saṅgahehi na saṅgaṇhanti,
atk-s0201a:2397_3: na āmisasaṅgahena cīvarena vā pattena vā pattapariyāpannena vā vasanaṭṭhānena vā.
atk-s0201a:2397_4: Kilamante milāyantepi nappaṭijagganti. Pāḷiṃ vā aṭṭhakathaṃ vā dhammakathābandhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2397_5: vā guyhaganthaṃ vā na sikkhāpenti. Navakā therānaṃ santikā sabbaso ime dve saṅgahe
atk-s0201a:2397_6: alabhamānā imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo
atk-s0201a:2397_7: na vaḍḍhati, evaṃ sīlādīni na vaḍḍhanti. Yathā ca so gopālako pañcahi gorasehi paribāhiro
atk-s0201a:2397_8: hoti, evaṃ pañcahi dhammakkhandhehi paribāhirā honti. Sukkapakkho kaṇhapakkhe vuttavipallāsavasena
atk-s0201a:2401_0: 350. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷagopālakasuttaṃ. Tattha ukkacelāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare.
atk-s0201a:2401_1: Tasmiṃ kira māpiyamāne rattiṃ gaṅgāsotato maccho thalaṃ patto. Manussā celāni telapātiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2401_2: temetvā ukkā katvā macchaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Nagare niṭṭhite tassa nāmaṃ karonte amhehi nagaraṭṭhānassa
