atk-s0201a:2401_3: gahitadivase celukkāhi maccho gahitoti ukkacelā-tvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Bhikkhū āmantesīti
atk-s0201a:2401_4: yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnassa sabbā gaṅgā pākaṭā hutvā paññāyati, tādise vālikussade gaṅgātitthe
atk-s0201a:2401_5: sāyanhasamaye mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisīditvā mahāgaṅgaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ sandamānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2401_6: olokento, – “atthi nu kho imaṃ gaṅgaṃ nissāya koci pubbe vaḍḍhiparihāniṃ patto”ti
atk-s0201a:2401_7: āvajjitvā, pubbe ekaṃ bālagopālakaṃ nissāya anekasatasahassā gogaṇā imissā gaṅgāya
atk-s0201a:2401_8: āvaṭṭe patitvā samuddameva paviṭṭhā, aparaṃ pana paṇḍitagopālakaṃ nissāya anekasatasahassagogaṇassa
atk-s0201a:2401_9: sotthi jātā vaḍḍhi jātā ārogyaṃ jātanti addasa. Disvā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2402_0: Māgadhakoti magadharaṭṭhavāsī. Duppaññajātikoti nippaññasabhāvo dandho mahājaḷo.
atk-s0201a:2402_1: Asamavekkhitvāti asallakkhetvā anupadhāretvā. Patāresīti tāretuṃ ārabhi. Uttaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2402_2: tīraṃ suvidehānanti gaṅgāya orime tīre magadharaṭṭhaṃ, pārime tīre videharaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2402_3: gāvo magadharaṭṭhato videharaṭṭhaṃ netvā rakkhissāmīti uttaraṃ tīraṃ patāresi. Taṃ
atk-s0201a:2402_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ – “uttaraṃ tīraṃ suvidehāna”nti. Āmaṇḍalikaṃ karitvāti maṇḍalikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2402_5: katvā. Anayabyasanaṃ āpajjiṃsūti avaḍḍhiṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, mahāsamuddameva pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2402_6: Tena hi gopālakena gāvo otārentena gaṅgāya orimatīre samatitthañca visamatitthañca
atk-s0201a:2402_7: oloketabbaṃ assa, majjhe gaṅgāya gunnaṃ vissamaṭṭhānatthaṃ dve tīṇi vālikatthalāni
atk-s0201a:2402_8: sallakkhetabbāni assu. Tathā pārimatīre tīṇi cattāri titthāni, imasmā titthā bhaṭṭhā
atk-s0201a:2402_9: imaṃ titthaṃ gaṇhissanti, imasmā bhaṭṭhā imanti. Ayaṃ pana bālagopālako orimatīre
atk-s0201a:2402_10: gunnaṃ otaraṇatitthaṃ samaṃ vā visamaṃ vā anoloketvāva majjhe gaṅgāya gunnaṃ vissamaṭṭhānatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2402_11: dve tīṇi vālikatthalānipi asallakkhetvāva paratīre cattāri pañca uttaraṇatitthāni
atk-s0201a:2402_12: asamavekkhitvāva atittheneva gāvo otāresi. Athassa mahāusabho javanasampannatāya
atk-s0201a:2402_13: ceva thāmasampannatāya ca tiriyaṃ gaṅgāya sotaṃ chetvā pārimaṃ tīraṃ patvā chinnataṭañceva
atk-s0201a:2402_15: alabhitvā paṭinivatti. Gāvo mahāusabho nivatto mayampi nivattissāmāti nivattā. Mahato
atk-s0201a:2402_16: gogaṇassa nivattaṭṭhāne udakaṃ chijjitvā majjhe gaṅgāya āvaṭṭaṃ uṭṭhapesi. Gogaṇo
atk-s0201a:2402_17: āvaṭṭaṃ pavisitvā samuddameva patto. Ekopi goṇo arogo nāma nāhosi. Tenāha – “tattheva
atk-s0201a:2403_0: Akusalā imassa lokassāti idha loke khandhadhātāyatanesu akusalā achekā, paralokepi
atk-s0201a:2403_1: eseva nayo. Māradheyyaṃ vuccati tebhūmakadhammā. Amāradheyyaṃ nava lokuttaradhammā.
atk-s0201a:2403_2: Maccudheyyampi tebhūmakadhammāva. Amaccudheyyaṃ nava lokuttaradhammā. Tattha akusalā
atk-s0201a:2403_3: achekā. Vacanatthato pana mārassa dheyyaṃ māradheyyaṃ. Dheyyanti ṭhānaṃ vatthu nivāso
atk-s0201a:2403_4: gocaro. Maccudheyyepi eseva nayo. Tesanti tesaṃ evarūpānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ, iminā
atk-s0201a:2404_0: 351. Evaṃ kaṇhapakkhaṃ niṭṭhapetvā sukkapakkhaṃ dassento bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2404_1: Tattha balavagāvoti dantagoṇe ceva dhenuyo ca. Dammagāvoti dametabbagoṇe ceva avijātagāvo
atk-s0201a:2404_2: ca. Vacchatareti vacchabhāvaṃ taritvā ṭhite balavavacche. Vacchaketi dhenupake taruṇavacchake.
atk-s0201a:2404_3: Kisābalaketi appamaṃsalohite mandathāme. Tāvadeva jātakoti taṃdivase jātako. Mātugoravakena
atk-s0201a:2404_4: vuyhamānoti mātā purato purato huṃhunti goravaṃ katvā saññaṃ dadamānā urena udakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2404_5: chindamānā gacchati, vacchako tāya goravasaññāya dhenuyā vā urena chinnodakena gacchamāno
atk-s0201a:2405_0: 352. Mārassa sotaṃ chetvāti arahattamaggena mārassa taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā. Pāraṃ gatāti
atk-s0201a:2405_1: mahāusabhā nadīpāraṃ viya saṃsārapāraṃ nibbānaṃ gatā. Pāraṃ agamaṃsūti mahāusabhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2405_2: pāraṅgatakkhaṇe gaṅgāya sotassa tayo koṭṭhāse atikkamma ṭhitā mahāusabhe pāraṃ patte
atk-s0201a:2405_3: disvā tesaṃ gatamaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā pāraṃ agamaṃsu. Pāraṃ gamissantīti catumaggavajjhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2405_4: kilesānaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse khepetvā ṭhitā idāni arahattamaggena avasesaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ
atk-s0201a:2405_5: chetvā balavagāvo viya nadīpāraṃ saṃsārapāraṃ nibbānaṃ gamissantīti. Iminā nayena
atk-s0201a:2405_6: sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. Dhammānusārino, saddhānusārinoti ime dve paṭhamamaggasamaṅgino.
atk-s0201a:2406_0: Jānatāti sabbadhamme jānantena buddhena. Suppakāsitoti sukathito. Vivaṭanti vivaritaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2406_1: Amatadvāranti ariyamaggo. Nibbānapattiyāti tadatthāya vivaṭaṃ. Vinaḷīkatanti vigatamānanaḷaṃ
atk-s0201a:2406_2: kataṃ. Khemaṃ patthethāti kattukamyatāchandena arahattaṃ patthetha, kattukāmā nibbattetukāmā
atk-s0201a:2406_3: hothāti attho. “Patta’tthā”tipi pāṭho. Evarūpaṃ satthāraṃ labhitvā tumhe pattāyeva
atk-s0201a:2406_4: nāmāti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva. Bhagavā pana yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:2410_0: 353. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷasaccakasuttaṃ. Tattha mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyanti mahāvanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2410_1: nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ. Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2410_2: himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ. Idaṃ tādisaṃ
atk-s0201a:2410_3: na hoti. Saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vananti mahāvanaṃ. Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya
atk-s0201a:2410_4: kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ antokatvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katā sabbākārasampannā buddhassa
atk-s0201a:2411_0: Saccako nigaṇṭhaputtoti pubbe kira eko nigaṇṭho ca nigaṇṭhī ca pañca pañca vādasatāni
atk-s0201a:2411_1: uggahetvā, vādaṃ āropessāmāti jambudīpe vicarantā vesāliyaṃ samāgatā. Licchavirājāno
atk-s0201a:2411_2: disvā, – “tvaṃ ko, tvaṃ kā”ti pucchiṃsu. Nigaṇṭho – “ahaṃ vādaṃ āropessāmīti jambudīpe
atk-s0201a:2411_3: vicarāmī”ti āha. Nigaṇṭhīpi tathā āha. Licchavino, “idheva aññamaññaṃ vādaṃ āropethā”ti
atk-s0201a:2411_4: āhaṃsu. Nigaṇṭhī attanā uggahitāni pañcavādasatāni pucchi, nigaṇṭho kathesi. Nigaṇṭhena
atk-s0201a:2411_5: pucchitepi nigaṇṭhī kathesiyeva. Ekassapi na jayo, na parājayo, ubho samasamāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2411_6: Licchavino, – “tumhe ubhopi samasamā āhiṇḍitvā kiṃ karissatha, idheva vasathā”ti
atk-s0201a:2411_7: gehaṃ datvā baliṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ. Tesaṃ saṃvāsamanvāya catasso dhītaro jātā, – ekā saccā
atk-s0201a:2411_8: nāma, ekā lolā nāma, ekā paṭācārā nāma, ekā ācāravatī nāma. Tāpi paṇḍitāva ahesuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2411_9: mātāpitūhi uggahitāni pañca pañca vādasatāni uggahesuṃ. Tā vayapattā mātāpitaro avocuṃ
atk-s0201a:2411_10: – “amhākaṃ ammā kule dārikā nāma hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni datvā kulagharaṃ pesitapubbā
atk-s0201a:2411_11: nāma natthi. Yo pana agāriko tāsaṃ vādaṃ maddituṃ sakkoti, tassa pādaparicārikā honti.
atk-s0201a:2411_12: Yo pabbajito tāsaṃ maddituṃ sakkoti, tassa santike pabbajanti. Tumhe kiṃ karissathā”ti?
atk-s0201a:2411_13: Mayampi evameva karissāmāti. Catassopi paribbājikavesaṃ gahetvā, “ayaṃ jambudīpo
atk-s0201a:2411_14: nāma jambuyā paññāyatī”ti jambusākhaṃ gahetvā cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu. Yaṃ gāmaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0201a:2411_15: tassa dvāre paṃsupuñje vā vālikapuñje vā jambudhajaṃ ṭhapetvā, – “yo vādaṃ āropetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2411_16: sakkoti, so imaṃ maddatū”ti vatvā gāmaṃ pavisanti. Evaṃ gāmena gāmaṃ vicarantiyo
atk-s0201a:2411_17: sāvatthiṃ pāpuṇitvā tatheva gāmadvāre jambudhajaṃ ṭhapetvā sampattamanussānaṃ ārocetvā
atk-s0201a:2412_0: Tena samayena bhagavā sāvatthiṃ nissāya jetavane viharati. Athāyasmā sāriputto gilāne
atk-s0201a:2412_1: pucchanto ajaggitaṭṭhānaṃ jagganto attano kiccamahantatāya aññehi bhikkhūhi divātaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2412_2: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto gāmadvāre jambudhajaṃ disvā, – “kimida”nti dārake pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2412_3: Te tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Tena hi maddathāti. Na sakkoma, bhante, bhāyāmāti. “Kumārā
atk-s0201a:2412_4: mā bhāyatha, ‘kena amhākaṃ jambudhajo maddāpito’ti vutte, buddhasāvakena sāriputtattherena
atk-s0201a:2412_5: maddāpito, vādaṃ āropetukāmā jetavane therassa santikaṃ gacchathāti vadeyyāthā”ti
atk-s0201a:2412_6: āha. Te therassa vacanaṃ sutvā jambudhajaṃ madditvā chaḍḍesuṃ. Thero piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0201a:2412_7: vihāraṃ gato. Paribbājikāpi gāmato nikkhamitvā, “amhākaṃ dhajo kena maddāpito”ti
atk-s0201a:2412_8: pucchiṃsu. Dārakā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Paribbājikā puna gāmaṃ pavisitvā ekekaṃ vīthiṃ
atk-s0201a:2412_9: gahetvā, – “buddhasāvako kira sāriputto nāma amhehi saddhiṃ vādaṃ karissati, sotukāmā
atk-s0201a:2412_10: nikkhamathā”ti ārocesuṃ. Mahājano nikkhami, tena saddhiṃ paribbājikā jetavanaṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2413_0: Thero – “amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne mātugāmassa āgamanaṃ nāma aphāsuka”nti vihāramajjhe
atk-s0201a:2413_1: nisīdi. Paribbājikāyo gantvā theraṃ pucchiṃsu – “tumhehi amhākaṃ dhajo maddāpito”ti?
atk-s0201a:2413_2: Āma, mayā maddāpitoti. Mayaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ vādaṃ karissāmāti. Sādhu karotha, kassa
atk-s0201a:2413_3: pucchā kassa vissajjanaṃ hotūti? Pucchā nāma amhākaṃ pattā, tumhe pana mātugāmā nāma
atk-s0201a:2413_4: paṭhamaṃ pucchathāti āha. Tā catassopi catūsu disāsu ṭhatvā mātāpitūnaṃ santike uggahitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2413_5: vādasahassaṃ pucchiṃsu. Thero khaggena kumudanāḷaṃ chindanto viya pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2413_6: nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā kathesi, kathetvā puna pucchathāti āha. Ettakameva, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2413_7: mayaṃ jānāmāti. Thero āha – “tumhehi vādasahassaṃ pucchitaṃ mayā kathitaṃ, ahaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:2413_8: ekaṃ yeva pañhaṃ pucchissāmi, taṃ tumhe kathethā”ti. Tā therassa visayaṃ disvā, “pucchatha,
atk-s0201a:2413_9: bhante, byākarissāmā”ti vattuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. “Vada, bhante, jānamānā byākarissāmā”ti puna āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2414_0: Thero ayaṃ pana kulaputte pabbājetvā paṭhamaṃ sikkhāpetabbapañhoti vatvā, – “ekaṃ
atk-s0201a:2414_1: nāma ki”nti pucchi. Tā neva antaṃ, na koṭiṃ addasaṃsu. Thero kathethāti āha. Na passāma,
atk-s0201a:2414_2: bhanteti. Tumhehi vādasahassaṃ pucchitaṃ mayā kathitaṃ, mayhaṃ tumhe ekaṃ pañhampi
atk-s0201a:2414_3: kathetuṃ na sakkotha, evaṃ sante kassa jayo kassa parājayoti? Tumhākaṃ, bhante, jayo,
atk-s0201a:2414_4: amhākaṃ parājayoti. Idāni kiṃ karissathāti? Tā mātāpitūhi vuttavacanaṃ ārocetvā,
atk-s0201a:2414_5: “tumhākaṃ santike pabbajissāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Tumhe mātugāmā nāma amhākaṃ santike pabbajituṃ
atk-s0201a:2414_6: na vaṭṭati, amhākaṃ pana sāsanaṃ gahetvā bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā pabbajathāti.
atk-s0201a:2414_7: Tā sādhūti therassa sāsanaṃ gahetvā bhikkhunisaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2414_8: Pabbajitā ca pana appamattā ātāpiniyo hutvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2415_0: Ayaṃ saccako tāsaṃ catunnampi kaniṭṭhabhātiko. Tāhi catūhipi uttaritarapañño, mātāpitūnampi
atk-s0201a:2415_1: santikā vādasahassaṃ, tato bahutarañca bāhirasamayaṃ uggahetvā katthaci agantvā rājadārake
atk-s0201a:2415_2: sippaṃ sikkhāpento tattheva vesāliyaṃ vasati, paññāya atipūritattā kucchi me bhijjeyyāti
atk-s0201a:2415_3: bhīto ayapaṭṭena kucchiṃ parikkhipitvā carati, imaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “saccako nigaṇṭhaputto”ti.
atk-s0201a:2416_0: Bhassappavādakoti bhassaṃ vuccati kathāmaggo, taṃ pavadati kathetīti bhassappavādako.
atk-s0201a:2416_1: Paṇḍitavādoti ahaṃ paṇḍitoti evaṃ vādo. Sādhusammato bahujanassāti yaṃ yaṃ nakkhattacārena
atk-s0201a:2416_2: ādisati, taṃ taṃ yebhuyyena tatheva hoti, tasmā ayaṃ sādhuladdhiko bhaddakoti evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2416_3: sammato mahājanassa. Vādena vādaṃ samāraddhoti kathāmaggena dosaṃ āropito. Āyasmā
atk-s0201a:2416_4: assajīti sāriputtattherassa ācariyo assajitthero. Jaṅghāvihāraṃ anucaṅkamamānoti
atk-s0201a:2416_5: tato tato licchavirājagehato taṃ taṃ gehaṃ gamanatthāya anucaṅkamamāno. Yenāyasmā
atk-s0201a:2417_0: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “ahaṃ ‘samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ āropessāmī’ti āhiṇḍāmi, ‘samayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2417_1: panassa na jānāmī’ti na āropesiṃ. Parassa hi samayaṃ ñatvā āropito vādo svāropito
atk-s0201a:2417_2: nāma hoti. Ayaṃ pana samaṇassa gotamassa sāvako paññāyati assajitthero; so attano
atk-s0201a:2417_3: satthu samaye kovido, etāhaṃ pucchitvā kathaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ
atk-s0201a:2417_4: āropessāmī”ti. Tasmā upasaṅkami. Vinetīti kathaṃ vineti, kathaṃ sikkhāpetīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2417_5: Thero pana yasmā dukkhanti vutte upārambhassa okāso hoti, maggaphalānipi pariyāyena
atk-s0201a:2417_6: dukkhanti āgatāni, ayañca dukkhanti vutte theraṃ puccheyya – “bho assaji, kimatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2417_7: tumhe pabbajitā”ti. Tato “maggaphalatthāyā”ti vutte, – “nayidaṃ, bho assaji, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0201a:2417_8: sāsanaṃ nāma, mahāāghātanaṃ nāmetaṃ, nirayussado nāmesa, natthi tumhākaṃ sukhāsā,
atk-s0201a:2417_9: uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya dukkhameva jirāpentā āhiṇḍathā”ti dosaṃ āropeyya, tasmā paravādissa
atk-s0201a:2417_10: pariyāyakathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yathā esa appatiṭṭho hoti, evamassa nippariyāyakathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2417_11: kathessāmīti cintetvā, “rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, anicca”nti imaṃ aniccānattavaseneva kathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2418_0: 354. Santhāgāreti rājakulānaṃ atthānusāsanasanthāgārasālāyaṃ. Yena te licchavī tenupasaṅkamīti
atk-s0201a:2418_1: evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “ahaṃ pubbe samayaṃ ajānanabhāvena samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ
atk-s0201a:2418_2: na āropesiṃ, idāni panassa mahāsāvakena kathitaṃ samayaṃ jānāmi, ime ca mama antevāsikā
atk-s0201a:2418_3: pañcasatā licchavī sannipatitā. Etehi saddhiṃ gantvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2418_4: tasmā upasaṅkami. Ñātaññatarenāti ñātesu abhiññātesu pañcavaggiyattheresu aññatarena.
atk-s0201a:2418_5: Patiṭṭhitanti yathā tena patiṭṭhitaṃ. Sace evaṃ patiṭṭhissati, atha pana aññadeva
atk-s0201a:2418_6: vakkhati, tatra mayā kiṃ sakkā kātunti idāneva piṭṭhiṃ parivattento āha. Ākaḍḍheyyāti
atk-s0201a:2418_7: attano abhimukhaṃ kaḍḍheyya. Parikaḍḍheyyāti purato paṭipaṇāmeyya. Samparikaḍḍheyyāti
atk-s0201a:2418_8: kālena ākaḍḍheyya, kālena parikaḍḍheyya. Soṇḍikākilañjanti surāghare piṭṭhakilañjaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2418_9: Soṇḍikādhuttoti surādhutto. Vālaṃ kaṇṇe gahetvāti surāparissāvanatthavikaṃ dhovitukāmo
atk-s0201a:2418_10: kasaṭanidhunanatthaṃ ubhosu kaṇṇesu gahetvā. Odhuneyyāti adhomukhaṃ katvā dhuneyya.
atk-s0201a:2418_11: Niddhuneyyāti uddhaṃmukhaṃ katvā dhuneyya. Nipphoṭeyyāti punappunaṃ papphoṭeyya.
atk-s0201a:2418_12: Sāṇadhovikaṃ nāmāti ettha manussā sāṇasāṭakakaraṇatthaṃ sāṇavāke gahetvā muṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2418_13: muṭṭhiṃ bandhitvā udake pakkhipanti. Te tatiyadivase suṭṭhu kilinnā honti. Atha manussā
atk-s0201a:2418_14: ambilayāgusurādīni ādāya tattha gantvā sāṇamuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā, dakkhiṇato vāmato sammukhā
atk-s0201a:2418_15: cāti tīsu phalakesu sakiṃ dakkhiṇaphalake, sakiṃ vāmaphalake, sakiṃ sammukhaphalake
atk-s0201a:2418_16: paharantā ambilayāgusurādīni bhuñjantā pivantā khādantā dhovanti. Mahantā kīḷā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2418_17: Rañño nāgo taṃ kīḷaṃ disvā gambhīraṃ udakaṃ anupavisitvā soṇḍāya udakaṃ gahetvā sakiṃ
atk-s0201a:2418_18: kumbhe sakiṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ sakiṃ ubhosu passesu sakiṃ antarasatthiyaṃ pakkhipanto kīḷittha.
atk-s0201a:2418_19: Tadupādāya taṃ kīḷitajātaṃ sāṇadhovikaṃ nāma vuccati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “sāṇadhovikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2418_20: nāma kīḷitajātaṃ kīḷatī”ti. Kiṃ so bhavamāno saccako nigaṇṭhaputto, yo bhagavato
atk-s0201a:2418_21: vādaṃ āropessatīti yo saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavato vādaṃ āropessati, so kiṃ bhavamāno
atk-s0201a:2418_22: kiṃ yakkho bhavamāno udāhu indo, udāhu brahmā bhavamāno bhagavato vādaṃ āropessati?
atk-s0201a:2418_23: Na hi sakkā pakatimanussena bhagavato vādaṃ āropetunti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a:2419_0: 355. Tena kho pana samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye saccako ārāmaṃ pāvisi, tasmiṃ. Kismiṃ
atk-s0201a:2419_1: pana samaye pāvisīti? Mahāmajjhanhikasamaye. Kasmā pana tasmiṃ samaye caṅkamantīti?
atk-s0201a:2419_2: Paṇītabhojanapaccayassa thinamiddhassa vinodanatthaṃ. Divāpadhānikā vā te. Tādisānañhi
atk-s0201a:2419_3: pacchābhattaṃ caṅkamitvā nhatvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpetvā nisajja samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2419_4: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Yena te bhikkhūti so kira kuhiṃ samaṇo gotamoti pariveṇato pariveṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2419_5: gantvā pucchitvā pavisissāmīti vilokento araññe hatthī viya caṅkame caṅkamamāne paṃsukūlikabhikkhū
atk-s0201a:2419_6: disvā tesaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. Taṃ sandhāya, “yena te bhikkhū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kahaṃ
atk-s0201a:2419_7: nu kho, bhoti katarasmiṃ āvāse vā maṇḍape vāti attho. Esa, aggivessana, bhagavāti
atk-s0201a:2419_8: tadā kira bhagavā paccūsakāle mahākaruṇā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷe
atk-s0201a:2419_9: sabbaññutaññāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā bodhaneyyasattaṃ olokento addasa – “sve saccako
atk-s0201a:2419_10: nigaṇṭhaputto mahatiṃ licchaviparisaṃ gahetvā mama vādaṃ āropetukāmo āgamissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2419_11: Tasmā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro vesāliyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0201a:2419_12: piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto mahāparisāya nisīdituṃ sukhaṭṭhāne nisīdissāmīti gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0201a:2419_13: apavisitvā mahāvane aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi. Te bhikkhū bhagavato
atk-s0201a:2419_14: vattaṃ dassetvā āgatā, saccakena puṭṭhā dūre nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassentā, “esa
atk-s0201a:2420_0: Mahatiyā licchaviparisāya saddhinti heṭṭhā pañcamattehi licchavisatehi parivutoti
atk-s0201a:2420_1: vuttaṃ. Te etassa antevāsikāyeva, antovesāliyaṃ pana saccako pañcamattāni licchavirājasatāni
atk-s0201a:2420_2: gahetvā, “vādatthiko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamanto”ti sutvā dvinnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ
atk-s0201a:2420_3: sossāmāti yebhuyyena manussā nikkhantā, evaṃ sā parisā mahatī aparicchinnagaṇanā
atk-s0201a:2420_4: ahosi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Añjaliṃ paṇāmetvāti ete ubhatopakkhikā, te evaṃ cintesuṃ
atk-s0201a:2420_5: – “sace no micchādiṭṭhikā codessanti, ‘kasmā tumhe samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ vanditthā’ti,
atk-s0201a:2420_6: tesaṃ, ‘kiṃ añjalimattakaraṇenapi vanditaṃ hotī’ti vakkhāma. Sace no sammādiṭṭhikā
atk-s0201a:2420_7: codessanti, ‘kasmā bhagavantaṃ na vanditthā’ti, ‘kiṃ sīsena bhūmiṃ paharanteneva
atk-s0201a:2420_8: vanditaṃ hoti, nanu añjalikammampi vandanā evā’ti vakkhāmā”ti. Nāma gottanti, bho
atk-s0201a:2420_9: gotama, ahaṃ asukassa putto datto nāma mitto nāma idha āgatoti vadantā nāmaṃ sāventi
atk-s0201a:2420_10: nāma. Bho gotama, ahaṃ vāsiṭṭho nāma kaccāno nāma idha āgatoti vadantā gottaṃ sāventi
atk-s0201a:2420_11: nāma. Ete kira daliddā jiṇṇakulaputtā parisamajjhe nāmagottavasena pākaṭā bhavissāmāti
atk-s0201a:2420_12: evaṃ akaṃsu. Ye pana tuṇhībhūtā nisīdiṃsu, te kerāṭikā ceva andhabālā ca. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2420_13: kerāṭikā, “ekaṃ dve kathāsallāpe karonto vissāsiko hoti, atha vissāse sati ekaṃ dve
atk-s0201a:2420_14: bhikkhā adātuṃ na yutta”nti tato attānaṃ mocentā tuṇhī nisīdanti. Andhabālā aññāṇatāyeva
atk-s0201a:2420_15: avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍo viya yattha katthaci tuṇhībhūtā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:2421_0: 356. Kiñcideva desanti kañci okāsaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ, athassa bhagavā pañhapucchane
atk-s0201a:2421_1: ussāhaṃ janento āha – puccha, aggivessana, yadākaṅkhasīti. Tassattho – “puccha yadi
atk-s0201a:2421_2: ākaṅkhasi, na me pañhavissajjane bhāro atthi”. Atha vā “puccha yaṃ ākaṅkhasi, sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2421_3: te vissajjessāmī”ti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi asādhāraṇaṃ paccekabuddhaaggasāvamahāsāvakehi.
atk-s0201a:2421_4: Te hi yadākaṅkhasīti na vadanti, sutvā vedissāmāti vadanti. Buddhā pana “pucchāvuso,
atk-s0201a:2422: “Puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0201a:2423: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te” iti. vā,
atk-s0201a:2424: “Tena hi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sake āsane nisīditvā puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti vā,
atk-s0201a:2426: Katāvakāsā pucchavho, yaṃ kiñci manasicchathā”ti. vā,
atk-s0201a:2427: “Puccha maṃ sabhiya pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0201a:2428: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te” iti. vā –
atk-s0201a:2429_1: Anacchariyañcetaṃ, yaṃ bhagavā buddhabhūmiṃ patvā etaṃ pavāraṇaṃ pavāreyya. Yo bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ padesañāṇepi ṭhito
atk-s0201a:2439_0: Evaṃ sarabhaṅgakāle, sambhavajātake ca sakalajambudīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ vicaritvā pañhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2439_1: antakaraṃ adisvā suciratena brāhmaṇena pañhaṃ puṭṭho okāse kārite, jātiyā sattavasso
atk-s0201a:2439_2: rathikāyaṃ paṃsuṃ kīḷanto pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā antaravīthiyaṃ nisinnova –
atk-s0201a:2441: Rājā ca kho taṃ jānāti, yadi kāhati vā na vā”ti. –
atk-s0201a:2443: Evaṃ bhagavatā sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāritāya attamano pañhaṃ pucchanto, “kathaṃ pana, bho gotamā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2444_0: Athassa bhagavā, “passatha, bho, aññaṃ sāvakena kathitaṃ, aññaṃ satthā katheti, nanu
atk-s0201a:2444_1: mayā paṭikacceva vuttaṃ, ‘sace tathā patiṭṭhissati, yathāssa sāvakena patiṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2444_2: evāhaṃ vādaṃ āropessāmī’ti. Ayaṃ pana aññameva katheti, tattha kiṃ mayā sakkā kātu”nti
atk-s0201a:2444_3: evaṃ nigaṇṭhassa vacanokāso mā hotūti heṭṭhā assajittherena kathitaniyāmeneva kathento,
atk-s0201a:2444_4: evaṃ kho ahaṃ, aggivessanātiādimāha. Upamā maṃ, bho gotama, paṭibhātīti, bho gotama,
atk-s0201a:2444_5: mayhaṃ ekā upamā upaṭṭhāti, āharāmi taṃ upamanti vadati. Paṭibhātu taṃ, aggivessanāti
atk-s0201a:2444_6: upaṭṭhātu te, aggivessana, āhara taṃ upamaṃ visatthoti bhagavā avoca. Balakaraṇīyāti
atk-s0201a:2444_7: bāhubalena kattabbā kasivāṇijjādikā kammantā. Rūpattāyaṃ purisapuggaloti rūpaṃ attā
atk-s0201a:2444_8: assāti rūpattā, rūpaṃ attāti gahetvā ṭhitapuggalaṃ dīpeti. Rūpe patiṭṭhāyāti tasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2444_9: attāti gahitarūpe patiṭṭhahitvā. Puññaṃ vā apuññaṃ vā pasavatīti kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ
atk-s0201a:2444_10: vā paṭilabhati. Vedanattādīsupi eseva nayo. Iminā kiṃ dīpeti? Ime pañcakkhandhā imesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2444_11: sattānaṃ pathavī viya patiṭṭhā, te imesu pañcasu khandhesu patiṭṭhāya kusalākusalakammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2444_12: nāma āyūhanti. Tumhe evarūpaṃ vijjamānameva attānaṃ paṭisedhento pañcakkhandhā anattāti
atk-s0201a:2444_13: dīpethāti ativiya sakāraṇaṃ katvā upamaṃ āhari. Iminā ca nigaṇṭhena āhaṭaopammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2444_14: niyatameva, sabbaññubuddhato añño tassa kathaṃ chinditvā vāde dosaṃ dātuṃ samattho
atk-s0201a:2444_15: nāma natthi. Duvidhā hi puggalā buddhaveneyyā ca sāvakaveneyyā ca. Sāvakaveneyye
atk-s0201a:2444_16: sāvakāpi vinenti buddhāpi. Buddhaveneyye pana sāvakā vinetuṃ na sakkonti, buddhāva
atk-s0201a:2444_17: vinenti. Ayampi nigaṇṭho buddhaveneyyo, tasmā etassa vādaṃ chinditvā añño dosaṃ dātuṃ
atk-s0201a:2444_18: samattho nāma natthi. Tenassa bhagavā sayameva vāde dosadassanatthaṃ nanu tvaṃ, aggivessanātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2445_0: Atha nigaṇṭho cintesi – “ativiya samaṇo gotamo mama vādaṃ patiṭṭhapeti, sace upari
atk-s0201a:2445_1: koci doso bhavissati, mamaṃ ekakaṃyeva niggaṇhissati. Handāhaṃ imaṃ vādaṃ mahājanassāpi
atk-s0201a:2445_2: matthake pakkhipāmī”ti, tasmā evamāha – ahampi, bho gotama, evaṃ vadāmi rūpaṃ me
atk-s0201a:2445_3: attā…pe… viññāṇaṃ me attāti, ayañca mahatī janatāti. Bhagavā pana nigaṇṭhato sataguṇenapi
atk-s0201a:2445_4: sahassaguṇenapi satasahassaguṇenapi vādīvarataro, tasmā cintesi – “ayaṃ nigaṇṭho
atk-s0201a:2445_5: attānaṃ mocetvā mahājanassa matthake vādaṃ pakkhipati, nāssa attānaṃ mocetuṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0201a:2445_6: mahājanato nivattetvā ekakaṃyeva naṃ niggaṇhissāmī”ti. Atha naṃ kiñhi te, aggivessanātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2445_7: Tassattho – nāyaṃ janatā mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ āgatā, tvaṃyeva sakalaṃ vesāliṃ saṃvaṭṭitvā
atk-s0201a:2445_8: mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ āgato, tasmā tvaṃ sakameva vādaṃ niveṭhehi, mā mahājanassa matthake
atk-s0201a:2445_9: pakkhipasīti. So paṭijānanto ahañhi, bho gotamātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2446_0: 357. Iti bhagavā nigaṇṭhassa vādaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā, tena hi, aggivessanāti pucchaṃ
atk-s0201a:2446_1: ārabhi. Tattha tena hīti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Yasmā tvaṃ pañcakkhandhe attato paṭijānāsi,
atk-s0201a:2446_2: tasmāti attho. Sakasmiṃ vijiteti attano raṭṭhe. Ghātetāyaṃ vā ghātetunti ghātārahaṃ
atk-s0201a:2446_3: ghātetabbayuttakaṃ ghātetuṃ. Jāpetāyaṃ vā jāpetunti dhanajānirahaṃ jāpetabbayuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2446_4: jāpetuṃ jiṇṇadhanaṃ kātuṃ. Pabbājetāyaṃ vā pabbājetunti sakaraṭṭhato pabbājanārahaṃ
atk-s0201a:2446_5: pabbājetuṃ, nīharituṃ. Vattituñca arahatīti vattati ceva vattituñca arahati. Vattituṃ
atk-s0201a:2446_6: yuttoti dīpeti. Iti nigaṇṭho attano vādabhedanatthaṃ āhaṭakāraṇameva attano māraṇatthāya
atk-s0201a:2446_7: āvudhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ karonto viya visesetvā dīpeti, yathā taṃ bālo. Evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotūti
atk-s0201a:2446_8: mama rūpaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ hotu, pāsādikaṃ abhirūpaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2446_9: viya susajjitacittapaṭo viya ca manāpadassananti. Evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosīti mama rūpaṃ
atk-s0201a:2446_10: evaṃvidhaṃ mā hotu, dubbaṇṇaṃ dussaṇṭhitaṃ valitapalitaṃ tilakasamākiṇṇanti.
atk-s0201a:2447_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti nigaṇṭho imasmiṃ ṭhāne viraddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “samaṇo gotamo mama vādaṃ
atk-s0201a:2447_1: bhindanatthāya kāraṇaṃ āhari, ahaṃ bālatāya tameva visesetvā dīpesiṃ, idāni naṭṭhomhi,
atk-s0201a:2447_2: sace vattatīti vakkhāmi, ime rājāno uṭṭhahitvā, ‘aggivessana, tvaṃ mama rūpe vaso
atk-s0201a:2447_3: vattatīti vadasi, yadi te rūpe vaso vattati, kasmā tvaṃ yathā ime licchavirājāno
atk-s0201a:2447_4: tāvatiṃsadevasadisehi attabhāvehi virocanti abhirūpā pāsādikā, evaṃ na virocasī’ti.
atk-s0201a:2447_5: Sace na vattatīti vakkhāmi, samaṇo gotamo uṭṭhahitvā, ‘aggivessana, tvaṃ pubbe vattati
atk-s0201a:2447_6: me rūpasmiṃ vasoti vatvā idāni paṭikkhipasī’ti vādaṃ āropessati. Iti vattatīti vuttepi
atk-s0201a:2447_7: eko doso, na vattatīti vuttepi eko doso”ti tuṇhī ahosi. Dutiyampi bhagavā pucchi,
atk-s0201a:2447_8: dutiyampi tuṇhī ahosi. Yasmā pana yāvatatiyaṃ bhagavatā pucchite abyākarontassa sattadhā
atk-s0201a:2447_9: muddhā phalati, buddhā ca nāma sattānaṃyeva atthāya kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri
atk-s0201a:2447_10: asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramīnaṃ pūritattā sattesu balavaanuddayā honti. Tasmā yāvatatiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2447_11: apucchitvā atha kho bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ etadavoca – etaṃ “byākarohī dānī”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a:2448_0: Tattha sahadhammikanti sahetukaṃ sakāraṇaṃ. Vajiraṃ pāṇimhi assāti vajirapāṇi. Yakkhoti
atk-s0201a:2448_1: na yo vā so vā yakkho, sakko devarājāti veditabbo. Ādittanti aggivaṇṇaṃ. Sampajjalitanti
atk-s0201a:2448_2: suṭṭhu pajjalitaṃ. Sajotibhūtanti samantato jotibhūtaṃ, ekaggijālabhūtanti attho.
atk-s0201a:2448_3: Ṭhito hotīti mahantaṃ sīsaṃ, kandalamakulasadisā dāṭhā, bhayānakāni akkhināsādīnīti
atk-s0201a:2448_4: evaṃ virūparūpaṃ māpetvā ṭhito. Kasmā panesa āgatoti? Diṭṭhivissajjāpanatthaṃ. Apica,
atk-s0201a:2448_5: “ahañceva kho pana dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, pare ca me na ājāneyyu”nti evaṃ dhammadesanāya
atk-s0201a:2448_6: appossukkabhāvaṃ āpanne bhagavati sakko mahābrahmunā saddhiṃ āgantvā, “bhagavā dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2448_7: desetha, tumhākaṃ āṇāya avattamāne mayaṃ vattāpessāma, tumhākaṃ dhammacakkaṃ hotu,
atk-s0201a:2448_8: amhākaṃ āṇācakka”nti paṭiññamakāsi. Tasmā “ajja saccakaṃ tāsetvā pañhaṃ vissajjāpessāmī”ti āgato.
atk-s0201a:2449_0: Bhagavā ceva passati, saccako ca nigaṇṭhaputtoti yadi hi taṃ aññepi passeyyuṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0201a:2449_1: kāraṇaṃ agaru assa, “samaṇo gotamo saccakaṃ attano vāde anotarantaṃ ñatvā yakkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2449_2: āvāhetvā dassesi, tato saccako bhayena kathesī”ti vadeyyuṃ. Tasmā bhagavā ceva passati
atk-s0201a:2449_3: saccako ca. Tassa taṃ disvāva sakalasarīrato sedā mucciṃsu, antokucchi viparivattamānā
atk-s0201a:2449_4: mahāravaṃ ravi. So “aññepi nu kho passantī”ti olokento kassaci lomahaṃsamattampi
atk-s0201a:2449_5: na addasa. Tato – “idaṃ bhayaṃ mameva uppannaṃ. Sacāhaṃ yakkhoti vakkhāmi, ‘kiṃ tuyhameva
atk-s0201a:2449_6: akkhīni atthi, tvameva yakkhaṃ passasi, paṭhamaṃ yakkhaṃ adisvā samaṇena gotamena
atk-s0201a:2449_7: vādasaṅghāṭe khittova yakkhaṃ passasī’ti vadeyyu”nti cintetvā – “na dāni me idha
atk-s0201a:2449_8: aññaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ atthi, aññatra samaṇā gotamā”ti maññamāno, atha kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto…pe…
atk-s0201a:2449_9: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca. Tāṇaṃ gavesīti tāṇanti gavesamāno. Leṇaṃ gavesīti leṇanti
atk-s0201a:2449_10: gavesamāno. Saraṇaṃ gavesīti saraṇanti gavesamāno. Ettha ca tāyati rakkhatīti tāṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2449_11: Nilīyanti etthāti leṇaṃ. Saratīti saraṇaṃ, bhayaṃ hiṃsati viddhaṃsetīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2450_0: 358. Manasi karitvāti manamhi katvā paccavekkhitvā upadhāretvā. Evaṃ me vedanā hotūti
atk-s0201a:2450_1: kusalāva hotu, sukhāva hotu. Evaṃ me saññā hotūti kusalāva hotu, sukhāva hotu, somanassasampayuttāva
atk-s0201a:2450_2: hotūti. Saṅkhāraviññāṇesupi eseva nayo. Mā ahosīti ettha pana vuttavipariyāyena attho
atk-s0201a:2450_3: veditabbo. Kallaṃ nūti yuttaṃ nu. Samanupassitunti “etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attā”ti
atk-s0201a:2450_4: evaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena passituṃ. No hidaṃ, bho gotamāti na yuttametaṃ, bho gotama.
atk-s0201a:2450_5: Iti bhagavā yathā nāma cheko ahituṇḍiko sappadaṭṭhavisaṃ teneva sappena puna ḍaṃsāpetvā
atk-s0201a:2450_6: ubbāheyya, evaṃ tassaṃyeva parisati saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ teneva mukhena pañcakkhandhā
atk-s0201a:2450_7: aniccā dukkhā anattāti vadāpesi. Dukkhaṃ allīnoti imaṃ pañcakkhandhadukkhaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi
atk-s0201a:2450_8: allīno. Upagato ajjhositotipi taṇhādiṭṭhivaseneva veditabbo. Dukkhaṃ etaṃ mamātiādīsu
atk-s0201a:2450_9: pañcakkhandhadukkhaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena samanupassatīti attho. Parijāneyyāti aniccaṃ
atk-s0201a:2450_10: dukkhaṃ anattāti tīraṇapariññāya parito jāneyya. Parikkhepetvāti khayaṃ vayaṃ anuppādaṃ upanetvā.
atk-s0201a:2451_0: 359. Navanti taruṇaṃ. Akukkukajātanti pupphaggahaṇakāle anto aṅguṭṭhappamāṇo eko
atk-s0201a:2451_1: ghanadaṇḍako nibbattati, tena virahitanti attho. Rittoti suñño antosāravirahito.
atk-s0201a:2451_2: Rittattāva tuccho. Aparaddhoti parājito. Bhāsitā kho pana teti idaṃ bhagavā tassa
atk-s0201a:2451_3: mukharabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā niggaṇhanto āha. So kira pubbe pūraṇādayo cha satthāro upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0201a:2451_4: pañhaṃ pucchati. Te vissajjetuṃ na sakkonti. Atha nesaṃ parisamajjhe mahantaṃ vippakāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2451_5: āropetvā uṭṭhāya jayaṃ pavedento gacchati. So sammāsambuddhampi tatheva viheṭhessāmīti
atk-s0201a:2452: “Ambho ko nāma yaṃ rukkho, sinnapatto sakaṇṭako;
atk-s0201a:2454_0: Ayaṃ khadiraṃ āhacca asārakarukkhaparicito mudutuṇḍasakuṇo viya sabbaññutaññāṇasāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2454_1: āhacca ñāṇatuṇḍabhedaṃ patto sabbaññutaññāṇassa thaddhabhāvaṃ aññāsi. Tadassa parisamajjhe
atk-s0201a:2454_2: pakāsento bhāsitā kho pana tetiādimāha. Natthi etarahīti upādinnakasarīre sedo nāma
atk-s0201a:2454_3: natthīti na vattabbaṃ, etarahi pana natthīti vadati. Suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ kāyaṃ vivarīti
atk-s0201a:2454_4: na sabbaṃ kāyaṃ vivari. Buddhā nāma gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā paṭicchannasarīrā parisati
atk-s0201a:2454_5: dhammaṃ desenti. Atha bhagavā galavāṭakasammukhaṭṭhāne cīvaraṃ gahetvā caturaṅgulamattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2454_6: otāresi. Otāritamatte pana tasmiṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmiyo puñjapuñjā hutvā suvaṇṇaghaṭato
atk-s0201a:2454_7: rattasuvaṇṇarasadhārā viya, rattavaṇṇavalāhakato vijjulatā viya ca nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇamurajasadisaṃ
atk-s0201a:2454_8: mahākhandhaṃ uttamasiraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kurumānā ākāse pakkhandiṃsu. Kasmā pana bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2454_9: evamakāsīti? Mahājanassa kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṃ. Mahājano hi samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃ sedo
atk-s0201a:2454_10: natthīti vadati, saccakassa tāva nigaṇṭhaputtassa yantāruḷhassa viya sedā paggharanti.
atk-s0201a:2454_11: Samaṇo pana gotamo ghanadupaṭṭacīvaraṃ pārupitvā nisinno, anto sedassa atthitā vā
atk-s0201a:2454_12: natthitā vā kathaṃ sakkā ñātunti kaṅkhaṃ kareyya, tassa kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṃ evamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2454_13: Maṅkubhūtoti nittejabhūto. Pattakkhandhoti patitakkhandho. Appaṭibhānoti uttari appassanto.
atk-s0201a:2455_0: 360. Dummukhoti na virūpamukho, abhirūpo hi so pāsādiko. Nāmaṃ panassa etaṃ. Abhabbo
atk-s0201a:2455_1: taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ puna otaritunti sabbesaṃ aḷānaṃ bhaggattā pacchinnagamano otarituṃ
atk-s0201a:2455_2: abhabbo, tattheva kākakulalādīnaṃ bhattaṃ hotīti dasseti. Visūkāyikānīti diṭṭhivisūkāni.
atk-s0201a:2455_3: Visevitānīti diṭṭhisañcaritāni. Vipphanditānīti diṭṭhivipphanditāni. Yadidaṃ vādādhippāyoti
atk-s0201a:2455_4: ettha yadidanti nipātamattaṃ; vādādhippāyo hutvā vādaṃ āropessāmīti ajjhāsayena upasaṅkamituṃ
atk-s0201a:2455_5: abhabbo; dhammassavanāya pana upasaṅkameyyāti dasseti. Dummukhaṃ licchaviputtaṃ etadavocāti
atk-s0201a:2455_6: kasmā avoca? Dummukhassa kirassa upamāharaṇakāle sesa licchavikumārāpi cintesuṃ –
atk-s0201a:2455_7: “iminā nigaṇṭhena amhākaṃ sippuggahaṇaṭṭhāne ciraṃ avamāno kato, ayaṃ dāni amittassa
atk-s0201a:2455_8: piṭṭhiṃ passituṃ kālo. Mayampi ekekaṃ upamaṃ āharitvā pāṇippahārena patitaṃ muggarena
atk-s0201a:2455_9: pothento viya tathā naṃ karissāma, yathā na puna parisamajjhe sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkhissatī”ti,
atk-s0201a:2455_10: te opammāni karitvā dummukhassa kathāpariyosānaṃ āgamayamānā nisīdiṃsu. Saccako tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2455_11: adhippāyaṃ ñatvā, ime sabbeva gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā oṭṭhehi calamānehi ṭhitā; sace paccekā
atk-s0201a:2455_12: upamā harituṃ labhissanti, puna mayā parisamajjhe sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2455_13: handāhaṃ dummukhaṃ apasādetvā yathā aññassa okāso na hoti, evaṃ kathāvāraṃ pacchinditvā
atk-s0201a:2455_14: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmīti tasmā etadavoca. Tattha āgamehīti tiṭṭha, mā
atk-s0201a:2456_0: 361. Tiṭṭhatesā, bho gotamāti, bho gotama, esā amhākañceva aññesañca puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2456_1: vācā tiṭṭhatu. Vilāpaṃ vilapitaṃ maññeti etañhi vacanaṃ vilapitaṃ viya hoti, vippalapitamattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2456_2: hotīti attho. Atha vā tiṭṭhatesāti ettha kathāti āharitvā vattabbā. Vācāvilāpaṃ vilapitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2456_3: maññeti ettha panidaṃ vācānicchāraṇaṃ vilapitamattaṃ maññe hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2457_0: Idāni pañhaṃ pucchanto kittāvatātiādimāha. Tattha vesārajjapattoti ñāṇapatto. Aparappaccayoti
atk-s0201a:2457_1: aparappattiyo. Athassa bhagavā pañhaṃ vissajjento idha, aggivessanātiādimāha, taṃ
atk-s0201a:2457_2: uttānatthameva. Yasmā panettha passatīti vuttattā sekkhabhūmi dassitā. Tasmā uttari
atk-s0201a:2457_3: asekkhabhūmiṃ pucchanto dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi, tampissa bhagavā byākāsi. Tattha dassanānuttariyenātiādīsu
atk-s0201a:2457_4: dassanānuttariyanti lokiyalokuttarā paññā. Paṭipadānuttariyanti lokiyalokuttarā paṭipadā.
atk-s0201a:2457_5: Vimuttānuttariyanti lokiyalokuttarā vimutti. Suddhalokuttarameva vā gahetvā dassanānuttariyanti
atk-s0201a:2457_7: aggaphalavimutti. Khīṇāsavassa vā nibbānadassanaṃ dassanānuttariyaṃ nāma. Maggaṅgāni
atk-s0201a:2457_8: paṭipadānuttariyaṃ. Aggaphalaṃ vimuttānuttariyanti veditabbaṃ. Buddho so bhagavāti
atk-s0201a:2457_9: so bhagavā sayampi cattāri saccāni buddho. Bodhāyāti paresampi catusaccabodhāya dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2457_10: deseti. Dantotiādīsu dantoti nibbisevano. Damathāyāti nibbisevanatthāya. Santoti
atk-s0201a:2457_11: sabbakilesavūpasamena santo. Samathāyāti kilesavūpasamāya. Tiṇṇoti caturoghatiṇṇo.
atk-s0201a:2457_12: Taraṇāyāti caturoghataraṇāya. Parinibbutoti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto. Parinibbānāyāti
atk-s0201a:2458_0: 362. Dhaṃsīti guṇadhaṃsakā. Pagabbāti vācāpāgabbiyena samannāgatā. Āsādetabbanti
atk-s0201a:2458_1: ghaṭṭetabbaṃ. Āsajjāti ghaṭṭetvā. Natveva bhavantaṃ gotamanti bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ āsajja
atk-s0201a:2458_2: kassaci attano vādaṃ anupahataṃ sakalaṃ ādāya pakkamituṃ thāmo natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2458_3: Na hi bhagavā hatthiādayo viya kassaci jīvitantarāyaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ pana nigaṇṭho
atk-s0201a:2458_4: imā tisso upamā na bhagavato ukkaṃsanatthaṃ āhari, attukkaṃsanatthameva āhari. Yathā
atk-s0201a:2458_5: hi rājā kañci paccatthikaṃ ghātetvā evaṃ nāma sūro evaṃ thāmasampanno puriso bhavissatīti
atk-s0201a:2458_6: paccatthikaṃ thomentopi attānameva thometi. Evameva sopi siyā hi, bho gotama, hatthiṃ
atk-s0201a:2458_7: pabhinnantiādīhi bhagavantaṃ ukkaṃsentopi mayameva sūrā mayaṃ paṇḍitā mayaṃ bahussutāyeva
atk-s0201a:2458_8: evaṃ pabhinnahatthiṃ viya, jalitaaggikkhandhaṃ viya, phaṇakataāsīvisaṃ viya ca vādatthikā
atk-s0201a:2458_9: sammāsambuddhaṃ upasaṅkamimhāti attānaṃyeva ukkaṃseti. Evaṃ attānaṃ ukkaṃsetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2458_10: nimantayamāno adhivāsetu metiādimāha. Tattha adhivāsetūti sampaṭicchatu. Svātanāyāti
atk-s0201a:2458_11: yaṃ me tumhesu kāraṃ karoto sve bhavissati puññañca pītipāmojjañca, tadatthāya. Adhivāsesi
atk-s0201a:2458_12: bhagavā tuṇhībhāvenāti bhagavā kāyaṅgaṃ vā vācaṅgaṃ vā acopetvā abbhantareyeva khantiṃ
atk-s0201a:2458_13: dhārento tuṇhībhāvena adhivāsesi. Saccakassa anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ manasāva sampaṭicchīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2459_0: 363. Yamassa patirūpaṃ maññeyyāthāti te kira licchavī tassa pañcathālipākasatāni
atk-s0201a:2459_1: niccabhattaṃ āharanti. Tadeva sandhāya esa sve tumhe yaṃ assa samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0201a:2459_2: patirūpaṃ kappiyanti maññeyyātha, taṃ āhareyyātha; samaṇassa hi gotamassa tumhe paricārakā
atk-s0201a:2459_3: kappiyākappiyaṃ yuttāyuttaṃ jānāthāti vadati. Bhattābhihāraṃ abhihariṃsūti abhiharitabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2459_4: bhattaṃ abhihariṃsu. Paṇītenāti uttamena. Sahatthāti sahatthena. Santappetvāti suṭṭhu
atk-s0201a:2459_5: tappetvā, paripuṇṇaṃ suhitaṃ yāvadatthaṃ katvā. Sampavāretvāti suṭṭhu pavāretvā,
atk-s0201a:2459_6: alaṃ alanti hatthasaññāya paṭikkhipāpetvā. Bhuttāvinti bhuttavantaṃ. Onītapattapāṇinti
atk-s0201a:2459_7: pattato onītapāṇiṃ, apanītahatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Onittapattapāṇi”ntipi pāṭho, tassattho,
atk-s0201a:2459_8: onittaṃ nānābhūtaṃ pattaṃ pāṇito assāti onittapattapāṇī. Taṃ onittapattapāṇiṃ, hatthe
atk-s0201a:2459_9: ca pattañca dhovitvā ekamante pattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnanti attho. Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti
atk-s0201a:2459_10: bhagavantaṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ ñatvā ekasmiṃ okāse nisīdīti attho. Puññañcāti yaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2459_11: dāne puññaṃ, āyatiṃ vipākakkhandhāti attho. Puññamahīti vipākakkhandhānaṃyeva parivāro.
atk-s0201a:2459_12: Taṃ dāyakānaṃ sukhāya hotūti taṃ imesaṃ licchavīnaṃ sukhatthāya hotu. Idaṃ kira so
atk-s0201a:2459_13: ahaṃ pabbajito nāma, pabbajitena ca na yuttaṃ attano dānaṃ niyyātetunti tesaṃ niyyātento
atk-s0201a:2459_14: evamāha. Atha bhagavā yasmā licchavīhi saccakassa dinnaṃ, na bhagavato. Saccakena
atk-s0201a:2459_15: pana bhagavato dinnaṃ, tasmā tamatthaṃ dīpento yaṃ kho, aggivessanātiādimāha. Iti
atk-s0201a:2459_16: bhagavā nigaṇṭhassa matena vināyeva attano dinnaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ nigaṇṭhassa niyyātesi,
atk-s0201a:2463_0: 364. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāsaccakasuttaṃ. Tattha ekaṃ samayanti ca tena kho pana samayenāti
atk-s0201a:2463_1: ca pubbaṇhasamayanti ca tīhi padehi ekova samayo vutto. Bhikkhūnañhi vattapaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2463_2: katvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā pattacīvaramādāya cetiyaṃ vanditvā kataraṃ gāmaṃ pavisissāmāti
atk-s0201a:2463_3: vitakkamāḷake ṭhitakālo nāma hoti. Bhagavā evarūpe samaye rattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0201a:2463_4: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ ekaṃsaṃ pārupitvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma
atk-s0201a:2463_5: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gandhakuṭipamukhe aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ sandhāya, – “ekaṃ samayanti
atk-s0201a:2463_6: ca tena kho pana samayenāti ca pubbaṇhasamaya”nti ca vuttaṃ. Pavisitukāmoti piṇḍāya
atk-s0201a:2463_7: pavisissāmīti evaṃ katasanniṭṭhāno. Tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā upasaṅkamīti? Vādāropanajjhāsayena.
atk-s0201a:2463_8: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “pubbepāhaṃ apaṇḍitatāya sakalaṃ vesāliparisaṃ gahetvā samaṇassa
atk-s0201a:2463_9: gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā parisamajjhe maṅku jāto. Idāni tathā akatvā ekakova gantvā
atk-s0201a:2463_10: vādaṃ āropessāmi. Yadi samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ parājetuṃ sakkhissāmi, attano laddhiṃ dīpetvā
atk-s0201a:2463_11: jayaṃ karissāmi. Yadi samaṇassa gotamassa jayo bhavissati, andhakāre naccaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:2463_12: na koci jānissatī”ti niddāpañhaṃ nāma gahetvā iminā vādajjhāsayena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2464_0: Anukampaṃ upādāyāti saccakassa nigaṇṭhaputtassa anukampaṃ paṭicca. Therassa kirassa
atk-s0201a:2464_1: evaṃ ahosi – “bhagavati muhuttaṃ nisinne buddhadassanaṃ dhammassavanañca labhissati.
atk-s0201a:2464_2: Tadassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattissatī”ti. Tasmā bhagavantaṃ yācitvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2464_3: catugguṇaṃ paññapetvā nisīdatu bhagavāti āha. “Kāraṇaṃ ānando vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0201a:2464_4: nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti yaṃ pana pañhaṃ ovaṭṭikasāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2464_5: katvā ādāya āgato taṃ ṭhapetvā passena tāva pariharanto etaṃ santi, bho gotamātiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a:2465_0: 365. Phusanti hi te, bho gotamāti te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sarīre uppannaṃ sārīrikaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2465_1: vedanaṃ phusanti labhanti, anubhavantīti attho. Ūrukkhambhoti khambhakataūrubhāvo,
atk-s0201a:2465_2: ūruthaddhatāti attho. Vimhayatthavasena panettha bhavissatīti anāgatavacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2465_3: Kāyanvayaṃ hotīti kāyānugataṃ hoti kāyassa vasavatti. Kāyabhāvanāti pana vipassanā
atk-s0201a:2465_4: vuccati, tāya cittavikkhepaṃ pāpuṇanto nāma natthi, iti nigaṇṭho asantaṃ abhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a:2465_5: yaṃ natthi, tadevāha. Cittabhāvanātipi samatho vuccati, samādhiyuttassa ca puggalassa
atk-s0201a:2465_6: ūrukkhambhādayo nāma natthi, iti nigaṇṭho idaṃ abhūtameva āha. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:2465_7: vuttaṃ – “yatheva ‘bhūtapubbanti vatvā ūrukkhambhopi nāma bhavissatī’tiādīni vadato
atk-s0201a:2465_8: anāgatarūpaṃ na sameti, tathā atthopi na sameti, asantaṃ abhūtaṃ yaṃ natthi, taṃ kathetī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2466_0: No kāyabhāvananti pañcātapatappanādiṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ sandhāyāha. Ayañhi tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2466_1: kāyabhāvanā nāma. Kiṃ pana so disvā evamāha? So kira divādivassa vihāraṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0201a:2466_2: tasmiṃ kho pana samaye bhikkhū pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu
atk-s0201a:2466_3: paṭisallānaṃ upagacchanti. So te paṭisallīne disvā cittabhāvanāmattaṃ ete anuyuñjanti,
atk-s0201a:2467_0: 366. Atha naṃ bhagavā anuyuñjanto kinti pana te, aggivessana, kāyabhāvanā sutāti
atk-s0201a:2467_1: āha. So taṃ vitthārento seyyathidaṃ, nando vacchotiādimāha. Tattha nandoti tassa
atk-s0201a:2467_2: nāmaṃ. Vacchoti gottaṃ. Kisoti nāmaṃ. Saṃkiccoti gottaṃ. Makkhaligosālo heṭṭhā āgatova.
atk-s0201a:2467_3: Eteti ete tayo janā, te kira kiliṭṭhatapānaṃ matthakapattā ahesuṃ. Uḷārāni uḷārānīti
atk-s0201a:2467_4: paṇītāni paṇītāni. Gāhenti nāmāti balaṃ gaṇhāpenti nāma. Brūhentīti vaḍḍhenti. Medentīti
atk-s0201a:2467_5: jātamedaṃ karonti. Purimaṃ pahāyāti purimaṃ dukkarakāraṃ pahāya. Pacchā upacinantīti
atk-s0201a:2467_6: pacchā uḷārakhādanīyādīhi santappenti, vaḍḍhenti. Ācayāpacayo hotīti vaḍḍhi ca avaḍḍhi
atk-s0201a:2467_7: ca hoti, iti imassa kāyassa kālena vaḍḍhi, kālena parihānīti vaḍḍhiparihānimattameva
atk-s0201a:2467_8: paññāyati, kāyabhāvanā pana na paññāyatīti dīpetvā cittabhāvanaṃ pucchanto, “kinti
atk-s0201a:2467_9: pana te, aggivessana, cittabhāvanā sutā”ti āha. Na sampāyāsīti sampādetvā kathetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2468_0: 367. Kuto pana tvanti yo tvaṃ evaṃ oḷārikaṃ dubbalaṃ kāyabhāvanaṃ na jānāsi? So tvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2468_1: kuto saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ cittabhāvanaṃ jānissasīti. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne codanālayatthero,
atk-s0201a:2468_2: “abuddhavacanaṃ nāmetaṃ pada”nti bījaniṃ ṭhapetvā pakkamituṃ ārabhi. Atha naṃ mahāsīvatthero
atk-s0201a:2468_3: āha – “dissati, bhikkhave, imassa cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa ācayopi apacayopi ādānampi
atk-s0201a:2468_4: nikkhepanampī”ti. Taṃ sutvā sallakkhesi – “oḷārikaṃ kāyaṃ pariggaṇhantassa uppannavipassanā
atk-s0201a:2469_0: 368. Sukhasārāgīti sukhasārāgena samannāgato. Sukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati
atk-s0201a:2469_1: dukkhā vedanāti na anantarāva uppajjati, sukhadukkhānañhi anantarapaccayatā paṭṭhāne
atk-s0201a:2469_2: paṭisiddhā. Yasmā pana sukhe aniruddhe dukkhaṃ nuppajjati, tasmā idha evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2469_3: Pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti khepetvā gaṇhitvā tiṭṭhati. Ubhatopakkhanti sukhaṃ ekaṃ pakkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2469_4: dukkhaṃ ekaṃ pakkhanti evaṃ ubhatopakkhaṃ hutvā.
atk-s0201a:2470_0: 369. Uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, bhāvitattā kāyassa. Uppannāpi
atk-s0201a:2470_1: dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, bhāvitattā cittassāti ettha kāyabhāvanā
atk-s0201a:2470_2: vipassanā, cittabhāvanā samādhi. Vipassanā ca sukhassa paccanīkā, dukkhassa āsannā.
atk-s0201a:2470_3: Samādhi dukkhassa paccanīko, sukhassa āsanno. Kathaṃ? Vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnassa
atk-s0201a:2470_4: hi addhāne gacchante gacchante tattha tattha aggiuṭṭhānaṃ viya hoti, kacchehi sedā
atk-s0201a:2470_5: muccanti, matthakato usumavaṭṭiuṭṭhānaṃ viya hotīti cittaṃ haññati vihaññati vipphandati.
atk-s0201a:2470_6: Evaṃ tāva vipassanā sukhassa paccanīkā, dukkhassa āsannā. Uppanne pana kāyike vā
atk-s0201a:2470_7: cetasike vā dukkhe taṃ dukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā samāpattiṃ samāpannassa samāpattikkhaṇe
atk-s0201a:2470_8: dukkhaṃ dūrāpagataṃ hoti, anappakaṃ sukhaṃ okkamati. Evaṃ samādhi dukkhassa paccanīko,
atk-s0201a:2470_9: sukhassa āsanno. Yathā vipassanā sukhassa paccanīkā, dukkhassa āsannā, na tathā samādhi.
atk-s0201a:2470_10: Yathā samādhi dukkhassa paccanīko, sukhassa āsanno, na ca tathā vipassanāti. Tena
atk-s0201a:2470_11: vuttaṃ – “uppannāpi sukhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, bhāvitattā kāyassa.
atk-s0201a:2470_12: Uppannāpi dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, bhāvitattā cittassā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2471: 370. Āsajja upanīyāti guṇe ghaṭṭetvā ceva upanetvā ca. Taṃ vata meti taṃ vata mama cittaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2472_0: 371. Kiñhi no siyā, aggivessanāti, aggivessana, kiṃ na bhavissati, bhavissateva,
atk-s0201a:2472_1: mā evaṃ saññī hohi, uppajjiyeva me sukhāpi dukkhāpi vedanā, uppannāya panassā ahaṃ
atk-s0201a:2472_2: cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhātuṃ na demi. Idānissa tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ upari pasādāvahaṃ
atk-s0201a:2472_3: dhammadesanaṃ desetukāmo mūlato paṭṭhāya mahābhinikkhamanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha idha me,
atk-s0201a:2472_4: aggivessana, pubbeva sambodhā…pe… tattheva nisīdiṃ, alamidaṃ padhānāyāti idaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2472_5: heṭṭhā pāsarāsisutte vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso, tattha bodhipallaṅke
atk-s0201a:2473_0: 374. Allakaṭṭhanti allaṃ udumbarakaṭṭhaṃ. Sasnehanti sakhīraṃ. Kāmehīti vatthukāmehi.
atk-s0201a:2473_1: Avūpakaṭṭhāti anapagatā. Kāmacchandotiādīsu kilesakāmova chandakaraṇavasena chando.
atk-s0201a:2473_2: Sinehakaraṇavasena sneho. Mucchākaraṇavasena mucchā. Pipāsākaraṇavasena pipāsā. Anudahanavasena
atk-s0201a:2473_3: pariḷāhoti veditabbo. Opakkamikāti upakkamanibbattā. Ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya
atk-s0201a:2474_0: Idaṃ panettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ – allaṃ sakhīraṃ udumbarakaṭṭhaṃ viya hi kilesakāmena
atk-s0201a:2474_1: vatthukāmato anissaṭapuggalā. Udake pakkhittabhāvo viya kilesakāmena tintatā; manthanenāpi
atk-s0201a:2474_2: aggino anabhinibbattanaṃ viya kilesakāmena vatthukāmato anissaṭānaṃ opakkamikāhi
atk-s0201a:2474_3: vedanāhi lokuttaramaggassa anadhigamo. Amanthanenāpi aggino anabhinibbattanaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:2474_4: tesaṃ puggalānaṃ vināpi opakkamikāhi vedanāhi lokuttaramaggassa anadhigamo. Dutiyaupamāpi
atk-s0201a:2474_5: imināva nayena veditabbā. Ayaṃ pana viseso, purimā saputtabhariyapabbajjāya upamā;
atk-s0201a:2475_0: 376. Tatiyaupamāya koḷāpanti chinnasinehaṃ nirāpaṃ. Thale nikkhittanti pabbatathale
atk-s0201a:2475_1: vā bhūmithale vā nikkhittaṃ. Etthāpi idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – sukkhakoḷāpakaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2475_2: viya hi kilesakāmena vatthukāmato nissaṭapuggalā, ārakā udakā thale nikkhittabhāvo
atk-s0201a:2475_3: viya kilesakāmena atintatā. Manthanenāpi aggino abhinibbattanaṃ viya kilesakāmena
atk-s0201a:2475_4: vatthukāmato nissaṭānaṃ abbhokāsikanesajjikādivasena opakkamikāhipi vedanāhi lokuttaramaggassa
atk-s0201a:2475_5: adhigamo. Aññassa rukkhassa sukkhasākhāya saddhiṃ ghaṃsanamatteneva aggino abhinibbattanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2475_6: viya vināpi opakkamikāhi vedanāhi sukhāyeva paṭipadāya lokuttaramaggassa adhigamoti.
atk-s0201a:2475_7: Ayaṃ upamā bhagavatā attano atthāya āhaṭā.
atk-s0201a:2476_0: 377. Idāni attano dukkarakārikaṃ dassento, tassa mayhantiādimāha. Kiṃ pana bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2476_1: dukkaraṃ akatvā buddho bhavituṃ na samatthoti? Katvāpi akatvāpi samatthova. Atha
atk-s0201a:2476_2: kasmā akāsīti? Sadevakassa lokassa attano parakkamaṃ dassessāmi. So ca maṃ vīriyanimmathanaguṇo
atk-s0201a:2476_3: hāsessatīti. Pāsāde nisinnoyeva hi paveṇiāgataṃ rajjaṃ labhitvāpi khattiyo na tathāpamudito
atk-s0201a:2476_4: hoti, yathā balakāyaṃ gahetvā saṅgāme dve tayo sampahāre datvā amittamathanaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:2476_5: pattarajjo. Evaṃ pattarajjassa hi rajjasiriṃ anubhavantassa parisaṃ oloketvā attano
atk-s0201a:2476_6: parakkamaṃ anussaritvā, “asukaṭṭhāne asukakammaṃ katvā asukañca asukañca amittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2476_7: evaṃ vijjhitvā evaṃ paharitvā imaṃ rajjasiriṃ pattosmī”ti cintayato balavasomanassaṃ
atk-s0201a:2476_8: uppajjati. Evamevaṃ bhagavāpi sadevakassa lokassa parakkamaṃ dassessāmi, so hi maṃ
atk-s0201a:2476_9: parakkamo ativiya hāsessati, somanassaṃ uppādessatīti dukkaramakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2477_0: Apica pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamānopi akāsiyeva, pacchimā hi janatā sammāsambuddho
atk-s0201a:2477_1: kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvāpi padhānaṃ padahitvāva
atk-s0201a:2477_2: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ patto, kimaṅgaṃ pana mayanti padhānavīriyaṃ kattabbaṃ maññissati;
atk-s0201a:2477_3: evaṃ sante khippameva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissatīti pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamāno akāsiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2478_0: Dantebhidantamādhāyāti heṭṭhādante uparidantaṃ ṭhapetvā. Cetasā cittanti kusalacittena
atk-s0201a:2478_1: akusalacittaṃ. Abhiniggaṇheyyanti niggaṇheyyaṃ. Abhinippīḷeyyanti nippīḷeyyaṃ. Abhisantāpeyyanti
atk-s0201a:2478_2: tāpetvā vīriyanimmathanaṃ kareyyaṃ. Sāraddhoti sadaratho. Padhānābhitunnassāti padhānena
atk-s0201a:2479_0: 378. Appāṇakanti nirassāsakaṃ. Kammāragaggariyāti kammārassa gaggaranāḷiyā. Sīsavedanā
atk-s0201a:2479_1: hontīti kutoci nikkhamituṃ alabhamānehi vātehi samuṭṭhāpitā balavatiyo sīsavedanā
atk-s0201a:2479_2: honti. Sīsaveṭhaṃ dadeyyāti sīsaveṭhanaṃ dadeyya. Devatāti bodhisattassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2480_0: Tadā kira bodhisattassa adhimatte kāyadāhe uppanne mucchā udapādi. So caṅkameva nisinno
atk-s0201a:2480_1: hutvā papati. Taṃ disvā devatā evamāhaṃsu – “vihārotveva so arahato”ti, “arahanto
atk-s0201a:2480_2: nāma evarūpā honti matakasadisā”ti laddhiyā vadanti. Tattha yā devatā “kālaṅkato”ti
atk-s0201a:2480_3: āhaṃsu, tā gantvā suddhodanamahārājassa ārocesuṃ – “tumhākaṃ putto kālaṅkato”ti.
atk-s0201a:2480_4: Mama putto buddho hutvā kālaṅkato, no ahutvāti? Buddho bhavituṃ nāsakkhi, padhānabhūmiyaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2480_5: patitvā kālaṅkatoti. Nāhaṃ saddahāmi, mama puttassa bodhiṃ apatvā kālaṅkiriyā nāma natthīti.
atk-s0201a:2481_0: Aparabhāge sammāsambuddhassa dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā anupubbena rājagahaṃ gantvā
atk-s0201a:2481_1: kapilavatthuṃ anuppattassa suddhodanamahārājā pattaṃ gahetvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2481_2: datvā antarābhattasamaye etamatthaṃ ārocesi – tumhākaṃ bhagavā padhānakaraṇakāle
atk-s0201a:2481_3: devatā āgantvā, “putto te, mahārāja, kālaṅkato”ti āhaṃsūti. Kiṃ saddahasi mahārājāti?
atk-s0201a:2481_4: Na bhagavā saddahinti. Idāni, mahārāja, supinappaṭiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya acchariyāni
atk-s0201a:2481_5: passanto kiṃ saddahissasi? Ahampi buddho jāto, tvampi buddhapitā jāto, pubbe pana
atk-s0201a:2481_6: mayhaṃ aparipakke ñāṇe bodhicariyaṃ carantassa dhammapālakumārakālepi sippaṃ uggahetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2481_7: gatassa, “tumhākaṃ putto dhammapālakumāro kālaṅkato, idamassa aṭṭhī”ti eḷakaṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2481_8: āharitvā dassesuṃ, tadāpi tumhe, “mama puttassa antarāmaraṇaṃ nāma natthi, nāhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2481_9: saddahāmī”ti avocuttha, mahārājāti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā bhagavā mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2482_0: 379. Mā kho tvaṃ mārisāti sampiyāyamānā āhaṃsu. Devatānaṃ kirāyaṃ piyamanāpavohāro,
atk-s0201a:2482_1: yadidaṃ mārisāti. Ajajjitanti abhojanaṃ. Halanti vadāmīti alanti vadāmi, alaṃ iminā
atk-s0201a:2482_2: evaṃ mā karittha, yāpessāmahanti evaṃ paṭisedhemīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2483_0: 380-1. Maṅguracchavīti maṅguramacchacchavi. Etāva paramanti tāsampi vedanānametaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2483_1: paramaṃ, uttamaṃ pamāṇaṃ. Pitu sakkassa kammante…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-s0201a:2483_2: viharitāti rañño kira vappamaṅgaladivaso nāma hoti, tadā anekappakāraṃ khādanīyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2483_3: bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādenti. Nagaravīthiyo sodhāpetvā puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapāpetvā dhajapaṭākādayo
atk-s0201a:2483_4: ussāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ devavimānaṃ viya alaṅkaronti. Sabbe dāsakammakarādayo ahatavatthanivatthā
atk-s0201a:2483_5: gandhamālādipaṭimaṇḍitā rājakule sannipatanti. Rañño kammante naṅgalasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0201a:2483_6: yojīyati. Tasmiṃ pana divase ekena ūnaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ yojenti. Sabbanaṅgalāni saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2483_7: balibaddarasmiyottehi jāṇussoṇissa ratho viya rajataparikkhittāni honti. Rañño ālambananaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0201a:2483_8: rattasuvaṇṇaparikkhittaṃ hoti. Balibaddānaṃ siṅgānipi rasmipatodāpi suvaṇṇaparikkhittā
atk-s0201a:2483_9: honti. Rājā mahāparivārena nikkhamanto puttaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2484_0: Kammantaṭṭhāne eko jamburukkho bahalapattapalāso sandacchāyo ahosi. Tassa heṭṭhā
atk-s0201a:2484_1: kumārassa sayanaṃ paññapetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakakhacitaṃ vitānaṃ bandhāpetvā sāṇipākārena
atk-s0201a:2484_2: parikkhipāpetvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rājā sabbālaṅkāraṃ alaṅkaritvā amaccagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0201a:2484_3: naṅgalakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Tattha rājā suvaṇṇanaṅgalaṃ gaṇhāti. Amaccā ekenūnaaṭṭhasatarajatanaṅgalāni
atk-s0201a:2484_4: gahetvā ito cito ca kasanti. Rājā pana orato pāraṃ gacchati, pārato vā oraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2484_5: Etasmiṃ ṭhāne mahāsampatti hoti, bodhisattaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā dhātiyo rañño sampattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2484_6: passissāmāti antosāṇito bahi nikkhantā. Bodhisatto ito cito ca olokento kañci adisvā
atk-s0201a:2484_7: vegena uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ānāpāne pariggahetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0201a:2484_8: Dhātiyo khajjabhojjantare vicaramānā thokaṃ cirāyiṃsu, sesarukkhānaṃ chāyā nivattā,
atk-s0201a:2484_9: tassa pana rukkhassa parimaṇḍalā hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Dhātiyo ayyaputto ekakoti vegena
atk-s0201a:2484_10: sāṇiṃ ukkhipitvā anto pavisamānā bodhisattaṃ sayane pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tañca pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2484_11: disvā gantvā rañño ārocayiṃsu – “kumāro deva, evaṃ nisinno aññesaṃ rukkhānaṃ chāyā
atk-s0201a:2484_12: nivattā, jamburukkhassa parimaṇḍalā ṭhitā”ti. Rājā vegenāgantvā pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a:2484_13: “idaṃ te, tāta, dutiyaṃ vandana”nti puttaṃ vandi. Idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “pitu
atk-s0201a:2484_14: sakkassa kammante…pe… paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharitā”ti. Siyā nu kho eso maggo
atk-s0201a:2484_15: bodhāyāti bhaveyya nu kho etaṃ ānāpānassatipaṭhamajjhānaṃ bujjhanatthāya maggoti.
atk-s0201a:2484_16: Satānusāriviññāṇanti nayidaṃ bodhāya maggo bhavissati, ānāpānassatipaṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2484_17: pana bhavissatīti evaṃ ekaṃ dve vāre uppannasatiyā anantaraṃ uppannaviññāṇaṃ satānusāriviññāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2484_18: nāma. Yaṃ taṃ sukhanti yaṃ taṃ ānāpānassatipaṭhamajjhānasukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2485_1: Bāhullikoti paccayabāhulliko. Āvatto bāhullāyāti rasagiddho hutvā paṇītapiṇḍapātādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2485_2: atthāya āvatto. Nibbijja pakkamiṃsūti ukkaṇṭhitvā dhammaniyāmeneva pakkantā bodhisattassa
atk-s0201a:2485_3: sambodhiṃ pattakāle kāyavivekassa okāsadānatthaṃ dhammatāya gatā. Gacchantā ca aññaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2485_4: agantvā bārāṇasimeva agamaṃsu. Bodhisatto tesu gatesu addhamāsaṃ kāyavivekaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0201a:2487_0: 387. Abhijānāmi kho panāhanti ayaṃ pāṭiyekko anusandhi. Nigaṇṭho kira cintesi – “ahaṃ
atk-s0201a:2487_1: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchiṃ. Samaṇo gotamo ‘aparāpi maṃ, aggivessana, aparāpi
atk-s0201a:2487_2: maṃ, aggivessanā’ti pariyosānaṃ adassento kathetiyeva. Kupito nu kho”ti? Atha bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:2487_3: aggivessana, tathāgate anekasatāya parisāya dhammaṃ desente kupito samaṇo gotamoti
atk-s0201a:2487_4: ekopi vattā natthi, paresaṃ bodhanatthāya paṭivijjhanatthāya eva tathāgato dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2487_5: desetīti dassento imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha ārabbhāti sandhāya. Yāvadevāti
atk-s0201a:2487_6: payojanavidhi paricchedaniyamanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – paresaṃ viññāpanameva tathāgatassa
atk-s0201a:2487_7: dhammadesanāya payojanaṃ, tasmā na ekasseva deseti, yattakā viññātāro atthi, sabbesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2487_8: desetīti. Tasmiṃyeva purimasminti iminā kiṃ dassetīti? Saccako kira cintesi – “samaṇo
atk-s0201a:2487_9: gotamo abhirūpo pāsādiko suphusitaṃ dantāvaraṇaṃ, jivhā mudukā, madhuraṃ vākkaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2487_10: parisaṃ rañjento maññe vicarati, anto panassa cittekaggatā natthī”ti. Atha bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:2487_11: aggivessana, na tathāgato parisaṃ rañjento vicarati, cakkavāḷapariyantāyapi parisāya
atk-s0201a:2487_12: tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti, asallīno anupalitto ettakaṃ ekavihārī, suññataphalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2488_0: Ajjhattamevāti gocarajjhattameva. Sannisādemīti sannisīdāpemi, tathāgato hi yasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2488_1: khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ deti, tasmiṃ khaṇe pubbābhogena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2488_2: samāpajjati, sādhukārasaddassa nigghose avicchinneyeva samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato
atk-s0201a:2488_3: paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti, buddhānañhi bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko hotīti assāsavāre passāsavāre
atk-s0201a:2488_4: samāpattiṃ samāpajjanti. Yena sudaṃ niccakappanti yena suññena phalasamādhinā niccakālaṃ
atk-s0201a:2488_5: viharāmi, tasmiṃ samādhinimitte cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi samādahāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2489_0: Okappaniyametanti saddahaniyametaṃ. Evaṃ bhagavato ekaggacittataṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0201a:2489_1: idāni attano ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ānītapañhaṃ pucchanto abhijānāti kho pana bhavaṃ
atk-s0201a:2489_2: gotamo divā supitāti āha. Yathā hi sunakho nāma asambhinnakhīrapakkapāyasaṃ sappinā
atk-s0201a:2489_3: yojetvā udarapūraṃ bhojitopi gūthaṃ disvā akhāditvā gantuṃ na sakkā, akhādamāno ghāyitvāpi
atk-s0201a:2489_4: gacchati, aghāyitvāva gatassa kirassa sīsaṃ rujjati; evamevaṃ imassapi satthā asambhinnakhīrapakkapāyasasadisaṃ
atk-s0201a:2489_5: abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva āsavakkhayā pasādanīyaṃ dhammadesanaṃ deseti. Etassa
atk-s0201a:2489_6: pana evarūpaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthari pasādamattampi na uppannaṃ, tasmā ovaṭṭikasāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2489_7: katvā ānītapañhaṃ apucchitvā gantuṃ asakkonto evamāha. Tattha yasmā thinamiddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2489_8: sabbakhīṇāsavānaṃ arahattamaggeneva pahīyati, kāyadaratho pana upādinnakepi hoti
atk-s0201a:2489_9: anupādinnakepi. Tathā hi kamaluppalādīni ekasmiṃ kāle vikasanti, ekasmiṃ makulāni
atk-s0201a:2489_10: honti, sāyaṃ kesañci rukkhānampi pattāni patilīyanti, pāto vipphārikāni honti. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2489_11: upādinnakassa kāyassa darathoyeva darathavasena bhavaṅgasotañca idha niddāti adhippetaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2489_12: taṃ khīṇāsavānampi hoti. Taṃ sandhāya, “abhijānāmaha”ntiādimāha. Sammohavihārasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2490_0: 389. Āsajja āsajjāti ghaṭṭetvā ghaṭṭetvā. Upanītehīti upanetvā kathitehi. Vacanappathehīti
atk-s0201a:2490_1: vacanehi. Abhinanditvā anumoditvāti alanti cittena sampaṭicchanto abhinanditvā vācāyapi
atk-s0201a:2490_2: pasaṃsanto anumoditvā. Bhagavatā imassa nigaṇṭhassa dve suttāni kathitāni. Purimasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2490_3: eko bhāṇavāro, idaṃ diyaḍḍho, iti aḍḍhatiye bhāṇavāre sutvāpi ayaṃ nigaṇṭho neva
atk-s0201a:2490_4: abhisamayaṃ patto, na pabbajito, na saraṇesu patiṭṭhito. Kasmā etassa bhagavā dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2490_5: desesīti? Anāgate vāsanatthāya. Passati hi bhagavā, “imassa idāni upanissayo natthi,
atk-s0201a:2490_6: mayhaṃ pana parinibbānato samadhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ accayena tambapaṇṇidīpe
atk-s0201a:2490_7: sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissati. Tatrāyaṃ kulaghare nibbattitvā sampatte kāle pabbajitvā
atk-s0201a:2490_8: tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0201a:2490_9: kāḷabuddharakkhito nāma mahākhīṇāsavo bhavissatī”ti. Idaṃ disvā anāgate vāsanatthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a:2491_0: Sopi tattheva tambapaṇṇidīpamhi sāsane patiṭṭhite devalokato cavitvā dakkhiṇagirivihārassa
atk-s0201a:2491_1: bhikkhācāragāme ekasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatto pabbajjāsamatthayobbane pabbajitvā tepiṭakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2491_2: buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā gaṇaṃ pariharanto mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upajjhāyaṃ passituṃ
atk-s0201a:2491_3: agamāsi. Athassa upajjhāyo saddhivihārikaṃ codessāmīti tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā
atk-s0201a:2491_4: āgatena tena saddhiṃ mukhaṃ datvā kathāmattampi na akāsi. So paccūsasamaye vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:2491_5: therassa santikaṃ gantvā, – “tumhe, bhante, mayi ganthakammaṃ katvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2491_6: āgate mukhaṃ datvā kathāmattampi na karittha, ko mayhaṃ doso”ti pucchi. Thero āha
atk-s0201a:2491_7: – “tvaṃ, āvuso, buddharakkhita ettakeneva ‘pabbajjākiccaṃ me matthakaṃ patta’nti
atk-s0201a:2491_8: saññaṃ karosī”ti. Kiṃ karomi, bhanteti? Gaṇaṃ vinodetvā tvaṃ papañcaṃ chinditvā cetiyapabbatavihāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2491_9: gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karohīti. So upajjhāyassa ovāde ṭhatvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2491_10: patvā puññavā rājapūjito hutvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro cetiyapabbatavihāre vasi.
atk-s0201a:2492_0: Tasmiñhi kāle tissamahārājā uposathakammaṃ karonto cetiyapabbate rājaleṇe vasati.
atk-s0201a:2492_1: So therassa upaṭṭhākabhikkhuno saññaṃ adāsi – “yadā mayhaṃ ayyo pañhaṃ vissajjeti,
atk-s0201a:2492_2: dhammaṃ vā katheti, tadā me saññaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti. Theropi ekasmiṃ dhammassavanadivase
atk-s0201a:2492_3: bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro kaṇṭakacetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha cetiyaṃ vanditvā kāḷatimbarurukkhamūle
atk-s0201a:2492_4: aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ eko piṇḍapātikatthero kāḷakārāmasuttante pañhaṃ pucchi. Thero nanu,
atk-s0201a:2492_5: āvuso, ajja dhammassavanadivasoti āha. Āma, bhante, dhammassavanadivasoti. Tena hi
atk-s0201a:2492_6: pīṭhakaṃ ānetha, idheva nisinnā dhammassavanaṃ karissāmāti. Athassa rukkhamūle āsanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2492_7: paññapetvā adaṃsu. Thero pubbagāthā vatvā kāḷakārāmasuttaṃ ārabhi. Sopissa upaṭṭhākadaharo
atk-s0201a:2492_8: rañño saññaṃ dāpesi. Rājā pubbagāthāsu aniṭṭhitāsuyeva pāpuṇi. Patvā ca aññātakaveseneva
atk-s0201a:2492_9: parisante ṭhatvā tiyāmarattiṃ ṭhitakova dhammaṃ sutvā therassa, idamavoca bhagavāti
atk-s0201a:2492_10: vacanakāle sādhukāraṃ adāsi. Thero ñatvā, kadā āgatosi, mahārājāti pucchi. Pubbagāthā
atk-s0201a:2492_11: osāraṇakāleyeva, bhanteti. Dukkaraṃ te mahārāja, katanti. Nayidaṃ, bhante, dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0201a:2492_12: yadi pana me ayyassa dhammakathaṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya ekapadepi aññavihitabhāvo
atk-s0201a:2492_13: ahosi, tambapaṇṇidīpassa patodayaṭṭhinitudanamattepi ṭhāne sāmibhāvo nāma me mā hotūti sapathamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2493_0: Tasmiṃ pana sutte buddhaguṇā paridīpitā, tasmā rājā pucchi – “ettakāva, bhante, buddhaguṇā,
atk-s0201a:2493_1: udāhu aññepi atthī”ti. Mayā kathitato, mahārāja, akathitameva bahu appamāṇanti. Upamaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2493_2: bhante, karothāti. Yathā, mahārāja, karīsasahassamatte sālikkhette ekasālisīsato
atk-s0201a:2493_3: avasesasālīyeva bahū, evaṃ mayā kathitaguṇā appā, avasesā bahūti. Aparampi, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2493_4: upamaṃ karothāti. Yathā, mahārāja, mahāgaṅgāya oghapuṇṇāya sūcipāsaṃ sammukhaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a:2493_5: sūcipāsena gataudakaṃ appaṃ, sesaṃ bahu, evameva mayā kathitaguṇā appā, avasesā bahūti.
atk-s0201a:2493_6: Aparampi, bhante, upamaṃ karothāti. Idha, mahārāja, cātakasakuṇā nāma ākāse kīḷantā
atk-s0201a:2493_7: vicaranti. Khuddakā sā sakuṇajāti, kiṃ nu kho tassa sakuṇassa ākāse pakkhapasāraṇaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2493_8: bahu, avaseso ākāso appoti? Kiṃ, bhante, vadatha, appo tassa pakkhapasāraṇokāso,
atk-s0201a:2493_9: avasesova bahūti. Evameva, mahārāja, appakā mayā buddhaguṇā kathitā, avasesā bahū
atk-s0201a:2493_10: anantā appameyyāti. Sukathitaṃ, bhante, anantā buddhaguṇā ananteneva ākāsena upamitā.
atk-s0201a:2493_11: Pasannā mayaṃ ayyassa, anucchavikaṃ pana kātuṃ na sakkoma. Ayaṃ me duggatapaṇṇākāro
atk-s0201a:2493_12: imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe imaṃ tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ ayyassa demāti. Tumhehi, mahārāja,
atk-s0201a:2493_13: attano pasannākāro kato, mayaṃ pana amhākaṃ dinnaṃ rajjaṃ tumhākaṃyeva dema, dhammena
atk-s0201a:2497_0: 390. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ. Tattha pubbārāme migāramātupāsādeti
atk-s0201a:2497_1: pubbārāmasaṅkhāte vihāre migāramātuyā pāsāde. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbīkathāatīte satasahassakappamatthake
atk-s0201a:2497_2: ekā upāsikā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0201a:2497_3: satasahassaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhagavato pādamūle nipajjitvā, “anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa
atk-s0201a:2497_4: aggupaṭṭhāyikā homī”ti patthanamakāsi. Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ceva manussesu
atk-s0201a:2497_5: ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa dhanañjayassa
atk-s0201a:2497_6: seṭṭhino gahe sumanadeviyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Jātakāle cassā visākhāti
atk-s0201a:2497_7: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Sā yadā bhagavā bhaddiyanagaraṃ agamāsi, tadā pañcahi dārikāsatehi
atk-s0201a:2497_8: saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ katvā paṭhamadassanamhiyeva sotāpannā ahosi. Aparabhāge
atk-s0201a:2497_9: sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā, tattha naṃ migāraseṭṭhi
atk-s0201a:2498_0: Patikulaṃ gacchantiyā cassā pitā mahālatāpiḷandhanaṃ nāma kārāpesi. Tasmiṃ piḷandhane
atk-s0201a:2498_1: catasso vajiranāḷiyo upayogaṃ agamaṃsu, muttānaṃ ekādasa nāḷiyo, pavāḷānaṃ dvāvīsati
atk-s0201a:2498_2: nāḷiyo, maṇīnaṃ tettiṃsa nāḷiyo, iti etehi ca aññehi ca sattavaṇṇehi ratanehi niṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2498_3: agamāsi. Taṃ sīse paṭimukkaṃ yāva pādapiṭṭhiyā bhassati, pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ
atk-s0201a:2498_4: dhārayamānāva naṃ itthī dhāretuṃ sakkoti. Sā aparabhāge dasabalassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā
atk-s0201a:2498_5: hutvā taṃ pasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navahi koṭīhi bhagavato vihāraṃ kārayamānā karīsamatte
atk-s0201a:2498_6: bhūmibhāge pāsādaṃ kāresi. Tassa uparibhūmiyaṃ pañca gabbhasatāni honti, heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2498_7: pañcāti gabbhasahassappaṭimaṇḍito ahosi. Sā “suddhapāsādova na sobhatī”ti taṃ parivāretvā
atk-s0201a:2498_8: pañca dvikūṭagehasatāni, pañca cūḷapāsādasatāni, pañca dīghasālasatāni ca kārāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2499_0: Mātugāmattabhāve ṭhitāya visākhāya viya aññissā buddhasāsane dhanapariccāgo nāma
atk-s0201a:2499_1: natthi, purisattabhāve ṭhitassa ca anāthapiṇḍikassa viya aññassa buddhasāsane dhanapariccāgo
atk-s0201a:2499_2: nāma natthi. So hi catupaññāsakoṭiyo vissajjetvā sāvatthiyā dakkhiṇabhāge anurādhapurassa
atk-s0201a:2499_3: mahāvihārasadise ṭhāne jetavanamahāvihāraṃ nāma kāresi. Visākhā, sāvatthiyā pācīnabhāge
atk-s0201a:2499_4: uttamadevīvihārasadise ṭhāne pubbārāmaṃ nāma kāresi. Bhagavā imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2499_5: anukampāya sāvatthiṃ nissāya viharanto imesu dvīsu vihāresu nibaddhavāsaṃ vasi. Ekaṃ
atk-s0201a:2499_6: antovassaṃ jetavane vasati, ekaṃ pubbārāme, etasmiṃ pana samaye bhagavā pubbārāme
atk-s0201a:2500_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhanteti kittakena nu kho, bhante. Saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto
atk-s0201a:2500_1: hotīti taṇhāsaṅkhaye nibbāne taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vimuttacittatāya taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto
atk-s0201a:2500_2: nāma saṃkhittena kittāvatā hoti? Yāya paṭipattiyā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutto hoti, taṃ
atk-s0201a:2500_3: me khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ saṃkhittena desethāti pucchati. Accantaniṭṭhoti
atk-s0201a:2500_4: khayavayasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ atītāti accantā. Accantā niṭṭhā assāti accantaniṭṭho, ekantaniṭṭho
atk-s0201a:2500_5: satataniṭṭhoti attho. Accantaṃ yogakkhemīti accantayogakkhemī, niccayogakkhemīti
atk-s0201a:2500_6: attho. Accantaṃ brahmacārīti accantabrahmacārī, niccabrahmacārīti attho. Accantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2500_7: pariyosānamassāti purimanayeneva accantapariyosāno. Seṭṭho devamanussānanti devānañca
atk-s0201a:2500_8: manussānañca seṭṭho uttamo. Evarūpo bhikkhu kittāvatā hoti, khippametassa saṅkhepeneva
atk-s0201a:2500_9: paṭipattiṃ kathethāti bhagavantaṃ yācati. Kasmā panesa evaṃ vegāyatīti? Kīḷaṃ anubhavitukāmatāya.
atk-s0201a:2501_0: Ayaṃ kira uyyānakīḷaṃ āṇāpetvā catūhi mahārājūhi catūsu disāsu ārakkhaṃ gāhāpetvā
atk-s0201a:2501_1: dvīsu devalokesu devasaṅghena parivuto aḍḍhatiyāhi nāṭakakoṭīhi saddhiṃ erāvaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2501_2: āruyha uyyānadvāre ṭhito imaṃ pañhaṃ sallakkhesi – “kittakena nu kho taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttassa
atk-s0201a:2501_3: khīṇāsavassa saṅkhepato āgamaniyapubbabhāgapaṭipadā hotī”ti. Athassa etadahosi –
atk-s0201a:2501_4: “ayaṃ pañho ativiya sassiriko, sacāhaṃ imaṃ pañhaṃ anuggaṇhitvāva uyyānaṃ pavisissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2501_5: chadvārikehi ārammaṇehi nimmathito na puna imaṃ pañhaṃ sallakkhessāmi, tiṭṭhatu tāva
atk-s0201a:2501_6: uyyānakīḷā, satthu santikaṃ gantvā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā uggahitapañho uyyāne kīḷissāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2501_7: hatthikkhandhe antarahito bhagavato santike pāturahosi. Tepi cattāro mahārājāno ārakkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2501_8: gahetvā ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhitā, paricārikadevasaṅghāpi nāṭakānipi erāvaṇopi nāgarājā
atk-s0201a:2501_9: tattheva uyyānadvāre aṭṭhāsi, evamesa kīḷaṃ anubhavitukāmatāya vegāyanto evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2502_0: Sabbe dhammā nālaṃ abhinivesāyāti ettha sabbe dhammā nāma pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni
atk-s0201a:2502_1: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo. Te sabbepi taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinivesāya nālaṃ na pariyattā na
atk-s0201a:2502_2: samatthā na yuttā, kasmā? Gahitākārena atiṭṭhanato. Te hi niccāti gahitāpi aniccāva
atk-s0201a:2502_3: sampajjanti, sukhāti gahitāpi dukkhāva sampajjanti, attāti gahitāpi anattāva sampajjanti,
atk-s0201a:2502_4: tasmā nālaṃ abhinivesāya. Abhijānātīti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti ñātapariññāya abhijānāti.
atk-s0201a:2502_5: Parijānātīti tatheva tīraṇapariññāya parijānāti. Yaṃkiñci vedananti antamaso pañcaviññāṇasampayuttampi
atk-s0201a:2502_6: yaṃkiñci appamattakampi vedanaṃ anubhavati. Iminā bhagavā sakkassa devānamindassa
atk-s0201a:2502_7: vedanāvasena nibbattetvā arūpapariggahaṃ dasseti. Sace pana vedanākammaṭṭhānaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-s0201a:2502_8: na kathitaṃ bhaveyya, imasmiṃ ṭhāne kathetabbaṃ siyā. Heṭṭhā pana kathitaṃ, tasmā
atk-s0201a:2502_9: satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Aniccānupassīti ettha aniccaṃ veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2502_10: aniccānupassanā veditabbā, aniccānupassī veditabbo. Tattha aniccanti pañcakkhandhā,
atk-s0201a:2502_11: te hi uppādavayaṭṭhena aniccā. Aniccānupassanāti pañcakkhandhānaṃ khayato vayato
atk-s0201a:2502_12: dassanañāṇaṃ. Aniccānupassīti tena ñāṇena samannāgato puggalo. Tasmā “aniccānupassī
atk-s0201a:2502_13: viharatī”ti aniccato anupassanto viharatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a:2503_0: Virāgānupassīti ettha dve virāgā khayavirāgo ca accantavirāgo ca. Tattha saṅkhārānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2503_1: khayavayato anupassanāpi, accantavirāgaṃ nibbānaṃ virāgato dassanamaggañāṇampi virāgānupassanā.
atk-s0201a:2503_2: Tadubhayasamāṅgīpuggalo virāgānupassī nāma, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “virāgānupassī”ti,
atk-s0201a:2503_3: virāgato anupassantoti attho. Nirodhānupassimhipi eseva nayo, nirodhopi hi khayanirodho
atk-s0201a:2503_4: ca accantanirodho cāti duvidhoyeva. Paṭinissaggānupassīti ettha paṭinissaggo vuccati
atk-s0201a:2503_5: vossaggo, so ca pariccāgavossaggo pakkhandanavossaggoti duvidho hoti. Tattha pariccāgavossaggoti
atk-s0201a:2503_6: vipassanā, sā hi tadaṅgavasena kilese ca khandhe ca vossajjati. Pakkhandanavossaggoti
atk-s0201a:2503_7: maggo, so hi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇato pakkhandati. Dvīhipi vā kāraṇehi vossaggoyeva,
atk-s0201a:2503_8: samucchedavasena khandhānaṃ kilesānañca vossajjanato, nibbānañca pakkhandanato. Tasmā
atk-s0201a:2503_9: kilese ca khandhe ca pariccajatīti pariccāgavossaggo, nirodhe nibbānadhātuyā cittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2503_10: pakkhandatīti pakkhandanavossaggoti ubhayampetaṃ magge sameti. Tadubhayasamaṅgīpuggalo
atk-s0201a:2503_11: imāya paṭinissaggānupassanāya samannāgatattā paṭinissaggānupassī nāma hoti. Taṃ sandhāya
atk-s0201a:2503_12: vuttaṃ “paṭinissaggānupassī”ti. Na kiñci loke upādiyatīti kiñci ekampi saṅkhāragataṃ
atk-s0201a:2503_13: taṇhāvasena na upādiyati na gaṇhāti na parāmasati. Anupādiyaṃ na paritassatīti aggaṇhanto
atk-s0201a:2503_14: taṇhāparitassanāya na paritassati. Paccattaññeva parinibbāyatīti sayameva kilesaparinibbānena
atk-s0201a:2503_15: parinibbāyati. Khīṇā jātītiādinā panassa paccavekkhaṇāva dassitā. Iti bhagavā sakkassa
atk-s0201a:2503_16: devānamindassa saṃkhittena khīṇāsavassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ pucchito sallahukaṃ
atk-s0201a:2504_0: 391. Avidūre nisinno hotīti anantare kūṭāgāre nisinno hoti. Abhisameccāti ñāṇena
atk-s0201a:2504_1: abhisamāgantvā, jānitvāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kiṃ nu kho esa jānitvā anumodi,
atk-s0201a:2504_2: udāhu ajānitvā vāti. Kasmā panassa evamahosīti? Thero kira na bhagavato pañhavissajjanasaddaṃ
atk-s0201a:2504_3: assosi, sakkassa pana devarañño, “evametaṃ bhagavā evametaṃ sugatā”ti anumodanasaddaṃ
atk-s0201a:2504_4: assosi. Sakko kira devarājā mahatā saddena anumodi. Atha kasmā na bhagavato saddaṃ
atk-s0201a:2504_5: assosīti? Yathāparisaviññāpakattā. Buddhānañhi dhammaṃ kathentānaṃ ekābaddhāya cakkavāḷapariyantāyapi
atk-s0201a:2504_6: parisāya saddo suyyati, pariyantaṃ pana muñcitvā aṅgulimattampi bahiddhā na niccharati.
atk-s0201a:2504_7: Kasmā? Evarūpā madhurakathā mā niratthakā agamāsīti. Tadā bhagavā migāramātupāsāde
atk-s0201a:2504_8: sattaratanamaye kūṭāgāre sirigabbhamhi nisinno hoti, tassa dakkhiṇapasse sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0201a:2504_9: vasanakūṭāgāraṃ, vāmapasse mahāmoggallānassa, antare chiddavivarokāso natthi, tasmā
atk-s0201a:2504_10: thero na bhagavato saddaṃ assosi, sakkasseva assosīti.
atk-s0201a:2505_0: Pañcahi tūriyasatehīti pañcaṅgikānaṃ tūriyānaṃ pañcahi satehi. Pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2505_1: nāma ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ susiraṃ ghananti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2505_2: Tattha ātataṃ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu ekatalatūriyaṃ. Vitataṃ nāma ubhayatalaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2505_3: Ātatavitataṃ nāma tantibaddhapaṇavādi. Susiraṃ vaṃsādi. Ghanaṃ sammādi. Samappitoti
atk-s0201a:2505_4: upagato. Samaṅgībhūtoti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Paricāretīti taṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto
atk-s0201a:2505_5: tato tato indriyāni cāreti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – parivāretvā vajjamānehi pañcahi tūriyasatehi
atk-s0201a:2505_6: samannāgato hutvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavatī. Paṭipaṇāmetvāti apanetvā, nissaddāni
atk-s0201a:2505_7: kārāpetvāti attho. Yatheva hi idāni saddhā rājāno garubhāvaniyaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā –
atk-s0201a:2505_8: “asuko nāma ayyo āgacchati, mā, tātā, gāyatha, mā vādetha, mā naccathā”ti nāṭakāni
atk-s0201a:2505_9: paṭivinenti, sakkopi theraṃ disvā evamakāsi. Cirassaṃ kho, mārisa moggallāna, imaṃ
atk-s0201a:2505_10: pariyāyamakāsīti evarūpaṃ loke pakatiyā piyasamudāhāravacanaṃ hoti, lokiyā hi cirassaṃ
atk-s0201a:2505_11: āgatampi anāgatapubbampi manāpajātiyaṃ āgataṃ disvā, – “kuto bhavaṃ āgato, cirassaṃ
atk-s0201a:2505_12: bhavaṃ āgato, kathaṃ te idhāgamanamaggo ñāto maggamūḷhosī”tiādīni vadanti. Ayaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:2505_13: āgatapubbattāyeva evamāha. Thero hi kālena kālaṃ devacārikaṃ gacchatiyeva. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2505_14: pariyāyamakāsīti vāramakāsi. Yadidaṃ idhāgamanāyāti yo ayaṃ idhāgamanāya vāro, taṃ,
atk-s0201a:2505_15: bhante, cirassamakāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idamāsanaṃ paññattanti yojanikaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0201a:2506_0: 392. Bahukiccā bahukaraṇīyāti ettha yesaṃ bahūni kiccāni, te bahukiccā. Bahukaraṇīyāti
atk-s0201a:2506_1: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Appeva sakena karaṇīyenāti sakaraṇīyameva appaṃ mandaṃ, na bahu,
atk-s0201a:2506_2: devānaṃ karaṇīyaṃ pana bahu, pathavito paṭṭhāya hi kapparukkhamātugāmādīnaṃ atthāya
atk-s0201a:2506_3: aṭṭā sakkassa santike chijjanti, tasmā niyamento āha – apica devānaṃyeva tāvatiṃsānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2506_4: karaṇīyenāti. Devānañhi dhītā ca puttā ca aṅke nibbattanti, pādaparicārikā itthiyo
atk-s0201a:2506_5: sayane nibbattanti, tāsaṃ maṇḍanapasādhanakārikā devadhītā sayanaṃ parivāretvā nibbattanti,
atk-s0201a:2506_6: veyyāvaccakarā antovimāne nibbattanti, etesaṃ atthāya aṭṭakaraṇaṃ natthi. Ye pana
atk-s0201a:2506_7: sīmantare nibbattanti, te “mama santakā tava santakā”ti nicchetuṃ asakkontā aṭṭaṃ
atk-s0201a:2506_8: karonti, sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ pucchanti, so yassa vimānaṃ āsannataraṃ, tassa santakoti
atk-s0201a:2506_9: vadati. Sace dvepi samaṭṭhāne honti, yassa vimānaṃ olokento ṭhito, tassa santakoti
atk-s0201a:2506_10: vadati. Sace ekampi na oloketi, taṃ ubhinnaṃ kalahupacchedanatthaṃ attano santakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2506_11: karoti. Taṃ sandhāya, “devānaṃyeva tāvatiṃsānaṃ karaṇīyenā”ti āha. Apicassa evarūpaṃ
atk-s0201a:2507_0: Yaṃ no khippameva antaradhāyatīti yaṃ amhākaṃ sīghameva andhakāre rūpagataṃ viya
atk-s0201a:2507_1: na dissati. Iminā – “ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ pañhavissajjanaṃ na sallakkhemī”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0201a:2507_2: Thero – “kasmā nu kho ayaṃ yakkho asallakkhaṇabhāvaṃ dīpeti, passena pariharatī”ti
atk-s0201a:2507_3: āvajjanto – “devā nāma mahāmūḷhā honti. Chadvārikehi ārammaṇehi nimmathīyamānā attano
atk-s0201a:2507_4: bhuttābhuttabhāvampi pītāpītabhāvampi na jānanti, idha katamettha pamussantī”ti aññāsi.
atk-s0201a:2507_5: Keci panāhu – “thero etassa garu bhāvaniyo, tasmā ‘idāneva loke aggapuggalassa santike
atk-s0201a:2507_6: pañhaṃ uggahetvā āgato, idāneva nāṭakānaṃ antaraṃ paviṭṭhoti evaṃ maṃ thero tajjeyyā’ti
atk-s0201a:2507_7: bhayena evamāhā”ti. Etaṃ pana kohaññaṃ nāma hoti, na ariyasāvakassa evarūpaṃ kohaññaṃ
atk-s0201a:2507_8: nāma hoti, tasmā mūḷhabhāveneva na sallakkhesīti veditabbaṃ. Upari kasmā sallakkhesīti?
atk-s0201a:2507_9: Thero tassa somanassasaṃvegaṃ janayitvā tamaṃ nīhari, tasmā sallakkhesīti.
atk-s0201a:2508_0: Idāni sakko pubbe attano evaṃ bhūtakāraṇaṃ therassa ārocetuṃ bhūtapubbantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2508_1: Tattha samupabyūḷhoti sannipatito rāsibhūto. Asurā parājiniṃsūti asurā parājayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2508_2: pāpuṇiṃsu. Kadā panete parājitāti? Sakkassa nibbattakāle. Sakko kira anantare attabhāve
atk-s0201a:2508_3: magadharaṭṭhe macalagāme magho nāma māṇavo ahosi, paṇḍito byatto, bodhisattacariyā
atk-s0201a:2508_4: viyassa cariyā ahosi. So tettiṃsa purise gahetvā kalyāṇamakāsi. Ekadivasaṃ attanova
atk-s0201a:2508_5: paññāya upaparikkhitvā gāmamajjhe mahājanassa sannipatitaṭṭhāne kacavaraṃ ubhayato
atk-s0201a:2508_6: apabbahitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ atiramaṇīyamakāsi, puna tattheva maṇḍapaṃ kāresi, puna gacchante
atk-s0201a:2508_7: kāle sālaṃ kāresi. Gāmato ca nikkhamitvā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi tigāvutampi yojanampi
atk-s0201a:2508_8: vicaritvā tehi sahāyehi saddhiṃ visamaṃ samaṃ akāsi. Te sabbepi ekacchandā tattha
atk-s0201a:2508_10: maṇḍapādīni karontā bahuṃ puññamakaṃsu. Magho satta vatapadāni pūretvā kāyassa bhedā
atk-s0201a:2509_0: Tasmiṃ kāle asuragaṇā tāvatiṃsadevaloke paṭivasanti. Sabbe te devānaṃ samānāyukā
atk-s0201a:2509_1: samānavaṇṇā ca honti, te sakkaṃ saparisaṃ disvā adhunā nibbattā navakadevaputtā āgatāti
atk-s0201a:2509_2: mahāpānaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Sakko devaputtānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi – “amhehi kusalaṃ karontehi
atk-s0201a:2509_3: na parehi saddhiṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kataṃ, tumhe gaṇḍapānaṃ mā pivittha pītamattameva karothā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2509_4: Te tathā akaṃsu. Bālaasurā gaṇḍapānaṃ pivitvā mattā niddaṃ okkamiṃsu. Sakko devānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2509_5: saññaṃ datvā te pādesu gāhāpetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi, sinerussa heṭṭhimatale asurabhavanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2509_6: nāma atthi, tāvatiṃsadevalokappamāṇameva. Tattha asurā vasanti. Tesampi cittapāṭali
atk-s0201a:2509_7: nāma rukkho atthi. Te tassa pupphanakāle jānanti – “nāyaṃ tāvatiṃsā, sakkena vañcitā
atk-s0201a:2509_8: maya”nti. Te gaṇhatha nanti vatvā sineruṃ pariharamānā deve vuṭṭhe vammikapādato
atk-s0201a:2509_9: vammikamakkhikā viya abhiruhiṃsu. Tattha kālena devā jinanti, kālena asurā. Yadā
atk-s0201a:2509_10: devānaṃ jayo hoti, asure yāva samuddapiṭṭhā anubandhanti. Yadā asurānaṃ jayo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2509_11: deve yāva vedikapādā anubandhanti. Tasmiṃ pana saṅgāme devānaṃ jayo ahosi, devā asure
atk-s0201a:2509_12: yāva samuddapiṭṭhā anubandhiṃsu. Sakko asure palāpetvā pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2509_13: Evaṃ ārakkhaṃ datvā vedikapāde vajirahatthā indapaṭimāyo ṭhapesi. Asurā kālena kālaṃ
atk-s0201a:2509_14: uṭṭhahitvā tā paṭimāyo disvā, “sakko appamatto tiṭṭhatī”ti tatova nivattanti. Tato
atk-s0201a:2510_0: 393. Vessavaṇo ca mahārājāti so kira sakkassa vallabho, balavavissāsiko, tasmā sakkena
atk-s0201a:2510_1: saddhiṃ agamāsi. Purakkhatvāti purato katvā. Pavisiṃsūti pavisitvā pana upaḍḍhapihitāni
atk-s0201a:2510_2: dvārāni katvā olokayamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Idampi, mārisa moggallāna, passa vejayantassa
atk-s0201a:2510_3: pāsādassa rāmaṇeyyakanti, mārisa moggallāna, idampi vejayantassa pāsādassa rāmaṇeyyakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2510_4: passa, suvaṇṇatthambhe passa, rajatatthambhe maṇitthambhe pavāḷatthambhe lohitaṅgatthambhe
atk-s0201a:2510_5: masāragallatthambhe muttatthambhe sattaratanatthambhe, tesaṃyeva suvaṇṇādimaye ghaṭake
atk-s0201a:2510_6: vāḷarūpakāni ca passāti evaṃ thambhapantiyo ādiṃ katvā rāmaṇeyyakaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2510_7: Yathā taṃ pubbekatapuññassāti yathā pubbe katapuññassa upabhogaṭṭhānena sobhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2510_8: evamevaṃ sobhatīti attho. Atibāḷhaṃ kho ayaṃ yakkho pamatto viharatīti attano pāsāde
