atk-s0201a:2511_0: Iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsīti iddhimakāsi. Āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā pāsādapatiṭṭhitokāsaṃ
atk-s0201a:2511_1: udakaṃ hotūti iddhiṃ adhiṭṭhāya pāsādakaṇṇike pādaṅguṭṭhakena pahari. So pāsādo yathā
atk-s0201a:2511_2: nāma udakapiṭṭhe ṭhapitapattaṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ aṅguliyā pahaṭaṃ aparāparaṃ kampati
atk-s0201a:2511_3: calati na santiṭṭhati. Evamevaṃ saṃkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, thambhapiṭṭhasaṅghāṭakaṇṇikagopānasiādīni
atk-s0201a:2511_4: karakarāti saddaṃ muñcantāni patituṃ viya āraddhāni. Tena vuttaṃ – “saṅkampesi sampakampesi
atk-s0201a:2511_5: sampavedhesī”ti. Acchariyabbhutacittajātāti aho acchariyaṃ, aho abbhutanti evaṃ sañjātaacchariyaabbhutā
atk-s0201a:2511_6: ceva sañjātatuṭṭhino ca ahesuṃ uppannabalavasomanassā. Saṃvigganti ubbiggaṃ. Lomahaṭṭhajātanti
atk-s0201a:2511_7: jātalomahaṃsaṃ, kañcanabhittiyaṃ ṭhapitamaṇināgadantehi viya uddhaggehi lomehi ākiṇṇasarīranti
atk-s0201a:2511_8: attho. Lomahaṃso ca nāmesa somanassenapi hoti domanassenapi, idha pana somanassena
atk-s0201a:2511_9: jāto. Thero hi sakkassa somanassavegena saṃvejetuṃ taṃ pāṭihāriyamakāsi. Tasmā somanassavegena
atk-s0201a:2512_0: 394. Idhāhaṃ, mārisāti idānissa yasmā therena somanassasaṃvegaṃ janayitvā tamaṃ vinoditaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2512_1: tasmā sallakkhetvā evamāha. Eso nu te, mārisa, so bhagavā satthāti, mārisa, tvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2512_2: kuhiṃ gatosīti vutte mayhaṃ satthu santikanti vadesi, imasmiṃ devaloke ekapādakena
atk-s0201a:2512_3: viya tiṭṭhasi, yaṃ tvaṃ evaṃ vadesi, eso nu te, mārisa, so bhagavā satthāti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2512_4: Sabrahmacārī me esoti ettha kiñcāpi thero anagāriyo abhinīhārasampanno aggasāvako,
atk-s0201a:2512_5: sakko agāriyo, maggabrahmacariyavasena panete sabrahmacārino honti, tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2512_6: Aho nūna te so bhagavā satthāti sabrahmacārī tāva te evaṃmahiddhiko, so pana te bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2512_7: satthā aho nūna mahiddhikoti satthu iddhipāṭihāriyadassane jātābhilāpā hutvā evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2513: 395. Ñātaññatarassāti paññātaññatarassa, sakko hi paññātānaṃ aññataro. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva, desanaṃ pana bhagavā yathānusandhināva niṭṭhāpesīti.
atk-s0201a:2517_0: 396. Evaṃ me sutanti mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhigatanti alagaddūpamasutte
atk-s0201a:2517_1: laddhimattaṃ diṭṭhigatanti vuttaṃ, idha sassatadiṭṭhi. So ca bhikkhu bahussuto, ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2517_2: appassuto, jātakabhāṇako bhagavantaṃ jātakaṃ kathetvā, “ahaṃ, bhikkhave, tena samayena
atk-s0201a:2517_3: vessantaro ahosiṃ, mahosadho, vidhurapaṇḍito, senakapaṇḍito, mahājanako rājā ahosi”nti
atk-s0201a:2517_4: samodhānentaṃ suṇāti. Athassa etadahosi – “ime rūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhārā tattha tattheva
atk-s0201a:2517_5: nirujjhanti, viññāṇaṃ pana idhalokato paralokaṃ, paralokato imaṃ lokaṃ sandhāvati
atk-s0201a:2517_6: saṃsaratī”ti sassatadassanaṃ uppannaṃ. Tenāha – “tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”nti.
atk-s0201a:2518_0: Sammāsambuddhena pana, “viññāṇaṃ paccayasambhavaṃ, sati paccaye uppajjati, vinā paccayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2518_1: natthi viññāṇassa sambhavo”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā ayaṃ bhikkhu buddhena akathitaṃ katheti,
atk-s0201a:2518_2: jinacakke pahāraṃ deti, vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhati, sotukāmaṃ janaṃ visaṃvādeti, ariyapathe
atk-s0201a:2518_3: tiriyaṃ nipatitvā mahājanassa ahitāya dukkhāya paṭipanno. Yathā nāma rañño rajje
atk-s0201a:2518_4: mahācoro uppajjamāno mahājanassa ahitāya dukkhāya uppajjati, evaṃ jinasāsane coro
atk-s0201a:2518_5: hutvā mahājanassa ahitāya dukkhāya uppannoti veditabbo. Sambahulā bhikkhūti janapadavāsino
atk-s0201a:2518_6: piṇḍapātikabhikkhū. Tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ayaṃ parisaṃ labhitvā sāsanampi antaradhāpeyya,
atk-s0201a:2518_7: yāva pakkhaṃ na labhati, tāvadeva naṃ diṭṭhigatā vivecemāti sutasutaṭṭhānatoyeva
atk-s0201a:2519_0: 398. Katamaṃ taṃ sāti viññāṇanti sāti yaṃ tvaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāya vadesi, katamaṃ
atk-s0201a:2519_1: taṃ viññāṇanti? Yvāyaṃ, bhante, vado vedeyyo tatra tatra kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2519_2: vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti, bhante, yo ayaṃ vadati vedayati, yo cāyaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2519_3: vipākaṃ paccanubhoti. Idaṃ, bhante, viññāṇaṃ, yamahaṃ sandhāya vademīti. Kassa nu
atk-s0201a:2519_4: kho nāmāti kassa khattiyassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā vessasuddagahaṭṭhapabbajitadevamanussānaṃ vā aññatarassa.
atk-s0201a:2520_0: 399. Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti kasmā āmantesi? Sātissa kira evaṃ ahosi
atk-s0201a:2520_1: – “satthā maṃ ‘moghapuriso’ti vadati, na ca moghapurisoti vuttamatteneva maggaphalānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2520_2: upanissayo na hoti. Upasenampi hi vaṅgantaputtaṃ, ‘atilahuṃ kho tvaṃ moghapurisa
atk-s0201a:2520_3: bāhullāya āvatto’ti bhagavā moghapurisavādena ovadi. Thero aparabhāge ghaṭento vāyamanto
atk-s0201a:2520_4: cha abhiññā sacchākāsi. Ahampi tathārūpaṃ vīriyaṃ paggaṇhitvā maggaphalāni nibbattessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2520_5: Athassa bhagavā chinnapaccayo ayaṃ sāsane aviruḷhadhammoti dassento bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-s0201a:2520_6: Usmīkatotiādi heṭṭhā vuttādhippāyameva. Atha kho bhagavāti ayampi pāṭiyekko anusandhi.
atk-s0201a:2520_7: Sātissa kira etadahosi – “bhagavā mayhaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthīti vadati,
atk-s0201a:2520_8: kiṃ sakkā upanissaye asati kātuṃ? Na hi tathāgatā saupanissayasseva dhammaṃ desenti,
atk-s0201a:2520_9: yassa kassaci desentiyeva. Ahaṃ buddhassa santikā sugatovādaṃ labhitvā saggasampattūpagaṃ
atk-s0201a:2520_10: kusalaṃ karissāmī”ti. Athassa bhagavā, “nāhaṃ, moghapurisa, tuyhaṃ ovādaṃ vā anusāsaniṃ
atk-s0201a:2520_11: vā demī”ti sugatovādaṃ paṭippassambhento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0201a:2520_12: veditabbo. Idāni parisāya laddhiṃ sodhento, “idhāhaṃ bhikkhū paṭipucchissāmī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2521_0: 400. Idāni viññāṇassa sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ yaṃ yadeva, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2521_1: manañca paṭicca dhamme cāti sahāvajjanena bhavaṅgamanañca tebhūmakadhamme ca paṭicca.
atk-s0201a:2521_2: Kaṭṭhañca paṭiccātiādi opammanidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena kiṃ dīpeti? Dvārasaṅkantiyā
atk-s0201a:2521_3: abhāvaṃ. Yathā hi kaṭṭhaṃ paṭicca jalamāno aggi upādānapaccaye satiyeva jalati, tasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2521_4: asati paccayavekallena tattheva vūpasammati, na sakalikādīni saṅkamitvā sakalikaggītiādisaṅkhyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2521_5: gacchati, evameva cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ tasmiṃ dvāre cakkhurūpaālokamanasikārasaṅkhāte
atk-s0201a:2521_6: paccayamhi satiyeva uppajjati, tasmiṃ asati paccayavekallena tattheva nirujjhati,
atk-s0201a:2521_7: na sotādīni saṅkamitvā sotaviññāṇantiādisaṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Esa nayo sabbavāresu.
atk-s0201a:2521_8: Iti bhagavā nāhaṃ viññāṇappavatte dvārasaṅkantimattampi vadāmi, ayaṃ pana sāti moghapuriso
atk-s0201a:2522_0: 401. Evaṃ viññāṇassa sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni pana pañcannampi khandhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2522_1: sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassento, bhūtamidantiādimāha. Tattha bhūtamidanti idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2522_2: jātaṃ bhūtaṃ nibbattaṃ, tumhepi taṃ bhūtamidanti, bhikkhave, passathāti. Tadāhārasambhavanti
atk-s0201a:2522_3: taṃ panetaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ āhārasambhavaṃ paccayasambhavaṃ, sati paccaye uppajjati
atk-s0201a:2522_4: evaṃ passathāti pucchati. Tadāhāranirodhāti tassa paccayassa nirodhā. Bhūtamidaṃ
atk-s0201a:2522_5: nossūti bhūtaṃ nu kho idaṃ, na nu kho bhūtanti. Tadāhārasambhavaṃ nossūti taṃ bhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a:2522_6: khandhapañcakaṃ paccayasambhavaṃ nu kho, na nu khoti. Tadāhāranirodhāti tassa paccayassa
atk-s0201a:2522_7: nirodhā. Nirodhadhammaṃ nossūti taṃ dhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ nu kho, na nu khoti. Sammappaññāya
atk-s0201a:2522_8: passatoti idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ nibbattanti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato vipassanāpaññāya
atk-s0201a:2522_9: sammā passantassa. Paññāya sudiṭṭhanti vuttanayeneva vipassanāpaññāya suṭṭhu diṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2522_10: Evaṃ ye ye taṃ pucchaṃ sallakkhesuṃ, tesaṃ tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gaṇhanto pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2523_0: Idāni yāya paññāya tehi taṃ sappaccayaṃ sanirodhaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ, tattha
atk-s0201a:2523_1: nittaṇhabhāvaṃ pucchanto imaṃ ce tumhetiādimāha. Tattha diṭṭhinti vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2523_2: Sabhāvadassanena parisuddhaṃ. Paccayadassanena pariyodātaṃ. Allīyethāti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi
atk-s0201a:2523_3: allīyitvā vihareyyātha. Kelāyethāti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi kīḷamānā vihareyyātha. Dhanāyethāti
atk-s0201a:2523_4: dhanaṃ viya icchantā gedhaṃ āpajjeyyātha. Mamāyethāti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi mamattaṃ uppādeyyātha.
atk-s0201a:2523_5: Nittharaṇatthāya no gahaṇatthāyāti yo so mayā caturoghanittharaṇatthāya kullūpamo
atk-s0201a:2523_6: dhammo desito, no nikantivasena gahaṇatthāya. Api nu taṃ tumhe ājāneyyāthāti. Vipariyāyena
atk-s0201a:2524_0: 402. Idāni tesaṃ khandhānaṃ paccayaṃ dassento, cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārātiādimāha,
atk-s0201a:2524_1: tampi vuttatthameva. Yathā pana eko imaṃ jānāsīti vutto, “na kevalaṃ imaṃ, mātarampissa
atk-s0201a:2524_2: jānāmi, mātu mātarampī”ti evaṃ paveṇivasena jānanto suṭṭhu jānāti nāma. Evamevaṃ
atk-s0201a:2524_3: bhagavā na kevalaṃ khandhamattameva jānāti, khandhānaṃ paccayampi tesampi paccayānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2524_4: paccayanti evaṃ sabbapaccayaparamparaṃ jānāti. So taṃ, buddhabalaṃ dīpento idāni
atk-s0201a:2524_5: paccayaparamparaṃ dassetuṃ, ime ca, bhikkhave, cattāro āhārātiādimāha. Taṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0201a:2524_6: Iti kho, bhikkhave, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā…pe… dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti
atk-s0201a:2524_7: ettha pana paṭiccasamuppādakathā vitthāretabbā bhaveyya, sā visuddhimagge vitthāritāva.
atk-s0201a:2525_0: 404. Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye sati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2525_1: phalaṃ hoti. Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa uppādā
atk-s0201a:2525_2: idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ uppajjati, tenevāha – “yadidaṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā…pe…
atk-s0201a:2525_3: samudayo hotī”ti. Evaṃ vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassento, avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2525_4: Tattha avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya eva tu. Asesavirāganirodhāti virāgasaṅkhātena maggena
atk-s0201a:2525_5: asesanirodhā anuppādanirodhā. Saṅkhāranirodhoti saṅkhārānaṃ anuppādanirodho hoti,
atk-s0201a:2525_6: evaṃ niruddhānaṃ pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā viññāṇanirodho hoti, viññāṇādīnañca nirodhā
atk-s0201a:2525_7: nāmarūpādīni niruddhāniyeva hontīti dassetuṃ saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodhotiādiṃ
atk-s0201a:2525_8: vatvā evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti vuttaṃ. Tattha kevalassāti
atk-s0201a:2525_9: sakalassa, suddhassa vā, sattavirahitassāti attho. Dukkhakkhandhassāti dukkharāsissa.
atk-s0201a:2527_0: 407. Evaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni imaṃ dvādasaṅgapaccayavaṭṭaṃ saha vipassanāya
atk-s0201a:2527_1: maggena jānantassa yā paṭidhāvanā pahīyati, tassā abhāvaṃ pucchanto api nu tumhe,
atk-s0201a:2527_2: bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha evaṃ jānantāti evaṃ sahavipassanāya maggena jānantā. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2527_3: passantāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Pubbantanti purimakoṭṭhāsaṃ, atītakhandhadhātuāyatanānīti
atk-s0201a:2527_4: attho. Paṭidhāveyyāthāti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena paṭidhāveyyātha. Sesaṃ sabbāsavasutte vitthāritameva.
atk-s0201a:2528_0: Idāni nesaṃ tattha niccalabhāvaṃ pucchanto, api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṃ jānantā
atk-s0201a:2528_1: evaṃ passantā evaṃ vadeyyātha, satthā no garūtiādimāha. Tattha garūti bhāriko akāmā
atk-s0201a:2528_2: anuvattitabbo. Samaṇoti buddhasamaṇo. Aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyyāthāti ayaṃ satthā
atk-s0201a:2528_3: amhākaṃ kiccaṃ sādhetuṃ na sakkotīti api nu evaṃsaññino hutvā aññaṃ bāhirakaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2528_4: uddiseyyātha. Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānanti evaṃsaññino hutvā puthūnaṃ titthiyasamaṇānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2528_5: ceva brāhmaṇānañca. Vatakotūhalamaṅgalānīti vatasamādānāni ca diṭṭhikutūhalāni ca
atk-s0201a:2528_6: diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalāni ca. Tāni sārato paccāgaccheyyāthāti etāni sāranti evaṃsaññino
atk-s0201a:2528_7: hutvā paṭiāgaccheyyātha. Evaṃ nissaṭṭhāni ca puna gaṇheyyāthāti attho. Sāmaṃ ñātanti
atk-s0201a:2528_8: sayaṃ ñāṇena ñātaṃ. Sāmaṃ diṭṭhanti sayaṃ paññācakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ. Sāmaṃ viditanti
atk-s0201a:2528_9: sayaṃ vibhāvitaṃ pākaṭaṃ kataṃ. Upanītā kho me tumheti mayā, bhikkhave, tumhe iminā
atk-s0201a:2528_10: sandiṭṭhikādisabhāvena dhammena nibbānaṃ upanītā, pāpitāti attho. Sandiṭṭhikotiādīnamattho
atk-s0201a:2528_11: visuddhimagge vitthārito. Idametaṃ paṭicca vuttanti etaṃ vacanamidaṃ tumhehi sāmaṃ
atk-s0201a:2529_0: 408. Tiṇṇaṃ kho pana, bhikkhaveti kasmā ārabhi? Nanu heṭṭhā vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanā
atk-s0201a:2529_1: matthakaṃ pāpitāti? Āma pāpitā. Ayaṃ pana pāṭiekko anusandhi, “ayañhi lokasannivāso
atk-s0201a:2529_2: paṭisandhisammūḷho, tassa sammohaṭṭhānaṃ viddhaṃsetvā pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti imaṃ desanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2529_3: ārabhi. Apica vaṭṭamūlaṃ avijjā, vivaṭṭamūlaṃ buddhuppādo, iti vaṭṭamūlaṃ avijjaṃ
atk-s0201a:2529_4: vivaṭṭamūlañca buddhuppādaṃ dassetvāpi, “puna ekavāraṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2529_5: matthakaṃ pāpessāmī”ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha sannipātāti samodhānena piṇḍabhāvena.
atk-s0201a:2529_6: Gabbhassāti gabbhe nibbattanakasattassa. Avakkanti hotīti nibbatti hoti. Katthaci
atk-s0201a:2531: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:2532_0: Katthaci gabbhe nibbattanasatto. Yathāha – “yathā kho, panānanda, aññā itthikā nava
atk-s0201a:2532_1: vā dasa vā māse gabbhaṃ kucchinā pariharitvā vijāyantī”ti. Idha satto adhippeto,
atk-s0201a:2533_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ sattaloke. Mātā ca utunī hotīti idaṃ utusamayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Mātugāmassa
atk-s0201a:2533_1: kira yasmiṃ okāse dārako nibbattati, tattha mahatī lohitapīḷakā saṇṭhahitvā bhijjitvā
atk-s0201a:2533_2: paggharati, vatthu suddhaṃ hoti, suddhe vatthumhi mātāpitūsu ekavāraṃ sannipatitesu
atk-s0201a:2533_3: yāva satta divasāni khettameva hoti. Tasmiṃ samaye hatthaggāhaveṇiggāhādinā aṅgaparāmasanenapi
atk-s0201a:2533_4: dārako nibbattatiyeva. Gandhabboti tatrūpagasatto. Paccupaṭṭhito hotīti na mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2533_5: sannipātaṃ olokayamāno samīpe ṭhito paccupaṭṭhito nāma hoti. Kammayantayantito pana
atk-s0201a:2533_6: eko satto tasmiṃ okāse nibbattanako hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo. Saṃsayenāti “arogo
atk-s0201a:2533_7: nu kho bhavissāmi ahaṃ vā, putto vā me”ti evaṃ mahantena jīvitasaṃsayena. Lohitañhetaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2533_8: bhikkhaveti tadā kira mātulohitaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ sampattaṃ puttasinehena paṇḍaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2533_9: Tasmā evamāha. Vaṅkakanti gāmadārakānaṃ kīḷanakaṃ khuddakanaṅgalaṃ. Ghaṭikā vuccati
atk-s0201a:2533_10: dīghadaṇḍena rassadaṇḍakaṃ paharaṇakīḷā. Mokkhacikanti samparivattakakīḷā, ākāse
atk-s0201a:2533_11: vā daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhupariyabhāvena parivattanakīḷananti
atk-s0201a:2533_12: vuttaṃ hoti. Ciṅgulakaṃ vuccati tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2533_13: Pattāḷhakaṃ vuccati paṇṇanāḷikā, tāya vālikādīni minantā kīḷanti. Rathakanti khuddakarathaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2534_0: 409. Sārajjatīti rāgaṃ uppādeti. Byāpajjatīti byāpādaṃ uppādeti. Anupaṭṭhitakāyasatīti
atk-s0201a:2534_1: kāye sati kāyasati, taṃ anupaṭṭhapetvāti attho. Parittacetasoti akusalacitto. Yatthassa
atk-s0201a:2534_2: te pāpakāti yassaṃ phalasamāpattiyaṃ ete nirujjhanti, taṃ na jānāti nādhigacchatīti
atk-s0201a:2534_3: attho. Anurodhavirodhanti rāgañceva dosañca. Abhinandatīti taṇhāvasena abhinandati,
atk-s0201a:2534_4: taṇhāvaseneva aho sukhantiādīni vadanto abhivadati. Ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatīti taṇhāajjhosānagahaṇena
atk-s0201a:2534_5: gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gaṇhāti. Sukhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā abhinandatu, dukkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2534_6: kathaṃ abhinandatīti? “Ahaṃ dukkhito mama dukkha”nti gaṇhanto abhinandati nāma. Uppajjati
atk-s0201a:2534_7: nandīti taṇhā uppajjati. Tadupādānanti sāva taṇhā gahaṇaṭṭhena upādānaṃ nāma. Tassa
atk-s0201a:2534_8: upādānapaccayā bhavo…pe… samudayo hotīti, idañhi bhagavatā puna ekavāraṃ dvisandhi
atk-s0201a:2535_0: 410-4. Idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato loke uppajjatītiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2535_1: Tattha appamāṇacetasoti appamāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ ceto assāti appamāṇacetaso, maggacittasamaṅgīti
atk-s0201a:2535_2: attho. Imaṃ kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ dhārethāti,
atk-s0201a:2535_3: bhikkhave, imaṃ saṃkhittena desitaṃ mayhaṃ, taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttidesanaṃ tumhe niccakālaṃ
atk-s0201a:2535_4: dhāreyyātha mā pamajjeyyātha. Desanā hi ettha vimuttipaṭilābhahetuto vimuttīti vuttā.
atk-s0201a:2535_6: saṅghāṭanti vuccati; iti imasmiṃ mahātaṇhājāle taṇhāsaṅghāṭe ca imaṃ sātiṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0201a:2535_7: kevaṭṭaputtaṃ paṭimukkaṃ dhāretha. Anupaviṭṭho antogadhoti naṃ dhārethāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2539_0: 415. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāassapurasuttaṃ. Tattha aṅgesūti aṅgā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0201a:2539_1: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena “aṅgā”ti vuccati, tasmiṃ aṅgesu janapade.
atk-s0201a:2539_2: Assapuraṃ nāma aṅgānaṃ nigamoti assapuranti nagaranāmena laddhavohāro aṅgānaṃ janapadassa
atk-s0201a:2539_3: eko nigamo, taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā viharatīti attho. Bhagavā etadavocāti etaṃ “samaṇā
atk-s0201a:2540_0: Kasmā pana evaṃ avocāti. Tasmiṃ kira nigame manussā saddhā pasannā buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā
atk-s0201a:2540_2: pubbaṇhasamayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ disvā bījanaṅgalādīni gahetvā khettaṃ
atk-s0201a:2540_3: gacchantāpi, pharasuādīni gahetvā araññaṃ pavisantāpi tāni upakaraṇāni nikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:2540_4: bhikkhusaṅghassa nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ āsanasālaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā sammajjitvā
atk-s0201a:2540_5: āsanāni paññapetvā arajapānīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakādīni
atk-s0201a:2540_6: datvā katabhattakiccaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ uyyojetvā tato tāni upakaraṇāni ādāya khettaṃ
atk-s0201a:2540_7: vā araññaṃ vā gantvā attano kammāni karonti, kammantaṭṭhānepi nesaṃ aññā kathā nāma
atk-s0201a:2540_8: natthi. Cattāro maggaṭṭhā cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭha puggalā ariyasaṅgho nāma; te
atk-s0201a:2540_9: “evarūpena sīlena, evarūpena ācārena, evarūpāya paṭipattiyā samannāgatā lajjino pesalā
atk-s0201a:2540_10: uḷāraguṇā”ti bhikkhusaṅghasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathenti. Kammantaṭṭhānato āgantvā bhuttasāyamāsā
atk-s0201a:2540_11: gharadvāre nisinnāpi, sayanigharaṃ pavisitvā nisinnāpi bhikkhusaṅghasseva vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2540_12: kathenti. Bhagavā tesaṃ manussānaṃ nipaccakāraṃ disvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyane
atk-s0201a:2541_0: Ye dhammā samaṇakaraṇā ca brāhmaṇakaraṇā cāti ye dhammā samādāya paripūritā samitapāpasamaṇañca
atk-s0201a:2541_1: bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇañca karontīti attho. “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, samaṇassa samaṇiyāni
atk-s0201a:2541_3: adhipaññāsikkhāsamādāna”nti ettha pana samaṇena kattabbadhammā vuttā. Tepi ca samaṇakaraṇā
atk-s0201a:2541_4: hontiyeva. Idha pana hirottappādivasena desanā vitthāritā. Evaṃ no ayaṃ amhākanti
atk-s0201a:2541_5: ettha noti nipātamattaṃ. Evaṃ ayaṃ amhākanti attho. Mahapphalā mahānisaṃsāti ubhayampi
atk-s0201a:2541_6: atthato ekameva. Avañjhāti amoghā. Saphalāti ayaṃ tasseva attho. Yassā hi phalaṃ
atk-s0201a:2541_7: natthi, sā vañjhā nāma hoti. Saudrayāti savaḍḍhi, idaṃ saphalatāya vevacanaṃ. Evañhi
atk-s0201a:2541_8: vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabbanti, bhikkhave, evaṃ tumhehi sikkhitabbaṃ. Iti bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2541_9: iminā ettakena ṭhānena hirottappādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Kasmā? Vacanapathapacchindanatthaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2541_10: Sace hi koci acirapabbajito bālabhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya – “bhagavā hirottappādidhamme
atk-s0201a:2541_11: samādāya vattathāti vadati, ko nu kho tesaṃ samādāya vattane ānisaṃso”ti? Tassa vacanapathapacchindanatthaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2541_12: Ayañca ānisaṃso, ime hi dhammā samādāya paripūritā samitapāpasamaṇaṃ nāma bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2541_13: nāma karonti, catupaccayalābhaṃ uppādenti, paccayadāyakānaṃ mahapphalataṃ sampādenti,
atk-s0201a:2541_14: pabbajjaṃ avañjhaṃ saphalaṃ saudrayaṃ karontīti vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0201a:2541_15: Vitthārato pana vaṇṇakathā satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2542_0: 416. Hirottappenāti “yaṃ hirīyati hirīyitabbena, ottappati ottappitabbenā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2542_1: vitthāritāya hiriyā ceva ottappena ca. Apicettha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī, bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2542_2: ottappaṃ. Attādhipateyyā hirī, lokādhipateyyaṃ ottappaṃ. Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī,
atk-s0201a:2542_3: bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ, vitthārakathā panettha sabbākārena visuddhimagge
atk-s0201a:2542_4: vuttā. Apica ime dve dhammā lokaṃ pālanato lokapāladhammā nāmāti kathitā. Yathāha
atk-s0201a:2542_5: – “dveme, bhikkhave, sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti. Katame dve? Hirī ca ottappañca.
atk-s0201a:2542_6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti. Ime ca kho, bhikkhave, dve sukkā
atk-s0201a:2542_7: dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ, nayidha paññāyetha, ‘mātā’ti vā, ‘mātucchā’ti vā, ‘mātulānī’ti
atk-s0201a:2542_8: vā, ‘ācariyabhariyā’ti vā, ‘garūnaṃ dārā’ti vā, sambhedaṃ loko agamissa, yathā ajeḷakā
atk-s0201a:2542_9: kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā”ti. Imeyeva jātake “devadhammā”ti kathitā. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:2545_0: Mahācundattherassa pana kilesasallekhanapaṭipadāti katvā dassitā. Yathāha – “pare
atk-s0201a:2545_1: ahirikā bhavissanti, mayamettha hirimanā bhavissāmāti sallekho karaṇīyo. Pare anottāpī
atk-s0201a:2545_2: bhavissanti, mayamettha ottāpī bhavissāmāti sallekho karaṇīyo”ti. Imeva mahākassapattherassa
atk-s0201a:2545_3: ovādūpasampadāti katvā dassitā. Vuttañhetaṃ – “tasmā tiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2545_4: tibbaṃ me hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesūti. Evañhi
atk-s0201a:2545_5: te, kassapa, sikkhitabba”nti. Idha panete samaṇadhammā nāmāti dassitā.
atk-s0201a:2546_0: Yasmā pana ettāvatā sāmaññattho matthakaṃ patto nāma hoti, tasmā aparepi samaṇakaraṇadhamme
atk-s0201a:2546_1: dassetuṃ siyā kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhākantiādimāha. Tattha sāmaññatthoti saṃyuttake
atk-s0201a:2546_2: tāva, “katamañca, bhikkhave, sāmaññaṃ? Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Seyyathidaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2546_3: sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhi, idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sāmaññaṃ. Katamo ca, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:2546_4: sāmaññattho? Yo, bhikkhave, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:2546_6: pana ṭhāne maggampi phalampi ekato katvā sāmaññattho kathitoti veditabbo. Ārocayāmīti
atk-s0201a:2547_0: 417. Parisuddho no kāyasamācāroti ettha kāyasamācāro parisuddho aparisuddhoti duvidho.
atk-s0201a:2547_1: Yo hi bhikkhu pāṇaṃ hanati adinnaṃ ādiyati, kāmesu micchā carati, tassa kāyasamācāro
atk-s0201a:2547_2: aparisuddho nāma, ayaṃ pana kammapathavaseneva vārito. Yo pana pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā
atk-s0201a:2547_3: vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā paraṃ potheti viheṭheti, tassa kāyasamācāro aparisuddho
atk-s0201a:2547_4: nāma, ayampi sikkhāpadabaddheneva paṭikkhitto. Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā
atk-s0201a:2547_5: paramasallekho nāma kathito. Yo hi bhikkhu pānīyaghaṭe vā pānīyaṃ pivantānaṃ, patte
atk-s0201a:2547_6: vā bhattaṃ bhuñjantānaṃ kākānaṃ nivāraṇavasena hatthaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā leḍḍuṃ vā uggirati,
atk-s0201a:2547_7: tassa kāyasamācāro aparisuddho. Viparīto parisuddho nāma. Uttānoti uggato pākaṭo.
atk-s0201a:2547_8: Vivaṭoti anāvaṭo asañchanno. Ubhayenāpi parisuddhataṃyeva dīpeti. Na ca chiddavāti
atk-s0201a:2547_9: sadā ekasadiso antarantare chiddarahito. Saṃvutoti kilesānaṃ dvāra pidahanena pidahito,
atk-s0201a:2548_0: 418. Vacīsamācārepi yo bhikkhu musā vadati, pisuṇaṃ katheti, pharusaṃ bhāsati, samphaṃ
atk-s0201a:2548_1: palapati, tassa vacīsamācāro aparisuddho nāma. Ayaṃ pana kammapathavasena vārito.
atk-s0201a:2548_2: Yo pana gahapatikāti vā dāsāti vā pessāti vā ādīhi khuṃsento vadati, tassa vacīsamācāro
atk-s0201a:2548_3: aparisuddho nāma. Ayaṃ pana sikkhāpadabaddheneva paṭikkhitto. Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ
atk-s0201a:2548_4: akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito. Yo hi bhikkhu daharena vā sāmaṇerena vā, “kacci,
atk-s0201a:2548_5: bhante, amhākaṃ upajjhāyaṃ passathā”ti vutte, sambahulā, āvuso, bhikkhubhikkhuniyo
atk-s0201a:2548_6: ekasmiṃ padese vicadiṃsu, upajjhāyo te vikkāyikasākabhaṇḍikaṃ ukkhipitvā gato bhavissatī”tiādinā
atk-s0201a:2548_7: nayena hasādhippāyopi evarūpaṃ kathaṃ katheti, tassa vacīsamācāro aparisuddho. Viparīto parisuddho nāma.
atk-s0201a:2549_0: 419. Manosamācāre yo bhikkhu abhijjhālu byāpannacitto micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, tassa
atk-s0201a:2549_1: manosamācāro aparisuddho nāma. Ayaṃ pana kammapathavaseneva vārito. Yo pana upanikkhittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2549_2: jātarūparajataṃ sādiyati, tassa manosamācāro aparisuddho nāma. Ayampi sikkhāpadabaddheneva
atk-s0201a:2549_3: paṭikkhitto. Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito. Yo
atk-s0201a:2549_4: pana bhikkhu kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi, tassa
atk-s0201a:2550_0: 420. Ājīvasmiṃ yo bhikkhu ājīvahetu vejjakammaṃ pahiṇagamanaṃ gaṇḍaphālanaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:2550_1: arumakkhanaṃ deti, telaṃ pacatīti ekavīsatianesanāvasena jīvikaṃ kappeti. Yo vā pana
atk-s0201a:2550_2: viññāpetvā bhuñjati, tassa ājīvo aparisuddho nāma. Ayaṃ pana sikkhāpadabaddheneva
atk-s0201a:2550_3: paṭikkhitto. Imasmiṃ sutte ubhayampetaṃ akathetvā paramasallekho nāma kathito. Yo
atk-s0201a:2550_4: hi bhikkhu sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitādīni labhitvā, “sve vā punadivase vā bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0201a:2550_5: sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjati, yo vā pana nimbaṅkurādīni disvā sāmaṇere vadati – “aṃṅkure
atk-s0201a:2550_6: khādathā”ti, sāmaṇerā thero khāditukāmoti kappiyaṃ katvā denti, dahare pana sāmaṇere
atk-s0201a:2550_7: vā pānīyaṃ pivatha, āvusoti vadati, te thero pānīyaṃ pivitukāmoti pānīyasaṅkhaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0201a:2550_8: denti, tampi paribhuñjantassa ājīvo aparisuddho nāma hoti. Viparīto parisuddho nāma.
atk-s0201a:2552_0: 423. Jāgariyamanuyuttāti rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse niddāya
atk-s0201a:2552_1: okāsaṃ datvā pañca koṭṭhāse jāgariyamhi yuttā payuttā. Sīhaseyyanti ettha kāmabhogiseyyā,
atk-s0201a:2552_2: petaseyyā, sīhaseyyā, tathāgataseyyāti catasso seyyā. Tattha “yebhuyyena, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:2552_3: kāmabhogī sattā vāmena passena sentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogiseyyā, tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2553: “Yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, petā uttānā sentī”ti ayaṃ petaseyyā, petā hi appamaṃsalohitattā aṭṭhisaṅghātajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti, uttānāva senti.
atk-s0201a:2554_0: “Yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, sīho migarājā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi anupakkhipitvā dakkhiṇena
atk-s0201a:2554_1: passena setī”ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā. Tejussadattā hi sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2554_2: ṭhāne pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2554_3: ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ matthake sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā sayati. Divasampi
atk-s0201a:2554_4: sayitvā pabujjhamāno na utrāsanto pabujjhati. Sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2554_5: ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkheti. Sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti, “nayidaṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2554_6: jātiyā, na sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpa”nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati, na gocarāya
atk-s0201a:2554_7: pakkamati. Avijahitvā ṭhite pana “tuyhaṃ jātiyā sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho
atk-s0201a:2554_8: uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṃ vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ
atk-s0201a:2554_9: naditvā gocarāya pakkamati. Catutthajjhānaseyyā pana tathāgataseyyāti vuccati. Tāsu
atk-s0201a:2554_10: idha sīhaseyyā āgatā. Ayañhi tejussadairiyāpathattā uttamaseyyā nāma. Pāde pādanti
atk-s0201a:2554_11: dakkhiṇapāde vāmapādaṃ. Accādhāyāti atiādhāya īsakaṃ atikkamma ṭhapetvā, gopphakena
atk-s0201a:2554_12: hi gopphake, jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjati, cittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2554_13: ekaggaṃ na hoti, seyyā aphāsukā hoti. Yathā pana na saṅghaṭṭeti, evaṃ atikkamma ṭhapite
atk-s0201a:2554_14: vedanā nuppajjati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, seyyā phāsukā hoti, tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2556_0: 426. Yā panāyaṃ seyyathāpi, bhikkhaveti upamā vuttā. Tattha iṇaṃ ādāyāti vaḍḍhiyā
atk-s0201a:2556_1: dhanaṃ gahetvā. Byantī kareyyāti vigatantāni kareyya. Yathā tesaṃ kākaṇikamattopi
atk-s0201a:2556_2: pariyanto nāma nāvasissati, evaṃ kareyya, sabbaso paṭiniyyāteyyāti attho. Tatonidānanti
atk-s0201a:2556_3: āṇaṇyanidānaṃ. So hi aṇaṇomhīti āvajjanto balavapāmojjaṃ labhati, balavasomanassamadhigacchati.
atk-s0201a:2557_0: Visabhāgavedanuppattiyā kakaceneva catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto ābādhatīti ābādho, svāssa
atk-s0201a:2557_1: atthīti ābādhiko. Taṃsamuṭṭhānena dukkhena dukkhito. Adhimattagilānoti bāḷhagilāno.
atk-s0201a:2557_2: Nacchādeyyāti adhimattabyādhiparetatāya na rucceyya. Balamattāti balameva, balañcassa
atk-s0201a:2557_3: kāye na bhaveyyāti attho. Tatonidānanti ārogyanidānaṃ, tassa hi arogomhīti āvajjayato
atk-s0201a:2557_4: tadubhayaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “labhetha pāmojjaṃ, adhigaccheyya somanassa”nti. Na
atk-s0201a:2557_5: cassa kiñci bhogānaṃ vayoti kākaṇikamattampi bhogānaṃ vayo na bhaveyya. Tatonidānanti
atk-s0201a:2557_6: bandhanāmokkhanidānaṃ, sesaṃ vuttanayeneva sabbapadesu yojetabbaṃ. Anattādhīnoti
atk-s0201a:2557_7: na attani adhīno, attano ruciyā kiñci kātuṃ na labhati. Parādhīnoti paresu adhīno,
atk-s0201a:2557_8: parasseva ruciyā pavattati. Na yena kāmaṃ gamoti yena disābhāgenassa kāmo hoti. Icchā
atk-s0201a:2557_9: uppajjati gamanāya, tena gantuṃ na labhati. Dāsabyāti dāsabhāvā. Bhujissoti attano
atk-s0201a:2557_10: santako. Tatonidānanti bhujissanidānaṃ. Kantāraddhānamagganti kantāraṃ addhānamaggaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2558_0: Ime pañca nīvaraṇe appahīneti ettha bhagavā appahīnaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ iṇasadisaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2558_1: sesāni rogādisadisāni katvā dasseti. Tatrāyaṃ sadisatā – yo hi paresaṃ iṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a:2558_2: vināseti. So tehi iṇaṃ dehīti vuccamānopi pharusaṃ vuccamānopi bajjhamānopi pahariyamānopi
atk-s0201a:2558_3: kiñci paṭibāhituṃ na sakkoti, sabbaṃ titikkhati, titikkhakāraṇañhissa taṃ iṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2558_4: Evamevaṃ yo yamhi kāmacchandena rajjati, taṇhāgaṇena taṃ vatthuṃ gaṇhāti, so tena
atk-s0201a:2558_5: pharusaṃ vuccamānopi bajjhamānopi pahariyamānopi sabbaṃ titikkhati. Titikkhakāraṇañhissa
atk-s0201a:2558_6: so kāmacchando hoti gharasāmikehi vadhīyamānānaṃ itthīnaṃ viyāti. Evaṃ iṇaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:2559_0: Yathā pana pittarogāturo madhusakkarādīsupi dinnesu pittarogāturatāya tesaṃ rasaṃ
atk-s0201a:2559_1: na vindati, tittakaṃ tittakanti uggiratiyeva. Evamevaṃ byāpannacitto hitakāmehi ācariyupajjhāyehi
atk-s0201a:2559_2: appamattakampi ovadīyamāno ovādaṃ na gaṇhāti, “ati viya me tumhe upaddavethā”tiādīni
atk-s0201a:2559_3: vatvā vibbhamati. Pittarogāturatāya so puriso madhusakkarādirasaṃ viya, kodhāturatāya
atk-s0201a:2559_4: jhānasukhādibhedaṃ sāsanarasaṃ na vindatīti. Evaṃ rogo viya byāpādo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2560_0: Yathā pana nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāre baddho puriso nakkhattassa neva ādiṃ, na
atk-s0201a:2560_1: majjhaṃ, na pariyosānaṃ passati. So dutiyadivase mutto, “aho hiyyo nakkhattaṃ manāpaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2560_2: aho naccaṃ, aho gīta”ntiādīni sutvāpi paṭivacanaṃ na deti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Nakkhattassa
atk-s0201a:2560_3: ananubhūtattā. Evamevaṃ thinamiddhābhibhūto bhikkhu vicittanayepi dhammassavane pavattamāne
atk-s0201a:2560_4: neva tassa ādiṃ, na majjhaṃ, na pariyosānaṃ jānāti. So uṭṭhite dhammassavane, “aho
atk-s0201a:2560_5: dhammassavanaṃ, aho kāraṇaṃ, aho upamā”ti dhammassavanassa vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānānaṃ sutvāpi
atk-s0201a:2560_6: paṭivacanaṃ na deti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Thinamiddhavasena dhammakathāya ananubhūtattāti.
atk-s0201a:2561_0: Yathā pana nakkhattaṃ kīḷantopi dāso, “idaṃ nāma accāyikaṃ karaṇīyaṃ atthi, sīghaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2561_1: tattha gaccha, no ce gacchasi, hatthapādaṃ vā te chindāmi kaṇṇanāsaṃ vā”ti vutto
atk-s0201a:2561_2: sīghaṃ gacchatiyeva, nakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavituṃ na labhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2561_3: Parādhīnatāya. Evamevaṃ vinaye appakataññunā vivekatthāya araññaṃ paviṭṭhenāpi kismiñcideva
atk-s0201a:2561_4: antamaso kappiyamaṃsepi akappiyamaṃsasaññāya uppannāya vivekaṃ pahāya sīlavisodhanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2561_5: vinayadharassa santike gantabbaṃ hoti. Vivekasukhaṃ anubhavituṃ na labhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2561_6: Uddhaccakukkuccābhibhūtatāyāti, evaṃ dāsabyaṃ viya uddhaccakukkuccaṃ daṭṭabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2562_0: Yathā pana kantāraddhānamaggapaṭipanno puriso corehi manussānaṃ viluttokāsaṃ pahatokāsañca
atk-s0201a:2562_1: disvā daṇḍakasaddenapi sakuṇasaddenapi corā āgatāti ussaṅkitaparisaṅkito hoti, gacchatipi,
atk-s0201a:2562_2: tiṭṭhatipi, nivattatipi, gataṭṭhānato āgataṭṭhānameva bahutaraṃ hoti. So kicchena
atk-s0201a:2562_3: kasirena khemantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti vā, na vā pāpuṇāti. Evamevaṃ yassa aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu
atk-s0201a:2562_4: vicikicchā uppannā hoti. So “buddho nu kho, na nu kho buddho”tiādinā nayena vicikicchanto
atk-s0201a:2562_5: adhimuccitvā saddhāya gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti. Asakkonto maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā na pāpuṇātīti
atk-s0201a:2562_6: yathā kantāraddhānamagge “corā atthi natthī”ti punappunaṃ āsappanaparisappanaṃ apariyogāhanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2562_7: chambhitatta cittassa uppādento khemantapattiyā antarāyaṃ karoti, evaṃ vicikicchāpi
atk-s0201a:2562_8: “buddho nu kho na buddho”tiādinā nayena punappunaṃ āsappanaparisappanaṃ apariyogāhanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2562_9: chambhitattaṃ cittassa uppādayamānā ariyabhūmippattiyā antarāyaṃ karotīti kantāraddhānamaggo viya daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0201a:2563_0: Idāni seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āṇaṇyanti ettha bhagavā pahīnakāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ āṇaṇyasadisaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2563_1: sesāni ārogyādisadisāni katvā dasseti. Tatrāyaṃ sadisatā – yathā hi puriso iṇaṃ ādāya
atk-s0201a:2563_2: kammante payojetvā samiddhakammanto, “idaṃ iṇaṃ nāma palibodhamūla”nti cintetvā savaḍḍhikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2563_3: iṇaṃ niyyātetvā paṇṇaṃ phālāpeyya. Athassa tato paṭṭhāya neva koci dūtaṃ peseti,
atk-s0201a:2563_4: na paṇṇaṃ, so iṇasāmike disvāpi sace icchati, āsanā uṭṭhahati, no ce, na uṭṭhahati.
atk-s0201a:2563_5: Kasmā? Tehi saddhiṃ nillepatāya alaggatāya. Evameva bhikkhu, “ayaṃ kāmacchando nāma
atk-s0201a:2563_6: palibodhamūla”nti satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva cha dhamme bhāvetvā kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2563_7: pajahati. Tassevaṃ pahīnakāmacchandassa yathā iṇamuttassa purisassa iṇasāmike disvā
atk-s0201a:2563_8: neva bhayaṃ na chambhitattaṃ hoti. Evameva paravatthumhi neva saṅgo na bandho hoti.
atk-s0201a:2563_9: Dibbānipi rūpāni passato kileso na samudācarati. Tasmā bhagavā āṇaṇyamiva kāmacchandappahānamāha.
atk-s0201a:2564_0: Yathā pana so pittarogāturo puriso bhesajjakiriyāya taṃ rogaṃ vūpasametvā tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:2564_1: madhusakkarādīnaṃ rasaṃ vindati. Evamevaṃ bhikkhu, “ayaṃ byāpādo nāma anatthakārako”ti
atk-s0201a:2564_2: cha dhamme bhāvetvā byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati. So evaṃ pahīnabyāpādo yathā pittarogavimutto
atk-s0201a:2564_3: puriso madhusakkarādīni madhurāni sampiyāyamāno paṭisevati. Evamevaṃ ācārapaṇṇattiādīni
atk-s0201a:2564_4: sikkhāpiyamāno sirasā sampaṭicchitvā sampiyāyamāno sikkhati. Tasmā bhagavā ārogyamiva byāpādappahānamāha.
atk-s0201a:2565_0: Yathā so nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāraṃ pavesito puriso aparasmiṃ nakkhattadivase,
atk-s0201a:2565_1: “pubbepi ahaṃ pamādadosena baddho taṃ nakkhattaṃ nānubhavāmi, idāni appamatto bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2565_2: yathāssa paccatthikā okāsaṃ na labhanti. Evaṃ appamatto hutvā nakkhattaṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0201a:2565_3: – “aho nakkhattaṃ aho nakkhatta”nti udānaṃ udānesi. Evameva bhikkhu, “idaṃ thinamiddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2565_4: nāma mahāanatthakara”nti cha dhamme bhāvetvā thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati. So evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2565_5: pahīnathinamiddho yathā bandhanā mutto puriso sattāhampi nakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2565_6: anubhavati. Evamevaṃ bhikkhu dhammanakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavanto
atk-s0201a:2565_7: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tasmā bhagavā bandhanā mokkhamiva thinamiddhappahānamāha.
atk-s0201a:2566_0: Yathā pana dāso kañcideva mittaṃ upanissāya sāmikānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā attānaṃ bhujissaṃ
atk-s0201a:2566_1: katvā tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ icchati, taṃ kareyya. Evameva bhikkhu, “idaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ
atk-s0201a:2566_2: nāma mahāanatthakara”nti cha dhamme bhāvetvā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pajahati. So evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2566_3: pahīnuddhaccakukkucco yathā bhujisso puriso yaṃ icchati, taṃ karoti. Na taṃ koci
atk-s0201a:2566_4: balakkārena tato nivatteti. Evamevaṃ bhikkhu yathāsukhaṃ nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0201a:2566_5: na naṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ balakkārena tato nivatteti. Tasmā bhagavā bhujissaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:2567_0: Yathā balavā puriso hatthasāraṃ gahetvā sajjāvudho saparivāro kantāraṃ paṭipajjeyya.
atk-s0201a:2567_1: Taṃ corā dūratova disvā palāyeyyuṃ. So sotthinā taṃ kantāraṃ nittharitvā khemantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2567_2: patto haṭṭhatuṭṭho assa. Evamevaṃ bhikkhu, “ayaṃ vicikicchā nāma anatthakārikā”ti
atk-s0201a:2567_3: cha dhamme bhāvetvā vicikicchaṃ pajahati. So evaṃ pahīnavicikiccho yathā balavā sajjāvudho
atk-s0201a:2567_4: saparivāro puriso nibbhayo core tiṇaṃ viya agaṇetvā sotthinā nikkhamitvā khemantabhūmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2567_5: pāpuṇāti. Evamevaṃ duccaritakantāraṃ nittharitvā paramakhemantabhūmiṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2567_6: pāpuṇāti. Tasmā bhagavā khemantabhūmiṃ viya vicikicchāpahānamāha.
atk-s0201a:2568_0: 427. Imameva kāyanti imaṃ karajakāyaṃ. Abhisandetīti temeti sneheti, sabbattha pavattapītisukhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2568_1: karoti. Parisandetīti samantato sandeti. Paripūretīti vāyunā bhastaṃ viya pūreti.
atk-s0201a:2568_2: Parippharatīti samantato phusati. Sabbāvato kāyassāti assa bhikkhuno sabbakoṭṭhāsavato
atk-s0201a:2568_4: ṭhānaṃ paṭhamajjhānasukhena aphuṭṭhaṃ nāma na hoti. Dakkhoti cheko paṭibalo nhānīyacuṇṇāni
atk-s0201a:2568_5: kātuñceva yojetuñca sannetuñca. Kaṃsathāleti yena kenaci lohena katabhājane. Mattikabhājanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2568_6: pana thiraṃ na hoti, sannentassa bhijjati, tasmā taṃ na dasseti. Paripphosakaṃ paripphosakanti
atk-s0201a:2568_7: siñcitvā siñcitvā. Sanneyyāti vāmahatthena kaṃsathālaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena
atk-s0201a:2568_8: pamāṇayuttaṃ udakaṃ siñcitvā siñcitvā parimaddanto piṇḍaṃ kareyya. Snehānugatāti
atk-s0201a:2568_9: udakasinehena anugatā. Snehaparetāti udakasinehena parigatā. Santarabāhirāti saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2568_10: antopadesena ceva bahipadesena ca, sabbatthakameva udakasinehena phuṭāti attho. Na
atk-s0201a:2568_11: ca pagghariṇīti na bindu bindu udakaṃ paggharati, sakkā hoti hatthenapi dvīhipi tīhipi
atk-s0201a:2569_0: 428. Dutiyajjhānasukhaupamāyaṃ ubbhitodakoti ubbhinnaudako, na heṭṭhā ubbhijjitvā
atk-s0201a:2569_1: uggacchanaudako, antoyeva pana ubbhijjanaudakoti attho. Āyamukhanti āgamanamaggo.
atk-s0201a:2569_2: Devoti megho. Kālenakālanti kāle kāle, anvaddhamāsaṃ vā anudasāhaṃ vāti attho. Dhāranti
atk-s0201a:2569_3: vuṭṭhiṃ. Nānuppaveccheyyāti na paveseyya, na vasseyyāti attho. Sītā vāridhārā ubbhijjitvāti
atk-s0201a:2569_4: sītaṃ vāri taṃ udakarahadaṃ pūrayamānaṃ ubbhijjitvā. Heṭṭhā uggacchanaudakañhi uggantvā
atk-s0201a:2569_5: uggantvā bhijjantaṃ udakaṃ khobheti. Catūhi disāhi pavisanaudakaṃ purāṇapaṇṇatiṇakaṭṭhadaṇḍakādīhi
atk-s0201a:2569_6: udakaṃ khobheti. Vuṭṭhiudakaṃ dhārānipātapupphuḷakehi udakaṃ khobheti. Sannisinnameva
atk-s0201a:2569_7: pana hutvā iddhinimmitamiva uppajjamānaṃ udakaṃ imaṃ padesaṃ pharati, imaṃ padesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2569_8: na pharatīti natthi. Tena aphuṭokāso nāma na hotīti. Tattha rahado viya karajakāyo,
atk-s0201a:2569_9: udakaṃ viya dutiyajjhānasukhaṃ. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2570_0: 429. Tatiyajjhānasukhaupamāyaṃ uppalāni ettha santīti uppalinī. Sesapadadvayesupi
atk-s0201a:2570_1: eseva nayo. Ettha ca setarattanīlesu yaṃkiñci uppalaṃ uppalameva, ūnakasatapattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2570_2: puṇḍarīkaṃ, satapattaṃ padumaṃ. Pattaniyamaṃ vā vināpi setaṃ padumaṃ, rattaṃ puṇḍarīkanti
atk-s0201a:2570_3: ayamettha vinicchayo. Udakānuggatānīti udakato na uggatāni. Antonimuggaposīnīti udakatalassa
atk-s0201a:2570_4: anto nimuggāniyeva hutvā posīni, vaḍḍhīnīti attho. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2571_0: 430. Catutthajjhānasukhaupamāyaṃ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātenāti ettha nirupakkilesaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:2571_1: parisuddhaṃ. Pabhassaraṭṭhena pariyodātaṃ veditabbaṃ. Odātena vatthenāti idaṃ utupharaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2571_2: vuttaṃ. Kiliṭṭhavatthena hi utupharaṇaṃ na hoti, taṅkhaṇadhotaparisuddhena utupharaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2571_3: balavaṃ hoti. Imissā hi upamāya vatthaṃ viya karajakāyo. Utupharaṇaṃ viya catutthajjhānasukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2571_4: Tasmā yathā sunhātassa purisassa parisuddhaṃ vatthaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nisinnassa
atk-s0201a:2571_5: sarīrato utu sabbameva vatthaṃ pharati, na koci vatthassa aphuṭokāso hoti. Evaṃ catutthajjhānasukhena
atk-s0201a:2571_6: bhikkhuno karajakāyassa na koci okāso aphuṭo hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Catutthajjhānacittameva
atk-s0201a:2571_7: vā vatthaṃ viya, taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ utupharaṇaṃ viya. Yathā hi katthaci odātavatthe
atk-s0201a:2571_8: kāyaṃ apphusantepi taṃsamuṭṭhānena utunā sabbatthakameva kāyo phuṭṭho hoti. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2571_9: catutthajjhānasamuṭṭhitena sukhumarūpena sabbatthakameva bhikkhuno karajakāyo phuṭo
atk-s0201a:2572_0: 431. Pubbenivāsañāṇaupamāyaṃ taṃdivasaṃ katakiriyā pākaṭā hotīti taṃdivasaṃ gatagāmattayameva
atk-s0201a:2572_1: gahitaṃ. Tattha gāmattayaṃ gatapuriso viya pubbenivāsañāṇalābhī daṭṭhabbo. Tayo gāmā
atk-s0201a:2572_2: viya tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā. Tassa purisassa tīsu gāmesu taṃdivasaṃ katakiriyāya āvibhāvo
atk-s0201a:2572_3: viya pubbenivāsāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno tīsu bhavesu katakiriyāya āvibhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2573_0: 432. Dibbacakkhuupamāyaṃ dve agārāti dve gharā. Sadvārāti sammukhadvārā. Anucaṅkamanteti
atk-s0201a:2573_1: aparāparaṃ sañcarante. Anuvicaranteti ito cito ca vicarante, ito pana gehā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0201a:2573_2: etaṃ gehaṃ, etasmā vā nikkhamitvā imaṃ gehaṃ pavisanavasenapi daṭṭhabbā. Tattha dve
atk-s0201a:2573_3: agārā sadvārā viya cutipaṭisandhiyo, cakkhumā puriso viya dibbacakkhuñāṇalābhī, cakkhumato
atk-s0201a:2573_4: purisassa dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare ṭhatvā passato dve agāre pavisanakanikkhamanakapurisānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2573_5: pākaṭakālo viya dibbacakkhulābhino ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā olokentassa cavanakaupapajjanakasattānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2573_6: pākaṭakālo. Kiṃ pana te ñāṇassa pākaṭā, puggalassāti? Ñāṇassa. Tassa pākaṭattā pana
atk-s0201a:2574_1: Sippiyo ca sambukā ca sippisambukaṃ. Sakkharā ca kathalā ca sakkharakathalaṃ. Macchānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2574_2: gumbā ghaṭāti macchagumbaṃ. Tiṭṭhantampi carantampīti ettha sakkharakathalaṃ tiṭṭhatiyeva,
atk-s0201a:2574_3: itarāni carantipi tiṭṭhantipi. Yathā pana antarantarā ṭhitāsupi nisinnāsupi vijjamānāsupi,
atk-s0201a:2574_4: “etā gāvo carantī”ti carantiyo upādāya itarāpi carantīti vuccanti. Evaṃ tiṭṭhantameva
atk-s0201a:2574_5: sakkharakathalaṃ upādāya itarampi dvayaṃ tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ. Itarañca dvayaṃ carantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2574_6: upādāya sakkharakathalampi carantanti vuttaṃ. Tattha cakkhumato purisassa tīre ṭhatvā
atk-s0201a:2574_7: passato sippisambukādīnaṃ vibhūtakālo viya āsavānaṃ khayāya cittaṃ nīharitvā nisinnassa
atk-s0201a:2575_0: 434. Idāni sattahākārehi saliṅgato saguṇato khīṇāsavassa nāmaṃ gaṇhanto, ayaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2575_1: bhikkhave, bhikkhu samaṇo itipītiādimāha. Tattha evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samaṇo
atk-s0201a:2575_2: hotītiādīsu, bhikkhave, evaṃ bhikkhu samitapāpattā samaṇo hoti. Bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0201a:2575_3: hoti. Nhātakilesattā nhātako hoti, dhotakilesattāti attho. Catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātehi
atk-s0201a:2575_4: vedehi akusaladhammānaṃ gatattā vedagū hoti, viditattāti attho. Teneva viditāssa
atk-s0201a:2575_5: hontītiādimāha. Kilesānaṃ sutattā sottiyo hoti, nissutattā apahatattāti attho. Kilesānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2575_6: ārakattā ariyo hoti, hatattāti attho. Tehi ārakattā arahaṃ hoti, dūrībhūtattāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2579: 435. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷaassapurasuttaṃ. Tassa desanākāraṇaṃ purimasadisameva. Samaṇasāmīcippaṭipadāti samaṇānaṃ anucchavikā samaṇānaṃ anulomappaṭipadā.
atk-s0201a:2580_0: 436. Samaṇamalānantiādīsu ete dhammā uppajjamānā samaṇe maline karonti malaggahite,
atk-s0201a:2580_1: tasmā “samaṇamalā”ti vuccanti. Etehi samaṇā dussanti, padussanti, tasmā samaṇadosāti
atk-s0201a:2580_2: vuccanti. Ete uppajjitvā samaṇe kasaṭe niroje karonti milāpenti, tasmā samaṇakasaṭāti
atk-s0201a:2580_3: vuccanti. Āpāyikānaṃ ṭhānānanti apāye nibbattāpakānaṃ kāraṇānaṃ. Duggativedaniyānanti
atk-s0201a:2580_4: duggatiyaṃ vipākavedanāya paccayānaṃ. Matajaṃ nāmāti manussā tikhiṇaṃ ayaṃ ayena
atk-s0201a:2580_5: sughaṃsitvā taṃ ayacuṇṇaṃ maṃsena saddhiṃ madditvā koñcasakuṇe khādāpenti. Te uccāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2580_6: kātuṃ asakkontā maranti. No ce maranti, paharitvā mārenti. Atha tesaṃ kucchiṃ phāletvā
atk-s0201a:2580_7: naṃ udakena dhovitvā cuṇṇaṃ gahetvā maṃsena saddhiṃ madditvā puna khādāpentīti evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2580_8: satta vāre khādāpetvā gahitena ayacuṇṇena āvudhaṃ karonti. Susikkhitā ca naṃ ayakārā
atk-s0201a:2580_9: bahuhatthakammamūlaṃ labhitvā karonti. Taṃ matasakuṇato jātattā “mataja”nti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2580_10: atitikhiṇaṃ hoti. Pītanisitanti udakapītañceva silāya ca sunighaṃsitaṃ. Saṅghāṭiyāti
atk-s0201a:2580_11: kosiyā. Sampārutanti pariyonaddhaṃ. Sampaliveṭhitanti samantato veṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2581_0: 437. Rajojallikassāti rajojalladhārino. Udakorohakassāti divasassa tikkhattuṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2581_2: Ubbhaṭṭhakassāti uddhaṃ ṭhitakassa. Pariyāyabhattikassāti māsavārena vā aḍḍhamāsavārena
atk-s0201a:2581_3: vā bhuñjantassa. Sabbametaṃ bāhirasamayeneva kathitaṃ. Imasmiñhi sāsane cīvaradharo
atk-s0201a:2581_4: bhikkhu saṅghāṭikoti na vuccati. Rajojalladhāraṇādivatāni imasmiṃ sāsane natthiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2581_5: Buddhavacanassa buddhavacanameva nāmaṃ, na mantāti. Rukkhamūliko, abbhokāsikoti ettakaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2581_6: pana labbhati. Tampi bāhirasamayeneva kathitaṃ. Jātameva nanti taṃdivase jātamattaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2581_7: naṃ. Saṅghāṭikaṃ kareyyunti saṅghāṭikaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca saṅghāṭikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2582_0: 438. Visuddhamattānaṃ samanupassatīti attānaṃ visujjhantaṃ passati. Visuddhoti pana
atk-s0201a:2582_1: na tāva vattabbo. Pāmojjaṃ jāyatīti tuṭṭhākāro jāyati. Pamuditassa pītīti tuṭṭhassa
atk-s0201a:2582_2: sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā pīti jāyati. Pītimanassa kāyoti pītisampayuttassa puggalassa
atk-s0201a:2582_3: nāmakāyo. Passambhatīti vigatadaratho hoti. Sukhaṃ vedetīti kāyikampi cetasikampi
atk-s0201a:2582_4: sukhaṃ vediyati. Cittaṃ samādhiyatīti iminā nekkhammasukhena sukhitassa cittaṃ samādhiyati,
atk-s0201a:2582_5: appanāpattaṃ viya hoti. So mettāsahagatena cetasāti heṭṭhā kilesavasena āraddhā desanā
atk-s0201a:2582_6: pabbate vuṭṭhavuṭṭhi viya nadiṃ yathānusandhinā brahmavihārabhāvanaṃ otiṇṇā. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2582_7: yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pokkharaṇīti
atk-s0201a:2582_8: mahāsīhanādasutte maggo pokkharaṇiyā upamito, idha sāsanaṃ upamitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2582_9: Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotīti sabbakilesānaṃ samitattā paramatthasamaṇo hotīti. Sesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2590_0: 439. Evaṃ me sutanti sāleyyakasuttaṃ. Tattha kosalesūti kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā.
atk-s0201a:2590_1: Tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena kosalāti vuccati, tasmiṃ kosalesu janapade.
atk-s0201a:2590_2: Porāṇā panāhu – yasmā pubbe mahāpanādaṃ rājakumāraṃ nānānāṭakāni disvā sitamattampi
atk-s0201a:2590_3: akarontaṃ sutvā rājā āha – “yo mama puttaṃ hasāpeti, sabbālaṅkārena naṃ alaṅkaromī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2590_4: Tato naṅgalānipi chaḍḍetvā mahājanakāye sannipatite manussā sātirekāni sattavassāni
atk-s0201a:2590_5: nānākīḷikāyo dassetvā naṃ hasāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Tato sakko devanaṭaṃ pesesi. So
atk-s0201a:2590_6: dibbanāṭakaṃ dassetvā hasāpesi. Atha te manussā attano attano vasanokāsābhimukhā
atk-s0201a:2590_7: pakkamiṃsu. Te paṭipathe mittasuhajjādayo disvā paṭisanthāraṃ karontā, “kacci, bho,
atk-s0201a:2590_8: kusalaṃ, kacci, bho, kusala”nti āhaṃsu. Tasmā taṃ “kusalaṃ kusala”nti vacanaṃ upādāya
atk-s0201a:2591_0: Cārikaṃ caramānoti aturitacārikaṃ caramāno. Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti sataṃ
atk-s0201a:2591_1: vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vāti evaṃ aparicchinnena mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2591_2: Brāhmaṇagāmoti brāhmaṇānaṃ samosaraṇagāmopi brāhmaṇagāmoti vuccati brāhmaṇānaṃ bhogagāmopi.
atk-s0201a:2591_3: Idha samosaraṇagāmo adhippeto. Tadavasarīti taṃ avasari, sampattoti attho. Vihāro
atk-s0201a:2591_4: panettha aniyāmito; tasmā tassa avidūre buddhānaṃ anucchaviko eko vanasaṇḍo bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2591_5: satthā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ gatoti veditabbo. Assosunti suṇiṃsu upalabhiṃsu. Sotadvārasampattavacananigghosānusārena
atk-s0201a:2591_6: jāniṃsu. Khoti avadhāraṇatthe padapūraṇamatte vā nipāto. Tattha avadhāraṇatthena
atk-s0201a:2591_7: assosuṃyeva, na nesaṃ koci savanantarāyo ahosīti ayamattho veditabbo. Padapūraṇena
atk-s0201a:2592_0: Idāni yamatthaṃ assosuṃ, taṃ pakāsetuṃ samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamotiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2592_1: samitapāpattā samaṇoti veditabbo. Khalūti anussavanatthe nipāto. Bhoti tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0201a:2592_2: ālapanamattaṃ. Gotamoti bhagavato gottavasena paridīpanaṃ. Tasmā samaṇo khalu, bho,
atk-s0201a:2592_3: gotamoti ettha samaṇo kira, bho, gotamagottoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Sakyaputtoti
atk-s0201a:2592_4: idaṃ pana bhagavato uccākulaparidīpanaṃ. Sakyakulā pabbajitoti saddhāpabbajitabhāvadīpanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2592_5: Kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāpabbajitoti
atk-s0201a:2592_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Tato paraṃ vuttatthameva. Taṃ kho panāti itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2592_7: tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho. Kalyāṇoti kalyāṇaguṇasamannāgato, seṭṭhoti
atk-s0201a:2592_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Kittisaddoti kittiyeva, thutighoso vā. Abbhuggatoti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ
atk-s0201a:2592_9: ajjhottharitvā uggato. Kinti? “Itipi so bhagavā…pe… buddho bhagavā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2593_0: Tatrāyaṃ padasambandho – so bhagavā itipi arahaṃ, itipi sammāsambuddho…pe… itipi
atk-s0201a:2593_1: bhagavāti. Iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha ārakattā, arīnaṃ arānañca
atk-s0201a:2593_2: hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2593_3: arahanti veditabbotiādinā nayena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā sabbāneva etāni padāni visuddhimagge
atk-s0201a:2593_4: buddhānussatiniddese vitthāritānīti tato tesaṃ vitthāro gahetabbo.
atk-s0201a:2594_0: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana; atthāvahaṃ sukhāvahanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathārūpānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2594_1: arahatanti yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo, evarūpānaṃ anekehipi kappakoṭisatasahassehi
atk-s0201a:2594_4: loke arahantoti laddhasaddānaṃ arahataṃ. Dassanaṃ hotīti pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīletvā
atk-s0201a:2594_5: dassanamattampi sādhu hoti. Sace pana aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena brahmassarena dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2594_6: desentassa ekaṃ padampi sotuṃ labhissāma, sādhutaraṃyeva bhavissatīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvā.
atk-s0201a:2595_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti sabbakiccāni pahāya tuṭṭhamānasā āgamaṃsu. Etadavocunti
atk-s0201a:2595_1: duvidhā hi pucchā agārikapucchā anagārikapucchā ca. Tattha “kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2595_2: kiṃ akusala”nti iminā nayena agārikapucchā āgatā. “Ime kho, bhante, pañcupādānakkhandhā”ti
atk-s0201a:2595_3: iminā nayena anagārikapucchā. Ime pana attano anurūpaṃ agārikapucchaṃ pucchantā etaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2595_4: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo”tiādivacanaṃ avocuṃ. Tesaṃ bhagavā yathā
atk-s0201a:2595_5: na sakkonti sallakkhetuṃ, evaṃ saṃkhitteneva tāva pañhaṃ vissajjento, adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu
atk-s0201a:2595_6: kho gahapatayotiādimāha. Kasmā pana bhagavā yathā na sallakkhenti, evaṃ vissajjesīti?
atk-s0201a:2595_7: Paṇḍitamānikā hi te; āditova mātikaṃ aṭṭhapetvā yathā sallakkhenti, evaṃ atthe vitthārite,
atk-s0201a:2595_8: desanaṃ uttānikāti maññantā avajānanti, mayampi kathentā evameva katheyyāmāti vattāro
atk-s0201a:2595_9: bhavanti. Tena nesaṃ bhagavā yathā na sakkonti sallakkhetuṃ, evaṃ saṃkhitteneva tāva
atk-s0201a:2595_10: pañhaṃ vissajjesi. Tato sallakkhetuṃ asakkontehi vitthāradesanaṃ yācito vitthārena
atk-s0201a:2595_11: desetuṃ, tena hi gahapatayotiādimāha. Tattha tena hīti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Yasmā maṃ
atk-s0201a:2596_0: 440. Tividhanti tīhi koṭṭhāsehi. Kāyenāti kāyadvārena. Adhammacariyāvisamacariyāti
atk-s0201a:2596_1: adhammacariyasaṅkhātā visamacariyā. Ayaṃ panettha padattho, adhammassa cariyā adhammacariyā,
atk-s0201a:2596_2: adhammakaraṇanti attho. Visamā cariyā, visamassa vā kammassa cariyāti visamacariyā.
atk-s0201a:2596_3: Adhammacariyā ca sā visamacariyā cāti adhammacariyāvisamacariyā. Etenupāyena sabbesu
atk-s0201a:2596_4: kaṇhasukkapadesu attho veditabbo. Luddoti kakkhaḷo. Dāruṇoti sāhasiko. Lohitapāṇīti
atk-s0201a:2596_5: paraṃ jīvitā voropentassa pāṇī lohitena lippanti. Sacepi na lippanti, tathāvidho
atk-s0201a:2596_6: lohitapāṇītveva vuccati. Hatappahate niviṭṭhoti hate ca parassa pahāradāne, pahate
atk-s0201a:2596_7: ca paramāraṇe niviṭṭho. Adayāpannoti nikkaruṇataṃ āpanno.
atk-s0201a:2597_0: Yaṃ taṃ parassāti yaṃ taṃ parassa santakaṃ. Paravittūpakaraṇanti tasseva parassa
atk-s0201a:2597_1: vittūpakaraṇaṃ tuṭṭhijananaṃ parikkhārabhaṇḍakaṃ. Gāmagataṃ vāti antogāme vā ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2597_2: Araññagataṃ vāti araññe rukkhaggapabbatamatthakādīsu vā ṭhapitaṃ. Adinnanti tehi
atk-s0201a:2597_3: parehi kāyena vā vācāya vā adinnaṃ. Theyyasaṅkhātanti ettha thenoti coro. Thenassa
atk-s0201a:2597_4: bhāvo theyyaṃ, avaharaṇacittassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Saṅkhā saṅkhātanti atthato ekaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2597_5: koṭṭhāsassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā”tiādīsu viya. Theyyañca
atk-s0201a:2597_6: taṃ saṅkhātañcāti theyyasaṅkhātaṃ, theyyacittasaṅkhāto eko cittakoṭṭhāsoti attho.
atk-s0201a:2597_7: Karaṇatthe cetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ, tasmā theyyasaṅkhātenāti atthato daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2598_0: Māturakkhitātiādīsu yaṃ pitari naṭṭhe vā mate vā ghāsacchādanādīhi paṭijaggamānā,
atk-s0201a:2598_1: vayapattaṃ kulaghare dassāmīti mātā rakkhati, ayaṃ māturakkhitā nāma. Etenupāyena
atk-s0201a:2598_2: piturakkhitādayopi veditabbā. Sabhāgakulāni pana kucchigatesupi gabbhesu katikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2598_3: karonti – “sace mayhaṃ putto hoti, tuyhaṃ dhītā, aññattha gantuṃ na labhissati, mayhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2598_4: puttasseva hotū”ti. Evaṃ gabbhepi pariggahitā sassāmikā nāma. “Yo itthannāmaṃ itthiṃ
atk-s0201a:2598_5: gacchati, tassa ettako daṇḍo”ti evaṃ gāmaṃ vā gehaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā uddissa ṭhapitadaṇḍā,
atk-s0201a:2598_6: pana saparidaṇḍā nāma. Antamaso mālāguṇaparikkhittāpīti yā sabbantimena paricchedena,
atk-s0201a:2598_7: “esā me bhariyā bhavissatī”ti saññāya tassā upari kenaci mālāguṇaṃ khipantena mālāguṇamattenāpi
atk-s0201a:2598_8: parikkhittā hoti. Tathārūpāsu cārittaṃ āpajjitā hotīti evarūpāsu itthīsu sammādiṭṭhisutte
atk-s0201a:2599_0: Sabhāgatoti sabhāyaṃ ṭhito. Parisāgatoti parisāyaṃ ṭhito. Ñātimajjhagatoti dāyādānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2599_1: majjhe ṭhito. Pūgamajjhagatoti senīnaṃ majjhe ṭhito. Rājakulamajjhagatoti rājakulassa
atk-s0201a:2599_2: majjhe mahāvinicchaye ṭhito. Abhinītoti pucchanatthāya nīto. Sakkhipuṭṭhoti sakkhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2599_3: katvā pucchito. Ehambho purisāti ālapanametaṃ. Attahetu vā parahetu vāti attano vā
atk-s0201a:2599_4: parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā. Āmisakiñcikkhahetu vāti ettha āmisanti
atk-s0201a:2599_5: lābho adhippeto. Kiñcikkhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ. Antamaso tittiravaṭṭakasappipiṇḍanavanītapiṇḍādimattakassapi
atk-s0201a:2599_6: lañjassa hetūti attho. Sampajānamusā bhāsitā hotīti jānantoyeva musāvādaṃ kattā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2600_0: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ itoti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ hoti, tesaṃ bhedāya. Amūsaṃ bhedāyāti
atk-s0201a:2600_1: yesaṃ amutrāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ hoti, tesaṃ bhedāya. Iti samaggānaṃ vā bhedakāti
atk-s0201a:2600_2: evaṃ samaggānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ sahāyakānaṃ bhedaṃ kattā. Bhinnānaṃ vā anuppadātāti suṭṭhu
atk-s0201a:2600_3: kataṃ tayā, taṃ pajahantena katipāheneva te mahantaṃ anatthaṃ kareyyāti evaṃ bhinnānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2600_4: puna asaṃsandanāya anuppadātā upatthambhetā kāraṇaṃ dassetāti attho. Vaggo ārāmo
atk-s0201a:2600_5: abhiratiṭṭhānamassāti vaggārāmo. Vaggaratoti vaggesu rato. Vagge disvā vā sutvā vā
atk-s0201a:2600_6: nandatīti vagganandī. Vaggakaraṇiṃ vācanti yā vācā samaggepi satte vagge karoti bhindati,
atk-s0201a:2601_0: Aṇḍakāti yathā sadose rukkhe aṇḍakāni uṭṭhahanti, evaṃ sadosatāya khuṃsanāvambhanādivacanehi
atk-s0201a:2601_1: aṇḍakā jātā. Kakkasāti pūtikā. Yathā nāma pūtikarukkho kakkaso hoti paggharitacuṇṇo,
atk-s0201a:2601_2: evaṃ kakkasā hoti, sotaṃ ghaṃsamānā viya pavisati. Tena vuttaṃ “kakkasā”ti. Parakaṭukāti
atk-s0201a:2601_3: paresaṃ kaṭukā amanāpā dosajananī. Parābhisajjanīti kuṭilakaṇṭakasākhā viya mammesu
atk-s0201a:2601_4: vijjhitvā paresaṃ abhisajjanī gantukāmānampi gantuṃ adatvā lagganakārī. Kodhasāmantāti
atk-s0201a:2601_5: kodhassa āsannā. Asamādhisaṃvattanikāti appanāsamādhissa vā upacārasamādhissa vā
atk-s0201a:2601_6: asaṃvattanikā. Iti sabbāneva tāni sadosavācāya vevacanāni.
atk-s0201a:2602_0: Akālavādīti akālena vattā. Abhūtavādīti yaṃ natthi, tassa vattā. Anatthavādīti akāraṇanissitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2602_1: vattā. Adhammavādīti asabhāvaṃ vattā. Avinayavādīti asaṃvaravinayapaṭisaṃyuttassa
atk-s0201a:2602_2: vattā. Anidhānavati vācanti hadayamañjūsāyaṃ nidhetuṃ ayuttaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2602_3: Akālenāti vattabbakālassa pubbe vā pacchā vā ayuttakāle vattā hoti. Anapadesanti
atk-s0201a:2602_4: suttāpadesavirahitaṃ. Apariyantavatinti aparicchedaṃ, suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:2602_5: tassa upalabbhaṃ vā upamaṃ vā vatthuṃ vā āharitvā bāhirakathaṃyeva katheti. Nikkhittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2602_6: nikkhittameva hoti. “Suttaṃ nu kho katheti jātakaṃ nu kho, nassa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā
atk-s0201a:2602_7: passāmā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Yathā vaṭarukkhasākhānaṃ gatagataṭṭhāne pārohā otaranti,
atk-s0201a:2602_8: otiṇṇotiṇṇaṭṭhāne sampajjitvā puna vaḍḍhantiyeva. Evaṃ aḍḍhayojanampi yojanampi gacchantiyeva,
atk-s0201a:2602_9: gacchante gacchante pana mūlarukkho vinassati, paveṇijātakāva tiṭṭhanti. Evamayampi
atk-s0201a:2602_10: nigrodhadhammakathiko nāma hoti; nikkhittaṃ nikkhittamattameva katvā passeneva pariharanto
atk-s0201a:2602_11: gacchati. Yo pana bahumpi bhaṇanto etadatthamidaṃ vuttanti āharitvā jānāpetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2602_12: tassa kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Anatthasaṃhitanti na atthanissitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2603_0: Abhijjhātā hotīti abhijjhāya oloketā hoti. Aho vatāti patthanatthe nipāto. Abhijjhāya
atk-s0201a:2603_1: olokitamattakena cettha kammapathabhedo na hoti. Yadā pana, “aho vatidaṃ mama santakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2603_2: assa, ahamettha vasaṃ vatteyya”nti attano pariṇāmeti, tadā kammapathabhedo hoti, ayamidha adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:2604_0: Byāpannacittoti vipannacitto pūtibhūtacitto. Paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappoti dosena duṭṭhacittasaṅkappo.
atk-s0201a:2604_1: Haññantūti ghātiyantū. Vajjhantūti vadhaṃ pāpuṇantu. Mā vā ahesunti kiñcipi mā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2604_2: Idhāpi kopamattakena kammapathabhedo na hoti. Haññantūtiādicintaneneva hoti, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2605_0: Micchādiṭṭhikoti akusaladassano. Viparītadassanoti vipallatthadassano. Natthi dinnanti
atk-s0201a:2605_1: dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yiṭṭhaṃ vuccati mahāyāgo. Hutanti paheṇakasakkāro
atk-s0201a:2605_2: adhippeto, tampi ubhayaṃ phalābhāvameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Sukatadukkaṭānanti
atk-s0201a:2605_3: sukatadukkaṭānaṃ, kusalākusalānanti attho. Phalaṃ vipākoti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti
atk-s0201a:2605_4: vā vuccati, taṃ natthīti vadati. Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi.
atk-s0201a:2605_5: Natthi paro lokoti idha loke ṭhitassapi paraloko natthi, sabbe tattha tattheva ucchijjantīti
atk-s0201a:2605_6: dasseti. Natthi mātā natthi pitāti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena
atk-s0201a:2605_7: vadati. Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavitvā upapajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2605_8: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentīti ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ abhivisiṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:2605_9: paññāya sayaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā pavedenti, te natthīti sabbaññubuddhānaṃ abhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0201a:2606: 441. Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyātiādayo satta kammapathā cūḷahatthipade vitthāritā. Anabhijjhādayo uttānatthāyeva.
atk-s0201a:2607_0: 442. Sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyanti sahabhāvaṃ upagaccheyyaṃ. Brahmakāyikānaṃ devānanti
atk-s0201a:2607_1: paṭhamajjhānabhūmidevānaṃ. Ābhānaṃ devānanti ābhā nāma visuṃ natthi, parittābhaappamāṇābhaābhassarānametaṃ
atk-s0201a:2607_2: adhivacanaṃ. Parittābhānantiādi pana ekato aggahetvā tesaṃyeva bhedato gahaṇaṃ. Parittasubhānantiādīsupi
atk-s0201a:2607_3: eseva nayo. Iti bhagavā āsavakkhayaṃ dassetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2608_0: Idha ṭhatvā pana devalokā samānetabbā. Tissannaṃ tāva jhānabhūmīnaṃ vasena nava brahmalokā,
atk-s0201a:2608_1: pañca suddhāvāsā catūhi ārūpehi saddhiṃ navāti aṭṭhārasa, vehapphalehi saddhiṃ ekūnavīsati,
atk-s0201a:2608_2: te asaññaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsati brahmalokā honti, evaṃ chahi kāmāvacarehi saddhiṃ chabbīsati
atk-s0201a:2608_3: devalokā nāma. Tesaṃ sabbesampi bhagavatā dasakusalakammapathehi nibbatti dassitā.
atk-s0201a:2609_0: Tattha chasu tāva kāmāvacaresu tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ vipākeneva nibbatti hoti. Uparidevalokānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2609_1: pana ime kammapathā upanissayavasena kathitā. Dasa kusalakammapathā hi sīlaṃ, sīlavato
atk-s0201a:2609_2: ca kasiṇaparikammaṃ ijjhatīti. Sīle patiṭṭhāya kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2609_3: nibbattetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbattati; dutiyādīni bhāvetvā dutiyajjhānabhūmiādīsu
atk-s0201a:2609_4: nibbattati; rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhito
atk-s0201a:2609_5: pañcasu suddhāvāsesu nibbattati; rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2609_6: nibbattetvā catūsu arūpesu nibbattati; rūpārūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0201a:2609_7: arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Asaññabhavo pana bāhirakānaṃ tāpasaparibbājakānaṃ āciṇṇoti idha
atk-s0201a:2613_0: 444. Evaṃ me sutanti verañjakasuttaṃ. Tattha verañjakāti verañjavāsino. Kenacideva
atk-s0201a:2613_1: karaṇīyenāti kenacideva aniyamitakiccena. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ purimasutte vuttanayeneva
atk-s0201a:2613_2: veditabbaṃ. Kevalañhi idha adhammacārī visamacārīti evaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā
atk-s0201a:2613_3: katā. Purimasutte dhammādhiṭṭhānāti ayaṃ viseso. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
atk-s0201a:2617_0: 449. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāvedallasuttaṃ. Tattha āyasmāti sagāravasappatissavacanametaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2617_1: Mahākoṭṭhikoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito.
atk-s0201a:2617_2: Duppañño duppaññoti ettha paññāya duṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi, appañño nippaññoti attho.
atk-s0201a:2617_3: Kittāvatā nu khoti kāraṇaparicchedapucchā, kittakena nu kho evaṃ vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2617_4: Pucchā ca nāmesā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā, diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā, vimaticchedanāpucchā,
atk-s0201a:2617_5: anumatipucchā, kathetukamyatāpucchāti pañcavidhā hoti. Tāsamidaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ –
atk-s0201a:2618_0: Katamā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā? Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ
atk-s0201a:2618_1: avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ, tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtāya vibhāvanatthāya
atk-s0201a:2619_0: Katamā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā? Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ
atk-s0201a:2619_1: vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ, aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati. Ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2620_0: Katamā vimaticchedanāpucchā? Pakatiyā saṃsayapakkhando hoti vimatipakkhando, dveḷhakajāto,
atk-s0201a:2620_1: “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho”ti, so vimaticchedanatthāya pañhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2621: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti? Aniccaṃ, bhante”ti evarūpā anumatiṃ gahetvā dhammadesanākāle pucchā anumatipucchā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2622_0: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānā, katame cattāro”ti evarūpā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sayameva
atk-s0201a:2622_1: pucchitvā sayameva vissajjetukāmassa pucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā nāma. Tāsu idha
atk-s0201a:2623_0: Thero hi attano divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā sayameva pañhaṃ samuṭṭhapetvā sayaṃ vinicchinanto
atk-s0201a:2623_1: idaṃ suttaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpesi. Ekacco hi pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃyeva sakkoti
atk-s0201a:2623_2: na nicchetuṃ; ekacco nicchetuṃ sakkoti na samuṭṭhāpetuṃ; ekacco ubhayampi na sakkoti;
atk-s0201a:2623_3: ekacco ubhayampi sakkoti. Tesu thero ubhayampi sakkotiyeva. Kasmā? Mahāpaññatāya.
atk-s0201a:2623_4: Mahāpaññaṃ nissāya hi imasmiṃ sāsane sāriputtatthero, mahākaccānatthero, puṇṇatthero,
atk-s0201a:2623_5: kumārakassapatthero, ānandatthero, ayameva āyasmāti sambahulā therā visesaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2623_6: adhigatā. Na hi sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā
atk-s0201a:2623_7: sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇituṃ, mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya sāriputtatthero
atk-s0201a:2623_8: taṃ ṭhānaṃ adhigato. Paññāya hi therena sadiso natthi. Teneva naṃ bhagavā etadagge
atk-s0201a:2623_9: ṭhapesi – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti.
atk-s0201a:2624_0: Tathā na sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā bhagavatā
atk-s0201a:2624_1: saṃkhittena bhāsitassa sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā samānetvā vitthārena
atk-s0201a:2624_2: atthaṃ vibhajetuṃ, mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya mahākaccānatthero tattha
atk-s0201a:2624_3: paṭibalo jāto, teneva naṃ bhagavā etadagge ṭhapesi – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
atk-s0201a:2624_4: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti.
atk-s0201a:2625_0: Tathā na sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2625_1: kathentena dasa kathāvatthūni āharitvā satta visuddhiyo vibhajantena dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2625_2: kathetuṃ, mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya puṇṇatthero catuparisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane
atk-s0201a:2625_3: cittabījaniṃ gahetvā nisinno līḷāyanto puṇṇacando viya dhammaṃ kathesi. Teneva naṃ
atk-s0201a:2625_4: bhagavā etadagge ṭhapesi – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2626_0: Tathā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgato bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathento
atk-s0201a:2626_1: ito vā etto vā anukkamitvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ gahetvā andho viya, ekapadikaṃ daṇḍakasetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2626_2: āruḷho viya ca gacchati. Mahāpañño pana catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ nikkhipitvā upamā ca
atk-s0201a:2626_3: kāraṇāni ca āharitvā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ gahetvā heṭṭhupariyaṃ karonto kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2626_4: Mahāpaññatāya pana kumārakassapatthero catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ nikkhipitvā upamā ca kāraṇāni
atk-s0201a:2626_5: ca āharitvā tehi saddhiṃ yojento jātassare pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni phullāpento viya
atk-s0201a:2626_6: sinerumatthake vaṭṭisahassaṃ telapadīpaṃ jālento viya tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ heṭṭhupariyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2626_7: karonto kathesi. Teneva naṃ bhagavā etadagge ṭhapesi – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
atk-s0201a:2627_0: Tathā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgato bhikkhu catūhi māsehi catuppadikampi
atk-s0201a:2627_1: gāthaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Mahāpañño pana ekapade ṭhatvā padasatampi padasahassampi
atk-s0201a:2627_2: gaṇhāti. Ānandatthero pana mahāpaññatāya ekapaduddhāre ṭhatvā sakiṃyeva sutvā puna
atk-s0201a:2627_3: apucchanto saṭṭhi padasahassāni pannarasa gāthāsahassāni valliyā pupphāni ākaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0201a:2627_4: gaṇhanto viya ekappahāreneva gaṇhāti. Gahitagahitaṃ pāsāṇe khatalekhā viya, suvaṇṇaghaṭe
atk-s0201a:2627_5: pakkhittasīhavasā viya ca gahitākāreneva tiṭṭhati. Teneva naṃ bhagavā etadagge ṭhapesi
atk-s0201a:2627_6: – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gatimantānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando, satimantānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2628_0: Na hi sakkā yāya vā tāya vā appamattikāya paññāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā catupaṭisambhidāpabhedassa
atk-s0201a:2628_1: matthakaṃ pāpuṇituṃ. Mahāpaññena pana sakkāti mahāpaññatāya mahākoṭṭhitatthero adhigamaparipucchāsavanapubbayogānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2628_2: vasena anantanayussadaṃ paṭisambhidāpabhedaṃ patto. Teneva naṃ bhagavā etadagge ṭhapesi
atk-s0201a:2628_3: – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākoṭṭhito”ti.
atk-s0201a:2629_0: Iti thero mahāpaññatāya pañhaṃ samuṭṭhāpetumpi nicchetumpīti ubhayampi sakkoti. So
atk-s0201a:2629_1: divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā sayameva sabbapañhe samuṭṭhapetvā sayaṃ vinicchinanto idaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2629_2: ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpetvā, “sobhanā vata ayaṃ dhammadesanā, jeṭṭhabhātikena
atk-s0201a:2629_3: naṃ dhammasenāpatinā saddhiṃ saṃsandissāmi, tato ayaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ ekamatiyā
atk-s0201a:2629_4: ekajjhāsayena ca ṭhapitā atigarukā bhavissati pāsāṇacchattasadisā, caturoghanittharaṇatthikānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2629_5: titthe ṭhapitanāvā viya, maggagamanatthikānaṃ sahassayuttaājaññaratho viya bahupakārā
atk-s0201a:2629_6: bhavissatī”ti diṭṭhasaṃsandanatthaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Tena vuttaṃ – “tāsu idha diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā adhippetā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2630_0: Nappajānātīti ettha yasmā nappajānāti, tasmā duppaññoti vuccatīti ayamattho. Esa
atk-s0201a:2630_1: nayo sabbattha. Idaṃ dukkhanti nappajānātīti idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, ito uddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2630_2: natthīti dukkhasaccaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato na pajānāti. Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti
atk-s0201a:2630_3: ito dukkhaṃ samudetīti pavattidukkhapabhāvikā taṇhā samudayasaccanti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato
atk-s0201a:2630_4: na pajānāti. Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti idaṃ dukkhaṃ ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo ca idaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2630_5: patvā nirujjhatīti ubhinnaṃ appavatti nibbānaṃ nirodhasaccanti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato
atk-s0201a:2630_6: na pajānāti. Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti ayaṃ paṭipadā dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchatīti
atk-s0201a:2630_7: maggasaccaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato na pajānātīti. Anantaravārepi imināva nayena
atk-s0201a:2630_8: attho veditabbo. Saṅkhepato panettha catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko puggalo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2631_0: Ayañhi ācariyasantike cattāri saccāni savanato uggaṇhāti. Ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmakā
atk-s0201a:2631_1: dhammā dukkhasaccaṃ, taṇhā samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnaṃ appavatti nibbānaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2631_2: dukkhasaccaṃ parijānanto samudayasaccaṃ pajahanto nirodhapāpano maggo maggasaccanti
atk-s0201a:2631_3: evaṃ uggahetvā abhinivisati. Tattha purimāni dve saccāni vaṭṭaṃ, pacchimāni vivaṭṭaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2631_4: vaṭṭe abhiniveso hoti, no vivaṭṭe, tasmā ayaṃ abhinivisamāno dukkhasacce abhinivisati.
atk-s0201a:2632_0: Dukkhasaccaṃ nāma rūpādayo pañcakkhandhāti vavatthapetvā dhātukammaṭṭhānavasena otaritvā,
atk-s0201a:2632_1: “cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ rūpa”nti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0201a:2632_2: Tadārammaṇā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ nāmanti evaṃ yamakatālakkhandhaṃ bhindanto
atk-s0201a:2632_3: viya “dveva ime dhammā nāmarūpa”nti vavatthapeti. Taṃ panetaṃ na ahetukaṃ sahetukaṃ
atk-s0201a:2632_4: sappaccayaṃ, ko cassa paccayo avijjādayo dhammāti evaṃ paccaye ceva paccayuppannadhamme
atk-s0201a:2632_5: ca vavatthapetvā “sabbepi dhammā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā”ti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti,
atk-s0201a:2632_6: tato udayavayappaṭipīḷanākārena dukkhā, avasavattanākārena anattāti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0201a:2633_0: Maggakkhaṇe cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati, ekābhisamayena abhisameti.
atk-s0201a:2633_1: Dukkhaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati. Samudayaṃ pahānapaṭivedhena, nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena,
atk-s0201a:2633_2: maggaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati. Dukkhaṃ pariññābhisamayena abhisameti, samudayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2633_3: pahānābhisamayena, nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayena, maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayena abhisameti.
atk-s0201a:2633_4: So tīṇi saccāni kiccato paṭivijjhati, nirodhaṃ ārammaṇato. Tasmiñcassa khaṇe ahaṃ
atk-s0201a:2633_5: dukkhaṃ parijānāmi, samudayaṃ pajahāmi, nirodhaṃ sacchikaromi, maggaṃ bhāvemīti ābhogasamannāhāramanasikārapaccavekkhaṇā
atk-s0201a:2633_6: natthi. Etassa pana pariggaṇhantasseva maggo tīsu saccesu pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentova
atk-s0201a:2634_0: Tasmā paññavāti vuccatīti ettha heṭṭhimakoṭiyā sotāpanno, uparimakoṭiyā khīṇāsavo
atk-s0201a:2634_1: paññavāti niddiṭṭho. Yo pana tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ pāḷito ca atthato ca anusandhito
atk-s0201a:2634_2: ca pubbāparato ca uggahetvā heṭṭhupariyaṃ karonto vicarati, aniccadukkhānattavasena
atk-s0201a:2634_3: pariggahamattampi natthi, ayaṃ paññavā nāma, duppañño nāmāti? Viññāṇacarito nāmesa,
atk-s0201a:2634_4: paññavāti na vattabbo. Atha yo tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā sammasanto
atk-s0201a:2634_5: ajja ajjeva arahattanti carati, ayaṃ paññavā nāma, duppañño nāmāti? Bhajāpiyamāno
atk-s0201a:2634_6: paññavāpakkhaṃ bhajati. Sutte pana paṭivedhova kathito.
atk-s0201a:2635_0: Viññāṇaṃ viññāṇanti idha kiṃ pucchati? Yena viññāṇena saṅkhāre sammasitvā esa paññavā
atk-s0201a:2635_1: nāma jāto, tassa āgamanavipassanā viññāṇaṃ kammakārakacittaṃ pucchāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2635_2: Sukhantipi vijānātīti sukhavedanampi vijānāti. Uparipadadvayepi eseva nayo. Iminā
atk-s0201a:2635_3: thero “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānātī”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0201a:2635_4: āgatavedanāvasena arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. Tassattho satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2636_0: Saṃsaṭṭhāti ekuppādādilakkhaṇena saṃyogaṭṭhena saṃsaṭṭhā, udāhu visaṃsaṭṭhāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2636_1: Ettha ca thero maggapaññañca vipassanāviññāṇañcāti ime dve lokiyalokuttaradhamme
atk-s0201a:2636_2: missetvā bhūmantaraṃ bhinditvā samayaṃ ajānanto viya pucchatīti na veditabbo. Maggapaññāya
atk-s0201a:2636_3: pana maggaviññāṇena, vipassanāpaññāya ca vipassanāviññāṇeneva saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2636_4: pucchatīti veditabbo. Theropissa tamevatthaṃ vissajjento ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2636_5: Tattha na ca labbhā imesaṃ dhammānanti imesaṃ lokiyamaggakkhaṇepi lokuttaramaggakkhaṇepi
atk-s0201a:2636_6: ekato uppannānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ. Vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti visuṃ visuṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:2636_7: vinivaṭṭetvā, ārammaṇato vā vatthuto vā uppādato vā nirodhato vā nānākaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2636_8: na sakkāti attho. Tesaṃ tesaṃ pana dhammānaṃ visayo nāma atthi. Lokiyadhammaṃ patvā
atk-s0201a:2636_9: hi cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, lokuttaraṃ patvā paññā.
atk-s0201a:2637_0: Sammāsambuddhopi hi lokiyadhammaṃ pucchanto, “bhikkhu, tvaṃ katamaṃ paññaṃ adhigato,
atk-s0201a:2637_1: kiṃ paṭhamamaggapaññaṃ, udāhu dutiya tatiya catuttha maggapañña”nti na evaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2637_2: Kiṃ phasso tvaṃ, bhikkhu, kiṃ vedano, kiṃ sañño, kiṃ cetanoti na ca pucchati, cittavasena
atk-s0201a:2637_3: pana, “kiñcitto tvaṃ, bhikkhū”ti pucchati. Kusalākusalaṃ paññapentopi “manopubbaṅgamā
atk-s0201a:2637_4: dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā”ti ca, “katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2637_5: kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti ca evaṃ cittavaseneva paññāpeti. Lokuttaraṃ pucchanto
atk-s0201a:2637_6: pana kiṃ phasso tvaṃ bhikkhu, kiṃ vedano, kiṃ sañño, kiṃ cetanoti na pucchati. Katamā
atk-s0201a:2637_7: te, bhikkhu, paññā adhigatā, kiṃ paṭhamamaggapaññā, udāhu dutiyatatiyacatutthamaggapaññāti
atk-s0201a:2638_0: Indriyasaṃyuttepi “pañcimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni. Katamāni pañca? Saddhindriyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2638_1: vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ. Kattha ca, bhikkhave, saddhindriyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2638_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ? Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu ettha saddhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kattha ca, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:2638_3: vīriyindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ? Catūsu sammappadhānesu ettha vīriyindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2638_4: Kattha ca, bhikkhave, satindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ? Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu ettha satindriyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2638_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kattha ca, bhikkhave, samādhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ? Catūsu jhānesu ettha
atk-s0201a:2638_6: samādhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kattha ca, bhikkhave, paññindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ? Catūsu
atk-s0201a:2638_7: ariyasaccesu ettha paññindriyaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti. Evaṃ savisayasmiṃyeva lokiyalokuttarā dhammā kathitā.
atk-s0201a:2639_0: Yathā hi cattāro seṭṭhiputtā rājāti rājapañcamesu sahāyesu nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmāti
atk-s0201a:2639_1: vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu ekassa seṭṭhiputtassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a:2639_2: gehasāmikova, “imesaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ detha, gandhamālālaṅkārādīni dethā”ti
atk-s0201a:2639_3: gehe vicāreti. Dutiyassa tatiyassa catutthassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī
atk-s0201a:2639_4: nisīdanti, gehasāmikova, “imesaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ detha, gandhamālālaṅkārādīni
atk-s0201a:2639_5: dethā”ti gehe vicāreti. Atha sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle kiñcāpi rājā sabbattha
atk-s0201a:2639_6: issarova, imasmiṃ pana kāle attano geheyeva, “imesaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ detha,
atk-s0201a:2639_7: gandhamālālaṅkārādīni dethā”ti vicāreti. Evamevaṃ kho saddhāpañcamakesu indriyesu
atk-s0201a:2639_8: tesu sahāyesu ekato vīthiṃ otarantesu viya ekārammaṇe uppajjamānesupi yathā paṭhamassa
atk-s0201a:2639_9: gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova vicāreti, evaṃ sotāpattiyaṅgāni
atk-s0201a:2639_10: patvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ saddhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni
atk-s0201a:2639_11: honti. Yathā dutiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova vicāreti,
atk-s0201a:2639_12: evaṃ sammappadhānāni patvā paggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2639_13: sesāni tadanvayāni honti. Yathā tatiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova
atk-s0201a:2639_14: vicāreti, evaṃ satipaṭṭhānāni patvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ satindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti
atk-s0201a:2639_15: pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni honti. Yathā catutthassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī
atk-s0201a:2639_16: nisīdanti, gehasāmikova vicāreti, evaṃ jhānavimokkhe patvā avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ samādhindriyameva
atk-s0201a:2639_17: jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni honti. Sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle
atk-s0201a:2639_18: pana yathā itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, rājāva gehe vicāreti, evameva ariyasaccāni
atk-s0201a:2639_19: patvā pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ paññindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni honti.
atk-s0201a:2640_0: Iti paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ agge ṭhapito mahākoṭṭhitatthero lokiyadhammaṃ pucchanto
atk-s0201a:2640_1: cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pucchi; lokuttaradhammaṃ pucchanto paññaṃ
atk-s0201a:2640_2: jeṭṭhakaṃ paññaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pucchi. Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheropi tatheva vissajjesīti.
atk-s0201a:2641_0: Yaṃ hāvuso, pajānātīti yaṃ catusaccadhammamidaṃ dukkhantiādinā nayena maggapaññā
atk-s0201a:2641_1: pajānāti. Taṃ vijānātīti maggaviññāṇampi tatheva taṃ vijānāti. Yaṃ vijānātīti yaṃ
atk-s0201a:2641_2: saṅkhāragataṃ aniccantiādinā nayena vipassanāviññāṇaṃ vijānāti. Taṃ pajānātīti vipassanāpaññāpi
atk-s0201a:2641_3: tatheva taṃ pajānāti. Tasmā ime dhammāti tena kāraṇena ime dhammā. Saṃsaṭṭhāti ekuppādaekanirodhaekavatthukaekārammaṇatāya saṃsaṭṭhā.
atk-s0201a:2642_0: Paññā bhāvetabbāti idaṃ maggapaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Taṃsampayuttaṃ pana viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2642_1: tāya saddhiṃ bhāvetabbameva hoti. Viññāṇaṃ pariññeyyanti idaṃ vipassanāviññāṇaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0201a:2642_2: vuttaṃ. Taṃsampayuttā pana paññā tena saddhiṃ parijānitabbāva hoti.
atk-s0201a:2643_0: 450. Vedanā vedanāti idaṃ kasmā pucchati? Vedanālakkhaṇaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2643_1: Evaṃ santepi tebhūmikasammasanacāravedanāva adhippetāti sallakkhetabbā. Sukhampi
atk-s0201a:2643_2: vedetīti sukhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vedeti anubhavati. Parato padadvayepi eseva nayo. “Rūpañca
atk-s0201a:2643_3: hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantadukkhaṃ abhavissa, dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2643_4: sukhena, nayidaṃ sattā rūpasmiṃ sārajjeyyuṃ. Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2643_5: sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṃ sārajjanti, sārāgā saṃyujjanti,
atk-s0201a:2643_6: saṃyogā saṃkilissanti. Vedanā ca hidaṃ… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇañca hidaṃ, mahāli,
atk-s0201a:2643_7: ekantadukkhaṃ abhavissa…pe… saṃkilissantī”ti iminā hi mahālisuttapariyāyena idha
atk-s0201a:2643_8: ārammaṇaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ adukkhamasukhanti kathitaṃ. Apica purimaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2643_9: ārammaṇaṃ katvā aparā sukhā vedanā vedeti; purimaṃ dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:2643_10: aparā dukkhā vedanā vedeti; purimaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā aparā
atk-s0201a:2643_11: adukkhamasukhā vedanā vedetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Vedanāyeva hi vedeti, na
atk-s0201a:2643_12: añño koci veditā nāma atthīti vuttametaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2644_0: Saññā saññāti idha kiṃ pucchati? Sabbasaññāya lakkhaṇaṃ. Kiṃ sabbatthakasaññāyāti?
atk-s0201a:2644_1: Sabbasaññāya lakkhaṇantipi sabbatthakasaññāya lakkhaṇantipi ekamevetaṃ, evaṃ santepi
atk-s0201a:2644_2: tebhūmikasammasanacārasaññāva adhippetāti sallakkhetabbā. Nīlakampi sañjānātīti nīlapupphe
