atk-s0201a:2644_3: vā vatthe vā parikammaṃ katvā upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā pāpento sañjānāti. Imasmiñhi
atk-s0201a:2644_4: atthe parikammasaññāpi upacārasaññāpi appanāsaññāpi vaṭṭati. Nīle nīlanti uppajjanakasaññāpi
atk-s0201a:2645_0: Yā cāvuso, vedanāti ettha vedanā, saññā, viññāṇanti imāni tīṇi gahetvā paññā kasmā
atk-s0201a:2645_1: na gahitāti? Asabbasaṅgāhikattā. Paññāya hi gahitāya paññāya sampayuttāva vedanādayo
atk-s0201a:2645_2: labbhanti, no vippayuttā. Taṃ pana aggahetvā imesu gahitesu paññāya sampayuttā ca
atk-s0201a:2645_3: vippayuttā ca antamaso dve pañcaviññāṇadhammāpi labbhanti. Yathā hi tayo purisā suttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2645_4: suttanti vadeyyuṃ, catuttho ratanāvutasuttanti. Tesu purimā tayo takkagatampi paṭṭivaṭṭakādigatampi
atk-s0201a:2645_5: yaṃkiñci bahuṃ suttaṃ labhanti antamaso makkaṭakasuttampi. Ratanāvutasuttaṃ pariyesanto
atk-s0201a:2645_6: mandaṃ labhati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Heṭṭhato vā paññā viññāṇena saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2645_7: sampayogaṃ labhāpitā vissaṭṭhattāva idha na gahitāti vadanti. Yaṃ hāvuso, vedetīti
atk-s0201a:2645_8: yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vedanā vedeti, saññāpi tadeva sañjānāti. Yaṃ sañjānātīti yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2645_9: saññā sañjānāti, viññāṇampi tadeva vijānātīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2646_0: Idāni sañjānāti vijānāti pajānātīti ettha viseso veditabbo. Tattha upasaggamattameva
atk-s0201a:2646_1: viseso. Jānātīti padaṃ pana aviseso. Tassāpi jānanatthe viseso veditabbo. Saññā hi
atk-s0201a:2646_2: nīlādivasena ārammaṇaṃ sañjānanamattameva, aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2646_3: pāpetuṃ na sakkoti. Viññāṇaṃ nīlādivasena ārammaṇañceva sañjānāti, aniccādilakkhaṇapaṭivedhañca
atk-s0201a:2646_4: pāpeti, ussakkitvā pana maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti. Paññā nīlādivasena ārammaṇampi
atk-s0201a:2646_5: sañjānāti, aniccādivasena lakkhaṇapaṭivedhampi pāpeti, ussakkitvā maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpetumpi sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2647_0: Yathā hi heraññikaphalake kahāpaṇarāsimhi kate ajātabuddhi dārako gāmikapuriso mahāheraññikoti
atk-s0201a:2647_1: tīsu janesu oloketvā ṭhitesu ajātabuddhi dārako kahāpaṇānaṃ cittavicittacaturassamaṇḍalabhāvameva
atk-s0201a:2647_2: jānāti, idaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ratanasammatanti na jānāti. Gāmikapuriso
atk-s0201a:2647_4: kūṭo ayaṃ cheko ayaṃ karato ayaṃ saṇho”ti pana na jānāti. Mahāheraññiko cittādibhāvampi
atk-s0201a:2647_5: ratanasammatabhāvampi kūṭādibhāvampi jānāti, jānanto ca pana naṃ rūpaṃ disvāpi jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2647_6: ākoṭitassa saddaṃ sutvāpi, gandhaṃ ghāyitvāpi, rasaṃ sāyitvāpi, hatthena garukalahukabhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2647_7: upadhāretvāpi asukagāme katotipi jānāti, asukanigame asukanagare asukapabbatacchāyāya
atk-s0201a:2647_8: asukanadītīre katotipi, asukācariyena katotipi jānāti. Evamevaṃ saññā ajātabuddhidārakassa
atk-s0201a:2647_9: kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇamattameva sañjānāti. Viññāṇaṃ gāmikapurisassa
atk-s0201a:2647_10: kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇampi sañjānāti, aniccādivasena lakkhaṇapaṭivedhampi
atk-s0201a:2647_11: pāpeti. Paññā mahāheraññikassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya nīlādivasena ārammaṇampi sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a:2647_12: aniccādivasena lakkhaṇapaṭivedhampi pāpeti, ussakkitvā maggapātubhāvampi pāpeti.
atk-s0201a:2648_0: Tenāha āyasmā nāgaseno – “dukkaraṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā katanti. Kiṃ, bhante, nāgasena
atk-s0201a:2648_1: bhagavatā dukkaraṃ katanti? Dukkaraṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā kataṃ, imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2648_2: cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhātaṃ, ayaṃ phasso,
atk-s0201a:2648_3: ayaṃ vedanā, ayaṃ saññā, ayaṃ cetanā, idaṃ citta”nti. Yathā hi tilatelaṃ, sāsapatelaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2648_4: madhukatelaṃ, eraṇḍakatelaṃ, vasātelanti imāni pañca telāni ekacāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0201a:2648_5: divasaṃ yamakamanthehi manthetvā tato idaṃ tilatelaṃ, idaṃ sāsapatelanti ekekassa
atk-s0201a:2648_6: pāṭiyekkaṃ uddharaṇaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ, idaṃ tato dukkarataraṃ. Bhagavā pana sabbaññutaññāṇassa
atk-s0201a:2648_7: suppaṭividdhattā dhammissaro dhammarājā imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2648_8: vavatthānaṃ akkhāsi. Pañcannaṃ mahānadīnaṃ samuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṭṭhāne, “idaṃ gaṅgāya
atk-s0201a:2648_9: udakaṃ, idaṃ yamunāyā”ti evaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ udakauddharaṇenāpi ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2649_0: 451. Nissaṭṭhenāti nissaṭena pariccattena vā. Tattha nissaṭenāti atthe sati pañcahi
atk-s0201a:2649_1: indriyehīti nissakkavacanaṃ. Pariccattenāti atthe sati karaṇavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2649_2: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – pañcahi indriyehi nissaritvā manodvāre pavattena pañcahi vā indriyehi
atk-s0201a:2649_3: tassa vatthubhāvaṃ anupagamanatāya pariccattenāti. Parisuddhenāti nirupakkilesena.
atk-s0201a:2649_4: Manoviññāṇenāti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānacittena. Kiṃ neyyanti kiṃ jānitabbaṃ. “Yaṃkiñci
atk-s0201a:2649_5: neyyaṃ nāma atthi dhamma”ntiādīsu hi jānitabbaṃ neyyanti vuttaṃ. Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2649_6: neyyanti kathaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānacittena arūpāvacarasamāpatti neyyāti? Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne
atk-s0201a:2649_7: ṭhitena arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkā hoti. Ettha ṭhitassa hi sā ijjhati.
atk-s0201a:2649_8: Tasmā “ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ neyya”ntiādimāha. Atha nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ kasmā na
atk-s0201a:2649_9: vuttanti? Pāṭiyekkaṃ abhinivesābhāvato. Tattha hi kalāpato nayato sammasanaṃ labbhati,
atk-s0201a:2649_10: dhammasenāpatisadisassāpi hi bhikkhuno pāṭiyekkaṃ abhiniveso na jāyati. Tasmā theropi,
atk-s0201a:2649_11: “evaṃ kirame dhammā ahutvā sambhonti, hutvā paṭiventī”ti kalāpato nayato sammasitvā
atk-s0201a:2649_12: vissajjesīti. Bhagavā pana sabbaññutaññāṇassa hatthagatattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyampi
atk-s0201a:2649_13: paropaññāsa dhamme pāṭiyekkaṃ aṃguddhāreneva uddharitvā, “yāvatā saññāsamāpattiyo,
atk-s0201a:2650_0: Paññācakkhunā pajānātīti dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhubhūtāya paññāya pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2650_1: Tattha dve paññā samādhipaññā vipassanāpaññā ca. Samādhipaññāya kiccato asammohato
atk-s0201a:2650_2: ca pajānāti. Vipassanāpaññāya lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena ārammaṇato jānanaṃ kathitaṃ. Kimatthiyāti
atk-s0201a:2650_3: ko etissā attho. Abhiññatthātiādīsu abhiññeyye dhamme abhijānātīti abhiññatthā. Pariññeyye
atk-s0201a:2650_4: dhamme parijānātīti pariññatthā. Pahātabbe dhamme pajahatīti pahānatthā. Sā panesā
atk-s0201a:2650_5: lokiyāpi abhiññatthā ca pariññatthā ca vikkhambhanato pahānatthā. Lokuttarāpi abhiññatthā
atk-s0201a:2650_6: ca pariññatthā ca samucchedato pahānatthā. Tattha lokiyā kiccato asammohato ca pajānāti,
atk-s0201a:2651_0: 452. Sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyāti vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā ca maggasammādiṭṭhiyā ca. Parato
atk-s0201a:2651_1: ca ghosoti sappāyadhammassavanaṃ. Yoniso ca manasikāroti attano upāyamanasikāro.
atk-s0201a:2651_2: Tattha sāvakesu api dhammasenāpatino dve paccayā laddhuṃ vaṭṭantiyeva. Thero hi kappasatasahassādhikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2651_3: ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūretvāpi attano dhammatāya aṇumattampi kilesaṃ pajahituṃ
atk-s0201a:2651_4: nāsakkhi. “Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti assajittherato imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvāvassa paṭivedho
atk-s0201a:2651_5: jāto. Paccekabuddhānaṃ pana sabbaññubuddhānañca paratoghosakammaṃ natthi, yonisomanasikārasmiṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2652_0: Anuggahitāti laddhūpakārā. Sammādiṭṭhīti arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhi. Phalakkhaṇe nibbattā
atk-s0201a:2652_1: cetovimutti phalaṃ assāti cetovimuttiphalā. Tadeva cetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃso
atk-s0201a:2652_2: assāti cetovimuttiphalānisaṃsā. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Ettha ca catutthaphalapaññā
atk-s0201a:2652_3: paññāvimutti nāma, avasesā dhammā cetovimuttīti veditabbā. Sīlānuggahitātiādīsu sīlanti
atk-s0201a:2652_4: catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Sutanti sappāyadhammassavanaṃ. Sākacchāti kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanakathā.
atk-s0201a:2652_5: Samathoti vipassanāpādikā aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Vipassanāti sattavidhā anupassanā. Catupārisuddhisīlañhi
atk-s0201a:2652_6: pūrentassa, sappāyadhammassavanaṃ suṇantassa, kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanaṃ chindantassa,
atk-s0201a:2652_7: vipassanāpādikāsu aṭṭhasamāpattīsu kammaṃ karontassa, sattavidhaṃ anupassanaṃ bhāventassa
atk-s0201a:2653_0: Yathā hi madhuraṃ ambapakkaṃ paribhuñjitukāmo ambapotakassa samantā udakakoṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2653_1: thiraṃ katvā bandhati. Ghaṭaṃ gahetvā kālena kālaṃ udakaṃ āsiñcati. Udakassa anikkhamanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2653_2: mariyādaṃ thiraṃ karoti. Yā hoti samīpe valli vā sukkhadaṇḍako vā kipillikapuṭo vā
atk-s0201a:2653_3: makkaṭakajālaṃ vā, taṃ apaneti. Khaṇittiṃ gahetvā kālena kālaṃ mūlāni parikhaṇati.
atk-s0201a:2653_4: Evamassa appamattassa imāni pañca kāraṇāni karoto so ambo vaḍḍhitvā phalaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a:2653_5: Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Rukkhassa samantato koṭṭhakabandhanaṃ viya hi sīlaṃ
atk-s0201a:2653_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ, kālena kālaṃ udakasiñcanaṃ viya dhammassavanaṃ, mariyādāya thirabhāvakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2653_7: viya samatho, samīpe valliādīnaṃ haraṇaṃ viya kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2653_8: kālena kālaṃ khaṇittiṃ gahetvā mūlakhaṇanaṃ viya sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ bhāvanā.
atk-s0201a:2653_9: Tehi pañcahi kāraṇehi anuggahitassa ambarukkhassa madhuraphaladānakālo viya imassa
atk-s0201a:2653_10: bhikkhuno imehi pañcahi dhammehi anuggahitāya sammādiṭṭhiyā arahattaphaladānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2654_0: 453. Kati panāvuso, bhavāti idha kiṃ pucchati? Mūlameva gato anusandhi, duppañño
atk-s0201a:2654_1: yehi bhavehi na uṭṭhāti, te pucchissāmīti pucchati. Tattha kāmabhavoti kāmabhavūpagaṃ
atk-s0201a:2654_2: kammaṃ kammābhinibbattā upādinnakkhandhāpīti ubhayamekato katvā kāmabhavoti āha.
atk-s0201a:2654_3: Rūpārūpabhavesupi eseva nayo. Āyatinti anāgate. Punabbhavassa abhinibbattīti punabbhavābhinibbatti.
atk-s0201a:2654_4: Idha vaṭṭaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchati. Tatrātatrābhinandanāti rūpābhinandanā saddābhinandanāti
atk-s0201a:2654_5: evaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ abhinandanā, karaṇavacane cetaṃ paccattaṃ. Tatratatrābhinandanāya
atk-s0201a:2654_6: punabbhavābhinibbatti hotīti attho. Ettāvatā hi gamanaṃ hoti, āgamanaṃ hoti, gamanāgamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2654_7: hoti, vaṭṭaṃ vattatīti vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi. Idāni vivaṭṭaṃ pucchanto
atk-s0201a:2654_8: “kathaṃ panāvuso”tiādimāha. Tassa vissajjane avijjāvirāgāti avijjāya khayanirodhena.
atk-s0201a:2654_9: Vijjuppādāti arahattamaggavijjāya uppādena. Kiṃ avijjā pubbe niruddhā, atha vijjā
atk-s0201a:2654_10: pubbe uppannāti? Ubhayametaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Padīpujjalanena andhakāravigamo viya vijjuppādena
atk-s0201a:2654_11: avijjā niruddhāva hoti. Taṇhānirodhāti taṇhāya khayanirodhena. Punabbhavābhinibbatti
atk-s0201a:2654_12: na hotīti evaṃ āyatiṃ punabbhavassa abhinibbatti na hoti, gamanaṃ āgamanaṃ gamanāgamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2654_13: upacchijjati, vaṭṭaṃ na vattatīti vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a:2655_0: 454. Katamaṃ panāvusoti idha kiṃ pucchati? Ubhatobhāgavimutto bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ
atk-s0201a:2655_1: nirodhaṃ samāpajjati. Tassa nirodhapādakaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2655_2: Paṭhamaṃ jhānanti idha kiṃ pucchati? Nirodhaṃ samāpajjanakena bhikkhunā aṅgavavatthānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2655_3: koṭṭhāsaparicchedo nāma jānitabbo, idaṃ jhānaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2655_4: duvaṅgikanti aṅgavavatthānaṃ koṭṭhāsaparicchedaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchati. Vitakkotiādīsu
atk-s0201a:2655_5: pana abhiniropanalakkhaṇo vitakko, anumajjanalakkhaṇo vicāro, pharaṇalakkhaṇā pīti,
atk-s0201a:2655_6: sātalakkhaṇaṃ sukhaṃ, avikkhepalakkhaṇā cittekaggatāti ime pañca dhammā vattanti.
atk-s0201a:2655_7: Kataṅgavippahīnanti idha pana kiṃ pucchati? Nirodhaṃ samāpajjanakena bhikkhunā upakārānupakārāni
atk-s0201a:2655_8: aṅgāni jānitabbāni, tāni pucchissāmīti pucchati, vissajjanaṃ panettha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0201a:2655_9: Iti heṭṭhā nirodhapādakaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ gahitaṃ, upari tassa anantarapaccayaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2655_10: pucchissati. Antarā pana cha samāpattiyo saṃkhittā, nayaṃ vā dassetvā vissaṭṭhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2656_0: 455. Idāni viññāṇanissaye pañca pasāde pucchanto pañcimāni, āvusotiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2656_1: gocaravisayanti gocarabhūtaṃ visayaṃ. Aññamaññassāti cakkhu sotassa sotaṃ vā cakkhussāti
atk-s0201a:2656_2: evaṃ ekekassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhoti. Sace hi nīlādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ samodhānetvā
atk-s0201a:2656_3: sotindriyassa upaneyya, “iṅgha tāva naṃ vavatthapehi vibhāvehi, kiṃ nāmetaṃ ārammaṇa”nti.
atk-s0201a:2656_4: Cakkhuviññāṇañhi vināpi mukhena attano dhammatāya evaṃ vadeyya – “are andhabāla,
atk-s0201a:2656_5: vassasatampi vassasahassampi paridhāvamāno aññatra mayā kuhiṃ etassa jānanakaṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0201a:2656_6: āhara naṃ cakkhupasāde upanehi, ahametaṃ ārammaṇaṃ jānissāmi, yadi vā nīlaṃ yadi
atk-s0201a:2656_7: vā pītakaṃ, na hi eso aññassa visayo, mayheveso visayo”ti. Sesadvāresupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2656_8: Evametāni aññamaññassa gocaraṃ visayaṃ na paccanubhonti nāma. Kiṃ paṭisaraṇanti etesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2656_9: kiṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ, kiṃ etāni paṭisarantīti pucchati. Mano paṭisaraṇanti javanamano
atk-s0201a:2656_10: paṭisaraṇaṃ. Mano ca nesanti manodvārikajavanamano vā pañcadvārikajavanamano vā etesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2656_11: gocaravisayaṃ rajjanādivasena anubhoti. Cakkhuviññāṇañhi rūpadassanamattameva, ettha
atk-s0201a:2656_12: rajjanaṃ vā dussanaṃ vā muyhanaṃ vā natthi. Etasmiṃ pana dvāre javanaṃ rajjati vā
atk-s0201a:2656_13: dussati vā muyhati vā. Sotaviññāṇādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2657_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – pañca kira dubbalabhojakā rājānaṃ sevitvā kicchena kasirena ekasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2657_1: pañcakulike gāme parittakaṃ āyaṃ labhiṃsu. Tesaṃ tattha macchabhāgo maṃsabhāgo yuttikahāpaṇo
atk-s0201a:2657_2: vā, bandhakahāpaṇo vā, māpahārakahāpaṇo vā, aṭṭhakahāpaṇo vā, soḷasakahāpaṇo vā,
atk-s0201a:2657_3: bāttiṃsakahāpaṇo vā, catusaṭṭhikahāpaṇo vā, daṇḍoti ettakamattameva pāpuṇāti. Satavatthukaṃ
atk-s0201a:2657_4: pañcasatavatthukaṃ sahassavatthukaṃ mahābaliṃ rājāva gaṇhāti. Tattha pañcakulikagāmo
atk-s0201a:2657_5: viya pañca pasādā daṭṭhabbā; pañca dubbalabhojakā viya pañca viññāṇāni; rājā viya
atk-s0201a:2657_6: javanaṃ; dubbalabhojakānaṃ parittakaṃ āyapāpuṇanaṃ viya cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ rūpadassanādimattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2657_7: Rajjanādīni pana etesu natthi. Rañño mahābaliggahaṇaṃ viya tesu dvāresu javanassa
atk-s0201a:2658_0: 456. Pañcimāni, āvusoti idha kiṃ pucchati? Antonirodhasmiṃ pañca pasāde. Kiriyamayapavattasmiñhi
atk-s0201a:2658_1: vattamāne arūpadhammā pasādānaṃ balavapaccayā honti. Yo pana taṃ pavattaṃ nirodhetvā
atk-s0201a:2658_2: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno, tassa antonirodhe pañca pasādā kiṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhantīti
atk-s0201a:2658_3: idaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchati. Āyuṃ paṭiccāti jīvitindriyaṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhanti. Usmaṃ
atk-s0201a:2658_4: paṭiccāti jīvitindriyaṃ kammajatejaṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati. Yasmā pana kammajatejopi jīvitindriyena
atk-s0201a:2658_5: vinā na tiṭṭhati, tasmā “usmā āyuṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhatī”ti āha. Jhāyatoti jalato. Acciṃ
atk-s0201a:2658_6: paṭiccāti jālasikhaṃ paṭicca. Ābhā paññāyatīti āloko nāma paññāyati. Ābhaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0201a:2658_7: accīti taṃ ālokaṃ paṭicca jālasikhā paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:2659_0: Evameva kho, āvuso, āyu usmaṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhatīti ettha jālasikhā viya kammajatejo.
atk-s0201a:2659_1: Āloko viya jīvitindriyaṃ. Jālasikhā hi uppajjamānā ālokaṃ gahetvāva uppajjati. Sā
atk-s0201a:2659_2: tena attanā janitaālokeneva sayampi aṇu thūlā dīghā rassāti pākaṭā hoti. Tattha jālapavattiyā
atk-s0201a:2659_3: janitaālokena tassāyeva jālapavattiyā pākaṭabhāvo viya usmaṃ paṭicca nibbattena kammajamahābhūtasambhavena
atk-s0201a:2659_4: jīvitindriyena usmāya anupālanaṃ. Jīvitindriyañhi dasapi vassāni…pe… vassasatampi
atk-s0201a:2659_5: kammajatejapavattaṃ pāleti. Iti mahābhūtāni upādārūpānaṃ nissayapaccayādivasena paccayāni
atk-s0201a:2659_6: hontīti āyu usmaṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati. Jīvitindriyaṃ mahābhūtāni pāletīti usmā āyuṃ
atk-s0201a:2660_0: 457. Āyusaṅkhārāti āyumeva. Vedaniyā dhammāti vedanā dhammāva. Vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyatīti
atk-s0201a:2660_1: samāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati. Yo hi bhikkhu arūpapavatte ukkaṇṭhitvā saññañca
atk-s0201a:2660_2: vedanañca nirodhetvā nirodhaṃ samāpanno, tassa yathāparicchinnakālavasena rūpajīvitindriyapaccayā
atk-s0201a:2660_3: arūpadhammā uppajjanti. Evaṃ pana rūpārūpapavattaṃ pavattati. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā eko
atk-s0201a:2660_4: puriso jālāpavatte ukkhaṇṭhito udakena paharitvā jālaṃ appavattaṃ katvā chārikāya
atk-s0201a:2660_5: aṅgāre pidhāya tuṇhī nisīdati. Yadā panassa puna jālāya attho hoti, chārikaṃ apanetvā
atk-s0201a:2660_6: aṅgāre parivattetvā upādānaṃ datvā mukhavātaṃ vā tālavaṇṭavātaṃ vā dadāti. Atha jālāpavattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2660_7: puna pavattati. Evameva jālāpavattaṃ viya arūpadhammā. Purisassa jālāpavatte ukkaṇṭhitvā
atk-s0201a:2660_8: udakappahārena jālaṃ appavattaṃ katvā chārikāya aṅgāre pidhāya tuṇhībhūtassa nisajjā
atk-s0201a:2660_9: viya bhikkhuno arūpapavatte ukkaṇṭhitvā saññañca vedanañca nirodhetvā nirodhasamāpajjanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2660_10: Chārikāya pihitaaṅgārā viya rūpajīvitindriyaṃ. Purisassa puna jālāya atthe sati chārikāpanayanādīni
atk-s0201a:2660_11: viya bhikkhuno yathāparicchinnakālāpagamanaṃ. Aggijālāya pavatti viya puna arūpadhammesu
atk-s0201a:2661_0: Āyu usmā ca viññāṇanti rūpajīvitindriyaṃ, kammajatejodhātu, cittanti ime tayo dhammā
atk-s0201a:2661_1: yadā imaṃ rūpakāyaṃ jahanti, athāyaṃ acetanaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ viya pathaviyaṃ chaḍḍito setīti
atk-s0201a:2662: “Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
atk-s0201a:2664_0: Kāyasaṅkhārāti assāsapassāsā. Vacīsaṅkhārāti vitakkavicārā. Cittasaṅkhārāti saññāvedanā.
atk-s0201a:2664_1: Āyūti rūpajīvitindriyaṃ. Paribhinnānīti upahatāni, vinaṭṭhānīti attho. Tattha keci
atk-s0201a:2664_2: “nirodhasamāpannassa cittasaṅkhārāva niruddhā”ti vacanato cittaṃ aniruddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2664_3: tasmā sacittakā ayaṃ samāpattīti vadanti. Te vattabbā – “vacīsaṅkhārāpissa niruddhā”ti
atk-s0201a:2664_4: vacanato vācā aniruddhā hoti, tasmā nirodhaṃ samāpannena dhammampi kathentena sajjhāyampi
atk-s0201a:2664_5: karontena nisīditabbaṃ siyā. “Yo cāyaṃ mato kālaṅkato, tassāpi cittasaṅkhārā niruddhā”ti
atk-s0201a:2664_6: vacanato cittaṃ aniruddhaṃ bhaveyya, tasmā kālaṅkate mātāpitaro vā arahante vā jhāpayantena
atk-s0201a:2664_7: anantariyakammaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya. Iti byañjane abhinivesaṃ akatvā ācariyānaṃ naye
atk-s0201a:2664_8: ṭhatvā attho upaparikkhitabbo. Attho hi paṭisaraṇaṃ, na byañjanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2665_0: Indriyāni vippasannānīti kiriyamayapavattasmiñhi vattamāne bahiddhā ārammaṇesu pasāde
atk-s0201a:2665_1: ghaṭṭentesu indriyāni kilamantāni upahatāni makkhitāni viya honti, vātādīhi uṭṭhitena
atk-s0201a:2665_2: rajena catumahāpathe ṭhapitaādāso viya. Yathā pana thavikāyaṃ pakkhipitvā mañjūsādīsu
atk-s0201a:2665_3: ṭhapito ādāso antoyeva virocati, evaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannassa bhikkhuno antonirodhe
atk-s0201a:2665_4: pañca pasādā ativirocanti. Tena vuttaṃ “indriyāni vippasannānī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2666_0: 458. Kati panāvuso, paccayāti idha kiṃ pucchati? Nirodhassa anantarapaccayaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2666_1: pucchissāmīti pucchati. Vissajjane panassa sukhassa ca pahānāti cattāro apagamanapaccayā
atk-s0201a:2666_2: kathitā. Animittāyāti idha kiṃ pucchati? Nirodhato vuṭṭhānakaphalasamāpattiṃ pucchissāmīti
atk-s0201a:2666_3: pucchati. Avasesasamāpattivuṭṭhānañhi bhavaṅgena hoti, nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ pana vipassanānissandāya
atk-s0201a:2666_4: phalasamāpattiyāti tameva pucchati. Sabbanimittānanti rūpādīnaṃ sabbārammaṇānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2666_5: Animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāroti sabbanimittāpagatāya nibbānadhātuyā manasikāro.
atk-s0201a:2666_6: Phalasamāpattisahajātaṃ manasikāraṃ sandhāyāha. Iti heṭṭhā nirodhapādakaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2666_7: gahitaṃ, nirodhassa anantarapaccayaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ gahitaṃ, idha nirodhato
atk-s0201a:2667_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne nirodhakathā kathetabbā hoti. Sā, “dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tayo
atk-s0201a:2667_1: ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatāpaññā
atk-s0201a:2667_2: nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge āgatā. Visuddhimagge panassā sabbākārena
atk-s0201a:2668_0: Idāni valañjanasamāpattiṃ pucchanto kati panāvuso, paccayātiādimāha. Nirodhato hi
atk-s0201a:2668_1: vuṭṭhānakaphalasamāpattiyā ṭhiti nāma na hoti, ekaṃ dve cittavārameva pavattitvā
atk-s0201a:2668_2: bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Ayañhi bhikkhu satta divase arūpapavattaṃ nirodhetvā nisinno nirodhavuṭṭhānakaphalasamāpattiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2668_3: na ciraṃ tiṭṭhati. Valañjanasamāpattiyaṃ pana addhānaparicchedova pamāṇaṃ. Tasmā
atk-s0201a:2668_4: sā ṭhiti nāma hoti. Tenāha – “animittāya cetovimuttiyā ṭhitiyā”ti. Tassā ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2668_5: kati paccayāti attho. Vissajjane panassā pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāroti addhānaparicchedo
atk-s0201a:2668_6: vutto. Vuṭṭhānāyāti idha bhavaṅgavuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati. Vissajjanepissā sabbanimittānañca
atk-s0201a:2669_0: 459. Yā cāyaṃ, āvusoti idha kiṃ pucchati? Idha aññaṃ abhinavaṃ nāma natthi. Heṭṭhā
atk-s0201a:2669_1: kathitadhammeyeva ekato samodhānetvā pucchāmīti pucchati. Kattha pana te kathitā?
atk-s0201a:2669_2: “Nīlampi sañjānāti pītakampi, lohitakampi, odātakampi sañjānātī”ti etasmiñhi ṭhāne
atk-s0201a:2669_3: appamāṇā cetovimutti kathitā. “Natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatananti neyya”nti ettha
atk-s0201a:2669_4: ākiñcaññaṃ. “Paññācakkhunā pajānātī”ti ettha suññatā. “Kati panāvuso, paccayā animittāya
atk-s0201a:2669_5: cetovimuttiyā ṭhitiyā vuṭṭhānāyā”ti ettha animittā. Evaṃ heṭṭhā kathitāva imasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2669_6: ṭhāne ekato samodhānetvā pucchati. Taṃ pana paṭikkhipitvā etā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0201a:2669_7: niddiṭṭhāvāti vatvā aññe cattāro dhammā ekanāmakā atthi. Eko dhammo catunāmako atthi,
atk-s0201a:2669_8: etaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā kathāpetuṃ idha pucchatīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ. Tassā
atk-s0201a:2669_9: vissajjane ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, appamāṇā cetovimuttīti ayaṃ pharaṇaappamāṇatāya appamāṇā
atk-s0201a:2669_10: nāma. Ayañhi appamāṇe vā satte pharati, ekasmimpi vā satte asesetvā pharati.
atk-s0201a:2670_0: Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, ākiñcaññāti ārammaṇakiñcanassa abhāvato ākiñcaññā. Attena vāti
atk-s0201a:2670_1: atta bhāvaposapuggalādisaṅkhātena attena suññaṃ. Attaniyena vāti cīvarādiparikkhārasaṅkhātena
atk-s0201a:2670_2: attaniyena suññaṃ. Animittāti rāganimittādīnaṃ abhāveneva animittā, arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2670_3: sandhāyāha. Nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā cāti byañjanampi nesaṃ nānā atthopi. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2670_4: byañjanassa nānatā pākaṭāva. Attho pana, appamāṇā cetovimutti bhūmantarato mahaggatā
atk-s0201a:2670_5: eva hoti rūpāvacarā; ārammaṇato satta paññattiārammaṇā. Ākiñcaññā bhummantarato mahaggatā
atk-s0201a:2670_6: arūpāvacarā; ārammaṇato na vattabbārammaṇā. Suññatā bhummantarato kāmāvacarā; ārammaṇato
atk-s0201a:2670_7: saṅkhārārammaṇā. Vipassanā hi ettha suññatāti adhippetā. Animittā bhummantarato lokuttarā;
atk-s0201a:2671_0: Rāgo kho, āvuso, pamāṇakaraṇotiādīsu yathā pabbatapāde pūtipaṇṇarasaudakaṃ nāma hoti
atk-s0201a:2671_1: kāḷavaṇṇaṃ; olokentānaṃ byāmasatagambhīraṃ viya khāyati. Yaṭṭhiṃ vā rajjuṃ vā gahetvā
atk-s0201a:2671_2: minantassa piṭṭhipādottharaṇamattampi na hoti. Evamevaṃ yāva rāgādayo nuppajjanti,
atk-s0201a:2671_3: tāva puggalaṃ sañjānituṃ na sakkā honti, sotāpanno viya, sakadāgāmī viya, anāgāmī
atk-s0201a:2671_4: viya ca khāyati. Yadā panassa rāgādayo uppajjanti, tadā ratto duṭṭho mūḷhoti paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:2671_5: Iti ete “ettako aya”nti puggalassa pamāṇaṃ dassento viya uppajjantīti pamāṇakaraṇā
atk-s0201a:2671_6: nāma vuttā. Yāvatā kho, āvuso, appamāṇā cetovimuttiyoti yattakā appamāṇā cetovimuttiyo.
atk-s0201a:2671_7: Kittakā pana tā? Cattāro brahmavihārā, cattāro maggā, cattāri ca phalānīti dvādasa.
atk-s0201a:2671_8: Tattha brahmavihārā pharaṇaappamāṇatāya appamāṇā. Sesā pamāṇakaraṇānaṃ kilesānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2671_9: abhāvena appamāṇā. Nibbānampi appamāṇameva, cetovimutti pana na hoti, tasmā na gahitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2671_10: Akuppāti arahattaphalacetovimutti; sā hi tāsaṃ sabbajeṭṭhikā, tasmā aggamakkhāyatīti
atk-s0201a:2671_11: vuttā. Rāgo kho, āvuso, kiñcanoti rāgo uppajjitvā puggalaṃ kiñcati maddati palibundhati.
atk-s0201a:2671_12: Tasmā kiñcanoti vutto. Manussā kira goṇehi khalaṃ maddāpento kiñcehi kapila, kiñcehi
atk-s0201a:2671_13: kāḷakāti vadanti. Evaṃ maddanattho kiñcanatthoti veditabbo. Dosamohesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2671_14: Ākiñcaññā cetovimuttiyo nāma nava dhammā ākiñcaññāyatanañca maggaphalāni ca. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2671_15: ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ kiñcanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assa natthīti ākiñcaññaṃ. Maggaphalāni kiñcanānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2671_16: maddanānaṃ palibundhanakilesānaṃ natthitāya ākiñcaññāni. Nibbānampi ākiñcaññaṃ, cetovimutti
atk-s0201a:2671_17: pana na hoti, tasmā na gahitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2672_0: Rāgo kho, āvuso, nimittakaraṇotiādīsu yathā nāma dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ sadisā dve vacchakā
atk-s0201a:2672_1: honti. Yāva tesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na kataṃ hoti, tāva “ayaṃ asukakulassa vacchako, ayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2672_2: asukakulassā”ti na sakkā honti jānituṃ. Yadā pana tesaṃ sattisūlādīsu aññataraṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2672_3: kataṃ hoti, tadā sakkā honti jānituṃ. Evameva yāva puggalassa rāgo nuppajjati, tāva
atk-s0201a:2672_4: na sakkā hoti jānituṃ ariyo vā puthujjano vāti. Rāgo panassa uppajjamānova sarāgo
atk-s0201a:2672_5: nāma ayaṃ puggaloti sañjānananimittaṃ karonto viya uppajjati, tasmā “nimittakaraṇo”ti
atk-s0201a:2673_0: Animittā cetovimutti nāma terasa dhammā – vipassanā, cattāro āruppā, cattāro maggā,
atk-s0201a:2673_1: cattāri ca phalānīti. Tattha vipassanā niccanimittaṃ sukhanimittaṃ attanimittaṃ ugghāṭetīti
atk-s0201a:2673_2: animittā nāma. Cattāro āruppā rūpanimittassa abhāvena animittā nāma. Maggaphalāni
atk-s0201a:2673_3: nimittakaraṇānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena animittāni. Nibbānampi animittameva, taṃ pana
atk-s0201a:2673_4: cetovimutti na hoti, tasmā na gahitaṃ. Atha kasmā suññatā cetovimutti na gahitāti?
atk-s0201a:2673_5: Sā, “suññā rāgenā”tiādivacanato sabbattha anupaviṭṭhāva, tasmā visuṃ na gahitā. Ekatthāti
atk-s0201a:2673_6: ārammaṇavasena ekatthā. Appamāṇaṃ ākiñcaññaṃ suññataṃ animittanti hi sabbānetāni
atk-s0201a:2673_7: nibbānasseva nāmāni. Iti iminā pariyāyena ekatthā. Aññasmiṃ pana ṭhāne appamāṇā honti,
atk-s0201a:2673_8: aññasmiṃ ākiñcaññā aññasmiṃ suññatā aññasmiṃ animittāti iminā pariyāyena nānābyañjanā.
atk-s0201a:2677_0: 460. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷavedallasuttaṃ. Tattha visākho upāsakoti visākhoti evaṃnāmako
atk-s0201a:2677_1: upāsako. Yena dhammadinnāti yena dhammadinnā nāma bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami. Ko panāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2677_2: visākho? Kā dhammadinnā? Kasmā upasaṅkamīti? Visākho nāma dhammadinnāya gihikāle
atk-s0201a:2677_3: gharasāmiko. So yadā bhagavā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā pavattavaradhammacakko
atk-s0201a:2677_4: yasādayo kulaputte vinetvā uruvelaṃ patvā tattha jaṭilasahassaṃ vinetvā purāṇajaṭilehi
atk-s0201a:2677_5: khīṇāsavabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ gantvā buddhadassanatthaṃ dvādasanahutāya parisāya
atk-s0201a:2677_6: saddhiṃ āgatassa bimbisāramahārājassa dhammaṃ desesi. Tadā raññā saddhiṃ āgatesu
atk-s0201a:2677_7: dvādasanahutesu ekaṃ nahutaṃ upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi, ekādasa nahutāni sotāpattiphale
atk-s0201a:2677_8: patiṭṭhahiṃsu saddhiṃ raññā bimbisārena. Ayaṃ upāsako tesaṃ aññataro, tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2677_9: paṭhamadassaneva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya, puna ekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ
atk-s0201a:2677_10: patvā, tato aparabhāgepi ekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhito. So anāgāmī
atk-s0201a:2677_11: hutvā gehaṃ āgacchanto yathā aññesu divasesu ito cito ca olokento sitaṃ kurumāno
atk-s0201a:2677_12: āgacchati, evaṃ anāgantvā santindriyo santamānaso hutvā agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2678_0: Dhammadinnā sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā vīthiṃ olokayamānā tassa āgamanākāraṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a:2678_1: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti cintetvā tassa paccuggamanaṃ kurumānā sopānasīse ṭhatvā olambanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2678_2: hatthaṃ pasāresi. Upāsako attano hatthaṃ samiñjesi. Sā “pātarāsabhojanakāle jānissāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2678_3: cintesi. Upāsako pubbe tāya saddhiṃ ekato bhuñjati. Taṃ divasaṃ pana taṃ anapaloketvā
atk-s0201a:2678_4: yogāvacarabhikkhu viya ekakova bhuñji. Sā, “sāyanhakāle jānissāmī”ti cintesi. Upāsako
atk-s0201a:2678_5: taṃdivasaṃ sirigabbhaṃ na pāvisi, aññaṃ gabbhaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā kappiyamañcakaṃ paññapāpetvā
atk-s0201a:2678_6: nipajji. Upāsikā, “kiṃ nu khvassa bahiddhā patthanā atthi, udāhu kenacideva paribhedakena
atk-s0201a:2678_7: bhinno, udāhu mayheva koci doso atthī”ti balavadomanassā hutvā, “ekaṃ dve divase
atk-s0201a:2678_8: vasitakāle sakkā ñātu”nti tassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2679_0: Upāsako, “kiṃ dhammadinne akāle āgatāsī”ti pucchi. Āma ayyaputta, āgatāmhi, na tvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2679_1: yathā purāṇo, kiṃ nu te bahiddhā patthanā atthīti? Natthi dhammadinneti. Añño koci
atk-s0201a:2679_2: paribhedako atthīti? Ayampi natthīti. Evaṃ sante mayheva koci doso bhavissatīti.
atk-s0201a:2679_3: Tuyhampi doso natthīti. Atha kasmā mayā saddhiṃ yathā pakatiyā ālāpasallāpamattampi
atk-s0201a:2679_4: na karothāti? So cintesi – “ayaṃ lokuttaradhammo nāma garu bhāriyo na pakāsetatabbo,
atk-s0201a:2679_5: sace kho panāhaṃ na kathessāmi, ayaṃ hadayaṃ phāletvā ettheva kālaṃ kareyyā”ti tassānuggahatthāya
atk-s0201a:2679_6: kathesi – “dhammadinne ahaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nāma adhigato,
atk-s0201a:2679_7: taṃ adhigatassa evarūpā lokiyakiriyā na vaṭṭati. Yadi tvaṃ icchasi, tava cattālīsa
atk-s0201a:2679_8: koṭiyo mama cattālīsa koṭiyoti asītikoṭidhanaṃ atthi, ettha issarā hutvā mama mātiṭṭhāne
atk-s0201a:2679_9: vā bhaginiṭṭhāne vā ṭhatvā vasa. Tayā dinnena bhattapiṇḍamattakena ahaṃ yāpessāmi.
atk-s0201a:2679_10: Athevaṃ na karosi, ime bhoge gahetvā kulagehaṃ gaccha, athāpi te bahiddhā patthanā
atk-s0201a:2679_11: natthi, ahaṃ taṃ bhaginiṭṭhāne vā dhituṭṭhāne vā ṭhapetvā posessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2680_0: Sā cintesi – “pakatipuriso evaṃ vattā nāma natthi. Addhā etena lokuttaravaradhammo
atk-s0201a:2680_1: paṭividdho. So pana dhammo kiṃ puriseheva paṭibujjhitabbo, udāhu mātugāmopi paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0201a:2680_2: sakkotī”ti visākhaṃ etadavoca – “kiṃ nu kho eso dhammo puriseheva labhitabbo, mātugāmenapi
atk-s0201a:2680_3: sakkā laddhu”nti? Kiṃ vadesi dhammadinne, ye paṭipannakā, te etassa dāyādā, yassa
atk-s0201a:2680_4: yassa upanissayo atthi, so so etaṃ paṭilabhatīti. Evaṃ sante mayhaṃ pabbajjaṃ anujānāthāti.
atk-s0201a:2680_5: Sādhu bhadde, ahampi taṃ etasmiṃyeva magge yojetukāmo, manaṃ pana te ajānamāno na
atk-s0201a:2680_6: kathemīti tāvadeva bimbisārassa rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2681_0: Rājā, “kiṃ, gahapati, akāle āgatosī”ti pucchi. Dhammadinnā, “mahārāja, pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2681_1: vadatīti. Kiṃ panassa laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti? Aññaṃ kiñci natthi, sovaṇṇasivikaṃ deva,
atk-s0201a:2681_2: laddhuṃ vaṭṭati nagarañca paṭijaggāpetunti. Rājā sovaṇṇasivikaṃ datvā nagaraṃ paṭijaggāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2681_3: Visākho dhammadinnaṃ gandhodakena nahāpetvā sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkārāpetvā sovaṇṇasivikāya
atk-s0201a:2681_4: nisīdāpetvā ñātigaṇena parivārāpetvā gandhapupphādīhi pūjayamāno nagaravāsanaṃ karonto
atk-s0201a:2681_5: viya bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā, “dhammadinnaṃ pabbājethāyye”ti āha. Bhikkhuniyo “ekaṃ
atk-s0201a:2681_6: vā dve vā dose sahituṃ vaṭṭati gahapatī”ti āhaṃsu. Natthayye koci doso, saddhāya
atk-s0201a:2681_7: pabbajatīti. Athekā byattā therī tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā kese ohāretvā
atk-s0201a:2681_8: pabbājesi. Visākho, “abhiramayye, svākkhāto dhammo”ti vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0201a:2682_0: Tassā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya lābhasakkāro uppajji. Teneva palibuddhā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2682_1: kātuṃ okāsaṃ na labhati. Athācariya-upajjhāyatheriyo gahetvā janapadaṃ gantvā aṭṭhatiṃsāya
atk-s0201a:2682_2: ārammaṇesu cittarucitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhā, abhinīhārasampannattā
atk-s0201a:2683_0: Ito paṭṭhāya hi satasahassakappamatthake padumuttaro nāma satthā loke udapādi. Tadā
atk-s0201a:2683_1: esā ekasmiṃ kule dāsī hutvā attano kese vikkiṇitvā sujātattherassa nāma aggasāvakassa
atk-s0201a:2683_2: dānaṃ datvā patthanamakāsi. Sā tāya patthanābhinīhārasampattiyā nāticiraṃ kilamittha,
atk-s0201a:2683_3: katipāheneva arahattaṃ patvā cintesi – “ahaṃ yenatthena sāsane pabbajitā, so matthakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2683_4: patto, kiṃ me janapadavāsena, mayhaṃ ñātakāpi puññāni karissanti, bhikkhunisaṅghopi
atk-s0201a:2683_5: paccayehi na kilamissati, rājagahaṃ gacchāmī”ti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ gahetvā rājagahameva
atk-s0201a:2683_6: agamāsi. Visākho, “dhammadinnā kira āgatā”ti sutvā, “pabbajitvā nacirasseva janapadaṃ
atk-s0201a:2683_7: gatā, gantvāpi nacirasseva paccāgatā, kiṃ nu kho bhavissati, gantvā jānissāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2683_8: dutiyagamanena bhikkhuniupassayaṃ agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho visākho upāsako
atk-s0201a:2684_0: Etadavocāti etaṃ sakkāyotiādivacanaṃ avoca. Kasmā avocāti? Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “abhiramasi
atk-s0201a:2684_1: nābhiramasi, ayye”ti evaṃ pucchanaṃ nāma na paṇḍitakiccaṃ, pañcupādānakkhandhe upanetvā
atk-s0201a:2684_2: pañhaṃ pucchissāmi, pañhabyākaraṇena tassā abhiratiṃ vā anabhiratiṃ vā jānissāmīti,
atk-s0201a:2684_3: tasmā avoca. Taṃ sutvāva dhammadinnā ahaṃ, āvuso visākha, acirapabbajitā sakāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2684_4: vā parakāyaṃ vā kuto jānissāmīti vā, aññattheriyo upasaṅkamitvā pucchāti vā avatvā
atk-s0201a:2684_5: upanikkhittaṃ sampaṭicchamānā viya, ekapāsakagaṇṭhiṃ mocentī viya gahanaṭṭhāne hatthimaggaṃ
atk-s0201a:2684_6: nīharamānā viya khaggamukhena samuggaṃ vivaramānā viya ca paṭisambhidāvisaye ṭhatvā
atk-s0201a:2684_7: pañhaṃ vissajjamānā, pañca kho ime, āvuso visākha, upādānakkhandhātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0201a:2684_8: pañcāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Upādānakkhandhāti upādānānaṃ paccayabhūtā khandhāti evamādinā
atk-s0201a:2684_9: nayenettha upādānakkhandhakathā vitthāretvā kathetabbā. Sā panesā visuddhimagge vitthāritā
atk-s0201a:2684_10: evāti tattha vittāritanayeneva veditabbā. Sakkāyasamudayādīsupi yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0201a:2685_0: Idaṃ pana catusaccabyākaraṇaṃ sutvā visākho theriyā abhiratabhāvaṃ aññāsi. Yo hi
atk-s0201a:2685_1: buddhasāsane ukkaṇṭhito hoti anabhirato, so evaṃ pucchitapucchitapañhaṃ saṇḍāsena
atk-s0201a:2685_2: ekekaṃ palitaṃ gaṇhanto viya, sinerupādato vālukaṃ uddharanto viya vissajjetuṃ na
atk-s0201a:2685_3: sakkoti. Yasmā pana imāni cattāri saccāni loke candimasūriyā viya buddhasāsane pākaṭāni,
atk-s0201a:2685_4: parisamajjhe gato hi bhagavāpi mahātherāpi saccāneva pakāsenti; bhikkhusaṅghopi pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0201a:2685_5: paṭṭhāya kulaputte cattāri nāma kiṃ, cattāri ariyasaccānīti pañhaṃ uggaṇhāpeti. Ayañca
atk-s0201a:2685_6: dhammadinnā upāyakosalle ṭhitā paṇḍitā byattā nayaṃ gahetvā sutenapi kathetuṃ samatthā,
atk-s0201a:2685_7: tasmā “na sakkā etissā ettāvatā saccānaṃ paṭividdhabhāvo ñātuṃ, saccavinibbhogapañhabyākaraṇena
atk-s0201a:2685_8: sakkā ñātu”nti cintetvā heṭṭhā kathitāni dve saccāni paṭinivattetvā guḷhaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:2685_9: gaṇṭhipañhaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchanto taññeva nu kho, ayyetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2686_0: Tassa vissajjane na kho, āvuso visākha, taññeva upādānanti upādānassa saṅkhārakkhandhekadesabhāvato
atk-s0201a:2686_1: na taṃyeva upādānaṃ te pañcupādānakkhandhā, nāpi aññatra pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi
atk-s0201a:2686_2: upādānaṃ. Yadi hi taññeva siyā, rūpādisabhāvampi upādānaṃ siyā. Yadi aññatra siyā,
atk-s0201a:2686_3: parasamaye cittavippayutto anusayo viya paṇṇatti viya nibbānaṃ viya ca khandhavinimuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2686_4: vā siyā, chaṭṭho vā khandho paññapetabbo bhaveyya, tasmā evaṃ byākāsi. Tassā byākaraṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2686_5: sutvā “adhigatapatiṭṭhā aya”nti visākho niṭṭhamagamāsi. Na hi sakkā akhīṇāsavena
atk-s0201a:2686_6: asambaddhena avitthāyantena padīpasahassaṃ jālentena viya evarūpo guḷho paṭicchanno
atk-s0201a:2686_7: tilakkhaṇāhato gambhīro pañho vissajjetuṃ. Niṭṭhaṃ gantvā pana, “ayaṃ dhammadinnā
atk-s0201a:2686_8: sāsane laddhapatiṭṭhā adhigatapaṭisambhidā vesārajjappattā bhavamatthake ṭhitā mahākhīṇāsavā,
atk-s0201a:2686_9: samatthā mayhaṃ pucchitapañhaṃ kathetuṃ, idāni pana naṃ ovattikasāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti
atk-s0201a:2687_0: 461. Tassa vissajjane assutavātiādi mūlapariyāye vitthāritameva. Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti,
atk-s0201a:2687_1: “idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassati. Yaṃ rūpaṃ so ahaṃ, yo ahaṃ taṃ rūpanti rūpañca
atk-s0201a:2687_2: attañca advayaṃ samanupassati. Seyyathāpi nāma telappadīpassa jhāyato yā acci so
atk-s0201a:2687_3: vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accīti acciñca vaṇṇañca advayaṃ samanupassati. Evameva idhekacco
atk-s0201a:2687_4: rūpaṃ attato samanupassati…pe… advayaṃ samanupassatī”ti evaṃ rūpaṃ attāti diṭṭhipassanāya
atk-s0201a:2687_5: passati. Rūpavantaṃ vā attānanti arūpaṃ attāti gahetvā chāyāvantaṃ rukkhaṃ viya taṃ
atk-s0201a:2687_6: attānaṃ rūpavantaṃ samanupassati. Attani vā rūpanti arūpameva attāti gahetvā pupphasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2687_7: gandhaṃ viya attani rūpaṃ samanupassati. Rūpasmiṃ vā attānanti arūpameva attāti gahetvā
atk-s0201a:2687_8: karaṇḍāya maṇiṃ viya attānaṃ rūpasmiṃ samanupassati. Vedanaṃ attatotiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2688_0: Tattha, rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti suddharūpameva attāti kathitaṃ. Rūpavantaṃ vā
atk-s0201a:2688_1: attānaṃ, attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ. Vedanaṃ attato… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-s0201a:2688_2: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatīti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu arūpaṃ attāti kathitaṃ. Vedanāvantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2688_3: vā attānaṃ, attani vā vedanaṃ, vedanāya vā attānanti evaṃ catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2688_4: tiṇṇaṃ vasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu rūpārūpamissako attā kathito. Tattha rūpaṃ attato
atk-s0201a:2688_5: samanupassati… vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre… viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatīti imesu pañcasu
atk-s0201a:2688_6: ṭhānesu ucchedadiṭṭhi kathitā, avasesesu sassatadiṭṭhīti. Evamettha pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo,
atk-s0201a:2688_7: pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo honti. Na rūpaṃ attatoti ettha rūpaṃ attāti na samanupassati.
atk-s0201a:2688_8: Aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti pana samanupassati. Na rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ…pe… na viññāṇasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2688_9: attānanti ime pañcakkhandhe kenaci pariyāyena attato na samanupassati, sabbākārena
atk-s0201a:2689_0: Ettāvatā theriyā, “evaṃ kho, āvuso visākha, sakkāyadiṭṭhi hotī”ti evaṃ purimapañhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2689_1: vissajjentiyā ettakena gamanaṃ hoti, āgamanaṃ hoti, gamanāgamanaṃ hoti, vaṭṭaṃ vattatīti
atk-s0201a:2689_2: vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassitaṃ. Evaṃ kho, āvuso visākha, sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotīti
atk-s0201a:2689_3: pacchimaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjentiyā ettakena gamanaṃ na hoti, āgamanaṃ na hoti, gamanāgamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2689_4: na hoti, vaṭṭaṃ nāma na vattatīti vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2690_0: 462. Katamo panāyye, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti ayaṃ pañho theriyā paṭipucchitvā vissajjetabbo
atk-s0201a:2690_1: bhaveyya – “upāsaka, tayā heṭṭhā maggo pucchito, idha kasmā maggameva pucchasī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2690_2: Sā pana attano byattatāya paṇḍiccena tassa adhippāyaṃ sallakkhesi – “iminā upāsakena
atk-s0201a:2690_3: heṭṭhā paṭipattivasena maggo pucchito bhavissati, idha pana taṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatalokiyalokuttarasaṅgahitāsaṅgahitavasena
atk-s0201a:2690_4: pucchitukāmo bhavissatī”ti. Tasmā appaṭipucchitvāva yaṃ yaṃ pucchi, taṃ taṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0201a:2690_5: Tattha saṅkhatoti cetito kappito pakappito āyūhito kato nibbattito samāpajjantena
atk-s0201a:2690_6: samāpajjitabbo. Tīhi ca kho, āvuso visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahitoti
atk-s0201a:2690_7: ettha yasmā maggo sappadeso, tayo khandhā nippadesā, tasmā ayaṃ sappadesattā nagaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2690_8: viya rajjena nippadesehi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito. Tattha sammāvācādayo tayo sīlameva,
atk-s0201a:2690_9: tasmā te sajātito sīlakkhandhena saṅgahitāti. Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṃ sīlakkhandheti bhummena
atk-s0201a:2690_10: viya niddeso kato, attho pana karaṇavasena veditabbo. Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi
atk-s0201a:2690_11: attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ na sakkoti. Vīriye pana paggahakiccaṃ
atk-s0201a:2690_12: sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhūpakāro hutvā sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2691_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – yathā hi “nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu
atk-s0201a:2691_1: eko supupphitaṃ campakarukkhaṃ disvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0201a:2691_2: Athassa dutiyo onamitvā piṭṭhiṃ dadeyya, so tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2691_3: na sakkuṇeyya. Athassa itaro aṃsakūṭaṃ upanāmeyya, so ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa
atk-s0201a:2691_4: aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷeyya. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ
atk-s0201a:2691_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekato uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyakā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo
atk-s0201a:2691_6: tayo dhammā. Supupphitacampako viya ārammaṇaṃ. Hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0201a:2691_7: viya attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ asakkonto samādhi. Piṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2691_8: datvā onatasahāyo viya vāyāmo. Aṃsakūṭaṃ datvā ṭhitasahāyo viya sati. Yathā tesu
atk-s0201a:2691_9: ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2691_10: sakkoti, evamevaṃ vīriye paggahakiccaṃ sādhente, satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā
atk-s0201a:2691_11: laddhupakāro samādhi sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ. Tasmā samādhiyevettha
atk-s0201a:2691_12: sajātito samādhikkhandhena saṅgahito. Vāyāmasatiyo pana kiriyato saṅgahitā honti.
atk-s0201a:2692_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2692_1: nicchetuṃ na sakkoti, vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṃ? Yathā
atk-s0201a:2692_2: hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhudaleneva
atk-s0201a:2692_3: parivattetuṃ sakkoti, aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2692_4: Evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ sakkoti, abhiniropanalakkhaṇena
atk-s0201a:2692_5: pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena viya ca ādāyā
atk-s0201a:2692_6: dinnameva vinicchetuṃ sakkoti. Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito paññākkhandhena
atk-s0201a:2692_7: saṅgahitā. Sammāsaṅkappo pana kiriyato saṅgahito hoti. Iti imehi tīhi khandhehi maggo
atk-s0201a:2692_8: saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Tena vuttaṃ – “tīhi ca kho, āvuso visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito”ti.
atk-s0201a:2693_0: Idāni ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ maggasamādhiṃ sanimittaṃ saparikkhāraṃ pucchanto, katamo
atk-s0201a:2693_1: panāyyetiādimāha. Tassa vissajjane cattāro satipaṭṭhānā maggakkhaṇe catukiccasādhanavasena
atk-s0201a:2693_2: uppannā sati, sā samādhissa paccayatthena nimittaṃ. Cattāro sammappadhānā catukiccasādhanavaseneva
atk-s0201a:2693_3: uppannaṃ vīriyaṃ, taṃ parivāraṭṭhena parikkhāro hoti. Tesaṃyeva dhammānanti tesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2694_0: Vitaṇḍavādī pana, “ekacittakkhaṇiko nāma maggo natthi, ‘evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī’ti
atk-s0201a:2694_1: hi vacanato sattapi vassāni maggabhāvanā hoti, kilesā pana lahu chijjantā sattahi
atk-s0201a:2694_2: ñāṇehi chijjantī”ti vadati. So “suttaṃ āharā”ti vattabbo. Addhā aññaṃ apassanto,
atk-s0201a:2694_3: “yā tesaṃyeva dhammānaṃ āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkamma”nti idameva suttaṃ āharitvā,
atk-s0201a:2694_4: “aññena cittena āsevati, aññena bhāveti, aññena bahulīkarotī”ti vakkhati. Tato vattabbo
atk-s0201a:2694_5: – “kiṃ panidaṃ, suttaṃ neyyatthaṃ nītattha”nti. Tato vakkhati – “nītatthaṃ yathā
atk-s0201a:2694_6: suttaṃ tatheva attho”ti. Tassa idaṃ uttaraṃ – evaṃ sante ekaṃ cittaṃ āsevamānaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2694_7: aparampi āsevamānaṃ, aparampi āsevamānanti evaṃ divasampi āsevanāva bhavissati, kuto
atk-s0201a:2694_8: bhāvanā, kuto bahulīkammaṃ? Ekaṃ vā bhāvayamānaṃ uppannaṃ aparampi bhāvayamānaṃ aparampi
atk-s0201a:2694_9: bhāvayamānanti evaṃ divasampi bhāvanāva bhavissati, kuto āsevanā kuto bahulīkammaṃ?
atk-s0201a:2694_10: Ekaṃ vā bahulīkarontaṃ uppannaṃ, aparampi bahulīkarontaṃ, aparampi bahulīkarontanti
atk-s0201a:2694_11: evaṃ divasampi bahulīkammameva bhavissati kuto āsevanā, kuto bhāvanāti.
atk-s0201a:2695_0: Atha vā evaṃ vadeyya – “ekena cittena āsevati, dvīhi bhāveti, tīhi bahulīkaroti.
atk-s0201a:2695_1: Dvīhi vā āsevati, tīhi bhāveti, ekena bahulīkaroti. Tīhi vā āsevati, ekena bhāveti,
atk-s0201a:2695_2: dvīhi bahulīkarotī”ti. So vattabbo – “mā suttaṃ me laddhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā avaca.
atk-s0201a:2695_3: Pañhaṃ vissajjentena nāma ācariyassa santike vasitvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā attharasaṃ
atk-s0201a:2695_4: viditvā vattabbaṃ hoti. Ekacittakkhaṇikāva ayaṃ āsevanā, ekacittakkhaṇikā bhāvanā,
atk-s0201a:2695_6: natthi, ‘ekacittakkhaṇikoyevā’ti saññāpetabbo. Sace sañjānāti, sañjānātu, no ce sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a:2695_7: gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī”ti uyyojetabbo.
atk-s0201a:2696_0: 463. Kati panāyye saṅkhārāti idha kiṃ pucchati? Ye saṅkhāre nirodhetvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0201a:2696_1: te pucchissāmīti pucchati. Tenevassa adhippāyaṃ ñatvā therī, puññābhisaṅkhārādīsu
atk-s0201a:2696_2: anekesu saṅkhāresu vijjamānesupi, kāyasaṅkhārādayova ācikkhantī, tayome, āvusotiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2696_3: Tattha kāyapaṭibaddhattā kāyena saṅkharīyati karīyati nibbattīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāro.
atk-s0201a:2696_4: Vācaṃ saṅkharoti karoti nibbattetīti vacīsaṅkhāro. Cittapaṭibaddhattā cittena saṅkharīyati
atk-s0201a:2696_5: karīyati nibbattīyatīti cittasaṅkhāro. Katamo panāyyeti idha kiṃ pucchati? Ime saṅkhārā
atk-s0201a:2696_6: aññamaññamissā āluḷitā avibhūtā duddīpanā. Tathā hi, kāyadvāre ādānagahaṇamuñcanacopanāni
atk-s0201a:2696_7: pāpetvā uppannā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā dvādasa akusalacetanāti evaṃ kusalākusalā
atk-s0201a:2696_8: vīsati cetanāpi assāsapassāsāpi kāyasaṅkhārātveva vuccanti. Vacīdvāre hanusaṃcopanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2696_9: vacībhedaṃ pāpetvā uppannā vuttappakārāva vīsati cetanāpi vitakkavicārāpi vacīsaṅkhārotveva
atk-s0201a:2696_10: vuccanti. Kāyavacīdvāresu copanaṃ apattā raho nisinnassa cintayato uppannā kusalākusalā
atk-s0201a:2696_11: ekūnatiṃsa cetanāpi saññā ca vedanā cāti ime dve dhammāpi cittasaṅkhārotveva vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:2696_12: Evaṃ ime saṅkhārā aññamaññamissā āluḷitā avibhūtā duddīpanā. Te pākaṭe vibhūte katvā
atk-s0201a:2697_0: Kasmā panāyyeti idha kāyasaṅkhārādināmassa padatthaṃ pucchati. Tassa vissajjane kāyappaṭibaddhāti
atk-s0201a:2697_1: kāyanissitā, kāye sati honti, asati na honti. Cittappaṭibaddhāti cittanissitā, citte
atk-s0201a:2698_0: 464. Idāni kiṃ nu kho esā saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ valañjeti, na valañjeti. Ciṇṇavasī
atk-s0201a:2698_1: vā tattha no ciṇṇavasīti jānanatthaṃ pucchanto, kathaṃ panāyye, saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti
atk-s0201a:2698_2: hotītiādimāha. Tassa vissajjane samāpajjissanti vā samāpajjāmīti vā padadvayena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattikālo
atk-s0201a:2698_3: kathito. Samāpannoti padena antonirodho. Tathā purimehi dvīhi padehi sacittakakālo
atk-s0201a:2698_4: kathito, pacchimena acittakakālo. Pubbeva tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotīti nirodhasamāpattito
atk-s0201a:2698_5: pubbe addhānaparicchedakāleyeva, ettakaṃ kālaṃ acittako bhavissāmīti addhānaparicchedacittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2698_6: bhāvitaṃ hoti. Yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetīti yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0201a:2699_0: Paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati vacīsaṅkhāroti sesasaṅkhārehi paṭhamaṃ dutiyajjhāneyeva nirujjhati.
atk-s0201a:2699_1: Tato kāyasaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne nirujjhati. Tato cittasaṅkhāroti
atk-s0201a:2699_2: tato paraṃ cittasaṅkhāro antonirodhe nirujjhati. Vuṭṭhahissanti vā vuṭṭhahāmīti vā
atk-s0201a:2699_3: padadvayena antonirodhakālo kathito. Vuṭṭhitoti padena phalasamāpattikālo. Tathā
atk-s0201a:2699_4: purimehi dvīhi padehi acittakakālo kathito, pacchimena sacittakakālo. Pubbeva tathā
atk-s0201a:2699_5: cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotīti nirodhasamāpattito pubbe addhānaparicchedakāleyeva ettakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2699_6: kālaṃ acittako hutvā tato paraṃ sacittako bhavissāmīti addhānaparicchedacittaṃ bhāvitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2699_7: hoti. Yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetīti yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ puggalaṃ tathattāya
atk-s0201a:2699_8: sacittakabhāvāya upaneti. Iti heṭṭhā nirodhasamāpajjanakālo gahito, idha nirodhato vuṭṭhānakālo.
atk-s0201a:2700_0: Idāni nirodhakathaṃ kathetuṃ vāroti nirodhakathā kathetabbā siyā, sā panesā, “dvīhi
atk-s0201a:2700_1: balehi samannāgatattā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi
atk-s0201a:2700_2: navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatāpaññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2700_3: sabbākārena visuddhimagge kathitā. Tasmā tattha kathitanayeneva gahetabbā. Ko panāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2700_4: nirodho nāma? Catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭisaṅkhā appavatti. Atha kimatthametaṃ samāpajjantīti.
atk-s0201a:2700_5: Saṅkhārānaṃ pavatte ukkaṇṭhitā sattāhaṃ acittakā hutvā sukhaṃ viharissāma, diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2701_0: Paṭhamaṃ uppajjati cittasaṅkhāroti nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa hi phalasamāpatticittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2701_1: paṭhamaṃ uppajjati. Taṃsampayuttaṃ saññañca vedanañca sandhāya, “paṭhamaṃ uppajjati
atk-s0201a:2701_2: cittasaṅkhāro”ti āha. Tato kāyasaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ bhavaṅgasamaye kāyasaṅkhāro
atk-s0201a:2701_3: uppajjati. Kiṃ pana phalasamāpatti assāsapassāse na samuṭṭhāpetīti? Samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0201a:2701_4: Imassa pana catutthajjhānikā phalasamāpatti, sā na samuṭṭhāpeti. Kiṃ vā etena phalasamāpatti
atk-s0201a:2701_5: paṭhamajjhānikā vā hotu, dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānikā vā, santāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa
atk-s0201a:2701_6: bhikkhuno assāsapassāsā abbohārikā honti. Tesaṃ abbohārikabhāvo sañjīvattheravatthunā
atk-s0201a:2701_7: veditabbo. Sañjīvattherassa hi samāpattito vuṭṭhāya kiṃsukapupphasadise vītaccitaṅgāre
atk-s0201a:2701_8: maddamānassa gacchato cīvare aṃsumattampi na jhāyi, usumākāramattampi nāhosi, samāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0201a:2701_9: nāmetanti vadanti. Evamevaṃ santāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa bhikkhuno assāsapassāsā
atk-s0201a:2702_0: Tato vacīsaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ kiriyamayapavattavaḷañjanakāle vacīsaṅkhāro uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:2702_1: Kiṃ bhavaṅgaṃ vitakkavicāre na samuṭṭhāpetīti? Samuṭṭhāpeti. Taṃsamuṭṭhānā pana vitakkavicārā
atk-s0201a:2702_2: vācaṃ abhisaṅkhātuṃ na sakkontīti kiriyamayapavattavaḷañjanakālenevataṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2702_3: Suññato phassotiādayo saguṇenāpi ārammaṇenāpi kathetabbā. Saguṇena tāva suññatā nāma
atk-s0201a:2702_4: phalasamāpatti, tāya sahajātaṃ phassaṃ sandhāya suññato phassoti vuttaṃ. Animittāpaṇihitesupieseva
atk-s0201a:2702_5: nayo. Ārammaṇena pana nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi suññattā suññaṃ nāma, rāganimittādīnaṃ abhāvā
atk-s0201a:2702_6: animittaṃ, rāgadosamohappaṇidhīnaṃ abhāvā appaṇihitaṃ. Suññataṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2702_7: katvā uppannaphalasamāpattiyaṃ phasso suññato nāma. Animittāpaṇihitesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2703_0: Aparā āgamaniyakathā nāma hoti, suññatā, animittā, appaṇihitāti hi vipassanāpi vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2703_1: Tattha yo bhikkhu saṅkhāre aniccato pariggahetvā aniccato disvā aniccato vuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:2703_2: tassa vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā animittā nāma hoti. Yo dukkhato pariggahetvā dukkhato
atk-s0201a:2703_3: disvā dukkhato vuṭṭhāti, tassa appaṇihitā nāma. Yo anattato pariggahetvā anattato
atk-s0201a:2703_4: disvā anattato vuṭṭhāti, tassa suññatā nāma. Tattha animittavipassanāya maggo animitto
atk-s0201a:2703_5: nāma, animittamaggassa phalaṃ animittaṃ nāma. Animittaphalasamāpattisahajāte phasse
atk-s0201a:2703_6: phusante animitto phasso phusatīti vuccati. Appaṇihitasuññatesupi eseva nayo. Āgamaniyena
atk-s0201a:2703_7: kathite pana suññato vā phasso animitto vā phasso appaṇihito vā phassoti vikappo
atk-s0201a:2703_8: āpajjeyya, tasmā saguṇena ceva ārammaṇena ca kathetabbaṃ. Evañhi tayo phassā phusantīti sameti.
atk-s0201a:2704_0: Vivekaninnantiādīsu nibbānaṃ viveko nāma, tasmiṃ viveke ninnaṃ onatanti vivekaninnaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2704_1: Aññato āgantvā yena viveko, tena vaṅkaṃ viya hutvā ṭhitanti vivekapoṇaṃ. Yena viveko,
atk-s0201a:2705_0: 465. Idāni yā vedanā nirodhetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, tā pucchissāmīti pucchanto
atk-s0201a:2705_1: kati panāyye, vedanāti āha. Kāyikaṃ vātiādīsu pañcadvārikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a:2705_2: manodvārikaṃ cetasikaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Tattha sukhanti sabhāvaniddeso. Sātanti
atk-s0201a:2705_3: tasseva madhurabhāvadīpakaṃ vevacanaṃ. Vedayitanti vedayitabhāvadīpakaṃ, sabbavedanānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2705_4: sādhāraṇavacanaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhātiādīsu sukhāya
atk-s0201a:2705_5: vedanāya atthibhāvo sukhaṃ, natthibhāvo dukkhaṃ. Dukkhāya vedanāya atthibhāvo dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2705_6: natthibhāvo sukhaṃ. Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya jānanabhāvo sukhaṃ, ajānanabhāvo dukkhanti attho.
atk-s0201a:2706_0: Kiṃ anusayo anusetīti katamo anusayo anuseti. Appahīnaṭṭhena sayito viya hotīti anusayapucchaṃ
atk-s0201a:2706_1: pucchati. Na kho, āvuso visākha, sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetīti na
atk-s0201a:2706_2: sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti. Na sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya so appahīno,
atk-s0201a:2706_3: na sabbaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārabbha uppajjatīti attho. Esa nayo sabbattha. Kiṃ pahātabbanti
atk-s0201a:2707_0: Rāgaṃ tena pajahatīti ettha ekeneva byākaraṇena dve pucchā vissajjesi. Idha bhikkhu
atk-s0201a:2707_1: rāgānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjati, jhānavikkhambhitaṃ rāgānusayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2707_2: tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmimaggena samugghāteti. So
atk-s0201a:2707_3: anāgāmimaggena pahīnopi tathā vikkhambhitattāva paṭhamajjhāne nānuseti nāma. Tenāha
atk-s0201a:2707_4: – “na tattha rāgānusayo anusetī”ti. Tadāyatananti taṃ āyatanaṃ, paramassāsabhāvena
atk-s0201a:2707_5: patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ arahattanti attho. Iti anuttaresūti evaṃ anuttarā vimokkhāti laddhanāme
atk-s0201a:2707_6: arahatte. Pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayatoti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa. Uppajjati pihāpaccayā domanassanti
atk-s0201a:2707_7: patthanāya paṭṭhapanamūlakaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati. Taṃ panetaṃ na patthanāya paṭṭhapanamūlakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2707_8: uppajjati, patthetvā alabhantassa pana alābhamūlakaṃ uppajjamānaṃ, “uppajjati pihāpaccayā”ti
atk-s0201a:2707_9: vuttaṃ. Tattha kiñcāpi domanassaṃ nāma ekantena akusalaṃ, idaṃ pana sevitabbaṃ domanassaṃ
atk-s0201a:2707_10: vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Yogino hi temāsikaṃ chamāsikaṃ vā navamāsikaṃ vā paṭipadaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a:2707_11: Tesu yo taṃ taṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā antokālaparicchedeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti
atk-s0201a:2707_12: ghaṭento vāyamanto na sakkoti yathāparicchinnakālena pāpuṇituṃ, tassa balavadomanassaṃ
atk-s0201a:2707_13: uppajjati, āḷindikavāsimahāphussadevattherassa viya assudhārā pavattanti. Thero kira
atk-s0201a:2707_14: ekūnavīsativassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūresi. Tassa, “imasmiṃ vāre arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2707_15: imasmiṃ vāre visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāressāmī”ti mānasaṃ bandhitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontasseva
atk-s0201a:2707_16: ekūnavīsativassāni atikkantāni. Pavāraṇādivase āgate therassa assupātena muttadivaso
atk-s0201a:2707_17: nāma nāhosi. Vīsatime pana vasse arahattaṃ pāṇuṇi.
atk-s0201a:2708_0: Paṭighaṃ tena pajahatīti ettha domanasseneva paṭighaṃ pajahati. Na hi paṭigheneva
atk-s0201a:2708_1: paṭighappahānaṃ, domanassena vā domanassappahānaṃ nāma atthi. Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu temāsikādīsu
atk-s0201a:2708_2: aññataraṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā iti paṭisañcikkhati – “passa bhikkhu, kiṃ tuyhaṃ sīlena
atk-s0201a:2708_3: hīnaṭṭhānaṃ atthi, udāhu vīriyena, udāhu paññāya, nanu te sīlaṃ suparisuddhaṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2708_4: supaggahitaṃ paññā sūrā hutvā vahatī”ti. So evaṃ paṭisañcikkhitvā, “na dāni puna
atk-s0201a:2708_5: imassa domanassassa uppajjituṃ dassāmī”ti vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā antotemāse vā antochamāse
atk-s0201a:2708_6: vā antonavamāse vā anāgāmimaggena taṃ samugghāteti. Iminā pariyāyena paṭigheneva
atk-s0201a:2709_0: Na tattha paṭighānusayo anusetīti tattha evarūpe domanasse paṭighānusayo nānuseti.
atk-s0201a:2709_1: Na taṃ ārabbha uppajjati, pahīnova tattha paṭighānusayoti attho. Avijjaṃ tena pajahatīti
atk-s0201a:2709_2: idha bhikkhu avijjānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjati, jhānavikkhambhitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2709_3: avijjānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattamaggena samugghāteti.
atk-s0201a:2709_4: So arahattamaggena pahīnopi tathā vikkhambhitattāva catutthajjhāne nānuseti nāma.
atk-s0201a:2710_0: 466. Idāni paṭibhāgapucchaṃ pucchanto sukhāya panāyyetiādimāha. Tassa vissajjane
atk-s0201a:2710_1: yasmā sukhassa dukkhaṃ, dukkhassa ca sukhaṃ paccanīkaṃ, tasmā dvīsu vedanāsu visabhāgapaṭibhāgo
atk-s0201a:2710_2: kathito. Upekkhā pana andhakārā avibhūtā duddīpanā, avijjāpi tādisāvāti tenettha
atk-s0201a:2710_3: sabhāgapaṭibhāgo kathito. Yattakesu pana ṭhānesu avijjā tamaṃ karoti, tattakesu vijjā
atk-s0201a:2710_4: tamaṃ vinodetīti visabhāgapaṭibhāgo kathito. Avijjāya kho, āvusoti ettha ubhopete
atk-s0201a:2710_5: dhammā anāsavā lokuttarāti sabhāgapaṭibhāgova kathito. Vimuttiyā kho, āvusoti ettha
atk-s0201a:2710_6: anāsavaṭṭhena lokuttaraṭṭhena abyākataṭṭhena ca sabhāgapaṭibhāgova kathito. Accayāsīti
atk-s0201a:2710_7: ettha pañhaṃ atikkamitvā gatosīti attho. Nāsakkhi pañhānaṃ pariyantaṃ gahetunti pañhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2710_8: paricchedapamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi, appaṭibhāgadhammassa paṭibhāgaṃ pucchi. Nibbānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2710_9: nāmetaṃ appaṭibhāgaṃ, na sakkā nīlaṃ vā pītakaṃ vāti kenaci dhammena saddhiṃ paṭibhāgaṃ
atk-s0201a:2710_10: katvā dassetuṃ. Tañca tvaṃ iminā adhippāyena pucchasīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2711_0: Ettāvatā cāyaṃ upāsako yathā nāma sattame ghare salākabhattaṃ labhitvā gato bhikkhu
atk-s0201a:2711_1: satta gharāni atikkamma aṭṭhamassa dvāre ṭhito sabbānipi satta gehāni viraddhova
atk-s0201a:2711_2: na aññāsi, evamevaṃ appaṭibhāgadhammassa paṭibhāgaṃ pucchanto sabbāsupi sattasu sappaṭibhāgapucchāsu
atk-s0201a:2711_3: viraddhova hotīti veditabbo. Nibbānogadhanti nibbānabbhantaraṃ nibbānaṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2711_4: Nibbānaparāyananti nibbānaṃ paraṃ ayanamassa parā gati, na tato paraṃ gacchatīti
atk-s0201a:2711_5: attho. Nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṃ avasānaṃ assāti nibbānapariyosānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2712_0: 467. Paṇḍitāti paṇḍiccena samannāgatā, dhātukusalā āyatanakusalā paṭiccasamuppādakusalā
atk-s0201a:2712_1: ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalāti attho. Mahāpaññāti mahante atthe mahante dhamme mahantā niruttiyo
atk-s0201a:2712_2: mahantāni paṭibhānāni pariggaṇhanasamatthāya paññāya samannāgatā. Yathā taṃ dhammadinnāyāti
atk-s0201a:2712_3: yathā dhammadinnāya bhikkhuniyā byākataṃ, ahampi taṃ evamevaṃ byākareyyanti. Ettāvatā
atk-s0201a:2712_4: ca pana ayaṃ suttanto jinabhāsito nāma jāto, na sāvakabhāsito. Yathā hi rājayuttehi
atk-s0201a:2712_5: likhitaṃ paṇṇaṃ yāva rājamuddikāya na lañchitaṃ hoti, na tāva rājapaṇṇanti saṅkhyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2712_6: gacchati; lañchitamattaṃ pana rājapaṇṇaṃ nāma hoti, tathā, “ahampi taṃ evameva byākareyya”nti
atk-s0201a:2712_7: imāya jinavacanamuddikāya lañchitattā ayaṃ suttanto āhaccavacanena jinabhāsito nāma
atk-s0201a:2716_0: 468. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷadhammasamādānasuttaṃ. Tattha dhammasamādānānīti dhammoti
atk-s0201a:2716_1: gahitagahaṇāni. Paccuppannasukhanti paccuppanne sukhaṃ, āyūhanakkhaṇe sukhaṃ sukaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2716_2: sukhena sakkā pūretuṃ. Āyatiṃ dukkhavipākanti anāgate vipākakāle dukkhavipākaṃ. Iminā
atk-s0201a:2717_0: 469. Natthi kāmesu dosoti vatthukāmesupi kilesakāmesupi doso natthi. Pātabyataṃ āpajjantīti
atk-s0201a:2717_1: te vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena pātabyataṃ pivitabbataṃ, yathāruci paribhuñjitabbataṃ
atk-s0201a:2717_2: āpajjantīti attho. Moḷibaddhāhīti moḷiṃ katvā baddhakesāhi. Paribbājikāhīti tāpasaparibbājikāhi.
atk-s0201a:2717_3: Evamāhaṃsūti evaṃ vadanti. Pariññaṃ paññapentīti pahānaṃ samatikkamaṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0201a:2717_4: Māluvāsipāṭikāti dīghasaṇṭhānaṃ māluvāpakkaṃ. Phaleyyāti ātapena sussitvā bhijjeyya.
atk-s0201a:2717_5: Sālamūleti sālarukkhassa samīpe. Santāsaṃ āpajjeyyāti kasmā āpajjati? Bhavanavināsabhayā.
atk-s0201a:2717_6: Rukkhamūle patitamāluvābījato hi latā uppajjitvā rukkhaṃ abhiruhati. Sā mahāpattā
atk-s0201a:2717_7: ceva hoti bahupattā ca, koviḷārapattasadisehi pattehi samannāgatā. Atha taṃ rukkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2717_8: mūlato paṭṭhāya vinandhamānā sabbaviṭapāni sañchādetvā mahantaṃ bhāraṃ janetvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:2717_9: Sā vāte vā vāyante deve vā vassante oghanaṃ janetvā tassa rukkhassa sabbasākhāpasākhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2717_10: bhañjati, bhūmiyaṃ nipāteti. Tato tasmiṃ rukkhe patiṭṭhitavimānaṃ bhijjati nassati.
atk-s0201a:2718_0: Ārāmadevatāti tattha tattha pupphārāmaphalārāmesu adhivatthā devatā. Vanadevatāti
atk-s0201a:2718_1: andhavanasubhagavanādīsu vanesu adhivatthā devatā. Rukkhadevatāti abhilakkhitesu
atk-s0201a:2718_2: naḷerupucimandādīsu rukkhesu adhivatthā devatā. Osadhitiṇavanappatīsūti harītakīāmalakīādīsu
atk-s0201a:2718_3: osadhīsu tālanāḷikerādīsu tiṇesu vanajeṭṭhakesu ca vanappatirukkhesu adhivatthā devatā.
atk-s0201a:2718_4: Vanakammikāti vane kasanalāyanadāruāharaṇagorakkhādīsu kenacideva kammena vā vicarakamanussā.
atk-s0201a:2718_5: Uddhareyyunti khādeyyuṃ. Vilambinīti vātena pahatapahataṭṭhānesu keḷiṃ karontī viya
atk-s0201a:2718_6: vilambantī. Sukho imissāti evarūpāya māluvālatāya samphassopi sukho, dassanampi sukhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2718_7: Ayaṃ me dārakānaṃ āpānamaṇḍalaṃ bhavissati, kīḷābhūmi bhavissati, dutiyaṃ me vimānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2718_8: paṭiladdhanti latāya dassanepi samphassepi somanassajātā evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2719_0: Viṭabhiṃ kareyyāti sākhānaṃ upari chattākārena tiṭṭheyya. Oghanaṃ janeyyāti heṭṭhā
atk-s0201a:2719_1: ghanaṃ janeyya. Upari āruyha sakalaṃ rukkhaṃ paliveṭhetvā puna heṭṭhā bhassamānā
atk-s0201a:2719_2: bhūmiṃ gaṇheyyāti attho. Padāleyyāti evaṃ oghanaṃ katvā puna tato paṭṭhāya yāva mūlā
atk-s0201a:2719_3: otiṇṇasākhāhi abhiruhamānā sabbasākhā paliveṭhentī matthakaṃ patvā teneva niyāmena
atk-s0201a:2719_4: puna orohitvā ca abhiruhitvā ca sakalarukkhaṃ saṃsibbitvā ajjhottharantī sabbasākhā
atk-s0201a:2719_5: heṭṭhā katvā sayaṃ upari ṭhatvā vāte vā vāyante deve vā vassante padāleyya. Bhindeyyāti
atk-s0201a:2719_6: attho. Khāṇumattameva tiṭṭheyya, tattha yaṃ sākhaṭṭhakavimānaṃ hoti, taṃ sākhāsu
atk-s0201a:2719_7: bhijjamānāsu tattha tattheva bhijjitvā sabbasākhāsu bhinnāsu sabbaṃ bhijjati. Rukkhaṭṭhakavimānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2719_8: pana yāva rukkhassa mūlamattampi tiṭṭhati, tāva na nassati. Idaṃ pana vimānaṃ sākhaṭṭhakaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2719_9: tasmā sabbasākhāsu saṃbhijjamānāsu bhijjittha. Devatā puttake gahetvā khāṇuke ṭhitā
atk-s0201a:2720_0: 471. Tibbarāgajātikoti bahalarāgasabhāvo. Rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti
atk-s0201a:2720_1: tibbarāgajātikattā diṭṭhe diṭṭhe ārammaṇe nimittaṃ gaṇhāti. Athassa ācariyupajjhāyā
atk-s0201a:2720_2: daṇḍakammaṃ āṇāpenti. So abhikkhaṇaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ karonto dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti,
atk-s0201a:2720_3: natveva vītikkamaṃ karoti. Tibbadosajātikoti appamattikeneva kuppati, daharasāmaṇerehi
atk-s0201a:2720_4: saddhiṃ hatthaparāmāsādīni karontova katheti. Sopi daṇḍakammapaccayā dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ
atk-s0201a:2720_5: paṭisaṃvedeti. Mohajātiko pana idha kataṃ vā katato akataṃ vā akatato na sallakkheti,
atk-s0201a:2720_6: tāni tāni kiccāni virādheti. Sopi daṇḍakammapaccayā dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
atk-s0201a:2721_0: 472. Na tibbarāgajātikotiādīni vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbāni. Kasmā panettha
atk-s0201a:2721_1: koci tibbarāgādijātiko hoti, koci na tibbarāgādijātiko? Kammaniyāmena. Yassa hi kammāyūhanakkhaṇe
atk-s0201a:2721_2: lobho balavā hoti, alobho mando, adosāmohā balavanto, dosamohā mandā, tassa mando
atk-s0201a:2721_3: alobho lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti, adosāmohā pana balavanto dosamohe pariyādātuṃ
atk-s0201a:2721_4: sakkonti. Tasmā so tena kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto luddho hoti, sukhasīlo
atk-s0201a:2722_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhadosā balavanto honti, alobhādosā mandā, amoho balavā,
atk-s0201a:2722_1: moho mando, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca, paññavā pana hoti vajirūpamañāṇo
atk-s0201a:2723: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhādosamohā balavanto honti, itare mandā, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti dandho ca, sukhasīlako pana hoti akkodhano.
atk-s0201a:2724: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi lobhadosamohā balavanto honti, alobhādayo mandā, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca.
atk-s0201a:2725: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosamohā balavanto honti, itare mandā, so purimanayeneva appakileso hoti, dibbārammaṇampi disvā niccalo, duṭṭho pana hoti dandhapañño ca.
atk-s0201a:2726: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhādosamohā balavanto honti, itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti sukhasīlako ca, mūḷho pana hoti.
atk-s0201a:2727: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosāmohā balavanto honti, itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti paññavā ca, duṭṭho pana hoti kodhano.
atk-s0201a:2728: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi alobhādayo balavanto honti, lobhādayo mandā, so mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero viya aluddho aduṭṭho paññavā ca hoti.
atk-s0201a:2733_0: 473. Evaṃ me suttanti mahādhammasamādānasuttaṃ. Tattha evaṃkāmāti evaṃicchā. Evaṃchandāti
atk-s0201a:2733_1: evaṃajjhāsayā. Evaṃadhippāyāti evaṃladdhikā. Tatrāti tasmiṃ aniṭṭhavaḍḍhane ceva
atk-s0201a:2733_2: iṭṭhaparihāne ca. Bhagavaṃmūlakāti bhagavā mūlaṃ etesanti bhagavaṃmūlakā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2733_3: hoti – ime, bhante, amhākaṃ dhammā pubbe kassapasammāsambuddhena uppāditā, tasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2733_4: parinibbute ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime dhamme uppādetuṃ samattho
atk-s0201a:2733_5: nāma nāhosi, bhagavatā pana no ime dhammā uppāditā. Bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime
atk-s0201a:2733_6: dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmāti evaṃ bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammāti. Bhagavaṃnettikāti
atk-s0201a:2733_7: bhagavā hi dhammānaṃ netā vinetā anunetāti. Yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ
atk-s0201a:2733_8: nāmaṃ gahetvā dassitā dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā nāma honti. Bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇāti catubhūmakā
atk-s0201a:2733_9: dhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchamānā bhagavati paṭisaranti nāmāti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
atk-s0201a:2733_10: Paṭisarantīti osaranti samosaranti. Apica mahābodhimaṇḍe nisinnassa bhagavato paṭivedhavasena
atk-s0201a:2733_11: phasso āgacchati, ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāmoti? Tvaṃ phusanaṭṭhena phasso nāma. Vedanā,
atk-s0201a:2733_12: saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇaṃ āgacchati. Ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāmanti? Tvaṃ vijānanaṭṭhena
atk-s0201a:2733_13: viññāṇaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0201a:2733_14: gaṇhanto bhagavā dhamme paṭisaratītipi bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātūti
atk-s0201a:2733_15: bhagavatoyeva etassa bhāsitassa attho upaṭṭhātu, tumheyeva no kathetvā dethāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2734: 474. Sevitabbeti nissayitabbe. Bhajitabbeti upagantabbe. Yathā taṃ aviddasunoti yathā aviduno bālassa andhaputhujjanassa. Yathā taṃ viddasunoti yathā viduno medhāvino paṇḍitassa.
atk-s0201a:2735_0: 475. Atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānanti purimasutte uppaṭipāṭiākārena mātikā ṭhapitā,
atk-s0201a:2735_1: idha pana yathādhammaraseneva satthā mātikaṃ ṭhapesi. Tattha dhammasamādānanti pāṇātipātādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2738_0: 478. Sahāpi dukkhenāti ettha micchācāro abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhīti ime tāva tayo pubbacetanāya
atk-s0201a:2738_1: ca aparacetanāya cāti dvinnaṃ cetanānaṃ vasena dukkhavedanā honti. Sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā
atk-s0201a:2738_2: pana sukhasampayuttā vā upekkhāsampayuttā vā hoti. Sesā pāṇātipātādayo satta tissannampi
atk-s0201a:2738_3: cetanānaṃ vasena dukkhavedanā honti. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi
atk-s0201a:2738_4: domanassenā”ti. Domanassameva cettha dukkhanti veditabbaṃ. Pariyeṭṭhiṃ vā āpajjantassa
atk-s0201a:2739_0: 479. Sahāpi sukhenāti ettha pāṇātipāto pharusavācā byāpādoti ime tāva tayo pubbacetanāya
atk-s0201a:2739_1: ca aparacetanāya cāti dvinnaṃ cetanānaṃ vasena sukhavedanā honti. Sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā
atk-s0201a:2739_2: pana dukkhasampayuttāva hoti. Sesā satta tissannampi cetanānaṃ vasena sukhavedanā
atk-s0201a:2739_3: hontiyeva. Sahāpi somanassenāti somanassameva cettha sukhanti veditabbaṃ. Iṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbasamaṅgino
atk-s0201a:2740_0: 480. Tatiyadhammasamādāne idhekacco macchabandho vā hoti, māgaviko vā, pāṇupaghātaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2740_1: nissāya jīvikaṃ kappeti. Tassa garuṭṭhāniyo bhikkhu akāmakasseva pāṇātipāte ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2740_2: pāṇātipātaviratiyā ca ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā sikkhāpadaṃ deti. So gaṇhantopi dukkhito
atk-s0201a:2740_3: domanassitova hutvā gaṇhāti. Aparabhāge katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā rakkhituṃ asakkontopi
atk-s0201a:2740_4: dukkhitova hoti, tassa pubbāparacetanā dukkhasahagatāva honti. Sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā
atk-s0201a:2740_5: pana sukhasahagatā vā upekkhāsahagatā vāti evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo. Iti pubbabhāgaparabhāgacetanāva
atk-s0201a:2740_6: sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ – “sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassenā”ti. Domanassameva cettha
atk-s0201a:2741_1: sukhasampayuttā hontiyeva, taṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ – “sahāpi sukhena sahāpi somanassenā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2742_0: 482. Tittakālābūti tittakarasaalābu. Visena saṃsaṭṭhoti halāhalavisena sampayutto
atk-s0201a:2742_1: missito luḷito. Nacchādessatīti na ruccissati na tuṭṭhiṃ karissati. Nigacchasīti
atk-s0201a:2742_2: gamissasi. Appaṭisaṅkhāya piveyyāti taṃ appaccavekkhitvā piveyya.
atk-s0201a:2743_0: 483. Āpānīyakaṃsoti āpānīyassa madhurapānakassa bharitakaṃso. Vaṇṇasampannoti pānakavaṇṇādīhi
atk-s0201a:2743_1: sampannavaṇṇo, kaṃse pakkhittapānakavasena pānakakaṃsopi evaṃ vutto. Chādessatīti
atk-s0201a:2743_2: tañhi halāhalavisaṃ yattha yattha pakkhittaṃ hoti, tassa tasseva rasaṃ deti. Tena
atk-s0201a:2744_0: 484. Pūtimuttanti muttameva. Yathā hi manussabhāvo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo pūtikāyotveva, tadahujātāpi
atk-s0201a:2744_1: galocilatā pūtilatātveva vuccati. Evaṃ taṅkhaṇaṃ gahitaṃ taruṇampi muttaṃ pūtimuttameva.
atk-s0201a:2744_2: Nānābhesajjehīti harītakāmalakādīhi nānosadhehi. Sukhī assāti arogo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sukhī bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2745_0: 485. Dadhi ca madhu cāti suparisuddhaṃ dadhi ca sumadhuraṃ madhu ca. Ekajjhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti
atk-s0201a:2745_1: ekato katvā missitaṃ āluḷitaṃ. Tassa tanti tassa taṃ catumadhurabhesajjaṃ pivato
atk-s0201a:2745_2: rucceyya. Idañca yaṃ bhagandarasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ lohitaṃ pakkhandati, na tassa bhesajjaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2745_3: āhāraṃ thambhetvā maggaṃ avalañjaṃ karoti. Yaṃ pana pittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ lohitaṃ, tassetaṃ
atk-s0201a:2746_0: 486. Viddheti ubbiddhe. Meghavigamena dūrībhūteti attho. Vigatavalāhaketi apagatameghe,
atk-s0201a:2746_1: deveti ākāse. Ākāsagataṃ tamagatanti ākāsagataṃ tamaṃ. Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇaparappavādeti
atk-s0201a:2746_2: puthūnaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ paresaṃ vāde. Abhivihaccāti abhihantvā. Bhāsate
atk-s0201a:2746_3: ca tapate ca virocate cāti saradakāle majjhanhikasamaye ādiccova obhāsaṃ muñcati tapati vijjotatīti.
atk-s0201a:2747_0: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ devatānaṃ ativiya piyaṃ manāpaṃ. Tatridaṃ vatthu – dakkhiṇadisāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2747_1: kira hatthibhogajanapade saṅgaravihāro nāma atthi. Tassa bhojanasāladvāre saṅgararukkhe
atk-s0201a:2747_2: adhivatthā devatā rattibhāge ekassa daharassa sarabhaññavasena idaṃ suttaṃ osārentassa
atk-s0201a:2747_3: sutvā sādhukāraṃ adāsi. Daharo kiṃ esoti āha. Ahaṃ, bhante, imasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā
atk-s0201a:2747_4: devatāti. Kasmiṃ devate pasannāsi, kiṃ sadde, udāhu sutteti? Saddo nāma, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2747_5: yassa kassaci hotiyeva, sutte pasannāmhi. Satthārā jetavane nisīditvā kathitadivase
atk-s0201a:2747_6: ca ajja ca ekabyañjanepi nānaṃ natthīti. Assosi tvaṃ devate satthārā kathitadivaseti?
atk-s0201a:2747_7: Āma, bhante. Kattha ṭhitā assosīti? Jetavanaṃ, bhante, gatāmhi, mahesakkhāsu pana
atk-s0201a:2747_8: devatāsu āgacchantīsu tattha okāsaṃ alabhitvā idheva ṭhatvā assosinti. Ettha ṭhitāya
atk-s0201a:2747_9: sakkā sutthu saddo sotunti? Tvaṃ pana, bhante, mayhaṃ saddaṃ suṇasīti? Āma devateti.
atk-s0201a:2747_10: Dakkhiṇakaṇṇapasse nisīditvā kathanakālo viya, bhante, hotīti. Kiṃ pana devate satthu
atk-s0201a:2747_11: rūpaṃ passasīti? Satthā mameva oloketīti maññamānā saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkomi, bhanteti.
atk-s0201a:2747_12: Visesaṃ pana nibbattetuṃ asakkhittha devateti. Devatā tattheva antaradhāyi. Taṃ divasaṃ
atk-s0201a:2747_13: kiresa devaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito. Evamidaṃ suttaṃ devatānaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2751_0: 487. Evaṃ me sutanti vīmaṃsakasuttaṃ. Tattha vīmaṃsakenāti tayo vīmaṃsakā – atthavīmaṃsako
atk-s0201a:2751_1: saṅkhāravīmaṃsako satthuvīmaṃsakoti. Tesu, “paṇḍitā hāvuso, manussā vīmaṃsakā”ti
atk-s0201a:2751_2: ettha atthavīmaṃsako āgato. “Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu dhātukusalo ca hoti, āyatanakusalo
atk-s0201a:2751_3: ca hoti, paṭiccasamuppādakusalo ca hoti, ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalo ca hoti, ettāvatā kho,
atk-s0201a:2751_4: ānanda, paṇḍito bhikkhu vīmaṃsakoti alaṃ vacanāyā”ti ettha saṅkhāravīmaṃsako āgato.
atk-s0201a:2751_5: Imasmiṃ pana sutte satthuvīmaṃsako adhippeto. Cetopariyāyanti cittavāraṃ cittaparicchedaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2751_6: Samannesanāti esanā pariyesanā upaparikkhā. Iti viññāṇāyāti evaṃ vijānanatthāya.
atk-s0201a:2752_0: 488. Dvīsu dhammesu tathāgato samannesitabboti idha kalyāṇamittūpanissayaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2752_1: Mahā hi esa kalyāṇamittūpanissayo nāma. Tassa mahantabhāvo evaṃ veditabbo – ekasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2752_2: hi samaye āyasmā ānando upaḍḍhaṃ attano ānubhāvena hoti, upaḍḍhaṃ kalyāṇamittānubhāvenāti
atk-s0201a:2752_3: cintetvā attano dhammatāya nicchetuṃ asakkonto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi,
atk-s0201a:2752_5: kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā”ti. Bhagavā āha – “mā hevaṃ, ānanda, mā hevaṃ, ānanda, sakalamevidaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2752_6: ānanda, brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā, kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā.
atk-s0201a:2752_7: Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, ānanda, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa,
atk-s0201a:2752_8: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessati, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkarissati.
atk-s0201a:2752_9: Kathañcānanda, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto…pe… ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, ariyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2752_10: aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaroti. Idhānanda, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti…pe… sammāsamādhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2752_11: bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ evaṃ kho, ānanda, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto…pe… bahulīkaroti, tadamināpetaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2752_12: ānanda, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ. Yathā sakalamevidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā
atk-s0201a:2752_13: kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā. Mamañhi, ānanda, kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā
atk-s0201a:2753_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ bāhiraṅgasampattiṃ kathentopi āha – “bāhiraṃ, bhikkhave, aṅganti karitvā
atk-s0201a:2753_1: nāññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0201a:2753_2: kalyāṇamittatā. Kalyāṇamittatā, bhikkhave, mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti. Mahācundassa
atk-s0201a:2753_3: kilesasallekhapaṭipadaṃ kathentopi, “pare pāpamittā bhavissanti, mayamettha kalyāṇamittā
atk-s0201a:2753_4: bhavissāmāti sallekho karaṇīyo”ti āha. Meghiyattherassa vimuttiparipācaniyadhamme
atk-s0201a:2753_5: kathentopi, “aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattanti.
atk-s0201a:2753_6: Katame pañca? Idha, meghiya, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto hoti”ti kalyāṇamittūpanissayameva
atk-s0201a:2757: Etesu taṇhaṃ mākāsi, mā lokaṃ punarāgamī”ti. –
atk-s0201a:2758_0: Kalyāṇamittūpanissayameva sabbapaṭhamaṃ kathesi. Evaṃ mahā esa kalyāṇamittūpanissayo
atk-s0201a:2758_1: nāma. Idhāpi taṃ dassento bhagavā dvīsu dhammesu tathāgato samannesitabboti desanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2758_2: ārabhi. Paṇḍito bhikkhu dvīsu dhammesu tathāgataṃ esatu gavesatūti attho. Etena bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2758_3: ayaṃ mahājaccoti vā, lakkhaṇasampannoti vā, abhirūpo dassanīyoti vā, abhiññāto abhilakkhitoti
atk-s0201a:2758_4: vā, imaṃ nissāyāhaṃ cīvarādayo paccaye labhissāmīti vā, evaṃ cintetvā maṃ nissāya
atk-s0201a:2758_5: vasanakiccaṃ natthi. Yo pana evaṃ sallakkheti, “pahoti me esa satthā hutvā satthukiccaṃ
atk-s0201a:2758_6: sādhetu”nti, so maṃ bhajatūti sīhanādaṃ nadati. Buddhasīhanādo kira nāmesa suttantoti.
atk-s0201a:2759_0: Idāni te dve dhamme dassento cakkhusotaviññeyyesūti āha. Tattha satthu kāyiko samācāro
atk-s0201a:2759_1: vīmaṃsakassa cakkhuviññeyyo dhammo nāma. Vācasiko samācāro sotaviññeyyo dhammo nāma.
atk-s0201a:2759_2: Idāni tesu samannesitabbākāraṃ dassento ye saṃkiliṭṭhātiādimāha. Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhāti
atk-s0201a:2759_3: kilesasampayuttā. Te ca na cakkhusotaviññeyyā. Yathā pana udake calante vā pupphuḷake
atk-s0201a:2759_4: vā muñcante anto maccho atthīti viññāyati, evaṃ pāṇātipātādīni vā karontassa, musāvādādīni
atk-s0201a:2759_5: vā bhaṇantassa kāyavacīsamācāre disvā ca sutvā ca taṃsamuṭṭhāpakacittaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhanti
atk-s0201a:2759_6: viññāyati. Tasmā evamāha. Saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa hi kāyavacīsamācārāpi saṃkiliṭṭhāyeva
atk-s0201a:2759_7: nāma. Na te tathāgatassa saṃvijjantīti na te tathāgatassa atthi. Na upalabbhantīti
atk-s0201a:2759_8: evaṃ jānātīti attho. Natthitāyeva hi te na upalabbhanti na paṭicchannatāya. Tathā
atk-s0201a:2759_9: hi bhagavā ekadivasaṃ imesu dhammesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavārento āha – “handa dāni,
atk-s0201a:2759_10: bhikkhave, pavāremi vo, na ca me kiñci garahatha kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2759_11: vutte āyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ
atk-s0201a:2759_12: paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “na kho mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato kiñci garahāma
atk-s0201a:2759_13: kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā. Bhagavā hi, bhante, anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa
atk-s0201a:2759_14: maggassa sañjānetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū maggavidū maggakovido.
atk-s0201a:2759_15: Maggānugā ca, bhante, etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchāsamannāgatā”ti. Evaṃ parisuddhā
atk-s0201a:2759_16: tathāgatassa kāyavacīsamācārā. Uttaropi sudaṃ māṇavo tathāgatassa kāyavacīdvāre anārādhanīyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2759_17: kiñci passissāmīti satta māse anubandhitvā likkhāmattampi na addasa. Manussabhūto
atk-s0201a:2759_18: vā esa buddhabhūtassa kāyavacīdvāre kiṃ anārādhanīyaṃ passissati? Māropi devaputto
atk-s0201a:2759_19: bodhisattassa sato mahābhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya chabbassāni gavesamāno kiñci anārādhanīyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2759_20: nāddasa, antamaso cetoparivitakkamattampi. Māro kira cintesi – “sacassa vitakkitamattampi
atk-s0201a:2759_21: akusalaṃ passissāmi, tattheva naṃ muddhani paharitvā pakkamissāmī”ti. So chabbassāni
atk-s0201a:2759_22: adisvā buddhabhūtampi ekaṃ vassaṃ anubandhitvā kiñci vajjaṃ apassanto gamanasamaye vanditvā –
atk-s0201a:2763_0: Vītimissāti kāle kaṇhā, kāle sukkāti evaṃ vomissakā. Vodātāti parisuddhā nikkilesā.
atk-s0201a:2763_1: Saṃvijjantīti vodātā dhammā atthi upalabbhanti. Tathāgatassa hi parisuddhā kāyasamācārādayo.
atk-s0201a:2763_2: Tenāha – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa arakkheyyāni. Katamāni cattāri? Parisuddhakāyasamācāro,
atk-s0201a:2763_3: bhikkhave, tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa kāyaduccaritaṃ, yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya,
atk-s0201a:2763_4: ‘mā me idaṃ paro aññāsī’ti. Parisuddhavacīsamācāro… parisuddhamanosamācāro… parisuddhājīvo,
atk-s0201a:2763_5: bhikkhave, tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa micchājīvo, yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya, mā
atk-s0201a:2764_0: Imaṃ kusalaṃ dhammanti imaṃ anavajjaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ. “Ayamāyasmā satthā kiṃ
atk-s0201a:2764_1: nu kho dīgharattaṃ samāpanno aticirakālato paṭṭhāya iminā samannāgato, udāhu ittarasamāpanno
atk-s0201a:2764_2: hiyyo vā pare vā parasuve vā divase samāpanno”ti evaṃ gavesatūti attho. Ekaccena
atk-s0201a:2764_3: hi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantena bahu micchājīvakammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ tattha kālātikkame paññāyati,
atk-s0201a:2764_4: pākaṭaṃ hoti. So aññataraṃ paccantagāmaṃ vā samuddatīraṃ vā gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0201a:2764_5: āraññako viya hutvā viharati. Manussā sambhāvanaṃ uppādetvā tassa paṇīte paccaye
atk-s0201a:2764_6: denti. Janapadavāsino bhikkhū tassa parihāraṃ disvā, “atidappito vatāyaṃ āyasmā,
atk-s0201a:2764_7: ko nu kho eso”ti pariggaṇhantā, “asukaṭṭhāne asukaṃ nāma micchājīvaṃ katvā pakkantabhikkhū”ti
atk-s0201a:2764_8: ñatvā na sakkā iminā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā kātunti sannipatitvā dhammena
atk-s0201a:2764_9: samena ukkhepanīyādīsu aññataraṃ kammaṃ karonti. Evarūpāya paṭicchannapaṭipattiyā
atk-s0201a:2764_10: atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā vīmaṃsāpetuṃ evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2765_0: Evaṃ jānātīti dīgharattaṃ samāpanno, na ittarasamāpannoti jānāti. Anacchariyaṃ cetaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2765_1: Yaṃ tathāgatassa etarahi sabbaññutaṃ pattassa dīgharattaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ parisuddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2766_0: Atīte kira gandhārarājā ca vedeharājā ca dvepi sahāyakā hutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā
atk-s0201a:2766_1: rajjāni puttānaṃ niyyātetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ekasmiṃ araññagāmake piṇḍāya
atk-s0201a:2766_2: caranti. Paccanto nāma dullabhaloṇo hoti. Tato aloṇaṃ yāguṃ labhitvā ekissāya sālāya
atk-s0201a:2766_3: nisīditvā pivanti. Antarantare manussā loṇacuṇṇaṃ āharitvā denti. Ekadivasaṃ eko
atk-s0201a:2766_4: vedehisissa paṇṇe pakkhipitvā loṇacuṇṇaṃ adāsi. Vedehisi gahetvā upaḍḍhaṃ gandhārisissa-santike
