atk-s0201a:2766_5: ṭhapetvā upaḍḍhaṃ attano santike ṭhapesi. Tato thokaṃ paribhuttāvasesaṃ disvā, “mā
atk-s0201a:2766_6: idaṃ nassī”ti paṇṇena veṭhetvā tiṇagahane ṭhapesi. Puna ekasmiṃ divase yāgupānakāle
atk-s0201a:2766_7: satiṃ katvā olokento taṃ disvā gandhārisiṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “ito thokaṃ gaṇhatha ācariyā”ti
atk-s0201a:2766_8: āha. Kuto te laddhaṃ vedehisīti? Tasmiṃ divase paribhuttāvasesaṃ “mā nassī”ti mayā
atk-s0201a:2766_9: ṭhapitanti. Gandhārisi gahetuṃ na icchati, aloṇakaṃyeva yāguṃ pivitvā vedehaṃ isiṃ avoca –
atk-s0201a:2769: Vedehisi avoca – “tumhe rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitā, idāni kasmā loṇacuṇṇamattasannidhikāraṇā pabbajjāya anucchavikaṃ na karothā”ti? Kiṃ mayā kataṃ vedehisīti? Atha naṃ āha –
atk-s0201a:2773: “Dhammaṃ bhaṇāmi vedeha, adhammo me na ruccati;
atk-s0201a:2777: Mahatthiyampi ce vācaṃ, na taṃ bhāseyya paṇḍito”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:2779: “Kāmaṃ ruppatu vā mā vā, bhusaṃva vikirīyatu;
atk-s0201a:2781: Tato vedehisi yassa sakāpi buddhi natthi, ācariyasantike vinayaṃ na sikkhati, so andhamahiṃso viya vane caratīti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0201a:2782: “No ce assa sakā buddhi, vinayo vā susikkhito;
atk-s0201a:2786_0: Evañca pana vatvā vedehisi ajānitvā mayā katanti gandhārisiṃ khamāpesi. Te ubhopi
atk-s0201a:2786_1: tapaṃ caritvā brahmalokaṃ agamaṃsu. Evaṃ tathāgatassa bodhisattakālepi dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2787_0: Uttajjhāpanno ayamāyasmā bhikkhu yasapattoti ayamāyasmā amhākaṃ satthā bhikkhu ñattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2787_1: paññātabhāvaṃ pākaṭabhāvaṃ ajjhāpanno nu kho, sayañca parivārasampattiṃ patto nu
atk-s0201a:2787_2: kho noti. Tena cassa paññātajjhāpannabhāvena yasasannissitabhāvena ca kiṃ ekacce
atk-s0201a:2787_3: ādīnavā sandissanti udāhu noti evaṃ samannesantūti dasseti. Na tāva, bhikkhaveti,
atk-s0201a:2787_4: bhikkhave, yāva bhikkhu na rājarājamahāmattādīsu abhiññātabhāvaṃ vā parivārasampattiṃ
atk-s0201a:2787_5: vā āpanno hoti, tāva ekacce mānātimānādayo ādīnavā na saṃvijjanti upasantūpasanto
atk-s0201a:2787_6: viya sotāpanno viya sakadāgāmī viya ca viharati. Ariyo nu kho puthujjano nu khotipi
atk-s0201a:2788_0: Yato ca kho, bhikkhaveti yadā pana idhekacco bhikkhu ñāto hoti parivārasampanno vā,
atk-s0201a:2788_1: tadā tiṇhena siṅgena gogaṇaṃ vijjhanto duṭṭhagoṇo viya, migasaṅghaṃ abhimaddamāno
atk-s0201a:2788_2: dīpi viya ca aññe bhikkhū tattha tattha vijjhanto agāravo asabhāgavutti aggapādena
atk-s0201a:2788_3: bhūmiṃ phusanto viya carati. Ekacco pana kulaputto yathā yathā ñāto hoti yasassī,
atk-s0201a:2788_4: tathā tathā phalabhārabharito viya sāli suṭṭhutaraṃ onamati, rājarājamahāmattādīsu
atk-s0201a:2788_5: upasaṅkamantesu akiñcanabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chinnavisāṇausabho
atk-s0201a:2788_6: viya, caṇḍāladārako viya ca sorato nivāto nīcacitto hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ceva sadevakassa
atk-s0201a:2788_7: ca lokassa, hitāya sukhāya paṭipajjati. Evarūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ sandhāya “nāssa idhekacce ādīnavā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2789_0: Tathāgato pana aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu tādī, so hi lābhepi tādī, alābhepi tādī, yasepi
atk-s0201a:2789_1: tādī, ayasepi tādī, pasaṃsāyapi tādī, nindāyapi tādī, sukhepi tādī, dukkhepi tādī,
atk-s0201a:2789_2: tasmā sabbākārena nāssa idhekacce ādīnavā saṃvijjanti. Abhayūparatoti abhayo hutvā
atk-s0201a:2789_3: uparato, accantūparato satatūparatoti attho. Na vā bhayena uparatotipi abhayūparato.
atk-s0201a:2789_4: Cattāri hi bhayāni kilesabhayaṃ vaṭṭabhayaṃ duggatibhayaṃ upavādabhayanti. Puthujjano
atk-s0201a:2789_5: catūhipi bhayehi bhāyati. Sekkhā tīhi, tesañhi duggatibhayaṃ pahīnaṃ, iti satta sekkhā
atk-s0201a:2789_6: bhayūparatā, khīṇāsavo abhayūparato nāma, tassa hi ekampi bhayaṃ natthi. Kiṃ paravādabhayaṃ
atk-s0201a:2789_7: natthīti? Natthi. Parānuddayaṃ pana paṭicca, “mādisaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ paṭicca sattā mā
atk-s0201a:2789_8: nassantū”ti upavādaṃ rakkhati. Mūluppalavāpivihāravāsī yasatthero viya.
atk-s0201a:2790_0: Thero kira mūluppalavāpigāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Athassa upaṭṭhākakuladvāraṃ pattassa
atk-s0201a:2790_1: pattaṃ gahetvā thaṇḍilapīṭhakaṃ nissāya āsanaṃ paññapesuṃ. Amaccadhītāpi taṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2790_2: pīṭhakaṃ nissāya paratobhāge nīcataraṃ āsanaṃ paññāpetvā nisīdi. Eko nevāsiko bhikkhu
atk-s0201a:2790_3: pacchā piṇḍāya paviṭṭho dvāre ṭhatvāva olokento thero amaccadhītarā saddhiṃ ekamañce
atk-s0201a:2790_4: nisinnoti sallakkhetvā, “ayaṃ paṃsukūliko vihāreva upasantūpasanto viya viharati,
atk-s0201a:2790_5: antogāme pana upaṭṭhāyikāhi saddhiṃ ekamañce nisīdatī”ti cintetvā, “kiṃ nu kho mayā
atk-s0201a:2790_6: duddiṭṭha”nti punappunaṃ oloketvā tathāsaññīva hutvā pakkāmi. Theropi bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0201a:2790_7: katvā vihāraṃ gantvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisīdi. Nevāsikopi katabhattakicco
atk-s0201a:2790_8: vihāraṃ gantvā, “taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ niggaṇhitvā vihārā nikkaḍḍhissāmī”ti asaññatanīhārena
atk-s0201a:2790_9: therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paribhogaghaṭato uluṅkena udakaṃ gahetvā mahāsaddaṃ
atk-s0201a:2790_10: karonto pāde dhovi. Thero, “ko nu kho ayaṃ asaññatacāriko”ti āvajjanto sabbaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0201a:2790_11: “ayaṃ mayi manaṃ padosetvā apāyūpago mā ahosī”ti vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalasamīpe
atk-s0201a:2790_12: pallaṅkena nisīdi. Nevāsiko duṭṭhākārena ghaṭikaṃ ukkhipitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā anto
atk-s0201a:2790_13: paviṭṭho theraṃ apassanto, “heṭṭhāmañcaṃ paviṭṭho bhavissatī”ti oloketvā tatthāpi
atk-s0201a:2790_14: apassanto nikkhamituṃ ārabhi. Thero ukkāsi. Itaro uddhaṃ olokento disvā adhivāsetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2790_15: asakkonto evamāha – “patirūpaṃ te, āvuso, paṃsukūlika evaṃ ānubhāvasampannassa upaṭṭhāyikāya
atk-s0201a:2790_16: saddhiṃ ekamañce nisīditu”nti. Pabbajitā nāma, bhante, mātugāmena saddhiṃ na ekamañce
atk-s0201a:2790_17: nisīdanti, tumhehi pana duddiṭṭhametanti. Evaṃ khīṇāsavā parānuddayāya upavādaṃ rakkhanti.
atk-s0201a:2791_0: Khayā rāgassāti rāgassa khayeneva. Vītarāgattā kāme na paṭisevati, na paṭisaṅkhāya
atk-s0201a:2791_1: vāretvāti. Tañceti evaṃ tathāgatassa kilesappahānaṃ ñatvā tattha tattha ṭhitanisinnakālādīsupi
atk-s0201a:2791_2: catuparisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvāpi itipi satthā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho
atk-s0201a:2791_3: vantakileso pahīnamalo abbhā muttapuṇṇacando viya suparisuddhoti evaṃ tathāgatassa
atk-s0201a:2791_4: kilesappahāne vaṇṇaṃ kathayamānaṃ taṃ vīmaṃsakaṃ bhikkhuṃ pare evaṃ puccheyyuṃ ceti attho.
atk-s0201a:2792_0: Ākārāti kāraṇāni. Anvayāti anubuddhiyo. Saṅghe vā viharantoti appekadā aparicchinnagaṇanassa
atk-s0201a:2792_1: bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe viharanto. Eko vā viharantoti icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave, aḍḍhamāsaṃ
atk-s0201a:2792_2: paṭisallīyitunti, temāsaṃ paṭisallīyitunti evaṃ paṭisallāne ceva pālileyyakavanasaṇḍe
atk-s0201a:2792_3: ca ekako viharanto. Sugatāti suṭṭhugatā suppaṭipannā kārakā yuttapayuttā. Evarūpāpi
atk-s0201a:2792_4: hi ekacce bhikkhū atthi. Duggatāti duṭṭhugatā duppaṭipannā kāyadaḷhibahulā vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0201a:2792_5: Evarūpāpi ekacce atthi. Gaṇamanusāsantīti gaṇabandhanena baddhā gaṇārāmā gaṇabahulikā
atk-s0201a:2792_6: hutvā gaṇaṃ pariharanti. Evarūpāpi ekacce atthi. Tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā gaṇato nissaṭā
atk-s0201a:2793_0: Āmisesu sandissantīti āmisagiddhā āmisacakkhukā catupaccayaāmisatthameva āhiṇḍamānā
atk-s0201a:2793_1: āmisesu sandissamānakabhikkhūpi atthi. Āmisena anupalittā catūhi paccayehi vinivattamānasā
atk-s0201a:2793_2: abbhā muttacandasadisā hutvā viharamānāpi atthi. Nāyamāyasmā taṃ tena avajānātīti
atk-s0201a:2793_3: ayaṃ āyasmā satthā tāya tāya paṭipattiyā taṃ taṃ puggalaṃ nāvajānāti, ayaṃ paṭipanno
atk-s0201a:2793_4: kārako, ayaṃ gaṇato nissaṭo visaṃsaṭṭho. Ayaṃ āmisena anupalitto paccayehi vinivattamānaso
atk-s0201a:2793_5: abbhā mutto candimā viyāti evamassa gehasitavasena ussādanāpi natthi. Ayaṃ duppaṭipanno
atk-s0201a:2793_6: akārako kāyadaḷhibahulo vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno, ayaṃ gaṇabandhanabaddho, ayaṃ āmisagiddho
atk-s0201a:2793_7: lolo āmisacakkhukoti evamassa gehasitavasena apasādanāpi natthīti attho. Iminā kiṃ
atk-s0201a:2793_8: kathitaṃ hoti? Tathāgatassa sattesu tādibhāvo kathito hoti. Ayañhi –
atk-s0201a:2795: Dhanapāle rāhule ca, sabbesaṃ samako munī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:2796_0: 489. Tatra, bhikkhaveti tesu dvīsu vīmaṃsakesu. Yo, “ke panāyasmato ākārā”ti pucchāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2796_1: āgato gaṇṭhivīmaṃsako ca, yo “abhayūparato ayamāyasmā”ti āgato mūlavīmaṃsako ca.
atk-s0201a:2796_2: Tesu mūlavīmaṃsakena tathāgatova uttari paṭipucchitabbo. So hi pubbe parasseva kathāya
atk-s0201a:2796_3: niṭṭhaṅgato. Paro ca nāma jānitvāpi katheyya ajānitvāpi. Evamassa kathā bhūtāpi hoti
atk-s0201a:2796_4: abhūtāpi, tasmā parasseva kathāya niṭṭhaṃ agantvā tato uttari tathāgatova paṭipucchitabboti attho.
atk-s0201a:2797_0: Byākaramānoti ettha yasmā tathāgatassa micchābyākaraṇaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā sammā
atk-s0201a:2797_1: micchāti avatvā byākaramānotveva vuttaṃ. Etaṃ pathohamasmi etaṃ gocaroti esa mayhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2797_2: patho esa gocaroti attho. “Etāpātho”tipi pāṭho, tassattho mayhaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ
atk-s0201a:2797_3: parisuddhaṃ, svāhaṃ tassa parisuddhabhāvena vīmaṃsakassa bhikkhuno ñāṇamukhe etāpātho,
atk-s0201a:2797_4: evaṃ āpāthaṃ gacchāmīti vuttaṃ hoti. No ca tena tammayoti tenapi cāhaṃ parisuddhena
atk-s0201a:2797_5: sīlena na tammayo, na sataṇho, parisuddhasīlattāva nittaṇhohamasmīti dīpeti.
atk-s0201a:2798_0: Uttaruttariṃ paṇītapaṇītanti uttaruttariṃ ceva paṇītatarañca katvā deseti. Kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāganti
atk-s0201a:2798_1: kaṇhaṃ ceva sukkañca, tañca kho sappaṭibhāgaṃ savipakkhaṃ katvā, kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā
atk-s0201a:2798_2: sukkanti sukkaṃ paṭibāhitvā kaṇhanti evaṃ sappaṭibhāgaṃ katvā kaṇhasukkaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a:2798_3: Kaṇhaṃ desentopi saussāhaṃ savipākaṃ deseti, sukkaṃ desentopi saussāhaṃ savipākaṃ
atk-s0201a:2798_4: deseti. Abhiññāya idhekaccaṃ dhammaṃ dhammesu niṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti tasmiṃ desite dhamme
atk-s0201a:2798_5: ekaccaṃ paṭivedhadhammaṃ abhiññāya tena paṭivedhadhammena desanādhamme niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2798_6: Satthari pasīdatīti evaṃ dhamme niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhiyyosomattāya sammāsambuddho so
atk-s0201a:2798_7: bhagavāti satthari pasīdati. Tena pana bhagavatā yo dhammo akkhāto, sopi svākkhāto
atk-s0201a:2798_8: bhagavatā dhammo niyyānikattā. Yvāssa taṃ dhammaṃ paṭipanno saṅgho, sopi suppaṭipanno
atk-s0201a:2798_9: vaṅkādidosarahitaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannattāti evaṃ dhamme saṅghepi pasīdati. Tañceti
atk-s0201a:2798_10: taṃ evaṃ pasannaṃ tattha tattha tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathentaṃ bhikkhuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2799_0: 490. Imehi ākārehīti imehi satthuvīmaṃsanakāraṇehi. Imehi padehīti imehi akkharasampiṇḍanapadehi.
atk-s0201a:2799_1: Imehi byañjanehīti imehi idha vuttehi akkharehi. Saddhā niviṭṭhāti okappanā patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0201a:2799_2: Mūlajātāti sotāpattimaggavasena sañjātamūlā. Sotāpattimaggo hi saddhāya mūlaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2799_3: Ākāravatīti kāraṇaṃ pariyesitvā gahitattā sakāraṇā. Dassanamūlikāti sotāpattimaggamūlikā.
atk-s0201a:2799_4: So hi dassananti vuccati. Daḷhāti thirā. Asaṃhāriyāti harituṃ na sakkā. Samaṇena
atk-s0201a:2799_5: vāti samitapāpasamaṇena vā. Brāhmaṇena vāti bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇena vā. Devena vāti
atk-s0201a:2799_6: upapattidevena vā. Mārena vāti vasavattimārena vā, sotāpannassa hi vasavattimārenāpi
atk-s0201a:2800_0: So kira satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā gehaṃ āgato. Atha māro dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2800_1: buddharūpaṃ māpetvā tassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā – “satthā āgato”ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi. Sūro
atk-s0201a:2800_2: cintesi, “ahaṃ idāneva satthu santikā dhammaṃ sutvā āgato, kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0201a:2800_3: upasaṅkamitvā satthusaññāya vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Māro āha – “yaṃ te mayā, sūrambaṭṭha,
atk-s0201a:2800_4: rūpaṃ aniccaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ aniccanti kathitaṃ, taṃ anupadhāretvāva sahasā mayā evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2800_5: vuttaṃ. Tasmā tvaṃ rūpaṃ niccaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ niccanti gaṇhāhī”ti. Sūro cintesi –
atk-s0201a:2800_6: “aṭṭhānametaṃ, yaṃ buddhā anupadhāretvā apaccakkhaṃ katvā kiñci katheyyuṃ, addhā
atk-s0201a:2800_7: ayaṃ mayhaṃ vibādhanatthaṃ māro āgato”ti. Tato naṃ tvaṃ māroti āha. So musāvādaṃ
atk-s0201a:2800_8: kātuṃ nāsakkhi, āma mārosmīti paṭijāni. Kasmā āgatosīti vutte tava saddhācālanatthanti
atk-s0201a:2800_9: āha. Kaṇha pāpima, tvaṃ tāva ekako tiṭṭha, tādisānaṃ mārānaṃ satampi sahassampi mama
atk-s0201a:2800_10: saddhaṃ cāletuṃ asamatthaṃ, maggena āgatā saddhā nāma silāpathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitasineru
atk-s0201a:2800_11: viya acalā hoti, kiṃ tvaṃ etthāti accharaṃ pahari. So ṭhātuṃ asakkonto tatthevantaradhāyi.
atk-s0201a:2800_12: Brahmunā vāti brahmakāyikādīsu aññatarabrahmunā vā. Kenaci vā lokasminti ete samaṇādayo
atk-s0201a:2800_13: ṭhapetvā aññenapi kenaci vā lokasmiṃ harituṃ na sakkā. Dhammasamannesanāti sabhāvasamannesanā.
atk-s0201a:2800_14: Dhammatāsusamanniṭṭhoti dhammatāya susamanniṭṭho, sabhāveneva suṭṭhu samannesito
atk-s0201a:2804_0: 491. Evaṃ me sutanti kosambiyasuttaṃ. Tattha kosambiyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tassa
atk-s0201a:2804_1: kira nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇīādīsu tesu tesu ṭhānesu kosambarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2804_2: tasmā kosambīti saṅkhaṃ agamāsi. Kusambassa nāma isino assamato avidūre māpitattātipi
atk-s0201a:2805_0: Pubbe kira addilaraṭṭhaṃ nāma ahosi. Tato kotūhalako nāma daliddo chātakabhayena
atk-s0201a:2805_1: saputtadāro kedāraparicchinnaṃ subhikkhaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gacchanto puttaṃ vahituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0201a:2805_2: chaḍḍetvā agamāsi. Mātā nivattitvā taṃ gahetvā gatā. Te ekaṃ gopālakagāmakaṃ pavisiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2805_3: gopālakānañca tadā pahatapāyaso paṭiyatto hoti, tato pāyasaṃ labhitvā bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2805_4: Atha so puriso pahūtapāyasaṃ bhuñjitvā jirāpetuṃ asakkonto rattibhāge kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0201a:2805_5: tattheva sunakhiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā kukkuro jāto. So gopālakassa piyo
atk-s0201a:2805_6: ahosi manāpo, gopālako ca paccekabuddhaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. Paccekabuddhopi bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0201a:2805_7: kukkurassa ekaṃ piṇḍaṃ deti. So paccekabuddhe sinehaṃ uppādetvā gopālakena saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2806_0: So gopālake asannihite bhattavelāya sayameva gantvā kālārocanatthaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre
atk-s0201a:2806_1: bhussati, antarāmaggepi caṇḍamige disvā bhussitvā palāpeti. So paccekabuddhe mudukena
atk-s0201a:2806_2: cittena kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti. Tatrassa ghosakadevaputtotveva nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2806_3: So devalokato cavitvā kosambiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kulaghare nibbatti. Taṃ aputtako seṭṭhi
atk-s0201a:2806_4: tassa mātāpitūnaṃ dhanaṃ datvā puttaṃ katvā aggahesi. Atha so attano putte jāte sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0201a:2806_5: mārāpetuṃ upakkami. So puññavantatāya sattasupi ṭhānesu maraṇaṃ appatvā avasāne ekāya
atk-s0201a:2806_6: seṭṭhidhītāya veyyattiyena laddhajīviko aparabhāge pituaccayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ patvā
atk-s0201a:2806_7: ghositaseṭṭhi nāma jāto. Aññepi kosambiyaṃ kukkuṭaseṭṭhi pāvārikaseṭṭhīti dve seṭṭhino
atk-s0201a:2807_0: Tena ca samayena tesaṃ sahāyakānaṃ seṭṭhīnaṃ kulūpakā pañcasatā isayo pabbatapāde
atk-s0201a:2807_1: vasiṃsu. Te kālena kālaṃ loṇambilasevanatthāya manussapathaṃ āgacchanti. Athekasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2807_2: vāre gimhasamaye manussapathaṃ āgacchantā nirudakamahākantāraṃ atikkamitvā kantārapariyosāne
atk-s0201a:2807_3: mahantaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ disvā cintesuṃ – “yādiso ayaṃ rukkho, addhā ettha mahesakkhāya
atk-s0201a:2807_4: devatāya bhavitabbaṃ, sādhu vatassa, sace no pānīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2807_5: Devatā isīnaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā imesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmīti attano ānubhāvena viṭapantarato
atk-s0201a:2807_6: naṅgalasīsamattaṃ udakadhāraṃ pavattesi. Isigaṇo rajatakkhandhasadisaṃ udakavaṭṭiṃ
atk-s0201a:2807_7: disvā attano bhājanehi udakaṃ gahetvā paribhogaṃ katvā cintesi – “devatāya amhākaṃ
atk-s0201a:2807_8: paribhogaudakaṃ dinnaṃ, idaṃ pana agāmakaṃ mahāaraññaṃ, sādhu vatassa, sace no āhārampi
atk-s0201a:2807_9: dadeyyā”ti. Devatā isīnaṃ upasaṃkappanavasena dibbāni yāgukhajjakādīni datvā santappesi.
atk-s0201a:2807_10: Isayo cintayiṃsu – “devatāya amhākaṃ paribhogaudakampi bhojanampi sabbaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2807_11: sādhu vatassa, sace no attānaṃ dasseyyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2808_0: Devatā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā upaḍḍhakāyaṃ dassesi. Te āhaṃsu – “devate, mahatī
atk-s0201a:2808_1: te sampatti, kiṃ kammaṃ katvā imaṃ sampattiṃ adhigatāsī”ti? Bhante, nātimahantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2808_2: parittakaṃ kammaṃ katvāti. Upaḍḍhauposathakammaṃ nissāya hi devatāya sā sampatti laddhā.
atk-s0201a:2809_0: Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira gehe ayaṃ devaputto kammakāro ahosi. Seṭṭhissa hi gehe uposathadivasesu
atk-s0201a:2809_1: antamaso dāsakammakāre upādāya sabbo jano uposathiko hoti. Ekadivasaṃ ayaṃ kammakāro
atk-s0201a:2809_2: ekakova pāto uṭṭhāya kammantaṃ gato. Mahāseṭṭhi nivāpaṃ labhanamanusse sallakkhento
atk-s0201a:2809_3: etassevekassa araññaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā assa sāyamāsatthāya nivāpaṃ adāsi. Bhattakārikā
atk-s0201a:2809_4: dāsī ekasseva bhattaṃ pacitvā araññato āgatassa bhattaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adāsi, kammakāro
atk-s0201a:2809_5: āha – “aññesu divasesu imasmiṃ kāle gehaṃ ekasaddaṃ ahosi, ajja ativiya sannisinnaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2809_6: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti? Tassa sā ācikkhi – “ajja imasmiṃ gehe sabbe manussā uposathikā,
atk-s0201a:2809_7: mahāseṭṭhi tuyhevekassa nivāpaṃ adāsī”ti. Evaṃ ammāti? Āma sāmīti. Imasmiṃ kāle uposathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2809_8: samādinnassa uposathakammaṃ hoti na hotīti mahāseṭṭhiṃ puccha ammāti? Tāya gantvā
atk-s0201a:2809_9: pucchito mahāseṭṭhi āha – “sakalauposathakammaṃ na hoti, upaḍḍhakammaṃ pana hoti,
atk-s0201a:2809_10: uposathiko hotū”ti. Kammakāro bhattaṃ abhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathiko hutvā
atk-s0201a:2809_11: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā nipajji. Tassa āhāraparikkhīṇakāyassa rattiṃ vāto kuppi. So
atk-s0201a:2809_12: paccūsasamaye kālaṃ katvā upaḍḍhauposathakammanissandena mahāvaṭṭaniaṭaviyaṃ nigrodharukkhe
atk-s0201a:2809_13: devaputto hutvā nibbatti. So taṃ pavattiṃ isīnaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0201a:2810_0: Isayo tumhehi mayaṃ buddho, dhammo, saṅghoti asutapubbaṃ sāvitā, uppanno nu kho loke
atk-s0201a:2810_1: buddhoti? Āma, bhante, uppannoti. Idāni kuhiṃ vasatīti? Sāvatthiṃ nissāya jetavane,
atk-s0201a:2810_2: bhanteti. Isayo tiṭṭhatha tāva tumhe mayaṃ satthāraṃ passissāmāti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0201a:2810_3: anupubbena kosambinagaraṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu. Mahāseṭṭhino, “isayo āgatā”ti paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2810_4: katvā, “sve amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha, bhante”ti nimantetvā punadivase isigaṇassa
atk-s0201a:2810_5: mahādānaṃ adaṃsu. Isayo bhuñjitvāva gacchāmāti āpucchiṃsu. Tumhe, bhante, aññasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2810_6: kāle ekampi māsaṃ dvepi tayopi cattāropi māse vasitvā gacchatha. Imasmiṃ pana vāre
atk-s0201a:2810_7: hiyyo āgantvā ajjeva gacchāmāti vadatha, kimidanti? Āma gahapatayo buddho loke uppanno,
atk-s0201a:2810_8: na kho pana sakkā jīvitantarāyo vidituṃ, tena mayaṃ turitā gacchāmāti. Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2810_9: mayampi gacchāma, amhehi saddhiṃyeva gacchathāti. Tumhe agāriyā nāma mahājaṭā, tiṭṭhatha
atk-s0201a:2810_10: tumhe, mayaṃ puretaraṃ gamissāmāti nikkhamitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dvepi divasāni avasitvā
atk-s0201a:2810_11: turitagamaneneva sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanavihāre satthu santikameva agamaṃsu. Satthu
atk-s0201a:2810_12: madhuradhammakathaṃ sutvā sabbeva pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2811_0: Tepi tayo seṭṭhino pañcahi pañcahi sakaṭasatehi sappimadhuphāṇitādīni ceva paṭṭunnadukūlādīni
atk-s0201a:2811_1: ca ādāya kosambito nikkhamitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanasāmante khandhāvāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2811_2: bandhitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2811_3: Satthā tiṇṇampi sahāyakānaṃ madhuradhammakathaṃ kathesi. Te balavasomanassajātā satthāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2811_4: nimantetvā punadivase mahādānaṃ adaṃsu. Puna nimantetvā punadivaseti evaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ
atk-s0201a:2811_5: dānaṃ datvā, “amhākaṃ janapadaṃ āgamanāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti pādamūle nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2811_6: Bhagavā, “suññāgāre kho gahapatayo tathāgatā abhiramantī”ti āha. Ettāvatā paṭiññā
atk-s0201a:2811_7: dinnā nāma hotīti gahapatayo sallakkhetvā dinnā no bhagavatā paṭiññāti dasabalaṃ
atk-s0201a:2811_8: vanditvā nikkhamitvā antarāmagge yojane yojane ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāretvā anupubbena kosambiṃ
atk-s0201a:2811_9: patvā, “loke buddho uppanno”ti kathayiṃsu. Tayopi janā attano attano ārāme mahantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2811_10: dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā bhagavato vasanatthāya vihāre kārāpayiṃsu. Tattha kukkuṭaseṭṭhinā
atk-s0201a:2811_11: kārito kukkuṭārāmo nāma ahosi. Pāvārikaseṭṭhinā ambavane kārito pāvārikambavano nāma
atk-s0201a:2811_12: ahosi. Ghositena kārito ghositārāmo nāma ahosi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “ghositaseṭṭhinā kārite ārāme”ti.
atk-s0201a:2812_0: Bhaṇḍanajātātiādīsu kalahassa pubbabhāgo bhaṇḍanaṃ nāma, taṃ jātaṃ etesanti bhaṇḍanajātā.
atk-s0201a:2812_1: Hatthaparāmāsādivasena matthakaṃ patto kalaho jāto etesanti kalahajātā. Viruddhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a:2812_2: vādanti vivādaṃ, taṃ āpannāti vivādāpannā. Mukhasattīhīti vācāsattīhi. Vitudantāti
atk-s0201a:2812_3: vijjhantā. Te na ceva aññamaññaṃ saññāpenti na ca saññattiṃ upentīti te atthañca
atk-s0201a:2812_4: kāraṇañca dassetvā neva aññamaññaṃ jānāpenti. Sacepi saññāpetuṃ ārabhanti, tathāpi
atk-s0201a:2812_5: saññattiṃ na upenti, jānituṃ na icchantīti attho. Nijjhattiyāpi eseva nayo. Ettha
atk-s0201a:2812_6: ca nijjhattīti saññattivevacanamevetaṃ. Kasmā panete bhaṇḍanajātā ahesunti? Appamattakena kāraṇena.
atk-s0201a:2813_0: Dve kira bhikkhū ekasmiṃ āvāse vasanti vinayadharo ca suttantiko ca. Tesu suttantiko
atk-s0201a:2813_1: bhikkhu ekadivasaṃ vaccakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho ācamanaudakāvasesaṃ bhājane ṭhapetvāva nikkhami.
atk-s0201a:2813_2: Vinayadharo pacchā paviṭṭho taṃ udakaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchi, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:2813_3: tayā idaṃ udakaṃ ṭhapitanti? Āma, āvusoti. Tvamettha āpattibhāvaṃ na jānāsīti? Āma
atk-s0201a:2813_4: na jānāmīti. Hoti, āvuso, ettha āpattīti. Sace hoti desessāmīti. Sace pana te, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:2813_5: asañcicca asatiyā kataṃ, natthi te āpattīti. So tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2814_0: Vinayadharo attano nissitakānaṃ, “ayaṃ suttantiko āpattiṃ āpajjamānopi na jānātī”ti
atk-s0201a:2814_1: ārocesi. Te tassa nissitake disvā – “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo āpattiṃ āpajjitvāpi āpattibhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2814_2: na jānātī”ti āhaṃsu. Te gantvā attano upajjhāyassa ārocesuṃ. So evamāha – “ayaṃ vinayadharo
atk-s0201a:2814_3: pubbe ‘anāpattī’ti vatvā idāni ‘āpattī’ti vadati, musāvādī eso”ti. Te gantvā, “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0201a:2814_4: upajjhāyo musāvādī”ti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2815_0: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti etaṃ, “idha, bhante, kosambiyaṃ bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā”tiādivacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2815_1: avoca. Tañca kho neva piyakamyatāya na bhedādhippāyena, atha kho atthakāmatāya hitakāmatāya.
atk-s0201a:2815_2: Sāmaggikārako kiresa bhikkhu, tasmāssa etadahosi – “yathā ime bhikkhū vivādaṃ āraddhā,
atk-s0201a:2815_3: na sakkā mayā, nāpi aññena bhikkhunā samaggā kātuṃ, appeva nāma sadevake loke appaṭipuggalo
atk-s0201a:2815_4: bhagavā sayaṃ vā gantvā, attano vā santikaṃ pakkosāpetvā etesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khantimettāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2815_5: sāraṇīyadhammadesanaṃ kathetvā sāmaggiṃ kareyyā”ti atthakāmatāya hitakāmatāya gantvā avoca.
atk-s0201a:2816_0: 492. Chayime, bhikkhave, dhammā sāraṇīyāti heṭṭhā kalahabhaṇḍanavasena desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0201a:2816_1: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne cha sāraṇīyā dhammā āgatāti evamidaṃ kosambiyasuttaṃ yathānusandhināva
atk-s0201a:2816_2: gataṃ hoti. Tattha sāraṇīyāti saritabbayuttā addhāne atikkantepi na pamussitabbā.
atk-s0201a:2816_3: Yo te dhamme pūreti, taṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyaṃ karontīti piyakaraṇā. Garuṃ karontīti
atk-s0201a:2816_4: garukaraṇā. Saṅgahāyāti saṅgahaṇatthāya. Avivādāyāti avivādanatthāya. Sāmaggiyāti
atk-s0201a:2816_5: samaggabhāvatthāya. Ekībhāvāyāti ekībhāvatthāya ninnānākaraṇāya. Saṃvattantīti bhavanti.
atk-s0201a:2816_6: Mettaṃ kāyakammanti mettacittena kattabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Vacīkammamanokammesupi eseva
atk-s0201a:2816_7: nayo. Imāni bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni, gihīsupi labbhantiyeva. Bhikkhūnañhi mettacittena
atk-s0201a:2816_8: ābhisamācārikadhammapūraṇaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Gihīnaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya bodhivandanatthāya
atk-s0201a:2816_9: saṅghanimantanatthāya gamanaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhe bhikkhū disvā paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2816_10: pattapaṭiggahaṇaṃ āsanapaññāpanaṃ anugamananti evamādikaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2817_1: tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. Gihīnañca, “cetiyavandanatthāya
atk-s0201a:2817_2: gacchāma, bodhivandanatthāya gacchāma, dhammassavanaṃ karissāma, padīpamālāpupphapūjaṃ
atk-s0201a:2817_3: karissāma, tīṇi sucaritāni samādāya vattissāma, salākabhattādīni dassāma, vassāvāsikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2817_4: dassāma, ajja saṅghassa cattāro paccaye dassāma, saṅghaṃ nimantetvā khādanīyādīni
atk-s0201a:2817_5: saṃvidahatha, āsanāni paññāpetha, pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetha, saṅghaṃ paccuggantvā ānetha,
atk-s0201a:2817_6: paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā chandajātā ussāhajātā veyyāvaccaṃ karothā”tiādikathanakāle
atk-s0201a:2818_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni ca katvā vivittāsane
atk-s0201a:2818_1: nisīditvā, “imasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū sukhī hontu, averā abyāpajjhā”ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ
atk-s0201a:2818_2: manokammaṃ nāma. Gihīnaṃ “ayyā sukhī hontu, averā abyāpajjhā”ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2819_0: Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ca parammukhā ca. Tattha navakānaṃ cīvarakammādīsu sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2819_1: sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Therānaṃ pana pādadhovanavandanabījanadānādibhedampi
atk-s0201a:2819_2: sabbaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2819_3: tesu avamaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittānaṃ viya paṭisāmanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2819_4: nāma. Devatthero tissattheroti evaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2819_5: Vihāre asantaṃ pana paripucchantassa, kuhiṃ amhākaṃ devatthero, amhākaṃ tissatthero
atk-s0201a:2819_6: kadā nu kho āgamissatīti evaṃ mamāyanavacanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2819_7: Mettāsinehasiniddhāni pana nayanāni ummīletvā suppasannena mukhena olokanaṃ sammukhā
atk-s0201a:2819_8: mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma. Devatthero, tissatthero arogo hotu appābādhoti samannāharaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2820_0: Lābhāti cīvarādayo laddhapaccayā. Dhammikāti kuhanādibhedaṃ micchājīvaṃ vajjetvā
atk-s0201a:2820_1: dhammena samena bhikkhācariyavattena uppannā. Antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampīti
atk-s0201a:2820_2: pacchimakoṭiyā patte pariyāpannaṃ pattassa antogataṃ dvattikaṭacchubhikkhāmattampi.
atk-s0201a:2820_3: Appaṭivibhattabhogīti ettha dve paṭivibhattāni nāma āmisapaṭivibhattaṃ puggalapaṭivibhattañca.
atk-s0201a:2820_4: Tattha, “ettakaṃ dassāmi, ettakaṃ na dassāmī”ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ āmisapaṭivibhattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2820_5: nāma. “Asukassa dassāmi, asukassa na dassāmī”ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ pana puggalapaṭivibhattaṃ
atk-s0201a:2820_6: nāma. Tadubhayampi akatvā yo appaṭivibhattaṃ bhuñjati, ayaṃ appaṭivibhattabhogī nāma.
atk-s0201a:2821_0: Sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogīti ettha sādhāraṇabhogino idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2821_1: yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ labbhati, taṃ taṃ neva lābhena lābhaṃ jigīsanāmukhena gihīnaṃ deti,
atk-s0201a:2821_2: na attanā paribhuñjati; paṭiggaṇhantova saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti gahetvā gaṇḍiṃ
atk-s0201a:2821_3: paharitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ saṅghasantakaṃ viya passati. Idaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2821_4: ko pūreti, ko na pūretīti? Dussīlo tāva na pūreti. Na hi tassa santakaṃ sīlavantā
atk-s0201a:2821_5: gaṇhanti. Parisuddhasīlo pana vattaṃ akhaṇḍento pūreti.
atk-s0201a:2822_0: Tatridaṃ vattaṃ – yo hi odissakaṃ katvā mātu vā pitu vā ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā deti,
atk-s0201a:2822_1: so dātabbaṃ deti, sāraṇīyadhammo panassa na hoti, palibodhajagganaṃ nāma hoti. Sāraṇīyadhammo
atk-s0201a:2822_2: hi muttapalibodhasseva vaṭṭati, tena pana odissakaṃ dentena gilānagilānupaṭṭhākaāgantukagamikānañceva
atk-s0201a:2822_3: navapabbajitassa ca saṅghāṭipattaggahaṇaṃ ajānantassa dātabbaṃ. Etesaṃ datvā avasesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2822_4: therāsanato paṭṭhāya thokaṃ thokaṃ adatvā yo yattakaṃ gaṇhāti, tassa tattakaṃ dātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2822_5: Avasiṭṭhe asati puna piṇḍāya caritvā therāsanato paṭṭhāya yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ, taṃ taṃ
atk-s0201a:2822_6: datvā sesaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ, “sīlavantehī”ti vacanato dussīlassa adātumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2823_0: Ayaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammo susikkhitāya parisāya supūro hoti, no asikkhitāya parisāya.
atk-s0201a:2823_1: Susikkhitāya hi parisāya yo aññato labhati, so na gaṇhāti, aññato alabhantopi pamāṇayuttameva
atk-s0201a:2823_2: gaṇhāti, na atirekaṃ. Ayañca pana sāraṇīyadhammo evaṃ punappunaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0201a:2823_3: laddhaṃ laddhaṃ dentassāpi dvādasahi vassehi pūrati, na tato oraṃ. Sace hi dvādasamepi
atk-s0201a:2823_4: vasse sāraṇīyadhammapūrako piṇḍapātapūraṃ pattaṃ āsanasālāyaṃ ṭhapetvā nahāyituṃ
atk-s0201a:2823_5: gacchati, saṅghatthero ca kasseso pattoti? Sāraṇīyadhammapūrakassāti vutte – “āharatha
atk-s0201a:2823_6: na”nti sabbaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vicāretvā bhuñjitvā ca rittapattaṃ ṭhapeti. Atha so bhikkhu
atk-s0201a:2823_7: rittapattaṃ disvā, “mayhaṃ asesetvāva paribhuñjiṃsū”ti domanassaṃ uppādeti, sāraṇīyadhammo
atk-s0201a:2823_8: bhijjati, puna dvādasa vassāni pūretabbo hoti, titthiyaparivāsasadiso hesa. Sakiṃ
atk-s0201a:2823_9: khaṇḍe jāte puna pūretabbova. Yo pana, “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me
atk-s0201a:2823_10: pattagataṃ anāpucchāva sabrahmacārī paribhuñjantī”ti somanassaṃ janeti, tassa puṇṇo nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2824_0: Evaṃ pūritasāraṇīyadhammassa pana neva issā, na macchariyaṃ hoti, so manussānaṃ piyo
atk-s0201a:2824_1: hoti, sulabhapaccayo; pattagatamassa dīyamānampi na khīyati, bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne
atk-s0201a:2824_2: aggabhaṇḍaṃ labhati, bhaye vā chātake vā sampatte devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0201a:2825_0: Tatrimāni vatthūni – leṇagirivāsī tissatthero kira mahāgirigāmaṃ upanissāya vasati.
atk-s0201a:2825_1: Paññāsa mahātherā nāgadīpaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya gacchantā girigāme piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0201a:2825_2: kiñci aladdhā nikkhamiṃsu. Thero pavisanto te disvā pucchi – “laddhaṃ, bhante”ti?
atk-s0201a:2825_3: Vicarimhā, āvusoti. So aladdhabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha – “yāvāhaṃ, bhante, āgacchāmi, tāva
atk-s0201a:2825_4: idheva hothā”ti. Mayaṃ, āvuso, paññāsa janā pattatemanamattampi na labhimhāti. Nevāsikā
atk-s0201a:2825_5: nāma, bhante, paṭibalā honti, alabhantāpi bhikkhācāramaggasabhāvaṃ jānantīti. Therā
atk-s0201a:2825_6: āgamiṃsu. Thero gāmaṃ pāvisi. Dhurageheyeva mahāupāsikā khīrabhattaṃ sajjetvā theraṃ
atk-s0201a:2825_7: olokayamānā ṭhitā therassa dvāraṃ sampattasseva pattaṃ pūretvā adāsi. So taṃ ādāya
atk-s0201a:2825_8: therānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā, “gaṇhatha, bhante”ti saṅghattheramāha. Thero, “amhehi ettakehi
atk-s0201a:2825_9: kiñci na laddhaṃ, ayaṃ sīghameva gahetvā āgato, kiṃ nu kho”ti sesānaṃ mukhaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0201a:2825_10: Thero olokanākāreneva ñatvā – “dhammena samena laddhapiṇḍapāto, nikkukkuccā gaṇhatha
atk-s0201a:2825_11: bhante”tiādito paṭṭhāya sabbesaṃ yāvadatthaṃ datvā attanāpi yāvadatthaṃ bhuñji.
atk-s0201a:2826_0: Atha naṃ bhattakiccāvasāne therā pucchiṃsu – “kadā, āvuso, lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhī”ti?
atk-s0201a:2826_1: Natthi me, bhante, lokuttaradhammoti. Jhānalābhīsi, āvusoti? Etampi me, bhante, natthīti.
atk-s0201a:2826_2: Nanu, āvuso, pāṭihāriyanti? Sāraṇīyadhammo me, bhante, pūrito, tassa me dhammassa
atk-s0201a:2826_3: pūritakālato paṭṭhāya sacepi bhikkhusatasahassaṃ hoti, pattagataṃ na khīyatīti. Sādhu
atk-s0201a:2826_4: sādhu, sappurisa, anucchavikamidaṃ tuyhanti. Idaṃ tāva pattagataṃ na khīyatīti ettha vatthu.
atk-s0201a:2827_0: Ayameva pana thero cetiyapabbate giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāya dānaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā, “imasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2827_1: ṭhāne kiṃ varabhaṇḍa”nti pucchati. Dve sāṭakā, bhanteti. Ete mayhaṃ pāpuṇissantīti.
atk-s0201a:2827_2: Taṃ sutvā amacco rañño ārocesi – “eko daharo evaṃ vadatī”ti. “Daharassevaṃ cittaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2827_3: mahātherānaṃ pana sukhumasāṭakā vaṭṭantī”ti vatvā, “mahātherānaṃ dassāmī”ti ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2827_4: Tassa bhikkhusaṅghe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite dentassa matthake ṭhapitāpi te sāṭakā hatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2827_5: nārohanti, aññeva ārohanti. Daharassa dānakāle pana hatthaṃ āruḷhā. So tassa hatthe
atk-s0201a:2827_6: ṭhapetvā amaccassa mukhaṃ oloketvā daharaṃ nisīdāpetvā dānaṃ datvā saṅghaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0201a:2827_7: daharassa santike nisīditvā, “kadā, bhante, imaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhitthā”ti āha. So
atk-s0201a:2827_8: pariyāyenapi asantaṃ avadanto, “natthi mayhaṃ, mahārāja, lokuttaradhammo”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2827_9: Nanu, bhante, pubbeva avacutthāti? Āma, mahārāja, sāraṇīyadhammapūrako ahaṃ, tassa
atk-s0201a:2827_10: me dhammassa pūritakālato paṭṭhāya bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0201a:2827_11: Sādhu sādhu, bhante, anucchavikamidaṃ tumhākanti vanditvā pakkāmi. Idaṃ bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne
atk-s0201a:2828_0: Brāhmaṇatissabhaye pana bhātaragāmavāsino nāgattheriyā anārocetvāva palāyiṃsu. Therī
atk-s0201a:2828_1: paccūsakāle, “ativiya appanigghoso gāmo, upadhāretha tāvā”ti daharabhikkhuniyo āha.
atk-s0201a:2828_2: Tā gantvā sabbesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgamma theriyā ārocesuṃ. Sā sutvā, “mā tumhe
atk-s0201a:2828_3: tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ cintayittha, attano uddesaparipucchāyonisomanasikāresuyeva yogaṃ
atk-s0201a:2828_4: karothā”ti vatvā bhikkhācāravelāya pārupitvā attadvādasamā gāmadvāre nigrodharukkhamūle
atk-s0201a:2828_5: aṭṭhāsi. Rukkhe adhivatthā devatā dvādasannampi bhikkhunīnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ datvā, “ayye,
atk-s0201a:2828_6: aññattha mā gacchatha, niccaṃ idheva ethā”ti āha. Theriyā pana kaniṭṭhabhātā nāgatthero
atk-s0201a:2828_7: nāma atthi. So, “mahantaṃ bhayaṃ, na sakkā idha yāpetuṃ, paratīraṃ gamissāmāti attadvādasamova
atk-s0201a:2828_8: attano vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhanto theriṃ disvā gamissāmī”ti bhātaragāmaṃ āgato. Therī,
atk-s0201a:2828_9: “therā āgatā”ti sutvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā, kiṃ ayyāti pucchi. So taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0201a:2828_10: Sā, “ajja ekadivasaṃ vihāreyeva vasitvā sveva gamissathā”ti āha. Therā vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2829_0: Therī punadivase rukkhamūle piṇḍāya caritvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0201a:2829_1: paribhuñjathā”ti āha. Thero, “vaṭṭissati therī”ti vatvā tuṇhī aṭṭhāsi. Dhammiko tātā
atk-s0201a:2829_2: piṇḍapāto kukkuccaṃ akatvā paribhuñjathāti. Vaṭṭissati therīti. Sā pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0201a:2829_3: ākāse khipi, patto ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Thero, “sattatālamatte ṭhitampi bhikkhunībhattameva,
atk-s0201a:2829_4: therīti vatvā bhayaṃ nāma sabbakālaṃ na hoti, bhaye vūpasante ariyavaṃsaṃ kathayamāno,
atk-s0201a:2829_5: ‘bho piṇḍapātika bhikkhunībhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vītināmayitthā’ti cittena anuvadiyamāno
atk-s0201a:2829_6: santhambhetuṃ na sakkhissāmi, appamattā hotha theriyo”ti maggaṃ āruhi.
atk-s0201a:2830_0: Rukkhadevatāpi, “sace thero theriyā hatthato piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjissati, na naṃ nivattessāmi,
atk-s0201a:2830_1: sace pana na paribhuñjissati, nivattessāmī”ti cintayamānā ṭhatvā therassa gamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2830_2: disvā rukkhā oruyha pattaṃ, bhante, dethāti pattaṃ gahetvā theraṃ rukkhamūlaṃyeva
atk-s0201a:2830_3: ānetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā piṇḍapātaṃ datvā katabhattakiccaṃ paṭiññaṃ kāretvā dvādasa
atk-s0201a:2830_4: bhikkhuniyo, dvādasa ca bhikkhū satta vassāni upaṭṭhahi. Idaṃ devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjantīti
atk-s0201a:2830_5: ettha vatthu, tatra hi therī sāraṇīyadhammapūrikā ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2831_0: Akhaṇḍānītiādīsu yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2831_1: hoti, tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ nāma. Yassa pana vemajjhe bhinnaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2831_2: tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa pana paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi
atk-s0201a:2831_3: bhinnāni, tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ vā kucchiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2831_4: aññataravaṇṇā gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa pana antarantarā bhinnāni, tassa
atk-s0201a:2831_5: antarantarā visabhāgabinducitrā gāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa pana sabbena
atk-s0201a:2831_6: sabbaṃ abhinnāni, tassa tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni nāma
atk-s0201a:2831_7: honti. Tāni panetāni taṇhādāsabyato mocetvā bhujissabhāvakaraṇato bhujissāni. Buddhādīhi
atk-s0201a:2831_8: viññūhi pasatthattā viññuppasatthāni. Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā, “idaṃ nāma tvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2831_9: āpannapubbo”ti kenaci parāmaṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca aparāmaṭṭhāni. Upacārasamādhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2831_10: vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti samādhisaṃvattanikānīti vuccanti. Sīlasāmaññagato
atk-s0201a:2831_11: viharatīti tesu tesu disābhāgesu viharantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samānabhāvūpagatasīlo
atk-s0201a:2831_12: viharati. Sotāpannādīnañhi sīlaṃ samuddantarepi devalokepi vasantānaṃ aññesaṃ sotāpannādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2831_13: sīlena samānameva hoti, natthi maggasīle nānattaṃ, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2832_0: Yāyaṃ diṭṭhīti maggasampayuttā sammādiṭṭhi. Ariyāti niddosā. Niyyātīti niyyānikā.
atk-s0201a:2832_1: Takkarassāti yo tathākārī hoti. Dukkhakkhayāyāti sabbadukkhakkhayatthaṃ. Diṭṭhisāmaññagatoti
atk-s0201a:2832_2: samānadiṭṭhibhāvaṃ upagato hutvā viharati. Agganti jeṭṭhakaṃ. Sabbagopānasiyo saṅgaṇhātīti
atk-s0201a:2832_3: saṅgāhikaṃ. Sabbagopānasīnaṃ saṅghāṭaṃ karotīti saṅghāṭanikaṃ. Saṅghāṭaniyanti attho.
atk-s0201a:2832_4: Yadidaṃ kūṭanti yametaṃ kūṭāgārakaṇṇikāsaṅkhātaṃ kūṭaṃ nāma. Pañcabhūmikādipāsādā
atk-s0201a:2832_5: hi kūṭabaddhāva tiṭṭhanti. Yasmiṃ patite mattikaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe patanti. Tasmā
atk-s0201a:2832_6: evamāha. Evameva khoti yathā kūṭaṃ kūṭāgārassa, evaṃ imesampi sāraṇīyadhammānaṃ yā
atk-s0201a:2832_7: ayaṃ ariyā diṭṭhi, sā aggā ca saṅgāhikā ca saṅghāṭaniyā cāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0201a:2833_0: 493. Kathañca, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ diṭṭhīti ettha, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ sotāpattimaggadiṭṭhi
atk-s0201a:2833_1: ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti vuttā, sā kathaṃ kena kāraṇena
atk-s0201a:2833_2: niyyātīti attho. Pariyuṭṭhitacittova hotīti ettāvatāpi pariyuṭṭhitacittoyeva nāma
atk-s0201a:2833_3: hotīti attho. Esa nayo sabbattha. Suppaṇihitaṃ me mānasanti mayhaṃ cittaṃ suṭṭhu
atk-s0201a:2833_4: ṭhapitaṃ. Saccānaṃ bodhāyāti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ bodhatthāya. Ariyantiādīsu taṃ ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2833_5: yasmā ariyānaṃ hoti, na puthujjanānaṃ, tasmā ariyanti vuttaṃ. Yesaṃ pana lokuttaradhammopi
atk-s0201a:2833_6: atthi, tesaṃyeva hoti, na aññesaṃ, tasmā lokuttaranti vuttaṃ. Puthujjanānaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:2833_7: abhāvato asādhāraṇaṃ puthujjanehīti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sabbavāresu.
atk-s0201a:2834: 494. Labhāmi paccattaṃ samathanti attano citte samathaṃ labhāmīti attho. Nibbutiyampi eseva nayo. Ettha ca samathoti ekaggatā. Nibbutīti kilesavūpasamo.
atk-s0201a:2836_0: 496. Dhammatāyāti sabhāvena. Dhammatā esāti sabhāvo esa. Vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyatīti saṅghakammavasena
atk-s0201a:2836_1: vā desanāya vā vuṭṭhānaṃ dissati. Ariyasāvako hi āpattiṃ āpajjanto garukāpattīsu
atk-s0201a:2836_2: kuṭikārasadisaṃ, lahukāpattīsu sahaseyyādisadisaṃ acittakāpattiṃyeva āpajjati, tampi
atk-s0201a:2836_3: asañcicca, no sañcicca, āpannaṃ na paṭicchādeti. Tasmā atha kho naṃ khippamevātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2836_4: Daharoti taruṇo. Kumāroti na mahallako. Mandoti cakkhusotādīnaṃ mandatāya mando.
atk-s0201a:2836_5: Uttānaseyyakoti atidaharatāya uttānaseyyako, dakkhiṇena vā vāmena vā passena sayituṃ
atk-s0201a:2836_6: na sakkotīti attho. Aṅgāraṃ akkamitvāti ito cito ca pasāritena hatthena vā pādena
atk-s0201a:2836_7: vā phusitvā. Evaṃ phusantānaṃ pana manussānaṃ na sīghaṃ hattho jhāyati, tathā hi
atk-s0201a:2836_8: ekacce hatthena aṅgāraṃ gahetvā parivattamānā dūrampi gacchanti. Daharassa pana hatthapādā
atk-s0201a:2836_9: sukhumālā honti, so phuṭṭhamatteneva dayhamāno cirīti saddaṃ karonto khippaṃ paṭisaṃharati,
atk-s0201a:2836_10: tasmā idha daharova dassito. Mahallako ca dayhantopi adhivāseti, ayaṃ pana adhivāsetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2836_11: na sakkoti. Tasmāpi daharova dassito. Desetīti āpattipaṭiggāhake sabhāgapuggale sati
atk-s0201a:2836_12: ekaṃ divasaṃ vā rattiṃ vā anadhivāsetvā rattiṃ caturaṅgepi tame sabhāgabhikkhuno
atk-s0201a:2837_0: 497. Uccāvacānīti uccanīcāni. Kiṃ karaṇīyānīti kiṃ karomīti evaṃ vatvā kattabbakammāni.
atk-s0201a:2837_1: Tattha uccakammaṃ nāma cīvarassa karaṇaṃ rajanaṃ cetiye sudhākammaṃ uposathāgāracetiyagharabodhigharesu
atk-s0201a:2837_2: kattabbakammanti evamādi. Avacakammaṃ nāma pādadhovanamakkhanādikhuddakakammaṃ, atha
atk-s0201a:2837_3: vā cetiye sudhākammādi uccakammaṃ nāma. Tattheva kasāvapacanaudakānayanakucchakaraṇa
atk-s0201a:2837_4: niyyāsabandhanādi avacakammaṃ nāma. Ussukkaṃ āpanno hotīti ussukkabhāvaṃ kattabbataṃ
atk-s0201a:2837_5: paṭipanno hoti. Tibbāpekkho hotīti bahalapatthano hoti. Thambañca ālumpatīti tiṇañca
atk-s0201a:2837_6: ālumpamānā khādati. Vacchakañca apacinātīti vacchakañca apaloketi. Taruṇavacchā hi
atk-s0201a:2837_7: gāvī araññe ekato āgataṃ vacchakaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nipannaṃ pahāya dūraṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2837_8: vacchakassa āsannaṭṭhāne caramānā tiṇaṃ ālumpitvā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā ekantaṃ vacchakameva
atk-s0201a:2837_9: ca viloketi, evameva sotāpanno uccāvacāni kiṃ karaṇīyāni karonto tanninno hoti, asithilapūrako
atk-s0201a:2838_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – mahācetiye kira sudhākamme kariyamāne eko ariyasāvako ekena hatthena
atk-s0201a:2838_1: sudhābhājanaṃ, ekena kucchaṃ gahetvā sudhākammaṃ karissāmīti cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruḷho.
atk-s0201a:2838_2: Eko kāyadaḷhibahulo bhikkhu gantvā therassa santike aṭṭhāsi. Thero aññasmiṃ sati
atk-s0201a:2838_3: papañco hotīti tasmā ṭhānā aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato. Sopi bhikkhu tattheva agamāsi. Thero
atk-s0201a:2838_4: puna aññaṃ ṭhānanti evaṃ katipayaṭṭhāne āgataṃ, – “sappurisa mahantaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2838_5: kiṃ aññasmiṃ ṭhāne okāsaṃ na labhathā”ti āha. Na itaro pakkāmīti.
atk-s0201a:2839_0: 498. Balatāya samannāgatoti balena samannāgato. Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti atthikabhāvaṃ katvā,
atk-s0201a:2839_1: atthiko hutvāti attho. Manasikatvāti manasmiṃ karitvā. Sabbacetasā samannāharitvāti
atk-s0201a:2839_2: appamattakampi vikkhepaṃ akaronto sakalacittena samannāharitvā. Ohitasototi ṭhapitasoto.
atk-s0201a:2839_3: Ariyasāvakā hi piyadhammassavanā honti, dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā niddāyamānā vā yena
atk-s0201a:2839_4: kenaci saddhiṃ sallapamānā vā vikkhittacittā vā na nisīdanti, atha kho amataṃ paribhuñjantā
atk-s0201a:2839_5: viya atittāva honti dhammassavane, atha aruṇaṃ uggacchati. Tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2840_0: 500. Dhammatā susamanniṭṭhā hotīti sabhāvo suṭṭhu samannesito hoti. Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyāti
atk-s0201a:2840_2: evaṃ imehi sattahi mahāpaccavekkhaṇañāṇehi samannāgato. Ayaṃ tāva ācariyānaṃ samānakathā.
atk-s0201a:2841_0: Vitaṇḍavādī pana ekacittakkhaṇiko nāma maggo natthi, “evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī”ti
atk-s0201a:2841_1: hi vacanato sattapi vassāni maggabhāvanā honti. Kilesā pana lahu chijjantā sattahi
atk-s0201a:2841_2: ñāṇehi chijjantīti vadati. So suttaṃ āharāti vattabbo, addhā aññaṃ suttaṃ apassanto,
atk-s0201a:2841_3: “idamassa paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hoti, idamassa dutiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ…pe… idamassa sattamaṃ
atk-s0201a:2841_4: ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hotī”ti imameva āharitvā dassessati. Tato vattabbo kiṃ panidaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2841_5: neyyatthaṃ nītatthanti. Tato vakkhati – “nītatthatthaṃ, yathāsuttaṃ tatheva attho”ti.
atk-s0201a:2841_6: So vattabbo – “dhammatā susamanniṭṭhā hoti sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyāti ettha ko
atk-s0201a:2841_7: attho”ti? Addhā sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyatthoti vakkhati. Tato pucchitabbo, “maggasamaṅgī
atk-s0201a:2841_8: phalaṃ sacchikaroti, phalasamaṅgī”ti. Jānanto, “phalasamaṅgī sacchikarotī”ti vakkhati.
atk-s0201a:2841_9: Tato vattabbo, – “evaṃ sattaṅgasamannāgato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpattiphalasamannāgato
atk-s0201a:2841_10: hotīti idha maggaṃ abhāvetvā maṇḍūko viya uppatitvā ariyasāvako phalameva gaṇhissati.
atk-s0201a:2841_11: Mā suttaṃ me laddhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā avaca. Pañhaṃ vissajjentena nāma ācariyasantike
atk-s0201a:2841_12: vasitvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā attharasaṃ viditvā vattabbaṃ hotī”ti. “Imāni satta
atk-s0201a:2841_13: ñāṇāni ariyasāvakassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇāneva, lokuttaramaggo bahucittakkhaṇiko nāma
atk-s0201a:2841_14: natthi, ekacittakkhaṇikoyevā”ti saññāpetabbo. Sace sañjānāti sañjānātu. No ce sañjānāti,
atk-s0201a:2841_15: “gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī”ti uyyojetabbo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0201a:2845_0: 501. Evaṃ me sutanti brahmanimantanikasuttaṃ. Tattha pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigatanti lāmakā
atk-s0201a:2845_1: sassatadiṭṭhi. Idaṃ niccanti idaṃ saha kāyena brahmaṭṭhānaṃ aniccaṃ “nicca”nti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2845_2: Dhuvādīni tasseva vevacanāni. Tattha dhuvanti thiraṃ. Sassatanti sadā vijjamānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2845_3: Kevalanti akhaṇḍaṃ sakalaṃ. Acavanadhammanti acavanasabhāvaṃ. Idañhi na jāyatītiādīsu
atk-s0201a:2845_4: imasmiṃ ṭhāne koci jāyanako vā jīyanako vā mīyanako vā cavanako vā upapajjanako vā
atk-s0201a:2845_5: natthīti sandhāya vadati. Ito ca panaññanti ito saha kāyakā brahmaṭṭhānā uttari aññaṃ
atk-s0201a:2845_6: nissaraṇaṃ nāma natthīti evamassa thāmagatā sassatadiṭṭhi uppannā hoti. Evaṃvādī
atk-s0201a:2845_7: pana so upari tisso jhānabhūmiyo cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni nibbānanti sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2845_8: paṭibāhati. Avijjāgatoti avijjāya gato samannāgato aññāṇī andhībhūto. Yatra hi nāmāti yo nāma.
atk-s0201a:2846_0: 502. Atha kho, bhikkhave, māro pāpimāti māro kathaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasa? So kira attano
atk-s0201a:2846_1: bhavane nisīditvā kālena kālaṃ satthāraṃ āvajjeti – “ajja samaṇo gotamo katarasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2846_2: gāme vā nigame vā vasatī”ti. Imasmiṃ pana kāle āvajjanto, “ukkaṭṭhaṃ nissāya subhagavane
atk-s0201a:2846_3: viharatī”ti ñatvā, “kattha nu kho gato”ti olokento brahmalokaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a:2846_4: “samaṇo gotamo brahmalokaṃ gacchati, yāva tattha dhammakathaṃ kathetvā brahmagaṇaṃ
atk-s0201a:2846_5: mama visayā nātikkameti, tāva gantvā dhammadesanāyaṃ vichandaṃ karissāmī”ti satthu
atk-s0201a:2846_6: padānupadiko gantvā brahmagaṇassa antare adissamānena kāyena aṭṭhāsi. So, “satthārā
atk-s0201a:2846_7: bakabrahmā apasādito”ti ñatvā brahmuno upatthambho hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha
atk-s0201a:2847_0: Brahmapārisajjaṃ anvāvisitvāti ekassa brahmapārisajjassa sarīraṃ pavisitvā. Mahābrahmānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2847_1: pana brahmapurohitānaṃ vā anvāvisituṃ na sakkoti. Metamāsadoti mā etaṃ apasādayittha.
atk-s0201a:2847_2: Abhibhūti abhibhavitvā ṭhito jeṭṭhako. Anabhibhūtoti aññehi anabhibhūto. Aññadatthūti
atk-s0201a:2847_3: ekaṃsavacane nipāto. Dassanavasena daso, sabbaṃ passatīti dīpeti. Vasavattīti sabbajanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2847_4: vase vatteti. Issaroti loke issaro. Kattā nimmātāti lokassa kattā ca nimmātā ca,
atk-s0201a:2848_0: Seṭṭho sajitāti ayaṃ lokassa uttamo ca sajitā ca. “Tvaṃ khattiyo nāma hohi, tvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2848_1: brāhmaṇo nāma, vesso nāma, suddo nāma, gahaṭṭho nāma, pabbajito nāma, antamaso oṭṭho
atk-s0201a:2848_2: hohi, goṇo hohī”ti evaṃ sattānaṃ visajjetā ayanti dasseti. Vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānanti
atk-s0201a:2848_3: ayaṃ ciṇṇavasitāya vasī, ayaṃ pitā bhūtānañca bhabyānañcāti vadati. Tattha aṇḍajajalābujā
atk-s0201a:2848_4: sattā antoaṇḍakose ceva antovatthimhi ca bhabyā nāma, bahi nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:2848_5: bhūtā. Saṃsedajā paṭhamacittakkhaṇe bhabyā, dutiyato paṭṭhāya bhūtā. Opapātikā paṭhamairiyāpathe
atk-s0201a:2848_6: bhabyā, dutiyato paṭṭhāya bhūtāti veditabbā. Te sabbepi etassa puttāti saññāya, “pitā
atk-s0201a:2849_0: Pathavīgarahakāti yathā tvaṃ etarahi, “aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti pathaviṃ garahasi
atk-s0201a:2849_1: jigucchasi, evaṃ tepi pathavīgarahakā ahesuṃ, na kevalaṃ tvaṃyevāti dīpeti. Āpagarahakātiādīsupi
atk-s0201a:2849_2: eseva nayo. Hīne kāye patiṭṭhitāti catūsu apāyesu nibbattā. Pathavīpasaṃsakāti yathā
atk-s0201a:2849_3: tvaṃ garahasi, evaṃ agarahitvā, “niccā dhuvā sassatā acchejjā abhejjā akkhayā”ti
atk-s0201a:2849_4: evaṃ pathavīpasaṃsakā pathaviyā vaṇṇavādino ahesunti vadati. Pathavābhinandinoti
atk-s0201a:2849_5: taṇhādiṭṭhivasena pathaviyā abhinandino. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Paṇīte kāye patiṭṭhitāti
atk-s0201a:2849_6: brahmaloke nibbattā. Taṃ tāhanti tena kāraṇena taṃ ahaṃ. Iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto.
atk-s0201a:2849_7: Upātivattitthoti atikkamittha. “Upātivattito”tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. Daṇḍena paṭippaṇāmeyyāti
atk-s0201a:2849_8: catuhatthena muggaradaṇḍena pothetvā palāpeyya. Narakapapāteti sataporise mahāsobbhe.
atk-s0201a:2849_9: Virādheyyāti hatthena gahaṇayutte vā pādena patiṭṭhānayutte vā ṭhāne gahaṇapatiṭṭhānāni
atk-s0201a:2849_10: kātuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu passasīti bhikkhu nanu tvaṃ imaṃ brahmaparisaṃ
atk-s0201a:2849_11: sannipatitaṃ obhāsamānaṃ virocamānaṃ jotayamānaṃ passasīti brahmuno ovāde ṭhitānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2849_12: iddhānubhāvaṃ dasseti. Iti kho maṃ, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā brahmaparisaṃ upanesīti,
atk-s0201a:2849_13: bhikkhave, māro pāpimā nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu passasi brahmaparisaṃ yasena ca siriyā ca
atk-s0201a:2849_14: obhāsamānaṃ virocamānaṃ jotayamānaṃ, yadi tvampi mahābrahmuno vacanaṃ anatikkamitvā
atk-s0201a:2849_15: yadeva te brahmā vadati, taṃ kareyyāsi, tvampi evamevaṃ yasena ca siriyā ca viroceyyāsīti
atk-s0201a:2849_16: evaṃ vadanto maṃ brahmaparisaṃ upanesi upasaṃhari. Mā tvaṃ maññitthoti mā tvaṃ maññi.
atk-s0201a:2849_17: Māro tvamasi pāpimāti pāpima tvaṃ mahājanassa māraṇato māro nāma, pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2849_18: mahājanassa ayasaṃ karaṇato pāpimā nāmāti jānāmi.
atk-s0201a:2850_0: 503. Kasiṇaṃ āyunti sakalaṃ āyuṃ. Te kho evaṃ jāneyyunti te evaṃ mahantena tapokammena
atk-s0201a:2850_1: samannāgatā, tvaṃ pana purimadivase jāto, kiṃ jānissasi, yassa te ajjāpi mukhe khīragandho
atk-s0201a:2850_2: vāyatīti ghaṭṭento vadati. Pathaviṃ ajjhosissasīti pathaviṃ ajjhosāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2850_3: taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi gaṇhissasi. Opasāyiko me bhavissasīti mayhaṃ samīpasayo bhavissasi,
atk-s0201a:2850_4: maṃ gacchantaṃ anugacchissasi, ṭhitaṃ upatiṭṭhissasi, nisinnaṃ upanisīdissasi, nipannaṃ
atk-s0201a:2850_5: upanipajjissasīti attho. Vatthusāyikoti mama vatthusmiṃ sayanako. Yathākāmakaraṇīyo
atk-s0201a:2850_6: bāhiteyyoti mayā attano ruciyā yaṃ icchāmi, taṃ kattabbo, bāhitvā ca pana jajjharikāgumbatopi
atk-s0201a:2851_0: Iminā esa bhagavantaṃ upalāpeti vā apasādeti vā. Upalāpeti nāma sace kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0201a:2851_1: taṇhādīhi pathaviṃ ajjhosissasi, opasāyiko me bhavissasi, mayi gacchante gamissasi,
atk-s0201a:2851_2: tiṭṭhante ṭhassasi, nisinne nisīdissasi, nipanne nipajjissasi, ahaṃ taṃ sesajanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2851_3: paṭibāhitvā vissāsikaṃ abbhantarikaṃ karissāmīti evaṃ tāva upalāpeti nāma. Sesapadehi
atk-s0201a:2851_4: pana apasādeti nāma. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – sace tvaṃ pathaviṃ ajjhosissasi, vatthusāyiko
atk-s0201a:2851_5: me bhavissasi, mama gamanādīni āgametvā gamissasi vā ṭhassasi vā nisīdissasi vā nipajjissasi
atk-s0201a:2851_6: vā, mama vatthusmiṃ mayhaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhissasi, ahaṃ pana taṃ yathākāmaṃ karissāmi
atk-s0201a:2851_7: bāhitvā ca jajjharikāgumbatopi lakuṇḍakataranti evaṃ apasādeti nāma. Ayaṃ pana brahmā
atk-s0201a:2851_8: mānanissito, tasmā idha apasādanāva adhippetā. Āpādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2852_0: Apica te ahaṃ brahmeti idāni bhagavā, “ayaṃ brahmā mānanissito ‘ahaṃ jānāmī’ti maññati,
atk-s0201a:2852_1: attano yasena sammatto sarīraṃ phusitumpi samatthaṃ kiñci na passati, thokaṃ niggahetuṃ
atk-s0201a:2852_2: vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha gatiñca pajānāmīti nipphattiñca pajānāmi.
atk-s0201a:2852_3: Jutiñcāti ānubhāvañca pajānāmi. Evaṃ mahesakkhoti evaṃ mahāyaso mahāparivāro.
atk-s0201a:2853_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā vicaranti. Disā bhanti
atk-s0201a:2853_1: virocanāti disāsu virocamānā obhāsanti, disā vā tehi virocamānā obhāsanti. Tāva sahassadhā
atk-s0201a:2853_2: lokoti tattakena pamāṇena sahassadhā loko, iminā cakkavāḷena saddhiṃ cakkavāḷasahassanti
atk-s0201a:2853_3: attho. Ettha te vattate vasoti ettha cakkavāḷasahasse tuyhaṃ vaso vattati. Paroparañca
atk-s0201a:2853_4: jānāsīti ettha cakkavāḷasahasse paropare uccanīce hīnappaṇīte satte jānāsi. Atho
atk-s0201a:2853_5: rāgavirāginanti na kevalaṃ, “ayaṃ iddho ayaṃ pakatimanusso”ti paroparaṃ, “ayaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:2853_6: sarāgo ayaṃ vītarāgo”ti evaṃ rāgavirāginampi janaṃ jānāsi. Itthaṃbhāvaññathābhāvanti
atk-s0201a:2853_7: itthaṃbhāvoti idaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ. Aññathābhāvoti ito sesaṃ ekūnasahassaṃ. Sattānaṃ āgatiṃ
atk-s0201a:2853_8: gatinti ettha cakkavāḷasahasse paṭisandhivasena sattānaṃ āgatiṃ, cutivasena gatiṃ
atk-s0201a:2853_9: ca jānāsi. Tuyhaṃ pana atimahantohamasmīti saññā hoti, sahassibrahmā nāma tvaṃ, aññesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2853_10: pana tayā uttari dvisahassānaṃ tisahassānaṃ catusahassānaṃ pañcasahassānaṃ dasasahassānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2853_11: satasahassānañca brahmānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi, catuhatthāya pilotikāya paṭappamāṇaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0201a:2853_12: vāyamanto viya mahantosmīti saññaṃ karosīti niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2854_0: 504. Idhūpapannoti idha paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ upapanno. Tena taṃ tvaṃ na jānāsīti
atk-s0201a:2854_1: tena kāraṇena taṃ kāyaṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi. Neva te samasamoti jānitabbaṭṭhānaṃ patvāpi
atk-s0201a:2854_2: tayā samasamo na homi. Abhiññāyāti aññāya. Kuto nīceyyanti tayā nīcatarabhāvo pana mayhaṃ kuto.
atk-s0201a:2855_0: Heṭṭhūpapattiko kiresa brahmā anuppanne buddhuppāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2855_1: katvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā catutthajjhānabhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2855_2: vehapphalabrahmaloke pañcakappasatikaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti. Tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0201a:2855_3: ṭhatvā heṭṭūpapattikaṃ katvā tatiyajjhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā subhakiṇhabrahmaloke
atk-s0201a:2855_4: catusaṭṭhikappaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti. Tattha dutiyajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā ābhassaresu
atk-s0201a:2855_5: aṭṭhakappaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti. Tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2855_6: kappāyuko hutvā nibbatti, so paṭhamakāle attanā katakammañca nibbattaṭṭhānañca aññāsi,
atk-s0201a:2855_7: kāle pana gacchante ubhayaṃ pamussitvā sassatadiṭṭhiṃ uppādesi. Tena naṃ bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:2855_8: “tena taṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi…pe… kuto nīceyya”nti āha.
atk-s0201a:2856_0: Atha brahmā cintesi – “samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃ āyuñca nibbattaṭṭhānañca pubbekatakammañca
atk-s0201a:2856_1: jānāti, handa naṃ pubbe katakammaṃ pucchāmī”ti satthāraṃ attano pubbekatakammaṃ pucchi. Satthā kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2857_0: Pubbe kiresa kulaghare nibbattitvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā, “jātijarābyādhimaraṇassa
atk-s0201a:2857_1: antaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamma isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānalābhī
atk-s0201a:2857_2: hutvā gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā jhānaratiyā vītināmeti. Tadā ca kālena kālaṃ satthavāhā
atk-s0201a:2857_3: pañcahi sakaṭasatehi marukantāraṃ paṭipajjanti. Marukantāre pana divā na sakkā gantuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2857_4: rattiṃ gamanaṃ hoti. Atha purimasakaṭassa aggayuge yuttabalibaddā gacchantā nivattitvā
atk-s0201a:2857_5: āgatamaggābhimukhāva ahesuṃ. Itarasakaṭāni tatheva nivattitvā aruṇe uggate nivattitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2857_6: jāniṃsu. Tesañca tadā kantāraṃ atikkamanadivaso ahosi. Sabbaṃ dārudakaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2857_7: tasmā, “natthi dāni amhākaṃ jīvita”nti cintetvā goṇe cakkesu bandhitvā manussā sakaṭapacchāyāyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2857_8: pavisitvā nipajjiṃsu. Tāpasopi kālasseva paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā paṇṇasāladvāre nisinno
atk-s0201a:2857_9: gaṅgaṃ olokayamāno addasa gaṅgaṃ mahatā udakoghena vuyhamānaṃ pavattitamaṇikkhandhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2857_10: viya āgacchantiṃ. Disvā cintesi – “atthi nu kho imasmiṃ loke evarūpassa madhurodakassa
atk-s0201a:2857_11: alābhena kilissamānā sattā”ti. So evaṃ āvajjanto marukantāre taṃ satthaṃ disvā, “ime
atk-s0201a:2857_12: sattā mā nassantū”ti, “ito mahā udakakkhandho chijjitvā marukantāre satthābhimukho
atk-s0201a:2857_13: gacchatū”ti abhiññācittena adhiṭṭhāsi. Sahacittuppādena mātikāruḷhaṃ viya udakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2857_14: tattha agamāsi. Manussā udakasaddena vuṭṭhāya udakaṃ disvā hatthatuṭṭhā nhāyitvā
atk-s0201a:2857_15: pivitvā goṇepi pāyetvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu. Satthā taṃ brahmuno pubbakammaṃ dassento –
atk-s0201a:2863_0: Aparasmiṃ samaye tāpaso gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā āraññakaṃ gāmaṃ nissāya vasati.
atk-s0201a:2863_1: Tena ca samayena corā taṃ gāmaṃ paharitvā hatthasāraṃ gahetvā gāviyo ca karamare
atk-s0201a:2863_2: ca gahetvā gacchanti. Gāvopi sunakhāpi manussāpi mahāviravaṃ viravanti. Tāpaso taṃ
atk-s0201a:2863_3: saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āvajjanto, “manussānaṃ bhayaṃ uppanna”nti ñatvā,
atk-s0201a:2863_4: “mayi passante ime sattā mā nassantū”ti abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:2863_5: abhiññācittena corānaṃ paṭipathe caturaṅginisenaṃ māpesi kammasajjaṃ āgacchantiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2863_6: Corā disvā, “rājā”ti te maññamānā vilopaṃ chaḍḍetvā pakkamiṃsu. Tāpaso “yaṃ yassa
atk-s0201a:2863_7: santakaṃ, taṃ tasseva hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi, taṃ tatheva ahosi. Mahājano sotthibhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2863_8: pāpuṇi. Satthā idampi tassa pubbakammaṃ dassento –
atk-s0201a:2869_0: Puna ekasmiṃ samaye uparigaṅgāvāsikaṃ kulaṃ heṭṭhāgaṅgāvāsikena kulena saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ
atk-s0201a:2869_1: katvā nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ bandhitvā bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyañceva gandhamālādīni ca āropetvā
atk-s0201a:2869_2: gaṅgāsotena āgacchati. Manussā khādamānā bhuñjamānā naccantā gāyantā devavimānena
atk-s0201a:2869_3: gacchantā viya balavasomanassā ahesuṃ. Gaṅgeyyako nāgo disvā kupito, “ime mayi saññampi
atk-s0201a:2869_4: na karonti, idāni ne samuddameva pāpessāmī”ti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā udakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2869_5: dvidhā bhinditvā uṭṭhāya phaṇaṃ katvā sussūkāraṃ karonto aṭṭhāsi. Mahājano disvā
atk-s0201a:2869_6: bhīto vissaramakāsi. Tāpaso paṇṇasālāya nisinno sutvā, “ime gāyantā naccantā somanassajātā
atk-s0201a:2869_7: āgacchanti, idāni pana bhayaravaṃ raviṃsu, kiṃ nu kho”ti āvajjanto nāgarājaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a:2869_8: “mayi passante ime sattā mā nassantū”ti abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2869_9: vijahitvā supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ māpetvā nāgarājassa dassesi. Nāgarājā bhīto phaṇaṃ saṃharitvā
atk-s0201a:2869_10: udakaṃ paviṭṭho. Mahājano sotthibhāvaṃ pāpuṇi. Satthā idampi tassa pubbakammaṃ dassento –
atk-s0201a:2876_0: Aparasmiṃ samaye esa isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kesavo nāma tāpaso ahosi. Tena samayena
atk-s0201a:2876_1: amhākaṃ bodhisatto kappo nāma māṇavo kesavassa baddhacaro antevāsiko hutvā ācariyassa
atk-s0201a:2876_2: kiṃkārapaṭissāvī manāpacārī buddhisampanno atthacaro ahosi. Kesavo taṃ vinā vattituṃ
atk-s0201a:2876_3: nāsakkhi, taṃ nissāyeva jīvikaṃ kappesi. Satthā idampi tassa pubbakammaṃ dassento –
atk-s0201a:2882_0: Evaṃ brahmuno nānattabhāvesu katakammaṃ satthā pakāsesi. Satthari kathenteyeva brahmā
atk-s0201a:2882_1: sallakkhesi, dīpasahasse ujjalite rūpāni viya sabbakammānissa pākaṭāni ahesuṃ. So
atk-s0201a:2887_0: Athassa bhagavā uttari asamasamataṃ pakāsento pathaviṃ kho ahaṃ brahmetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2887_1: Tattha pathaviyā pathavattena ananubhūtanti pathaviyā pathavisabhāvena ananubhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a:2887_2: appattaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti? Nibbānaṃ. Tañhi sabbasmā saṅkhatā nissaṭattā pathavisabhāvena
atk-s0201a:2887_3: appattaṃ nāma. Tadabhiññāyāti taṃ nibbānaṃ jānitvā sacchikatvā. Pathaviṃ nāpahosinti
atk-s0201a:2887_4: pathaviṃ taṇhādiṭṭhimānagāhehi na gaṇhiṃ. Āpādīsupi eseva nayo. Vitthāro pana mūlapariyāye
atk-s0201a:2888_0: Sace kho te, mārisa, sabbassa sabbattenāti idameva brahmā attano vāditāya sabbanti
atk-s0201a:2888_1: akkharaṃ niddisitvā akkhare dosaṃ gaṇhanto āha. Satthā pana sakkāyaṃ sandhāya “sabba”nti
atk-s0201a:2888_2: vadati, brahmā sabbasabbaṃ sandhāya. Tvaṃ “sabba”nti vadasi, “sabbassa sabbattena
atk-s0201a:2888_3: ananubhūta”nti vadasi, yadi sabbaṃ ananubhūtaṃ natthi, athassa ananubhūtaṃ atthi.
atk-s0201a:2888_4: Mā heva te rittakameva ahosi tucchakameva ahosīti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ rittakaṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0201a:2888_5: tucchakaṃ mā hotūti satthāraṃ musāvādena niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2889_0: Satthā pana etasmā brahmunā sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena vādītaro,
atk-s0201a:2889_1: tasmā ahaṃ sabbañca vakkhāmi, ananubhūtañca vakkhāmi, suṇāhi meti tassa vādamaddanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2889_2: kāraṇaṃ āharanto viññāṇantiādimāha. Tattha viññāṇanti vijānitabbaṃ. Anidassananti
atk-s0201a:2889_3: cakkhuviññāṇassa āpāthaṃ anupagamanato anidassanaṃ nāma, padadvayenapi nibbānameva
atk-s0201a:2889_4: vuttaṃ. Anantanti tayidaṃ uppādavayaantarahitattā anantaṃ nāma. Vuttampi hetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:2891: Bhūte antāni dissanti, bhūte antā pakāsitā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2892_0: Sabbatopabhanti sabbaso pabhāsampannaṃ. Nibbānato hi añño dhammo sapabhataro vā jotivantataro
atk-s0201a:2892_1: vā parisuddhataro vā paṇḍarataro vā natthi. Sabbato vā tathā pabhūtameva, na katthaci
atk-s0201a:2892_2: natthīti sabbatopabhaṃ. Puratthimadisādīsu hi asukadisāya nāma nibbānaṃ natthīti
atk-s0201a:2892_3: na vattabbaṃ. Atha vā pabhanti titthassa nāmaṃ, sabbato pabhamassāti sabbatopabhaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2892_4: Nibbānassa kira yathā mahāsamuddassa yato yato otaritukāmā honti, taṃ tadeva titthaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2892_5: atitthaṃ nāma natthi. Evamevaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu yena yena mukhena nibbānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2892_6: otaritukāmā honti, taṃ tadeva titthaṃ. Nibbānassa atitthaṃ nāma kammaṭṭhānaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a:2892_7: Tena vuttaṃ sabbatopabhanti. Taṃ pathaviyā pathavattenāti taṃ nibbānaṃ pathaviyā
atk-s0201a:2892_8: pathavīsabhāvena tato paresaṃ āpādīnaṃ āpādisabhāvena ca ananubhūtaṃ. Iti yaṃ tumhādisānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2892_9: visayabhūtaṃ sabbatebhūmakadhammajātaṃ tassa sabbattena taṃ viññāṇaṃ anidassanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2893_0: Tato brahmā gahitagahitaṃ satthārā vissajjāpito kiñci gahetabbaṃ adisvā laḷitakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2893_1: kātukāmo handa carahi te, mārisa, antaradhāyāmīti āha. Tattha antaradhāyāmīti adissamānakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2893_2: karomīti āha. Sace visahasīti yadi sakkosi mayhaṃ antaradhāyituṃ, antaradhāyasi,
atk-s0201a:2893_3: pāṭihāriyaṃ karohīti. Nevassu me sakkoti antaradhāyitunti mayhaṃ antaradhāyituṃ neva
atk-s0201a:2893_4: sakkoti. Kiṃ panesa kātukāmo ahosīti? Mūlapaṭisandhiṃ gantukāmo ahosi. Brahmānañhi
atk-s0201a:2893_5: mūlapaṭisandhikaattabhāvo sukhumo, aññesaṃ anāpātho, abhisaṅkhatakāyeneva tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0201a:2893_6: Satthā tassa mūlapaṭisandhiṃ gantuṃ na adāsi. Mūlapaṭisandhiṃ vā agantvāpi yena tamena
atk-s0201a:2893_7: attānaṃ antaradhāpetvā adissamānako bhaveyya, satthā taṃ tamaṃ vinodesi, tasmā antaradhāyituṃ
atk-s0201a:2893_8: nāsakkhi. So asakkonto vimāne nilīyati, kapparukkhe nilīyati, ukkuṭiko nisīdati.
atk-s0201a:2893_9: Brahmagaṇo keḷimakāsi – “esa kho bako brahmā vimāne nilīyati, kapparukkhe nilīyati,
atk-s0201a:2893_10: ukkuṭiko nisīdati, brahme tvaṃ antarahitomhī”ti saññaṃ uppādesi nāmāti. So brahmagaṇena
atk-s0201a:2894_0: Evaṃ vutte ahaṃ, bhikkhaveti, bhikkhave, etena brahmunā, “handa carahi te, mārisa,
atk-s0201a:2894_1: antaradhāyāmī”ti evaṃ vutte taṃ antaradhāyituṃ asakkontaṃ disvā ahaṃ etadavocaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2894_2: Imaṃ gāthamabhāsinti kasmā bhagavā gāthamabhāsīti? Samaṇassa gotamassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0201a:2894_3: atthibhāvo vā natthibhāvo vā kathaṃ sakkā jānitunti evaṃ brahmagaṇassa vacanokāso
atk-s0201a:2895_0: Tattha bhavevāhaṃ bhayaṃ disvāti ahaṃ bhave bhayaṃ disvāyeva. Bhavañca vibhavesinanti
atk-s0201a:2895_1: imañca kāmabhavāditividhampi sattabhavaṃ vibhavesinaṃ vibhavaṃ gavesamānaṃ pariyesamānampi
atk-s0201a:2895_2: punappunaṃ bhaveyeva disvā. Bhavaṃ nābhivadinti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kiñci bhavaṃ na
atk-s0201a:2895_3: abhivadiṃ, na gavesinti attho. Nandiñca na upādiyinti bhavataṇhaṃ na upagañchiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2895_4: na aggahesinti attho. Iti cattāri saccāni pakāsento satthā dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0201a:2895_5: desanānusārena vipassanāgabbhaṃ gāhāpetvā dasamattāni brahmasahassāni maggaphalāmatapānaṃ piviṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2896_0: Acchariyabbhutacittajātāti acchariyajātā abbhutajātā tuṭṭhijātā ca ahesuṃ. Samūlaṃ
atk-s0201a:2896_1: bhavaṃ udabbahīti bodhimaṇḍe attano tāya tāya desanāya aññesampi bahūnaṃ devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2896_2: samūlakaṃ bhavaṃ udabbahi, uddhari uppāṭesīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2897_0: 505. Tasmiṃ pana samaye māro pāpimā kodhābhibhūto hutvā, “mayi vicaranteyeva samaṇena
atk-s0201a:2897_1: gotamena dhammakathaṃ kathetvā dasamattāni brahmasahassāni mama vasaṃ ativattitānī”ti
atk-s0201a:2897_2: kodhābhibhūtatāya aññatarassa brahmapārisajjassa sarīre adhimucci, taṃ dassetuṃ atha
atk-s0201a:2897_3: kho, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha sace tvaṃ evaṃ anubuddhoti sace tvaṃ evaṃ attanāva
atk-s0201a:2897_4: cattāri saccāni anubuddho. Mā sāvake upanesīti gihisāvake vā pabbajitasāvake vā taṃ
atk-s0201a:2897_5: dhammaṃ mā upanayasi. Hīne kāye patiṭṭhitāti catūsu apāyesu patiṭṭhitā. Paṇīte kāye
atk-s0201a:2897_6: patiṭṭhitāti brahmaloke patiṭṭhitā. Idaṃ ke sandhāya vadati? Bāhirapabbajjaṃ pabbajite
atk-s0201a:2897_7: tāpasaparibbājake. Anuppanne hi buddhuppāde kulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0201a:2897_8: kassaci kiñci avicāretvā ekacarā hutvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā brahmaloke uppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2897_9: te sandhāya evamāha. Anakkhātaṃ kusalañhi mārisāti paresaṃ anakkhātaṃ anovadanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2897_10: dhammakathāya akathanaṃ kusalaṃ etaṃ seyyo. Mā paraṃ ovadāhīti kālena manussalokaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2897_11: kālena devalokaṃ, kālena brahmalokaṃ, kālena nāgalokaṃ āhiṇḍanto mā vicari, ekasmiṃ
atk-s0201a:2897_12: ṭhāne nisinno jhānamaggaphalasukhena vītināmehīti. Anālapanatāyāti anullapanatāya.
atk-s0201a:2897_13: Brahmuno ca abhinimantanatāyāti bakabrahmuno ca idañhi, mārisa, niccantiādinā nayena
atk-s0201a:2897_14: saha kāyakena brahmaṭṭhānena nimantanavacanena. Tasmāti tena kāraṇena. Imassa veyyākaraṇassa
atk-s0201a:2897_15: brahmanimantanikaṃtveva adhivacanaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti jātā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0201a:2901_0: 506. Evaṃ me sutanti māratajjanīyasuttaṃ. Tattha koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭhoti kucchiṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0201a:2901_1: antānaṃ anto anupaviṭṭho, pakkāsayaṭṭhāne nisinno. Garugaro viyāti garukagaruko viya
atk-s0201a:2901_2: thaddho pāsāṇapuñjasadiso. Māsācitaṃ maññeti māsabhattaṃ bhuttassa kucchi viya māsapūritapasibbako
atk-s0201a:2901_3: viya tintamāso viya cāti attho. Vihāraṃ pavisitvāti sace āhāradosena esa garubhāvo,
atk-s0201a:2901_4: abbhokāse caṅkamituṃ na sappāyanti caṅkamā orohitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā pakatipaññatte
atk-s0201a:2901_5: āsane nisīdi. Paccattaṃ yoniso manasākāsīti, “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āvajjamāno attanoyeva
atk-s0201a:2901_6: upāyena manasi akāsi. Sace pana thero attano sīlaṃ āvajjetvā, “yaṃ hiyyo vā pare
atk-s0201a:2901_7: vā parasuve vā paribhuttaṃ avipakkamatthi, añño vā koci visabhāgadoso, sabbaṃ jīratu
atk-s0201a:2901_8: phāsukaṃ hotū”ti hatthena kucchiṃ parāmasissa, māro pāpimā vilīyitvā agamissa. Thero
atk-s0201a:2901_9: pana tathā akatvā yoniso manasi akāsi. Mā tathāgataṃ vihesesīti yathā hi puttesu
atk-s0201a:2901_10: vihesitesu mātāpitaro vihesitāva honti, saddhivihārikaantevāsikesu vihesitesu ācariyupajjhāyā
atk-s0201a:2901_11: vihesitāva, janapade vihesite rājā vihesitova hoti, evaṃ tathāgatasāvake vihesite
atk-s0201a:2901_12: tathāgato vihesitova hoti. Tenāha – “mā tathāgataṃ vihesesī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2902: Paccaggaḷe aṭṭhāsīti patiaggaḷeva aṭṭhāsi. Aggaḷaṃ vuccati kavāṭaṃ, mukhena uggantvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā bahipaṇṇasālāya kavāṭaṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2903_0: 507. Bhūtapubbāhaṃ pāpimāti kasmā idaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi? Thero kira cintesi – “ākāsaṭṭhakadevatānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2903_1: tāva manussagandho yojanasate ṭhitānaṃ ābādhaṃ karoti. Vuttañhetaṃ – ‘yojanasataṃ
atk-s0201a:2903_2: kho rājañña manussagandho deve ubbādhatī’ti. Ayaṃ pana māro nāgariko paricokkho mahesakkho
atk-s0201a:2903_3: ānubhāvasampanno devarājā samāno mama kucchiyaṃ pavisitvā antānaṃ anto pakkāsayokāse
atk-s0201a:2903_4: nisinno ativiya paduṭṭho bhavissati. Evarūpaṃ nāma jegucchaṃ paṭikūlaṃ okāsaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0201a:2903_5: nisīdituṃ sakkontassa kimaññaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ bhavissati, kiṃ aññaṃ lajjissati, tvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2903_6: mama ñātikoti pana vutte mudubhāvaṃ anāpajjamāno nāma natthi, handassa ñātikoṭiṃ
atk-s0201a:2903_7: paṭivijjhitvā mudukeneva naṃ upāyena vissajjessāmī”ti cintetvā imaṃ desanamārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2904_0: So me tvaṃ bhāgineyyo hosīti so tvaṃ tasmiṃ kāle mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo hosi. Idaṃ paveṇivasena
atk-s0201a:2904_1: vuttaṃ. Devalokasmiṃ pana mārassa pitu vaṃso pitāmahassa vaṃso rajjaṃ karonto nāma
atk-s0201a:2904_2: natthi, puññavasena devaloke devarājā hutvā nibbatto, yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā cavati.
atk-s0201a:2904_3: Añño eko attanā katena kammena tasmiṃ ṭhāne adhipati hutvā nibbattati. Iti ayaṃ māropi
atk-s0201a:2904_4: tadā tato cavitvā puna kusalaṃ katvā imasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ adhipatiṭṭhāne nibbattoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2905_0: Vidhuroti vigatadhuro, aññehi saddhiṃ asadisoti attho. Appakasirenāti appadukkhena.
atk-s0201a:2905_1: Pasupālakāti ajeḷakapālakā. Pathāvinoti maggapaṭipannā. Kāye upacinitvāti samantato
atk-s0201a:2905_2: citakaṃ bandhitvā. Aggiṃ datvā pakkamiṃsūti ettakena sarīraṃ pariyādānaṃ gamissatīti
atk-s0201a:2905_3: citakassa pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā catūsu disāsu aggiṃ datvā pakkamiṃsu. Citako padīpasikhā
atk-s0201a:2905_4: viya pajjali, therassa udakaleṇaṃ pavisitvā nisinnakālo viya ahosi. Cīvarāni papphoṭetvāti
atk-s0201a:2905_5: samāpattito vuṭṭhāya vigatadhūme kiṃsukavaṇṇe aṅgāre maddamāno cīvarāni vidhunitvā.
atk-s0201a:2905_6: Sarīre panassa usumamattampi nāhosi, cīvaresu aṃsumattampi najjhāyi, samāpattiphalaṃ nāmetaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2906_0: 508. Akkosathāti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosatha. Paribhāsathāti vācāya paribhāsatha.
atk-s0201a:2906_1: Rosethāti ghaṭṭetha. Vihesethāti dukkhāpetha. Sabbametaṃ vācāya ghaṭṭanasseva adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2906_2: Yathā taṃ dūsī māroti yathā etesaṃ dūsī māro. Labhetha otāranti labhetha chiddaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2906_3: kilesuppattiyā ārammaṇaṃ paccayaṃ labheyyāti attho. Muṇḍakātiādīsu muṇḍe muṇḍāti
atk-s0201a:2906_4: samaṇe ca samaṇāti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya, ime pana hīḷentā muṇḍakā samaṇakāti āhaṃsu. Ibbhāti
atk-s0201a:2906_5: gahapatikā. Kiṇhāti kaṇhā, kāḷakāti attho. Bandhupādāpaccāti ettha bandhūti brahmā
atk-s0201a:2906_6: adhippeto. Tañhi brāhmaṇā pitāmahoti voharanti. Pādānaṃ apaccā pādāpaccā, brahmuno
atk-s0201a:2906_7: piṭṭhipādato jātāti adhippāyo. Tesaṃ kira ayaṃ laddhi – “brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato
atk-s0201a:2906_8: nikkhantā, khattiyā urato, vessā nābhito, suddā jāṇuto, samaṇā piṭṭhipādato”ti.
atk-s0201a:2907_0: Jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmāti jhāyino mayaṃ jhāyino mayanti. Madhurakajātāti ālasiyajātā.
atk-s0201a:2907_1: Jhāyantīti cintayanti. Pajjhāyantītiādīni upasaggavasena vaḍḍhitāni. Mūsikaṃ maggayamānoti
atk-s0201a:2907_2: sāyaṃ gocaratthāya susirarukkhato nikkhantaṃ rukkhasākhāya mūsikaṃ pariyesanto. So
atk-s0201a:2907_3: kira upasantūpasanto viya niccalova tiṭṭhati, sampattakāle mūsikaṃ sahasā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2907_4: Kotthūti siṅgālo, soṇotipi vadanti. Sandhisamalasaṅkaṭireti sandhimhi ca samale ca
atk-s0201a:2907_5: saṅkaṭire ca. Tattha sandhi nāma gharasandhi. Samalo nāma gūthaniddhamanapanāḷi.
atk-s0201a:2907_6: Saṅkaṭiraṃ nāma saṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ. Vahacchinnoti kantārato nikkhanto chinnavaho. Sandhisamalasaṅkaṭireti
atk-s0201a:2907_7: sandhimhi vā samale vā saṅkaṭire vā. Sopi hi baddhagatto viya niccalo jhāyati.
atk-s0201a:2908_0: Nirayaṃ upapajjantīti sace māro manussānaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā evaṃ kareyya, manussānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2908_1: akusalaṃ na bhaveyya, mārasseva bhaveyya. Sarīre pana anadhimuccitvā visabhāgavatthuṃ
atk-s0201a:2908_2: vippaṭisārārammaṇaṃ dasseti, tadā kira so bhikkhū khippaṃ gahetvā macche ajjhottharante
atk-s0201a:2908_3: viya, jālaṃ gahetvā macche gaṇhante viya, lepayaṭṭhiṃ oḍḍetvā sakuṇe bandhante viya,
atk-s0201a:2908_4: sunakhehi saddhiṃ araññe migavaṃ carante viya, mātugāme gahetvā āpānabhūmiyaṃ nisinne
atk-s0201a:2908_5: viya, naccante viya, gāyante viya, bhikkhunīnaṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu visabhāgamanusse
atk-s0201a:2908_6: nisinne viya, ṭhite viya ca katvā dassesi. Manussā araññagatāpi vanagatāpi vihāragatāpi
atk-s0201a:2908_7: vippaṭisārārammaṇaṃ passitvā āgantvā aññesaṃ kathenti – “samaṇā evarūpaṃ assamaṇakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2908_8: ananucchavikaṃ karonti, etesaṃ dinne kuto kusalaṃ, mā etesaṃ kiñci adatthā”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0201a:2908_9: te manussā diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne sīlavante akkosantā apuññaṃ pasavitvā apāyapūrakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2909_0: 509. Anvāviṭṭhāti āvaṭṭitā. Pharitvā vihariṃsūti na kevalaṃ pharitvā vihariṃsu. Kakusandhassa
atk-s0201a:2909_1: pana bhagavato ovāde ṭhatvā ime cattāro brahmavihāre nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2910_0: 510. Āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vāti paṭisandhivasena āgamanaṭṭhānaṃ vā, cutivasena gamanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2910_1: vā na jānāmi. Siyā cittassa aññathattanti somanassavasena aññathattaṃ bhaveyya. Saggaṃ
atk-s0201a:2910_2: lokaṃ upapajjantīti idhāpi purimanayeneva attho veditabbo. Yathā hi pubbe vippaṭisārakaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2910_3: ārammaṇaṃ dasseti, evamidhāpi pasādakaraṃ. So kira tadā manussānaṃ dassanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0201a:2910_4: bhikkhū ākāse gacchante viya, ṭhite viya pallaṅkena nisinne viya, ākāse sūcikammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2910_5: karonte viya, potthakaṃ vācente viya, ākāse cīvaraṃ pasāretvā kāyaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpente
atk-s0201a:2910_6: viya, navapabbajite ākāsena carante viya, taruṇasāmaṇere ākāse ṭhatvā pupphāni ocinante
atk-s0201a:2910_7: viya katvā dassesi. Manussā araññagatāpi vanagatāpi vihāragatāpi pabbajitānaṃ taṃ
atk-s0201a:2910_8: paṭipattiṃ disvā āgantvā aññesaṃ kathenti – “bhikkhūsu antamaso sāmaṇerāpi evaṃmahiddhiko
atk-s0201a:2910_9: mahānubhāvā, etesaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ nāma hoti, etesaṃ detha sakkarothā”ti. Tato
atk-s0201a:2910_10: manussā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi sakkarontā bahuṃ puññaṃ katvā saggapathapūrakā
atk-s0201a:2911: 511. Etha tumhe, bhikkhave, asubhānupassino kāye viharathāti bhagavā sakalajambudīpaṃ āhiṇḍanto antamaso dvinnampi tiṇṇampi bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0201a:2912_0: “Asubhasaññāparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato methunadhammasamāpattiyā
atk-s0201a:2912_1: cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati, upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti.
atk-s0201a:2913_0: Āhāre paṭikūlasaññāparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato rasataṇhāya
atk-s0201a:2913_1: cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati, upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti.
atk-s0201a:2914_0: Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññāparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato
atk-s0201a:2914_1: lokacitresu cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati, upekkhā vā
atk-s0201a:2915_0: Aniccasaññāparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato lābhasakkārasiloke
atk-s0201a:2915_1: cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati, upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā
atk-s0201a:2916_0: Etha tumhe, bhikkhave, asubhānupassī kāye viharatha, āhāre paṭikūlasaññino sabbaloke
atk-s0201a:2916_1: anabhiratisaññino sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassinoti. Imāni cattāri kammaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0201a:2916_2: kathesi. Tepi bhikkhū imesu catūsu kammaṭṭhānesu kammaṃ karontā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0201a:2916_3: sabbāsave khepetvā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, imānipi cattāri kammaṭṭhānāni rāgasantāni
atk-s0201a:2917_0: 512. Sakkharaṃ gahetvāti antomuṭṭhiyaṃ tiṭṭhanapamāṇaṃ pāsāṇaṃ gahetvā. Ayañhi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi
atk-s0201a:2917_1: bhikkhū akkosāpetvāpi, brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ vasena bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0201a:2917_2: uppādāpetvāpi, otāraṃ alabhanto idāni sahatthā upakkamitukāmo aññatarassa kumārassa
atk-s0201a:2917_3: sarīre adhimuccitvā evarūpaṃ pāsāṇaṃ aggahesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sakkharaṃ gahetvā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2918_0: Sīsaṃ vo bhindīti sīsaṃ bhindi, mahācammaṃ chijjitvā maṃsaṃ dvedhā ahosi. Sakkharā
atk-s0201a:2918_1: panassa sīsakaṭāhaṃ abhinditvā aṭṭhiṃ āhacceva nivattā. Nāgāpalokitaṃ apalokesīti
atk-s0201a:2918_2: pahārasaddaṃ sutvā yathā nāma hatthināgo ito vā etto vā apaloketukāmo gīvaṃ aparivattetvā
atk-s0201a:2918_3: sakalasarīreneva nivattitvā apaloketi. Evaṃ sakalasarīreneva nivattitvā apalokesi.
atk-s0201a:2918_4: Yathā hi mahājanassa aṭṭhīni koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca ṭhitāni, paccekabuddhānaṃ aṅkusalaggāni,
atk-s0201a:2918_5: na evaṃ buddhānaṃ. Buddhānaṃ pana saṅkhalikāni viya ekābaddhāni hutvā ṭhitāni, tasmā
atk-s0201a:2918_6: pacchato apalokanakāle na sakkā hoti gīvaṃ parivattetuṃ. Yathā pana hatthināgo pacchābhāgaṃ
atk-s0201a:2918_7: apaloketukāmo sakalasarīreneva parivattati, evaṃ parivattitabbaṃ hoti. Tasmā bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2918_8: yantena parivattitā suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya sakalasarīreneva nivattitvā apalokesi, apaloketvā
atk-s0201a:2918_9: ṭhito pana, “na vāyaṃ dūsī māro mattamaññāsī”ti āha. Tassattho, ayaṃ dūsī māro pāpaṃ
atk-s0201a:2919_0: Sahāpalokanāyāti kakusandhassa bhagavato apalokaneneva saha taṅkhaṇaññeva. Tamhā
atk-s0201a:2919_1: ca ṭhānā cavīti tamhā ca devaṭṭhānā cuto, mahānirayaṃ upapannoti attho. Cavamāno
atk-s0201a:2919_2: hi na yattha katthaci ṭhito cavati, tasmā vasavattidevalokaṃ āgantvā cuto, “sahāpalokanāyā”ti
atk-s0201a:2919_3: ca vacanato na bhagavato apalokitattā cutoti veditabbo, cutikāladassanamattameva
atk-s0201a:2919_4: hetaṃ. Uḷāre pana mahāsāvake viraddhattā kudāriyā pahaṭaṃ viyassa āyu tattheva chijjitvā
atk-s0201a:2919_5: gatanti veditabbaṃ. Tayo nāmadheyyā hontīti tīṇi nāmāni honti. Chaphassāyatanikoti
atk-s0201a:2920_0: Saṅkusamāhatoti ayasūlehi samāhato. Paccattavedaniyoti sayameva vedanājanako. Saṅkunā
atk-s0201a:2920_1: saṅku hadaye samāgaccheyyāti ayasūlena saddhiṃ ayasūlaṃ hadayamajjhe samāgaccheyya.
atk-s0201a:2920_2: Tasmiṃ kira niraye upapannānaṃ tigāvuto attabhāvo hoti, therassāpi tādiso ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2920_3: Athassa hi nirayapālā tālakkhandhapamāṇāni ayasūlāni ādittāni sampajjalitāni sajotibhūtāni
atk-s0201a:2920_4: sayameva gahetvā punappunaṃ nivattamānā, – “iminā te ṭhānena cintetvā pāpaṃ kata”nti
atk-s0201a:2920_5: pūvadoṇiyaṃ pūvaṃ koṭṭento viya hadayamajjhaṃ koṭṭetvā, paṇṇāsa janā pādābhimukhā
atk-s0201a:2920_6: paṇṇāsa janā sīsābhimukhā koṭṭetvā gacchanti, evaṃ gacchantā pañcahi vassasatehi
atk-s0201a:2920_7: ubho ante patvā puna nivattamānā pañcahi vassasatehi hadayamajjhaṃ āgacchanti. Taṃ
atk-s0201a:2921_0: Vuṭṭhānimanti vipākavuṭṭhānavedanaṃ. Sā kira mahāniraye vedanāto dukkhatarā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2921_1: yathā hi sinehapānasattāhato parihārasattāhaṃ dukkhataraṃ, evaṃ mahānirayadukkhato
atk-s0201a:2921_2: ussade vipākavuṭṭhānavedanā dukkhatarāti vadanti. Seyyathāpi macchassāti purisasīsañhi
atk-s0201a:2921_3: vaṭṭaṃ hoti, sūlena paharantassa pahāro ṭhānaṃ na labhati parigalati, macchasīsaṃ
atk-s0201a:2921_4: āyataṃ puthulaṃ, pahāro ṭhānaṃ labhati, avirajjhitvā kammakāraṇā sukarā hoti, tasmā
atk-s0201a:2922_0: 513. Vidhuraṃ sāvakamāsajjāti vidhuraṃ sāvakaṃ ghaṭṭayitvā. Paccattavedanāti sayameva
atk-s0201a:2922_1: pāṭiyekkavedanājanakā. Īdiso nirayo āsīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne nirayo devadūtasuttena dīpetabbo.
atk-s0201a:2922_2: Kaṇha-dukkhaṃ nigacchasīti kāḷaka-māra, dukkhaṃ vindissasi. Majjhe sarassāti mahāsamuddassa
atk-s0201a:2922_3: majjhe udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvā nibbattavimānāni kappaṭṭhitikāni honti, tesaṃ veḷuriyassa
atk-s0201a:2922_4: viya vaṇṇo hoti, pabbatamatthake jalitanaḷaggikkhandho viya ca nesaṃ acciyo jotanti,
atk-s0201a:2922_5: pabhassarā pabhāsampannā honti, tesu vimānesu nīlabhedādivasena nānattavaṇṇā accharā
atk-s0201a:2922_6: naccanti. Yo etamabhijānātīti yo etaṃ vimānavatthuṃ jānātīti attho. Evamettha vimānapetavatthukeneva
atk-s0201a:2922_7: attho veditabbo. Pādaṅguṭṭhena kampayīti idaṃ pāsādakampanasuttena dīpetabbaṃ. Yo
atk-s0201a:2922_8: vejayantaṃ pāsādanti idaṃ cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttena dīpetabbaṃ. Sakkaṃ so paripucchatīti
atk-s0201a:2922_9: idampi teneva dīpetabbaṃ. Sudhammāyābhito sabhanti sudhammasabhāya samīpe, ayaṃ pana
atk-s0201a:2922_10: brahmaloke sudhammasabhāva, na tāvatiṃsabhavane. Sudhammasabhāvirahito hi devaloko nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2923_0: Brahmaloke pabhassaranti brahmaloke mahāmoggallānamahākassapādīhi sāvakehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0201a:2923_1: tassa tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa bhagavato obhāsaṃ. Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā
atk-s0201a:2923_2: brahmaloke sudhammāya devasabhāya sannipatitvā, – “atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0201a:2923_3: vā evaṃmahiddhiko. Yo idha āgantuṃ sakkuṇeyyā”ti cintentasseva brahmagaṇassa cittamaññāya
atk-s0201a:2923_4: tattha gantvā brahmagaṇassa matthake nisinno tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2923_5: āgamanaṃ cintesi. Tepi gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā paccekaṃ
atk-s0201a:2923_6: disāsu nisīdiṃsu, sakalabrahmaloko ekobhāso ahosi. Satthā catusaccappakāsanaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2923_7: desesi, desanāpariyosāne anekāni brahmasahassāni maggaphalesu patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Taṃ
atk-s0201a:2923_8: sandhāyimā gāthā vuttā, so panāyamattho aññatarabrahmasuttena dīpetabbo.
atk-s0201a:2924_0: Vimokkhena aphassayīti jhānavimokkhena phusi. Vananti jambudīpaṃ. Pubbavidehānanti
atk-s0201a:2924_1: pubbavidehānañca dīpaṃ. Ye ca bhūmisayā narāti bhūmisayā narā nāma aparagoyānakā
atk-s0201a:2924_2: ca uttarakurukā ca. Tepi sabbe phusīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ pana attho nandopanandadamanena
atk-s0201a:2924_3: dīpetabbo. Vatthu visuddhimagge iddhikathāya vitthāritaṃ. Apuññaṃ pasavīti apuññaṃ
atk-s0201a:2924_4: paṭilabhi. Āsaṃ mā akāsi bhikkhūsūti bhikkhū vihesemīti etaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsi. Sesaṃ
